Summary: We stayed 4 nights and the room was better than expected. It was clean and the beds were very comfortable.  The room size easily accommodated 2 queen beds, couch and desk.  If staying more than 1 night, you do have to request room refresh as needed. I prefer daily, but it was okay requesting on demand and getting same day service.
Manager Response: Dear Karenanderson65,  Thank you for the wonderful review on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am pleased to hear the stay was comfortable and clean and that you liked the size of the room.  Hopefully; we have the pleasure to host your next Disneyland trip again.  Warm regards;  Management

Summary Heading: It’s ok. But I wouldn’t stay again.
Summary: We stayed for two nights during our Disney trip. I have good and bad things to say.  Pro: two full beds were comfortable. Linens and pillows were changed and nice and clean. Pro:staff was nice and very attentive and super helpful with extra blankets and towels. Pros:microwave and Fridge Pro: free parking Pro:about 13-15 minute walk to Disneyland.  Cons: The room itself was not very clean and things needed fixing.   -Whoever cleans the rooms are not doing there job.  Toilet had pee on it and I found a public hair.  Yuck!!!!! Then I found some long hairs.   Mirrors were streaky and had water spots from previous person…. Nothing was wiped down. Bathroom/all tile floor has not been vacuumed/swept or mopped in who knows how long. Lots of dust and dirt.  Shower shelf was falling off.
Manager Response: Dear secnars85,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Wyndham Anaheim. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies.  Your feedback is very important to us, and I am saddened to hear that the stay was unsatisfactory, we have shared this review with the Housekeeping Supervisor. Please rest assured that we are taking the appropriate measures to address the problem and prevent any future occurrences. Here at Wyndham Anaheim Hotel, we continuously strive to meet your needs and expectations.   We appreciate the time you took to share your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: Stayed here while we were visiting Disneyland. Hotel was a 10-15 minute walk to the park which was amazing. Staff was very helpful and kind when we checked in. They gave us directions to the parks and information about the area. Rooms were clean and beds were very comfortable. There is a Starbucks in the hotel; however, it closes at 1130. Wish we were stayed longer, but will definitely book again when we are in the area.
Manager Response: Dear jessjess2407,  Thank you for rating us 5 stars out of 5!  I am happy to hear the stay was comfortable and clean and the staff was friendly and helpful.   Can't wait to host your next Disneyland trip again.   Warm regards;  Management

Summary: The staff provided exceptional customer service. The hotel is new, modern and very clean. My family really enjoyed our stay and can't wait to come back. Free parking, heated pool, clean rooms, snacks and drinks available in the lobby.
Manager Response: Dear Vacationer235019,  Thank you for rating us 5 stars out of 5!  I am happy to hear that your stay was comfortable and clean and the staff was friendly and helpful.   Hopefully; we have the pleasure to host your next Disneyland trip again.   Warm regards;  Management

Summary: Pleasant, helpful, and attentive staff.  Great location near Disney parks entrance.  Great property with solid amenities. Well kept property.  Secured lot, underground parking to keep your vehicle and belongings safe.
Manager Response: Dear sunfun2492,  Thank you for the amazing review on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. Warm regards;  Management

Summary: Clean rooms and facility. Friendly employees. Free parking and close to Disneyland, only took about 15 min to walk there with our young kids. Heated pool although we didnt get to use it this trip. Nice selection of restaurants at the mall 1 block away.
Manager Response: Dear jcjolleyfam,  Thank you for the review on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. Warm regards;  Management

Summary: Exceptional service - every employee we encountered was friendly and very helpful.  Lots of restaurants nearby and Walgreens and CVS across the street. The cafe in the lobby had great service too, and great breakfast options.  About 15 mins walk to Disney gates. Free parking was a great perk too. Pool was decent for our 9 year old - it was chilly outside, but pool/hot tub were warm.
Manager Response: Dear Travel566451,  Thank you for the amazing review on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. Warm regards;  Management

Summary: Very very clean and the location was so close to Disney, we could walk back for a break from the park. They were very friendly at the front desk as we arrived after midnight. Many stores, coffee shop option and restaurants close by. Parked our car and didn’t need to use it for two days.
Manager Response: Dear Joflores74,  Thank you for the wonderful review on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. Warm regards;  Management

Summary: I love staying here.  The hotel is conveniently located. It's within walking distance of Disneyland.  It's about a 15 minute walk. The staff is super friendly. The rooms are very nice and comfortable.  This is my go to place in Anaheim. Parking is free and secured.
Manager Response: Dear Caroline D,  Thank you for the wonderful review on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am pleased to hear the stay was comfortable and the staff was friendly and helpful.   Hopefully; we have the pleasure to host your next Disneyland trip with us again.   Warm regards;  Management

Summary Heading: Great place to stay when at Disneyland!
Summary: We went for our annual family trip to Disneyland and this was our first time staying here. We had a wonderful experience and Sandra the Manager, as well as the Wyndham staff members were all friendly and wonderful. Sandra made sure we were comfortable during our stay, ensured that our room was comfortable for a family of 4 plus our niece who was with us. She always greeted us a with a smile upon returning from the parks. The rooms were clean and anything we needed, everyone was more than happy to help. Would stay here again! And thank you Sandra for everything!
Manager Response: Dear Z2642APjanicet,  Thank you for the wonderful review on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am pleased to hear the staff was helpful and friendly, especially Sandra ( front desk agent) went above and beyond.  Can't wait to host your next Disneyland trip with us again.   Warm regards;  Management

Summary: Shout out to Jung she literally is the best!!! She’s super helpful, kind, caring, compassionate an overall rockstar! She definitely deserves a raise and promotion! The hotel was super nice as well clean and in the BESTTT location!

I will share your comments with our team, who I am certain will be encouraged by your remarks. Here at Wyndham Anaheim, we continuously strive to exceed your expectations.  Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary Heading: I highly recommend this hotel no matter your reason to stay.
Summary: This hotel has been a place I’ve spent the last two nights. It is a beautiful and well maintained hotel. We had a small holiday retreat and the steam members were very attentive as well as very helpful throughout our stay. Each one has a small no matter how old or young each guest was. I spend over 259 room nights ea h year in a hotel but what I loved about this hotel is that every touchpoint for me was provided. We had hand sanitizing stations in our rooms and on each floor including lobby. The lobby coffee shop was awesome in the morning to grab a white bit, they have this hidden quiet area on the second floor if we needed to gather in the evening with our colleagues.   The icing on the. Ale was how close we were to restaurants as well as Disney theme parks. I intend to choose

Summary: This hotel is an easy 15- 20 minute walk to Disneyland. We love the free parking and coffee shop in the lobby.   While the amenities, location and price were what attracted us to this location....it's the great staff that make us keep coming back. Over multiple stays, the staff has always been very friendly and helpful. Especially Ozzie who is the Front Desk Manager. But... everyone at the front desk has been great.   We keep looking at other options in the Disney area...but we always end up back at this location because our experience has always been so good. Great value also.

Summary: Had a wonderful time and really enjoyed our stay at Wyndham Anaheim. It is a good distance to Disneyland Parks and Downtown Disney. Kids were excited about how nice the rooms were as well as the walk to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear mariojimenez2315,  Thank you for rating us 5 stars out of 5! I am happy to hear the stay was comfortable and the location was perfect for you.  Hopefully; we have the pleasure to host your next Disneyland trip with us again.   Warm regards;  Management

Summary: We stayed here on Nov. 18 for one night. Between us we had 4 rooms. The staff was excellent! Being allowed a parking pass to park on the hotel grounds and walk to Disneyland was a deciding factor. The entire hotel looked new, it was nice. There was a smell in our room, I thought it might be a COVID cleaning agent but it wasn’t present in the other guests rooms only ours. Make sure you sign up to be a member before hand, so you can take advantage of a free Starbucks coffee (even the fancy ones), that was a really nice perk. There are so many close by places to eat also.
Manager Response: Dear Gram-Glam,  Thank you for rating us 5 stars out of 5!  I am pleased to hear the stay was comfortable, the staff was helpful and friendly  and location was perfect for you. Sorry to hear you encountered a smell in the room, we have shared this review with the housekeeping director.  Hopefully; we have the pleasure to host your next Disneyland trip with us again.  Warm regards;  Management

Summary Heading: Always stay here for our Disneyland trips
Summary: Staff were very friendly and pleasant both checking in and checking out.   Room was very clean.  Beds were very comfortable.  The noise from other rooms are minimal.  Love their parking privileges! I will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear 756yvonneg,  Thank you for the wonderful review on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am pleased  to hear the stay was clean, the beds were comfortable and the staff was helpful and friendly. Can't wait to host your next Disneyland trip with us again.  Warm regards;  Management

Summary: I cannot recommend this hotel enough. The staff was courteous, friendly, respectful, and welcoming. The room was clean and comfortable. The hotel itself was convenient to both the convention center and Disneyland. The room had a Keurig and also has a cafe in the lobby, so I felt right at home.
Manager Response: Dear asmith1228,  Thank you fort he amazing review on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am ecstatic to hear the stay was comfortable, clean, the staff was helpful and friendly and the location was perfect for you.  Hopefully; we have the pleasure to host your next Disneyland trip with us again.   Warm regards;  Management

Summary: I was greatly satisfied with the accommodations and service that we received! The front desk, the cleaning staff, and the Starbucks staff were all very friendly and helpful! The location was approximately 15 minutes walking distance from Disneyland and was adjacent to a great variety of eateries. The only thing we did notice was the water from the bathroom sink faucet did have a funky smell to it initially but would clear up; the shower did not have that problem. We did like the rainfall shower; it felt amazing! Overall, it made a very stressful vacation a lot more enjoyable and we’ll gladly come back!
Manager Response: Dear orsya231,  Thank you for the wonderful review on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am ecstatic to hear the stay was comfortable, the staff was helpful and friendly and the location was perfect for you.  Can't wait to host your next Disneyland trip with us again at Wyndham Anaheim.   Warm regards;  Management

Summary: Double bed with pull out coach was spacious enough for a family of 6. Clean rooms and welcoming staff. At least a 15 minute walk from Disneyland at a normal pace, but a plus is the hotel offers free parking so ubering to the parks is an option (about 7-10 min for an XL).
Manager Response: Dear famof612557,  Thank you for the wonderful review on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. Hopefully; we have the pleasure to host your next Disneyland trip with us again at Wyndham Anaheim.  Best regards;  Management

Summary: There are several other affordable places to stay near Disneyland, and this is a very nice place to stay, but .  One thing that makes the Wyndham stand out is the ample free parking there.  That will save you $30 over what Disney charges for parking, and almost as much at most other hotels in near the parks. Bonus: we had no trouble getting a space at 7 AM before we even checked in. The hotel appears to have been renovated recently.  Our room was large enough for two queen beds plus a sofa bed! The queen size beds were very comfortable. The bathroom was bright, and the large shower had a rain shower overhead. No bathtub. The twin sinks had space for your toiletries. My two complaints are large stain on the carpet, and a weak but strange oder in the room.  It was unpleasant but

Summary Heading: Nice hotel but the amenities were lackluster
Summary: We were at this hotel for the D23 Expo Convention in early September.  The hotel is nice but for $350 a night, the beds are the only thing at this hotel to rave about.  A lot of the main area of the hotel was being renovated and yet they still charged this high rate.  Pros: Comfy beds--The best thing about this hotel Nice decor clean rooms TV choices Refrig and microwave in room Free parking Nice staff Wonderful air conditioning  Extremely convenient to the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland Resort Parks  Cons: Wi-Fi was down for most of our stay Restaurant was closed the whole time Maid service (including trash dumping) only available on request  Coffee condiments were very cheap—packets of gross “whitener” rather than half and half pods. At Motel 6 you expect whitener”

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel several times in the past, it is especially convenient for walking to the Anaheim Convention Center. The included parking is definitely a huge plus. The staff is always incredibly helpful and friendly. During this latest trip Jung at the front desk was especially helpful and went above and beyond for us! I will absolutely be staying again in the future.

Summary: Clean rooms. Reception area was nice and clean as well. Liked that it had free parking. Friendly staff. Wasnt a fan of the pool area though. Very small and not many seats / loungers. If youre looking to just stay the night and not really use the pool then this could do. Its close to DL also. Could be walking distance for some.
Manager Response: Dear LLGHouls,  Thank you for the feedback on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. Best regards;  Management

Summary Heading: Our home when going to Disneyland
Summary: I've stayed at this hotel 5 times or so now and I'm always happy with the service, the staff, the professionalism, the cleanliness of the rooms, little to no noise complaints from neighboring guests in rooms, we are lifers here now. The location is great, easily walkable to Disneyland park, the other guests who stay here are decent as well, and don't sleep on the cafe(serves starbucks)/bar downstairs in the lobby. Their food is actually good!! I had a smoked salmon bagel sandwich and my partner had crispy bacon english muffin sandwich and it looked exactly like the picture, and tasted delicious!! I was surprised as they have a small kitchenette space that is combined with the bar and cafe, but wow. It was good!! Be sure to tip them, as they are well worth the quality of food

Hopefully; we have the pleasure to host your next Disneyland trip with us again Wyndham Anaheim.  Best regards;  Management

Summary: We’ve stayed here twice now and our experience has been nothing but amazing. The deluxe room is perfect for our family, the Starbucks downstairs, and most importantly the staff is amazing, friendly, and always greet you with a smile.
Manager Response: Dear Marisoldelrio87,  Thank you for the wonderful review on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. Can't wait to host your next Disneyland vacation with us again.  Best Regards;  Management

Summary: We have annual passes with Disneyland and if we stay offsite this is always our choice of hotel. So many positives. Great friendly staff, very clean common areas, secure free underground well lit parking, clean comfortable rooms/beds and a great little cafe that serves Starbucks coffee.   We just checked out this morning after two nights. We actually checked out this morning and walked over to Disneyland for a few hours before returning to drive home. So convenient. It’s about a ten to fifteen minute walk from the hotel to the main gates of either Disneyland or Disney California Adventure depending on your walking speed. Very safe walk also.   There may be other hotels a little closer to the parks but keep in mind that most of those are in fact motels that are older, have

Summary: My friend and I went to Disneyland for 3 days and stayed at this hotel. Firstly, their location is great as it is central and close to most places, their front desk staff is great, their parking is private which made us feel safer.  This place is always spotless and clean, I think it deserves all 5 stars.   When I come back again this will be the place I’ll stay again. I’ve stayed at other locations and nothing compares  to them.

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for a Family Trip
Summary: Staff gave great service, free parking is a plus considering all the other hotels charge $25+ a night. Hotel was very clean, quiet, and location is only a 7-10 minute walk from the Disneyland entrance. Would be perfect if they offered free breakfast like many of the other hotels in the area. Still recommended though for family vacations to Disneyland. Will stay here again in the future.

Summary Heading: Short walk to the Park and stores
Summary: Walking distance to Disneyland about 10 min they have a Walgreens, CVS and a 7 eleven in the corner about 2 min and around 5 min form the Garden walk they have stores and restaurants over there really cute and clean.
Manager Response: Dear bkeiline,  Thank you for the feedback on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am pleased to hear the stay was clean and the location was perfect for you.  Warmest regards;  Management

Summary Heading: Exactly what we were Looking for
Summary: Based on recommendations from YouTubers about the area, we just finished our first stay and loved it! We were on the 4th floor and found the whole week to be quiet. The only noise came from the fireworks at Disneyland, which we enjoyed actually. Some reasons we chose Wyndham Anaheim: Starbucks in the lobby, a hotel (indoor hallways), secure parking that had enough spots and was included in the booking price, pool & hot tub, mini fridge-coffee maker-microwave kitchenette, walkable to DL & DCA, and a good price. After staying here, I will add that the beds were also comfy. We needed and got a lot of good sleep - rested up for the next day's adventure!  My only additional request would be a soaker tub or jetted tub, but the shower was sufficient. The beds were comfortable enough

Summary: We loved the location in Anaheim, amenities were perfect, nearby services made it an easy site to find what we needed.... We appreciated the secure parking, cleanliness of the facility was excellent and the fun pool made it a perfect place to stay.

Summary: I decided last minute to celebrate my Birthday at Disneyland so I called Wyndham directly and booked for four nights. We did two days at Disney & Adventure the other two days sight seeing around LA. The room was clean water pressure in shower was perfect always had hot water. Housekeeping always made sure we had fresh towels each day being a family of four that was great. Kids enjoyed pool it was clean the water temperature was great. There is a laundry room for guests which was very helpful and accommodating and it was clean. The staff from reservations, front desk to Housekeeping made our stay an excellent experience!!! My family was on the go each day but everytime we came back to the hotel the room was nice and cool if we saw staff in hallway  they would acknowledge us.
Manager Response: Dear betinaleOn,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Wyndham Anaheim. It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback.  I am particularly pleased that you found the accommodations comfortable, the staff was helpful and friendly. I will share your comments with our team, who I am certain will be encouraged by your remarks. Here at Wyndham Hotels and Resorts, we continuously strive to exceed your expectations.  Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary: If you are looking for someplace close to Disneyland that includes parking look no further. Wyndham Anaheim is close to the park,  and has all the amenities - parking, pool, fridge, microwave, safe, and a pillow top (super comfy) bed. My only recommendation is to ask for a room away from the street.
Manager Response: Dear pixie h,  Thank you for the feedback on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay, you liked the amenities and the comfy bed.  Hopefully; we have the pleasure to host your next Disneyland trip with us again.   Warmest Regards,  Management

Summary: Bathroom had a sewage smell and there was mold on the windows. Also heard some late night drilling at 10pm on our first night. But since it was within walking distance to Disneyland it made the stay a lot better.
Manager Response: Dear sweetronice,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Wyndham Anaheim. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies.  Your feedback is very important to us, and I am saddened to hear that your stay was unsatisfactory. we have forwarded all the issues to the housekeeping department. Please rest assured that we are taking the appropriate measures to address the problem and prevent any future occurrences. Here at Wyndham Hotels and Resorts, we continuously strive to meet your needs and expectations.  We appreciate the time you took to share your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: My family and I came down sometime in June for a two night stay, to spend some time at Disneyland. Guest Service was amazing! I was checked out by Jennifer. She offered me to enroll into Wyndham free membership & gave me some of the benefits info. With housekeeping only being done by request, I didn't request it. Your able to call guest services to bring some extra towels and they even picked up my trash (Big Pizza Box).  I will be returning soon. The rooms can be more cleaner but I'm not one to complain about Housekeeping, knowing they might be cleaning over 90 rooms each day
Manager Response: Dear F5720HAstaceyg,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Wyndham Anaheim. It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback.  I am particularly pleased that you found the accommodations comfortable, the front desk agent Jeniffer was amazing and offered the Wyndham Rewards program.  I will share your comments with our team, who I am certain will be encouraged by your remarks. Here at Wyndham Hotels and Resorts, we continuously strive to exceed your expectations.  Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary: The people at the front desk were amazing. They were always greeting us and asking if there is anything they can help us with. They offer great customer services. The facility is clean and well maintained. Excellent location. Very close to all the restaurants and within 10-15 minute walk from the main entrance to Disneyland. There is also a small Starbucks downstairs that opens very early. I had an amazing experience and would recommend to all families.
Manager Response: Dear car16men,  Thank you for the wonderful review on your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am happy to hear that the stay was clean, comfortable, the staff was very helpful, friendly, the location was perfect for you and we can't wait to host your next Disneyland trip with us again.   Warmest Regards;  Ozzie Camarena

Summary Heading: Best hotel I've ever stayed at!!
Summary: Beautiful , clean and staff is amazing Best hotel we've ever stayed in!! I am handicapped and they went out of their way to help and make me feel so welcome. the rooms are beautiful and smell amazing!We will never stay any place else! The swimming pool was beautiful area with large swim towels . The handicapped bathrooms have sit down tubs and hand reels all over to help . There is a Starbucks onsite so that was a plus to my husband . we recommend this hotel for everyone!
Manager Response: Dear Alicia A,  Thank you for the amazing review on your recent stay at Wyndham Anaheim.  I am pleased to hear that the stay was comfortable, clean the staff was very helpful, friendly, you liked the amenities we offer and that you’ll recommend Wyndham Anaheim to all your peers. Can’t wait to host your next Disneyland trip with us again.   Warmest Regards;  Management

Summary: looks nice outside but not very clean inside. No free breakfast for the price of stay. Ac was muggy and no window screen on window. So unsafe, overall I rather pay 30$ more to have continental breakfast and amenities.
Manager Response: Dear elicOrtez,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Wyndham Anaheim. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies.  Your feedback is very important to us, and I am saddened to hear that the stay was unsatisfactory, we have shared all the housekeeping discrepancies to the housekeeping department. Please rest assured that we are taking the appropriate measures to address the problem and prevent any future occurrences. Here at Wyndham Hotels and Resorts, we continuously strive to meet your needs and expectations.  We appreciate the time you took to share your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Warmest Regards;  Ozzie Camarena Management

Summary: I checked in at 2AM on Monday morning and was promptly welcomed and checked in by a happy representative.  I forgot a tooth brush and they helped me out.  The Wyndham Anaheim was super clean and updated with great amenities like a Starbucks in the check in area. The beds were extremely comfortable and the internet was fast.
Manager Response: Dear codylharlow,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Wyndham Anaheim. It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback.  I am particularly pleased that you found the accommodations comfortable. I will share your comments with our team, who I am certain will be encouraged by your remarks. Here at Wyndham Hotels and Resorts, we continuously strive to exceed your expectations.  Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary: The staff was amazing to work with and very accommodating. The walk wasn’t too long from the park and the beds were clean and comfortable. We felt safe during our stay and would stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear rysteph,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Wyndham Anaheim. It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback.  I am particularly pleased that you found the accommodations comfortable and the staff was very helpful and friendly. I will share your comments with our team, who I am certain will be encouraged by your remarks. Here at Wyndham Hotels and Resorts, we continuously strive to exceed your expectations.  Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary: We stayed here for one night last week. The first room on the 2nd floor had a very bad sewage smell and the bathroom tap shot water across the room so we asked to be moved. This was taken care of in a professional manner and we were moved to a room on the 4th floor.  The room was clean and you get a fridge, two bottles of water, coffee machine, and nice toiletries.  There is a starbucks in the lobby which serves a small selection of breakfast. To be honest I prefer hotels which include a buffet breakfast but there are plenty of places around such as IHOP and Dennys to eat at instead.  We didn't use the pool as it was mostly shaded and a lot smaller than the pictures make out, with all the seating pushed together which isn't nice.  The free parking was the biggest bonus and we
Manager Response: Dear moomin21  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Wyndham Anaheim. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies.  Your feedback is very important to us, and I am saddened to hear that your stay was unsatisfactory. we have forwarded all the issues to the housekeeping department. Please rest assured that we are taking the appropriate measures to address the problem and prevent any future occurrences. Here at Wyndham Hotels and Resorts, we continuously strive to meet your needs and expectations.  We appreciate the time you took to share your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: We stayed here for a Disney trip and it was great! The room was an awesome value, the walkability to Disney was perfect, and on top of the good value parking was free, which is tough to find in that area. Overall I would absolutely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello valfoy,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Wyndham Anaheim. It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback.  I am particularly pleased that you found the accommodations comfortable. I will share your comments with our team, who I am certain will be encouraged by your remarks. Here at Wyndham Hotels and Resorts, we continuously strive to exceed your expectations.  Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary: The staff are amazing.  The price was reasonable, and the room was very clean.  The food was also high quality, and a great selection.  I can't enough about how well our visit went while staying there. Thank you.
Manager Response: Hello debbiewillis2022,  Thank you for the feedback of your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am pleased to hear that the stay was amazing, and clean. Hopefully; we have a chance to welcome you back on your next Disneyland trip.   Warmest Regards;  Ozzie Camarena Front Desk Manager

Summary: We chose this hotel because it was walkable to Disneyland. Took us 15 minutes to walk to the Disneyland security point from our hotel room at a moderate pace. Hotel was clean and comfortable.  We did not use other amenities during our stay so I cannot comment on that. Staff was all friendly and helpful when needed.
Manager Response: Hello hsteiner418,  Dear Aloma,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Wyndham Anaheim. It is always a pleasure to receive positive feedback.  I am particularly pleased that you found the accommodations comfortable and clean. I will share your comments with our team, who I am certain will be encouraged by your remarks. Here at Wyndham Anaheim and Resorts, we continuously strive to exceed your expectations.  Thank you again for sharing your experience, and we look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary: WOW, just exceptional all around m!! The front desk manager checked us in he was so friendly and gave us just amazing service and so much gratitude and lots of kudos to the baristas too they were so friendly, patient and gave amazing service!! They were so busy every morning but always no matter what stayed patient & friendly!! Just amazing, loved our stay and room it was so clean and comfortable! Thank you all for your kindness and exceptional service means a lot :)
Manager Response: Hello  ReginaandPhil1214,  Thank you for the amazing review of your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am thrilled to hear that the stay and the service were fabulous and above and beyond, especially at the front desk Manager and the coffee shop baristas,  I will share your comments with our team, who I am certain will be encouraged by your remarks.  Here at Wyndham Anaheim Hotel, we continuously strive to exceed your expectations.  Warmest Regards;   Ozzie Camarena Front Desk Manager

Summary: Very clean, nice pool and hot tub, underground parking, and a block away from the Anaheim Garden Walk if you'd like a sit down breakfast or lunch. Close to Disney, and the rooms are very nice and clean.
Manager Response: Hello Melloxellos,  Thank you for the wonderful review of your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim, I am pleased to hear that the stay was clean, comfortable, you liked the pool, spa and the complimentary parking. Hopefully we have a chance to welcome you back on your next Disneyland trip.  Warmest Regards;  Ozzie Camarena Front Desk Manager

Summary: No housekeeping the entire four nights we stayed so we were mounding up garbage and didn’t have enough towels ever. Covid can’t be the excuse for everything-not cleaning for 5 days is disgusting and seems pretty contradictory to wearing masks. So wear a mask but only give 3 towels? What the..? Makes no sense.
Manager Response: Hello stokesprincess14,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Wyndham Anaheim. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies.  Your feedback is very important to us, and I am saddened to hear that you stayed was not satisfactory, we do inform upon check in, due to COVID-19, the hotels cleaning protocol. Please rest assured that we are taking the appropriate measures to address the problem and prevent any future occurrences. Here at Wyndham Anaheim Hotel, we continuously strive to meet your needs and expectations.   We appreciate the time you took to share your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.

Summary: The staff is very friendly and accommodating. The beds are really  comfortable & it’s a short walk to Disney. There’s a Starbucks in the lobby which is super convenient in the morning. However, the sink in our bathroom kept clogging and had an awful smell. The AC unit was super loud and was dirty. There were stains on the carpet and the room just felt stale. This was our second stay at this property and our first visit was flawless, I don’t know if we just got an older room this time but for the price it was very disappointing.
Manager Response: Hello Devon130,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Wyndham Anaheim. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies.  Your feedback is very important to us, and I am saddened to hear about the housekeeping cleaning, sink clogged and smell issues you encountered during your stay. Please rest assured that we are taking the appropriate measures to address the problem and prevent any future occurrences. Here at Wyndham Anaheim, we continuously strive to meet your needs and expectations.   We appreciate the time you took to share your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Ozzie Munoz Front Desk Manager Wyndham Anaheim

Summary: We spent a full week at the Wyndham Anaheim. My first impression was ok because the front desk attendant was very helpful and pleasant. As soon as we got off the elevator, things changed. The hallway and our room was somewhat outdated. Also, our room had the worst rotten egg smell. Anytime we turned on the water, the smell made us want to gag. We mentioned it to the front desk a few times and they said they knew what the problem was and they would get it fixed. They never fixed it or even tried. We had to brush our teeth with bottled water. We also asked for housekeeping services on our fifth day and that never happened either. The free underground parking was nice. The walk to Disney wasn’t too bad in the mornings but seemed a little far in the evenings when we were tired. The
Manager Response: Hello Stay290923,  Thank you for taking the time to tell us about your experience at Wyndham Anaheim. I am sorry that your experience did not meet your expectations; please allow me to express my sincerest apologies.  Your feedback is very important to us, and I am saddened to hear about the housekeeping and sink smell issues you encountered. Please rest assured that we are taking the appropriate measures to address the problem and prevent any future occurrences. Here at Wyndham Hotels and Resorts, we continuously strive to meet your needs and expectations.   We appreciate the time you took to share your concerns, and it is our hope that you will give us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.  Sincerely, Ozzie Munoz Front Desk Manager Wyndham Anaheim

Summary: My wife and I spend the weekend here to visit Disneyland. It was a great stay. The room was ready before the check in time and the staff were super friendly. The only complaint that I had was the outdoor noise, but the hotel was at a great location. Restaurants were very close and the hotel had a great lounge area as well. Highly recommend.
Manager Response: Hello DisneyDavid21,  Thank you for the amazing review of your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim.  I am ecstatic to hear that the accommodations were fabulous, the room was ready prior to check-in and the staff was very helpful and friendly. Hopefully; we have the pleasure to host your next Disneyland trip with us again.   Warmest Regards;  Front Desk Manager Ozzie Camarena

Summary: I can’t say enough great things about this property. The rooms are clean and super comfy! Starbucks in the lobby is a major plus! The front desk staff are very friendly and greet you whenever they see you. Our family loves how close it is to walk to the f Disneyland Parks.
Manager Response: Hello Ischrade,  Thank you for the wonderful review of your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am happy to hear that the accommodations were clean, comfy and the staff was amazing. Hopefully; we have a chance to welcome you back on your next Disneyland trip.   Warmest Regards;   Ozzie Camarena Front Desk Manager

Summary: Great location to Disneyland. Lots of food choices within close area. Clean room, looks recently updated. Friendly staff, great value. Walk to disney was only about ten minutes. And it's nice to get free parking.
Manager Response: Hello, jacobsdavid,  Thank you for rating us 4 stars out of 5!  I am pleased to hear that your stay was comfortable, clean, the staff was very helpful and friendly. Hopefully; we have a chance to welcome you back on your next Disneyland trip.   Warmest Regards,  Ozzie Camarena Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Favorite place to stay in Anaheim!
Summary: My family and I come to Anaheim quite frequently. We choose the Wyndham Anaheim as our hotel for room quality, closeness to the park, and friendly staff! Rooms are really nice and clean. Our favorite part about this hotel is how kind and friendly all the staff are!
Manager Response: Hello becksteadmadison14,  Welcome back!! I am pleased to hear that this stay was exceptional as always, the room was clean, comfortable and the staff was very helpful and friendly. Can't wait to host your next Disneyland trip with us again at Wyndham Anaheim.   Warmest Regards,  Ozzie Camarena Front Desk Manager

Summary: This is a very nice hotel. The customer server was absolutely amazing. They really do go above and beyond. Also, the cafe they have there was really good. They have great food and Starbucks! I mean come on you can’t beat that, especially  since there was no wait. What was really great for us is that  Disneyland is less than a 15 minute walk. Your saving money on the parking.
Manager Response: Hello adrianac12182022,  Thank you for the wonderful review of your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am pleased to hear that the stay was amazing, the staff was very helpful and friendly.   Hopefully; we have a chance to welcome you back on your next Disneyland trip.   Warmest Regards,  Ozzie Camarena Front Desk Manager

Summary: I had never stayed the Wyndham before, but I would definitely stay there again! The staff was unreal, they were super attentive, and I love that there’s a Starbucks that opens early in the lobby. Definitely an amazing experience!
Manager Response: Hello 861shaip,   Thank you for rating us 5 stars out of 5! I am happy to hear that your stay was amazing, the staff was very helpful, friendly and attentive, can't wait to host your next Disneyland trip with us again.  Warmest Regards,  Ozzie Camarena  Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Super convenient for a Disney vacation
Summary: This hotel is an easy walk to Disneyland. The hotel is modernized, clean, comfortable and fairly priced. Perfect place to crash after a tiring day in the park. We found the staff to be enthusiastic and helpful.
Manager Response: Hello Kristina S,  Thank you for the wonderful review of your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am pleased to hear that the stay was clean, comfortable, and the staff was very helpful and friendly.   Hopefully; we have a chance to welcome you back on your next Disneyland trip.   Warmest Regards,  Ozzie Camarena  Front Desk Manager

Summary: This is one of the cleanest and most comfortable hotels I’ve ever been to and free parking is offered so that was definitely a big plus. We came on a Monday so it was less busier than usual therefore check in was quick and easy.
Manager Response: Hello Maria R,  Thank you for the kind review of your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am pleased to hear that the stay was comfortable, clean and you liked our complimentary parking.  Hopefully; we have a chance to welcome you back on your next Disneyland trip.

Summary: Rudy and Ozzie at the front desk were great! Rooms were clean. Bed was comfortable. Starbucks in the lobby (wish they were open longer). Beautiful hotel. Coin laundry on site was convenient. We’ll definitely be back again. We had a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Hello vitabrevis2022,  Thank you for the amazing review of your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear that the staff was very helpful, friendly, and especially our " ROCKSTARS AT THE FRONT DESK RUDY AND OZZIE" I will definitely forward this review to both. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay and can't wait to host your next Disneyland trip with us again.   Warmest Regards,  Ozzie Camarena Front Desk Manager

Summary: Friendly staff, clean rooms and grounds, and within walking distance (about 15 minutes) to Disneyland and DCA.  Just what we expected. We would definitely stay again.  There is a small cafe downstairs that serves Starbucks coffee, which was nice. It gets pretty busy in the mornings so get there early.  CVS and Walgreens are just across the street and there are lots of restaurants nearby.  Perfect for a trip to Disney.
Manager Response: Hello Iammags,  Thank you for rating us 4 stars out of 5!  I am pleased to hear that the stay was clean, you liked the proximity of Disney, DCA and the staff was very friendly and helpful. Can't wait to host your next Disneyland trip with us again.   Warmest Regards, Ozzie Camarena Front Desk Manager

Summary: My two grandsons and I recently spent two nights here for a short visit to Disney. The hotel is first rate. It's clean, modern and functional. Having parking that is but a 15 minute walk to the Disney entrance is wonderful. We used the pool which was very nice. Only downside was that the restaurant was not fully "open" but we knew that before our arrival. All is all I was very pleased with our stay and would definitely stay here again on a future visit to the Magic Kingdom.
Manager Response: Hello highdesertbadger,  Thank you for the wonderful review of your recent stay with us at Wyndham Anaheim. I am happy to hear that the stay was clean, comfortable and you'll stay with us at again at Wyndham Anaheim.   Warmest Regards, Ozzie Camarena Front Desk Manager

Summary Heading: Great Place to Stay in Anaheim!
Summary: Wyndham Anaheim was a great place for us. Within walking distance to Disney, restaurants, etc. No complaints! The staff greeted us each time we entered the lobby and took care of any needs we had. Definitely a great hotel for a getaway!
Manager Response: Hello Fearless1191,  Thank you for the wonderful review of your recent stay with us at Wyndham  Anaheim. I am pleased to hear that the stay with comfortable, the staff was very helpful and friendly.   Hopefully; we have a chance to welcome you back on your next Disneyland trip with us at Wyndham Anaheim.

Summary: We stayed here during a recent trip to Disneyland. Everything was excellent. Staff was friendly. Rooms were clean and well appointed. Plenty of towels, soap, and such. Bottled water and coffee in the room. Covered parking. Starbucks downstairs for morning breakfast and coffee. We walked to Disneyland. This is a mid-range hotel, stylish but not opulent, which was totally ok and exactly what we expected. Prices here were about half or one-third of Disney-branded properties. This is how a great “regular” hotel should be. Zero substantial complaints. Air condition worked perfectly, but was loud (hardly a problem). Overall, we were extremely pleased. We plan to return.
Manager Response: Hello AuthorLAX,  Thank you for taking the time to write this nice 5-star review of your recent stay with us at our Wyndham Anaheim property. I am very happy to read that you enjoyed your stay and the staff was very helpful and friendly.  We can't wait to host your next stay during your visit to Anaheim!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The room and property were great. Our lock on our room didn’t work and they immediately put us in another room. The close walk to Disney was awesome and the Walgreens across the street were so convenient! I’d stay again just for the proximity to Disney and the super friendly staff.
Manager Response: Dear 07awilliams,  Thank you for taking the time to write this nice 5-star review of your recent stay with us at our Wyndham Anaheim property. I am very happy to read that you enjoyed how close of a walk our hotel is to the Disney Parks and convenience stores just across the street. We really appreciate you contacting the front desk about your lock issue and letting us move you rooms to ensure you get the best stay you deserve. We can't wait to host your next stay during your visit to Anaheim!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Wonderful service! We arrived on the afternoon of January 24th and we’re greeted by Ozzie. He was amazing. I booked both rooms but he was able to transfer it to my father’s name so he could get the rewards. We got connecting rooms as I requested although I booked one room in the hotel website and booked the other through a third party vendor.   The purpose of our stay was for Disneyland. We did not utilize any of the facilities because we were at the parks from open to close. Each morning we left, we were greeted and each evening we returned we were asked if we needed anything before going to our room.  The baristas at the hotel Starbucks were amazing also. Especially the two working the morning of January 25. They were so unbelievably patient with us and were great at
Manager Response: Dear theluckyboog,  Wow! Thank you so much for this detailed 5-star review of our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel during your visit to Disneyland. I am so happy to read that our Front Desk Manager Ozzie was able to accommodate your reservation changes and you enjoyed his outstanding customer service; he is a great leader and example in providing the best solutions for our guests so you can enjoy a hassle-free stay under our Wyndham Anaheim branch. We recently reopened our Starbucks Cafe and Bar in our lobby this year and it has been a great hit with all of our guests, the baristas will be so delighted to read this review and your kind words are very appreciated.  We can't thank you enough for this great review and hope to host your next stay during your trip to the Disney parks.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: During our trip, the room was good, clean and comfortable. What stands out at this location was that the staff was AMAZING. Always available and knowledgeable!  I would recommend this location and can’t wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear hermit727,  It was very nice to read your 5-star review of our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel during your visit to Anaheim. I am so glad to read that you enjoyed the cleanliness of our rooms and the great customer service from our team members, they will be so delighted to read this sweet review. Thank you for your recommendation and we hope to host your next stay soon during your visit to Anaheim!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Free parking, within walking distance to disneyland
Summary: Stayed here for 2 nights on December 2020 right before the pandemic hits. We chose this hotel because it is within walking distance to Disneyland and they provide free parking space. The room itself is very clean , spacious, and looks newly renovated. Considering the location, this hotel is definitely worth the money. Will definitely stay here again when we visit disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Kumaboo,   Thank you so much for this excellent 5-star review of your most recent stay at our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel during your visit to Disneyland. I am so glad to read that you enjoyed how close of a walk our property is to the parks. It means a lot to hear your kind words on the cleanliness of our rooms and overall hotel.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We took a room the night before a Disneyland visit. The room was clean and comfortable, but a little small for four people. We were allowed to park our car there the following day during our visit to Disneyland, which was a big plus.
Manager Response: Dear philw00ds,  Our property is so grateful you have taken the time to leave this nice 5-star review. We are so happy to read that you enjoyed the complimentary parking  and how close we are to Disneyland! Thank you for choosing to stay with us, we are looking forward to hosting your next stay!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui

Summary: This hotel was great! It was very clean and close to Disneyland. It was approximately a 10-15 minute walk, depending on how fast you walk/how long it takes to cross Harbor Blvd. They require masks when you are walking throughout the common areas of the hotel, and the provide them if you don't have one.  Unfortunately due to the pandemic, the main restaurant was closed and you had to request to have the room cleaned, or to get new linens. The Starbucks is open, and has a great selection of food and drinks.  The real reason for the 5 stars is the staff. They were all so nice! Especially the front desk staff and the team at the Starbucks. Also, the parking is free, which was a really nice surprise!
Manager Response: Dear Em S,  Wow! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5-star review of your recent stay at our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel during your visit to Disneyland. We really appreciate you listing all of our perks like how close of a walk we are to both Disney parks, a Starbucks Cafe and Bar in our lobby every morning, the complimentary masks for all our guests and one of the best reasons to stay with us, FREE parking!  The baristas and our front desk team members will be so delighted to read your sweet comments, I am very proud to read that you had the oppurtunity to enjoy our award winning customer service and the kind words from your review will be added motivation for our team.   We can't wait to host your next stay during your trip to Disneyland!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is the ONLY hotel along with its sister property next door I like to stay at. Very clean and staff is amazing! Staff is always very helpful. They are always positive. And rooms are always very clean.
Manager Response: Dear  yochinita1,  Wow, thank you so much for this nice 5-star review of your recent stay at our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel! I am so happy to read that you enjoyed your stay in our clean rooms and had a great time with our team members and their outstanding customer service. We really appreciate you taking the time to leave this sweet review, we hope to get the chance to welcome you back soon!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed here for one night for two days at Disneyland Park and it was fantastic. Great, flexible staff, super clean and modern, and proximity to the park was great. Rooms were clean and well-appointed, and we barely heard the late night fireworks at the park. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear cecc0011,  Thank you so much for this great 5-star review of your recent stay at our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel during your visit to the Disney Parks! I am so happy to read that you enjoyed how close of a walk we are to the park entrance and how clean our newly renovated property is. We really appreciate the kind words and can't wait to host your next stay!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: bedsheet was dirty/bathroom not properly clean
Summary: upon checking the room, notice the bedsheet was dirty with black skid marking on one of the bed.  the bathroom toilet was not properly clean.  had to request for another room.  could hear footsteps from guests above us.
Manager Response: Dear 228datt,  Thank you for this review and the feedback on your stay with us during a trip to Anaheim. We really appreciated that you contacted the front desk and let us remedy the situation by moving you immediately to a cleaner room that was to your standards. We are sorry that you experienced some minor issues in the previous room, due to COVID-19 we are retraining all of our new housekeeping hires and staff on Wyndham brand standards. The happiness of our guests and the cleanliness of our rooms are the top priorities at our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel.  We hope we get the chance to welcome you and your family back for the stay you deserve.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: I have so many good things to say about this hotel. My husband and I stayed here for our 1st Wedding Anniversary. Upon checking in, I was greeted by Stacey who was absolutely wonderful. She was so friendly, polite and accommodating. Every time we saw her she was soo nice and willing to go above and beyond for anything we needed.  I wish every hotel had a Stacey!   Upon checking in I asked how much parking was and Stacey said it was FREE! There are a few parking spaces within their parking lot, but there is an underground gated garage. Our vehicle was parked for our entire 3 day stay. The location is perfect and within walking distance to Disneyland (Approx. 15 minutes). There is a Walgreens across the street and places to eat near the hotel. There is a Starbucks inside of the
Manager Response: Dear reginas134,  Wow! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this great 5-star review of your recent stay at our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel. I am so happy to read that you had an amazing stay and enjoyed all of our wonderful and complimentary amenities like free parking and free WiFi! It was truly a pleasure hosting your stay and celebrating your wedding anniversary with you and your husband; the room that you were upgraded to with the deep soaking tub and extended room size is our Wellness King Bed Suite for future booking references. Thank you for listing all the special perks of our property, just a short walk to the Disneyland parks and convenient stores like Walgreens and CVS just across the way.   We can't thank you enough for this stellar 5- star review and look forward to hosting your next stay the next time you and your husband visit Disneyland!   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great location to stay for a trip to Disneyland. Short walk to the park. Staff are soooo nice and accommodating. FREE parking during your stay is a huge plus. Safe to park in a gated parking lot. Will stay here when we come back to Disneyland
Manager Response: Dear Davis D,  Thank you kindly for providing such a great review of our property. I am so pleased to hear all the accommodations worked for your stay. This is exactly what we strive for every day. We can't wait to welcome you back for your next Disneyland trip.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The staff was always very friendly and helpful. Our room was clean, comfortable and spacious. We were close to Disney and lots of restaurants and convenience stores. We were so glad to stay here. We will gladly stay here again and recommend it to our family/friends.
Manager Response: Dear Ana O,  Thank you so much for providing such a great 5- Star review of our Wyndham Anaheim property. I am so pleased to hear all the accommodations worked for your stay during your trip to Disneyland. This is exactly what we strive for every day, we can't wait to host your next stay in Anaheim.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great staff, short walk to Disneyland
Summary: The front desk staff were very friendly and happy to answer any questions. Property is a nice short walk to Disneyland. Convenience store and fast food in close proximity. Room was nice and had comfortable beds.
Manager Response: Dear malifahpolifo,  Thank you for your recent stay with us during your visit to Disneyland and for this nice 5-star review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed how comfortable our newly appointed property is and how close of a walk we are to the Disney Parks.  We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim.  All the best, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The staff was friendly and wore masks per mandate. It’s was conveniently located for my needs. The room however was obviously dirty. Towel had fresh makeup stains on it and another black stains. There was trash from previous guest that was missed underneath the rolling seats, and someone left a love note on the shower wall that is visible when steamed. Overall, the property seems fancy so if that’s what you’re going for this is it. I just kept thinking how dirty it was during my whole stay.
Manager Response: Hello Sunshinepudding,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your recent stay with us, though it is not the 5-star reviews we are used to, I still appreciate your stay and feedback. I have brought all the issues above to my executive housekeeper and we are working on retraining our staff on the cleanliness standards and expectations we have at our Wyndham Anaheim property. I apologize for the inconveniences you experienced,  We hope you give us another opportunity for your next trip to Anaheim so we can provide you with the best stay you deserve! Please feel free to contact me directly at 714-991-6868 and mention this post when reserving your next stay.  Sincerely,  Management

Summary: The staff was so kind and helpful! It was suxhexceptional service, to the point that I stands out above most places we have stayed across across USA. The rooms were very comfortable and clean. The parking garage below the parking lot was very convenient and safe. Everything was perfect.
Manager Response: Dear amydeatherage,  Thank you kindly for providing such a great review of our property. I am so pleased to hear all the accommodations worked for your stay during your trip to Disneyland. This is exactly what we strive for every day, we can't wait to host your next stay in Anaheim.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Best Hotel For going to Disneyland
Summary: Me and my spouse have used this hotel to stay at when we go to Disneyland, and I felt I needed to write a review to share how amazing the hotel and staff are! And it is not crazy expensive! I will be coming back to this hotel several times just this year!
Manager Response: Dear jjorda958492,  Thank you for leaving our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel this nice 5 star review. We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our great location. It was a pleasure hosting your stay and we can’t wait to have you back the next time you’re in Anaheim.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Absolute amazing experience To stay at this hotel for our family Disneyland trip. The location is walking distance to everything. The hotel itself were clean, staffs are friendly and parking is a breeze. Love this hotel
Manager Response: Dear Aileen_west,  Thank you kindly for providing such a great review of our property. I am so pleased to hear all the accommodations worked for your stay during your trip to Disneyland. This is exactly what we strive for every day, we can't wait to host your next stay in Anaheim.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: I book 4-5 nights in a row to stay at Disney for leisure and this hotel is on the top of my list at all times. It is clean, modern and staff are very friendly and professional at all times. It is walking distance to disney but that is not why i stay, i stay for the people that work here!
Manager Response: Dear cclements2021,  Thank you for taking the time to review our Wyndham Anaheim property. I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed our rooms and overall had a great stay with our amazing front desk and their award-winning customer service. We will always try our best to assist every guest we can in any way possible, I am so glad we were able to accomplish that for you. Please let us know if we can do anything and we look forward to having you again.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: I recommend this place! Went on a day trip to Disneyland with my friend. We spent a night here and was exactly what we needed! Such a great stay! It was comfy and had the amenities we needed. Hotel staff super kind, considerate and their customer service is unmatched!
Manager Response: Dear kaylapD6137PH,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide a 5 star review of our Wyndham Anaheim property. I am so pleased to hear all the accommodations worked for your stay during your trip to Disneyland. This is exactly what we strive for every day, we can't wait to host your next stay in Anaheim.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The customer service is very good. I can't say the same on who ever cleans the rooms, or did they clean the room?  Dirty fridge, hair in shower, bed, stains on furniture, carpet, we could not wait to leave. So glad we only booked one night and headed to a different hotel for the next 3 nights. I picked this hotel because the reviews were very good? Who did the reviews?
Manager Response: Dear cleesp,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your recent stay with us, though it is not the 5-star reviews we are used to, I still appreciate your stay and feedback. I have brought all the issues above to my executive housekeeper and we are working on retraining our staff on the cleanliness standards and expectations we have at our Wyndham Anaheim property. I apologize for the inconveniences you experienced,  We hope you give us another opportunity for your next trip to Anaheim so we can provide you with the best stay you deserve! Please feel free to contact me directly at 714-991-6868 and mention this post when reserving your next stay.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Best service I have had at a hotel. Very nice and the place was well kept and clean. We needed more towels and brought them to us within a minute. Very safe. We had a couple young girls and they felt very safe in this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear 1mariah321,  Thank you for leaving our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel this nice review. We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our great location. It was a pleasure hosting your stay and we can’t wait to have you back the next time you’re in Anaheim.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Came for a quick trip to Disneyland. Stacey (sp?) at the front desk was so sweet, kind, helpful and informative of the amenities and points of interest nearby. Room was spacious for my sister and myself. We were able to see the fireworks from the parking lot by the pool! An easy 10min walk to the harbor side entrance to Disney. There’s a Starbucks downstairs which was nice so we could get a drink on the go. They provided water in the room as well. Definitely would stay here again. Next time I’d check out the garden walk
Manager Response: Dear adagrl,  Thank you for taking the time to review our Wyndham Anaheim property. I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed our rooms and overall had a great stay with our amazing front desk and their award-winning customer service. We will always try our best to assist every guest we can in any way possible, I am so glad we were able to accomplish that for you. Please let us know if we can do anything and we look forward to having you again.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: My girlfriend and I stayed here while we went to Disneyland with family. I am writing this review specifically because The Guest Service Manager, Stacey Bui provided such excellent service that I had to write a review. Everything she did was above and beyond what was expected in ensuring we felt welcome and enjoyed our stay. She is such an asset to this hotel and it is because of her we will recommend this location to our friends and family. Thank you Stacey.
Manager Response: Dear Carthulu,  Thank you for taking the time to review our Wyndham Anaheim property. I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed our rooms and overall had a great stay with our amazing front desk and their award-winning customer service. We will always try our best to assist every guest we can in any way possible, I am so glad we were able to accomplish that for you. Please let us know if we can do anything and we look forward to having you again.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great location and very clean and friendly
Summary: This hotel was easy to walk to the Disney parks and also shopping and restaurants.  You are able to see the Disney fireworks from the parking lot.  The rooms were very clean and comfortable for our family of 4, 2 of which are teenagers.  We had the room with the pullout bed.  The staff were very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear heatherw165,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5-star review and for your recent stay with us during your trip to Anaheim! I am so happy to read that you enjoyed how clean and spacious our rooms were for your family and how close of a walk we are to the Disney parks.   We can't wait to welcome you and your family back the next time you're visiting Anaheim.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Walking distance from Disneyland parks and restaurants, pool is great, rooms are clean, comfortable beds, this is my 5th time staying here never had any issues at all. Great parking avaliable. Never disappoints.
Manager Response: Dear aguirrekevin,  We are so happy to read that you had a nice stay during your trip to the Disneyland parks. It is always our pleasure to host your stays and we can't thank you enough for taking the time to leave our property this great 5 star review.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Clean, beautiful, and very close to Disneyland!  Staff is AMAZING!  I will stay here every chance I get!  The parking is free!!!  Walking distance to restaurants.  Walking distance to Disneyland, so need for the parking lot.
Manager Response: Dear Monica8157,  I am so happy to read that you had a great stay and enjoyed the superb customer service from our front desk team members. Thank you so much for this 5-star review and we can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're visiting Anaheim!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The whole hotel was perfectly clean, from the room to the lobby.  Everything was organized and well-marked.  Like many travelers, we parked our car there the morning of our Disneyland day and then checked in at the end of a long day at the parks.  The lady who checked us in on June 25 was very friendly, professional, and efficient.  Despite a growing line of guests arriving to check in, she had a smile and a positive energy as she greeted everyone and checked us in.  Everything about this hotel has a polished, friendly, easy vibe to it.  We will definitely stay again.  And we hope that lady we met at the front desk is well-appreciated by her management- she's a gem!
Manager Response: Dear Jenny Y,  Wow! Thank you so much for providing such a great review of our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel. I am so pleased to hear all the accommodations worked for your stay and that you experienced exceptional customer service. This is exactly what we strive every day.   We can't wait to get the chance to welcome you back again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: What an amazing hotel next to Disneyland! We 10/10 recommend this hotel and we will stay here again. The room was spacious and cleanly. We were just here to celebrate our engagement and they were kind enough to upgrade us to a beautiful room. The walk to Disneyland is about 10 minutes. The staff here was so helpful and friendly, as well as always available. Bumble and bumble amenities was the cherry on top! This will be our choice of stay for future Disney trips!
Manager Response: Dear eugyeuge,  Thank you for taking to leave us this nice 5-star review and for your recent stay with us! I am very pleased to hear you that enjoyed how perfectly appointed and spacious our newly remodeled rooms were during your trip to Disneyland. Congratulations on the engagement, I am so happy our team members were able to make your time more special with an upgrade. We will always do our best to assist our guests in any way possible, so I am glad we were able to accomplish that for you.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Staff were incredibly friendly and helpful. Facilities, rooms, and all areas we entered were very clean. Short walk to the Disney Parks. On-site parking was wonderful and it wasn't full. This will be our new Disney hotel. (Blaze Pizza and Walgreens right across the street.)
Manager Response: Dear Pete B,  Thank you for your recent stay with us during your visit to Disneyland and for this nice 5 star review. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed how clean our property is and how close of a walk we are to the Disney Parks.  We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim.  All the best, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Friendly staff made for a good stay - but the, “suites” here are hardly anything more than your cramped ordinary rooms. Nice pool, easy parking and close to disneyland. But do not pay extra for a suite - it is anything but!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This has become a favorite place to stay when in Anaheim, especially being disabled. We've stayed several times in the past year thru the pandemic and they've been wonderful. Their handicap rooms really are accessible for me. (Side note: please don't book a handicap room if you don't need it, it takes away from those that do)  Starting with the room itself, we always go for a king bed and let me tell you, they have the MOST comfortable beds ever!!! Never have any issues falling asleep quickly here. Most places don't realize how much a comfortable bed is needed when you are already in pain from your disabilities! And it is not so low that I can't get in or out of it. Did I mention how comfortable the bed is yet?  Next, I can get a walk in/roll in shower.  This is such a HUGE deal
Manager Response: none

Summary: Love that it was a short walk to Disney, had food onsite for breakfast which was super convenient. The rooms were clean and very friendly staff. Would highly recommend and would stay again! We were a family of 4. Didn’t use the pool but maybe next time!
Manager Response: Dear serena s,  Thank you kindly for providing such a great review of our property. I am so pleased to hear all the accommodations worked for your stay during your trip to Disneyland. This is exactly what we strive for every day, we can't wait to host your next stay in Anaheim.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed first time at Wyndham and turned out to be the worst experience due to bathroom cleanliness and stinky smell, later found out someones dirty underwear hidden under the vanity and the used shower cap on hanging, look like the bathroom was never cleaned after previous checkout. I couldn’t request to move as it was too late and kids were asleep but next morning I requested for a different room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Wyndham Anaheim is a very nice hotel located in the Disneyland area and lots of chain restaurants within walking distance. The lobby staff is extremely friendly and welcoming as you come/go throughout the day. The room we had consisted of 2-queen beds and a double bed sofa sleeper to sleep up to 6 guests. The bathroom was very spacious and room had several mirrors which was very helpful when getting ready to go out. Also, they have an underground parking garage at no additional cost. I would stay here again if in the Anaheim area to enjoy Disneyland. It’s about a 45min/36miles from LAX. Definitely get a rental car as an Uber would be around $120 each way.
Manager Response: Dear 682amyt,  Thank you for taking the time to review our Wyndham Anaheim property. I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed our rooms and overall had a great stay with our amazing front desk and their award-winning customer service. We will always try our best to assist every guest we can in any way possible, I am so glad we were able to accomplish that for you. Please let us know if we can do anything and we look forward to having you again.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Linda Hyatt1/5just now on ￼ Google  I made a reservation on booking.com for 3 nights. We were taking a mini vacation to Disney to celebrate my being done with boards I had up until 72 hours before check in to cancel without a fee. Our beloved dog got sick an hour after the cancellation window. I have tried contacting them several times since to see if we could cancel without a few or use our money towards another 3 night stay. No one has contacted me back. We had to euthanize my poor dog. Understandably, I don't feel like going to Disneyland now that I am grieving my dog. I attempted everything to cancel in more than a reasonable amount of time so the hotel can cell the room. Now I have to pay for the first night and not even benefit from going on vacation. Their customer
Manager Response: Dear bluerainsoup,  I am very sorry to hear about your beloved dog, please rest assure at the Wyndham Anaheim Hotel we put our guests and their comfort above all, we also want to send you our condolences. This is the first time this reservation cancellation request has been brought to our attention directly at the property. Please call us directly at 714-991-6868 and ask to speak to the Manager on Duty and we can help you go through the appropriate outlets to ensure you can move the dates so you have time to grieve for your dog, we completely understand how tough times like this can be. From our hotel reservation system, the only Linda Hyatt that was registered booked through a third party company - Booking.com, after thoroughly reviewing the reservation history, it shows the reservation was canceled on June 12th, 2021 without any charges to the credit card on file through our system. If you were charged through Booking.com, please call us and we can contact them to confirm you did not physically stay at the property so they can issue you a refund through their merchant. A guest also reviewed that the 3rd party company did not offer assistance with a cancellation and once this was brought to our attention our management team worked diligently with the guest and other travel agency to reconcile, as 52malissak previously reviewed on TripAdvisor and updated the posting thanking our hotel for all the help. I do hope this response gives you a little bit of light that we do care, we can help you move the dates so you can fully enjoy the Disneyland experience and we are always here to help.  I hope to hear from you soon and we wish you and your family all the best. Sincerely, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Update: Ozzie and the Manager from Wyndham have worked tirelessly to assist me with my refund. I couldn't ask for them to do anything more on their end.  Numerous calls were placed to Hotels.com and they always kept me updated throughout the process. Ozzie was patient and friendly throughout, even when I was not and it was greatly appreciated. I'd still avoid Hotels.com (Expedia) at ALL costs. I can't count the number of hours myself and Wyndham staff spent just to get a simple refund from them. Book directly with the hotel!  Original Review:  Disneyland was shut down during our reservation. The hotels response was that I have to work it out with hotels.com. Hotels.com response was that I have to work it out with the hotel.  Round and round. I'll never book with hotels.com or a
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is a great option for Disneyland. 5-10 min walk to California Adventure/Disneyland, walkable to food, etc and felt like a good area. Staff were super nice, hotel is great, clean, quiet. Really great stay.
Manager Response: Dear Kasia L,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5-star review of your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim Hotel! I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed the great customer service from our front desk team members and had an amazing stay in our fresh, clean, and sanitized hotel property that our housekeepers work so hard to keep up the Wyndham standards.
