We can't wait to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in Anaheim.  All the best, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Wyndham Anaheim - a great place to stay and wonderful service for your Disneyland Resort visit!!
Summary: We have stayed at the Wyndham Anaheim on countless occasions and always enjoyed our stays at this recently remodeled hotel that is close to the Disneyland Resort.  From the spacious rooms and modern facilities to the included underground parking, this hotel delivers on all counts.  The attached restaurant is still closed due to COVID, however the Lobby Coffee Bar that serves Starbucks products was the perfect start of our days during our stay.  It’s also a manageable walk to the Resort, but be prepared after a long day at the parks to make your way back to the hotel and the welcome and comfortable beds!  Of particular note is the service - it is outstanding, and a particular shout out goes to Stacy, who is the GM and Ozzie, the Front Desk Mgr. who greet us every time with a huge
Manager Response: none

Summary: The service here is great!! The staff at the front desk are very friendly and answer any questions you may have. Secured parking is an absolute bonus when going to the parks. Also, they held our bags!
Manager Response: Dear kburtonhom,   Thank you for staying with us during your trip to Anaheim and for this great 5-star review! I am so happy to read that our front desk team members provided you with outstanding customer service and were able to store your luggage for you before check-in time. We can't wait to host your stay the next time you're in Anaheim, please feel free to contact us anytime for special room accommodations.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Would stay here anytime and the new updates were great. Had a great time with the family for a trip to Disneyland. The walk to the park is nothing and almost like your staying at the park. Would stay here again anytime.
Manager Response: Dear gblaser2021,  Thank you for providing such a nice 5-star review of our newly remodeled Wyndham Anaheim property. I am so pleased to hear all the accommodations worked for you and that you enjoyed how close of a walk our hotel was to the Disney Parks. We can't wait to get the chance to welcome you back again the next time you're visiting Anaheim.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Clean, secure, convenient, great friendly service!
Summary: Excellent security, cleanliness, customer service!  Best place we have found for vehicle security with the electronic gated garage.  Very nice Keurig, microwave and larger than college dorm fridge in the room.  Anaheim Garden Walk around the corner, many restaurants within walking distance, 7-11 at the corner if you need a snack.  Would stay here again for sure.
Manager Response: Dear bmc1965,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel a 5-star review of your recent stay in Anaheim! I am so pleased to hear all the accommodations worked for your stay, this is exactly what we strive for every day. Parking is still complimentary for our guests and our lobby now also has a Grab and Go section where you can purchase snacks and drinks to save you the trip to 7-11. We can't wait to host your next stay in Anaheim.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect from check in to check out
Summary: From the moment we checked in Rudy at the front desk was so kind and genuine. We even commented on it after we got our keys. Then he was kind enough to accommodate switching rooms to across the hall to have a view of the park which made me literallly jump up and down, I was incredibly happy. He really enhanced our experience, so we were very appreciative of him. Even coming in and out his greetings were sweet and natural- which we feel is rare. The beds were insanely comfy, the parking was free and easy, the location is excellent and the staff was lovely. This is the best Anaheim hotel we have  experienced! Wish we could have stayed more than 3 nights!
Manager Response: Dear Meeshellero,  I want to thank you for taking the time to review our property and leaving us this fantastic 5-star post! I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed our rooms and overall had an amazing stay with all the great and complimentary amenities. We always do our best to assist all of our guests in any way possible, I am so glad Rudy and our team members were able to accomplish that for you. He will be so delighted to read this sweet review! We can't wait to hose your next stay in Anaheim!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The Wyndham Hotel is a very quiet, private and clean hotel. I love the fountain outside by the parking lot and I love how you have the availability to park upstairs or downstairs. I also enjoy how the elevator is very accessible from the parking lot or lobby. I genuinely enjoyed my stay, will come back again!
Manager Response: Dear guzmanbelen022,  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us and for this great 5-star review of our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel. I am so happy to read that you enjoyed our newly remodeled water fountain and how accessible our surface lot and underground parking structures are. We can't wait to host your next stay in Anaheim!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: I enteted and was immediately greeted and taken care of. The staff was helpful and delightful. The facilities were clean and I appreciated the purell stations they had everywhere. The whole place looked absolutely spotless. I would definitely like to visit again. Also is hard to beat the location.
Manager Response: Dear Michelle P.  Thank you for providing such a great 5-star review of our Wyndham Anaheim property. I am so pleased to hear all the accommodations worked for your stay. This is exactly what we strive for every day. Hopefully, we get a chance to welcome you back again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great customer service and convenient location
Summary: My family and I (2 adults and 2 kids) stayed here during our recent 2 day trip to Disney. The hotel is conveniently located a short 15 minute walk to the parks, and on the same block as numerous restaurants and waiters. Rooms were clean and spacious.  But where this hotel exceeds is the customer service. Rudy G. at the front desk checked us in and during our stay helped us multiple times. He went above and beyond, was super polite and personable, and I cannot say enough good things about him.  There is a coffee shop in the lobby that serves Starbucks branded coffee drinks. The baristas are super nice and super pleasant as well.
Manager Response: Dear Luis M,  Wow! Thank you for taking the time to review our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel and for the great 5 stars! I am very pleased to hear you enjoyed our clean rooms and how close of a walk we are to both Disneyland Park,  Disneyland California Adventure Park, and the restaurants and attractions at the Garden Walk which is also just a short stroll from us. It is so very sweet of you to personally name Rudy at our front desk, he is new to our property and we appreciate all the great feedback, he will be so ecstatic when he reads this! We always strive to do our best to accommodate our guests in every way possible, I'm very proud and glad we were able to accomplish that for your family during your trip to Anaheim.  The Starbucks Cafe in our lobby just reopened a few weeks ago with breakfast sandwiches, new specialty bagels, and refreshing drinks that our sweet baristas make have been a great hit! I can't thank you enough for this informative review and we hope to host your next stay when visiting Anaheim!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Knowing we wanted a comfortable place to stay the night before heading into Disney, we enjoyed this location for its closeness-easy walking distance to the parks! Also super nice to be on the opposite side of most car parking traffic flow that Disney gets
Manager Response: Dear ranchocristywestman,  Thank you for providing such a nice 5-star review of our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel property. I am so pleased to hear all the accommodations worked for your stay. This is exactly what we strive for every day. Hopefully, we get a chance to welcome you back again. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  All the best, Stacey Bui  Guest Service Manager.

Summary: Great service and accommodation at this hotel. Staff is excellent as are the guestrooms. Pool and gym are great options. Close to dining and to Disneyland and to freeways making it a great option if staying in the area.
Manager Response: Dear ecastillo2021,  Hello Mr. Castillo! We are so happy to read this awesome review from you, just like we are so happy to host your stays! Thank you so much for the 5-star and for your continued loyalty for staying with our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel when you are in town visiting. We are only a short walk to the new restaurants at the GardenWalk and Disneyland and California Adventure is just around the corner from us, with Disneyland opening soon, the recommendations in your review is perfect!   We can't wait to host your next stay and wish you all the best Mr. Castillo from your Wyndham Anaheim family!  Sincerely, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: From check in to check out I had a great stay at this surprising Wyndham. Was upgraded at check-in to a large room with a huge bathroom. I wasn’t expecting the luxurious bathroom with huge soaking tub. But I think most of all I appreciate the free parking. This to me says this hotel values it’s guests.
Manager Response: Dear carbiker,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this nice 5 star review of your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim! I am so happy to hear that you loved our large soaking tub and how lavish our deluxe King Well Suite bathroom was for you. Besides our Complimentary WiFi and No Resort Fee, parking for our guests is also FREE because we appreciate all our guests. We can't wait to host your next stay when you're in Anaheim!  Warmest regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Always a pleasure to stay here It’s always home away from home for us. Very comfortable and accommodating. Weather your too tipsy or all the way sober. Just a great get away from the kids every once in a while.😂🤣🥰
Manager Response: Dear tattoogusgus,  We want to thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay. It is always a pleasure for all of our team members to host your stay when you're visiting Anaheim, we really appreciate your loyalty as a Platinum Wyndham Rewards member and it is always a delight to serve you and your guests!   Wishing you all the best Gus from your Wyndham Anaheim Team members!

Summary: the hotel complely remodle inside out, eveything look brand news, starbucks  serve  in lobby , hotel provide electric card for guess drive to disneyland park, it very conveient for senior, hotel provide mouth wash for each rooms . they do every thing for guess , i will come back again with my fomily
Manager Response: Dear LightPacker615354,  Thank you so much for this great 5-star review and for choosing to stay with us during your trip to Anaheim. Our newly renovated hotel is just a short walk to the Disney Parks and we can always help our guests set up a Taxi, Uber, or Lyft to the parks. We can't wait to host your next trip with your family, our Starbucks cafe in our lobby is currently closed due to Covid-19 restrictions but we have plenty of restaurants within walking distance.   All the best, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing place to stay and great staff!
Summary: I had such a great experience at this hotel! I felt very comfortable staying here! It was super clean and the room was amazing! I couldn’t have asked for anything better. I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear pnichols19,  I want to thank you for staying with us during your trip to Anaheim and for this sweet 5-star review. I am beyond happy and proud to read that you had an amazing stay at Wyndham Anaheim with our clean rooms and customer service.  We can't wait to host your next stay! All the best, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: I enjoyed the stay , very comfortable beds and very clean environment. I will definitely be coming back. I also recommend this location to anyone staying in the area. The air quality was good as well. Overall the stay was splendid!
Manager Response: Dear richcali619,  I want to thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this gracious 5-star review of your recent stay. Our housekeepers work hard to clean the rooms and property to keep our newly renovated hotel up to our Wyndham standards for our wonderful guests. They will be so delighted to read this sweet review. Thank you so much for your recommendation and we hope to host your next stay in Anaheim!  All the best, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great spot close to the park
Summary: We have stayed in many places in Anaheim and several during the pandemic.  None have been as clean, kind and cared for as this Wyndham.  The service is by request, but fast.  The rooms are spotless with no excuses for the covid rules.  The garage has a gate to keep non guests out, not a simple bar but a full gate.  We were here with several friends and got rooms close together with no hassle.  We highly recommend this location
Manager Response: Dear b5orange,  Wow thank you so much for this detailed 5 star review of our property and how clean it was compared to other hotels in Anaheim. We have been operating during the pandemic and our housekeepers have done an amazing job of complying with all COVID-19 cleanliness protocols and even though we are still open under restrictions, we appreciate great guests like yourselves and appreciate the acknowledgment of how hard our housekeepers work.   We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim!  All the best, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Arrived at 1:30am looking for a bed for the night and was greeted by Jane! With a BIG Smile and warming welcoming, she took care of us with out a bother.  Her customer service was beyond 5 Stars, she had me walking on a red carpet with rose petals.  Loved my stay at this hotel and the bed! Was like no other & so comfortable , so if your looking for the best service and bed make your next stay here and let Jane and the rest of the staff welcome you in with a Big smile and excellent customer service.
Manager Response: Dear gregoryrS6746WX,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel this stellar 5 star review! I am so happy to read our General Manager Jane was a great representation of our property upon your arrival and even assisted you with a smooth check-in! At the Wyndham Anaheim Hotel we strive for all of our guests to feel at home and it starts with great customer service all the way from our General Manager, to our front desk team members and our housekeeping department. Since our recent renovations, the beds in every room have been updated with a pillow topper for a nice and relaxing nap or sleep before a day at Downtime Disney or at the Garden Walk, both are just a short walk from our hotel. We appreciate this sweet review and the special shout out to our excellent GM Jane, she will be so delighted to read your posting!  We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim.  All the best, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent stay, looking forward to returning!
Summary: We stayed here in July 2020 either the pandemic restrictions in place. That being said, it was an amazing stay! Checking in with Ozzy, we were immediately greeting and felt like we were home. Walking into our room, we were blown away with how modern and how new it was. We had 2 queens and a sleeper sofa. Perfect for the next trip when we bring our kids. The room was spotless. We love the blackout shade, farmhouse door to the restroom and the incredible large walk in shower. Another huge bonus was the massive mini fridge AND microwave in the room. We also loved that there were so many outlets and USBs in the room. So handy. Lastly, upon check out Stacey was so warm and friendly and just really made our morning! We get like we had been friends with her for years. We cannot wait to
Manager Response: Dear c_miles2008,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5-star review of your recent stay with us at our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel.  I am incredibly pleased to hear that you had an amazing stay ar our property for the first time! This is exactly what we strive for at our newly remodeled hotel; for all of our guests to have an easy check-in with our friendly team members, followed up nice leisure stay in our perfectly appointed rooms, and to leave happy and want to return! Thank you for listing some of our amenities in the room, all of our rooms are equipped with a mini-fridge, microwave, Keurig coffee maker, and USB ports ready for charging multiple devices, this will come in handy when you bring your 2 sons next time! It was truly my pleasure to host your stay and we all enjoyed seeing and getting to know you and your husband throughout the trip. We appreciate all of our guests and their loyalty, so when we saw your names in our system again just 2 weeks after your previous stay, Ozzie and I were so ecstatic to see you and welcome back our newly special Wyndham Rewards Member and guests!  Please let us know if you need anything at all. Hopefully, we get a chance to welcome you back again soon!  All the best, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The service is exceptional and the rooms are clean and comfortable. We stayed here during June and the Covid restrictions. The friendliness and helpfulness in meeting our needs was appreciated. We felt safe and secure. This hotel is conveniently located. We will be back.
Manager Response: Dear SuDunlap,  I want to thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay at the Wyndham Anaheim. It was our pleasure hosting yours and Mr. Dunlap's stay for the days that you were here, you really did make the most of the trip even during tough quarantine times. We really appreciate your Wyndham Rewards Membership loyalty and the sweet feedback. We can't wait to host your next trip with some close by attractions opening up again soon, Downtown Disney's outdoor services are still open as of July 2020.  All the best, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary: If you're looking for a hotel to stay in that is modern, comfortable with clean rooms, has friendly and extremely helpful staff, is within walking distance of Disneyland and has free parking...then look no further!  The beds and pillows were so comfortable...I wish I could have taken them home with me!    We spent A LONG time trying to find a nice hotel that was within a decent price range and this hotel met all of our needs and surpassed all of our expectations.  The chap on the front desk was so welcoming.  We're definitely coming back and have recommended this hotel to lots of people! :)
Manager Response: Dear 971im  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Anaheim Hotel. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and how close of a walk we are to the Disney Parks and restaurants at the Garden Walk. Our front desk team members will be so thrilled to read your generous compliments about their great customer service, we can't wait to host your next stay.  All the best, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel seemed brand new! Our StayWell room was clean and sparkling and had so many nice amenities, like the pure aire and the aromatherapy option. Loved that we could see the Disneyland fireworks from our room as well. While our trip was cut short because of Disneyland closing, the staff was so accommodating and helpful in so many ways. We'll be back for sure!
Manager Response: Dear QuayView   Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your time with us! We love hearing a review of our new StayWell rooms. The special amenities chosen by Deepak Chopra are intended for pure relaxation and bliss and isn't that firework view a nice bonus? We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us direct for any future booking needs.   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: My family and I stayed here March 7 - 12, 2020.  I highly recommend this hotel.  Our family enjoys traveling, and we have stayed in many hotels over the years.  By far, the customer service at Wyndham Anaheim exceeded any we have received from comparable hotels in the past.  It, truly, seemed that the staff took pleasure in making our stay as pleasant as possible.  The rooms were clean and modern.  The beds - I can only say, I wish I could have brought them home with us.  The hotel is two blocks from the entrance to Disneyland.  We would stay here again without hesitation.
Manager Response: Dear 285JoyB  Thank you o much for taking the time to write this glowing review of our location our staff and our amenities! We are so glad that all your expectations were not only met but exceeded! Our staff really loves to take a true interest in our guests and hospitality is always our number one concern. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs.   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Excellent service, friendly, helpful staff.  Hotel was super clean.  Our room was clean.  Beds were super comfy.  Travelled with 3 children all 4 and under.  The staff was great, they were super friendly and helpful.  We purchased a $10.00 breakfast voucher.  The food was great and more than we could eat.  All I can say is that every aspect of this hotel was wonderful.  It was close to Disney, I would say about 2 blocks within walking distance.  The hotel offered free parking.  Parking was in a secure underground, as well a security guard checked the structure.  A1 all around.  Highly recommend.  This is the only hotel we will stay at.
Manager Response: Dear Elizabethi321  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your time with us. We are so glad that you and your family enjoyed our comfortable rooms. amazing service and close proximity to Disneyland! We are especially happy that you found our gated, secured and best of all free parking structure a perfect fit for your car! We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs!   Best Wishes  Hotel Management

Summary: My family and I stayed here from March 7-10, 2020. The hotel feels and smells new and the rooms are generously large. The location is very near Disneyland and there are lots of choices for food in and around the hotel. The staff was very nice and helpful. I would like to specially commend Stacey who was extremely helpful in checking us in and throughout our stay.
Manager Response: Dear MarkoM9435XX  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a lovely review about your time with us. We love to hear that you enjoyed the new feel and even smell of our hotel! Thank you so much for the lovely compliment!  We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs.   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: The hotel is nice and clean, the front desk staff was very friendly, greeting guests as they entered the property. Room size is good, it looks modern. It was just my family, the three of us, plenty of room.  The location of this property with relevance to the Main gate at Disney is good, 7 minute walk, $10 uber ride, or $6 public shuttle (all day pass). I wish it were closer, but such is life. Their was free parking too.  The price we paid was good. If I can't get another hotel right across the main gate, I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Patricks16502MB  Thank you so much for writing a review about your time with us. We love to hear that our rooms where spacious and modern fitting your family of three perfectly. We are glad that you tried the different form of transportation in the area for your time at Disney we love the different options available to our guests! We hope to see you again int he future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs.   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: 7 minute walk to the Disney entrance. Super clean, VERY friendly staff, close to lots of shops and restaurants. Nice happy hour every evening. Room was spacious and comfortable. I would very much recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Valjax  Thank you so much for this beautiful review of our location and your time with us! We are so glad to hear that you enjoyed our spacious rooms and happy hour menu. We pride ourselves on our hospitality and hearing that our staff exceeded your expectations is music to our ears. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs.   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: This property was amazing! I’m a Wyndham Rewards Diamond member and this was one of the better properties I’ve stayed at. Priced right and everything I expected and more! The staff was super friendly and the room itself was clean and comfy. Next time we’re in the area, we’ll be staying there!
Manager Response: Dear bgreer2020  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a nice review of your time with us! We always love hearing that our rewards members have their expectations not only met but far exceeded! We can't wait to see you again during your next Anaheim visit and encourage you to call us directly for your booking needs.   Best wishes Hotel management

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel several times in the past couple years when I've visited Disneyland.  I've always been happy with my previous stays here.  However, with their recent renovations, it's definitely my go-to hotel when I visit Disneyland!  With the new renovations, the hotel is very upscale, stylish, and hip.  The rooms are beautiful.  Bathrooms are luxurious.  The lounge with bar/coffee is convenient.  Prices for the food and drinks are reasonable.  The hotel is only about a 10 minute walk from Disneyland, which is great.  And, parking is free!  Customer service was awesome!  I had a minor issue with the room (the safe didn't work).  When they weren't able to fix it immediately, they were very apologetic and tried to comp me for other amenities.  Overall, just a very
Manager Response: Dear Z2G35  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such an amazing review of our location and your time with us! We are so glad to hear that you appreciate the recently renovated rooms! We are very proud of our upscale location and we love to hear that it is appreciated by our amazing guests as well. The comfort and relaxation of our guests will always be our main goal and we will do whatever we can to make your stay more relaxing. We cant wait to see you again for your next visit and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs!   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: I regularly visit the Wyndham Anaheim for business and leisure several times a year and I'm delighted to say my recent stay this past weekend was nothing short of excellent. The staff are always friendly and full of energy, whilst the property itself is in excellent condition and offers excellent value for money.
Manager Response: Dear Denedict M  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a lovely review about your time with us. We love hearing that you have returned for both business and pleasure. We pride ourselves on the thoughtfully appointed rooms and add on amenities. We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs!   best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Highly recommend this option if your in the area. I do a few 3 day Disney Marathons and love to stay at a hotel that’s walking distance. This hotel is an amazing option. I wouldn’t stay anywhere else. The hotel is modern, quite, safe parking, clean and above all if there is anything I need the front desk and house keeping are the most professional staff I have ever encountered (and I’ve stayed at plenty hotels in my life). Great choice!! Quick walk to park and good eating options close by.
Manager Response: Dear cclements619  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a lovely review of your time with us. We are overjoyed to hear that you not only love our location but continue to return with each of your Disney trips! We love hearing that our rooms our comfy and that the staff exceed your expectations of courtesy and help! We can't wait for you to come back for your next Disney vacation and encourage you to call us directly for your booking needs.   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: My husband, 8-year-old daughter, and I stayed here for 3 nights and we loved it!! It’s the 4th hotel we’ve stayed at in the area and it’s by far our favorite. Every employee was above and beyond friendly, there are lots of little extras, including USB ports around the room, the housekeeper leaving extra coffee because they noticed we drank it all - things like that. Free parking, parking before checking in... I could go on and on. We left this hotel and checked into a fancy hotel on the San Diego marina for my husband’s work conference and we wish we could go back to the Wyndham Anaheim! So much nicer than this $400/night room we are in now.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer J  Thank you for taking the time to write this amazing review from your stay! We are so glad that you your husband and daughter loved the little extras in the room like USB ports and extra coffee! We pride ourselves on our attention to detail and we believe it really makes the difference especially to seasoned travelers who know the difference. Again we want to thank you for taking the time to write this review (especially while you're currently sitting in another hotel!) and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs!   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: Room was nice only complaint in handicap bathroom have a stool to sit at sink and for towels and mat fir inside tub to slippery. I slipped and fell in tub. Stiff and bruised a bit but ok. I would come back and stay.
Manager Response: Dear  Jtn7115  Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write this review. We are so sorry that the ADA bathroom was slippery, we take any situation like this very seriously and will look into ways to fix the problem. We hope that you will be back soon and would love the chance to earn your business again with one of our stay well rooms! Please feel free to call us directly and make sure to mention this review!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: We had a great stay. Everyone was friendly, helpful, and positive.  Our room was clean, nice sized, and comfortable. Easy walk to Disneyland.  We will definitely stay here again.  Great amenities- pool, hot tub, Starbucks coffee in lobby, free parking.
Manager Response: Dear NicoleS9967MB  Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write a review of your time with us. We are so glad that you had a chance to check out all the amenities our location has to offer! It really sounds like you guys had a chance to try it all! We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to callus directly for any future booking needs.   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary: We had a quick one night stay at this hotel while we visited Disney parks. We didn’t spend much time in the hotel but it was perfect for what we needed. The hotel room was large and clean. Staff were super friendly and helpful. Parking was free and we could park both days of our stay. Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Dear 787Katyh  Thank you for taking the time to write such a beautiful review! We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed the thoughtful amenities and extras we have to offer like free parking and spacious rooms! We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs!   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: I came down to Anaheim for a conference that I attend annually.  I decided to come back to the Wyndham for the second year In a row. Stacey, Andres, and Michelle were incredible. So friendly and hospitable, and were more than happy to take care of me for any need that I had. I chose this hotel again because they have always taken such great care of me and are so wonderful and thoughtful. They make sure all guests are comfortable and enjoy their stay. And they did an amazing job . The rooms were nice, clean, and spacious and very comfortable. To all the staff thank you so much. And I will definitely be back.
Manager Response: Dear Alech287  Thank you so much for writing this amazing review of our location and staff. Reviews like this make us smile from ear to ear. The comfort of our guests is always our top priory and hearing such amazing things about our staff is music to our ears. We cant wait for you to return for your next stay and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs.   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: I've stayed here in February 2020 for 3nights-4 days.    The check-in process is very efficient and the people at the reception are very nice and attentive. I had a couple of packages sent to the hotel before my arrival and those were given to me with no issue The room has a good size. Having a microwave and a fridge is very convenient.  The hotel have some parts that look a little dated, however, rooms are renovated and nice.  There are a lot of USB connections in the room which we appreciated to charge all devices   We had breakfast very early (7 am) and there was always service with a smile. The last day we were greeted by Miguel and he was super nice to us and make my kid happy The check out process was super quick as well.
Manager Response: Dear Sabgr0  Thank you for taking the time out of your day to write such a nice review of our location. It is always great to hear that our check in process was efficient and handled with care. We love to hear that you appreciated the abundance of USB outlets in the room. We have found that having the proper outlets can make all the difference when it comes to comfort. We will make sure to pass along the compliments to our restaurant staff! We hope to see you again in the future and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs.   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Best and warmest customer service, ever
Summary: This was seriously the best customer service I have had in a hotel, ever.  The entire hotel is extremely clean (your housekeeping is doing an EXCELLENT job!!!), and is modern.  The moment you walk into the hotel you are warmly greeted and “welcomed back”.  The manager was extremely congenial and accommodating.  I had concerns with our room location since it faced the street and I am a light sleeper, he fixed it immediately and ensured that I didn’t feel like a pain for asking for this.  Joyce and Stacey at the front desk were outstanding.  One of them noticed that my water bottle was empty as we were walking in, and promptly asked me if I’d like to have it refilled with filtered water.  Um, yes please!  The room was perfect for us since it had a sofa bed, so each teen had a bed
Manager Response: Dear cl02003ih   First off we want to thank you from the bottom of our hearts for this glowing review of your time with us. We can not stress enough how happy a review like this makes us. When staying at any hotel we know guests first priority is always comfort and ease and this is something we try and focus on as a core principle of hospitality. Providing rooms that meet the needs of our guests will always be our main priority and making sure you had the room you needed will never be looked at as a "pain" Thank you again for taking the time to write this review I will be sure to let Stacey, Joyce, and our housekeeping staff know about this review! We can not wait for you to come back for your next Disney trip and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs.   Best wishes Hotel Management

Summary Heading: Awesome service, beautiful  and clean property
Summary: I had never stayed at this hotel as many times as I have been to Anaheim. They had the best customer service from the time I registered. Both Andy and Stacey were so friendly, helpful and positive. The room was clean, beautiful and more then I had expected. I recommend this place for all who need to stay for business or pleasure or any other reason. I will definitely be back. They offer free parking for guests.
Manager Response: Dear H3296VOveronicar  Thank you for taking the time to write this amazing review of our location! We are so glad to hear that our staff was friendly and helpful! Our goal is always to make sure our guests are relaxed and carefree from the moment they walk in the door. We will be sure to pass along the compliments and encourage you to call us directly for any future booking needs.   Best Wishes Hotel Management

Summary: I spend a lot of time in hotels due to the nature of my work. I travel to Anaheim once a year and I can say for certain that this Wyndham is by far the hotel of my choice. This is where I will stay each and every time I visit Anaheim. Not only were the rooms very nice, but the staff was amazing. After 2 days of being there, the ladies at the front desk knew me by name and went out of their way to ensure my stay was meeting my standards. See you in Feb. next year!
Manager Response: Dear BradPDT,  Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your experience. We are so glad to see you enjoyed your stay. It was a pleasure to have you and we hope to see you again soon!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is a short walk to Disneyland. It is convenient and accessible. At night, it's quiet and relaxing. The staff is always friendly and they offer many food options for quick bites. This is the 4th time we have stayed in the past year and will continue to make it a number one hotel choice in the future.
Manager Response: Dear thepound06,  Thank you for leaving our Wyndham Anaheim Hotel this nice review. We are so happy to see you enjoyed your stay and took advantage of our great location. It was a pleasure hosting your stay and we can’t wait to have you back the next time you’re in Anaheim.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Excellent staff, very helpful.  Great room.  Clean room.   I plan to use this hotel  when i have travels to Los Angeles.  Good location for business.  The check is was very helpful with the room selection.   I will recommend this to my business associates.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Came here to celebrate my 21 year anniversary and visit Disneyland.  I was greeted and welcomed with open arms.  Stayed for 3 days and enjoyed every minute of it.  Everything and everyone was a wonderful experience.  I even received a reward member welcome gift bag upon my check-in.  Definitely coming back to this hotel on my next trip to Disneyland.  Overall a 10/10.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good Morning.   It is with a delighted heart, that I write this review about my great stay with Wyndham Garden Anaheim.  It was the first time that me and my family were going to visit Disneyland. So it was a very special trip to me. As soon as we came in, we were received with a very warm and beautiful smile from Stacey Bui and Randy Ramos at the front desk. They were so nice to me and my family that we really felt welcomed and embraced by them.  Stacey was smiling all the time talking to me and my family and interacting with my niece, nephew and the rest of my family. Randy welcomed me and thanked me for being a Wyndham Rewards Member and gave me a welcome package with some goodies as long with 2 welcome drinks. Randy was very nice and made check in process fast, efficient and
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was so happy to stay here. From the time I checked in to the day I checked out my service was exceptional. Wifi, parking, pool, restaurant, starbucks coffee, 7 minutes from Disneyland by walking, fridge in room, and laundry facilities were some of the reasons this is a great place to stay. I would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The BEST place to stay while in Anaheim
Summary: The Staff at Wyndham Anaheim were the most warm, friendly and wonderful people we've had the pleasure of meeting.  Thanks again to Joyce and Andy for their above and beyond wonderful attitude that made our stay truly enjoyable!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My team and I stayed at the Wyndham while attending a conference at the nearby Anaheim Convention Center (10 min walk). The hotel is bright and comfortable and the staff were outstanding - from front desk to housekeeping. Very comfortable beds and great showers! My only observation is that the coffee shop is rather clinical - no one wants to have dinner in a neon bright canteen at night!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Friendly, helpful staff, clean hotel. It is in close proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland so we were able to easily walk to both. It is also close to the Garden Walk for shopping and dining.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed 5 nights for a business conference. The hotel and my room was always kept clean. The staff was so friendly. They always made sure to welcome you with a huge smile and greeting every time you walked through the door. It created a very welcome and warm atmosphere.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The entire staff was so welcoming and friendly.  We would like to specifically recognize Kenny in the bar.  He took great care of us and gave us excellent recommendations. Simply put, he was so nice and genuine that it left a noteable impression on our entire team who was there on business for the week. The tater tots and beer/wine selection was another plus.  Again, the entire staff and location was exceptional.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I really enjoyed my stay at this hotel. The conference I attended was at the Disneyland hotel and this hotel was an excellent choice. It was within walking distance to Disneyland and Anahiem Gardens and many restaurants. The hotel was very clean and the staff was very friendly. I also enjoyed a wonderful breakfast on Friday morning.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Perfect location for Disneyland and LA sight-seeing
Summary: We enjoyed this hotel and it close proximity to Disneyland.  We were there for three nights in July and did some LA sightseeing and a quick day at Disneyland.  There was a bit of confusion about our room at checkin where we were supposed to have two beds in the second bedroom, but there was just one.  Not a big deal, but my teenage kids really wanted their own beds.  We had to pack up the next day, leave our bags at the desk, and then they moved us into a different room when it was available.  We also had purchased groceries and when they moved us, they did not put most of the perishables in the fridge while we were out all day.  Again, not a big deal, but it could have been handled better by management.  Overall, the resort is great and we enjoyed staying there.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very clean, comfortable and the people in Wyndham's empty were always friendly and helpful.  We left an article of clothing behind and they are the only hotel in our life's experiences that ever called to let us know and to offer help in returning the jacket.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a very good hotel. Conveniently located to the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland. Up to date decor, nice amenities, small bu pleasant bar and restaurant. Very comfortable room; nice bathroom. Iternet worked well. Very friendly front desk staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My friends and I booked a one night stay here in Anaheim. The hotel was very clean, the staff was very professional, and the room itself was immaculate. There was 5 of us. Needless to say, we occupied a lot of space; the two beds and pull-out sleeper were adequate and comfortable. After a long day at the convention center, we returned to our hotel room for the night. In the morning, after check out, we ate breakfast at the bar/cafe. A short time after we had gotten our food, the hotel's concierge, Stacey, alerted us that the hotel's cleaning staff found my friends air pods in our recently vacated room. That right there showed us this was a very humble and honest hotel. I would very much like to stay here again. The service was great, and weekend was one for the books.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff made this business trip warm, friendly, and personable. The guest rooms are super clean. The meeting rooms fit all our needs. I will be back!

When we got to our room all my kids commented on how the room smelled funny. It had a mildew-like smell. I didn’t want to say anything but when we saw her later she asked about the room and quickly moved us to a new one. The new one smelled fine when we checked into it. However once we got settled in again and started getting ready for bed, the sink had an awful sewage smell every time we turned the faucet on. We had wanted to add an extra night but because of this, we decided to end our

I am a picky sleeper and these beds were very comfortable. The hotel is clearly kept up and has a very modern design. Manager Response: none

Summary: This team went out their way to help us make the best of a nightmarish start of a weekend! Made us feel right at home. This is not the first time we stayed at this facility and the staff took every step to make sure our stay exceeded expectations

Summary Heading: Great hotel for your next Disney trip!

I would definitely come back on my next Disney trip with the family!

My elderly, handicapped family had to walk around the building to the front desk every time the stepped out.  Just to have the front desk

We got a room that had a view of the fireworks every night. So my daughter was excited about that. Especially since we weren’t there to go to Disneyland. It was nice to still have a touch of Disney added to our trip. I would stay here again any time I’m in the area!!

We returned well after 11pm and our luggage and quick check-in was waiting allowing us to get to our room without a hassle. The room was spacious enough and had a refrigerator, safe, coffee maker and a large bathroom. On our second day we again ate at the restaurant and bought some snacks at the lobby coffee shop/bar. While the walk is fairly short to Disney, there is also a bus for $4 that picks you up outside the hotel.  The hotel itself is nice and modern. Manager Response: Dear Elanagb.  I want to thank you for providing such a great review of our property. Summary Heading: Great property and distance to Disneyland!
Summary: Absolutely a great value and a walkable distance to Disneyland (10-15 minutes). A few things on my 'wish' list for it: optional transportation to Disneyland in case you can't walk, etc (but it's very walkable) and better snacks available. It's just around the corner from pizza, Korean food, and other food so it's easy to grab something quick too.   A note on noise - we were too tired from Disneyland to notice anything!  If you're looking for a friendly, clean, affordable hotel for Disneyland, this is your spot!

Manager Response: Dear 826lt,  Thank you for this great 5 star review and for choosing to stay with us. I am so happy to read that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms and how close of a walk we are to both Disney Parks. Our team members will be so delighted to read this nice review, we can't wait to welcome you back!   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui  Guest Service Manager

Summary: After searching walking distance and affordable hotels to the Disney resorts we decided on this one, even though we ended up using the ART bus. Just around the corner from HarborBlvd. Breakfast available from almost dawn till11am and dinner till 9 pm I think but we were never there for that. On the ART bus route for very affordable and convenient pick-up and drop-off. One thing that stood out was the front desk staff recognized my sister and myself and made us feel appreciated. Very nicely appointed rooms and with a brother and sister, you need that. Nice breakfast room serving from 6 am till 11 am I believe.I would certainly stay here again and they fully explained how the ART buses operate.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Check-in People were wonderful. And great walking distance to food and shops. However, the stay itself was ridiculous. From the street noise, to guest noise, to the maids knocking on the door 4 times starting at 6:40 am and VACUUMING right in front of our door multiple times. I have medical issues, I did not sleep at all due to the noise, and even though we had LATE check-out we were continuously harassed. And when I talked to the front desk they cared more about who gave me the late check out than my issues or complaints- complete disregard to the actual issue.
Manager Response: Dear Megan Z,  I appreciate you taking the time to leave our newly renovated property a candid review of your recent stay, though it is not the usual 5 stars we are used to, we fully acknowledge and value all feedback. I am very happy to hear that you had a great check in experience with our front desk team members and enjoyed how close of a proximity our hotel is to the Garden Walk with their new restaurants and attractions. It is unfortunate and surprising to read that you had somebody knocking on your door at 6:40AM only because our housekeeping department does not clock in until 9AM, if this was reported at the time of the incident we could have sent Security to check the discrepancy and let you get the rest you deserve especially with your medical ailment. I was reviewing your reservation and you did check into a king room with a street view of Katella; there was not any alerts or notes to have you in a quiet room or top floor, at the front desk we will always do our best to be accommodating as possible to ensure you get the best stay you deserve, for future reservations please do contact us directly so we can add these special notes to your reservation to have you on our highest floor and a pool view for a quieter room. Concerning your late check out request, our front desk team member was informed by the housekeeping supervisor that she did not have you on her list of late check outs after 11AM therefore she requested for her to call you to get an estimate of your departure since all the rooms must be serviced before 3PM for the next arriving guests. I apologize if you were granted a late check out and that it was not passed on appropriately to the next shift, we still do genuinely hope to get the chance to welcome you back and provide you with the best Wyndham Garden experience you fully deserve as one of our guests! Please feel free to contact me directly at 714-991-6868 for your next booking so I can ensure your room needs are properly met and your stay is as magical as your time at the Disneyland Park!  Warmest Regards Sincerely, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Kids and I loved our stay in this modern, clean hotel super close to Disney (ten minute walk) and the Garden Walk (five minute walk). The pool was warm and had plenty of towels. The beds were comfortable. Heaven! We can’t wait to go back!
Manager Response: Dear Seattle_Mom_76,  I want to thank you for leaving us this great 5 star review of your recent stay. I am so happy to read that you enjoyed our newly remodeled property and how close of a proximity we are to both parks. We can't wait to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in Anaheim!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Very close to amenities, perfect for Anaheim visit.

Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed here  with a friend in August for the D23 Expo, and everything was perfect! Everyone at the front desk was warm and friendly, and seemed genuinely happy to see us every time we walked into the lobby. They went above and beyond to make sure our stay was great.   The hotel itself is very nice. It's modern without feeling cold or impersonal. I love the plant life motif throughout. It felt very relaxing and cozy.  The room was really nice: very clean, and with all of the amenities we could need: a TV, a fridge, microwave, iron and ironing board. and even a keurig for making coffee or tea! And the beds were so comfortable! Far more comfy than my bed at home! I also loved how quiet the hotel was. I couldn't hear any of our neighbors from our room, and the lobby was always
Manager Response: none

Summary: 12-15 minute walk to Disneyland. Service (front desk and otherwise) impeccable. I really appreciated the change in towels. Cleaning service starts early so don't forget to put up a Do Not Disturb sign!
Manager Response: Dear tfarnique,  Thank you so much for this sweet 5 star review of your recent stay at our newly renovated property. All of our team members will be so happy to read this from our front desk staff to our housekeepers who work hard to keep this property the #1 Wyndham Garden in Anaheim. Great tip by the way about the Do Not Disturb sign, all rooms will be serviced once the housekeepers arrive unless a DND sign is posted. We hope to get the chance to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Best location for visiting Disneyland or Convention Center
Summary: Pros - great place to stay and extremely convenient if you are visiting either the Convention Center or Disneyland, both are no more than a 7 & 10 minute walk depending on stoplights.  Staff are extremely friendly and the convenience of the lounge and cafe are a huge plus.  Beds and pillow are amazing and water pressure/showers are awesome.  Cons - The massive green plant wall next to the bed may give you nightmares.  No fans in the bathroom cause black mold on the ceiling and our bathroom sink had a ridiculous bad odor.  Tips - If you plan to eat in the cafe/restaurant, go to the front desk and purchase the $10 voucher for entree and beverage...this will save you anywhere from $5-$10 per person and you can buy as many as you like as often as you like.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Spacious room, comfortable beds. Easy walk to Disney and also close to a good selection of restaurants after a tiring day at the parks. This hotel is well set up for people who need an accessible hotel the pool even has a lift! Super friendly staff nothing is too much trouble
Manager Response: Dear NicolaBurnieTasmania,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this nice review of your recent stay. I am very happy to read that our newly renovated hotel was properly appointed for all your accessible needs and that you were able to enjoy our pool with the lift! Thank you for this posting and your sweet compliment about our team members and their wonderful customer service. I hope we get a chance to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The staff at the Wyndan Garden Anaheim were AWESOME!  Everyone was friendly, helpful and accommodating. Rooms were clean, beds were comfortable and a great location close to everything.  A great experience.  We will return.

The staff was very friendly and helpful,  the pool was great. We especially liked the underground parking which required a room key to enter. It was a short 10 minute walk to Disneyland parks.

AND a little outside pool and area for really hot days. The rooms were so clean and we loved the citrus products. We will stay there again!

Summary Heading: The best Wyndham hotel I've stayed in Los Angeles
Summary: I have stayed in other Wyndham properties, and the Wyndham Garden Anaheim I would say is the best family hotel I've visited.  First, the customer service is excellent.   The front staff is warm, welcoming, and friendly.  The hotel is immaculate and has a very clean and pleasant smell everywhere and across the hallway.  The room has lots of USB charging stations, a USB radio, and an alarm clock.  I appreciate that there is a small fridge, coffee maker, microwave, and complimentary bottled water.  Thank you for that. It helps when you just arrived from traveling.  The restaurant in the hotel is also a great option.  The price is reasonable.  Staff service is also great and attentive.  The fact also that they provide complimentary parking for hotel guests makes our Disneyland park
Manager Response: none

Summary: I just wanted to take this opportunity to give a HUGE shout out to the Wyndham Garden- Anaheim! Everyone from the front desk staff, to housekeeping, to the girls at the coffee bar, went above and beyond any expectations I had and made our stay here even more enjoyable! They were all so friendly and helpful, and provided the upmost hospitality and service! I would not hesitate to stay here again when in the Anaheim area, and I look forward to doing so again soon! Thank you again, it was seriously top-notch accommodations!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location for Disney with free parking, rooms are a great size, clean and well looked after, the staff couldn’t do enough and were always smiling, they were so friendly, would thoroughly recommend this hotel and would use again, thanks for looking after us
Manager Response: none

Summary: Location is in the center of the are Cheesecake, PF Chang’s, Bubba Shrimp and Garden walk is within walking distance as is Disneyland.  Beds are very comfortable and rooms are spacious. Relaxing rain shower.
Manager Response: Dear Manuel G,  Thank you so much for leaving us this great 5 star review of your stay with us during your trip to Disneyland. That is nice that you were able to take a quick stroll to the abundance of restaurants at The Garden Walk just down the street from our hotel. I am so happy to hear that you loved our newly renovated property with the stand in water fall shower head along with our new beds too! I hope we get the chance to welcome you back soon.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Came down for a quick day trip to Disneyland and was very pleased with how quiet and clean this hotel was.  Free parking was one of the biggest perks in an area where it’s commonly charged.  Great service and friendly employees at all hours!!
Manager Response: Dear dmbarf00t,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this nice review of your recent stay. I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed how clean our newly remodeled property was and the complimentary perks of parking, free WiFi and no resort fee. I really appreciate the sweet feedback about our team members and their great customer service throughout your stay. We hope to get the chance to welcome you back soon!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We had an amazing time while visiting Disneyland for the 1st time! This hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland- there also many restaurants nearby for which to pick from. We will definitely go back!
Manager Response: Dear nceciliano,  Thank you so much for this great 5 star review and for choosing to stay with us on your first trip to Disneyland! I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed how close of a walk our newly renovated property is to the parks and all the restaurant strips next to us. We can't wait to welcome you back for your second visit!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: First a big thank you to both Ozzie and Stacey at the Front Desk. They are both top notch people working for this hotel. The hotel is nice and the rooms are great, but Ozzie and Stacey really made our two night stay very enjoyable. I could tell they are both very good working in hospitality and enjoy working at this property. I have been working in hospitality for the past 8 years in Northern California, and I would be very proud to have these two on my team. This hotel will be my new hotel to stay at when I’m in Southern California. Again thank you for the great stay.
Manager Response: Dear 849louisr,  I want to thank you for choosing to stay with us during you visit to Anaheim and for this great 5 star review! It was our pleasure hosting your stay and we had a wonderful time making memories with you; we are so fortunate to have amazing guests like yourselves who go the extra mile to let us know we're appreciated and that is why we work so hard to ensure every guest has the best stay they deserve! I can't thank you enough for this review, your stellar recommendations and kind words, we sincerely hope to get the chance to welcome you back!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: I will not be staying at a Wyndham hotel again. It was cheaply remodeled and the FREE breakfast was just for two adults. NO KIDS.... We also found a bug on our bed one of the nights. The front dest staff was great.
Manager Response: Dear beraunlove,  Hello Ms. Elizabeth, I appreciate you taking the time to leave us this candid review of your stay. We just completed renovations over a year ago and through the Wyndham Garden brand we have been awarded #1 Best Of Wyndham Gardens in Anaheim. I do recall upon check in thoroughly informing you about your booking with breakfast, since you booked through a third party and only listed 1 adult on the reservation therefore the room and breakfast charge was for 1 adult per day during your stay instead of the party you had of 2 adults and 4 children, you acknowledged the rate difference and agreed since only 1 adult was listed instead of the party of 6 it would have costed more; my apologies to you that this cause an inconvenience during your trip, next time please feel free to call us directly and we can help you with your booking. We sincerely enjoyed hosting your stay with your family and was even to able to accommodate your husband's request of dining in our lobby and putting on the World Cup soccer game while you all had dinner. I am very surprised and sorry to hear that you found a bug in your bed, it was never reported to us at the front desk otherwise we would have taken all the appropriate steps to deep clean your room or move you if need be so your family would have been more comfortable.   Again, thank you for the review and for staying with us. I do hope that you would reconsider staying with us again in the future so we can provide you and your family the best stay you deserve.   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay, close to Disneyland
Summary: We only stayed one night and wished we had tie to stay longer and enjoy the room more. The beds were SO comfortable, the whole hotel and rooms were super clean, staff was great. and it was about a 5 minute walk to the park. As an added bonus they didnt charge for parking or a resort fee. This is now our go to hotel when in Anahiem.
Manager Response: Dear Roam23048543015,  I really appreciate you taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your stay! It is so good to hear that you loved how clean the rooms were and how comfortable our new beds are too, they were all replaced during our renovations and have been a big hit with our guests that we even have the bed brand on hand if you would like. Thank you for the sweet comments about our team members and their great customer service, we are always here to meet your needs and accommodate the best we can. Parking is complimentary as well as WiFi and no resort fee, so our guests can save that extra money for more fun at the parks! We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Had a great 1 weeks stay here.  We were originally told on the phone that we would have to change rooms in the middle of the week, since they didn't have the same room for the week, but by the time came, Jesus, was able to get us the same room all week.  Clean Rooms.  Security guard outside at night
Manager Response: Dear Duane K,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us this nice review of your recent stay! I am so happy to read that you enjoyed your one week long stay with us and your room accommodation was met at check in, we strive to ensure all of our guests have the best stay they deserve and that all starts upon arrival. We had such a great time hosting your stay and making memories with your family, thank you for the sweet shout out to Jesus, he is new and is a good addition to our team. I hope we get the chance to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Check in was seamless.  Front desk communication was seamless regardless of current.  Rooms were comfortable and clean.  Parking was the best I had experienced on our trip.  The location is proximal to Disney and would allow you to take a break from the action and return to your room instead of pulling a 16 hour day between the parks like we did!
Manager Response: Dear S4mu3L_D,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star of your recent stay! I am so happy to read that you had an easy check in, enjoyed our complimentary underground parking and loved the room! We are only a short walk from our newly remodeled property to both Disney Parks so a lot of our guests take that opportunity to come back mid-day for a break then stroll back to the parks for the fireworks! We can't thank you enough for staying with us and we hope to host your next stay soon!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Perfect hotel for the Disneyland trip
Summary: The staff at the Wyndham Garden were fantastic. Very welcoming, kind and attentive. The check-in process was easy and parking was a breeze. We were able to walk to Disneyland, since the hotel was only about a block away. The room was very clean and the beds were extremely comfortable. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear jtbirdton,  Thank you so much for leaving us this awesome 5 star review! We really enjoyed hosting your stay and making memories with you and your family during your Disneyland vacation trip! I am so happy to read that you loved how clean and new our rooms were, we can't wait to have you back!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We had an amazing stay at Wyndham Garden Anaheim...The hotel, grounds, restaurant and pool were well kept, modern and very clean. ALL the staff were so friendly, helpful and genuine. The front desk, baristas, servers and housekeeping ALL did an impeccable job. I was more than impressed with everything about my stay. If ever back in California, I will definitely stay with them again.  Also, it is within walking distance to Disneyland, Anaheim Gardenwalk, Convention Center and lots of great restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear Jill B,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review our newly renovated property! I am so happy to read that you thoroughly enjoyed  your stay with us and had a great time making memories with our front desk team members from the baristas at our Courtyard Cafe in the lobby all the way to our great housekeeping department. It is always very appreciated when every department of our hotel is recognized, the housekeepers will be so delighted when I pass along this sweet review, they are the backbone of our property to ensure every guest has a clean room and enjoy our newly remodeled property. Your great review and recommendation is all we can ask for.. and of course to host your next stay. Best wishes to you!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Easily walked to convention center and disneyland. Excellent and friendly staff, super professional, clean! We really enjoyed our stay here and would definitely come back when we come visit again. thumbs up!!!
Manager Response: Dear Passenger33777470645,   I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this nice review of your recent stay. I am so happy to hear that you loved making memories with our front desk team members and enjoyed how clean our newly remodeled property is. We can't wait to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in Anaheim!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hotel was very nice, clean, and the staff was superb—professional, attentive, friendly, and responsive to any need! Would highly recommend staying at this hotel. Very close to Disneyland entrance—walkable!  There is a local shuttle available for pickup and drop off outside the hotel for a nominal fee!
Manager Response: Dear _Zippy35,  Thank you so much for leaving us this great 5 star review of your recent stay! I want to thank you for the sweet compliments about our team members and their great customer service, reviews like these really go a long way. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed our new property and how close of a walk we are to the Disney Parks, there is also the city shuttle ART that picks you up directly in front of our hotel too! We hope to get the chance to welcome you and your family back soon, best wishes!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Location within walking distance to Disneyland.  Nice hotel, clean & modern.  Staff very friendly at front desk. Requested extra towels and comforter and received them promptly and with a smile!  would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear 3399jima,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review and for you recent stay with us. We are so happy that you loved how new and clean our remodeled property is, we are only a short walk to both Disney Parks as well as restaurants. Thank you so much for the kind words about our front desk team members and their award winning customer service, we really appreciate the recognition and support. We can't wait to welcome you back!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We really enjoyed the hotel, staff was very friendly and welcoming! Kids loved the pool! Was a short walk to Disneyland! We will certainly consider staying here again the next time we come for a visit!
Manager Response: Dear Culture60404855672,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review! I am so happy that your family had a great time staying at our newly remodeled hotel and enjoyed our pool and making memories with our team members. We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great location. Friendly staff. Clean and spacious accommodations. Close to Disneyland and restaurants. Cheesecake restaurant and other nice restaurants are nearby within several minutes of walking. Seattle coffee is available in the hotel lobby and Starbucks is across the street.
Manager Response: Dear Nomad67457668335,  Thank you for this fantastic 5 star review and for choosing to stay with us for your family trip to Disneyland. We are convienently located right behind Disneyland Parks and restaurants just down the way, I am happy that the proximity provided an easy walk for your family. We can't thank you enough for staying with us and this sweet review, we hope to host your next stay soon!

Summary: Every staff member that we interacted with during our five days was amazing.  Free parking, great breakfast, and they let us keep our car there after we checked out.  From asking for ice in the restaurant or for extra towels to take to the beach, they delivered with a smile.
Manager Response: Dear hueryadsalkdjfa,  Wow! Thank you so much for leaving us this great review of your 5 DAY STAY WITH US! We had such a great time making memories with your family and really enjoyed hosting your stay. Thank you for including our hotel provides complimentary parking, as well as WiFi and there is not a resort fee! I am so happy to read that our front desk team members were able to accommodate all your requests promptly and happily! We hope to get a chance to welcome you back soon.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: My family and I went to Anaheim to visit Huntington Beach, Universal and Disneyland. We chose Wyndham Garden due to our previous love of this hotel, formerly known as the Ramada Plaza. My kids, well now adults, 18 and 24, loved the new modern upgrades. The room was nice and clean. The beds were soft and comfortable. We couldn't have asked for better! Also, loved, loved the new coffee bar! The staff was super pleasant and friendly every time we left and entered the hotel. Check-in and out was a breeze. Definitely will be staying here again!
Manager Response: Dear Explorer603079,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us such a great 5 star review! Wow it is so amazing to have such loyal guests like yourselves that have been with us since our Ramada Plaza days. I am so happy to read that you loved our newly remodeled hotel and the new lobby Courtyard Cafe & Restaurant. We can't thank you enough for your staying with us and being so kind with your recommendations. Please call us for your next booking, we hope to host your next stay soon.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Fantastic recently renovated hotel very close to Disneyland.
Summary: This hotel was great from the start and kept us happy throughout our trip.  Not many hotels offer free parking and they let us park before our check-in time and after our check-out time to avoid Disney parking costs.  The rooms are recently renovated and were great quality with modern amenities.  The staff was very friendly and helpful throughout, and remembered us as we came in each day, asking how our trip was going.  The beds were extremely comfortable.  On the soft side which we like, but not so soft that someone who prefers a firm bed would be unhappy.  The pillows were plentiful and soft.  The walk to the front gate of Disney is only .7 miles and took us 10-15 minutes each day.  Uber / Lyft was close to $5 each way, though that varies.  Really couldnt ask for more out of a
Manager Response: Dear Bryan S,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review and for choosing to stay with us during your trip to Disneyland! I am so happy that our team members were able to accommodate with parking before the room was ready and even upon check out you can leave it all day, its a great complimentary perk as well as no resort fee with us! We are so appreciative for the nice shout out to our team members and their great customer service, this is what we strive for everyday. We can't wait to get the chance to welcome you back the next time you're in town.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great hotel. Many stores in the area. Free parking, secure rooms, super friendly and helpful staff. Delicious coffee and Kids loved the pool too! Very clean rooms and hotel overall. Staff went above and beyond to help and make sure we were comfortable!
Manager Response: Dear  jessie207,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this nice 5 star review! I am so happy to read that you enjoyed our newly remodeled rooms and had a great time making memories with our team members, we are always here to help answer any questions and make your stay as pleasant as possible! We can't wait to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in Anaheim!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: A perfect place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: What a great place to stay. Cannot fault it one bit. As soon as you step through the glass doors you are greeted very genuinely by the front desk staff. They are most helpful and will answer every question and help in many ways. The room itself is a nice size with all the modern conveniences. There is a pool, fitness centre, bar and restaurant and laundry facilities (which were most handy). Across the road are 2 chemists, there're plenty of restaurants and bars within 5 minutes walk and Disneyland main entrance is only 10 walk away. Thank you Wyndham Garden, and special mention to Stacey who was very helpful on front desk.
Manager Response: Dear Aussie_2012,  Wow! I want to thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this wonderful 5 star review! We had such a great time hosting your stay and enjoyed making memories with you and your family. Thank you for the sweet compliments about out team members and their award winning customer service, they will all be so delighted to read this read! I am so happy to hear that you thoroughly enjoyed our newly remodeled property and how close of a walk we are to the Disney Parks. We hope you all the best and can't wait to get the chance to welcome you back the next time you and your family are in Anaheim, warmest regards to you all!  Sincerely, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Wyndham Garden Inn - a great place to stay!
Summary: The newly remodeled property is clean, comfortable and a short walk to the main entrance of the parks.  The restaurant is also a great place to have breakfast if you want to avoid the crowds before heading over!
Manager Response: Dear 12MarkR53,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay. I am so happy that enjoyed our updated renovations and loved how modern and clean our rooms were. We can't thank you enough for dining with us at the Courtyard Restaurant in our lobby! We hope to get the chance to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim during a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center. Initially, I had an issue with my room but they went above and beyond to resolve the issue. The front desk staff were extremely friendly and I’d definitely stay here again if I’m ever in the area. Jesus at the front desk was awesome.
Manager Response: Dear kreifsn1,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review! Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your trip to Anaheim, we are only a short walk to the Anaheim Convention Center and restaurants near by. I am very pleased to read that our team members were able to fix the issue in your room and accommodate you the best we can, Jesus will be so ecstatic when I pass along this review with a sweet shout out for him. We can't thank you enough for this amazing review and we can't wait to welcome you back!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: 5 Star Rating. The Room was like new, and very comfortable. The folks here were very friendly and accommodating. Things like shopping,restaurants, and transportation where all within walking distance. I would recommend this hotel to my friends and family. And, we will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear alarmslv,  Thank you so much for staying with us and for this great 5 star review! I am so happy to read that you loved our newly remodeled property and how accommodating our front desk team members are.
