Our property is perfectly located right in the heart of Anaheim with convenient stores at the corner and the Garden Walk just down the street. We really appreciate this sweet review and your recommendation as well.   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Highly recommend this hotel. Staff was very friendly and attentive to our needs.  They always cheerfully greeted us when we left and returned to the hotel     Beds were wonderfully comfortable.  Rooms have a new and fresh feeling.  This hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland which was a HUGE plus for us.  They also have a nice pool and hot tub to rest in after a long day at Disneyland.  Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Extraordinary672948,  I want to thank you for your recent stay and for this great 5 star review! I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed making memories with our front desk team members and loved how newly renovated and spacious our rooms are, we are only a short walk to the Disney parks and our pool is open to 10PM every night so you can sneak back a little early from the parks and soak your feet after a long day. We really appreciate this review and can't wait to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in Anaheim!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great hotel, distance, and free parking.
Summary: Pool, hotel and staff were nice and clean. Great meal at the dining area. Affordable yet great tasting food. Parking was free even the day we checked out. We still had a day at Disney on the day of check out and they let us keep the car in their parking lot. That is a huge plus.
Manager Response: Dear Eddy A,   I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review! I am so happy that you loved how friendly and accommodating our from desk team members were and enjoyed our newly remodeled property. Thank you so much for dining with us at the Courtyard Restaurant, they just opened a few months ago and have been a great hit with our guests. Yes, even after check out our guests are able to keep their vehicles parked here complimentary so you can enjoy an extra half day at the Disney Parks or souvenir shopping at Downtown Disney. We can't thank you enough for this great review and we hope to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in Anaheim!

Summary: I do not give reviews often, but felt compelled to after my stay. From the moment you walk in the door you are greeted by an warm and attentive staff that make you feel like you are at home. Smiles abounded and you never had to wait or look for assistance. The room blew us away, Clean, Large and well appointed. The Cleaning staff took great care and the folded swans made from towels was awesome. I will look to stay at Wyndham more as it was perfect.
Manager Response: Dear Daydream42250289976,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review. I am very proud and happy to read that you loved our front desk team members great customer service and felt right at home, that is exactly what we strive for with every guest and I am so appreciative for the sweet acknowledgement! We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in town!   Best Wishes, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: It’s hard not to compare this room to the timeshare room we stayed the day before, but other than not having kitchen and kitchen utensils we loved our room. The mattresses at all Wyndham/World Mark rooms are the best.
Manager Response: Dear Nomad58797213593,  I appreciate you taking the time to leave us this review of your of your recent stay. I am happy that you loved our newly remodeled room and the mattress as well, since we are not apart of the Wyndham Timeshare and we are the Wyndham Hotel and Resorts our rooms come with 1 mini-fridge and 1 microwave, we have plenty of utensils at the front desk we can always provide to our guests upon request. Thank you for this review and we hope you all the best.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent experience and close to Disneyland
Summary: It took us about 15 minutes to walk to the park from here.  There's lots of restaurants, CVS, and Walgreens the nearby corners.  The parking spaces had enough room for my full-sized van, the check-in and check-out processes were painless and the staff was very friendly no matter what time of day (arrived close to midnight, left around 0900).  The rooms are spacious, well laid out and nicely appointed with a modern look and feel.  I would definitely consider this hotel at the top of my list when returning for another visit with Mickey.
Manager Response: Dear Benedict P,   Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review! I am so happy to have had the pleasure of checking you and your daughter in late one evening and really enjoyed the cute pictures of your family's soon to be puppy that you were visiting while in Anaheim. Our surface lot is open and spacious enough for vans and trailers, since we have a night time Security Officer on duty it is always safe and secure as well. I can't thank you enough for the sweet recommendation and I can't wait to welcome you and your daughter back the next time you're in Anaheim!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: I had the pleasure of staying at this ultra modern and friendly hotel.  Right at the corner of Katella and Harbor with food choices all around.  The GM was the nicest lady this morning while I was checking out.  Great business type restaurant right in the hotel, pool/spa, gym and grab n go choices too!  Lucky enough to get a fireworks view room. Giant tub, separate shower and private lav.   If you really like business hotels, it’s like coming home.
Manager Response: Dear silverstate1968,  I want to thank you for leaving us this great 5 star review of your recent stay at our newly remodeled property. I am so happy to read that you loved how new and modern our hotel is and how we are conveniently located in the middle of a restaurant strip. I can't thank you enough for the sweet compliment about our General Manager Jane, she has been with the property for 15+ years and even though she is the GM, she makes sure to be out in the lobby supporting our front desk team members whether its assisting with checking in and out guests or answering any questions about the hotel. It is great that you were able to see the fireworks from your deluxe king room with the soaking tub and stand it waterfall shower as well. I am very delighted that you had such a great stay and was able to meet our amazing GM, she will be so happy to read this review!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: For both personal and business trips, I have been staying at this hotel for over 10 years.  I have celebrated birthday's, anniversaries, and many holidays as I truly feel it is a home away from home to me.  The Staff is also a big part of my decision as they always make me feel welcomed, like a VIP!  They always go the extra mile to make sure each stay is the best it can be!
Manager Response: Dear Vanessa R,  Special greetings Mrs. Rogers! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us! It is great to read a review from one of our frequent V.I.P guest like yourself, we love having you, Sue and the girls with us when you're in town for your monthly Disneyland trip because your stories are always so fun and the special treats you hand make us are personalized and wonderful(not to mention delicious)! It is our pleasure to host all of your special getaways, anniversaries and holidays too by always making sure to have your special room on the 4th floor reserved and your goodie bags ready upon arrival too. I really appreciate this sweet review and all that you do for us at the front desk, you're our #1 special V.I.P and I can't wait to welcome you back by the end of this month!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed here for a vacation to Disneyland. The room was nice and the hotel was close enough to Disneyland that we could walk there easily and save money by not having to pay to park at Disneyland. The staff was also very friendly. The restaurant was pretty good. Especially the chicken Alfredo. The only negative is when we ordered Mickey pancakes for my daughter one morning.  They were rubbery. Other than that everything was good.
Manager Response: Dear Companion10269961965,   Thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay! I am so happy to read that you loved how close of a walk we are to the Disney Parks and enjoyed our newly remodeled room! I want to thank you for trying our newly opened Courtyard Restaurant in the lobby, the chicken Alfredo entree for dinner is a big hit with our guests and you even get 10% off your bill too; thank you for the candid review of the pancakes, I have passed this along to our Director of Food and Beverage and he has dully noted your review and passed it along to the cooks to better the quality of our pancakes, we appreciate any constructive criticism especially since we just completed renovations. We hope to get a chance to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in town.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: My go-to hotel for Disneyland trips
Summary: This is my favorite place to stay when visiting Disneyland. It is an easy 10/15 minute walk to the parks and is also surrounded by food and shops. The rooms are comfortable, clean, and updated, and the staff is extremely friendly! The secure, underground parking is also a huge perk. Since I can walk to the parks, I can leave my car down there the whole stay and not worry about it.
Manager Response: Dear KellyBowker,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us this sweet 5 star review! I am so happy to read that we are your favorite hotel to stay at while in town visiting Disneyland, that is the best compliment any property in Anaheim can ask for! We are perfectly placed right in the middle of Harbor and Katella with convenient stores located a few minutes away and just a quick stroll to restaurants at the Garden Walk. I really appreciate the great compliments about our front desk team members an their stellar customer service, this is what we strive for everyday and it is always great when our guests are not only happy but comfortable with leaving their luggage and vehicles stored with us all day securely. We can't wait to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in Anaheim!

Summary: Went for a last minute Disney trip and Wyndham Garden had a great rate on Hotels Tonight. As avid Disney go-ers and WonderCon attendees, we’ve experience most of the Anaheim hotels, and this one quickly rose right to the top on our first stay there! The location is great, the staff was super friendly and knowledgeable, and even the breakfast, although not included in the room rate, was substantial and had healthy options, for a really solid price point. Definitely making a point to stay here for future trips!
Manager Response: Dear SatisfiedFool,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us! Thank you so much for staying with us during your trip to Disneyland, we also have great amounts of guests that stay with us for WonderCon and walk to the Anaheim Convention Center too! We appreciate the sweet compliments about our front desk team member's amazing customer service and especially that we are #1 on your to stay list when visiting Anaheim! I really can't thank you enough for dining with us in our lobby at the Courtyard Restaurant, the variety of dinner salads and the specialty salmon dinner dish has been a great hit! We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim for Disneyland.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great clean, modern, spacious, rooms. Very comfortable beds. Short walk to Disneyland.  Front desk clerk Stacie is very attentive, helpful and courteous!  Great staff, this hotel provides great service!
Manager Response: Dear Freedom45201984188,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay! I am so happy that you loved how new and big our remodeled rooms were and how close of a walk we are to the Disney Parks. I really appreciate the sweet comment, we will always do our best to ensure every guest has the best stay they deserve and that starts with great customer service, it is always an extra sweet bonus when special guests like yourself notice and appreciate it too! We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you and your family are in Anaheim!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great option for Disneyland with friendly staff
Summary: I want to acknowledge this hotel as a great option for everyone visiting Disneyland or Anaheim area. I have been in the hotel and airline industry for over 28 years and havent seen consistency with great customer service from all staff for a very long time. Stacy was bubbly with enthusiasm at every touch point and her team each time we left or returned to the property would make eye contact and acknowledge us (even just for a second while serving other guests). This is great for the brand as well as the standard they have set. We were lucky to have a room assigned on the 4th floor very quiet looking out towards the pool and car park and we didnt hear anything the whole time we were there. Bed was extremely comfortable, room and bathroom was very clean. Good coffee machine and
Manager Response: Dear duffus07,  WOW! I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review and for all the informative details you included as well! We appreciate your recommendation of our hotel and your sweet compliments really motivate all of us at the front desk to always provide outstanding customer service to each and every individual guests because reviews like these make it all worth while! I am so happy that you enjoyed your pool view room on the highest floor and how spacious and modern the room was, our owner hand picked every wallpaper mural so that our guests can look at the green lush picture and feel at ease at the Wyndham Garden. The Keurig coffee machine and mini fridge in every room is perfect and practical for families like yours traveling to Disneyland. We are only a short walk to the abundance of restaurants at the Gardenwalk and local pharmacy convenient stores like CVS and Walgreens across the way. I thoroughly enjoyed hosting your stay and had such a delightful time sharing stories and making memories with your family that upon departure it was sad to say goodbye since you were all going back to New Zealand! I can't thank you enough for staying with us and this amazing review, I was so happy to read that you will all be back next year, we can't wait to take care of you on your next visit and wish you all the best all the way from Anaheim!   Sweetest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Wonderful stay...clean and nice staff! This is our go-to hotel in Anaheim now! This hotel is a gem in the middle of ok or overpriced hotels.  Close to Disneyland and easy walk to the front entrance. Trust us!  You won't be disappointed!
Manager Response: Dear Pioneer41105248495,  I want to thank you for this sweet 5 star review and for your recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear you had an amazing stay and enjoyed the wonderful customer service from our front desk team members. It is nice that you were able to enjoy the short walk from our hotel to the Disney parks, we can't thank you enough for choosing to stay with us instead of the many hotels near by, with the new renovations our owners have made a point to keep the rates as reasonable as we can for families going to Disneyland or for the traveling workers attending conventions at the Anaheim Convention Center. We can't wait to host your next stay!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Was welcomed by a amazing staff (Stacey).  My husband had just had surgery so she changed our room to a honeymoon suite which had a tub.  Amazing room, very spacious.  We decided to dine onsite, food was amazing.  Same price if you go elsewhere, best thing no wait or trying to find parking.  Tried breakfast next morning, amazing.  Not a lot of people in restaurant, if I stay anywhere else I would come back to eat.  Room and hotel look just like pictures.  I will definitely stay again
Manager Response: Dear Riosaj6,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay! I am so happy that I was able to check you in and upgrade you to our king suite so your husband could be more comfortable after his knee surgery, we will always do our best to be as accommodating as possible. Our deluxe king suites are great for couples who want to get away and lounge around in the spacious room or soak in the tub and enjoy the Disney fireworks too, I am so glad you loved the room and our Courtyard Restaurant too! The restaurant opened a few months and the breakfast vouchers have a been a hit with our guests, thank you so much for dining with us and for this sweet review, it was my pleasure taking care of you and your husband and nice daughter too! I can't wait to host your next stay, please feel free to call me anytime if you have any questions.  Warmest Regards Mrs. Rios! Sincerely, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Fantastic hotel all the way around. The outside of the hotel is beautiful and the have ample parking in a very secure and private parking area (part of it underground). The lobby is airy and clean and the front desk staff are super pleasant. Every time you enter they greet you and offer a helping hand or advice if you need. Most of the staff knew me by the time we left.  In the lobby there is a cafe and the courtyard restaurant. Both are very good. The cafe has great breakfast sandwiches and Seattle's best coffee. Also have good muffins/pastries, chips, oatmeal cups to use the in the room microwave, microwaveable Mac n cheese, fresh fruit, etc. The food at the restaurant was delicious and you can order to the room for delivery as well.  The rest of the hotel common areas are
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I visited Disneyland and stayed at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim for 2 nights and we are glad we did. The hotel staff were very friendly. The housekeepers did very good work in keeping our room clean and were very friendly. This hotel has a secure parking lot which you need your hotel room key to enter the parking lot. I felt comfortable knowing that my vehicle was gated and secure. Also the walk to Disneyland is about 10 minutes, not too far from the hotel. This hotel have a restaurant and bar on site, but there are other restaurants nearby. This hotel is a good place to stay if planning to visit Disneyland. I would stay at this hotel again when I come back and visit Disneyland. Thank you Wyndham Garden Staff!
Manager Response: Dear josethepilot,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this amazing 5 star review! I am so happy to read that you had a great stay and that all of our front desk team members were welcoming and provided you with great customer service. Thank you so much for mentioning our housekeeping department, they are the backbone of our hotel to ensure all the rooms are ready for guests by check in time and do a great job at keeping our newly remodeled property clean and up to Wyndham Garden standard, it is always nice when the housekeepers are acknowledged too; they will be so happy when I pass along this review! I can't thank you enough for this 5 star review and hope to welcome you and your family back soon!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Honestly five stars is NOT ENOUGH.  The check in process was soo smooth and easy! Very low credit card hold at only $50USD for our entire stay.  MARIANA at the front desk is possibly the loveliest human we’ve ever encountered. Soo friendly and welcoming! And really helpful! Free, safe parking!  Cheapest laundry we’ve come across yet! $3 wash and $3 dry.  The BEST night’s sleep of my entire life in the bed here! It’s bigger than my entire bedroom at home!  We literally opened the door to our room and were like, ‘is this really where we’re staying?!’ It’s so big! And open, modern and clean! With a fridge and microwave which was great.  The location is amazing. Disney is just across the road, there are so many food options around the corner, a CVS and Walgreens plus multiple
Manager Response: Dear NatalieKeato,  Wow!! I can't thank you enough for this stellar 5 star review of your recent stay with us! I am so happy to read that you thoroughly enjoyed every aspect of your stay with us at our newly renovated property from the quick check in with our great front desk team member Mariana, she will be so flattered to read this review with a sweet shout out for her! Our parking lot on the surface and underground is always complimentary for our guests and safe as well, we have on site Security patrolling the property all night until dawn. That is great that you were able to do your laundry with us and enjoyed how spacious and practical our newly remodeled rooms are with a mini fridge and microwave. Thank you for the great comment about our beds, they have been a big hit with our guests just as much as the new modern renovations are, if you are ever interested we have the bedding details from our supplier too, just give us a call anytime! We are only a short walk to both Disney parks and just across the street from convenient stores and restaurants at the Garden Walk.  This is such a great review from the sweet comments about our front desk team member Mariana to the great details of the room and location, we sincerely can not wait to host your next stay! Best wishes to you and your family and we anticipate your arrival back.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: My family and I stayed here for 2 nights and enjoyed the stay very much. We wanted something close to Disneyland and it’s only a 10 min walk. Let me just say Sandy made us feel so welcoming and made sure if we needed anything to let her know. She definitely made our stay that much better! There is a restaurant in the lobby area but I didn’t get to eat there although there is a bar and the drinks were okay. Cheesecake Factory is a 5 min walk and there are some places to eat next door such as Chinese food, pizza, and Mexican food. The room was quite nice with a view to see the fireworks. I liked the fact that there are many outlets in the room to charge your phone so kudos for that. The fridge and microwave were a plus as well as the coffee machine. I enjoyed my stay very much and
Manager Response: Dear M3927MTmariac,  I really appreciate you taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us! I am so happy to hear that our team members were accommodating and made your stay with us as comfortable as can be. Our Courtyard Restaurant in the lobby just opened a few months ago and offer 10% off your dinner bill and they have $10 breakfast vouchers as well, hopefully on your next stay you will get the chance to dine with us; thank you for stopping by our Courtyard Cafe and Bar, they only serve beer and wine for now and of course great blended smoothies and espresso drinks. I am so happy to hear that you had one of our great Disneyland Firework view room so when you're too tired to stay until 9:30pm at the parks, you can always catch it from our parking lot or selected rooms. Our owner was very hands on with the renovations and made sure to add the extra outlets for large families going to Disneyland or for the working traveler attending conferences at the Convention Center. I am very delighted that you had such an amazing stay with us making memories with your family and our front desk team members. We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel has come a long ways and looks great. I think it is the perfect location if looking for something close distance to Disneyland. For background, I had to work while out there and found it to be very nice and quiet. But when working outside of the room be warned that the business center is out in the open of the front desk area.  All in all a great stay for all types, single/family/business.
Manager Response: Dear Safari18659331772,  Thank you for this great review of your recent stay at our newly renovated hotel. We are only a short walk to both Disney parks and restaurants close by at the Garden Walk too! Thank you for choosing to stay with us while attending a conference at the Convention Center, we are only a 10 minute walk from our hotel; I am very pleased to read that even with guests with children in and out of the hotel you were able to find the peace you needed in your room. The business center in our lobby has computers that are accessible 24/7 with free printing too! I hope we get the pleasure of hosting your stay the next time you're in Anaheim!   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: I took a trip to SoCal and split my time between San Diego, Santa Monica and Anaheim. My time in Anaheim was by far the best, and it was mostly thanks to the service and customer focus of the Wyndham Garden Anaheim.  I think it’s relatively new, and it’s walking distance to pretty much everything (exception of the baseball stadium, but i think there’s mass transit there). Downtown Disney, Disneyland, shops, the Garden Walk and other tourist attractions. Me, i was mostly happy there was a Cheesecake Factory and IHOP nearby.  It blows my mind that some hotels in SoCal don’t have ample parking available. I mean, the area was designed for the motor vehicle. Parking was not only complimentary at this establishment, there were plenty of outdoor spaces to park. There is also a pool, an
Manager Response: Dear tcooper22,  Wow! This is amazing, thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great and detailed review of your recent stay. I am so happy and honored to read that you had the best stay with us and really enjoyed making memories with all of our front desk team members. We just completely renovations over a year ago and reviews like yours really help other future guests finalize their decision on staying with us, we understand how important great customer service is when you have to travel and make a hotel your home for 1 day or 1 week. Every front desk team member has received award winning customer service recognition from our Wyndham franchise but it's always a little more special when it is recognized by our awesome guests. Parking for our guests will always be complimentary as well as the WiFi and the best part is there is not a resort fee at the end of your stay, our owners have been in Anaheim for decades and though the hotel next door may charge you for everything, we understand you might want to save a few bucks here and there to spend at Disneyland! I really appreciate the feedback on your generalization of early check ins for east coasters traveling, we will always do our best to accommodate any special requests we can and make sure you're happy. Generally check out time is 11am or 12pm and check in time is 3pm until midnight or later if you need since we are 24 hours, after the housekeepers thoroughly clean and service the room, the housekeeping supervisor must check all 105 rooms to ensure they are up to our Wyndham Garden standard and release the clean rooms to the front desk, as you know cleanliness is #1 on our standards as a hotel under the Wyndham Garden brand. I am very pleased to read that our team members were able to get you into your room even before check in and that you were able to enjoy our local Cheesecake Factory too! I really appreciate this detailed review and your stay with us.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We found this hotel when we decided to stay an extra night at Disneyland and couldn’t handle another stay at our previous one. This hotel was amazing, the concierge when we first checked in was super nice and attentive and the room was great. No complaints from me and my husband! The walk to Disneyland makes it even better too.
Manager Response: Dear Estrella B  Thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us. I am very happy to hear that you loved our front desk team members great customer service and our newly remodeled rooms. We can't wait to host your next stay!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great Stay With Family Disneyland Trip
Summary: As an Australian family with two children (5&7yrs) visiting Disneyland & Californian Adventure Park over four days, our stay at Wyndham Garden was really good and we recommend this hotel to other families. See great points below:  Hotel - The staff were really friendly & helpful, check in/out was easy, the rooms were clean and a good standard, the latte coffees in the cafe on the ground floor were excellent by anyone’s standard, the two outdoor pools (luke warm & warm) were loved by our kids and the self-serve laundry ($3 wash, $3 dryer & $2 washing powder) had new & clean machines which made a full family load of washing after three days really easy.   To/From Disney - We walked to/from Disneyland & Adventure Park every day, sometimes a second time for the evening, about 8-9
Manager Response: Dear katieandbron,  Wow! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great and detailed 5 star review of your recent stay! I am so happy that you chose to stay with us out of all the hotels in Anaheim since you can all the way from Australia! I am very happy to hear that you had an easy check in and enjoyed the great customer service from our front desk team members, we are always here to help and accommodate any way we can to ensure you get the best stay you deserve and from reading this review it seems like we nailed it. Our pool and Jacuzzi is perfect for relaxing after a long day at the parks and even more fun for the little kids who just love splashing and playing with water. Our housekeepers do a great job at maintaining the Wyndham Garden cleanliness standards and it is a great bonus when they are recognized! I am happy to read that you were able to enjoy the close proximity of restaurants near by and how safe our property is. We hope to have a chance to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in Anaheim!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Best hotel. Value and great service.
Summary: We throughly enjoyed our stay at The Wyndham Garden Anaheim. The staff were helpful and welcoming. We had an accessible room for our daughter and it was well equipped for all of us. The rooms are well insulated from street and  other room’s noise. An easy 10 minute walk to Disney passing by a 7 eleven and Walgreen’s for an last minute needs. The staff was so kind and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Salle M,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay! I am so very happy to read that you loved how friendly and accommodating our team members were and the nice convenience of having an accessible room for your sweet daughter! We are only a short walk to both Disney parks and convenience stores just across the street, our engineers worked hard throughout the property during our renovation to eliminate as much noise as possible within and outside the hotel, I am very pleased to hear you appreciated that. We can't thank you enough for this great review and for giving our newly renovated property a shot, we hope to have you back the next time you're in Anaheim!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: A great first time trip to Disneyland
Summary: This was a beautiful hotel the front desk manager was a joy to deal with. The room was large and very well appointed. Plenty of towels and a good array of soaps and lotions. Had breakfast at the on site cafe and was pleasantly surprised  The omelette was one of the best I have ever had. The close proximity to the Disney resort was the cherry on top We will definitely be back !!
Manager Response: Dear centerringpro,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of your stay with us. I am so happy that you loved how spacious and modern our newly remodeled rooms are. Our Courtyard Restaurant in the lobby just opened a few months ago and have been a hit with our guests, the chefs will be so delighted when they read this review about your delicious omelette! We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: this place is in a great location, close to Disney land maybe a 15-20 minute walk.  Really nice big rooms.  There is a coffee/ bar in the lobby, plus there is quick bite restaurant in the lobby also.  There is a Walgreen's and CVS across the street.
Manager Response: Dear 724timothya,  I appreciate you posting this 5 star review of your recent stay with us! I am so happy you enjoyed how spacious our new rooms are and was even able to grab some coffee at our lobby cafe. Please feel free to call us anytime for your next booking, we can't wait to have you back!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: All in all the hotel was very nice with many local food options with in walking distance. Also close to the Disneyland entrance. My only complaint.... out room felt very stale inside. I checked the exhaust in the restroom and noticed it was not working. I talked with the front desk and the said they would have the maintenance guy check it out. The next day I asked again and they said they are working on it. We stayed 3 nights and the issue was never corrected.
Manager Response: Dear ryantE7683QF,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us this review of your recent stay. I am happy that you enjoyed our newly renovated property and how close of a walk we are to the Disney parks and local restaurants near by. I do recall reading in our front desk log book about your exhaust fan in the bathroom and that the front desk team submitted a work order and it was checked by our maintenance man, I am sorry that it was not fully fixed to your liking during your 3 day stay. The housekeeping and maintenance team informed me it was checked and working but there are other settings out of our control when it comes to the exhaust fans and interior duct work. I will re-follow up with my team and see how we can resolve this for the next guests and hopefully for you and your family for your next stay! I really appreciate this review, though it is not the usual 5 stars we are used to, we appreciate any feed back and will do our best to improve our property to ensure you get the best stay you deserve. Please feel free to call me directly if you have any questions or for a next booking!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Our 5th go around to Disneyland & this by far has been my favorite hotel. Free parking is one of the reason I booked, & also there are no other hidden fees after checkout as I saw in so many other hotels in the area. It’s also very close to Disneyland in case you want to walk, & the ART shuttle picks up & drops off right in front of the hotel. It felt nice to be greeted each time we left & arrived. The rooms were clean & very nice for a family of 4. I’ll definitely book again on our next trip to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Vacation691415,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay at our newly renovated property. I am very happy to read that you appreciated that we do not charge any hidden fees upon check out like resort fees or fees for parking, we are one of the few property left in Anaheim that does not believe in hidden fees. We are only a short walk to the parks and the ART does pick you up right in front of our hotel as well for $5.50 all day per adult and $2 for children. I can't thank you enough for this 5 star review and hope to welcome you and your family back soon!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel is the perfect place to stay if you are visiting Disneyland.  It is an easy walking distance to get there.  You can grab a latte and a scone in the morning on your way out for your day of Disney fun.  We had a king bedroom.  There was plenty of room and the bed was very comfortable.  There is a pool and jacuzzi for guests to use which would feel great after walking for hours at Disneyland.  The staff at this hotel were helpful and always cheerful.
Manager Response: Dear Ruth J,  I really appreciate you taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay! I am so happy to hear you enjoyed how close of a walk we are to Disneyland and loved how comfortable our beds were too! The Courtyard Cafe in our lobby is the perfect option for a quick breakfast sandwich or latte on the go like you had. Our newly renovated rooms are big enough for the traveling families or a nice quaint king room for our couples enjoying the day at the parks or concerts at the House of Blues. We can't thank you enough for this great 5 star review and I am very pleased that you were able to make great memories with all of our team members!  Best Wishes, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We booked this hotel mainly because of its proximity to Disneyland (10 min to entrance). I had narrowed it down to this hotel or Candy Cane (which is just across the road). When it came down to it we used up some Wyndham rewards and got quite a deal on this hotel.   While breakfast was not included, there is a small cafe within the hotel that is open early in the morning. We got smoothies and coffee there (I wouldn’t recommend the bagels though, they were not very fresh). There is also a sit down restaurant that we didn’t try. For lunch we left the parks and grabbed a pizza at Blaze from just across the street to eat back in our hotel room.   The rooms were newly refinished and very clean. Staff was also reasonably friendly although I wouldn’t say they went above and beyond to
Manager Response: Dear dzire1,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us this great review of your recent stay at our newly remodeled property. I am so happy to read that you were able to use your Wyndham Rewards points for your stay, it is the #1 rewards program above other hotels because of the value in points per dollar, so thank you for giving our new hotel a shot over the Candy Cane Inn. Though breakfast is not included with the room, the Courtyard Restaurant in our lobby has a nice deal for $10, you can pick 1 item off the breakfast menu and a drink for only $10! I am very delighted that you enjoyed how clean and modern our rooms are, as for early check in before 3pm, we will always do our best to accommodate if the request was submitted beforehand so we can correlate with our housekeeping supervisor to ensure the room is ready before 3pm but it is nice that you were able to have your luggage stored complimentary. I am sorry to hear that you had less than amazing customer service with some individuals on our team, I will surely address this with my team members to ensure every guest gets the best stay they deserve, we appreciate any feedback to better ourselves and our property. I do understand your general and broad complaint about the City of Anaheim and the homelessness surrounding the hotel areas, with Disneyland being so close we attract many guests from different states/ countries visiting frequently, unfortunately since Anaheim is so populated it has also attracted other humans from different walks of life that have been displaced and homeless. Luckily our property has an on site Security Officer who patrols the entire property within our hotel and outside as well to ensure the safety of our guests! Thank you so much for the great feedback and for staying with us!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We have stayed here several times over the past two years for our family trips to Disneyland. The hotel is a 7-10 min walk to the entrance of Disneyland and is very close to many restaurants and Starbucks. The hotel was recently renovated and all the rooms are so nice! The breakfast sandwiches in the downstairs lounge are delicious and nicely priced. We didn’t have a chance to eat at the hotel restaurant but it had a nice menu. We love the front desk staff! They are part of the reason we continue to stay here. Stacey, Ozzie, Jane and Micki always remember our family and are so courteous, helpful and knowledgeable about the area. The WiFi is fast and free and so is the parking. We highly recommend this hotel!!
Manager Response: Dear Rachelnmendoza,  Hi Mrs. Mendoza! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us! We were all so happy to have you and your family back for your annual Disneyland trip! It is always a pleasure hosting your stay because your two daughters are so sweet and light up our lobby with their stories about Disneyland and their cute little smiles! I am so happy to loved the breakfast sandwiches and all the hotel amenities as well. Micky will be so happy when she reads this sweet review, we can't wait to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in town! I really appreciate your continuous stays and this great review post, Ozzie and Jane will be so happy when they see this review too! Best wishes to you and we hope you have a great summer, until next time!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Room was exceptionally clean. Comfortable bed! This was the best customer service I’ve ever experienced in a hotel! Extremely welcoming and helpful staff. They went above and beyond. I could complain about a couple minor things but won’t because the service outshined them! Will definitely return!
Manager Response: Dear Wanderer22315600049,  Thank you so much for this great 5 star review and for staying with us! I am so very happy and proud to read that you had the best customer service experience from our front desk team members, we are always here to help and accommodate you the best we can to ensure you get the best stay you deserve! Great reviews and sweet comments like yours really keep us going and striving to always provide the best memory we can whether you're here for a conference at the Convention Center or a big family Disney trip! We absolutely can't wait to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in Anaheim!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Super clean and updated, easy walk to Disneyland
Summary: Perfect hotel for our family trip to Disneyland. Pool area nice, no deep ends, can watch fireworks. Super clean, very secure parking, nice coffee bar in lobby. Easy walk to Disneyland. Bed so comfortable, bought the bedding online when I got home because it was better than mine.
Manager Response: Dear katevanrij,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us! I am so happy to hear that you loved how closed of walk our newly renovated property is to both Disney Parks. Our Courtyard Cafe just opened early this March and has been a great hit with our guests for fast morning breakfast sandwiches and blended smoothies and espressos. I am so happy to for you that you were able to take a little bit of our hotel home with you, since I've had so many requests from guests upon check out for the bed brand that our General Manager Jane was able to contact the whole seller and retrieve the brand and model for guests like yourself! We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: This place was amazing! Very clean and inviting. The newly renovated rooms are amazing and comfortable. The staff was my favorite part and earned this review its fifth star. They were always there to help with any questions, anytime of the day. They accommodated our crazy schedule and made sure that we had everything we needed our entire stay. The hotel may not be rated 5 stars but having worked at a five star resort myself, this staff is a five star staff!
Manager Response: Dear Cupkate4,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay! I am very happy to read that you loved our newly renovated property and had a wonderful time making memories with our front desk team members. We are always eager to answer any questions about the Disney parks and will always do our best to meet any accommodations you may have to ensure every guest has the best stay they deserve. I can't thank you enough for this stellar review about our award winning customer service and the great recommendations you've been giving. We hope to have the pleasure of hosting your next stay the next time you're in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: A perfect week stay for a great price for a close stay to disney :)
Summary: We really enjoyed our stay here. The location was close to our destination.. disneyland ❤️ The staff was very welcoming. The room was nice and comfortable. My husbans and I will deff stay here again whenever we’re in the area :)
Manager Response: Dear Stay40247894545,  Thank you for leaving us this 5 star review of your stay with us. I am so happy to read that you loved how nice our newly remodeled rooms were and how close of a walk we are to the Disney Parks. Thank you so much for your sweet compliments about our front desk team members and their award winning customer service, they will all be so delighted when they read this review! I can't wait to get the chance to welcome you and your husband back when you're in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We had a wonderful experience, staff is very friendly and helpful...always with a smile.   The food in the restaurant was delicious. Everyday when we got back, they greeted us and asked how our day was.  I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Quest762029,  Thank you for this fantastic 5 star review of your recent stay with us! I am so happy to hear that you had a great time making memories with our team members and enjoyed the new restaurant in our lobby, its been a big hit with our guests and locals too! We can't thank you enough for the sweet compliments and recommendation, call us to book your next stay!     Best wishes, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stacey Bui thanks for making our stay fantastic. We stayed at this hotel for Easter weekend. The room was clean, friendly staff, quick check in, fast check out and great room service. Whenever we are in town, we will only stay in this hotel. Thank You!
Manager Response: Dear suesolan5757,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review! I am so happy and humbled to have hosted  your Easter stay, it was great meeting your family and making sure you had the best stay you deserved. The housekeepers will be so delighted when they read this review, they work hard to maintain our #1 Award for Best of Wyndham Garden and cleanliness along with great customer service is at the top of the list. We can't wait to host your next stay during your visit to Anaheim!  Warmest Regards,  Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We did find some hair in our sheets, and the clean set they sent up was a twin size, so it didn’t fit our king size bed, and after a full day at Disney we were too tired to call and wait for another, so we just placed the sheets over the bed. Other than that, everything else was clean, the location was great, and the staff was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear katiebird921,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review about your recent stay! I am sorry that you found some hairs on your sheets and that the wrong size was sent up, thank you for bringing this to our attention, I have passed this along to our housekeeping supervisor so we can work on improving all aspects of our property. I am so happy to hear that you loved how close of a walk we are to the parks and only had great encounters with our front desk team members. I hope we get the chance to welcome you back so we can give you the best stay you deserve!   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Lovely hotel. Everything looks new and clean, rooms are spacious, beds were incredibly comfortable, loved the shower. Staff were all friendly and helpful. We did not visit the restaurant, but did stop by the cafe for coffee and bagels/pastries every morning. It was all good. This stay was for a family trip to Disneyland. The walk from the hotel to security check at the park was about 15 minutes. There are multiple restaurants and convenience stores nearby, onsite parking is free. Highly recommend and will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear bucky_27,   I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us. I am so glad to read that you loved how modern and remodeled our property is, the rooms are big enough for the traveling family to spread out and relax after a long day at the Disney parks. Thank you so much for trying our Courtyard Cafe, its a great option if you need a quick breakfast to go while walking around the corner to Disneyland. We can't wait to get the chance to welcome you back the next time you're in town and hopefully you get a chance to try our new Courtyard Restaurant in the lobby, show your room key for 10% off!  Best Wishes, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Nice, clean, friendly staff and a ten minute walk to Disneyland. They would also have let us stay parking for free for the day of check out (if they had room).     The room was comfortable and spacious enough for all four people. Would definitely recommend!
Manager Response: Dear D1340RXsharonp,  Thank you for this great review of your recent stay our property. I am so happy to read that you enjoyed our newly renovated and spacious rooms, our housekeepers work hard to maintain our Wyndham Garden cleanliness standards and it is always nice when they are recognized too. Our front desk team members are always here to help with a smile and hopefully the next time you visit you'll be able to utilize our complimentary parking. We can't wait to welcome you back!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: It was a very nice place to stay. It was very clean, and the staff was very friendly. It is near all major attractions in Anaheim. I went for a conference, and it was a quick 10-20 minute walk up to the Anaheim convention center.
Manager Response: Dear Dreamer08398891918,  I want to thank you for leaving this 5 star post of your recent stay with us. I am very happy to hear you enjoyed our newly renovated property and how clean the rooms are, and most importantly, had some great memories with our front desk team members and their award winning customer service. We are only a short walk to the Anaheim Convention Center and the Disney Parks. I hope we get the pleasure of hosting your next stay while you're at a conference or for some fun in the sun at Disneyland.  Best Wishes, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Having stayed in many of the local hotels surrounding Disneyland, this was one of best! We were always greeted with a smile and asked if there was anything we needed. Even, when coming back to the hotel after a long tiring day at the parks, walking up to the hotel with firetrucks and a crowd outside of the hotel (don't worry no fire damage, only a small fire in a trash can, is what I heard). We are offered a seat in the hotel restaurant to rest while the fire department did their final safety check. After being allowed to return to our room on the 4th floor, we walked into residual haze and smell. No way, could we stay in that room, we went back to the lobby, worried there would be no other rooms...but we were quickly given new room on the 3rd floor which made the stress and
Manager Response: Dear Kim L,  I want to deeply thank you for taking the time to leave this great and detailed review of your recent stay with us. This might just be one of my favorite reviews because this was the first time I had to deal with a small fire incident; with all the commotion that night, reading this review provides me with a great sigh of relief and puts a great big smile on my face because of your sweet praise and words of encouragement. We are very grateful and fortunate to have such understanding guests like yourself who were helpful and corporative during the incident. Thankfully there was not any property damage and it was just a silly little towel fire that was quickly contained and through reviewing the tapes our management confirmed there was not any foul play and we have taken all the appropriate measures to ensure that does not happen again. I am so very happy to hear that you had only great memories with our front desk team members and the baristas and servers at our Café and Restaurant are amazing at their job and are here to serve no matter what. I can't thank you enough for this stellar review and for choosing to stay with us, I can't wait to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in Anaheim, whether it is for a conference again or a trip to the Disney Parks! I hope this response gives you some joy as your review gave us sweet delight.   Warmest Regards,  Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is the hotel we stayed at for our most recent Disneyland trip. Fist thing to compliment was the staff. I called twice before arriving and the staff was excellent. We requested a crib in our room, which was already in the room when we checked in.   The hotel is super clean and bright. Modern lobby and rooms. My main comment is NO free breakfast. We did eat some delicious breakfast sandwiches that were 2 for $5.00. Also, the parking is underground, and secured, and free!  The room was bright and large. In room lock box, our room had the sleeper sofa, and a walk in shower. Very clean and comfortable.   I highly recommend this location if you are going to Disneyland. It is a decent walk (10-15 minutes). We actually came back to the room for naps (two kids under 4) half way
Manager Response: Dear karrenandjasonw,  Wow! I can't thank you enough for taking the time to leave this stellar 5 star review of your recent stay with us! I am so very happy and proud to hear that even before arrival you were provided with excellent customer service over the phone and the crib was in your room when you arrived. We will always do our best to accommodate any special requests and it really does help us reserve cribs before arrival too, so thank you for meeting us halfway! We just completed renovations over a year ago and with the Wyndham Garden brand our owner wanted a sleek but modern and calm feel, upon entering our lobby you'll notice the large lush green wallpaper and eccentric furnishings. It is nice that you were able to try our 2 for $5 breakfast sandwiches which is perfect for a quick on the go bite while taking a short stroll to the Disney Parks, our Courtyard Restaurant in the lobby has a great deal for breakfast with their $10 breakfast vouchers, which gets you any item on the breakfast menu plus a drink. The housekeepers will be so pleased when I pass along this sweet review about how clean the rooms and property was. I really appreciate your detailed review and some great key points for future guests. Please feel free to contact me anytime for your next booking, we can't wait to welcome you back!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Convenient location to convention center, The Parks, restaurants. Pool not very secure, out in parkinglot so did not want to use it at night.  Staff very nice and helpful. Very comfortable beds and rainshower spa bathroom. No balconies
Manager Response: Dear Cynthia B,  I appreciate you taking the time to leave us this review about your recent stay at our newly remodeled hotel. I am very happy to hear that you loved how close of a proximity our hotel is to the Disney Parks, Convention center and near by local eats. Our front desk team members really appreciate the sweet comment, they work hard to ensure you have the best stay you deserve and it all starts with great customer service. I am sorry to hear you did not utilize our pool during your stay, the hours are from 8AM to 10PM, the surface lot where the pool is located is very well lit and we have on duty security for your safety. Thank you for the feedback and I hope we get the chance to welcome you back.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great and friendly customer service from the housekeeping to the front desk.  Always was greeted with a smile and hello!  We have tried a few hotels from around the area but this is now our go to hotel for Disneyland (within walking distance) and very clean.
Manager Response: Dear Road43241905209,  Thank you for this 5 star review and for your recent stay with us. I am so very happy to hear you only had great encounters with our front desk team members and even our housekeeping staff. They will be so delighted when I show them this sweet review, they are the backbone of our property and it is extra nice when the housekeepers are acknowledge too, thanks to their due diligence in maintaining the Wyndham Garden brand we just won #1 Wyndham Garden in the whole Nation! We can't thank you enough for this 5 star review and great recommendation. Please feel free to call us anytime if you have any questions or for a quote on your next booking.   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Excellent service, very clean and comfortable! Beds were yummy! Staff really went out of their way to be helpful. The restaurant was dissapointing for dinner, but everything else was perfect. Loved the location too, since we were there for a conference at the Anaheim Convention Center!
Manager Response: Dear Departure50326856808,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review! I am so very happy to read that you loved our newly renovated property and how comfortable the beds were, since we have received so many requests about the bed brand I always have it on hand for anybody who calls asking where can they get one too! We just recently opened our restaurant and appreciate the feedback, our chefs are still experimenting with different dishes on the menu and we hope to have you back to try some new and improved dishes. It is nice that you were able to walk to the Anaheim Convention Center from our property, we are right next to a restaurant strip and the Garden Walk as well. Thank you so much for this sweet review and for staying with us, we can't wait to welcome you back!  Best wishes, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed at this beautiful property on a family trip to Disney parks. Stacey at the front desk was just amazing. She helped us get into the perfect room after a bad experience at a local Ramada. We had great service with a smile. Clean and comfy room. Breakfast was good and we fully enjoyed the stay. I highly recommend this location for your stays. Again Stacey was just amazing and very helpful.
Manager Response: Dear BigKD57,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay at our newly remodeled hotel. I am so very happy that I was able to get you into our family suite room after an incident at a near by Ramada, we are always here to help! It is very nice to hear that you enjoyed our breakfast, we just opened our Courtyard Restaurant in the lobby a little over a month and it's been a great hit with their $10 breakfast vouchers and 10% off for dinner. Thank you for the sweet comments, it was my pleasure ensuring you had the best stay and I am humbled for the nice shout out. We can't thank you enough for staying with us and for the great recommendations! We hope to get the chance to welcome you and  your family back the next time you're in Anaheim! Best wishes to you all!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great Location. Walking distance to Disneyland, the Convention Centre, a wide variety of eating places, public transport to other parts of Anaheim and beyond. The Hotel meet all my expectations. I could not have asked for a better place to stay. Could not fault it in any facet of the hotel experience.
Manager Response: Dear Edward H,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting the Wyndham Garden Anaheim. I am very happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed how close our property is to the Disney parks, restaurants at the Garden Walk and just down the street from the Anaheim Convention Center. We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed here for Wondercon 2019 at the Convention center, which is a 5 minute walk. Disneyland is maybe 10 by foot. And a short walk to the Anaheim Garden Walk. The staff is unfailingly pleasant, friendly and helpful. The new cafe/bar is much better for breakfast than the adjoining restaurant. Our room was very nice and has a shower we would kill for. No drawbacks at all.
Manager Response: Dear dennis l,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of our newly renovated property. We had a great time hosting your stay as well as and many others for the Wondercon, it was such a treat seeing all the cosplay characters walking from our hotel to the Anaheim Convention Center. I am very proud to read that you only had great encounters with every team member at the front desk, we just won #1 Wyndham Garden in the World and that is all thanks to these great reviews and amazing guests like you and your family. Thank you so much for this great review and we can't wait to host your next stay.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Perfect location! Love the upgrades! Will stay there again. Very quiet, you can see the Disney fireworks, and it’s about less than 1 mile. Walk to downtown Disney. Restaurants close by. Definitely will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear funnie_1999,  Thank you so much for this 5 star review of your recent stay with us! I am so very happy to read that you love our newly remodeled property and how close of a walk we are to the Disney Parks. We are close to the restaurants at the Garden Walk and we just opened our very own Courtyard Restaurant and Bar in our lobby this month! Its been a great hit with our guests for breakfast and you get 10% off dinner too! We can't wait to welcome you back!   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Ozzie Camerena and his staff are top notch!!!! Everyone on staff here was EXCELLENT!!!! Customer service skills on point all around.  The property was CLEAN!!!! You can tell that the entire staff takes pride in their jobs and it shows!!! LOVED IT!
Manager Response: Dear BaymontBelen,  Wow! I want to thank you for taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of our amazing Front Office Manager Ozzie and our team members. Special shout outs and reviews like this really mean the world to us and reassures all team members that we are doing our job and that is to make sure every guest deserves the best stay we can offer. I really appreciate your sweet acknowledgement about how clean our newly remodeled property is, the housekeepers work hard to maintain our Wyndham Garden cleanliness standards and proudly keep our title for the #1 Wyndham Garden worldwide! We can't wait to have you and your family back the next time you're in Anaheim!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Everything was amazing! Parking was free and very convenient. The shuttle stop to Disney is literally right outside the door. The rooms are clean, comfortable and spacious. There are plenty of food locations nearby and CVS right across the street. We enjoyed our stay!
Manager Response: Dear Getaway47489349006,  Thank you for this 5 star review of your recent stay with us during your visit to Disneyland. We are only a short walk to both parks and have an array of restaurants and convenient stores just around the corner. I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed how clean and spacious our new rooms are, they're perfect for the traveling family or for attending conferences at the Convention Center. Thank you for staying with us and we can't wait to welcome you and your family back!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Ollie and Marianna were lovely and incredibly helpful during my stay. Rooms were simple and clean with lovely bathroom toiletries. Great location, only a short walk to Disneyland. Would highly recommend and stay again!
Manager Response: Dear 11sarahq,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this 5 star review of your recent stay with us and a special shout out to our Front Office Manager Ozzie and front desk Mariana, they will be so ecstatic to see their names mentioned in this post! I am very happy to read that you enjoyed how clean and modern our newly remodeled rooms are and how close of a walk we are to the Disney parks, we can't thank you enough for staying with us and your recommendation.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great Hotel! Literally across the street and two blocks away from Disneyland. With the FREE PARKING we parked the rental and walked to enjoy full days at Disney and greeted by a friendly staff and nice rooms and beds. A great value close to Disney
Manager Response: Dear Excursion58010241683,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide this 5 star review and for your recent stay with us! I am so pleased to hear you had such a great experience during your trip to Disneyland and that all of our team members were so friendly. This is exactly what we strive for everyday. At our property the parking and WiFi is always complimentary  Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Relations Manager

Summary: This hotel is very nice.  Stayed here two nights for a hockey game at Honda centre. Has just been redone only two years ago. Tastefully decorated with earthy colours. Very clean and quiet. Walking distance to Bubba Gump restaurant, house of blues. There is a strip mall close by with different fast food restaurants. Two pharmacies across the street and an IHOP. Very close to Disney park. City bus just across street for $2.00 a ride to Honda centre. The beds are super comfortable. There is a restaurant on site. Pool, whirlpool exercise room and washer and dryer.
Manager Response: Dear Anna L,  Wow! Thank you so much for such an incredible review and for your recent stay with us. I'm so glad to see you even included the restaurants close by within walking distance and the Anaheim City bus fair too, that will be great information for other guests in town for hockey games at the Honda Center just down the street! I am very proud to read that you enjoyed house clean and quiet our newly remodeled rooms were. I am so happy to hear that you loved how comfortable our beds were, all beds have been replaced with the new renovations as well. Hopefully we get the chance to welcome you again soon. The pictures you posted were beautiful and I can't thank you enough for the time and effort you put into this review, so very kind! Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Best Wishes, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: I had a great stay at this hotel.  Very friendly staff. I arrived around 9am on a Sunday and they had a room ready for me. I was able to drop off my bags and head to Disneyland.  The hotel is about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland.  They have free underground parking.  The room was spacious,  updated and the windows opened!! Very quiet room,  even with families staying there.  The hotel has a bar and breakfast available,  there is a charge for breakfast.  Overall a wonderful place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear symbolman,   Thank you so much for this sweet 5 star review of your recent stay with us at our newly renovated Wyndham property! I am very proud to read that all of our team members were accommodating and friendly, guests can always store luggage with us before check in and even after check out too. Our remodeled rooms are spacious enough for traveling families and the wall paper gives a refreshing vibe when you enter after a long day at the Disney parks or conferences at the Anaheim Convention Center. The Courtyard Restaurant in our lobby opened just about a month ago and has been a great hit with guests and locals for breakfast and dinner, make sure to show your room key for 10% off! I sincerely appreciate this stellar review and appreciate your stay with us, we can't wait to welcome you back!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We had a great time at this hotel.  It was clean and up to date.  You can see the Disney fireworks from this hotel.  We spent most of our time at Disneyland, but it was nice to have a very nice place to rest and recharge for the next day.
Manager Response: Dear 542michaeldp,  I want to thank you for this great 5 star post of your stay with us. I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed the clean rooms and was even able to catch the fireworks from our hotel! We can't wait to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in Anaheim!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Everything was amazing across the board - from the location to the welcoming and friendly staff to the cleanliness of the room.   Came here for a Disneyland stay and couldn’t have asked for a better set up.   We’ll be back for sure.
Manager Response: Dear chrisb-az-1234,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your stay at our newly renovated Wyndham hotel. I am so happy to read that you enjoyed how clean our rooms were and how close of a walk we are to Disneyland, my front desk team members will be so delighted to read your sweet compliment about their stellar customer service; we work hard so you don't have to while vacationing! We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim.

Summary: Let me start by saying I HIGHLY RECOMMEND this hotel! As most people we came for the parks. The rooms are updated, clean and pretty big for our family size. But the staff... that is really what has us coming back again and again , we even extended our stay an extra day. They are all awesome, but Stacey is AMAZING, she made us feel like we were the only guests in the hotel the entire weekend! That’s the kind of guest service we need more of in the world. ☺️
Manager Response: Dear monaliisa82,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay. I am so grateful for the sweet compliments and am very proud of my front desk team for their stellar customer service and our housekeeping department for ensuring your rooms were clean for your family after a long day at the parks. We were so happy to host your stay and enjoyed making memories with you all. I can't thank you enough for this review, you recommendation and we can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim!   Warmest Regards to you and your family! Sincerely, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary: Friendly staff, updated and clean room.  The staff at the desk recognized people walking them and greeted them ,asking them if they needed anything.  It was close to Disney and not overly crowded.  Was truly the best place I've stayed in a while.
Manager Response: Dear  Erin R,  I want to thank you for leaving us this great 5 star review of our newly renovated property. I am so happy to hear that our front desk team members were friendly and accommodating, we take pride in our award winning customer service and do the best we can to ensure every guest gets the best stay they deserve. We can't wait to host your next stay!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary: We had a lovely room with a king bed, keurig coffeemaker, microwave, fridge and full bath.  We were a comfortable 12 minute walk to and from Disneyland.  We could watch the fireworks from our room.  There was a pool and hot tub that we enjoyed as well.  Best of all though was the staff.  They were so incredibly happy, friendly and helpful.  We brought in Chinese food one evening only to find out that the restaurant forget to give us silverware.  Staff immediately brought some to us.  If we saw them in the hallway, they always asked if we needed something or if they could help us in some way.  We were pampered by them.
Manager Response: Dear agingnurse,   Thank you so much for taking the time to provide such an excellent review and for your recent stay with us! I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay at our newly renovated property and all of our team members were so friendly and accommodating. This is exactly what we strive for everyday. I am very proud that we exceeded your expectations and really appreciate your acknowledgement of our housekeeping team's hard work in ensuring we keep our new Wyndham Garden property the best for our guests!  Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great place to stay! Walking distance to Disneyland. Close to restaurants and stores like cvs & Walgreens, making it easy to grab snacks and food to eat when we didn’t want to walk back to Disney. Complimentary parking. Great hotel staff (very friendly). Hotel was nicely remodeled and very clean.
Manager Response: Dear Quest54884446618,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide this great 5 star review and for your recent stay with us! I am so pleased to hear you had a such a great experience and that all of our team members were so friendly. This is exactly what we strive for everyday. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We greatly enjoyed our stay.  After a long drive, we enjoyed the 3 p.m. check-in, free parking, and close walking distance to Garden Walk for dinner.  Our room was clean and quiet and we were well rested to spend three days at Disneyland, which was an easy walking distance from our hotel.  My husband actually misses the pillow from the room and he doesn't normally sleep well at home or away.
Manager Response: Dear Cindy B,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave this 5 star review of your recent stay with us in our newly renovated hotel. Parking for all of our guests is complimentary as well as the WIFI and the best part is unlike the other hotels in Anaheim next door, we do not charge a resort fee so you can spend more on your family and making memories at the parks. I am so happy to read that you loved how clean our rooms are, our housekeepers work hard to make sure the property stays at the top of the Wyndham list for cleanliness. We can't wait to welcome you and your husband back, please feel free to call us anytime for reservations. Our pillows are WynRest pillows for your own personal information. :) Best wishes!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Amazing customer service here especially ozzie the front desk manager. I booked third party and it ended up being fraudulent and my reservation was cancelled leaving us without a room and out the money. They honored my precious rate and got us a room right away even before standard check in time. Rooms are fantastic, clean comfortable and quiet. The ladies in the cafe are great making fresh breakfast sandwiches for a very reasonable cost, it was perfect breakfast on the go while walking to disney land. Would absolutely return, one small complaint would be, is that the hotel lobbies and hallways smell like cheap cologne or perfume an overwhelming cleaning smell. Thanks wyndham for a great experience.
Manager Response: Dear ksbk2018,  Wow! Thank you so much for such an incredible review and for your recent stay with us. I'm so glad to read that our amazing Front Office Manager Ozzie was able to assist you with the reservation rates and able to accommodate an early check in, he is a hard worker and it is nice when our managers are recognized and appreciated too, he will be so delighted to read this review!   Hopefully we get the chance to welcome you again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hotel is basic, but clean and comfortable.  Rooms were spacious and beds were comfortable.  It's an easy ten minute walk to the parks or the convention center.  We were there on a group rate that included breakfast, parking and wifi so it was a great deal for us.  The front desk was very friendly and accommodating.
Manager Response: Dear jp94952,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide such an excellent review and for your recent stay with us!I am so pleased to hear you had a such a great experience and all of our staff were so friendly and accommodating. This is exactly what we strive for everyday. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Great customer service. The staff made us feel welcome the moment we arrived.  The rooms were spacious and clean.  My wife really enjoyed the coffee bar in the lobby.  I would definitely stay there again.  The water was shut off for one day but it didn't affect us too much because we were at the parks all day.
Manager Response: Dear Victor R,  Thank you so much for leaving us this great 5 star review of your recent stay. I am so very happy and proud to hear that our team members made you feel at home upon arrival, our motto is "every guest deserves a great stay" and that is what we are here to provide. My housekeeping team will be so delighted when they read this review, thank you for your acknowledgement in house clean and well kept our property and rooms are, they work hard and it is always great when the backbone of our hotel is appreciated too! Thank you so much for being so easy going and understanding about our mandatory water service by the City of Anaheim. We hope to get the chance to welcome you back soon!  Warmest Regards,  Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Very Very Clean Hotel. Super Nice Staff. Close to Convention Center, restaurants and shopping. Perfect place to stay if you visit Anaheim for a convention. Also very close to Disneyland. Would recommend to anyone visiting for business or pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear Discover37230258590,  Thank you so much for this great 5 star review of our newly remodeled property. I am very happy to read that you enjoyed how close we are to restaurants at the GardenWalk and the Anaheim Convention Center, the Disney Parks is just a short stroll behind us as well.
