I really appreciate your recommendation of our hotel and hope to host your stay for your next visit to Anaheim.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui

Summary: We stayed only one night at this hotel after deciding to extend our time at Disneyland by an extra day. We had previously been next door at the Hotel Indigo.   The hotel is only a 5 - 10 minute walk to the Disneyland parks and offers free parking. Both features were great for our family. The rooms have been recently renovated and are really nice but on the small side. I really appreciated having a microwave in the room which is something that wasn’t offered at Hotel Indigo.   The room we were allocated was at the back of the hotel on the top floor so we had views overlooking the parks and could watch the fireworks at night from the warmth of our room (it was freezing cold and raining on the day we stayed here so this was really great).   The only negative I have is that the
Manager Response: Dear Reba02,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this great review of your recent stay! I really appreciate that you decided to give our newly remodeled property a try after staying at our sister property next door! We can't wait to get the chance to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Needs a restaurant to compare with the ones down the street like PF Changs or Cheese cake factory.  Very friendly and courteous staff, room was well taken care of and internet kept jumping to the Indigo hotel next door.
Manager Response: Dear Getaway62135897480,   I appreciate you taking the time to leave us this review of your recent stay with us. Thank you for the restaurant suggestion we are actually updating the current one located in our lobby that is scheduled to be opening soon. We are only a short 3 minute walk to the restaurants at the Garden Walk. I am so pleased to read that you only had great memories with our front desk team members and that everybody was friendly and professional. We can't wait to host your next visit to Anaheim.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Fantastic location and the hotel was great.  My family had a great time during their stay.  We will recommend the Hotel to our family and friends.  The rooms were really good and the amenities were enough to have a great time.
Manager Response: Dear jaibra,  Thank you so much for leaving us this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us at our newly renovated property. I am so happy to hear that you and your family enjoyed the spacious rooms and we can't wait to host your next stay. Thank you so much for the recommendations, we appreciate this review and your loyalty. Please feel free to call us directly for special rates!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Very clean. Good location. Nice breakfast bar. Short walk to Restaurants and Garden Walk area. Close to the convention center and shopping. Nice gym and outdoor pool. Onsite Parking. Very friendly and helpful employees.
Manager Response: Dear Fearless21482686558,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave this stellar 5 star review of your recent stay with us. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed how conveniently close our property is to the Garden Walk and Disney parks! We just renovated our gym and outdoor pool last year, I am very proud that you liked it and really loved how accommodating and nice our front desk team members are! We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: My stay here was excellent. Great rooms, wi-fi was perfect, friendly courteous staff, etc. Only bad thing to say was it rained a few days (not their fault!) I would recommend this hotel to any business traveler that is doing a trade show at Anaheim Convention Center.
Manager Response: Dear BackPacker317939,  Thank you so much for this great 5 star review of our newly renovated property! I am so happy to hear that you had an amazing stay with us, high speed WiFi will always be complimentary for our guests and we are only a short walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. We hope to get the pleasure of welcoming you back the next time you're in Anaheim!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Very bad experience, when we got to the room there was blood stains on the ceiling. Then we left for the day and when we got back after the room was cleaned, there was an atrocious smell. We had to move into a new room around 11pm at night. To top it all off a false fire alarm went off the next day at 7am.
Manager Response: Dear Cruiser13691918444,  Hello there Mr. Alvaro Garcia, I appreciate your feedback on your recent stay with us, though it is not the usual 5 stars we are used to I would like to take the time to address the issues in your review. I do recall reading on our daily reports that a front desk agent sent up a housekeeper to clean the stains on your ceiling immediately after you reported it to our morning team; that following night Andy rushed to your room when you called about the cleaning odor. He serviced the room the best he could with your family present in it and when I spoke to you moments later that night I gave you several options of how we can resolve the issue at hand and make you and your family more comfortable. Ultimately your family decided to move rooms, which we were happy and eager to accommodate; we luckily found you a room right next door and assisted with your luggage, further more I personally delivered complimentary breakfast vouchers where you thanked me profusely for our diligent service and even mentioned how much you loved the hotel room and property that you asked if I could help you make a second reservation so you could stay another night and not have to check out on your scheduled departure date. As Guest Service Manager I was able to accommodate your second reservation with Half Off the original rate so you only had to pay 50% of your last day with us, which is a great saving bonus. As for the alarm sounding off the next day, you were actually given a formal paper notice upon check in as all of our guests receive at the front desk informing you about our Annual Fire Alarm Safety Test that is mandatory by the City Of Anaheim to ensure our property is up to code, notices were also displayed throughout the property at our front desk counter and in all the elevators on the day before the testing was scheduled. I do hope this response clears up some confusion on your end because every department in our property from my housekeeping team to the front desk team members and my self exasperated all options in assisting you and your family to ensure you had a great stay. I strongly feel that everybody in my team did the best they could to make you comfortable and I am sorry that you felt it was not enough to leave this one star review. I sincerely do hope you have the time to contact me directly at 714-991-6868 so we can be on the same page and so I can learn from you what else I could have done to appease you. Hopefully we get the chance to welcome you back and provide you with the best stay you deserve.  Sincerely, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The restaurant was not open yet, they are waiting on official government approval.  The rooms are nicely decorated, and fairly spacious.  The hotel is a newly remodeled hotel that changed from a Ramada to a Wyndham.  Staff were very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear jlxnr,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this 5 star review of your recent stay with us! I am so happy to hear that you loved our new rooms and only had great memories with our front desk team members, we are excited to be opening our restaurant soon in March! We can't wait to welcome you back!  Best Wishes, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The suite was nice, clean, and felt new. Everything worked and all of the finishes looked nice. The bed and pillows were great and comfortable. The size of the suite was great; tons of room. The bathroom was beautiful.Minor annoyances: the room could be quieterThe room was facing the parking lot. On our second morning, there was a truck backing up and the backup alarm was loud enough to wake us up around 5:45AM.There is enough noise transferred from floor-to-floor that if someone is moving around above you, you can hear their footsteps. Light sleepers beware.
Manager Response: Dear Stay45003809775,  I appreciate you taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us! I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your suite room, the bathroom in the king suites are amazing with the deep soaking tub and a stand in waterfall shower head too. I am so sorry to hear that you had some noise issues in your room, if reported we could have moved you to the top floor and found a quieter room, we hope to have you back in the near future to give you the best stay you deserve.  Best Wishes, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Excellent Short-term Home for Convention Center Guests
Summary: With free underground garage parking, an updated boutique hotel feel, a pleasant and helpful staff and reasonable room rates that include internet, the Wyndham Garden Anaheim, located a short walk from the Convention Center, is a great home for Convention visitors. I highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear OnTheRoadAgain26  Thank you for this nice review of your recent stay with us at our newly remodeled property. I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary parking and WiFi, another bonus is that we do not charge a resort fee! We are only a short walk to the Disney Parks and Anaheim Convention Center. We can't wait to welcome you back!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: . Very close to Disneyland and the Toy Story Parking lot. The staff will go out of their way for you to feel welcome and happy. There is a great coffee shop attached in the lobby and a cool little bar too. Plenty of parking.
Manager Response: Dear Mary B,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this sweet review of your recent stay with us! I am so proud and happy to hear that you only had great memories with our staff and enjoyed our Courtyard Cafe & Bar in our lobby. We hope to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: During our recent visit to Anaheim for the 2019 NAMM show, our organization had scheduled meetings and classes at the Hilton and Sheraton hotels (although we were staying at the Wyndham). Due to the labor action against those hotels by UNITE 11, we chose to stand in solidarity with the union and faced the challenge of cancelling our sessions or trying to relocate them. The Wyndham worked with us and was able to accommodate our last minute needs. We ended up having to cancel only one session because the hotel went the extra mile.
Manager Response: Dear danat426,  I really appreciate this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us during the NAMM Convention. All kudos go to our General Manager Jane for her due diligence in making sure our meeting rooms were available and ready for your ESTA meetings and class sessions. We really enjoyed hosting your company's meetings and stays, we will always do our best to ensure all of your needs are met and ensuring everybody on your team gets the best stay they deserve. We hope to have you back for the 2020 NAMM SHOW!   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary: We were delighted to see how close the Wyndham was to everything--walkable on all counts. The rooms were very clean, the service was friendly, helpful and kind and the beds and pillows yummy. The perfect sweet spot!
Manager Response: Dear KHNA,  Thank you for taking the time to leave this 5 star review of your recent stay with us. I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and loved how clean the rooms were and how attentive our front desk team members were. We anticipate your arrival back and really appreciate this sweet review.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary Heading: Couldn't have asked for a better experience
Summary: Beautiful, comfortable, and clean hotel conveniently located a short walk away from Disneyland and tons of restaurants and shops.  The staff is extremely friendly and helpful.  The rooms are reasonably priced.  In the lobby, there is a coffee shop/bar with great drinks, breakfast sandwiches, and snacks that are not at all expensive like you'd expect to find in a hotel--it was nice to not have to leave the premises for my morning coffee and breakfast!
Manager Response: Dear Venture17294239338,  I appreciate you taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of your stay with us at our newly renovated Wyndham Garden property. I am so delighted to hear that you loved our new rooms and how close of a proximity to both Disney parks and restaurants at the GardenWalk. Our Courtyard Cafe just opened a few months ago and have been a hit with all of our guests and locals, they serve Seattle's Best Coffee and breakfast sandwiches on the go for a quick stroll to Disneyland just behind us. Our housekeepers will be so proud when they read this review of their hard work in keeping the Wyndham cleanliness standards at a high for our guest. We enjoyed hosting your stay and hope to have you and your family back soon!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Excellent hotel! The rooms are extremely clean and well appointed with a Keurig machine, fridge and microwave. The hotel room felt brand new. The beds are extremely comfortable. It was hard to get out of them! The hotel staff was friendly and extremely helpful. Perfect location for a trip to Disneyland. Lot's of dining options close by and ART bus has a stop right next door. We were completely comfortable here and could totally relax in a super clean smoke free room . Definitly will stay her in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Sunshine26979316688,  Thank you for leaving this sweet 5 star review of our newly renovated hotel. I am so very happy to hear you loved how new and clean our property is, the beds were just recently replaced when we renovated as well, I get so many requests for the bed brand that I will have it on hand if you ever call and request it. Each room does come with a mini fridge and microwave so that it is more practical for the families going to Disneyland or for the traveling worker. You can take a short 7 minute walk to the Disney Parks or buy a ART shuttle bus ticket with us at the front desk, they pick you up directly in front of our hotel. Thank you so much for this detailed review and for your stay with us, we anticipate your arrival back.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed here for a gymnastics meet at the convention center. It was a perfect location! Staff was super friendly, we enjoyed the coffe bar in the lobby, room was clean! Checked all the boxes including gated FREE parking. We will definitely be back!
Manager Response: Dear Traveler31346954485,  Thank you for staying with us during your trip to the Anaheim Convention Center for the Gymnastics tournament. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed our Courtyard Cafe that serves Seattle's Best Coffee and breakfast sandwiches on the go for a short walk to the Convention Center. Parking is always complimentary for our guests as well as WiFi and no resort fee! We hope to have you back the next time you're in town.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great place for family to stay while going to Disneyland
Summary: Clean, recently renovated and really nice spacious room, we had 4 in a double room and plenty of space for luggage and the kids. Bathroom has nice large bench, super nice shower and plenty of storage area. Front desk staff are very nice and go out of their way to assist.
Manager Response: Dear  melm182,  I appreciate you taking the time to leave this 5 star review of your recent stay with us. I am very pleased to hear that you enjoyed how big and spacious our newly renovated rooms are, it is made to be practical for families traveling to Disneyland or for business at the Convention Center close by. Our front desk team members will be so happy when they read this review, we work hard to help in any way possible to make your stay the best stay!  We hope to have you back soon.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui

Summary: 2nd time staying here and the quality was just the same. Super friendly staff and extremely clean rooms! Short walk to Disneyland all while being very affordable! You cannot beat the deal of their room prices without compromising quality!
Manager Response: Dear Travel29354282178,  Thank you for you recent stay and continuous support by choosing to stay with us while in Anaheim. I am so happy you love our rooms and prices, we will always do our best to keep you coming back. Please call us anytime for special rates for your next visit.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Amazing hotel! Absolutely clean and well taken care of. This hotel has a modern style and everything is updated. The customer service is amazing as well Mickey and Stacey were very helpful and very sweet. They did a great job with making sure everything was perfect for us! I was also very impressed with the cleanliness of the hotel, excellent work. Will be coming back. Ps we stayed in the king suite which is the best!
Manager Response: Dear Gigi2355,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us! I am so happy to hear our front desk team members went above and beyond to make your stay an amazing one, we believe every guest deserves a great stay and this review proves it all. I really appreciate your acknowledgement and sweet compliments about how clean our property is, the housekeepers work hard to ensure our new Wyndham Garden property exceeds standards and guest expectations. We can't wait for your next visit to Disneyland, please feel free to call us for special loyal guest rates!   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We had our 1st family trip to Disneyland.   We loved this hotel, very nice staff, very clean rooms, nice smelling rooms as well.  Special thanks to Stacey who was so helpful always,  made us feel at home. Always smilingly and making sure we were comfortable and happy ! They have a really nice size refrigerator in the room, and a Keurig coffee maker !!! Very convenient for those early mornings heading to Disneyland!  Very close by to Disneyland,  walking distance!!! This hotel is surrounded by restaurants,  convenience stores, shopping stores ! We enjoyed this hotel very much and we are definitely coming back !  In fact, we are already planning our next family trip !!!  Thank you for the amazing stay
Manager Response: Dear GioJH,  I really appreciate you taking the time to leave us this stellar 5 star review of your recent stay with us! We are so happy that we were able to host your first family trip to Disneyland, hopefully this was 1 of many to come! I am very pleased to hear that all of our team members were ready and available to assist you with any questions or extra amenities for the complimentary Keurig in the room; each room does come with a mini fridge that you can fill up. We can't thank you enough for this detailed review and I am so happy that we will be apart of your next upcoming trip! Best wishes to you and your family, please call us if you have any questions about future bookings.  Sincerely, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary: Fabulously Accommodating and Beautiful! The remodel is amazing. Rooms are spacious and clean. The staff is OUTSTANDING! We stay here every year for our annual Disney trip. The hotel is In short walking distance to Disneyland! Thank You!
Manager Response: Dear Venture40449178020,  Thank you for this review of your recent stay with us at our newly renovated property. I am very pleased to hear that you enjoyed how clean and big the new rooms are. Our front desk team members will be so happy when I pass along this sweet review of their execellent customer service. We anticipate your arrival back and hope you all the best.   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: I will definitely be back to this location. Love it here! I love everything about it. The hotel has almost everything you need and in a great location! The staff was wonderful everyday.  So personable and nice. Very clean place. Cant wait to come back.
Manager Response: Dear Voyage41005218044,   Thank you for leaving this 5 star review of your recent stay with us. I am very happy to hear that you loved how clean our rooms are and how conveniently close we are to restaurants and the Disney Parks. Our staff are one of a kind and ensure every guest gets the best stay they deserve. We can't wait to have you back either and hope you all the best until the next stay!   Best Wishes, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed for the weekend due to a family trip to Disneyland. Great hotel and location. Service and staff were exceptional. Rooms are very comfy and quiet during the night.  Will definitely stay again when the opportunity comes!
Manager Response: Dear markcH4492XU,  We want to thank you for taking the time to leave this 5 star review of your recent stay with us. The front desk team members will be so happy when they read the nice comments about their customer service, we are always here to help with a smile and can't wait to have you back.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The staff was friendly and helpful from the get go st the front desk. The building and rooms were very modern and clean. The house keeping staff was very nice and helpful. We very much enjoyed our stay which was just a short walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear stonewallbernhardt,   Thank you for this 5 star review of your stay with us at our newly renovated property. I really appreciate the sweet comments about our housekeepers and how clean our property is, they work hard to maintain the Wyndham Garden standards and it is nice when they are acknowledged too. I can't wait to print this review and pass it along to them, we hope to host your next stay.   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The property was very clean and odor free. They have gated underground parking available for all guests. It is .5 miles (a quick walk 15min) from the Disneyland parks. There are Pizza, Mexican and Korean BBQ restaurants right next door a Starbucks and a Blaze Pizza across the street as well as a CVS. The rooms were clan with very comfortable beds (Very Soft, the mattress is not firm if that is your preference.) The only con was the A/C was loud but if you are a heavy sleeper it is not an issue. The staff were all very helpful, cheerful and accommodating with our questions and requests. Would easily recommend and stay there again on return trips as for the location and standard of the accommodations it was a very good value.
Manager Response: Dear Safari00497415764,   Thank you for spending your Disneyland trip with us at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim! I am so delighted to read that you enjoyed our newly renovated hotel. We are only a short walk to the Disney parks and a few minutes from restaurants at the Garden Walk and convenience stores across the way. All of our beds in the room have been updated with renovations as well, I am so grateful for you generous compliments about our front desk team members and their award winning customer service. Thank you for the feedback on our air conditioning unit, with renovation completions coming close to a year now we are working out the kinks and value any information guests have; I have passed this along to our Executive Maintenance Manager and we look forward to giving you the best stay you deserve next time you're in Anaheim.  Our team appreciates you taking the time to share your kind words with us. We look forward to welcoming you back very soon!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Always a home away from home experience
Summary: It is always a pleasure to come back to this wonderful establishment and be greeted by a genuine welcome.They truly have made it our home away from home and we are always made to feel very welcomeIt is clean, convenient and central.
Manager Response: Dear Glenvillan,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave this kind 5 star review of your recent stay with us. It was our pleasure to host your stay and welcome you back to your "second home", thank you for your continuous support and great feedback, we value you as a guest and a friend. We can't wait to have you back!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great Location, Amazing Staff, The Perfect Disney Hotel
Summary: My favorite place to stay at when taking the family to Disneyland. Easy walk down the street to the parks, beautifully renovated hotel with the friendliest and most-helpful staff. Ozzie is incredible and goes above and beyond to ensure you have a great stay. I’ve stayed here three times now and will continue to return each and every time I take my family to the Disneyland parks.
Manager Response: Dear JonathanL2169,   Thank you for this great 5 star review and for your continuous support and stays at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim. I am so happy to read that you loved how newly remodeled our hotel is and only had good encounters with our team members. Ozzie is the best at what he does and that is making sure every guest has the greatest stay they deserve, he is one of a kind and a good Manager to our team, he will be so delighted when he reads this sweet compliment! We appreciate your thoughtful feedback on your stay and look forward to the opportunity to host your family's next stay.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: GREAT space in rooms. A little outdated.
Summary: In general, a great place to stay. Convienently located right next to the Anaheim Garden Walk and down the street from Disneyland. Lobby is attractive, clean and professional. Great outdoor pool area. Friendly and accommodating staff. The size of each unit is the biggest perk. Basically a small apartment. Much easier with kids than a standard hotel room. Only downside to this property is the units are a little worn and outdated-particularly the bathrooms-and sometimes I feel could be cleaned more deeply. But still put together and clean in general. Very comfortable beds/bedding. All in all a great place to stay!
Manager Response: Dear Trip06554009292,  Thank you for this review and your feedback of your recent stay with us. I am very pleased to hear that our lobby was up to your standards and you enjoyed how spacious our rooms were. We appreciate any and all feedback, especially in departments that we can improve in, I have passed along this notation to our Housekeeping Supervisor to ensure all standards of the Wyndham Garden brand are met and cleanliness is something we take pride in at our property. We look forward to hosting your next stay and giving you the best stay you deserve. Thank you for this review and your support.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel was nice. The only issue was the bathroom sink had a sewage smell coming from the plumbing. It was pretty bad. The smell would eventually go away once your nose adjusted to it. The beds were comfortable and the room was clean
Manager Response: Dear Meander37589887884,  I want to thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. I am sorry to hear that you had an issue with an odor in your room, with remodeling completion we are working out the kinks and if reported we would do all we can to fix the smell ASAP so you get the best stay you deserve. I have passed this long to my Housekeeping Supervisor to ensure we maintain our Wyndham Garden Rewards on highest levels of cleanliness and hotel standards. Please contact me directly for your next booking so we can accommodate you the best we can. We truly appreciate your stay and hope to get a chance to welcome you back!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We had a great time in Anaheim but especially at Wyndham, very nice staff, helpful and willing to help with any requests. I will be telling family about this Hotel and he great service and assistance we received by all staff there.
Manager Response: Dear Voyager44166714260,  Thank you so much for this amazing 5 star review of your recent stay with us at our newly renovated hotel. We appreciate your business and the recommendation to all your friend and family, we are always here to help and can't wait to welcome you back!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel was in a great location.  10 minute walking distance from Disneyland.  There were spacious, clean rooms.  We were very impressed with the staff.  They were super friendly & helpful staff.  Overall, we were very impressed.
Manager Response: Dear  DayTrip66861619345,  I'm so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at our newly remodeled property. We truly appreciate your thoughtful feedback and look forward to the opportunity of hosting your next stay.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We loved this hotel so much. There was nothing we didnt love.  Staff were amazing. Room was spotless and big. Great gym. Close to Disneyland. Free parking. Free wifi. Lots of restaurants around. Nice heated pool area. Would highly recommend.
Manager Response: Dear MrsMorgan77,  I am so glad you enjoyed your stay with us at our newly remodeled property. We truly appreciate your thoughtful feedback and look forward to the opportunity of hosting your next stay.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: I've always loved my stays at the Wyndham Hotels. I love her clean they are and the friendly staff. My kids love the renewed swimming pool & Lobby area. We like how close it is to walk to shops or any restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear Pioneer29250296881,  I appreciate you leaving this 5 star review of your recent stay with us. Thank you so much for your continuous support and stays with our Wyndham Hotels and Resorts.. At the Wyndham Garden Anaheim, all of our rooms are newly remodeled, as well as everything else on property. I am happy to hear that your children enjoyed the new pool and spa as well, we are a close walk to the Gardenwalk and both Disneyland Parks! We look forward to hosting your next stay! Happy New Years!   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel was more than we expected.  It is nicely renovated.  Our room had all the usual things including a small frig and a microwave.  The bed was super comfy!  The curtains were successful in blocking the CA sunshine.  We did not have a chance to visit any of the amenities but we saw the signs pointing the way. I am disappointed that I lost a waterpik charger there.  Even though I called the same day that we checked out, and stopped in a few days later, they were unable to locate the charger:( Even during the busy holiday season, the staff was pleasant:)
Manager Response: Dear Julie T,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us this review of your recent stay with us. I am very happy that our property exceeded your expectations and that you enjoyed how comfortable the beds were, how convenient the mini fridge and microwave in your room was and the great new addition to our room, 2 layers of curtain shades to block out the sun. I am very sorry that your waterpik charger was misplaced, I do recall the supervisor recovering the item the next day and our front desk left you a voicemail informing you we can ship it to you with your card of choice. Please do not hesitate to call us anytime.   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: I stayed here last month with my family well we went to Disneyland. This is a great new hotel just around the corner with the most amazing and attentive staff. From check in with Daniela to checking out with one of the manager's Stacy. She was informative and even let us park our car when we went to Down town. We will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Jdjdas,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us! I am so happy that you enjoyed our complimentary parking and had a smooth check in with Daniela, she has been with us for many years and will be so happy when she reads this special shout out. We are only half a mile away, about at 7 minute walk to Disneyland, I hope you and your family have a great 2019 and we can't wait to have you back!   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel is newly renovated. The staff is very friendly. The queen sized beds felt very small - in between a double and a queen. The bathroom smelled like a sewer the entire time - so gross. Overall it was decent.
Manager Response: Dear Bart W,  Thank you for choosing to stay with us during your visit to Anaheim. I appreciate you taking the time to leave us this review about your stay, I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed the great customer service from our team members. It is unfortunate that you had an issue with your room, if it was addresses we could have sent our housekeepers to service the room or switch you if need be, we hope to have you back in the near future to host a better stay.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Wyndam Garden is a high quality hotel.  Clean, comfortable and easy to relax at the end of the day.  The staff are genuinely friendly and helpful.  There is a nice food area inside the hotel, and everything is close by. !00% what we needed for our family!
Manager Response: Dear Jet41814573525,  Thank you for staying with us at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim, our goal is to continually improve our guests' experience, and I'm pleased to read that your family enjoyed your most recent stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The hotel was absolutely perfect very modern and looked to be recently updated everything was very clean and it was more comfortable than any hotel I have ever slept in before. All of the staff was amazing and we will absolutely be back.
Manager Response: Dear Mobile01118234507,  I appreciate you taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us! Thank you so much for sweet comments about our front desk team members and their stellar customer service, I am so happy to hear you liked how clean and comfortable your room was. We look forward to having you back the next time you're in Anaheim.  Happy Holidays, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Thanks for making our stay comfortable. The room was clean and comfortable. The staff were so welcoming they always said hello and goodbye. We felt safe and comfortable. We will for sure stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Mobile26304971980,  Thank you for taking the time to leave this great review of your stay with us! I am so happy to hear that you had a great stay and enjoyed our newly renovated rooms, most importantly I am very proud that you felt safe at our property. At the Wyndham Garden Anaheim Hotel we take great pride in our clean property, new rooms and making sure our guests are happy and safe, it is with great delight that you recognized our efforts and we appreciate this sweet review. Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we can't wait to have you back!  Happy Holidays, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: I have found the best place to stay when going to Disneyland. It's in walking distance (I have bad knees) and its close to strip mall that serves good food to wee hours of the morning. There's a Starbucks and Blaze pizza across the street, as well as super close to a Walgreens AND CVS.
Manager Response: Hi there SMHatz!!  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us this 5 star review of your recent stay! We also enjoy hosting your stays and are always so happy to see you and the girls! It is nice that you are able to walk to Disneyland because we are so close even with some limitations, the scooter helps too. We are right across from the convenience stores and have our very own Courtyard Cafe & Bar that serves Seattle's Best Coffee. I really appreciate this great review and we can't wait to see you again.  Happy Holidays, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We are Staying at wyndham Garden Inn for our Disneyland trip. It is newly renovated hotel and owners have done great job. super clean and comfortable. will stay here again on our next trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Rosenbudd,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us this 5 star review of your stay with us. Our owners will be so delighted to read this and your generous comments about our brand new renovations, we are very happy to hear you enjoyed the room and we look forward to having you back the next time you're in Anaheim!  Happy Holidays, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim hotel for a Disneyland visit over the Christmas season and could not have made a better choice.  There are so many good things about this hotel, but the best things included how friendly the entire staff was.  Everyone always gave us a friendly greeting from the time you walk in the door and whenever you pass by anyone on staff.  The hotel was renovated not too long ago.  The room we stayed in was clean and had a modern look to it.  Our room faced busy Katella Ave, but we turned on the fan and you didn't really notice.  Aside from the hotel itself, the location is great.  Its a short 10 minute walk to Disneyland and its located near many restaurants that you can walk to.  That includes many casual places and some nicer ones as well.  We have
Manager Response: Dear egee555,  Thank you for leaving this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us at our newly renovated property! Our front desk team members will be so grateful when I pass along your sweet praises on their customer service. We appreciate you choosing to stay with us instead of the many hotels in the Anaheim/ Disneyland area, with our new renovations we are proud to say the value/ rate of our rooms are generous enough for the traveling family to enjoy with complimentary parking, WiFi and no resort fee! We can't wait to host your next stay and happy holidays!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: My family and I stayed here for 1 night in order to experience Disneyland's Christmas festivities (we have never seen them before hehe) and I gotta say, everything about this place was excellent.  Being AP holders for Disney, we've stayed at numerous hotels surrounding the park, and this hotel has to be at the top of my list.  HUGE POSITIVE about this hotel: PLENTY of parking and parking is FREE. It may appear that there isn't much parking once you drive thru their lot, but they have an underground parking area with plenty of spaces. We love staying at hotels that are walking distance to Disney, especially now since we have an 8 month old, and the walk is like 10 minutes, another huge POSITIVE.  When it comes to the rooms, everything looks modern, beds are extremely comfortable,
Manager Response: Dear Maryannneee,  I want to thank you so much for taking the time to leave this amazing 5 star review of your stay with us! I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed our  complimentary parking and how close of a walk our hotel is to the Disney Parks. Our rooms are all renovated with new beds, a vanity mirror in the bathroom, and spacious enough for a family traveling to Disneyland, thank you for recognizing how clean our hotel is, the housekeepers work hard to maintain our award winning property. We are currently updating the restaurant in our lobby that should be operating shortly, in the meanwhile our Courtyard Cafe & Bar in our lobby serves Seattle's Best Coffee and beer and wine too.  Thank you so much for this review, our front desk team members will be so happy to hear the sweet comments about their exceptional customer service. We hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you and your family back!   Happy Holidays, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary Heading: Brand New Hotel within Walking Distance to Disneyland
Summary: The Wyndham Garden Hotel is an Anaheim hotel within a 10-minute walking distance to Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center. I honestly think it's the best hotel in Anaheim because it's both family and business friendly.   There's so much space in their suite room - it's crazy! I love the plush carpeted floors in the suites and how much space you have to move around. The hotel is new and just opened in 2018 as the newest Wyndham Hotel.  Service is excellent and the staff is awesome! The people at the front desk were so welcoming.   I also love the facilities - they're spacious, thoughtful, and modern. Super light and clean look throughout the Wyndham. The fitness room is great, too, as the flooring is rubber (so no painful falls!) with a Yoga section, too!  Amenities:
Manager Response: Dear May W,  Wow! Thank you so much for such an incredible review and for your recent stay with us. I'm so glad to see you even included the property's history, an array of our complimentary amenities and that your membership level was recognized and upgraded so that you were able to enjoy our deluxe king suite.  All king suites are spacious enough that it comes with a pull out sofa, a deep soaking tub, stand in waterfall shower head and it's own little section for the commode. I am very proud that you had only great encounters and exceptional customer service provided by all of our team members, this is exactly what we strive for everyday. I can't thank you enough for this generous and detailed review, please contact me directly for your future bookings!  Happy Holidays, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: This was the first time our entire family traveled together to Disneyland. The room was clean, the buffet breakfast was very good, and the staff was very friendly. The shuttle was very convenient. I would definitely recommend this hot l.
Manager Response: Dear Diane U,  I appreciate you taking the time to leave this 5 star review of your recent stay with us! I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed how clean our rooms are and how friendly our staff was, the ART shuttle does stop by right in front of our hotel and drops you off right at Disneyland. We are currently working on our restaurant in the lobby so the only breakfast items are per purchase at our Courtyard Cafe and Bar in the lobby, they have delicious breakfast sandwiches and scones. Thank you for this great review and we can't wait to have you back the next time you're in town.  Happy Holidays, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Hotel recently renovated. Clean. Staff very nice and attentive.Location perfect between DisneyLand and convention center. Restaurants nearby Furniture all new.Room quiet has refrigerator coffee pot microwave and a large tv
Manager Response: Dear M1054GLjoet,   Thank you for this 5 star review of our newly renovated hotel. We are only a short walk from our lobby to the Disney Parks and Anaheim Convention Center as well as restaurants at the Gardenwalk; I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed how clean and modern our rooms are, the Keurig is complimentary and all of our rooms come with a mini fridge and you can heat up leftovers in our microwaves too! We can't to host your next stay.  Happy Holidays, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: AmaZing stay. I’m a Wyndham employee and I appreciate being able to use my discount here. I’ve stayed here over 10 times. I’m an annual pass holder for Disney so I come very often and always stay here! Very recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Wanderer39674431013,  I appreciate you taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us! I am so happy to hear that you had a stellar stay and was able to utilize your employee rate as well as earning Wyndham Points, that's always a plus! We can't thank you enough for your loyalty and recommendation, please call me directly for your next stay and we can give you a Disney Firework view too!  Happy Holidays, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Very friendly staff. Coffee bar in lobby, 24 hour business center with printing. Rooms are clean, comfortable and updated with microwave, keurig, and mini fridge. Very nice showerhead. Within walking distance to convention center and restaurants
Manager Response: Dear lizcV9307JH,  Thank you for this great review of your stay with us during your conference at the Convention Center. I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed the coffee in our Courtyard Cafe & Bar, our business center is also complimentary as well. I appreciate you taking the time to praise our front desk team members, they work hard to provide the best customer service possible because at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim we believe every guest deserves a great stay and that starts with friendly service and a smile. Our newly remodeled rooms are equipped with the rain fall shower head, complimentary coffee for the Keurig, I am glad you were able to relish in our spacious room after a short walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. We hope to have you back the next time you're in town.   Happy Holidays, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great place to stay if you’re visiting Disneyland
Summary: We switched last minute to this hotel, we loved it. It’s very clean, spacious, has a modern feel to it. We would definitely recommend this place. Price is really acceptable, compared to the other hotels in the neighborhood. Friendly staff. About a 10 min walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Greets 735teund!  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of your stay with us at our newly renovated property! I am so happy to hear that you loved how clean, big and new our hotel is, our housekeeping department works hard to maintain the Wyndham standard of cleanliness to ensure every guest has a leisure stay while traveling. They will be so grateful and delighted when I post this sweet review in their break room! We appreciate you staying with us and can't wait to have you back the next time you're in town.  Happy Holidays! Sincerely, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: This newly renovated hotel is really lovely,  The rooms were great, the staff there were outstanding.  The underground parking was easy to use.  We were able to walk to the Disney Resort in minutes, there were drug stores across the street, Target was close by, and a wide selection of restaurants nearby.  The rooms were very quiet.
Manager Response: Greetings Bob M!  So very happy to hear from you and thank you for this sweet 5 star review! I am very proud that every team member you encountered only provided you with exceptional customer service, we appreciate your acknowledgement and reviews like this is a great moral booster! It is nice that you were able to enjoy a nice close stroll to CVS and Walgreens from our hotel, the restaurants at the GardenWalk are just a few minutes down the way too. We can't wait for your arrival back and best wishes to you and your family!  Happy Holidays, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The customer service was just phenomenal. Every single staff member we came into contact with was polite, & courteous. They were ready to help with ANYTHING we needed. The rooms were clean, and looked nice. The beds were so comfortable, & pillows felt amazing, as well as the showers! Amazing! The overall of the hotel, including hot tub, pool, & distance from Disneyland was beyond our expectations! We would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Discover60374095213,  Thank you for your recent stay and taking the time to leave this great 5 star review! I am very grateful for your sincere compliments pertaining to our team members' stellar customer service, the housekeepers will be so happy to hear you enjoyed how clean and nice the property was, they work hard so you don't have to while on vacation! All of our rooms come with the new showers, light up vanity mirror in the bathrooms and our pool/ Jacuzzi is newly updated too, its great that your family was able to enjoy it. We look forward to hosting your next stay, please feel free to call us directly for your next booking!  Happy Holidays from our Wyndham Family to yours, Sincerely, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary: Lovely hotel with excellent staff.  Rooms were immaculate.  Short walk to the park.  Hotel offers a reasonably priced breakfast options too.  We appreciated the free parking.  It was all worth paying just a little bit more.
Manager Response: Hello D5321ATbillc,  I appreciate you staying with us and taking the time to leave a great 5 star review. I am so happy to hear that you loved our rooms and enjoyed the complimentary parking, you can even leave your vehicle in our lot on the day of check out to enjoy restaurants within a 3 minute stroll from us at the GardenWalk or a nice trip to Downtown Disney. We appreciate your feedback and can't wait to have you back!   Happy Holidays, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We finally found the hotel we can afford to stay at AND that accomodated my large family! The hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland, the staff was incredibly friendly, and the room was comfortable and clean!
Manager Response: Dear Navigate50377267382,  Thank you so much for this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us! I am so happy to hear that our newly renovated room was spacious enough for your family on this Disneyland trip, our team members are always happy to help and appreciate your feed back! We hope to welcome you and your family back soon.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Comfortable Rooms. Good price. Great location.
Summary: Within walking distance of Disneyland. There are lots of restaurants, and convenience stores around. We used the outdoor pool and hot tub; both were clean and heated to good temperatures. The room was clean and equipped with lots of outlets so my family could charge phones, cameras, computers, etc simultaneously. There is a sizable fridge in each room, which was great.   It was nice to stay in a hotel where the heating/AC really seemed to adjust to the temperature I chose. The beds were comfortable, and the staff was outgoing and friendly. The staff was responsive to all our requests.   There are two things to note, despite the 5 stars I gave in my score... #1 - Our room did not have a bath tub. This made things interesting when we tried to bathe our small children. #2 - The
Manager Response: Dear Aric F,  I appreciate you taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us! We just renovated all the rooms a little over a year ago, I am very happy that you loved how clean and practical our rooms are. There are various charging hubs throughout the rooms for multiple devices for families visiting Disneyland or for the traveling workers. It is nice that your family was able to enjoy how close our hotel is to the restaurants at the Garden Walk and a short stroll to both Disney Parks. Since completing all remodeling of the rooms, we have replaced the standard old school bathtubs with stand in waterfall shower heads, upon request and availability we would be more than glad to upgrade you to our standard 2 queen bed with a tub so you can bathe your children. Please feel free to contact us directly after your next booking so we can reserve this special room for you! Thank you so much for this stellar 5 star review and we can't wait to welcome you back!  Happy Holidays to your family from our Wyndham Family! Stacey Bui Guest Relations Manager

Summary Heading: Hotel is great and the staff is wonderful
Summary: We had a wonderful stay at this hotel. The rooms, location and coffee/wine bar were great! The staff were some of the most helpful and friendliest I've ever experienced. We will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Global42941152795,  Thank you for this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us! Our rooms are all newly renovated as well as our lobby where our Courtyard Cafe is, we serve beer and wine throughout the morning and evening. I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed our award winning customer service from our team members throughout the property, thank you for the acknowledgement, reviews like yours really boost our moral to keep it up! Please feel free to call us anytime to book for your next stay, we can't wait to welcome you back!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Awesome hotel!  SO close to Disneyland, and they let us park our car at the hotel (while we went to the park) at no charge even after we had checked out for the day!  The staff was exceptionally friendly - Stacey and Micky made us feel very welcome and answered all of our questions with a smile!  The hotel is very modern and nicely appointed.  The decor was above and beyond what you would expect at a family hotel in Anaheim!  I would highly recommend this hotel and the staff.
Manager Response: Dear Roving26922586719,  I really appreciate you taking the time to leave this stellar 5 star review of your recent stay with us! Parking for all of our guests is complimentary even before check in and if we have vacancy you can even park your vehicle with us after check out so you can enjoy another day at Disneyland or some last minute shopping at Downtown Disney which is also just a short walk away. Thank you for your sweet comments about Micky, she is a great team member and always eager to help! I am very happy to hear that you loved our decor, our owner hand picked every single mural in the rooms and throughout the property so when you enter the calm decor eases your travels. We can't wait to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in town!   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We loved our stay here and will be happy to come back again in the future. Rooms are beautiful and up to date. Staff is super friendly and accommodating. Loved their coffee/bar down stairs. Very reasonably priced drinks
Manager Response: Dear DGunderson2177,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this 5 star review of our renovated property! I am very pleased to hear that you enjoyed our new rooms, the Courtyard Cafe in the lobby and our great team members at the front desk! We can't wait to have you back!   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Best Value: Short Walk to Disneyland
Summary: We loved staying here at this recently remodeled property, rebranded from a Ramada to a Wyndham Garden, located at 515 West Katella Avenue.  This is your best value option in this area.  A really short walk to the entrance of Disneyland and California Adventure.  You certainly cannot justify a shuttle!  This property is super impeccably clean, all new in every respect.  The hotel quickly addressed any of our concerns that were found needing adjustments in our room.  The staff were AMAZING here and you won’t find better service anywhere else.  The beds are super comfortable with terrific pillows.  All new treatments in every part of the hotel and the bathroom is 100% new.  AC was effective and WiFi was free and fast.  We enjoyed the pool and the hot tub.  Very kid friendly
Manager Response: Dear 729LarryF,   Wow! Thank you so much for such an incredibly detailed review and for your recent stay with us! I'm so glad to hear that you enjoyed our newly remodeled property and how close of a walk we are to the Disney Parks for your family. It always feels great to read reviews such as yours with specific information, I am so happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations and you enjoyed our staff. It is great that our team members were attentive and accommodating by taking care of your concerns right away, we work hard so you don't have to while visiting Disneyland or traveling to the Convention Center in Anaheim. I really appreciate your acknowledgement of our housekeeping department's hard work in upholding our Wyndham cleanliness standards; thank you for the sweet friendly comments pertaining to our front desk team! I have dully noted your suggestion about softeners for our towels and have passed that along to our Executive Housekeeper. Thank you for the great feed back and this amazing review!  We can't wait to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in town!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing - beautiful as long as your neighbors don’t smoke weed!
Summary: This hotel is stunning! So close to Disney! Amazing staff! We were just unfortunate to get stuck by bad neighboring hotel patrons who broke the no smoking rules and filled the halls and our room for a bit with weed smoke. Fine if you enjoy it- not if you have a special needs child.  Despite this - we were only at this lovely hotel for one night. Wish it had been for our whole trip!!
Manager Response: Dear 6Monkeys,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide such an excellent review and of your recent stay with us! I am very pleased to hear you had a great experience and enjoyed our team members' stellar customer service. That was unfortunate that another guest did not abide by the hotel's policies and it effected your stay, I recall sending up our front desk team member to address your neighbor next door and that put a halt to that; for future reference, we can also move you to a different floor so your family does not have to deal with that during your trip and stay with us. Thank you for staying with us and we can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The staff really made the difference and I mean every last one of them. Very friendly, very attentive, great customer service all the way round. Their manager Ozzie sets the tone with his warm welcomes and willing to make sure you have everything you need. Stacey was fabulous, she's a great sport (we messed with her a ton), and she smiled and took it like a champ the whole time while providing wonderful service. When she gives you a map be careful though LOL jk. Micky was very polite, courteous, and helped us finish up our stay in grand fashion. This was my second time staying here in 4 months and each time this was the case extremely excellent service and an amazing stay.
Manager Response: Hello there Tom D!  I want to thank you for taking the time to provide such an incredible review of your recent stay with us! I am pleased to hear you had such a great experience and that all of our team members were friendly and accommodating, this is exactly what we strive for everyday at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim. Our Front Office Manager Ozzie is the backbone of our front desk team, he is amazing at his job and it trickles down into every team member at the front desk, we enjoy working here and I am happy that it is displayed and recognized by our special guests like you! Micky is a gem at our property and she will be so happy when I pass along this sweet shout out to her! Tom, I am very proud to inform you that all of our maps have been newly replenished and we will have them waiting for your next visit with us, I have even saved you a few old ones too! I really appreciate this stellar review and your continuous visits with us, we anticipate your arrival back and only wish the best for you and your colleague, til next time!   Sincerely,  Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Had a great stay at this hotel. The front desk staff were very friendly and accomodating. Both Stacey and Mickey were extremely helpful with our packages that came in throughout the weekend. Would book again!
Manager Response: Dear Adventure23798198450,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting to stay with us at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim. I am very happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations with our award winning customer service and free package accommodations, your group was exceptionally polite and fun. We are grateful for your stay with us during the Blizzard Convention and hope to see you next year   Sincerely, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Everything is great about this place. It’s super close to Disney. There is a hot tub/spa. The staff are very helpful especially micky (I think she was called that) I’m sorry if I’ve got her name wrong. The parking was easy.
Manager Response: Dear Emma F,  We appreciate this 5 star review of your recent stay at our newly renovated hotel! I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed the close walk from our hotel to the Disney Parks, we are also close to restaurants nearby at the Garden Walk. I really appreciate you recognizing Micky and her wonderful customer service, she puts forth her best everyday for our guests and special recognition's go a long way, I will pass along this sweet message to her! We anticipate your arrival back.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary: Our stay was perfect! The rooms are clean, comfortable, and quiet. We were able to walk to Disneyland easily and the front desk staff was among the friendliest I have ever encountered. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Denise T,  Thank you for taking the time to leave this 5 star review of your stay with us! I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated property and our team members' great customer service, we are always eager to help and make your stay the best one yet! We will see you soon!  Best Regards,  Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The staff, the location, the rooms, the options: all AMAZING!  Close to so many attractions and restaurants. The room came with coffee and bottles of water for no extra charge! Car rental pickup and drop off is super close which made it convenient to drop off my rental from Vegas! Didn’t use the pool but it looks nice!
Manager Response: Dear Amy W,  I appreciate you taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of your stay with us! I was happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations and that you loved our property. I appreciate your recognition of our team's hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent customer service. The Keurig coffee pods and water bottles are complimentary in every room and we have extra coffee pods at the front desk for free refills too! Thank you for your review and we hope to have you back soon!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Look no further, you found the right hotel!
Summary: The Ramada Plaza staff are absolute superstars! They welcomed us so warmly, they upgraded our room to a suite! The room had just newly been renovated.   The service kept on getting better and better when our friends from San Deigo met us at the hotel and they provided an extra free parking pass for our friends. (They where willing to pay for the parking and tried!) but instead they waived the fee!   When we checked out, they offered us hot coffee. We where also able to print our boarding passes off at the hotel. I Cannot recommend this place enough.  When everything else seems so overwhelming and expensive in Anaheim, comes the Wyndham Garden! Thank you!!
Manager Response: Dear Danistyles85,  Wow! Thank you so much for such an incredible review and for your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim, we were formerly known as the Ramada Plaza Anaheim Hotel before our renovations. I am so happy to hear you only had great encounters with all of our team members, parking for our guests if complimentary so we will always be here to take care of you. It is great that our team members were able to help you with printing your boarding passes, we are here to help even after check out! I can't thank you enough for choosing to stay with us and this amazing review of your stay in our newly remodeled and upgraded deluxe king room! I hope your holidays are filled with festivities and we look forward to hosting your next stay in Anaheim!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We are Disney annual pass holders from San Diego on a two day trip to the parks. Upon check-in we were delightfully greeted by one of two front desk clerks. He was friendly and efficient with the check-in process. It was clear that he enjoyed his work and it was a great first impression for us. We found the beds comfortable and pillows were excellent. Great shower!
Manager Response: Dear Stay53623774716,  Thank you for taking the time to leave this 5 star review of your stay with us! I am so happy to hear that you had a great check in with our team member and was provided with the standard award winning customer service at Wyndham. Our beds and stand in waterfall shower heads are all new as well as the rooms and amenities provided throughout our property. We hope to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim.  Sincerely, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We arrived in the evening and was greeted and checked in by Stacie and The other woman on staff on 10/29 in the evening. Both women were friendly and charming. The second evening Stacey was on staff again when we came back from Disneyland and she was awesome. She asked about our day and was very engaging with our daughter. We all enjoyed her company. The room was everything we expected, nice, and clean with plenty of room for the 3 of us to move around. It was also a great location for us to get to the main entrance of Disneyland quickly.   We also has coffee at the in the lobby. Service was great and the cold brew coffee was delicious.
Manager Response: Dear Seaside593373,  Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting to stay with us for your Disneyland trip! I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our new spacious room and really appreciate your acknowledgement of our housekeeping departments hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service. It was my pleasure hosting your stay and it was not hard to adore your sweet and smart daughter, I can't wait to have you all back the next time you're in Anaheim!!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Found this little gem and am super happy I did.  Rooms are large and quiet, ours had a fabulous deep soaking tub (seriously).   Park your care and leave it at the hotel.  Then take Lyft or Uber to the park, they drop you off at the front of the park and you will shave off 30 minutes of unnecessary drama from your fun day.
Manager Response: Dear BernieRose,  I want to thank you for taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us! All of our rooms are newly remodeled, I am so happy to hear you enjoyed our spacious deluxe king room with the deep bathtub for a nice soak after a long day at Disneyland. Parking is complimentary for all of our guests and transportation services like Uber and Lyft picks you up right in front of our lobby! We hope to have you back the next time you're in Anaheim!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The room was great! We stayed one night, but were able to used free parking on the property for two days! The location was great too. Close to Disneyland and restaurants! We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Cruiser698199,  I appreciate you taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your stay with us. I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed your room, even if it was just for one night! Our newly renovated property is only a short walk to the Disney Parks and restaurants at the Gardenwalk, parking for our guests is complimentary even before check in time and after check out if available, we will always try to accommodate and assist by any means to make your trip and stay a pleasurable one. We hope to have you back the next time you're in town!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary: This hotel,close to Disneyland about 5 to 7 minute walk is first class all the way very nice room with great staff and very not complimentary breakfast but very reasonably priced,Stacey at the front desk is what every hotel should take a blueprint from she is one of a kind,nothing more I can say but you won't be disappointed
Manager Response: Dear Calvin D,  I am so grateful for this stellar review of our newly renovated hotel and even more happy to hear that you had a great stay! We are only a short walk to Disneyland and the Adventure Park, our Courtyard Cafe and Bar in the lobby serves breakfast muffins and little pastries as well as sandwiches and fruit cups, we are currently working on opening our very own restaurant soon Mr. Derr, so the next time you're back in California we will be ready for you and your family. I do appreciate your sweet comments and genuinely enjoyed hosting your free night stays, it really does pay off to be a Wyndham Rewards Member. Please feel free to contact me directly at the hotel for special rates for your next visit, we can't wait to have you back!   Warmest Regards to you and your family, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Staff were friendly and accommodating, always willing to assist with a professional attitude. The only issue we had was not enough towels in the room for number of people for the first two nights but this was rectified when addressed with the front desk.
Manager Response: Dear paula-willtravel,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide this nice review of your recent stay with us! I am pleased to hear that you received the additional towels as requested and enjoyed our team members award winning customer service, this is what we strive for everyday at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim Hotel. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The two ladies at the front desk when I arrived gave me a warm greeting and chatted with me for a bit. They answered my questions and informed me about all of the amenities available to me. They were so sweet! The room was modern and clean and the bed was very comfortable. The shower was awesome too!
Manager Response: Dear Tristy37,   Thank you for this 5 star review of your stay with us, I am delighted to hear that upon check in our team members were informative and assisted you in all your needs. All of our regular rooms come with the stand in waterfall shower head, light up vanity mirror, a mini fridge and microwave. We hope to have you back the next time you're in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed here for two nights whilst visiting Disneyland.  Upon arrival I think we had one of the most enthusiastic welcomes I have ever experienced upon checking into a hotel!  The hotel has some some parking at street level and an underground garage with more spaces, there is lift access into the hotel.  Parking was free which was good.  The room was large, clean, modern, well furnished and maintained.  The bed was comfortable and we slept really well.  Our room was at the front of the hotel and we didn't experience any noise from the street, there was internal noise though particularly from the lifts.  There is a pool and small spa which we used and although not particularly scenic, it was nice to take a break from the parks for a bit and rest our weary legs!  Disneyland was
Manager Response: Dear Tobesk,  Wow! Thank you so much for such an incredible review of your recent stay with us. I am so pleased to hear you had only great experiences and that all of our team members were friendly. This is what we strive for everyday, all of our team members will be happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations and that you loved our property. I really appreciate your acknowledgement of our housekeeping departments hard work in ensuring the rooms and property are well maintained and clean. Our newly renovated spa and pool is perfect after a long day at the parks, you can even catch Disneyland's firework show while swimming or lounging around at the pool. We can't wait to welcome you and your family back the next time you're in town!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We were very happy with our stay here.  The hotel was recently renovated and the rooms were great.  If you have young children, be aware that our room did not have a tub.  It's a 10 to 12 minute walk to Disneyland and there are a lot of nearby food and drink options.  Micky greeted us as we walked in and seemed to be there every day.  Her service was fantastic.  She was always very friendly and made sure we had what we needed.  Her service was some of the best I've seen.
Manager Response: Dear Ryan O,  Thank you so much for choosing to stay with us and your great 5 star review of our newly renovated property. I am very happy to hear that you enjoyed our new rooms with the stand in waterfall shower head and how close of a walk it is to the Disney Parks! Great fast food options are just around the corner or nice dinners at the Garden Walk which is only a few minutes walking distance away. We appreciate you acknowledging Micky and her amazing customer service, she is a gem at the front desk and goes the extra mile to ensure our guests are happy while staying right next to the magical place on earth, Disneyland! I will pass along this sweet message to her and we hope to have you back soon!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We had a fantastic stay at the Wyndham Garden, the parking is free and easy and the staff were happy to let us drop the car off the morning we arrived before we checked in. All the staff were really warm and welcoming and very professional. The rooms were new, clean and very spacious and it was a close walk to Disneyland. We would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Australian___3,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave this 5 star review of your stay with us! I am so pleased to hear that you had an amazing stay with us and was provided with exceptional customer service from our front desk team members. That is great that you were able to park your vehicle even before check in, we will always try to take care of our guests by any means. Thank you for this review and we hope to have you back!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: There were hairs found throughout the room on each day of the stay which means every day the room was cleaned, new hairs popped up.  One of the days there was a dried booger on one of the towels.  On our way to the 2nd floor lounge we saw a cockroach crawling across the floor which i stepped on and told the maid (she was watching).  The maid walked over to the cockroach so we assumed she got it, but when we walked back that way the cockroach was still crawling around.  The maid was still there so we again told her it was there and it needed to get taken care of and she just laughed.  We informed the front desk and they seemed more concerned and said they would take care of it.The staff was very nice and friendly and other than the issues listed above we had a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear 183ryan,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your recent stay with us, though it is not the 5 star reviews we are used to, I still appreciate your stay and feed back. I have brought all the issues above to my executive housekeeper and we are working on retraining our staff on the cleanliness standards and expectations we have at our Wyndham Garden property. I apologize for  the inconveniences you experienced, I do recall sending up fresh towels to your room and sending a team member from the front desk to check the lounge. We hope to have you back the next time you're in Anaheim so we can provide you with the best stay you deserve! Please feel free to contact me directly at 714-991-6868 and mention this post when reserving your next stay.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui  Guest Service Manager

Summary: The air conditioning was very loud.  Poor insulation and hallway noises easily heard.  Hotel updated with new furnishings and staff made it a pleasant trip. The exercise room had new equipment.  Very nice.
Manager Response: Dear adm5099,  Thank you for your review of our hotel and for choosing to stay with us. We apologize for any inconveniences you encountered with the air conditioning unit in your room and the insulation. I have spoken to my maintenance team about these issues and we are working together to ensure this does not recur in the future. I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our remodeled room, the new fitness center and great customer service from our front desk team members. We hope to have you back the next time you're in town!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Property is clean, very new and modern for the area, and not overpriced. Disneyland and restaurants all within walking distance and outlet shopping is a short Uber ride away, will definitely come back
Manager Response: Dear Angela A,  Thank you for leaving this great 5 star review of our newly renovated property. I am happy to hear that the value of our hotel met your expectations and that you enjoyed the close proximity of the Disney Parks and the restaurants at the Garden Walk which is just a short stroll from our lobby.  We anticipate your arrival back and appreciate you taking the time to leave this review for us!  Warm Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: A wonderful time with our grandchildren!
Summary: From the moment we arrived the entire staff of Wyndham Garden could not have done more to make our stay so enjoyable.  Stacey, the amazing person who first greeted us was truly exceptional in her helpfulness and friendliness.  She graciously accepted our luggage even though we were five hours before check in.  We actually were able to move into the room three hours before check in.  The room was spacious and immaculate.  Even though there were five of us (3 adults and children ages 7 and 10) we found there was space for all.  The pool and hot tub were wonderful and used each of the five nights we stayed.  We will definitely stay at the Wyndham Garden when we next visit Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear John M,  We want to thank you for taking the time to provide such an amazing review of your recent stay with us. I am so grateful that you recognized our excellent customer service and was taken care of even before check in. We are always here to help and accommodate our guests by any means from complimentary luggage storage to free early check in service too. With our modern renovations, every room is spacious enough for our traveling workers and frequent family visits to the magical kingdom, Disneyland!  We can't wait to welcome you and your family back soon the next time you're in Anaheim. Best wishes to you and your sweet grandchildren.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is the 2nd time we stayed here and it does not disappoint! Friendly front desk staff willing to go above and beyond to please and walking distance to Disneyland. Clean rooms and all the amenities needed. Comfortable beds. We had one minor issue that was beyond anyone’s control and it was resolved promptly. We will stay here again!
