Manager Response: Good Morning Venture624340,   Thank you for your five star rating and for selecting to stay with us again for your Disneyland trip! I was happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations and that you loved our beds and amenities. I really appreciated that your acknowledged my team's hard work in keeping the hotel clean and well maintained while delivering excellent service. We can't wait to welcome you back for the 3rd time soon!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing hotel for our Disney trip
Summary: We recently stayed at the Wyndham Garden Hotel.  We were able to walk to Disneyland in about 15 minutes.  The room was spacious and very clean.  The staff was friendly and helpful. When my grandson got sick in the middle of the night, the desk staff provided water bottles free of charge and showed genuine concern.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello wllsmichelle,  Thank you so much for taking the time to provide such an excellent review of your recent stay with us! I am so pleased to hear you had such a great experience and all of our staff were attentive and compassionate. This is what we strive for everyday and we appreciate the recognition; I will pass along this sweet message to my team members. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon.   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: This hotel has excellent location to the Disney park and restaurants. The rooms where comfortable, clean, and spacious. The customer service was excellent and very professional. My family and I will definitely consider this hotel for our next Disney tip.
Manager Response: Hello Ohana_AZ  Thank you for this review and for your recent stay with us at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim. I am so pleased to hear you had only great experiences with our team members, we take pride in our award winning customer service and strive to be helpful, friendly and professional. Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon.   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: All I can say is that this hotel has great costumer service and that makes a difference on everything. The people at the front desk were always courteous and willing to go the extra mile to make our stay great.
Manager Response: Dear curly8001,  Thank you so much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am very pleased to hear that our team members were able to assist you and provided your family with great customer service! Hopefully we get a chance to welcome you back again soon. Please let us know if you need anything at all.   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed for five nights at the start of October. Really glad we picked this hotel over all the others near Disney.  Recently been renovated and the restaurant was closed when we stayed but there’s so many restaurants nearby that this isn’t a problem at all. Starbucks and blaze pizza right opposite, five minute walk to the garden walk with the Cheesecake Factory. And obviously loads more places closer to Disneyland.  Room was spacious and bed was massive, so comfy! Just what we needed after a day at the parks.   Parking is free, which is one of the reasons we chose the hotel. The parking garage is secure as you need a pass to enter.  Staff were all really friendly. Shoutout to Stacey and the rest of the staff working the front desk, they made our stay amazing and listened to our
Manager Response: Dear confidence-cohen,  Wow! Thank you so much for this incredible review and for your recent stay with us. First and foremost, CONGRATULATIONS ON YOUR ENGAGEMENT and thank you for sharing that sweet milestone moment in your lives with us at the front desk, we could not be more happy for you and your fiance, she is a gem! You both were so pleasant and traveled so far to surprise her with the proposal at Disneyland, we hope your union is as magical as your proposal. I am so pleased to hear you enjoyed our comfy beds after a long day at the parks and how close our new hotel is to convenient stores and restaurant strips. We hope only the best for you two and can't wait to welcome you back.   Sincerely, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary: Prefect location! So clean, quiet, modern looking, large room, updated, easy 10 min walk to Disneyland. Loved having so much food offerings and dining within walking distance, especially the Anaheim garden walk and Starbucks across the street. Loved it and having underground parking was a huge plus!
Manager Response: Thank you Christina N for leaving this 5 star review of your stay at our newly renovated property. We are only a close walk from our lobby to the Disney Parks' front gate. I am happy to hear that you enjoyed our new modern rooms and the short walk to the restaurants at the Garden Walk. The underground parking structure is a great addition for secured parking and the best perk is that parking is complimentary as well as our WiFi and no resort fee!  We appreciate this great review and look forward to hosting your next stay.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Our stay was short just 1 night, but the room was lager then expected, room was very clean and fresh, comfortable, and quiet. Loved the rain shower head with large bathroom. Staff was friendly and check in and out was quick. Would gladly stay again and recommend to anyone.
Manager Response: Hello samaturino,  We want to thank you for taking the time to leave this nice 5 star review of your stay with us! I am happy to hear that you loved our newly remodeled room and enjoyed how spacious and clean the room was. We will pass along your sweet message to our team members and appreciate the recommendation.   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The whole week has been a great experience! The staff was incredibly welcoming and they were friendly and helpful. The rooms were beautiful and I have no complaints about my stay. It’s so close to Disneyland and the convention center where we had our conference.
Manager Response: Thank you Taylor A for leaving this 5 star review of your stay at our newly renovated hotel. We appreciate the nice comments about our staff and their award winning customer service, we believe every guest deserves a great stay and we are pleased to meet your expectations and look forward to your next visit.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Stayed two nights for a recent Disney trip. Upon arrival at the hotel, I was greeted very warmly by the front desk staff and their friendliness continued all throughout my stay. I was greeted by the staff every time I entered the hotel with a friendly "welcome, how was your day" and was even acknowledged while exiting the hotel. The hotel itself is very nice and clean, and our room was large and comfortable. The Keurig in the room was a nice touch! We also had a fridge, microwave and safe in our room. Parking is free, which is unusual for this area, so that was a plus. There is a parking lot at street level and an underground garage which you need a room key to enter; the entrance to the garage is a little steep and small so if you have a large vehicle make sure you arrive early
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim, our goal is to continually improve our guests' experience, and I'm pleased to read that you enjoyed your most recent stay with us! We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The room was so clean and the bed were comfortable. The staff was very nice and accommodating. They let me keep my electric wheelchair in ther lobby and kept it safe. We will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Hello Farah S,  We appreciate you leaving this great 5 star review of your stay at our newly renovated property! We understand how tiring it can be to walk all day at the parks so we have extra charging stations in our lobby for electric scooters so it doesn't take up your room space. Thank you for the sweet comments about our front desk team members, we will pass along the message and hope to have you back the next time you're in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Just finished our 8 night stay at the hotel. We couldn't be happier. Staff were great. Super friendly. Beds were comfortable. Rooms were spotless and the location was great. I highly reccomend it a 10 minute walk to the front gates of the Disney parks makes it great for families.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon Richard J!   Thank you for taking the time to leave us this 5 star review of our newly renovated property. I am pleased to hear that you enjoyed your 8 night stay with us and was provided with great customer service from our team members. We are only a short walk from our lobby to the front gates of the Disney parks and the shuttle stops by our hotel to Disneyland too!  We appreciate your sweet review and can't wait to have you back the next time you're in town!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary: We stayed here for our honeymoon. The location was amazing - really close to Disney as well as a heap of restaurants/eateries and shops. The staff were super friendly, the room was amazingly spacious and really comfy. It’s so easy to drive from LAX here (even driving on the wrong side of the road!) and from here you can get to the outlets easily as well. Free parking at the hotel. Couldn’t be happier with our stay here!
Manager Response: Hello there SpankNMoose,  Thank you for leaving this great 5 star review of our new hotel! Congratulations to you and your new union, thank you for choosing to share this magical experience with us. We are only a short walk to the Disney Parks and restaurants at the Garden Walk, we also have the Courtyard Cafe and Bar in our lobby too. I am happy to hear that you only had great encounters with our front desk team members and you loved our newly renovated rooms!   We look forward for your next stay with us and appreciate this sweet review!  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary Heading: Our go to place to stay when in Anaheim!
Summary: We have been staying at the Wyndham Garden for the last year and watched it transform from the Ramada to it's current form. Our stay here has always been enjoyable. The staff have gone out of their way to help make our stays are the best.  We just returned from a 3 night stay. Stacey always greeted us with a smile when we returned to our rooms after a long day. We had a minor issue with our room which was dealt with promptly.   Hotel is clean, service is friendly and location is great for walking to Disney.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon Troy C!  Thank you for this great 5 star review of your stay at our new property. We always enjoy having you and your family with us when you're in Anaheim, we appreciate your continuous support even through our renovation process. I am happy to hear that you've only had great encounters with our team members at the front desk and that the minor issue you experienced was resolved promptly, thank you letting us take care of you.  We look forward to your next stay and truly appreciate your great feedback!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary: Amazing in every way! Would go back again. Short walk to Disney Parks and Garden Walk. Friendly staff, clean facility and great coffee bistro in the lobby. Great pool and family friendly facility. Highly recommend hotel.
Manager Response: Hello benhamrobin!  Thank you so much for leaving us this  5 star review of your stay at our new remodeled hotel. We are only a short walk to parks and restaurants near by with the Courtyard Cafe & Bar in our lobby that serves Seattle's Best coffee. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and had great encounters with our front desk team members. We anticipate your arrival back.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Clean hotel with friendly welcoming staff. Lots of parking and close to lots of shopping, dining and Disneyland. Easy access to freeways. Room are big enough to accommodate a family of four, including room for a pack n play.
Manager Response: Thank you airish8693 for this 5 star review of our newly renovated property!   Since completing full renovations of the hotel a few months ago, our housekeeping department has done an amazing job maintaining the cleanliness of the property and rooms, they are the backbone of our team and I am glad to hear that our front desk team members provided you with great customer service. We have open parking for our guests and plenty of room space in the rooms for pack and plays, we also provide cribs upon request.  Thank you for your review and we look froward to having you back.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 7 days with a 7&10 year old. When I booked I had a really hard time choosing between this hotel and Indigo next door, but I got a better deal at Wyndham and could not have made a better choice! The staff were super helpful and kind, the room was so nice, and clean and fresh. The beds were extremely comfortable, the bathroom and shower were fantastic, the pool was great, everything was modern, even all the public spaces and washrooms have been revamped. Secure free parking was also a major bonus. The walk to Disney was quick and do-able with the kids after a long day, there are lots of places to eat nearby, and we enjoyed the small restaurant next door for breakfast (@ Indigo... we also used their pool when ours was closed and it was great as well). We
Manager Response: Hello 25Calgary!  Amazing! This is such a great 5 star and detailed review of your stay at our newly renovated property. We can't thank you enough for taking the time to share your experience! We are so happy to hear that you decided to stay with us, even though Hotel Indigo is our sister property, we just finished full renovations about 3 months ago so our Courtyard Cafe is new as well as the pool, gym and lobby. We take pride in our award winning customer service and I am very proud of my front desk team members for always giving the best to every guest, thank you for the recognition, I will pass this along to my team and management.   For all of our guests parking is complimentary as well as WiFi and the best part is that we do NOT charge a resort fee. Our owner understands how costly traveling to the Disney Parks can be with a family so we try to help in any way possible and offer the best rates in town. We appreciate your feedback and will follow up with our supplier on the quality of our toilet paper.  We are so grateful for your stellar review of our new hotel and enjoyed your family as much as you enjoyed our hotel. We look forward to having you back the next time you're in town. We're just a call or booking away from another magical stay!  Best wishes and sweetest regards to you and your family.  Sincerely, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for a week in a King Suite, big room and great bath. It close to Disneyland, and the staff were amazing people thanks for making our holiday wonderful, especially to Veda for her coffee and making us feel welcome you are a gem I would recommend this hotel and yes I would stay here again
Manager Response: Hi there Heather L,  We want to thank you for taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of your stay with us! I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed our deluxe king suite that comes with a bathtub and our stand in shower with the rainfall shower head. We are only a short walk to the front gates of the Disney parks and our Courtyard Cafe serves Seattle's Best in the mornings and nights, I will pass along this sweet message to Veda and the rest of our team members. We enjoyed having you and your husband with us for a whole week and can't wait to welcome you back!   Sincerely,  Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Wyndham Anaheim..WOW! I will definitely use you again!
Summary: Great staff, great location, great everything! Transportation to and from Disneyland was awesome. They have a bus service that stops right in front of the hotel. Or you can walk the short distance there.  Staff was so informative with attractions, times and prices to get there! I loved the vacation..my granddaughters first time there and they made it very memorable for her. Comfortable beds, children under17! stay free!  They made this paradise and I live in paradise (Hawaii) Thank you to all the staff at Wyndham Anaheim! You are the best! Aloha!
Manager Response: Good Morning sp123adua,  This is amazing! Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of your stay with us at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim! The A.R.T shuttle does pick up right in front of our hotel and drops you right off at the Disney parks, we are also a short walk. I am delighted to hear that our front desk team members were able to assist you with all the necessary information for the Disney parks. We enjoyed having you and your family stay with us and really appreciate your review of our new hotel.  We can't wait for your next stay with us!  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Awesome hotel, walking distance from the park (10-12 mins) without being crazy expensive. They will hold your bags up front if you want to go straight to Disneyland and then check-in after you get back from the park. Great experience.
Manager Response: Hello mbgeib,  Thank you for leaving this 5 star review of your stay at our newly renovated property! Our front desk team members are always here to help and accommodate our guests in any way possible; from storing your luggage to providing great customer service. We are only a short walk from our hotel to the front gates of the Disney Parks and right next to the restaurants at the Garden Walk. Thank you for staying wit us and we can't wait to have you and your family back!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Great staff, easy walk to Disneyland!!
Summary: We have stayed at many hotels in the Disneyland Resort area but this was our first time staying here at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim and let me tell you, we were not disappointed!! The staff is excellent, parking was not a problem, never heard any noise from upstairs or hallways, our room had plenty of space and was always clean! The walk to Disneyland is quick and easy even after a long day at the parks. There is plenty of places to eat close by and there is a Walgreens right across the street in case you need anything!  We will be back next year!
Manager Response: Hi there Tony R!  We want to thank you for leaving this stellar 5 star, our front desk staff is very appreciative of the compliments. We are always on hand to assist guests with whatever their needs are. We are only a short walk to both Disney parks and the local shuttle picks  We will also pass on the kind words to our housekeeping department about the cleanliness of the rooms and through out the property. We look forward to your visit next year!   Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: A gem of a hotel close to Disneyland
Summary: We were looking for a hotel that was within walking distance to Disneyland.  We found a gem when we booked Wyndham Garden Anaheim.  The walk was about 15 minutes to the security station at Disneyland.   I loved being welcomed by the staff each time we walked through the doors. The property is clean, the rooms are spacious, the beds are comfortable and the pool is small but nice.  The coffee shop in the lobby serves Seattles Best Coffee (remember to show your key card for a 10% discount).  There is also a Starbucks across the street.  There are plenty of food establishments within walking distance.  My sons favorites were Sabrosada Mexican Food and the Pizza Press.  If you forgot something at home there are both Walgreeens and CVS close by.  Thank you to the team at Wyndham
Manager Response: Hello FrequentFlier13627,  Wow! I want to thank you for taking the time to leave such a great and detailed 5 star review about our new hotel! The walk to the Disney parks from our hotel is only a few minutes away as are the restaurants at the GardenWalk where you can bowl, shop and eat. Thank you for acknowledging the cleanliness of our rooms and property, our housekeeping department works hard to maintain our stellar reputation. The Courtyard Cafe and Bar in our lobby also serves beer and wine from 4pm to 11pm every day.  We appreciate your kind review and anticipate your arrival back!   Sincerely, Stacey Bui. Guest Service Manager

Summary: This is a great place to stay. Staff is helpful and friendly. Rooms are clean and comfortable. Shower is super! Perfect walk to Disneyland (about 15 minutes there, 20 back (tired feet)). I have stayed here multiple trips even when it was under construction and have enjoyed it everytime
Manager Response: Thank you wyndham324 for leaving this great 5 star review about our property during your stay. I am delighted to hear that you enjoyed our rooms, the housekeeping department works hard to ensure every room is up to Wyndham standards. We are only a short walk from our hotel to the front gates of the Disney Parks. We can't thank you enough for staying with us even through our remodeling, we appreciate your loyalty and can't wait to have you and your family back!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui  Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Wyndham Garden Anaheim - a great choice for the Disneyland Resort
Summary: A great alternative for the Disneyland Resort, this newly remodeled hotel is just a short walk away from the parks.  The hotel is very clean, convenient and has an extremely friendly staff.  We will be back!
Manager Response: Thank you Mark R,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave this great 5 star review about our newly renovated property. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: Very close to Disney and lots of restaurants!! Very convenient. Very friendly staff. The room was very comfortable, nicely furnished, and always smelled clean.  I would definitely recommend this hotel to family and friends.
Manager Response: Hello danielleleyva125,  We appreciate you leaving this great 5 star review about our new hotel. We are so glad to hear that you loved your room and had a great experience with our team members, we can't wait to have you back!

Summary: This was our first time staying here since the remodel. I have read great reviews about it, so decided to check it out, and am I glad I did. The rooms were clean and updated, the pool was on the smaller side (3-4 feet deep) but perfect for my 9 and 5 year olds, and the shower was amazing! But the thing that stood out to me this trip was the impeccable staff. I called at around 11am when I got into town to see if there was any chance we could check in early, and Ozzie said of course come on over! We were so thrilled to be able to rest and get ready for our day! Ozzie was so friendly and helpful and so welcoming! Every time we walked through the lobby the front desk staff were friendly and always said hello. The housekeeping was always on point and the ladies were very friendly
Manager Response: Good Morning Trina M!  This is amazing! How kind of you to leave such a great and detailed 5 star review of our newly renovated property! We really appreciate you taking the time to share your experience. Our new pool is the perfect size for families and adults to enjoy and cool off after a long day at the parks. We really can thank you enough for personally mentioning Ozzie, he is our Front Office Manager and a great one at that! Every team member here puts their best foot forward to ensure every guest has a great stay!

Summary: I used this location for guests to stay while attending a local class. The service from the sales team was top notch and on arrival the front desk knew exactly who we were! This is unique having done this type of travel over the past several years! Great service, friendly and helpful staff as well as the most comfortable hotel bed I have ever slept on!
Manager Response: Thank you KMHKMH for leaving a 5 star review of our newly renovated property! Thank you so much for recognizing and praising our front desk team members and Director of Sales, Ms. Laura Glass. They all work hard so you don't have to while staying with us, we believe every guest deserves a leisure stay, especially with the most comfortable hotel bed around!

Summary: We stayed here for five days and it was Great. The staff was always helpful. the rooms were clean and comfortable. the walk to Disneyland was pretty good. A little closer would have been nice after a long day in the parks, but the price was right.
Manager Response: Hello Dan B.   We appreciate you taking the time to leave this great 5 star review! Our team members at the front desk and in housekeeping are always here to help and ensure you get the great stay you deserve. Our hotel is so close to Disney that you can even request Disney view rooms and see the fireworks from there! We hope to see you and your family soon!

Summary: We stayed here for 11 days. Great location, handy to Disneyland. We used public transport and it was also handy for a lot of the bus's to get into LA and also to the shopping outlets. Good value for money. Great sized room and very clean. The only tiny fault we had was that the internet was patchy and often dropped out despite saying the signal was strong.Would highly recommend this hotel and would definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon masoniteColeraine,  Wow! Thank you so much for this stellar review of our property, we really appreciate you taking the time to tell everybody how great your stay with us was! The ART shuttle does pick up right in front of our hotel and since we are the last stop it is only a 2 minute shuttle ride to the front gates of Disney. Thank you for recommending and wanting to return back!

Summary: Great hotel, seems newly remodeled but not sure when. I remember it was a Ramada before and never stayed there.  The staff was all very helpful and greeted us every time we returned to the hotel. No breakfast but IHOP is less than a block away. Will be back!
Manager Response: Hello Doug-WineCountry,  We really appreciate you taking the time to leave this great 5 star review about our newly renovated property. Thank you for giving us a shot and we can't wait to have you back!

Summary: Our stay at this hotel was fantastic. The rooms were bright and clean and the amenities great.  The staff at this hotel know how to deliver five star service, we were made to feel very welcome by everyone we met and were treated like friends.  I would definitely stay there again when visiting Disneyland.
Manager Response: Good Morning Fonzie100  We want to thank you for taking the time to leave a great five star review about our stay! I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms with the modern decor and complimentary amenities throughout your stay. At the Wyndham Garden Anaheim Hotel we strive to provide the best customer service we can because we believe every guest deserves a great stay.

Summary Heading: Average upgrade made it less Inviting
Summary: The hotel staff is AMAZING and friendly, always greeting with a smile. But the upgraded rooms and lobby are far less inviting than I remember when it was Ramada Plaza. The coffees are nice and the pastry selection fresh which was nice. No restaurant yet is kind of a hassle.
Manager Response: Good afternoon TaraGhigs,   We appreciate your review of our newly renovated property. Thank you for noticing and praising our front desk staff and their exceptional customer service, we are always here to help with a smile! Our new rooms and lobby are all apart of the Wyndham Hotels and Resorts Branch theme with the new, modern and sleek stand in waterfall shower head, contemporary furniture and a coffee bar in our lobby that you had the chance to enjoy. We will soon be renovating our restaurant, we hope to have you back in the near future.

Summary: Staff was wonderful and the rooms were clean and comfortable. Our favorite part of the room was the showers! Close to Disneyland, about a 15 min walk. We didn't bring trunks for the pool, but it looked very inviting.
Manager Response: Hi DonaldS1219,   Thank you for taking the time to leave this 5 star review about our newly renovated hotel! We are happy to hear that you loved our showers and how close our hotel is to the Disney parks. We hope to have you and your family back the next time you're in Anaheim and you can try our new pool and spa too!

Summary: We used this hotel as a base to do Disney/Universal Studios/Six Flags and the main selling point for us when we booked the hotel was that the parking was free so we wouldn't be paying double parking on days that we weren't visiting Disney. It was by far the best decision we could have made- and not just for the parking!  Check in was quick and easy when we got there and the staff at the hotel were top notch, always smiling and checking that everything was okay. We had a room with 2 double beds which was plenty big enough, the beds were super comfy and it had recently been renovated so everything was brand new and spotlessly clean. The shower in the room was AMAZING and the shampoos/conditioner/shower gel etc that were supplied were great to (and replaced everyday so we never ran
Manager Response: Good Afternoon Christina L,  Wow! We want to thank you for taking the time to leave such a great 5 star review about your stay with us! At the Wyndham Garden Anaheim we understand expenses add up when you are traveling, so we made parking and WiFi complimentary and the best part is there is not a resort fee! Thank you for recognizing our team members stellar customer service, we work hard so you don't have to while on vacation our motto is "We believe every guest deserves a great stay!" Our newly remodeled rooms are spacious and every room has the stand in waterfall shower head, a mini fridge and microwave for quick meals or to heat up leftovers from restaurants at the Gardenwalk which is only a few minutes walking distance away. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our Disney view room, you can even catch the fireworks from the room or our driveway too!   We can't wait to have you back the next time you're in town!   Sweetest regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Food was left to rot after I requested it be kept on ice. It was already on ice but I had to be gone, thus the request.Late check in and late check out were met with care and consideration. Luggage was held as necessary. Room only had one comfy chair. Shower was a tripping hazard. Very quiet room with good view.Staff did not tell us of any amenities nor where/how to get to room.Liked the 'bowl' sink.Beds were comfy but high.Cab drivers did not know where hotel was due to recent remodel.
Manager Response: Dear bamadaviscd,   Thank you for taking the time to leave a review about your stay with us. We hope you accept our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience you experienced with your perishable items. Your comments are highly valuable to us and assist our team in the continuous efforts to improve the service level we aim for with the Wyndham Garden brand. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed the comfortable beds and our newly remodeled and modern sink and quiet room.   Again, thank you for staying with us and we hope you give us another try when you're in Anaheim.   Best Regards,

Summary: Excellent, for a reasonable price. We stay in this hotel because we went to Disneyland, and try to book a room in Disney hotel, but it was sooooo expensive that was a prohibited price to pay for, after buying the park entrance, parking for the car for the food, souvenirs and everything else for 3 people for 1 day of fun would have been over $ 1,300.00 and there are people that does not make that much in a month worth of work, so I kept searching for a hotel until I found Wyndham Garden Anaheim.
Manager Response: Hello Escape775982,  Thank you so much for taking the time to share this review with us. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay and found our location convenient for your trip to Disneyland. We appreciate your feedback regarding the value of our newly renovated property. We can't wait to welcome you back again in the future.  Best Regards,  Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary: Everything from the room to the staff, and location were just right. Front desk was very efficient with check in/out and with my luggage storage while i waited on the shuttle. Mickey is especially good at her job and went out of her way to make me feel welcome.
Manager Response: Hi there joseph k,  We appreciate your stellar review of our newly renovated property and the staff to match! We want to thank you for especially noticing Micky, she's a strong asset to our team and works hard to make sure each guest has a great stay and you can contact her directly to book for your next trip to Disneyland.

Summary: The Wyndham Garden Hotel ticks all the boxes, for friendly and courteous staff. Rooms were clean and inviting. Pool, Gym, Laundry and an on-site cafe which made the best coffee. The staff should be very proud of themselves as they have exceptional customer service. Very close to Disneyland a leisurely walk of about 10 mins. Highly recommend this hotel .
Manager Response: Hello Tiaki-Sarge,  Thank you for leaving this great 5 star review of your stay at our property. We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated pool, gym, and laundry; the baristas at our Courtyard Cafe in the lobby make great coffee and serve beer and wine as well. We can not thank you enough for your generous comments about our staff, at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim we take pride in our award winning customer service and we are appreciative to be recognized by our guests! We hope to see you and your family soon!

Summary: Walking distance to Disneyland, restaurants, shopping, everything is so close wonderful location Rooms are very cozy, clean hotel, friendly staff . We will be staying at this property again.Thank you!
Manager Response: Good Morning mirjanapetko!  Thank you so much for leaving this 5 star review of your stay! We are very pleased to hear that you had a great stay, encountered our friendly staff and enjoyed the close proximity of the restaurants. We are happy to have you back, call us to book your next reservation!

Summary: I liked that the hotel was so close to Disney but the room itself left a lot to be desired. There were none of the usual Wyndham home away from home feel in it. We did not get any shampoo only conditioner which was strange. This will not be a spot we revisit.
Manager Response: Dear gmend,  Thank you for your feedback on your recent stay. We sincerely apologize for the inconveniences you experienced. We will look into your concerns and have them addressed right away and ensure every room is fully equipped with all toiletries upon arrival. It is very important that our guests have an exceptional experience with us and we are sorry we did not meet your expectations, please feel free to contact me directly at 714-991-6868 for your next booking and mention this review, I will promptly remember you and make sure your next stay with us is a better one.   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary: I hesitated due to it's proximity to Disney as this was a quick overnight trip for work, not fun. I'm glad I did! What a beautiful property and it has now been added to the top of my list when in the area. Desk staff was genuine and personable.  The gals at the bar in the evening were fun and the sweet one in the morning made my coffee perfectly.  The difference maker was how nice the saff is. They look you in the eyes and was easy to tell they were genuinely happy to see you.
Manager Response: Hello there TravelAgenTLV!  We appreciate you leaving this great review about our newly renovated property during your visit to Disneyland! At the Wyndham Garden Anaheim we believe everybody deserves a great stay and that starts with customer service, we are 24/7 so there will always be a knowledge and eager staff to help with a smile! The baristas at our Courtyard Cafe don't only make delightful coffees, but they are a delight themselves, we really appreciate this sweet review and hope to have you back soon! Thank you so much.

Summary: Amazing customer service, the room was great, the people were courteous and nice and the facility was very clean.  the price was also great.  The parking lot was extremely clean, and easy access to the rooms.  the hotel also located to some of the fine dining that Anaheim can afford.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon kdaneshv,  Thank you for taking the time to leave this great 5 star review, we greatly appreciate it! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms and had good encounters with our staff, we will always try our best to keep the value of our hotel up to your standards and we can't wait to have you and your family back!

Summary: I dislike the traditional rooms, and prefer a more modern aesthetic look. This room is exactly that! The room also have a coffee machine in the room which makes it necessary for a Disney trip! Overall the room was fatastic size and had awesomeDecor.
Manager Response: Hi there aguirresylvia,  Thank you so much for leaving this great review of our newly renovated property, we really appreciate it! The rooms are all renovated and equipped with new beds, Keurig coffee machine, mini fridge, microwave and a stand in water fall shower head, we are so happy to hear that you loved it all! Our owner takes great pride in the modern design and hand picked every wallpaper you see throughout the hotel and in the rooms, we can't wait to have you and your family back the next time you're in town.

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a long weekend and a visit to Disneyland. The hotel was still going through some construction. The ac unit in the room was not working and the water smelled like sulfur. The staff was attentive and addressed our concerns. We were moved to another room right away. Although we lost our great view, the room was much better. Staff was friendly. Just a little confusing finding the pool from the room and accessing parking. Great location by nice restaurants. Still over a mile walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Hello Excursion69627,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave this great review about our property during your weekend stay. With our new renovations we are working on perfecting every room and correcting the kinks you experienced in the first room. We are so happy to hear that our staff was able to accommodate your move to a much better room, we strive to provide the best experience and stay for each of our guests. You are correct, we are only a short walk to restaurants at the Garden-walk and Disneyland.

Summary Heading: VERY MODERN, EXTREMELY CLEAN - KEEP ROOM KEY AWAY FROM OTHER CARDS WITH MAGNETIC STRIPS
Summary: This is the second time we have stayed at this hotel since it has been remodeled.  Still lovely and affordable.  Micky at the front desk stands out as being extra friendly and accommodating.  I had to have a package delivered overnight -- emergency -- and she was wonderful!  If you are here for Disneyland like we were, the walk there is always easy.  It's the walk back I dread for my feet.  A Lyft cost about $9.  That is $6.75 with a $2 tip. Most important tip I have for this specific hotel is to remember to keep your room key card separate from any other magnetic strip cards, like debit or credit cards.  The first time we stayed here after the remodel, we had to make five trips down, one right after the other, the first night after Disneyland.  It sucked.  And I wasn't happy.
Manager Response: Hi there Audra V,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave this great 5 star review of your stay at our newly renovated property! Micky is a gem at the front desk and we are so happy to hear that her excellent customer service is being appreciated, we will pass along the sweet hello to her.  We are glad that you enjoyed the walk to Disneyland from our hotel, the ART shuttle also picks up guests right in front of our hotel and drop you off to Disney so you can save your walk for inside the parks :). Thank you for staying with us through our renovation phase, we apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with the key cards, you are correct that it is best to keep them away from magnetic strips. We are so thankful for this detailed review and really appreciate you staying with us. We hope to see you and your family soon!

Summary: Nice hotel ,close to Disneyland . Not to expensive.stuff are very friendly and helpful. Didnt experience any problem staying there. Free WIFI worked great. The only thing they don’t serve breakfast there , but there are plenty breakfast  places around and so close it was not a problem at all . I will use this hotel in a future
Manager Response: Hi there natalliauhlik,  We want to thank you for taking the time leave a 5 star review about your stay with us during your visit to Disneyland. We understand how costly traveling can be so wherever we can help cut any additional expenses we try to do so; like no resort fees, parking and WiFi is complimentary. We are currently working on renovating the restaurant in our lobby so we will have breakfast, lunch and dinner coming soon! We hope to see you and your family on the next trip to Disneyland!

Summary Heading: Great location, nice hotel, fantastic service staff
Summary: Great location, close to Disney and good restaurants. Very friendly staff providing great service. Nice looking and clean room. Very comfortable bed. Free parking is a nice amenity. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello annW6923DM,  We want to thank you for leaving this 5 star review about your stay! We are only a short walk from our hotel to Disneyland and the GardenWalk too! Our housekeeping staff is the best and always do their best to maintain the cleanliness of the room and our property, we are happy that you appreciate it! We can't wait to have you back the next time you're in town!

Summary Heading: Best hotel that we stayed in so far!
Summary: Staff was friendly and helpful especially Stacy the manager! Room was more than we have expected. Very clean and quiet! We love the everything about the room, softness of the bed and pillows to overhead showerhead!
Manager Response: Good Morning Shaunadean G!  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a 5 star review about your stay and the staff, we really appreciate your kindness! We are so happy that our room surpassed your standards and we can't wait to have you back the next time you're in Anaheim. :)

Summary: Our entire stay was excellent, starting at check in. Every employee, including house keeping was very friendly and helpful. We were greeted every time we entered the hotel, and even offered a bottle of water which was very nice at the end of long hot days at Disneyland. I look forward to staying here again, would highly recommend to anybody!
Manager Response: Hello mzebratski,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave a 5 star review about your stay with us! We are very pleased to hear that every employee  you encountered was nice and helpful, customer satisfaction always comes first with us! Thank you for the recommendations and we hope to have you back soon, call us directly for betting deal bookings! Have a great rest of your summer!

Summary: Hotel is very clean with a friendly staff. Wine bar which I did not use but was open every evening. It is located in close proximity to many attractions including Disneyland, GardenWalk, Packing District and Convention Center.
Manager Response: Good afternoon klilli814133,  That you for taking the time to leave a review about our newly renovated property. We are happy that you love our clean hotel and the staff was nice and accommodating. Our Courtyard Cafe and Bar is serving Seattle's Best Coffee and beer/ wine in the evening, we hope you get to enjoy a drink there for your next stay, you get 10% off!

Summary: Location was close to DisneyLand. Staff was friendly. Keurig in room. Microwave and fridge were also in room. The room was spacious. Also had a laundry room downstairs around the corner from front desk. Had a few carpet stains in the hallway on the 4th floor & the pool area had some random trash on the ground, but that was probably due to some very messy guests.
Manager Response: Hi there 19Ramona76,   Thank you for leaving such a great review about your stay with us! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our friendly staff and the room was to your liking. We hope to have you back the next time you're in Anaheim!

Summary: This place was awesome.  It was very well maintained and the staff was so friendly.  They made you feel right at home.  The beds were extremely comfy. They made it so hard to get up in the morning and walk the 10 minute walk to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Good Afternoon lee92amanda,  We want to thank you for taking the time to leave a great review about your stay! We are so happy to hear that the staff provided you with excellent customer service during your trip to Disneyland. As you know we are only a short walk and our beds are new just like the rooms, thank you for staying with us before and after our renovations, we can't wait to have you and your family back!

Summary: The pool was disgusting! It was not well kept and had clearly not been cleaned.  The staff was very accommodating and friendly. The room was not as clean as I would have preferred upon check in. Never any water bottles in the room. Excellent location for a Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Hi there jenjen357!  Thank you for the review of your stay, I am so happy to hear that you enjoyed great customer service from our staff! I am sadden that the pool was not up to your standards during your stay, the company we use usually services the pool every other day, we will continue to make sure the pool is kept clean and ready for guest use, I apologize for that inconvenience you experienced. We hope to have you in town for your next stay so we can better service you!

Summary: Great location but beds very uncomfortable and rooms very noisy . Lots of construction going on also  Lots of work on front of motel  Beds less than par and not a good night sleep cause of bed and noisy people in halls and rooms around us
Manager Response: Hi there Kip L,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review about your stay, we are sorry to hear that you did not like the beds, we hope that the next time you're in town you will let us make up for the less than par sleep that you had. We can always try to make the bed more comfortable to your liking, as for the renovation work taking place, we apologize for any inconvenient you encountered, we always inform guests when reserving about the updating of our new property, luckily they only work until 4 or so at the latest so they will not bother you during the night or while you sleep. We hope to have you back so we can make your stay a great one!

Summary: We had our team stay in this Hotel for 5 days, and though they are still upgrading and there was a bit of exterior construction, the overall vibe was great. The staff was young and caring and knew how to address all of us. Very cool, and made for a friendly and inviting experience.
Manager Response: Hi there Timothy S!   Thank you so much for taking the time to write this great review about your stay, your family was a pleasure to have! We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay and was well taken care of by our amazing staff, we work hard so you don't have to while on vacation! We hope to have you and your sweet family back the next time you're in Anaheim, call us for special rates and accommodations.

Summary: This big plus was, there was no charge for parking. I've stayed in a few hotels next to Disneyland and the nice ones always charged for parking so that was a big plus to me because those one I stayed in were all are pretty nice.
Manager Response: Good Morning Eric H!  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary parking and WiFi, another bonus is no resort fee! We understand that traveling can be expensive enough as is and we want to help any way we can whether it be with great customer service or cutting out the "hidden check out" fees. We anticipate your arrival back and really appreciate the review!

Summary: This place is hands down the best place we’ve stayed at. So clean and modern looking. Everyone is so friendly (especially Mickey) and helped out as fast as possible. Sorry Desert Palms, but we found a new place to rest our tired Disney bones.
Manager Response: Hi there morticiaadams13!  We appreciate you taking the time to leave a review about your stay with us! Micky is a gem at the front desk and we are happy to hear that she assisted you during your trip to Disneyland! We are even more happy to hear that we are now your new favorite hotel! :) Give us a call for some rates for your next visit to Anahiem, we can't wait!

Summary: Overall, We were very pleased with the changes made to the location by the Wyndham Group.  The new elevators and lobby remodel make this place a hidden gem next to Disneyland and CA Adventure parks. Walking with the family is great just be very street smart at the bus stops and liquor stores ;)  The staff was friendly and polite, which goes a long way with us. Window cleaning does need some detailing on the inside with lip marks from excited kids as the view from the room is nice.  Pool is cozy and the jacuzzi works as advertised.  We are definitely going back!
Manager Response: Good Morning Ivan L,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such an awesome review of our hotel, we really appreciate it! We are so happy that you love our newly renovated property. We are conveniently located right by the Garden-walk and the ART shuttle bus picks you up right in front of our hotel and drops you off directly in front of Disneyland. We take pride in our aware winning customer service and love that you enjoyed the experience with us!   We can't wait to have your family back!

Summary: Highly recommended!  Excellent service, comfortable renovated rooms! Pool area was very nice for the kids!  The free parking is a great plus!  A couple blocks to Disneyland!  Close to restaurants and stores!
Manager Response: Hi there gabypm7,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a 5 star review about our newly renovated property! We are happy to hear that the kids enjoyed the pool, it is only 4 feet so it is kid friendly and safe. Parking and WiFi is complimentary and there is not a resort fee because we understand traveling expenses can add up so any way we can help, we try our best! We can't wait to have you back next time you're in town!

Summary: The room was okay.  However, it smelled of sewer and we had dirty towels.  The walk to the park was ok.  There are other hotels in the area that have also undergone renovation.  The people who work at the hotel were very friendly.
Manager Response: Hello there ch0wren,  Thank you for taking the time to write this review about your stay with us, we apologize that you encountered some issues in the room, at Wyndham Garden we strive for our guests to have the perfect stay while vacationing. If the issues were reported we could have fixed the smell and replaced the towel or even upgraded you, anything we can do to rectify the situation, we will always try our best for our guests! :)  We hope you will be back soon so we can give you the best experience you deserve, contact us directly and mention this post for a deal!

Summary Heading: Great Branch of the Wyndham Family
Summary: I had a spectacular (albeit short) stay at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim.    I came to blow off some steam for a couple of days at Disney. This place was perfect, 20 minute walk from the gates. All the staff were gracious and helpful, and I was able to drop off my bags when I arrived in the morning so I could go right to the parks.    The lobby is simple but nice, with a good lighting design, and the coffee shop, run by Virginia, was exactly what I needed. I stayed in a king suite and was not disappointed.  It was spacious, the rug was thick and great, and the soaking tub (separate from the rain style shower) was excellent.    The bed was very comfortable and the Keurig was nice.  I didn't stay long enough to need the fridge, safe, or closet; but they exist.
Manager Response: Good Morning Nick K!  We appreciate you taking the time to leave a such a great review about your stay at our newly renovated hotel! :) We are only a short walk from our lobby to the Disney parks and to the Garden walk for dining options. We always try our best to accommodate our guests as best as we can whether it be storing your luggage or complimentary parking.  Our lobby is newly renovated and so is The Courtyard Cafe & Bar, Virginia is very nice and opens the coffee shop at 6:30am to 12pm and then again at 6pm - 11pm for beer and wine too, all guests can enjoy 10% the bill! :)

Summary: The hotel was clean and within walking distance to Disneyland. The staff was very friendly and helpful.  The beds were soft and very comfortable. There were good restaurants close by and parking was underground and secure.
Manager Response: Hi there marcieclark310,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review about your stay with us during your trip to Disneyland. We are so happy to hear that you were pleased with our front desk representatives and the beds too! We are only a short walk from the Garden Walk and to the Disney parks. We can't wait to have you and your family back for your next trip!

Summary: So close to Disney! Free parking! Check out the pizza place right next door yuuum!!!! Staff was nice, rooms were clean, beds were comfortable!!! Lots of dining options at the garden walk. Cvs and Walgreens across the street.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon Stacey B!  Thank you for taking the time to leave a good review about our hotel! We take pride in the fact that we do not charge for parking, WiFi and there is no resort fee, we are a family friendly hotel and appreciate that you loved our beds and staff! We can't wait to have you back the next time you're in Anaheim!

Summary: My husband snd I came to Anaheim for the very first time.  The hotel was absolutely amazing!!  Perfect customer service, very clean, courteous and when we had a long wait for our shuttle to the air port, they were very accomoditating and made us feel welcome the whole time.  I'll definitely be staying here again!!
Manager Response: Hello there Lianne L,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave such a great review about our property, we are more happy to hear that we were your first hotel in Anaheim! :) The staff at our property takes pride in providing all of our guests with award winning customer service. We are so glad to hear that you had a great stay and can't wait to have you back!

Summary: very nice place, people very kind and helpful, rooms comfortable and clean, pool and jacuzzi were clean and well kept. Was only there for one night but would definitely plan another trip very soon to stay for at least a few nights.
Manager Response: Hi there Tyla B!  Thank you so much for leaving this great review of our newly renovated property! We are proud of the new pool and jacuzzi and so happy to hear that you enjoyed it! We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: Loved the hotel. The room was wonderful. Very clean, spacious, and beautifully renovated. The staff was very friendly. Had the pleasure of meeting Iris and Stacy. Iris made sure our stay was more than perfect and had a smile on her face at all times. Will definitely be coming back to this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Hello there Elizabeth V,  We want to thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your stay at our newly renovated property. Thank you so much for mentioning Stacy and Iris, they work hard at the front desk to ensure every guest is greeted and their needs are met. We can't wait to have you back!

Summary: We absolutely loved our stay at the Wyndham Garden. The location is perfect, the rooms are VERY clean and extremely comfortable plus the staff was very nice.  We just wished we would have stayed longer, we will definitely be going back!!
Manager Response: Hi there MJones132018 thank you for your kind review of our hotel! We are conveniently located right behind  Disneyland and by the Garden Walk for some good food and fun. We are so happy to hear that the staff provided you with great customer service! For your next trip call us directly to book with a special rate! :)

Summary: Great staff, great rooms, great location. I am so glad stayed here. I always passed by this hotel when it was the Ramada Plaza, but never stayed. I've stayed at a few hotels on Katella and Harbor, but the Wyndham Garden is my new favorite hotel. The staff is just wonderful and the check was so quick. I love room. The beds here are among the most comfortable beds in the Anaheim resort area. I will definitely be staying here again.
Manager Response: Good Afternoon Desco_Fresh!  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a great about your stay. We appreciate you giving us a chance and now that you have, we're so happy to hear we're you're new favorite hotel in Anaheim! The front desk staff is always here for you and we treat each guest as if they were a guest at our own home. Our beds seem to be one of the staples of our newly renovated room, with so many guest inquiries even after check out about the beds we've taken down the brand and have it on hand for you! We hope to have you back soon!

Summary Heading: Front Desk Staff Was TOP NOTCH
Summary: This was our first time staying at the Wyndham Garden in Anaheim.  I was a little apprehensive since we usually stay at a hotel that is literally right across the street from Disneyland, but the price was right and the reviews were great, and we decided to make the booking.  This property is just around the corner from the park...and it only took us 15 minutes to walk (with little kids) back and forth from the main gate.   Let me start out by saying that the front desk staff at the Wyndham is second to none.  They constantly went out of their way to make sure that we felt welcome and were taken care of. After our initial check in, it seemed like I was greeted by name any time I came in or out of the lobby.  The rooms were large, and updated, and clean.  Some hotels feel like you
Manager Response: Good Morning Mat A,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave such a great and detailed review of your stay! Thank you for giving us a chance and staying with us during your visit to Disneyland, we are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the short walk from our hotel to the front gates. We take pride in our award winning customer service and I am so happy that you and your family were able to experience it!  As you know our property is newly renovated and we just opened our pool 2 months ago, just in time for your family to enjoy it! :) We apologize about the air conditioning inconvenience you experience but we are glad that our front desk agent was able to accommodate your family right away, we always try our best to resolve any issues at hand and do whatever we can to make your stay a comfortable one!  We can't wait to have you and your family back for your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: I stayed here with my family for the night so we could get and early start at Disney the next morning. The room was good size, clean, nicely decorated and the beds were comfy. They have a nice walk in shower with a rain shower head choice. We would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hi there felicialynn02!  We want to thank you for taking the time to leave a good review about your stay with us during your trip to Disneyland! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our beds and the new rain fall shower head, thank you for staying with us and coming back in the near future! We can't wait to see you and your family again!

Summary: I loved staying here.  It was so close to Disneyland and the free underground parking was awesome too.  There were 5 of us and we all fit very comfortably.  I loved the huge shower and housekeeping was awesome.  They noticed that we had a bunch of beach towels and no where to put them and one day we came back to the room and they had provided a huge garbage bag for us to put them in.  I mean, how cool is that?  I just truly loved staying here and would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Hello there sweetfrostingcakes!  We are so thrilled to receive such a great review of your stay! Our parking is always complimentary as well as the WiFi and no resort fee! Thank you for appreciating our housekeeping staff, they work hard so you don't have to while you stay with us! Our newly remodeled rooms come with the rain fall shower head for a relaxing rinse after a long day at the parks. We can't thank you enough for this kind review of our new property and our great housekeeping staff, we would love to have you and your family back!

Summary Heading: Fresh inside and out.  Close and Comfy.
Summary: We were on the top floor facing Katella.  This hotel was recently remodeled and name changed from the Ramada.  The beds are really comfy after a long day at DL.  We had a mini-suite but didn't have much more than a little space and possibly a bigger couch.  The walk to Disney is 15-20 minutes but easy and once you cross the street you are essentially on Disney property.  Having a CVS, Walgreens and 7-11 on across the street make it easy for those little needs that come up.
Manager Response: Hi therer gkbpro!  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a great review about our newly remodeled property. We are so glad to hear that the beds were comfortable after a long day at the Disneyland Parks, each two queen bed deluxe room comes with 2 queen beds, 1 pull out sofa, 1 mini fridge and a microwave. We are conveniently located on the corner of Harbor and Katella with plenty of stores like the CVS and Walgreens you mentioned, we hope to have you and your family back the next time you're in town!

Summary Heading: The best affordable option we've found in Anaheim thus far
Summary: We are annual passholders and have stayed many places throughout Anaheim.  We typically stay in a timeshare but when one is unavailable we have to stay at a hotel...oh no!! LOL! There are many nice hotels in the Anaheim area but you'll pay $350-$1k/night.  The Wyndham Garden is around $200/peak night, it was clean, it is updated, it is close by, and the staff is nice.  If we stay at a hotel in Anaheim, we'll be staying here most likely.
Manager Response: Hello there MrTonga!  We appreciate you taking the time to leave a nice review about our property! Being that we just renovated and switched to Wyndham Garden we do get a few Wyndham timeshare holders that give us a try and we end up being their favorite go to Wyndham when in Anaheim, thank you for giving us a shot! We are a family hotel and always try to keep our prices as reasonable as possible because we understand that traveling expenses add us, that is why WiFi and parking is complimentary and there is no resort fee.  We hope to have you back soon!

Summary: Very nice hotel. Friendly staff, clean. Nice and close to Disneyland Parks. Just a 15 minute walk. Everyone was very helpful at this hotel. We had no problems. I would stay there again! Great free parking in an underground secured area.
Manager Response: Good Morning kathy c,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave our new property a 5 star review! We are so happy to hear that you have a great stay and that our staff was friendly and went out of their way to assist in any way possible! We are still providing complimentary parking, WiFi and no resort fee, we can't wait to have you back the next time you're in Anaheim!

Summary: Hotel is a few years old and is walking distance to Disneyland. Rooms spacious and clean. Hotel has small restaurant and bar also in morning coffee shop open till noon for good coffee and pastries. Centrally located to fast food restaurants.
Manager Response: Hi there 274christyd,   We appreciate your review of our newly renovated property, we are only about a 7 minute walk from our lobby to Disneyland with an abundance of restaurants and stores near by for your convenience. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our Courtyard Cafe, we are proudly serving Seattle's Best Coffee til 12pm as you have listed. We hope to have you and your family back!

Summary Heading: Happy Hotel walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: From the front desk staff being polite happy and helpful to the beautiful room- luxury fittings, comfy beds, desk and lounge chair we were extremely happy and impressed with the Wyndham. Thank you for a great trip!
Manager Response: Thank you awilki450568 so much for leaving us a great review!   We are so glad to hear that the front desk staff provided you with great costumer service and that you were pleased with our newly renovated rooms! We just released the rooms a year or so ago and moved into our new lobby just 2 months ago, we are so grateful that our guests love the new property and hope to have you back!

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay for family vacation.
Summary: I definitely recommend this place for a family vacation. Walking distance to Disneyland and close distance to Cheesecake Factory and more restaurants option in the area with a few shopping stores around Anaheim Garden Walk.
Manager Response: Hi there kathkath10,  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave us a review for your stay! We are literally just behind Disneyland and a quick stroll to the Garden Walk where the Cheesecake Factory and other restaurants are conveniently located. Please feel free to call us to book for your next stay with a special promotion for returning guests!   We anticipate your arrival back.

Summary Heading: Great place and super close to Disney!
Summary: We loved our stay at Wyndham Garden Anaheim. It was super close to Disney and we could walk over. All staff we encountered were very friendly and helpful. The room was larger than I had expected and my daughter loved staying here as well. She called it a princess room due to the green wallpaper with leaves. :)
Manager Response: Hello ashcarter33!  Thank you so much for taking the time to write such a great review about our hotel and your stay, we really appreciate it! We are thrilled to hear that our staff provided you with award winning customer service during your stay, they always go above and beyond to ensure our guests are happy and comfortable. Our wallpaper was newly installed when the room was under renovation a year ago, we are happy that  your daughter loved it and enjoyed her little princess room, that is so cute! :) We hope to have you back soon and look forward to hearing from you!

Summary Heading: Perfect Last Night Stay in CA!
Summary: I was hotel hopping around California, and I decided to stay one night here before I left home in Texas. This hotel did not disappoint! The lobby area is very clean and they have a computer area, couch seating area, and mini coffee/breakfast bar in the middle. I received the best service here from the front desk and it was a breeze checking in. The room layout felt spacious, the bathroom area had great counter space (something I need for all my toiletries) and I immediately felt cozy when I got situated! Wished I stayed here longer! I would recommend this hotel for families, solo travelers, or those who want a high-quality hotel stay for a great price! Thank you for making my stay wonderful!
Manager Response: Hi there Reesa R!  We are so grateful for this amazing review of our newly renovated hotel Wyndham Garden Anaheim. We just opened our new lobby 2 months ago and appreciate your detailed review of how clean it is, that it includes our business center and extra chairs to lounge in front of our 85 inch TV. It is always an extra bonus when our award winning service provided by our staff is recognized and appreciated, they work hard so you don't have to on vacation!   Thank you so much for recommending this hotel and we hope to have you back soon! Best wishes from us in California to you in Texas!

Summary: Ozzy was very welcoming. Andy was very helpful and made sure I had a very comfortable stay. The location is great and the Roman showers are nice as well as the Indian restaurant downstairs. I’ll stay there again.
Manager Response: Hello MJames9000,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a stellar review about Ozzy and Andy, they both have been at this property for many years and always go out of their way to make sure guests are happy and comfortable. We are conveniently located right behind Disneyland and the City Of Anaheim has ART shuttle bus that does stop right in front of our hotel and drops you right off at the parks for only $5.50, which is an all day pass.  We are so happy to hear that you love the new showers and indian restaurant too! We anticipate your arrival back and look forward to seeing you soon!

Summary: Stacey at the front desk was so helpful during my stay. I went to Disneyland with my family but a couple of my kids were joining us a day later and she helped accommodate me and get them a parking pass and room key. They remodeled the hotel and it is nicer now. The beds are very comfortable and the pillows. It made it feel like I was at home. Do not get me started about the shower. The shower has a rainshower! Will definitely be staying here again. Thank you Stacey for helping me have a great stay after a long day at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Good Evening gianninahernandez97,  We want to thank you for taking the time out of your schedule to leave such a great review of our newly remodeled hotel! I am glad to hear that Stacey was very accommodating during your stay and was able to take care of your family too! We take pride great pride in having such a wonderful team at the front desk who always goes above and beyond. Thank you so much for wanting to stay with us again, call us anytime at the front desk and we can book your next reservation with special requests like a Disney View on the 4th floor or close by the elevators if need be, we are always here for you!

Summary: When we book our two rooms this was a Ramada Inn. We just found about two weeks be for our stay April 26 to April 30. the property was changing to a Windham.When we arrived we were very delighted to find a newly remodled Wyndham Garden Anaheim. The staff were very helpful from the first phone call to when we arrived . We arrived before our kids and family,The rooms were ready and beautiful very clean.It has free secure underground parking. We walked to Disneyland in the morning and back every night .  Everyone was very friendly and safe. we hope to return soon and plan on staying here at the Wyndham Garden again
Manager Response: Hi there Greg453,   I am so happy to hear that our front desk was helpful not only over the phone but during the duration of your stay too! You are correct, we were formerly the Ramada but recently transitioned into the Wyndham Garden Anaheim. Thank you for your kind compliment that the rooms were beautiful and clean, we pride ourselves in our top notch housekeeping service and free amenities, like the complimentary parking you mentioned, also there is not a resort fee and WiFi is free as well!   We are only a short walk to the Disneyland Parks and we hope to see you and your family soon, they were all very delightful!

Summary: The staff is amazing. The room was very clean. It was larger than we expected so the entire family was comfortable with no complaints. It’s convenient to the interstate. Has plenty of options for food. Check in and check out was easy. The remodel on the hotel was very classy.
Manager Response: Good Morning Anita M,  I am so glad to hear that you are pleased with our staff and the rooms. Reviews like this one is what we aim for, we are always happy to hear that your stay was a great one without any complaints! Our newly remodeled hotel has a modern feel to it with the new lobby furniture and water fall shower heads in the bathrooms.   We look forward to having you back soon!

Summary Heading: Best hotel we have ever stayed at
Summary: The staff was super helpful and friendly went out of their way to help us. Always checked in on us when ever we came back from the park and made sure we had water to take with us. It made our stay easier
Manager Response: Hi F3374XOmichellep,  We appreciate your review about our new property and how great our front desk took care of you and your family during your stay. When we do have water bottles at the front desk, we always try to hand them out to our guests because we understand after a long day at Disneyland any little way we can help goes a long way.   Thank you for your business and we anticipate your arrival back!

Summary: Was satisfied with mostly everything, from front office staff to room size and cleanliness, comfortable beds and pillows, good channels. So close to Disneyland, about a 10 min walk. Pool area was a little small but nice, only thing Hot tub/ Jacuzzi was pretry dirty.
Manager Response: Hello sortiz464139,  We appreciate you taking the time to leave us a 5 star review of your stay! We are glad to hear that you were pleased with our front staff and the beds, we just replaced them about a year ago and its been a great investment so far since guests even call us months later after their stay to inquire about the bed brand, so we're always here for you even after your departure!  As for the swimming pool and jacuzzi, we apologize that we had to place the spa out of order for a day in order to keep it maintained and up to our guest's standards. Please feel free to contact me directly when you make your next booking, I will make sure the amenities are in perfect working order for your next visit with us!  We hope to see you and your family this summer!

Summary: We celebrated our mom's life in heaven that day, and The welcoming of the front desk clerk Stacey made a Huge difference. She is very accommodating, professional and sweet.The sleeping room was up to par. We will definitely stay here again. And everything is clean.
Manager Response: Hi Shirley M!  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave a review about Stacey and how clean our newly renovated hotel is. We are glad that she was able to make your stay comfortable during this time, and we are sorry for your lost. Thank you so much for wanting to stay with us again! Call us anytime to reserve a room with a special returning guest rate.

Summary: This was my second visit to this hotel ... the first time was in 2012 and it was formerly Ramada inn and now under new management ... close proximity to Disneyland is the icing on the cake ...Right from the time of checking in , Ozzie at the main desk made us comfortable ... the rooms were good and clean and each and every one in the staff was very friendly and courteous ... they also make arrangements for transport if you require ..they have an inhouse tour guide called Johnny who we utilised for the better half of the day and the tour was worth the money. There is no breakfast included in package as i guess they do not have a kitchen or similar arrangement .they have an independent restaurant near the lobby called Gandhi which also incidentally has undergone a management
Manager Response: Good Morning sunil_devdas,  I am happy to hear that Ozzie made your visit back to us a great and comfortable one! He is a gem and always goes above and beyond to accommodate guests, especially returning ones! We were the Ramada Plaza and just transitioned into the Wyndham Garden Anaheim about 2 months ago. We appreciate your past business and thank you for coming back home to us when you're in Anaheim!   Our local driver Johny is always affordable and prompt with great service and knowledge of the area. We apologize that you were unsatisfied with Gandhi and rest assure we will be opening our very own restaurant in it's place shortly.   We are conveniently located right behind Disneyland and within walk distant of the Garden Walk. We anticipate your arrival back and will always be here for you!   Sincerely, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager.

Summary Heading: Fantastic hotel in Anaheim close to Disney!
Summary: This hotel was reserved for a stay for my family while visiting in Anaheim.  We stayed for 4 nights and every day was great!  The service in the hotel, especially Stacey at the front desk, was top notch and deserves special recognition.  There are not many times where people still go above and beyond but this hotel and its staff absolutely made us feel well cared for and important.  The rooms were clean and spacious with enough room for comfortable sleeping arrangements for my wife and I with our 3 children.  Our room came with 2 queen beds and a sofa bed.  The bathroom was equipped with a shower only but the rain shower type of shower head was relaxing and appreciated after a long day at Disney.  The pool and hot tub were also enjoyed by our family.  We never had anyone at the
Manager Response: Hi Luis M,  Thank you for taking the time to review our new property and for complimenting Stacey, she is grateful for your feedback and says Thank you! At our property, we take pride in our award winning customer service provided by each and every one of our front desk and management staff, it is an extra bonus for us when we are blessed with great reviews and appreciate the recognition!  We are happy to hear that the deluxe family suite with the sofa fit you and your family comfortably, we just opened our pool about 3 weeks ago so everything is newly renovated and we're pleased to hear you enjoyed it. Our Courtyard Cafe did just recently open and we are proudly serving Seattle's Best, we try to keep our prices as reasonable as we can because we understand traveling and family vacations can get costly, we are always here for you!  Once again, Thank you so much for leaving this stellar review and we can't wait to have you and your family back!

Summary: excellent new location  and a new place which is close to convention center and Disneyland  as well as many shops and restaurants . Would rate it more when they get their bar installed. Just opened in March 2018 Great staff
Manager Response: Good evening Donald,  We appreciate you taking the time to review our new property, we apologize that the bar is not opened yet but we are serving Seattle's Best Coffee in the Courtyard Cafe, as for adult beverages for our guests you get 15% off your entire bill at Chambers, the restaurant inside our sister property hotel just right next door. We are just a short walking distant to Disneyland and the Garden Walk. We can't wait to see you and your family again!

Summary: Highly recommend. All the staff were so warming and welcoming, Stacy and Mickey went above and beyond their services and even arranged early morning check in for us with side by side rooms. Rooms were always cleaned daily and very comfortable, spacious and contemporary. Would stay here again for sure!
