Manager Response: Hi Donna M,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such an Excellent review from your recent stay with us at Wyndham Garden Anaheim! I am so glad our staff was able to accommodate an early check and find you  great rooms for you. Stacey and Micky are definitely a gem here at our property and I love to hear that Stacey and Micky made you feel welcome and comfortable while you were staying. The highest compliment we can receive is that you would definitely stay again with us, and i look forward to personally welcoming you back upon your next trip!

Summary: Very Clean, modern look, the staff very friendly I recommend this to everyone 5 Star quality. When enter lobby u get this nice welcome from the Agent. There so nice and professional. This was our first time
Manager Response: Thank you so much DJ_JUMBO for your kind review of our newly renovated hotel and lobby! We just moved into this lobby a little over a month ago and appreciate all the great feedback, we are very pleased to hear that you are happy with our staff, we work hard so you don't have to while you stay with us! We can't wait to have you and your family back the next time you're in Anaheim.

Summary: I love this hotel.  We have stayed here twice now and each time have no problem walking to and from the Disneyland parks as well as nearby stores and food.  The best part aside from the updated interior is the free parking.  Hotel parking can be quite pricey in the area, so when a hotel offers free parking I jump on it!  Each member of the staff that we came across was super friendly and helpful and the hotel was very quiet and relaxing.  Definitely going to try and stay here again, and again, and again.
Manager Response: Hello elmntlizz83,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a nice review from your recent stay with us! I am so glad to hear that you liked our complimentary underground parking and our location is perfect for you, and most of all that our staff were super nice for you!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland adventure!

Summary: The location is ideal and not a bad walk to Disneyland. The hotel is still under constructions which is fine. The coffee/breakfast bar is non-existent as well as the regular bar as there is no one to tend to it. That was one of the main reasons we booked this hotel to unwind after a day at the park and to recharge in the morning and that wasn't happening so quiet a disappointment. Also the room wasn't cleaned very well to the point I had to write a note asking housekeeping to please take out the overflowing trash, replace the K-cups coffee with regular not decaf (they gave us all decaf then after my note gave me 1 of 6 regular), and to give us more paper coffee cups. These are little things that should be noticed when housekeeping is properly cleaning a room. Also the linens are
Manager Response: Thank you Kati,   I am very sorry to hear that our housekeeping staff did not meet your standards. We are working very hard to have our housekeeping working at 100% accuracy. I do appreciate you taking the time to leave this comment as it helps us to do so.

Summary: This place had one of the cleanest hotels with the nicest staff! I will definitely be staying here again! The front desk staff was extremely pleasant and helpful, going above and beyond to make sure we had a great stay!
Manager Response: Hello Khardcstle91,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such an excellent review from your recent stay with us at Wyndham Garden Anaheim! I am so glad our staff was extremely pleasant and helpful! The highest compliment we can receive is that you would definitely stay again with us, and I look forward to personally welcoming you back upon your next trip!

Summary: The hotel is located very close to Disneyland. The hotel offers free, secure, underground parking. The room was quiet and clean. The location of the hotel is very close to stores and restaurants. We will stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello Deborah P,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us at Wyndham Garden Anaheim. I am glad to hear we are in a perfect location for you to the park, restaurants, and stores.    I look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary Heading: Excellent property whithin walking distance of Disneyland and convention center.
Summary: This hotel was very clean, with great rooms with lots of charging ports. The decor was modern. The location  was within walking distance of Disneyland, convention center and numerous restaurants. It was a 10 minute drive to the outlet.
Manager Response: Hello Alisa R,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! I am so glad to hear we are in the perfect location for you and that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms & amenities such as additional charging ports.   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney adventure!!

Summary: Great front desk staff. Very welcoming and just a joy to talk to. Great room. Brand new and completely remodeled. Top notch in every respect. If you are going to Disneyland this hotel is the perfect place to be. Very affordable and parking is included. They care that your stay is a good one and it will be.
Manager Response: Hello C4788JBmarks,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us at Wyndham Garden Anaheim! I am so glad to here you enjoyed our newly upgraded rooms, our location was perfect for you, and most off all that our staff was so amazing!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Do not forget anything of importance in your room!
Summary: Our daughter became sick while visiting Disney and as I waited to see a doctor, my husband went back to quickly grab our stuff and checkout.  Unfortunately he forgot an object of importance to my daughter. We called for days and were told they would follow-up with housekeeping who days later claimed that nothing was turned in. I'm really disappointed that this hotel had no regard for our personal property or care about an upset little girl. Please make sure you triple check your room before you leave.
Manager Response: Hello L0vesweet,  Thank you for staying with us recently. It is unfortunate that the item was not found in the room that you stayed in, however I can assure you that anything that is left behind in our rooms is turned in to lost and found. I apologize for this huge inconvenience, please let me know if I can be of any further assistance to you and your family.

Summary: Very comfortable pillow top beds. Our room was very quiet and clean. The bathroom didn’t have anyplace to put our toiletries. The little counter around the sink (about 7”) is where they put your towels.1/2 mile to Disneyland. About a 15 min. Walk  or a $7 Uber ride. It was great for what we needed. Just a place to get a good night sleep for a reasonable price near Disneyland. Would have been nice if they offered continental breakfast, but they did offer free parking!
Manager Response: Hello seedlite,  Thank you so much for the great review from your recent stay with us at Wyndham Garden Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear that you loved the hotel pillow top beds! and that the was room was very quiet and comfortable. I have reviewed the reservation/stay and the room you occupied was an accessible room; these rooms commonly does not have additional counter space; I will definitely forward your suggestion to the room division department manager.    I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Fantastic Stay! Great base for Disney
Summary: We've been to Anaheim (for Disneyland!) a number of times, and we thought we'd give this hotel a try - as the rate seemed particularly good when we booked.  Our newly renovated room was super shiny and comfortable - absolutely lovely! The beds were so comfy. The exercise room was a good size (always had it to myself), with top quality new equipment. Parking was also easy and plentiful, and really appreciated that it was included in the price (lots of other hotels in the area charge extra).  The hotel is excellently located. A ten minute walk to Disney, with some very nice restaurants just down the street.  Finally a huge thumbs up to the reception staff, they were all so friendly  - even when grappling with a power cut that took out the whole block (not much the hotel could do
Manager Response: Hello Ian D,  Thank you so much for your wonderful review about our hotel! We appreciate you taking the time to leave such great comments about our staff, amenities, and attention to detail. I am glad that the fitness center suited your needs.  I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms! Please do not hesitate to contact us directly if you plan on returning to the Wyndham Garden Anaheim. We would love to welcome you back!

Summary: My family and I stayed here the night before going to Disneyland so not to deal with morning traffic from the South Bay Area to Anaheim. The rooms were clean and comfortable. Convenient to Disneyland and would stay here again
Manager Response: Hello Leasa,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Wyndham Garden Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms. It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and I do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!  Thank you again and see you soon!

Summary Heading: Our home away from home in Anaheim
Summary: We keep coming back to this hotel again and again for one simple reason, the staff go out of their way to make sure that it is the holiday experience that we all want to have, it is our home away from home. All of that under the trying conditions of a full refurbishment. We WILL be back and do not consider staying anywhere else now that we have discovered this gem.
Manager Response: Hello Glenvillan,  Thank you so much for returning to our property again and for taking the time to leave such a great review! It makes me happy to hear  that the staff was so friendly and helpful.   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Nice hotel, good price, walking distance to Disney
Summary: We spent 3 nights at this hotel last week. We had 5 people and were able to get side by side rooms. The rooms are very clean, and well equipped with fridge, microwave, iron, hair dryer and safe. The beds were very comfortable. The front desk staff were very friendly. The pool was not open but we were given a key to the hotel next door and could use their pool. The location is excellent if you are planning a trip to Disneyland. It took about 12 minutes to walk to the parks. There were lots if restaurants and stores nearby. We were able to buy breakfast provisions at CVS right across the street and have food and drinks in our room. I would not hesitate to stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Hello Zoe,  We would like to thank you for posting such wonderful review of our hotel. Your positive feedback continues to drive us to do our best and provide our guests with exceptional stays. We look forward to serving you soon.

Summary: I went on a vacation with my family and it was very pleasant! Very close to Disney which was our primary reason for the visit. The hotel looked very new and always smelled very clean. The housekeeping was amazing! Fastest elevators I have ever used!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your kind words about our property! We appreciate you taking the time to leave great comments about our housekeeping staff as well as our proximity to Disneyland. I did notice that your review was 2 stars, if there is anything I or the staff can do to enhance our guest experience I would love to get your feedback. We hope to welcome you back soon to the Wyndham Garden Anaheim!

Summary: Friendly staff with excellent service and accommodations. Very clean rooms. Free parking. Microwave was a plus compared to what other hotels offered. And the price was phenomenal compared to Disney hotels. We typically pay to stay at Disneyland, but after our stay here at the Wyndham, I will never stay at Disney hotels again. Thank you!!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your fantastic review of our hotel! We absolutely love to hear that the staff and accommodations suited your needs when staying in the Anaheim area. We plan to open up a brand new cafe/bar in the lobby, we hope to welcome you back to the Wyndham Garden when we have even more accommodations for our wonderful guests!

Summary Heading: Great Service, Nice Place, Fantastic Staff, Close to Disneyland
Summary: I was in town for Disneyland's Star Wars Day celebration with my little nephews. With all the energy that I spent on planning, gathering all the stuff, and driving up to the hotel, I was exhausted during the check in process. I was pleasantly surprised by the warm greeting we received from the Stacey and the staff, they were able to answer all of my questions regarding the room, I felt so relieved. They informed me of all the amenities available to me during my stay, as well as transportation to and from Disneyland. The room was extremely clean, the queen size beds/pillows were so comfortable, the bathroom and shower were of modern design, made it convenient for use. The attentiveness and keen attention to detail displayed by the staff really made this trip a wonderful
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your wonderful review about our hotel! We appreciate you taking the time to leave such great comments about our staff, cleanliness, and attention to detail. We are ecstatic to hear that after a long day of travel our staff was able to ease the stress and find you a great room. Stacey is definitely a gem here at our property and I love to hear that she made you feel informed and comfortable while you were staying. Please do not hesitate to contact us directly if you plan on returning to the Wyndham Garden Anaheim. We would love to welcome you back!

Summary: It was our third stay at this property. We keep going back to this one because of the awesome people working there!!! They are professional and make us feel super welcomed. Their updated rooms are very nice and clean. They have washer & dryer and free parking. It is about 10 minute walk to Disneyland. I highly recommend this hotel!!
Manager Response: Hello Heejunge7  Thank you so much for returning to our property again and for taking the time to leave such a great review! It makes me happy to hear that you like the renovations that we have done, and that the staff was so friendly and helpful. The highest compliment we can receive is that you would recommend this hotel, and I look forward to personally welcoming you back upon your next trip!

Summary: Stayed here at the end of April 2018 for one night. The desk staff is AWESOME!  Stacey at the front desk was super friendly and helpful, even at midnight when we checked in post-park closing.  And whoever helped us the morning of our arrival (I think he was the reservations manager?) went out of his way to help as well.  The property is close to the parks (10-ish minute walk) and car parking was free for both days, even though we stayed one night (it's roughly $20 to park at Disney, which actually takes longer to get to).   Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Hello Jlevy77,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Wyndham Garden Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you! Yes Stacey is AWESOME! The highest compliment we can receive is that you would definitely stay again with us. It sound like we are in the perfect location for you and I look forward to personally welcoming you back upon your next Disney Trip!!

Summary Heading: Great Place, Nice Service, Close to Disneyland
Summary: This a very nice place to stay. It is in walking distance to Disneyland. Rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable. Staff is welcoming and very helpful. Have stayed there many times and have enjoyed it each time.
Manager Response: Hello Wyndham324  Thank you for reviewing  your recent stay with us at Wyndham Garden Anaheim. I am so glad to hear you liked the new rooms and the comfortable beds, and that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next vacation trip!!

Summary: We got a GREAT deal on a King suite on Priceline for one night, mid-week (about half the price of other sites). I knew that the hotel had recently been renovated and changed names. I was worried that because we'd gotten a great price, we'd be stuck in one of the old, unrenovated rooms. I could not have been more wrong.   Our room was band new, super clean and HUGE. The bathtub was HUGE (though the design of the faucet is really odd and gets water everywhere.) We went across the street to CVS and bought bubble bath. The bathroom does need more towel hooks or bars. I know that sounds dumb, but, like many hotels, they'd like guests to air dry their towels and use them more than one day. I do that at home, so I'm fine with that when I travel. Saves the environment a bit, and all.
Manager Response: Hello Maggie3661  We would like to thank you for posting such wonderful review of our hotel. Your positive feedback continues to drive us to do our best and provide our guests with exceptional  stays. We look forward to serving you soon.

Summary: We had a fantastic stay at the Wyndham Garden Anaheim.  The location is an easy 10 minute walk to Disneyland, and local buses run just down the road.  The newly updated decor is beautiful, and the staff are friendly and very accommodating.  I would gladly stay there again in the future!
Manager Response: Hello Jlparke,  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us at Wyndham Garden Anaheim. I am so glad to hear you liked the new rooms, and that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!!

Summary Heading: Fantastic stay, recently remodeled, great location
Summary: Booked for a 2 night stay, fantastic value for the location. Arrived early, to pre-checkin and get parking pass, dropped car off, came back later to get room. Front desk staff all very engaging and friendly. Great look, this was my first stay here. The room was fantastic, modern look, all re-done, huge TV, pod coffee maker, closet safe. Beds pillows were soooo comfy, super pillow top, but still firm. Close enough to walk to the Parks, or try to grab ART 6. Close walk to food, Subway, Bubba Gump's, Cheesecake Factory, Garden Walk, ect. Wyndham currently doesn't offer free breakfast, but I knew that while booking. There is a restaurant attached to the lobby, that has a good breakfast buffet.
Manager Response: Hello Sept1967,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us at Wyndham Garden Anaheim! I am so glad to hear you enjoyed our newly upgraded rooms with our amazing amenities such TV, pod coffee maker and in room safe.  It sounds that the location was perfect for you, and most off all that our staff was so amazing!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Very friendly and helpful staff. There was construction going on in main lobby so cant comment on the Breakfast or Bar. Grounds were nice. Pool was closed for some reason as well.we were allowed to use pool at hotel next door if we wanted. But was a bit inconvienant
Manager Response: Hello guylikestotravel,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Wyndham Garden Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed the new grounds and as well as that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!   Thank you again and see you soon!

Summary: We loved it here! Just a short walking distance to Disneyland. The staff was amazingly awesome!!! We arrived early to check in because we took the red eye flight from Hawaii and our rooms were ready and they were able to check us in early. They helped my father get an electric scooter for our entire stay at a discounted rate, which was delivered to the hotel lobby within 30 minutes. The staff greeted us every time we got back to the hotel lobby to ask us how our day went! They were all sooo friendly!! Shoutout to all their wonderful staff! The rooms were nicely remodeled . We had two queen size beds and a pull out couch which worked out perfect for 4 adults and my 21 month old son . Free parking which was awesome!! Can’t wait to come back and stay here again!
Manager Response: Hello Kristine,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Wyndham Garden Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms and as well as that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!  It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and I do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!  Thank you again and see you soon!

Summary: Location is very convenient . Near to targets and restaurants . Free shuttle bus to Disneyland . Free breakfast for your whole stay . Do consider it if u are bringing your family or kids here . U won't regret it
Manager Response: Dear Jocelyn L,  I really appreciate this nice 5 star review of your recent stay with us, I am so happy to read that you were able to enjoy how close of a walk we are to convenient stores and restaurants at the GardenWalk down the street. The ART shuttle bus from the city of Anaheim is $6 per adult and $2.50 per child for an all day bus pass, breakfast in our Courtyard Restaurant is $10 for 1 item plus a drink. Thank you for the recommendation and we can't wait to welcome you and your family back.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: We stayed here for a cheer competition, had to walk to convention center. Very close to walk and lots of restaurants close by. Downtown Disney is easy access and quiet in our room, not to mention the remodel is super modern and elegant.
Manager Response: Dear whitegoldtan,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us this great 5 star review of your recent stay. I am so happy to hear you loved how close of a walk we are to the Disney Parks and that you enjoyed our newly remodeled property. We can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in Anaheim.  Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: The facility was upgraded from Ramada Plaza to Wyndham Garden just one day before we arrived. It took 15-min walk for us to Disney entrances. There are some restaurants very close the hotel, so dinner is not a problem.
Manager Response: Dear Ralph Y,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us this great five star review of your recent stay with us. I am so happy to read that you enjoyed how close of a walk we are to the Disney Parks and restaurants at the Garden Walk too! I hope we get the chance to welcome you and your family back soon.  Warmest Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Amazing staff (Stacey) & 7 mins to the park
Summary: This hotel is undergoing renovations but they did not bother us at all. We stayed in a renovated room... the bed was soooo comfortable it was amaze after a 12 hour day at the parks. The walk is only about 7 mins. There is restaurants and stores beside and across from you. Free parking. I would 100% stay here again. Also, Stacey at the front desk is so nice, she remembers your name, asks how your day was. Very nice!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hip-Hip Hooray to The Ramada Plaza Hotel Anahiem
Summary: My experience at the Ramada Plaza Hotel Anaheim was wonderful. I enjoyed my WonderCon and Disneyland weekend. Special shout out the marvelous staff members and to STACEY who made staying at the Ramada Plaza Hotel Anaheim simply amazing! Keep up the great work everyone, I'll come back again during my next trip to Disneyland. Cheers!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: unaware That the hotel was under construction when we...
Summary: unaware That the hotel was under construction when we booked it. Room smelted like rot. We swapped rooms and 2nd was was fine but there was an an empty liquor bottle and candy wrapper left behind on room. No breakfast but maybe due to construction? We needed up eating at Starbucks across the street. Staff was great. It was a quick walk to DL, but we will stay elsewhere next time.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Their renovation was proceeding. Due to that, the atomosphere was not good. There are a drugstore, casual restarutrants nearby. They were so convinient. The stuffs were kind. It was helpful. When I asked for booking the Sky shuttle, a stuff struggled for me to do it and managed to do it. Thanks a lot.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything in the room was great and staff was very friendly and helpful, I especially like the rain shower.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was under construction but that didn't dampen the service or the quality. There was no noise associated with construction while we were there. The room was clean and comfy for our family of 5. We were a very short walk to Disneyland which was nice. After checkout we were able to leave our car in the parking garage while we finished our day at California Adventure.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location just a short walk from the convention center, and service was superb.Stacey at the front desk was amazing!She helped us with all of our needs and was very pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Jason S,  Thank you so much for this great 5 star review of your recent stay with us! It was my pleasure hosting your stay and ensuring you had an amazing one at that! I can't wait to welcome you back the next time you're in town!   Best Regards, Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary: Do not be alarmed about the parking space upon arrival as there is a garage underneath with plenty of space. Everything is/was renovated. Beds comfortable, big screen tv, nice shower. Pool almost done. Restaurant on site. No free breakfast. Completely non-smoking site. Location is ideal. Pizza, Subway, Walgreens, 7-11, much more. A short walk(10-15min) to Disneyland was such a benefit. All staff was polite and courteous. No concerns or complaints. Good stuff going on here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Awesome beds with down comforters, remodeled rooms, nice modern high end decor, excellent price, good location and very clean. The only issue was that they are doing construction so the pool was closed. They offered us to use the one at the Indigo hotel as they own that property. I was concerned about the construction when we arrived and the front desk man didn’t care, he said we were welcome to go somewhere else. We only stayed because another guest overheard us and told us how nice the rooms were. Then they told him they saved his business and again he didn’t care and shrugged his shoulders. Other than that it was fantastic. We would stay there again when the pool is finished.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Checking in was one of the BEST experiences I’ve had arriving at a hotel. Stacey greeted us and was friendly, courteous and answered all our questions. She made us feel welcome and taken care of from the moment we walked in.   Unlike some photos, all the hotel rooms are now renovated. I think they are also going through a name change from Ramada Plaza to Wyndham Plaza. The new rooms are beautiful, clean, quiet and comfortable. Bathrooms are large, clean and new with large showers. Parking at the hotel is free in a secure underground lot and Disneyland was within easy walking distance.  Overall a wonderfully pleasant experience, and I will definitely be staying at this hotel again in the future. And thank you Stacey at the front desk for your hospitality!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We thoroughly enjoyed our recent stay. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful. The room was spacious, with very comfortable beds, lovely bathroom and great shower pressure. The walking distance to Disneyland was so convenient. We would highly recommend this hotel and would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Wish we could take the bed home
Summary: Even during a renovation, an exceptional experience. Without exception, the front desk people were smiling, friendly and eager to help. No phony smile here. We got upgraded to a king suite (sometimes good stuff happens unexpectedly) and it was terrific, from the floor to the shower. We even got to see Disney fireworks both nights, from our window. Did I mention the bed? Best sleep in years. We would not recommend the restaurant for breakfast.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Although they are still undergoing renovations at this property, the rooms are very nice.  We have stayed at this property many time throughout the years, and we have always been happy.  The one thing we do miss is the free breakfast.  Even without this perk, we are still happy to stay here.  The big draw for us is the secured parking garage.  If we ever return to Anaheim, we will stay at the newly renovated property.  I believe the name will change, but I'm sure we'll find it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Ramada. It was clean, comfortable with current decor. Loved the shower pressure and the rainfall/removable shower-head. The lighting in the bathroom was cool, though it made it a little hard to see when applying make-up.  The bed was comfortable. My only real complaint was the monitoring the room temperature. If you wanted it cooled off in the room and turned on the air it blasted out very well but was kinda loud. Maybe I didn't know how to use the thermostat properly but I just wanted the room to remain at a comfortable temperature and not get too stuffy without turning on the air. It was in walking distance to Disneyland/California Adventure. The front desk was very helpful and courteous. We also liked the secure parking garage. We would definitely
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: In midst of renovation but still nice
Summary: The common areas were still under renovation but the rooms are all new and very nice and comfortable, great location. Will be even better once it’s fully renovated
Manager Response: Dear jenniopp,  Thank you for taking the time to leave us this great review of your recent stay. We hope to have you back so you can fully experience our completed renovations!  Best Regards,  Stacey Bui Guest Service Manager

Summary Heading: Comfortable beds and pillows, great rooms, service not so great.
Summary: The service at checking in was not so great. I asked the gentleman that checked me in to see if he could put me in a room that would be close to my daughters' but he made no effort to do that. I then asked him where the cart to carry the baggage was and he simply said it was not available he then got on the phone and proceeded to ignore me while I was still asking questions. We made several trips to the car to get our luggage while they were just there watching. I didn't ask for anything else or made any requests during my stay there so I don't know if they would have been accommodating or not. Also the coffeemaker in the room did not work. The rooms were very clean, roomy and comfortable. I would stay there again just  for that and give the front desk another chance.
Manager Response: susanalizarraga4  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us. It is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests. I am disappointed to hear that the front desk staff member on duty did not handle the situation better for you and you left with this bad impression. I do ask that during your next trip to Anaheim you please contact me personally and give me the chance to ensure you have a flawless stay so you can experience why we are such a premier hotel destination in the resort area. Although an apology does not change the situations you encountered, i do enlist one with all sincerity, and look forward to hearing from you in the future!

Summary: Excellent location 12-15 walk to the Disney Parks. Great free parking, very accommodating if you're going to the parks during the day. Revamping the hotel currently, but the updates are almost finished and look great. Loved the little snack pack at check out, such a nice surprise :)
Manager Response: ndavika,  We would like to thank you for posting such wonderful review of our hotel. Your positive feedback continues to drive us to do our best and provide our guests with exceptional stays. We look forward to serving you soon.

Summary Heading: Wonderful Disneyland Trip made better with a stay here.
Summary: Wonderful stay for a Disneyland Trip. Great location. Comfy beds and lovely bathroom and amenities. Nice tv. Keurig in room and fridge with freezer compartment and microwave. Wonderful friendly staff. Free wifi and free parking.
Manager Response: biancachu  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am so glad to hear you enjoyed our newly upgraded rooms, our amazing Keurig coffee maker with complimentary k-cup coffee, fridge & microwave. It sound our location was perfect for you, and most off all that our staff was so amazing!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: This hotel is our first choice to stay while going to Disneyland. We love to leave the car at the garage for some days (it is very conveniently located, considering all the facilities around it). The rooms are super clean and calm. And the best, all of that come with a very reasonable price.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us! I am so glad to hear that we are in a perfect location for you!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Beds were very comfortable. Use towel softener because your towels felt rough and hard. The room was perfect for me for what I needed. It was very nice and clean. Even though the hotel was being renovated I enjoyed my stay very much. I didn't hear any loud noises.
Manager Response: mpooneill,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms and the comfortable beds!  It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and I do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!  Thank you again and see you soon!

Summary: Our stay was so nice. Even though the hotel was going through renovation/upgrade. It did not affect us in any one. The room was very clean as well as the bathroom. The WiFi was great. Hotel staff was very friendly upon check in. Our room had a mini fridge and a microwave that was a great surprise. They also had a coffee maker with three different coffees so nice for our early mornings.
Manager Response: camachomom11,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am so glad to hear you enjoyed our newly upgraded rooms, complimentary WiFi,  and most of all that our staff was so amazing!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Great remodel that is almost complete. Rooms clean and comfortable with refrigerator, microwave, safe and very comfortable beds. Large room and nice shower. Short walk to Disneyland. We loved our stay!
Manager Response: Michelle W  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am so glad to hear you enjoyed our newly upgraded rooms and our location was perfect for you!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: The staff was very pleasant, professional and attentive. They were in the midst of a remodel but kept the area as tidy as it could be while the workers were working. The bed was so very comfortable.
Manager Response: 1LMH,  Thank you for leaving a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am glad to hear that you enjoyed our new rooms and the comfortable beds! I am thrilled that our staff was so helpful for you!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: Still doing a remodel and the smell of new paint and carpet is all over. This is really a nice place take advantage of going while everyone is so nice still.They should have the pool and spa done by summer and you can go to the hotel next door for a good happy hour at the hotel indigo.I will be going back if they keep their rates affordable.The beds are great and they have parking under hotel so its all good
Manager Response: istanbulrocks  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am glad you liked our new rooms & beds were so comfortable!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland trip!

Summary Heading: Check in was awesome danelia made it effortless!! And Ozzie...
Summary: Check in was awesome danelia made it effortless!! And Ozzie made check out a breeze!! By far one of the best hotels i have ever stayed at!!
Manager Response: Liset M,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear that the staff was exceptional friend and helpful! specially Daniela & Ozzie. It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and I do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip! Thank you again and see you soon

Summary: I absolutely love the remodel they’ve done to this hotel. The rooms are very clean and the beds are the most comfortable thing ever. My one big issue on this trip was the doorway to connect the next guest room is not insulated/sound proofed AT ALL!!! The family next door woke us up at 5:45 in the morning with talking, babies crying, hair dryers, running around, etc. we knocked on door to see if they’d keep it down but it didn’t stop. If I were to return I would request a room that does not have the ability to connect to another room.
Manager Response: candice222018  We would like to thank you for posting such wonderful review of our hotel. Your positive feedback continues to drive us to do our best and provide our guests with exceptional stays. We look forward to serving you soon.

Summary: We have stayed in many hotels across the street from the entrance to Disneyland on South Harbor Bvd. They are closer, for sure, but not as upmarket. We decided to look a little further out but still walkable.  It is one kilometre from the hotel to the main entrance of Disneyland. It’s an easy walk, and yes the hotel is undergoing renovation but for us it was still worth it. We were barely there during the day to be inconvenienced by any noise or clutter. It is close to Anaheim Garden Walk for food and shopping as well as a few places around the corner, various eateries, Ihop, Starbucks, Subway, chainstores CVS, Walgrens, Seven Eleven, etc to name a few.  We found the staff exceptionally friendly and helpful. Highly recommend this place.
Manager Response: PhoebeNJ  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear that the staff was exceptional friend and helpful! It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and I do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip! Thank you again and see you soon

Summary: Super nice customer service. The room was phenomenal. The beds are like sleeping on a cloud. Best place I’ve stayed so far. Walking distance to Disneyland. Would definitely recommend to family and friends.
Manager Response: danagirl78  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms and the comfortable beds, as well as that our staff provided outstanding customer service.  It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and I do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!  Thank you again and see you soon!

Summary: This hotel was going through major remodeling but our room was very clean and the staff was very friendly and helpful!  Once construction is done this place is going to be awesome.  Great stay overall!!
Manager Response: ryantinez,  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. I am so glad to hear you liked the new rooms, and that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!!

Summary Heading: Stay somewhere else for a better value
Summary: Changed name from Ramada to Wyndham and did not communicate change to customers. We were without hotel room keys for 2 days. Only 1 working elevator. Refrigerator not on and food spoiled. I have much more to say.
Manager Response: sheenaoverton,  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us. It is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests. I do apologize that the renovations did not meet your expectations and appreciate you letting us know. This is typically stated upon booking as well as it is posted on all of our websites and third party booking channels. I do ask that during your next trip to Anaheim you please contact me personally and give me the chance to ensure you have a flawless stay so you can experience why we are such a premier hotel destination in the resort area. Although an apology does not change the situations you encountered, i do enlist one with all sincerity, and look forward to hearing from you in the future!

Summary: I did not spend much time in the room. I was on a business trip and it was constantly non-stop. The room was very clean and well kept and easy to unwind after a crazy busy dat. I left my phone charger in the room and I felt like the hotel missed an opportunity to WOW me with reaching out to me and offering to mail it back. Also, it's important to note that the reason I ranked the appearance as a 3 is because the hotel was undergoing renovations during my stay.
Manager Response: Josh422,  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us. It is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests. I do apologize that the lost & found department did not meet your expectations and appreciate you letting us know.  I do ask that during your next trip to Anaheim you please contact me personally and give me the chance to ensure you have a flawless stay so you can experience why we are such a premier hotel destination in the resort area. Although an apology does not change the situations you encountered, i do enlist one with all sincerity, and look forward to hearing from you in the future!

Summary Heading: Under construction...not a great stay for the price and condition.
Summary: This hotel was under construction. The only restaurant was an Indian Restaurant which I do not prefer.  All amenities were next door at the inde hotel - pool, fitness, bar, snacks, etc. The staff tried to make up for the noise and mess, but I feel we were overcharged for the condition and inconvenience.
Manager Response: NotoGirls,  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us. It is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests. I do apologize that the renovations did not meet your expectations and appreciate you letting us know.   I do ask that during your next trip to Anaheim you please contact me personally and give me the chance to ensure you have a flawless stay so you can experience why we are such a premier hotel destination in the resort area. Although an apology does not change the situations you encountered, i do enlist one with all sincerity, and look forward to hearing from you in the future!

Summary: Our room smelled like sewer smell, And also the shower handle came out of my hand, l was lucky it that it not hot water when I turn it on.  I told the front desk  the next day about 9:00 am. They send the housekeeping! Why? They didn't do anything!   When we back at 9:30 pm.  The smell was so bad, We called back and complained, They send another housekeeper, She said that didn't have a P-trap in the sink. Keurig coffee maker and the room too was so dusty. like they didn't clean it for a few days. The manager called us that we could change rooms at 10:40 pm. We were all ready sleeping. The manager gave us $25.00 off. What a joke, I expected more for what we been through.
Manager Response: browneyesse64  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us. It is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests. The room issue was addressed immediately and there was a full clean of the sink to ensure the issue is rectified.  I am disappointed to hear that the Manager on duty did not handle the situation better for you and you left with this bad impression.  I do ask that during your next trip to Anaheim you please contact me personally and give me the chance to ensure you have a flawless stay so you can experience why we are such a premier hotel destination in the resort area. Although an apology does not change the situations you encountered, i do enlist one with all sincerity, and look forward to hearing from you in the future!

Summary Heading: Our Trip to the Magic Kingdom
Summary: The hotel is being renovated. There were things - like the pool that weren't finished yet. They had options to use a sister property - that weren't finished yet. Other than that, we truly enjoyed the hotel. The staff was extremely helpful. We got there 6 hours before check in. Our room was ready. This really helped. The 8 of us unloaded the van. We did not have to do that after a day at Disney. The room was very comfortable. There were enough outlets and USB plugs for all the devices we had. The Keurig was great.
Manager Response: Andrew D  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms as well as that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you! I look forward to personally welcoming you back upon your next trip!

Summary: The building is being remodeled - but the staff do not need any upgrade.  I have never been to a property where 100% of the staff I encountered showed me genuine smiles and friendly, helpful dispositions.  These people will outshine the new building!
Manager Response: Gregg D  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms as well as that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!  I look forward to personally welcoming you back upon your next trip!

Summary: This place was AMAZING !! Not sure what's going on with the people who gave this less than 4/5 starts,  except maybe they're beyond spoiled.  The rooms were perfection. Totally remodeled.  Up to date EVERYTHING! They are close to the end of a fabulous remodel. There was a small bit of construction still going on but didn't affect us. Parking is substantial and under ground. The pool is a VERY SHORT distance across the way (maybe 40ft), shared with the adjoining NICE hotel during remodel.  The price was GREAT set only $103 night which included all taxes n fees.  And pretty darn close to theme parks.  (I'm 54yo and took me maybe 15min to walk it).  The staff was so very friendly.  This is definitely THE place to stay!!
Manager Response: quilbillymom  Thank you so much for reviewing us!. Your feedback will continue to help our hotel get better and will be a great source of information for our TripAdvisor community. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you and your family during your next Disneyland trip.

Summary: Last minute I decided to switch my hotel in Anaheim to be a little closer to Disneyland...Best Decision! At this time they were under major construction so trying to find the temporary lobby area was a little confusing especially since we arrived at night.  Room was great! Clean...spacious...bathroom updated and to top it off the great friendly service we were presented with every single time we walked through the lobby.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Ashlee H  Thank you for taking the time to leave such an excellent review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I look forward to personally welcoming you back upon your next trip!

Summary: Nice hotel rooms, clean and confortable beds, all that is needed to rest after a very long walk at Disney!
Manager Response: mezajoe1,  We would like to thank you for posting such wonderful review of our hotel. Your positive feedback continues to drive us to do our best and provide our guests with exceptional stays. We look forward to serving you soon.

Summary: The place was very clean and the service was great. Room was updated and comfortable. Didn't love the parking situation and it was under construction but when that is complete I am sure it will be great. They allowed me early check in, which was fabulous. The location is excellent.
Manager Response: sonnetrodrigues,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms! It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and I do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!  Thank you again and see you soon!

Summary Heading: Room was excellent, staff was great and super friendly...
Summary: Room was excellent, staff was great and super friendly! Daniella was awesome, as well as the rest of the front desk staff. We’d stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: burnzfernandez  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms as well as that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!  The highest compliment we can receive is that you would definitely stay again with us, and i look forward to personally welcoming you back upon your next trip!

Summary: The room was very nice and clean. All the rooms were recently renovated, so everything was new. The hotel was still under renovation but signage helped guide us to the rooms and lobby. It's supposed to be completed this April. The staff was very nice and helpful. The hotel is located conveniently close to the Disney parks (less than 1 mile). It took us only 10 minutes to walk to the entrance gates. I'd recommend this place to others!
Manager Response: avery615,  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. I am so glad to hear you liked the new rooms, and that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!!

Summary: This hotel was very nice. The staff was super friendly. Rooms are a good size and very clean. There beds are comfy. The showers are spacious and shower heads are amazing I definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Hello,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms and the comfortable beds, as well as that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!  It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and I do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!

Summary: Front desk settled some matters we had promptly, the rooms were great, and we will return again for sure!
Manager Response: mikeandkid4ever,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such an Excellent review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am so glad our staff was able to settle those issues upon arrival. The highest compliment we can receive is that you would definitely stay again with us, and i look forward to personally welcoming you back upon your next trip!

Summary Heading: Get past the MAJOR renovation for a beautiful room
Summary: It’s a bit chaotic parking to check in, the “lobby” is very makeshift and construction is everywhere but our room is beautiful! We had booked a discount rate for two queens but wanted a king since we have a Co sleeping 3 yr old, which they accommodated. Room is beautiful and new, although small, but functional. We could have had a bigger room with the 2 queen. The bed is soft and comfy, good for me, too soft for the hubby. I’d recommend not getting a room overlooking Katella, normal road noise isn’t an issue but emergency vehicles are loud. The Indian restaurant on premises is fairly good, a bit over priced but hits the spot when you don’t really want to leave the hotel.
Manager Response: Suzancr,  Thank you so much for reviewing us!. Your feedback will continue to help our hotel get better and will be a great source of information for our TripAdvisor community. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you and your family during your next Disneyland trip.

Summary: The staff were very kind and gracious. They were great with recommendations for dinner and listened to and helped with specific needs. I will be to staying here in the future for sure. The room was very comfy, and the distance to everything was perfect.
Manager Response: Rogersga,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such an Excellent review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am so glad our staff was able to provide excellent dinner recommendations. The highest compliment we can receive is that you would definitely stay again with us, and i look forward to personally welcoming you back upon your next trip!

Summary Heading: Very nice amenities. Undergoing renovation so a bit dusty...
Summary: Very nice amenities. Undergoing renovation so a bit dusty in common areas. Overall enjoyed our stay.
Manager Response: RebelREL  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Loved the rooms and the staff
Summary: There was construction but it didn’t affect my stay. My only complaint was the air conditioners didn’t work right. We set it for 68 and the temperature never got below 79. I tried opening the window but to much street noise. I should have said something but I didn’t.
Manager Response: Dana D  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your wonderful experience with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. I am sorry to hear that you encountered issues with the a.c. Next time please do not hesitate to let us know so we can fix the issue, whether minor or major right away so we can ensure your full comfort. I can't wait to welcome you back during your next stay with us!!

Summary Heading: Great location but the new rooms are a mess
Summary: Stayed 2 night and was looking forward to the new rooms as I have stayed here many times before. Sadly the whole place is a giant mess and the customer service was awful. Our "new" room had ripped sheets and the window shade and sheets had black smears on them. Several of the power outlets didn't work. When I told the staff all I got was "sorry, we'll look into it" really sad because this was my favorite hotel for Disney vacations.
Manager Response: David G  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us. It is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests. I am disappointed to hear that the staff on duty did not handle the situation better for you and you left with this bad impression. I do ask to contact me personally and give me the chance to ensure you have a flawless stay so you can experience why we are such a premier hotel destination in the resort area. Although an apology does not change the situations you encountered, i do enlist one with all sincerity, and look forward to hearing from you in the future!

Summary: This hotel is currently under construction so the exterior doesn’t reflect the interior yet. Our room was beautiful and spacious. The beds were comfy and we appreciated the extra pillows. The shower is large and has dual shower heads. There was a keurig coffee machine and the fridge was much bigger than expected. The staff was extremely friendly and I love that they have a secured under ground parking garage. They don’t charge for parking which is fantastic! The only downside was the proximity to the parks was a bit farther than we realized. We usually walk to Disneyland but this a too far for us to walk after walking around the park all day. With that being said, it’s only a $5 Uber ride away.
Manager Response: Krisfain  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am so glad to hear you enjoyed our newly upgraded rooms, complimentary Keurig coffee maker with our amazing complimentary k-cup coffee including complimentary fridge in the room and most off all that our staff was so amazing!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: This is a great place to stay.Even with the renovations...
Summary: This is a great place to stay.Even with the renovations being done. The staff was great and very helpful.The location is great,only 15 min walk to Disneyland as well as bus right out front to the park.
Manager Response: donnalynnm2018  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. I am so glad that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!!

Summary: We travelled in December and there was lots of construction going on. I was aware of this and it’s probably why we got such a great deal. The customer service is amazing, everyone will make you feel welcome and are very helpful. The beds are super comfy. This hotel is about a 15-20 minute walk to Disneyland park. It’s really not too bad however when traveling with small children the walk back is tiring but you can always take an uber or a taxi which are located right outside of the park. Also the room has a mini fridge and is spacious. Plenty of restaurants near by and also a CVS and Walgreens.
Manager Response: glyma1009  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms and the comfortable beds, as well as that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!  It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and I do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!  Thank you again and see you soon!

Summary Heading: Best stay at the Disney resort!
Summary: Wow! Our stay with the Ramada was easily the BEST stay I’ve had in Anaheim. I use wyndham hotels on a regular basis for work and this stay is also in my top three stays. We arrived early on our first day, the exterior on the hotel is under construction but don’t let that deter you from booking. Upon arrival we entered the temp lobby to two VERY helpful and friendly team members. We had a party of five with two rooms- one was not ready yet but they did give us keys to our other room so we could head out to the parks. When we arrived back our room was ready and they had even remembered our crib request made at booking. The rooms have been updated- they were exceptionally clean, had a great size bathroom, but the best were the beds- truly so comfortable, some of the nicest I’ve
Manager Response: sarahmckay86  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms and the comfortable beds, as well as that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!  It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and I do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!  Thank you again and see you soon!

Summary: My sister and I stayed here for our Disney trip, and we LOVED it!!! We've stayed in many hotels nearby over the years, but this was our first time at Ramada Plaza, and we were not disappointed. All of the rooms and main areas were newly renovated, but the outside was still under construction. We were never bothered by the construction nor did we ever hear anything.  We were lucky enough to get to check-in early, and the room was perfect. Comfy beds, clean space, big bathroom. We were at the end of the hall near the elevator, but we never heard a peep from anyone else. It was blissfully quiet.  The staff was beyond amazing! I had read a lot of reviews about the staff being incredible, so I assumed they'd be friendly, but they still exceeded my expectations. Anything we needed,
Manager Response: T8517EJjessicas,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such an excellent review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am so glad our staff was able to accommodate an early check in for you. The highest compliment we can receive is that you would definitely stay again with us, and I look forward to personally welcoming you back upon your next trip!

Summary: We really had a pleasant stay here. Staff was very accommodating and helpful, the location is great – just two long blocks from the park.  They are in the process of renovating, which nobody told us ahead of time. The noise did not bother us, but the parking spaces were partially blocked by construction trucks – no big deal,  but I would’ve appreciated a heads up before I made my reservation. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a great review! It makes me happy to hear that the staff was so friendly and helpful. We do have the renovations posted on all of our booking sites and I am so glad to hear that we are in a perfect location!!   We look forward to hearing from you in the future!

Summary Heading: amazing hotel. just a little dusty outside as they are...
Summary: amazing hotel. just a little dusty outside as they are renovating. other than that the whole family had a wonderful and restful night. highly recommend.
Manager Response: bebe2018  Thank you for taking the time to leave such an excellent review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I look forward to personally welcoming you back upon your next trip!

Summary: The staff were very attentive to the guests, from the receptionists, to the catering manager ( Jesus) and sales manager ( Laura).
Manager Response: analynnd  Thank you so much for the FANTASTIC review. Your feedback will continue to help our hotel get better and will be a great source of information for our TripAdvisor community. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you and your family during your next Disneyland trip or for an event.

Summary: The hotel was under construction so felt very empty, but otherwise great. The front desk was helpful and it was a pleasurable stay. It will be a nice hotel once the remodel is complete. I forgot a fork when I went out for fast food, the front desk brought one up immediately when I called.
Manager Response: marekh947  Thank you so much for the FANTASTIC review. Your feedback will continue to help our hotel get better and will be a great source of information for our TripAdvisor community. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you and your family during your next Disneyland trip.

Summary: The room interior was newly remodeled, spacious and spotlessly clean. The room came fully equipped with everything advertised. The linens were new. The check-in was quick and effortless with the front desk clerks courteous and helpful. Possibly the layout could be improved as the route with a cart of luggage took me down long hallways, elevators and more hallways. The hall carpet was covered with plastic and painting tarps.  The pool, lobby and front end of the bldg are still under construction. I was provided access to a neighboring motels pool but declined.  I would like to see the motel it when it's done.
Manager Response: constructionpm2017  Thank you so much for the FANTASTIC review. Your feedback will continue to help our hotel get better and will be a great source of information for our TripAdvisor community. We hope to have the opportunity to serve you and your family during your next Disneyland trip.

Summary Heading: The bathroom from my last stay was not comfortably...
Summary: The bathroom from my last stay was not comfortably remodeled like all the other rooms, it was suited for an elderly couple and was a bit cramped.
Manager Response: F9505Mlstevenb  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us. It is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests. I do apologize that the renovations did not meet your expectations and appreciate you letting us know. All the hotel rooms including bathrooms have been renovated, the room booked was an accessible room; all accessible rooms have roll-in showers & tubs, non accessible rooms have standing showers...  I do ask that during your next trip to Anaheim you please contact me personally and give me the chance to ensure you have a flawless stay so you can experience why we are such a premier hotel destination in the resort area. Summary: In town for Disneyland. Hotel is located within a 20 minute walk to park entrances. Fantastic price for being so close! Also located next to a nice mall and many restaurants. Good area to be. Don't be put off with the construction. The room was lovely and recently re-modeled. Staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: VegasBabyz  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a great review! It makes me happy to hear that you like the renovations that we have done, and that the staff was so friendly and helpful.   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Good location. STILL under renovation. Room was great. Once that's done this will be a great property. Only thing I would change is add a clothes line in the bathroom since you have a pool.
Manager Response: darth1138  Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a great review!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: It was my first time staying here and I loved it! The room was updated and the bed was soft. The shower had a rain shower head and a wand which was awesome. It was only a 15 minute walk to Disneyland and had free parking and WiFi. There was also plenty to eat in the area. The reason why I gave it a 4 was because there was no free breakfast offered and the stay was rather pricey (way cheaper than the park hotels though). Also the pillows were way to soft. I didn’t even bother using a pillow because they were too soft. Please provide firmer pillows. I wish the construction would be done but I know when it is, it will be beautiful. Finally, I would hear the road noise from my room and I had ear plugs in, so don’t forget to bring ear plugs!
Manager Response: 145hillary1234  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms and the comfortable beds, as well as that underground gated parking!  It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and I do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!

Summary: Even with the ongoing construction, everything was amazing and we enjoyed our two nights at your location.
Manager Response: 273filibertof  Thank you for taking the time to leave such an Excellent review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!    I look forward to personally welcoming you back upon your next trip!

Summary Heading: It's what matters on the inside, not the outside!
Summary: This hotel is currently going through a major face lift however they were smart to complete the rooms first rather than doing everything all together. All the rooms have been recently been remodeled. As long as you can get past the tarps and construction signs this hotel is a great deal. Easy parking, easy checking, clean rooms, and a 10 min walk to Disneyland or GardenWalk. Highly reccomend.
Manager Response: cianov2018  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! Summary: Second stay here, and just as the first time, the staff was friendly and helpful! Although the hotel is under construction, it was impressively clean and comfortable! My family will definitely be visiting this hotel again, as we frequent this area for vacation!
Manager Response: Alyssa G  Thank you so much for returning to our property again and for taking the time to leave such a great review! It makes me happy to hear that you like the renovations that we have done, and that the staff was so friendly and helpful.   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: I was happy to book this hotel, as I had stayed here previously. The construction was still going on a year later. The entry felt like a haphazard access. No pool or workout facilities on the premises due to remodeling. Not the relaxing experience I was expecting. No indication of construction on the booking website.

Summary: I wish that I had been informed that the property was undergoing renovation. Parking for check-in was confusing because there wasn't any near registration area and I did not at that point have a card to open the underground parking. The lobby was not available at all during our stay. The rooms are renovated and are nice and the desk service was outstanding. A discount during the renovation period would have been nice.

Summary: Hotel under construction, but it didn't affect our stay.  Rooms were new, clean and beds were comfortable.  Close enough to walk to Disneyland.  Liked the underground gated parking and ablility to park before check-in time.  Good price and outdoor stay again.
Manager Response: Jane G  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and I do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!  Thank you again and see you soon!

Summary: We stayed at this location for 4 nights and it was great! They are remodeling but it didn’t inconvenience us at all.  The room was super clean, the beds were comfortable, and the room was quite. We were in the 3rd floor and never heard our neighbors at all.  The staff was always friendly saying hello every time we left or came back from Disneyland. It is super close to Disneyland and lots of other places like 7-11, Walgreens, cvs and food places.  Ozzy at the front desk is a gem, he was so helpful when I needed to fax something. We will definitely be staying at this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: goofyquina  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms and the comfortable beds, as well as that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!   It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and I do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!

Summary: You could hear everything in the hallway, construction started early, no breakfast included. Sink drain, smelled like a sewer drain, pretty gross. We found that housekeeping, did not do the best cleaning. We found food, wrappers and other gems under the sink. On a positive note, great location, close to Disneyland but off the beaten path.

Summary: The location is great. Short walk to Disneyland.  There is a shuttle right outside if you don’t want to walk. Beds were very comfortable and rooms were clean. Front office service was friendly and great. This hotel was still being remodeled.  I would go back to this hotel and would love to see the final remodel.  I would recommend this hotel if you are headed to Disney.

It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and I do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!

Summary: The hotel is under construction during our stay, so I can only comment on the accommodations and service. The rooms were clean, spacious, attractive, and the beds were very comfortable. Service was fantastic. Breakfast at the associated Indian restaurant was disgusting. I recommend eating elsewhere.

I hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip and please do not hesitate to contact me personally to get you all set up!

Summary: Currently under renovations, but doing a great job keeping things running smoothly and accommodating. Great place to stay.
Manager Response: Ashley O  Thank you for taking the time to leave such an excellent review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I look forward to personally welcoming you back upon your next trip!

Summary: Great hotel clean staff was friendly and helpful.  Wish they had their own shuttle to Disneyland after a full day the short walk became a long one.   I would definitely recommend this hotel great price and very clean.  Hotel is under construction but did not disturb us at all!
Manager Response: andreamW1764MR  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. I am so glad to hear you liked the hotel, and that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next

Summary Heading: The property is being renovated and the decor is lovely. I...
Summary: The property is being renovated and the decor is lovely. I was switching hotels and spending a last night at this property when we decided to add an extra day to Disneyland.   The front desk was awesome. They allowed me to park my car and called me at Disneyland to let me know our room was ready. It made it so much nicer of a trip, as we were able to maximize our time in the park. I was very appreciative. I would stay again for sure.
Manager Response: Carla  O  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms and  as well as that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you! ! I am so glad our staff was able to accommodate an early check in for you. The highest compliment we can receive is that you would definitely stay again with us.  It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and i do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!  Thank you again and see you soon!

Summary: My family and I stayed for 5 days 4 nights to visit Disney. The staff was friendly, room was clean and we had a good rest. One thing I did notice was that from the 3rd day forward, our room was not cleaned very well. We did leave tips daily as well as picked up after ourselves. The hotel was under renovation when we stayed and the noise from the construction started early. We had no problem with it because we were up early everyday, but if you are thinking of sleeping in, you may want to stay elsewhere if still in renovation.
Manager Response: Araceli C  Thank you for taking the time to provide us such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us. It is through feedback, both positive and negative where we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests.  I am so glad to hear the positive side that our staff were really nice and helpful.  I apologize that the 3rd day forward the room was not completely made and appreciate you letting us know. This is something we will evaluate and see how we can make it better for our valued guests.   I do hope during your next trip to Anaheim you will contact me personally so i can have the chance to show you why we are a top hotel destination in Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Nice Staff; Nice Rooms; Let down by construction.
Summary: I was aware of the construction, and the room itself was fine. Going in and out of the hotel was more difficult due to the location of the lobby, but once construction is finished, it will be fine.

Summary Heading: Hotel under construction, but unexpectedly nice inside! Most comfortable beds EVER!
Summary: Room cleaned and restocked daily, friendly and helpful staff, excellent beds and bedding, very pleasant stay for 4 nights.
