I am so glad to hear you liked the new rooms; the comfortable beds and that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!!

Summary: The hotel was under construction , but it was still nice inside. The staff was so nice and helpful. Our stay was awesome. Hopefully they have everything done for our next visit next year.   We where greeted every time we came back from Disneyland and when we went out they wished us a good day. It’s was amazing.
Manager Response: vanessa o  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. I am so glad  that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!!

Summary: Was staying at the Ramada as it was a perfect location which was walking distance to the entrance of Disneyland.  We had a great stay there! If you are looking to stay here, I wouldn’t hesitate in booking.  Just want to let you know that the hotel is under going renovations outside and also in the lobby areas.  But the rooms are already renovated and look fantastic.  Beds are comfy and the washrooms look great with a big shower.  It looked like a war zone during renovations outside but we didn’t mind because we were in Disneyland most of the day.  The noise for construction didn’t mind us in the morning as well.  The pool area was also being renovated at the time but we were still able to use the pool next door at the indigo hotel if we would like.  Still gave it a 4 out of 5
Manager Response: Dmatthew79  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am glad you liked our new rooms! It's also nice to hear that we are in the perfect location for you to Disneyland!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland trip!

Summary Heading: We would not stay here again
Summary: Luckily we only had a one night stay at this hotel. The room itself was nice but that's all. I was deceived because there used to be another Ramada across from Disneyland. This one was way around the corner on Katela, at least a 15 minute walk, which is not fun with kids! Then they said that they offer a shuttle, for a charge $8 per adult and $5 per kid. The shuttle was then full when it stopped and then we had to wait another 30 minutes for another to come. Did not have access to a computer or printer in the lobby, and no pool because of remodeling. Also, the remodeling was a complete mess.
Manager Response: ashleygL5537TA  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us. I do apologize that the shuttle services provided by the city of Anaheim did not meet your expectations and appreciate you letting us know. Summary Heading: Despite some issues, Ramada Plaza was pleasant
Summary: Our original room has an awful chemical smell in it, very toxic. The maids told us it was the sink, but it wouldn't go away. Without hesitation, front desk moved us to another room and gave us an upgrade for the inconvenience. No matter what we asked for, they were incredibly professional and kind. Great service from all staff. With all the construction, I can't comment on the overall appearance outside of the rooms. The location was good though. We also didn't use the restaurant so can't comment on that either.
Manager Response: Beanhead31  Thank you for taking the time to leave us such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us.  The room issue was addressed immediately and there was a full clean of the sink to ensure the issue is rectified. I'm glad that the front desk staff went above and beyond and were able accommodate you in another room.   Thank you again as it is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests. I do hope that next time you are in the Anaheim area you will contact me personally so i can ensure you have a flawless stay with us and you can see why we are such a premier hotel destination!

Summary Heading: The Hotel was in the middle of renovations so it was noisy...
Summary: The Hotel was in the middle of renovations so it was noisy at times, however, the staff does a terrific job.  I am sure that once the renovations are complete, all appearance short comings will be remedied.
Manager Response: richardaE2154RQ  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! I am so glad to hear you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay from our friendly/professional front desk staff.   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney adventure!!

Summary: Loved the location and proximity to Disneyland, but the hotel is under major construction. The main walkway to the elevator was covered in dust and super slippery. On my last day, I was woken up by construction on the roof (stayed on the top floor). It sounded as if something incredibly heavy was being dropped repeatedly. Then the fire alarm went off twice. When I was checking out, the person at the front desk gave me a half hearted apology regarding the alarm. Apparently they had been testing it, but didn’t think to inform guests prior so that there wouldn’t be any panic. Overall, I loved the room and it’s location. I just wish it hadn’t been under construction at the time.
Manager Response: 732ericae  Thank you for taking the time to provide us such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us. It is through feedback, both positive and negative where we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests. I do apologize to hear that the front desk staff member on duty did not handle the situation better for you and you left with this bad impression.  I am so glad to hear that we are in a perfect location and that you liked our newly remodeled rooms!!   I do ask that during your next trip to Anaheim you please contact me personally and give me the chance to ensure you have a flawless stay so you can experience why we are such a premier hotel destination in the resort area. Although an apology does not change the situations you encountered, i do enlist one with all sincerity, and look forward to hearing from you in the future!

Summary: Super impressed by the quality of the room and its location is perfect for travelers headed to Disneyland.  The staff was super nice!
Manager Response: Br00ker0se  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. I am so glad to hear you liked the new rooms, and that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!!

Summary: The rooms were beautiful the outside was still being renovated.  You need to put mirros for people who can't see good.
Manager Response: K2657VPmariaj  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. I am so glad to hear you liked the new rooms!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!!

Summary: Walking distance to Disney and good nearby dining options led to a great stay at the Ramada Plaza. I was visiting with my wife and 4 & 8 year olds. We were initally worried by driving through an archway under construction, however those concerns were unfounded as we had a refurbished room which was quiet.  The front desk team was helpful and helped us with a later check out.  One thing to be aware of is that you need cash (no cards) for buying Disney tickets from the hotel.
Manager Response: Graham P  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am glad to hear how nice our staff treated you and was able to accommodate your schedule and that you liked our newly remodeled rooms!!   Thank you again and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Clean renovated room! Walking distance to Disneyland...
Summary: Clean renovated room! Walking distance to Disneyland. Enclosed parking garage.  Due to major renovation, I cannot comment on the hotel lobby or pool, they were both closed. Once this renovation is complete, the hotel will be great!
Manager Response: justinfC4552KX  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am glad you liked our new rooms! It's also nice to hear that we are in the perfect location for you to Disneyland!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland trip!

Summary Heading: Director Of Lower School Support Services
Summary: The rooms were very nice, and the employees were helpful and friendly. I would not recommend this hotel to  anyone until all the remodeling is over. There were may morning that I was awaken by the noise.
Manager Response: 622marlah  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. I am so glad to hear you liked the new rooms, and that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!!

Summary: Hotel exterior is getting renovated. The rooms are nicely updated and clean but the first floor and exterior are still in process. I was very happy with the stay until I was woken up by extremely loud construction noise at 7:30 am. It sounded like it was in my room. Startling to say the least.  Parking is gated and underground, there's a microwave, fridge, TV, desk, sitting area, etc. Bed was comfortable but the room was hot. Guys at the front desk were very nice and helpful. Check in and check out was very fast.
Manager Response: jhylau  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us. It is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests. I do apologize that the renovations did not meet your expectations and appreciate you letting us know.  I am so glad to hear you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay from our friendly/professional front desk staff.    I do ask that during your next trip to Anaheim you please contact me personally and give me the chance to ensure you have a flawless stay so you can experience why we are such a premier hotel destination in the resort area. Although an apology does not change the situations you encountered, i do enlist one with all sincerity, and look forward to hearing from you in the future!

Summary: Was a lot construction in the hotel. At 7 am the workers were outside our windows singing loud and talking. I felt no privacy too. When we booked the hotel they said that the construction will be over on 11/30. If we knew that still going on we will book the rooms in another hotel. The construction is far from be done, probably another month or two.
Manager Response: M2318LBcarlo,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us. I am glad you had read the renovation verbiage about our hotel prior to coming. We do have the renovations posted on all of our booking sites, as well as third party booking sites; we do update the renovation completion date accordingly.  I do appreciate your feedback in regards to the work being done, that the renovation crew was singing loud and talking, that is something I will definitely have to inspect closer.   Although an apology does not change the situations you encountered, I do enlist one with all sincerity, and look forward to hearing from you in the future!

Summary: We stayed here during renovations, for a family trip to Disneyland. Location was great, easy walk to Disneyland and we could see CA Adventure from our room. The newly renovated room was nice, and having a Keurig with complimentary k-cup coffee and tea was really nice. I can't say enough about the friendliness of the front desk staff, they were incredibly welcoming, friendly, and accommodating.  Good high speed internet and complimentary parking are so nice. Once the renovations are complete, I think this hotel will be fantastic in every way!
Manager Response: jel205  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am so glad to hear you enjoyed our newly upgraded rooms, complimentary Wi-Fi, our amazing Keurig coffee maker with our complimentary k-cup coffee and our location was perfect for you, and most off all that our staff was so amazing!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Despite the on-going refurbishing of the property, our fourth floor stay was wonderful. Close to Disneyland where we and our daughter annually celebrate birthdays (daughter born on wife's birthday), we were graciously received and cared for. The room was quiet and comfortable, larger than most rooms.. An underground parking garage provided greater security than above ground. An Asian Indian restaurant is on property and several other quality choices are within a five minute walk.
Manager Response: don b,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a nice review from your recent stay with us! I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed the room and had a pleasant stay! We're glad that you have also enjoyed the complimentary underground parking!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland adventure!

Summary: Everuthing was great besides the construction going on. Other then that great service and our room was upgraded. I would stay here again for sure and its only a 10min walk to Disneyland. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: yayadan619  Thank you so much for your great review form your recent stay with us. I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms. I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland trip!

Summary Heading: Very good hotel, I have used this hotel before, but the new...
Summary: Very good hotel, I have used this hotel before, but the new (ongoing) remodel is making it better.
Manager Response: J8898YWjonathanp  Thank you so much for returning to our property again and for taking the time to leave such a great review! It makes me happy to hear that you like the renovations that we have done! I am thrilled to hear that you loved your stay so much with us and that  over all everything was perfect!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: The hotel was undergoing renovations. Due to this, check-in wase taking place in a hallway, construction was going on during the day, the outside and lower, commodn levels look very unattractive, the gym and pool were not available (but you could walk to a hotel on the same block - I guess they had some kind of agreement). The staff was friendly and helpful, though, and the rooms have all been updated, so that made up for a lot. Also, it was a great location - 10 minute walk to the convention center, shops, and Disney. There are a lot of hotel options on this short block, so given the option I'd probably choose another, but it's where my conference put me, and overall it did the job.
Manager Response: 628laritaw  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us! I am delighted to hear that the rooms were nice and location was perfect for you! Thank you for the feedback in regards that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!!  I look forward to having the opportunity to welcome you back during your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Perfect for our trip to Disneyland. It is under renovations and that’s obvious from the outside and temporary lobby. Close to the park, employees were friendly and the rooms were nice. Would stay again
Manager Response: Burtonburger,  Thank you for leaving a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am glad to hear that it was a perfect trip to Disneyland, and that our staff was so helpful for you!!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: The rooms are all newly renovated and very nice, but the rest of the hotel is under renovation. Something to strongly consider when booking. Didn’t bother me at all.
Manager Response: CleverHarer  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. I am so glad to hear you liked the new rooms!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!!

Summary Heading: Property was still under renovation but rooms were very...
Summary: Property was still under renovation but rooms were very modern and clean. Great location to Disneyland. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: Renae W  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. I am so glad to hear you liked the new rooms, and the location was perfect your you!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!!

Summary: I traveled to the Ramada/Wyndham for a conference. I'm an educator. While there were renovations being done, the room I stayed in was spectacular. Comfortable. Wonderful and friendly staff at the front desk. Always willing to help for any little thing. The cleaning staff, as well must be commended for their incredible friendliness and thorough cleaning of all the rooms. I highly recommend this hotel. Walking distance to restaurants and stores and more importantly, Disneyland!
Manager Response: amandaS9122QA  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. I am so glad to hear you liked the new rooms, and that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!!

Summary: Wifi didn't work well AC didn't work, only fan which was noisy Bad odor was coming from bathroom sink
Manager Response: toddn446  Thank you for taking the time to leave us such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us. The room issues were addressed immediately and there was a full clean of the sink to ensure the issue is rectified as well we have checked the internet connectivity and the AC malfunction.  Thank you again as it is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests. I do hope that next time you are in the Anaheim area you will contact me personally so i can ensure you have a flawless stay with us and you can see why we are such a premier hotel destination!

Summary: Even though the outside of the hotel doesn't look like much on the outside right now -during the remodel- it is what is inside that counts. The rooms were lovely and all brand new. But the real gems here are the people. From the front desk staff to he guys doing remodeling work in the lobby, every single interaction was friendly and helpful. Whatever they are paying them, it is likely not enough because they really do go above and beyond to make you happy. Bravo!
Manager Response: zmStPaulMN  Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. I am so glad to hear you liked the new rooms, and that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!!

Summary: Although the hotel is being renovated and has a lot of construction work being done, the basic guest services were handled by the staff with courteous and professional manner.  My son, Loren Javier, is a repeat customer and the staff has always assisted him with his power scooter and physically handicap requirements and has convinced me to book at your hotel each time we are in Anaheim.  Thank you.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Ramada Plaza Anaheim was under construction, but that didn’t impact my experience.  My room was beautifully updated.  It was spacious with great lighting.  I loved the programmable safe, updated shower with two shower heads, and modern sink and mirror.  The sliding barn-door-style bathroom door was beautiful and a great idea for a hotel room.  The people were always courteous and willing to help me.  They were knowledgeable and genuine.  The location is also amazing.  Close to the convention center and Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: We would not stay here again.
Summary: I would not recommend this hotel - especially while under construction.  We had to move rooms three times.  The first room smelled like sewer, the second room was dirty (Hair in different places and didn’t look vacuumed), the third room was just ok. We didn’t like how the bathroom was combined with the sink and mirror - made it hard for all of us to get ready when someone was showering.  The  construction woke us up at 7am - loud banging outside our window.  We don’t travel much, so when we do we love to be able to enjoy our stay and make the most of it.   This hotel was very disappointing for our family getaway.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Eventhough they were under construction our hotel room was absolutely amazing and excited all expectations. The staff was very knowledgeable and very helpful and overall we will definitely be coming back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great stay in spite of renovations
Summary: In spite of the construction, it was a wonderful stay. The staff was outstanding, friendly and welcoming. The newly renovated rooms are beautiful. It is in the best location near the Garden Walk as well as tons of restaurants.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good customer service , room was super clean , they remodeling the property and looks ugly outside and dirty but we understand and are satisfied with our room , lady on lobby was friendly and fast during check in. And a couple blocks away from disney!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I think this hotel will definitely be one I stay at again, but once the renovation is complete. Our room was already done and it was very nice. The two people we were staying with had issues with smells that the hotel quickly and very kindly took care of as far as switching them, but that’s a pain to move everything. I just think it should’ve been posted somewhere that there was going to be construction at 7 AM right outside our window during our stay. I probably would have stayed somewhere else. Being woken up early to hammering and men talking is tough with little kids. All of the renovations will be wonderful and the staff is very kind, this will be definitely a go to hotel for Disneyland once it’s all complete.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was not my first time to the hotel for breakfast and the food was very good.  Many choice to choose from in buffet, such as bacon, sausage, eggs, french toast, toast, coffee, milk, juices.  The waitresses were very nice and the restaurant was immaculately clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for family vacation
Summary: Even though the hotel is under construction it did not interfere with our stay. The room was updated with new furniture and bathroom fixtures.  We asked for extra sheets and got them delivered right away. The service was great. The Hotel staff was friendly and helped us get around the area easily.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location is perfect, just down the street and around the corner from the maingate Disneyland.  It will be very nice when all the renovations are complete. The staff were very friendly every time we came in and out.
Manager Response: H4230ZCarolk,  Thank you for leaving a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim! I am glad to hear that we are in a perfect location for you to Disneyland, you enjoyed our new rooms, and that our staff was so helpful for you!!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: We decided to stay as we shop around for the best hotels as an annual Passholder. Although still under construction, mainly outside, the room are great and so was the service. The newly remodeled room are great. Bathroom is like a spa although there wasn’t a tub to soak my tired feet I enjoyed it anyways. Could have used better towels or more softener. Quick walk to the park. Would definitely stay again
Manager Response: none

Summary: My first impression of this hotel was very mixed - the gentleman that helped me check in was warm, polite and friendly, but the common area that looked messy due to on-going renovation made me worried about how the room would be like. But the room was surprisingly nice and clean (seemed to be updated recently). I particularly like the semi-transparent curtains that allowed you to have both the california sunshine and the privacy. The staffs that did the daily cleaning were also doing their duties carefully every day and paying attention to details (although I haven't met them during my 5-day stay). Location of the hotel is excellent; 10-15 min walk to either Anaheim Convention Center or Disneyland. Free garage parking is another plus. So despite the construction that makes the
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Rooms are very nice after renovation
Summary: Their main entrance was still under renovation, but the rooms have been renovated. The rooms are very nice after the renovation. We were very happy with the cleanliness and the service we got in the hotel. Fast Internet. Beds were a bit on the soft side though.  However, I wanted to point out a safety concern at the main entrance of the hotel. The main entrance was still under renovation, but it was not clear that guests are not supposed to walk underneath the main entrance as it is a hard-hat only area. There was a "No-pedestrian sign" on the side of the main entrance, and we thought that only meant the sidewalk was closed. We proceeded to walk underneath the main entrance (meant for vehicles) to enter the hotel. We only realized this mistake the next day when we were exiting
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is under renovation, but was such an easy walk to Disneyland, offers free underground gated parking, and the new rooms have very comfortable beds.
Manager Response: 531charc,  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a nice review from your recent stay with us! I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed our rooms/our comfortable beds, our location is perfect for you, and the complimentary underground parking!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland adventure!

Summary: We took a chance on this hotel on a very busy weekend in Anaheim. The exterior of the building, the lobby, and most of the first floor is under construction. If you can look past the construction, the hotel staff was very friendly and the room was newly remodeled and was great.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were surprised at how torn up the hotel was when we arrived. The renovation process has the outside looking like it is about to be demolished and the lobby was like walking into someone's single car garage. I wanted to leave and cancel. Micky at the desk was gracious and offered to check us in early and assured us that we had pool use next door and that the renovation of the rooms were done and that they were quite nice. I'm glad we didn't leave because she was right. The room was great though returning daily to the exterior wreck and construction maze wasn't ideal. Her attitude and helpfulness was a turning point. Great employee!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Rooms were not bad.Hotel personnel were helpful. However, there were undergoing major renovation, including having to walk through ladders, etc, very "cheap" set up for entry desk. Also no breakfast place, no fitness center (there was one next door). And I got the impression that rate was the same as other times.
Manager Response: A5074JGmartinr,  Thank you very much for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us. It is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests. I do apologize that none of our staff reiterated that we do offer All American Breakfast Buffet from 6:30am-10am; cost $11.99(adults) and $5.99(child).. I do ask that during your next trip to Anaheim you please contact me personally and give me the chance to ensure you have a flawless stay so you can experience why we are such a premier hotel destination in the resort area. Although an apology does not change the situations you encountered, i do enlist one with all sincerity, and look forward to hearing from you in the future!

Summary Heading: Beautiful modern rooms and super clean. Best rooms around Disneyland!
Summary: They had the most modern updated rooms of any hotel around Disneyland. Room was really clean and the bathroom was excellent quality with modern fixtures. I would stay here again. The walk to the park is fast, 10-15 mins.
Manager Response: A471OGroberts,         Thank you for taking the time to leave such a nice review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am so glad to hear that we have the best rooms around Disneyland!!     It is also nice to hear that we are in a great location for you!!    I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland adventure!

Summary Heading: Decent near convention center and Disney
Summary: The hotel was undergoing renovations but he rooms were done. Very easy parking. Nice rooms even though the walls are a little thin. The restaurant in the property offers breakfast and is GodAwful-should be shut down. Dirty place, room temp food...there are places to eat nearby however.
Manager Response: Bryan C,        Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!   I am delighted to hear that the rooms were nice and the parking was very easy for you.  Thank you for the feedback in regards to the restaurant.  It is great to hear this so we can improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests, and i am sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations.    I look forward to having the opportunity to welcome you back during your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Under construction, however rooms are great!
Summary: The hotel is undergoing construction so the lobby was in a temporary location, however the elevator, hallways, and rooms are completed and very nice.  The room was very clean and updated with very nice amenities including a fridge, microwave, keurig, and TV.  The beds were comfy.  The  hotel is about 1/2 mile from the Disneyland park entrance.  The only disappointment was the continental breakfast offering.  The restaurant in the hotel price per person for the breakfast buffet was disappointing for what was offering for food.
Manager Response: paulg791795,        Thank you very much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!  I am glad to hear you liked so many different aspects of our property from the proximity to Disneyland, the nice hallways, and the clean updated rooms!   I apologize that the breakfast did not meet your expectations and appreciate you letting us know.   This is something we will evaluate and see how we can make it better for our valued guests.    I hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip and please do not hesitate to contact me personally to get you all set up!

Summary: Hotel is under renovation but I heard no noise, all rooms are finished.  Softest bed I've ever had in a hotel.  Rainforest shower head.  Blackout curtains.  10 minute walk to Disneyland.  Super nice people at check in.  Using pool at Hotel Indigo until theirs is ready.
Manager Response: bkwrm0527,        Thank you for taking the time to leave such a nice review from your recent stay with us!   I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed our rooms, our location is perfect for you, and most of all that our check in staff were super nice for you!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland adventure!

Summary: I arrived at the hotel at 6:30am. Was able to get a parking pass and to enjoy myself at the patk until my room was ready. Got a call around 12:30pm to tell me my room was available. Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: DidjaSeeThat,         Thank you for taking the time to leave such an Excellent review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am so glad our staff was able to accommodate an early check in for you.     The highest compliment we can receive is that you would definitely stay again with us, and i look forward to personally welcoming you back upon your next trip!

Summary Heading: No mention of the ongoing renovations!
Summary: We contacted this hotel a few times before we arrived and asked for a specific side of the hotel & asked about amenities BUT no one said it was under construction. We didn’t get the backside of the hotel ... in spite of requesting it. Our view was thru the tarps over the window & the pool was closed. We walked across the parking lot to pool next door. The hammering started at 6:45am! It was brutal!  I get it ... renos need to happen, but we should have been told. We complained about the noise but nothing changed! Same hammering at the same time!  All we got was a whole lot of lip service from the manager!   Albeit, the rooms were renovated and they were lovely.
Manager Response: Patricia W,         Thank you very much for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us.  It is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests.  I do apologize that none of our staff reiterated the renovation process during the few times you contacted the hotel.  This is typically stated upon booking as well as it is posted on all of our websites and third party booking channels.   I will definitely have to provide a little training to ensure all guests are aware every time they call in! In regards to the hammering they should not have been starting at 6:45am.  They typically come around 7:00am to do set up and no loud noises start until 8:00am.  I am disappointed to hear that the Manager on duty did not handle the situation better for you and you left with this bad impression.  I do ask that during your next trip to Anaheim you please contact me personally and give me the chance to ensure you have a flawless stay so you can experience why we are such a premier hotel destination in the resort area.    Although an apology does not change the situations you encountered, i do enlist one with all sincerity, and look forward to hearing from you in the future!

Summary: We were visiting Disneyland in October and stayed at the Ramada Plaza Hotel in Anaheim.  Very friendly front desk staff.  The hotel lobby and exterior are under renovations, but the rooms have all been remodeled and they are very nice.  The beds and pillows are wonderful!!!  The most comfortable sleep ever - especially after a long day at Disneyland!  The park is within walking distance.  Would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: MyReview82,  Thank you for leaving such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am so glad you enjoyed so many aspects of your stay from our Friendly front desk staff, the newly remodeled rooms, and the wonderful bed and pillows!     The best comment is hearing that you would recommend our hotel and for that i can't thank you enough!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland trip!

Summary: Although this place was under construction, we hardly noticed! The rooms were upgraded and super comfy. The staff were amazing, and we were super close to Disneyland!
Manager Response: ashley_braatz,         Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!  I am so glad to here you enjoyed our newly upgraded rooms, our location was perfect for you, and most off all that our staff was so amazing!!    I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: I stayed here for a convention that was held at the Anaheim Convention Center. It was a great location and within walking distance or virtually anything you needed to get to (CVS, Walgreens, Con Center, restaurants). The rooms were newly remodeled and the hotel was undergoing renovation. The staff was SUPER friendly. I don't remember any of their names except Dionne.
Manager Response: Brittany P,    Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us!   I am so glad to hear that we are in a perfect location for you and that our staff were so SUPER friendly!!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: Hotel was under deep construction with no note of if when i reserved, many of the listed amenities were gone and they told us to go next door (a different hotel) if we wanted them. Room also had a constant horrid smell of raw sewage coming from the sink and shower drain.
Manager Response: ChrissX2872MV,        Thank you for taking the time to leave us such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us.  I believe based on your information provided to TripAdvisor and what i have in my hotel system it looks like you booked through Expedia.  All the renovations are posted through Expedia but i will definitely revisit the website and contact them to ensure it is easily noticeable for our guests.  The room issue was addressed immediately and there was a full clean of the sink to ensure the issue is rectified.   As for the amenities such as the pool, fitness center, and laundry facility we do have these options set up at our sister property right on the other side of our parking lot.   Our amenities will be back very soon as completion is right around the corner!    Thank you again as it is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests.   I do hope that next time you are in the Anaheim area you will contact me personally so i can ensure you have a flawless stay with us and you can see why we are such a premier hotel destination!

Summary: I received a recommendation from a co-worker that frequents this hotel.  I knew they were under renovation upon booking the room...but even knowing that, I was slightly intimidated when our shuttle dropped off.  The whole exterior is under renovation and it really leaves you wondering what's happening inside.  Upon entering the small lobby, we were introduced to the nicest office staff.  They were so friendly and welcoming, offering us water.  Our plan, when we arrived at 9:30AM, well before our room was scheduled to be ready, was to leave our bags and head to Disneyland.  However our room was ready and we were allowed into it.  Let me tell you, the interior renovations have already happened and the room was the nicest hotel I've ever stayed in.  Everything was brand new, the
Manager Response: Kelliem701,        Thank you for taking the time to leave such a wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   It is so nice to hear that our hotel came recommended to you, and even better to hear that after staying with us you would recommend us as well!  I am glad to hear how nice our staff treated you and was able to accommodate your schedule and that you liked our newly remodeled rooms!!  The bathroom is my favorite part as well, especially the Rain fall shower!!       Thank you again and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to the Anaheim area!

Summary: Wow, this was a great pick. chose based off price and location  (10 minute walk to park). after this stay, we will definitely return everytime we're back to Disneyland. Mickaroo (Micky) at the front desk was SO nice and super helpful with letting us check in early, then we got to our room which was so spacious! a 2 queen sized bed room felt like a suite, it was very clean, and super comfortable. we checked out on Halloween and they gave us each a goody bag, so cute! they were renovating the exterior of the hotel which didn't bother us at all. this was so perfect and will return! oh yeah and free parking and wifi!
Manager Response: juliaaa_guliaaa,        Thank you so much for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!  I am thrilled to hear we were such a great pick for you and that the combination of our location, room size, and the great service by Micky were so good!    We definitely feel Micky is a strong asset to us and i am so glad it shows to our guests!!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Everything was wonderful. The walk to Disneyland wasn’t terrible, although in the evenings after spending all day at the park it seems like the hotel is exceptionally far. The staff was friendly. More importantly the rooms were clean despite the ongoing renovations.
Manager Response: Lori M,         Thank you for taking the time to provide a great review from your recent stay with us!  I am thrilled to hear how friendly our staff was and how clean your rooms were!  In regards to the trip back from Disneyland there is a shuttle called the ART that runs to and from our property every 20 min.  This shuttle will drop you back off right in front of our property and even runs up to half an hour after the park closes!    Thank you again and I look forward to having the opportunity to welcome you back during your next Disney getaway!!

Summary: It was a great distance from the park, easy to walk mid-day and head back for more evening fun. The room was nice and spacious, bed was decent as well. It'll be a great hotel after all the construction is finished, luckily it was pretty quiet and we never even noticed.
Manager Response: Catrina G        Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!   I am so glad to hear we are in the perfect location for you and that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms.     I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney adventure!!

Summary Heading: Wish we wouldve known it was under construction.
Summary: Wish we wouldve known it was under construction. The pool wasn't finished, but at least we got a nice new remodeled room. Bonus: walking distance to Disneyland, and a lot of restaurant options just down the street.  Half the people working the "lobby" were REALLY nice and helpful and the other half were super NOT helpful.... like telling us incorrect prices for their disney tickets, and recommendations for places to eat near by were.. subway, and a pizza delivery... when there were tons of great restaurants just around the corner (that we found on our own). I think it was just an OFF time to come here and when it's all remodeled and the staff is up and running as well, it would be a good place to stay.
Manager Response: alexcU9918UZ,        Thank you for taking the time to provide us such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us.  It is through feedback, both positive and negative where we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests.  I would like to know how you booked as we have renovations posted on all websites, and our staff is trained to inform guests prior to completing reservations.  I am so glad to hear the positive side of the location for you and that some of the staff you encountered were really nice and helpful.   I am sorry that some of the other staff gave you wrong information and did not inform you of the great restaurants at Garden Walk that is just a few steps away from the property.   This feedback is great so i can ensure all of our staff is trained up to our standards for our guests.   I do hope during your next trip to Anaheim you will contact me personally so i can have the chance to show you why we are a top hotel destination in Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Although the building was under construction, facilities were clean, staff was kind, attenttive and knowledgeable
Summary: Me, my wife and our 5 year old, stayed for our Disneyland vacation. Close enough to walk, but, we decided to purchase the shuttle tickets.  Room was clean, beds were big and comfy, bathroom was really nice (especially the shower) and everything we needed was present and in working order.  I wished there would have been an on site place to eat (that had better hours), but, less than a block down the street we could get pizza, subs, etc. (even a Starbucks and well known drug store). Garage Parking is a little small, but, we managed to find a spot.  Overall, 4 out of 5 stars (maybe 5 stars once renovations are completed).  Regardless, I would stay there again.
Manager Response: LuissP5644NM,         Thank you very much for bring your family to stay with us during your Disneyland vacation and for taking the time to leave us such a nice review! I am so glad to hear that you liked our newly renovated rooms, and really appreciate the feedback on the hours of the restaurant so we can reassess that for our guests!   I hope to have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland adventure!

Summary: The beds were great, rooms nice and spacious, and it was affordable for a family with children. Easy walking TO Disneyland.
Manager Response: taceeb,         Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am glad you liked our new rooms and that the beds were so great.  It's also nice to hear that we are in the perfect location for you to Disneyland!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland trip!

Summary: Hotel is being renovated.  The first floor was being renovated when we stayed.  So we were concerned until we got to our room son the 4th floor.  They are excellent.  Great finishes, looks and feels brand new!  Highly reccomend.
Manager Response: Gregory F,         Thank you for the excellent review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!  I am thrilled to hear that you like our newly renovated rooms and that you highly recommend us!  I look forward to welcoming you back in the future!

Summary Heading: We stayed there for two days with a family of four.  I was...
Summary: We stayed there for two days with a family of four.  I was really impress with the room.  The hotel m was close to the parks and free parking was a plus.  Rooms can be a little noisy at night due to the closeness of the busy street.  Overall very sastified with our stay.
Manager Response: 5525snd,         Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  I am so glad to hear that you were impressed with our new room and that you were very satisfied with your stay!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Booked with Hotel tonight and.it was reasonable price. We slept comfortable. The room was beautiful and perfect. And enjoyed our welcome to Disneyland for our family trip.
Manager Response: V6822MPcarolinag,        Thank you for taking the time to leave such a nice review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms and you were able to sleep comfortably on our new beds!      I hope to have the opportunity to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!

Summary: We've stayed here a couple of times in the past and were pleased to see the recent renovations. The outside of the hotel was under construction, but the rooms were beautiful.  The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. Can't wait to return next year
Manager Response: Carina A,         Thank you so much for returning to our property again and for taking the time to leave such a great review!  It makes me happy to hear that you like the renovations that we have done, and that the staff was so friendly and helpful.   I look forward to welcoming you back next year!!

Summary Heading: Under renovation but rooms were Great!
Summary: Stayed here for our 3 day trip to Disneyland and the comfort of these newly renovated rooms cannot be under stated.
Manager Response: Mark_Mace_Jr,        Thank you so much for your great review form your recent stay with us.   I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms.       I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland trip!

Summary: Hotels was under renovation and still had a great stay! No noise, no interruptions and sadly no pool😞 but still had a great time. The beds were amazing and I got the best sleep ever!
Manager Response: khines70,         Thank you for your great review from your recent stay with!   I am so glad to hear that you had a great stay and that the renovations did not interrupt you at all.   As for the pool i do hope it was relayed to you at check in that our guests are more then welcome to utilize our sister properties pool at any time!    I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim and for you to check our our brand new pool that will be ready to go shortly :)

Summary: I absolutely loved our stay here ! the rooms are amazing so new and modern and well cleaned. staff was amazing anything i needed they helped accommoate or they would keep checking in with me to make sure i was kept in the loop about my request. the walk from disney was about 15 mins. the lobby is being renovated but that they are doing an amazing job at making the transition so easy and still welcoming  great parking and just over all it was perfect !!
Manager Response: ruthsoto2023,        Thank you so much for the great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am thrilled to hear that you loved your stay so much with us and that over all everything was perfect!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: The hotel was under construction so that was interesting... especially b/c we didn't know it was under construction when the reservations was made.  It would have been nice to know in case we wanted to make a different decision.  Luckily the construction didn't seem to effect our visit.  The staff was super nice and very helpful.  The room construction was complete so the room was nice.  The hotel served the purpose and was overall good.
Manager Response: TiffanyJJR,        Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!  I would like to know how you booked your reservation as we have made notes on all of our websites as well as have let all of our third party booking companies know.   I would like to be able to address this for future.  Although i am sorry to hear you encountered this, i am so glad to hear that the renovations did not effect your visit, and that our staff was so nice and helpful.     I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim and for you to see the finished product!

Summary: Great location. Only 10 min from the parks. The rooms were recently renovated so all furniture were new. Very clean as well. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: eranv257,        Thank you for leaving such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!  I am so glad to hear that you liked our newly renovated rooms and that we are in a great location for you!!  I appreciate you recommending us and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to the parks!

Summary Heading: sewage smell from bathroom sink. Fridge door was broke. Construction everywhere
Summary: Bad sewage smell in bathroom. Construction everywhere when they said it would be done in September on website. Door that covered fridge broke first time we opened it and was never fixed. No pool
Manager Response: 58shayg,         Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your recent stay with us.  I do appreciate the feedback as it is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain and where need be improve on our services we provide to our valued guests. I will be sending you a private message in hopes to find some more information on the room you stayed in so i can address the issues of the smell and the fridge cabinet door.   I would also like to know which website you booked through so i can address the end date of renovation they have posted.   Thank you for your time and for being our guest.  I do hope you will contact me personally during your next visit to Anaheim so i can have the chance to show you how great of a hotel we truly are!

Summary: Very good service, clean room and excellent housekeeping service, close distance from Disneyland, front desk personnel very friendly, only issue was no parking but other than that everything was excellent
Manager Response: Claudia M E,        Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your recent stay with us!  I am so glad to hear about the excellent housekeeping service and the friendly front desk staff!   I am glad that we are in a great location for you to Disneyland and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit!

Summary: Great place to stay during our trip to Disney. The property was in the process of a remodel during our stay, but the work was limited to the exterior of the building. The rooms had been recently updated and they were absolutely amazing! I would definitely come back.
Manager Response: K5532JJalbertg,         Thank you for your great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!  I am so glad to hear you liked our newly remodeled rooms.   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!

Summary Heading: This was our first time at this hotel and we will...
Summary: This was our first time at this hotel and we will definitely consider coming back as it would be nice to enjoy it again once the renovation is complete. The staff truly couldn't be any more genuinely warm and friendly. We were greeted with a smile EVERY single time we entered the lobby, so nice! The rooms were super comfy and tastefully renovated. Even the fridge was a little on the larger side with a tiny freezer to refreeze our ice packs so our water bottles were cold all day at Disneyland. There's even a Keurig in the room! The walk to Disneyland not bad at all, even for coming back to the hotel mid-day for a break. I definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: melindal486,        Thank you for taking the time to leave such a nice review from your recent stay with us!  I am delighted to hear you that you liked our newly renovated rooms and that our staff was so warm and friendly!     Thank you for recommending this hotel and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to to Disneyland!

Summary: Even though the hotel was under renovations, our stay was very pleasant. Can't wait to stay again after the renovations are completed
Manager Response: D8246XUloric,        Thank you for leaving such an excellent review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am so glad to hear that your stay was so pleasant and i can't wait to welcom you back during your next trip for you to see our final product!

Summary: Ramada plaza is affordable comfortable clean and most importantly easy walking distance from Disneyland! Also close to strip mall for food and shopping, Walgreens and Starbucks across the street! I loved the rooms the beds are very comfortable and they just reconstructed the hotel so very modern looking. All staff are very nice and pleasant. Thanks Andy!
Manager Response: PandaBoo16,        Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!  I am so glad to hear that we are in the perfect location for you and that you loved our new rooms.   Thank you for your kind words in regards to our staff and for mentioning Andy, we pride ourselves on our guest service and Andy is one of our leaders so i am thrilled it shows!!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Wonderful hotel even in the renovation. The complementary bags and water they gave out were perfect snacks. And the staff (sorry guys the business cards on the bags were lost or I would write your names) were friendly, helpful and overall really positive. The noise of the renovation was minimal. Because everything inside the hotel is new and updated, voices in the hallways can carry but not enough not to stay in this hotel.   The room we stayed in was really nice and the beds were really comfortable. Usually a major concern to someone who hasn't been to this hotel before. It is a 12 to 15 minute walk to the gates of Disneyland.  We would stay at The Ramada Plaza Anaheim again. The price for a night are comparable to everyone else but the free underground parking and staff puts
Manager Response: C4788JBmarks,         Thank you for taking the time to leave such a Wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am thrilled to hear you enjoyed our new rooms and the comfortable beds, as well as that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!    It sounds like we are in the perfect location for you and i do hope I have the chance to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!  Thank you again and see you soon!

Summary Heading: Great location, clean room - renovations in progress
Summary: We stayed in this hotel for a trip to Disneyland, and the location was great (approx. 15 minute walk to Disneyland with a toddler in a stroller). Our floor/room had been recently renovated and were very nice and clean. Good room size (2 queens and a sofa bed) and it was nice to have a fridge and microwave. No bathtub, which wasn't a problem for us but those with smaller children might prefer it. The hotel was still in the process of renovating the lower floor, including the lobby, fitness room, and pool, but arrangements were made to use the fitness facility and pool at the hotel next door.  (We didn't use them as we were at the park all day, but good to know if those are important to you.) Loved that we didn't have to pay a resort fee or for parking. I think the only thing that
Manager Response: katiewH5913TZ,        Thank you for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us!  I am delighted to hear that our location was so great for you and your family, and that you enjoyed so many aspects of our new rooms!!  If a bathtub would help in the future with your child, please let us know as we do have a couple of room types that do offer a tub.  In regards to breakfast we do have packages that it is included.  Please feel free to contact us directly prior to your next trip and we would be more than happy to go over these packages with you!  Thank you again and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Disneyland!!

Summary: We arrived at 1 am and were still able to check in without an issue. Late check-out not a problem quick walk to Disneyland this was a great hotel to stay when visiting DL. Lots of food nearby to the hotel and 24 hour Walgreens across the street. We are going back next month and stay at this hotel for certain.  The beds are like sleeping on clouds. :)
Manager Response: justinwA4660HT,        Thank you for taking the time to provide such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am so glad to hear our front desk team made your late arrival perfect, and that we are in the perfect location for you!  The new beds are one of my favorite parts of the room as well, they are so soft and i am glad our guests approve!   I look forward to welcoming you back next month!!

Summary: Under renovation but the rooms are clean and new, the walk to Disneyland is under 10 minutes, the staff is helpful and the price, you can not beat! Parking is included in the price and no resort fee tacked on.
Manager Response: lisak56,        Thank you for leaving a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am glad to hear that we are in a perfect location for you to Disneyland, you enjoyed our new rooms, and that our staff was so helpful for you!!    I am glad you appreciate that we do not have any other fees on top of our room and tax.  We like our guests to get their quote and not have to worry about anything else!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: Despite being under construction, our stay at this hotel was awesome!!  The front staff...each and every one of them....were always so friendly and helpful and should be commended for providing outstanding customer service!!  From the check in/out process, to giving suggestions on places to go, to booking a cab, and providing details about the theme parks, they were always so helpful and accommodating and always greeted us with a smile.  The room we stayed in had been newly renovated and was very modern and so bright and clean and the beds were super comfortable. The bathroom was spectacular as well with plenty of room to get ready and a huge glass shower!  Our room was also equipped with several USB ports which was a welcome addition and a very nice modern touch. The upgrades
Manager Response: Joan L,        Thank you for taking the time to leave such an Amazing review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!!  I am delighted to hear that we are in the perfect location for you and that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms!  The USB ports are my favorite thing i look for when i travel as well so my family and i can ensure we are all charged up!    Your comments on our staff are greatly appreciated and well received, we pride ourselves on our customer service and being able to bring people into our home and make memories!   Thank you again for the review and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: Under renovation could have been more discriptive as to what would not be open to use, pool etc. restaurant food was cold! Asked for a razor never got it. No water available for the coffee maker
Manager Response: 817lydiac,         Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback from your recent stay with us.   It is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests.   I do apologize if the description was not detailed enough, and i will gladly go back and revisit that.   I do hope it was communicated with you when you arrived that we have a pool and fitness center to use out our sister property right next door to us.  As for the restaurant food, and the lack of follow through on your razor request, i will most definitely follow up with quality tests to ensure this does not happen again in the future.    I do hope you will give us a second chance and contact me personally during your next trip to Anaheim so i can ensure you have a perfect get away and show you how we are a premier hotel destination in the Anaheim Resort area!   Thank you again for your time and valuable feedback.

Summary: Even though the exterior of the building, the lobby and the pool were being remodeled the room was updated and very nice. The bathroom was clean and the USB ports in the room were a nice modern touch. nicely done.
Manager Response: jnoahh,         Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!   I am glad to hear you liked our newly remodeled rooms, and that the multiple USB ports were a nice touch for you!    I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Will happily stay here again and again!
Summary: The rooms are all updated and clean. The beds were sooo comfortable, slept like a baby. The best part of the hotel is the staff! Every single staff member we spoke to was friendly and helpful! They made the hotel even more inviting! I would happily stay here for every Disney trip!!!
Manager Response: lindatF4741IA,        Thank you for reviewing your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am so glad to hear you liked the new rooms, and that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!!    I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!!

Summary: My family and I have stayed here several times and not once have we had a problem. Staff is just amazing, rooms are super clean, location is great.
Manager Response: WoknMel,        Thank you for your great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am so glad to hear how we continue to impress you each stay!  It is nice to hear that you like our rooms, location, and that our staff is consistently amazing!    I look forward to welcoming you back home during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: We have been coming to this hotel for months now since we got our annual passes for Disneyland. It's a perfect distance from Disneyland, the rooms are nice and new, service was awesome as well. This time we brought my boyfriends parents with us and they enjoyed it too. Definitely coming back.
Manager Response: jesseniavn,         Thank you for taking the time to leave such a nice review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I would also like to thank you for coming back to our property and making us your home for Disneyland.  I am glad to hear you like our new rooms, as well as that our service was so awesome!   I hope you, your boyfriend, and his parents had a great trip and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland adventure!

Summary: I booked this hotel for its proximity to Disneyland. I took a chance and it paid off. The hotel is undergoing major construction right now. So if you don’t mind the check in area being a little out of sorts, you’ll be happy. I checked in and was told my room was on the 4th floor. Which she said they just finished remodeling. The entire 4th floor was clean. Hallways, etc. And the room looked brand new as well. Actually like it had never been used before. The bathroom was amazing. Clean, upgraded. Very impressive. I’m a hotel snob. And a tough grader. So I rarely give 5 stars. But this place was so new and clean that it deserves it. I’m sure after time the rooms will deteriorate. But as of right now, I was very impressed. Just ignore the dust and construction downstairs.
Manager Response: mattymatt95125,        Thank you for leaving such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am so glad that you took a chance on us and it paid off!!   We are so close to being finished with our full remodel and I can't wait for you to experience the entire property, not just the great guest floors!   I am glad to hear that we have impressed a tough grader, and can't wait to welcome you back during your next Disneyland trip!!

Summary: Booked a room weeks ago so I could see the Angels MLB team play nearby.  This hotel was great.  Plan on staying here again.  Close to many nearby family and upscale restaurants and easy public transportation.  Staff very friendly.  Feel I got more than my money's worth!
Manager Response: James S,        Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am glad to hear we are in a perfect location for you to the park, restaurants, and transportation.    I do appreciate the comments on our friendly staff as that is what we pride ourselves on!     I look forward to welcoming you back next season for more Angels games, and hopefully some playoff games as well ;)     Thank you again for your time!

Summary: If you can look beyond the construction which is advertised, you should be good.  Yes, parking is a pain when you 1st check-in but after check-in there is no worries you park under the building.   Room was cozy, fluffy pillows, clean bedding & bathroms. Everything is near by.  Really couldn't complain for the price.  Got a great deal.   If someone was to ask if i would return? If the price is right...yes.
Manager Response: E9133ZZjv,        Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!  I am glad to hear that you liked our newly renovated rooms and that we are in a great location for you with everything near by!   Thank you for your feedback in regards to parking as that is something we will look into to help simplify while we are in our finishing stages of remodel.    I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Great location, but be aware of ongoing remodel
Summary: I read the reviews about the ongoing remodel at this hotel – and thank God for that because they don’t advertise it anywhere. It would be a rude awakening if you just booked and showed up to see that this place looks like it’s in the middle of war zone.   By the time I got there at the end of September 2017, the rooms had been redone and they were working on the first floor, lobby, pool, and exterior. Apparently this remodel has been going on for a year and a half, so I could have nothing but pity for the front desk workers. They were all congenial, helpful, and responsive, which I have to give them credit for given the circumstances.   So, the public areas of this place are a mess at the moment. And if you want to use a pool, fitness center, or laundry, you have to go next door
Manager Response: 763bobb,         Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  I am glad you had read reviews about our hotel prior to coming, and that you were comfortable after reading reviews to come and join us.   We do have the renovations posted on all of our booking sites, as well as third party booking sites.   I am glad you feel the remodel is nice, and i do appreciate your feedback in regards to the work being done.  That is something i will definitely have to inspect closer.   It sounds like we are in a great location for you to Disney and the Garden Walk, and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland trip!

Summary: So...it only gets 3 stars now as the hotel is undergoing a complete renovation and will be rebranded to a Wyndham Garden Inn when complete.   If you need less expensive lodging, close to Disney entrance, food and groceries, without any resort amenities (pool, fitness, etc...) then this is a good option. Very convenient.   The staff was super friendly and helpful (especially Ozzie), and they dealt with a couple of lingering room issues quickly.   The renovated room (king + sofa) was quite nice and spacious. Room could have used some extra soundproofing, but it was nice and we would stay there again.
Manager Response: Michael M,         Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!  I am glad to hear we are in a great location for you and that our staff, especially Ozzie, was so friendly and helpful!  I do apologize you experienced a few room issues, but am glad to hear the staff was able to resolve them for you quickly.   For your next trip, we do offer the pool, fitness center, and Laundry room at our sister property right next door to us for use. Please feel free to take advantage of the amenities at any time!!      Thank you again and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!

Summary: Though they are undergoing construction, the room itself was excellent and the service was superb!
Manager Response: bluer00t,        Thank you for taking the time to leave a great review from your recent stay with us.  I am glad to hear you enjoyed our excellent room and that our service was superb!!     I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: Great location for Disney trip and family stay.
Summary: We just stayed there with a family of 5. We booked a room with 2 queen beds, but had an extra child , so they upgraded us to a 2 queen + 1 couch bed room for free!!! The rooms are very nicely remodeled, very comfortable! I loved their pillows and blankets!  The room had a good size fridge, microwave and a coffee maker.  Walking from Disney about 10-15 minutes, or you can take a shuttle.  Parking is free.  Across the street there is Walgreens, CVS, and Starbucks. Down the street there is Denny's , pizza place, Cheesecake Factory, stake place, etc... the hotel itself has a restaurant -Indian, but has an American breakfast ( not a free breakfast)  The staff is very helpful and friendly! They always greeted us with a smile.  The hotel has completely met our expectations and needs.
Manager Response: Lucy J,        Thank you for leaving such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am glad to hear that our staff was able to be so accommodating for you and your family of 5!  I am glad we are in such a perfect location for you and that you like our newly remodeled rooms!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland trip so we can not just meet your expectations, but be able to exceed them!!

Summary: Nice and clean,friendly staff,reasonable price for room,close many restaurants and food to go,little Saigon.You can have a coffee or tea at anytime at the lobby,of course  do it yourself,re menber not the best,just okay...
Manager Response: Baynguyen,         Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  I am glad to hear that that we are in a perfect location for you and that our staff was so friendly!    I do appreciate your feedback on our complimentary coffee and tea service we provide and will definitely check the quality.  Thank you again and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Stayed at the Ramada plaza anaheim on Katella and the room quality was excellent, especially for the value. The beds were soft and the room looked like it was recently remodeled. The hotel is currently undergoing a renovation so you may have some construction noise. We will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: nacho2oo2,        Thank you for leaving such an excellent review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am delighted to hear that you liked our newly remodeled rooms and that the beds were nice and soft!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: I came during the remodeling but I knew about it in advance and was prepared. The lobby isn't done, but the floor I'm staying on and the room I'm in Is. It's nice and clean and the beds are comfortable however we came for mickeys Halloween party and when we returned to our room after a day at Disney to change into our costumes two items of my clothing were missing and unfortunately one of them was the main piece to my costume (a black dress). I don't know if it was an accident or what, but realizing you don't have your costume right before you need it, is incredibly frustrating. In addition there was a strong foul sewer smell coming from the sink in the bathroom and the rooms have roller blinds but no black out curtains. There is a coffee pot in the room, so you can bring your
Manager Response: Cheri B,         Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback from your recent stay with us.  Although i am glad to hear that you enjoyed our newly remodeled rooms and the amenities we have to offer inside, i am displeased to hear about the missing item from your room.  I will follow up with all staff in regards to this and if you would like to discuss your experience any further please do not hesitate to contact me at your convenience.    I look forward to speaking with you and having the opportunity to welcome you back in the future!

Summary: Hotel staff were super friendly and welcoming from the moment we arrived! Front desk were able to accommodate our needs and every time we left for the park they helped with valuable information to save time and money! Rooms are also very clean and up to date, beds were amazing! Although, they are doing construction to the place there wasn't any disruptions! Place is within walking distance to Disneyland with is a plus! And we didn't pay an arm and leg for our 4 day stay! Would HIGHLY recommend!
Manager Response: 58chelseak,         Thank you for taking the time to leave such a fantastic review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!  I am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms and our amazing new beds!!  Thank you as well for your comments in regards to our staff.   Our customer service is what we pride ourselves on!!     I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland trip!!

Summary Heading: Nice Renovated rooms and close to disneyland
Summary: Excellent renovated rooms... outside appearance still not good due to construction but i care about room only so satisfied and will come again.. and walking distance to disneyland and restaurants. Overall good
Manager Response: deepak0278,        Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  I am so glad to hear you liked our excellent renovated rooms.   It also sounds like we are in the perfect location for you!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: Great stay. We were welcomed with a smile and a "Welcome back". The welcome drink and snack bag was much appreciated. Our room was super comfortable. The renovation is almost completed. The room for disabilities is excellent.
Manager Response: GenevieveMc,        Thank you for coming back and taking the time to leave such an amazing review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!     I am so glad to hear that the staff made your welcome so memorable and nice, and that your room was super comfortable.    I look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to Anaheim, or your next Anniversary!!

Summary: My GF and I have had the worst of luck with hotels but this one was definitely not one of them. We arrived late at night and yes you could tell the hotel was undergoing some extreme renovations but that didn't bother us one bit. Made us feel like it was part of DisneyLands Halloween Theme lol. Anyways we arrived late and I can't remember the guys name but the receptionist with blonde hair had us Checked in and in our room within 5 minutes, which was amazing because we were tired. The room was amazing, we loved it. Got a call every single morning from the front desk asking if we needed anything. Whenever we came back the sheets were replaced and everything was cleaned up. The day before our last we came back to the room looking for one of our debit cards and called front desk
Manager Response: Samuel A,        Thank you for taking the time to leave such a nice review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!  I am so glad to hear that our staff was able to make this the Best Vacation you've had!!   I am thrilled to hear how the staff was always smiling and welcoming whenever you passed by and that they were able to assist you with your card.      It sounds like we are in a perfect location for you and i can't wait to welcome you and your girlfriend back during your next Disneyland trip!

Summary: Very nice staff, hotel rooms are modern, super close to disneyland. You could buy tickets at hotel lobby. Hotel is under construction however it can go unnoticed not a bother at all. They coffee in the lobby and in rooms. The bed is real soft.
Manager Response: Martha R,         Thank you for your Excellent review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am so glad to hear how friendly our staff was to you, that you liked our newly renovated room, and as well as our close location to Disneyland!!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Disneyland!
