Summary: Was under renovation but if you look past that to the convenience to Disneyland, it is a good value. the renovated rooms are nice. Would be nice if bottled water was provided for use with the keurig.
Manager Response: melissarW8197HU,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.   I am glad to hear that the convenience to Disneyland was good for you and you liked the newly renovated rooms.   The bottled water use for the Keurig is a great idea that we will visit!  Thank you for the suggestion.     I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: We stayed here and booked a room through Hotels Tonight in August. We stayed at the end of the hall where the rooms next to the rooms that were about to be renovated. It was a little bit loud in the morning, but not terribly loud, which is to be expected. The staff could not have been any nicer! Really great staff for check-in and check-out.
Manager Response: TravelerMcGeezus,         Thank you for your Good review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!  Thank you for your understanding during the renovation process and i am glad it was not terribly loud for you.   Those last few rooms have been completed since your stay and all of our guest rooms are done!!   I am so glad to hear how nice our staff was and how the check in and check out process was great!!  Thank you for taking the time and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: We stayed here last week while we were visiting Disneyland. We have 3 kids aged 1.5,4 and 8 plus my husband and I. The hotel was under exterior construction but we asked for a quiet room and we were put on the other side of the hotel and seriously never heard a sound of construction! It was a bit annoying that the front desk area was so small for the construction period but everything else was wonderful. The rooms are updAted and the beds and pillows are so comfy. We had an awesome view of the fireworks from our room! The room was always cleaned really nicely and the staff at the front were so nice and welcoming when we would leave or come back. We had a great stay! Walk to Disneyland was about 10 minutes :)  We walked every morning and twice I hopped on a bus at the end of the
Manager Response: 469briannan,         Thank you for your wonderful review of your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!  I am so glad to hear that that our staff was able to accommodate your request and place you and your family in a nice quiet location.  I am also glad to hear you loved our new rooms and your view.   Thank you for your feedback in regards to our temporary lobby, although it is small we do our best to make it comfortable and to provide all the amenities that we would have in our regular lobby.  We are hopeful of being back in our main lobby very shortly!!  Thank you again for taking the to leave such a wonderful review and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland trip!!

Summary: The hotel was under renovation, but the new rooms are beautiful! Bedding and pillows make you feel like you're sleeping on a cloud. Staff was extremely friendly, polite, and helpful. Wish I spent more than just 2 nights there!
Manager Response: Angela H,         Thank you so much for your Excellent review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am so glad to hear you like our new rooms and that our staff was so friendly and helpful to you!    I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim for a longer stay with us!!

Summary Heading: Always made to feel like a VIP!
Summary: Once again my stay at this hotel was the BEST!  I always feel very welcomed and important when I stay here.  Even through their renovation of the property, all of the staff have a smile on their face and always ask if there is anything they can do to make my stay more enjoyable.  I'm always sad to leave, but know that when I return it will feel like coming home--thank you Ozzie, Josh, Jane,  Andrew, Stacy, Dionne, Mickie and everyone at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim!!
Manager Response: Vanessa R,         Thank you so much for your amazing review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.    It has been such a pleasure meeting you and getting to know you over the past few months.   We as well are sad when you leave, but that makes us even more excited when you come back home!!     Thank you again for your review, and making us your home away from home!!    We can't wait to see you again very soon!!

Summary Heading: Will be a great hotel when finished - Will stay again
Summary: Although the property was under construction when we stayed, the staff was amazing, so helpful and kind, they really where great.  Never heard the construction as they have very restricted hours which the staff told us about before hand.  We stayed in a newly renovated room, it was very well done, the bed was super comfortable and the shower was awesome.  I loved that this hotel had underground parking and was also steps away from some yummy restaurants.  We walked to Disneyland and it was an easy walk and especially nice with a some convenience stores on the corner to pick up some snacks and/or drinks.
Manager Response: Christina R,         Thank you for your nice review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am thrilled to hear that our staff was so amazing and helpful for you, as well as that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms.     I am also glad that the renovations didn't impact your stay, and that we are in such a great location for you.   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Disneyland!!

Summary Heading: Remodeling at the moment, otherwise excellent.
Summary: Newly renovated room. Friendly staff. Very clean room. Bright with plenty of outlets. Soft and supportive mattress. Thick towels. K-cup coffee maker was a treat. Underground parking. Within walking distance to Disneyland. Remodeling noise starts at 8 AM. But it was not a problem since we were going to spend the day at Disneyland and not the hotel. Had to give 4 star because of the construction noise and equipment.
Manager Response: mayw551,        Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us.  I am so glad to hear how friendly our staff was and that you liked so many aspects of our hotel.      I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland trip and for you to see the amazing product when we are completed shortly.

Summary: Great newly remodeled rooms. Loved the nice big shower. Can't wait to see the entire hotel when its all finished. Super nice front desk staff. I have no complaints and will be back in a month.  Easy safe walk to Disneyland resort.
Manager Response: PinkGirlsx3,     Thank you so much for your lovely review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am so glad to hear how much you loved your stay and that our desk staff were super nice to you!!  I look forward to welcoming you back next month!!

Summary: The room was clean and it is a great location for disney but they are the only positives of this hotel! Staff were very unhelpful and actually rude at times! We stayed in a room were the door didn't lock properly. We told the reception staff that morning and were assured it would be seen to when we came back 12 hours later after being at disney all day they had not done anything about it - our belongings had been unsecured all day. When I called reception they wanted to check the door themselves before they would move us to another room which was very unprofessional we felt - like we would lie about a broken door  - we were not gaining anything from moving rooms! He was then shocked when he came to the room and it really didn't work. The room cleaners disturbed us twice the
Manager Response: Jenlpsg,    Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your recent stay with us.   It is through feedback both positive and negative where we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests.  Although an apology does not change the experience you had, i do enlist one with all sincerity.   I am so disappointed to hear about the interactions you had with our staff, as guest service is normally an area that we shine in.  I will be addressing these situations with the staff personally, as well as the door lock situation.  The door lock situation is something that needs to be taken extremely serious as that is security and safety for our guests!    If you would like to discuss your past stay any further please do not hesitate to contact me at any time.   I do hope that when you are back in the Anaheim area again you will personally call me so i can show you how we are truly one of the best destinations in Anaheim, and to ensure you have a flawless trip.    Thank you again for taking the time and i do hope to hear from you soon!!

Summary: Even though extensive remodeling was occurring during our stay, it was very pleasant. The staff was extremely friendly and helpful. The room was very nice, obviously recently redone.
Manager Response: michaeldE4788EZ,        Thank you for your nice review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am please you had a pleasant stay with us and our remodel didn't impact your stay.   Thank you for your kind words about our staff, that is what we pride our selves on and i am glad it shows!!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: I really liked this hotel.  Even though it's under renovation I still felt like it was well set up and they did well hiding the renovations.
Manager Response: F1132OLangelag,         Thank you for your review from your recent trip with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am thrilled to hear you had a Good Stay!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: My first issue was when I first pulled up, I couldn't find the hotel. I thought to myself maybe it was tucked in between some buildings. And to my surprise I saw a building undergoing construction and said "It cant be that place, right?" Well it was. I thought I was catfished into a third party hotel booking scam! So I go in and sure enough it was the hotel I booked, and they were renovating.  Second issue; I had to pay full price for an incomplete hotel. The pool, fitness center, and laundry center we not available via this hotel due to the renovations. Instead we had to go to "Hotel Indigo" (Their sister hotel)to be able to access that (Which is the hotel next to it). And our "view" was blocked by scaffolds.  My final issue; the A/C!  Possibly one of the most important
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was under construction (mainly outside and lobby area) while we stayed there.  The room we stayed was super nice- beds were extremely comfortable and loved the fact that there was a mini fridge and microwave available.  The bathroom was lovely as well however, we had to deal with a 'sewage smell' coming out of the sink the entire time we there.  I want to assume it was because of the construction going on.  Other than that, we were SUPER pleased with everything overall.  The front staff were extremely nice as well.  We would definitely be staying there every time we go to Disneyland!  GREAT WALKING DISTANCE TO BOTH PARKS!!
Manager Response: patty906,        Thank you very much for the great review from your recent stay with us.   Although i am sad to hear that you encounter a smell during your stay, i am so glad to hear that everything else was SUPER!   It sounds like all the amenities we have to offer were a perfect fit for you!   Thank you for your kind words in regards to our staff as that is what makes us shine and i am glad it shows!  Thank you again and I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Disneyland!!

Summary Heading: Nice resort (or will be once construction done)
Summary: Rooms are recently update and larger then expected. Really loved the room. They are still in construction of the lobby and lower floors so had to walk through to even get to elevator. Once done believe it will be really nice and a nice walk to Disney.
Manager Response: Tanya E,        Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am so glad to hear that you loved our newly renovated rooms and hopefully you look forward to staying with us again when we complete our renovations shortly.    Thank you again and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!

Summary: The room was up to date; the location was walking distance to convenient stores and restaurants; they have free parking and WiFi; the problem is that there were ants everywhere in our room and that ruined our stay.  Without the ant problem, its a great hotel.
Manager Response: 534priscillaw,         Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback from your recent stay with us.  Although an apology doesn't change the fact you encountered such an issue, i do enlist one with all sincerity.  We have taken the necessary steps to ensure this problem is rectified and will not happen again.   Although you encountered this problem, i am glad to hear everything else including our location and amenities were great for you.   Please do not hesitate to contact me directly during your next trip to Anaheim so i can personally ensure your stay is fantastic!

Summary Heading: Customer service is the only good thing!!
Summary: I really appreciated the customer service and trying to make my stay very pleasant. I got out into a room that seemed clean but when looking around was disgusting. Hair in the shower. Dirty towels. Hair in the sheets. Buggers & stains on the pillows. I got transferred into another room at least the beds were fine but the floor was stained and had sticky spots on the floor. Stairs on the chairs. I know they are renovating and maybe it will be better but as of now I will not be going back to find out. The customer service was awesome though. They were very welcoming and polite.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were there last week. And we had a amazing experience. The service was great and its really close to Disneyland.  The only bad thing its that they are remodeling the hotel and it doesn't have a great view from the outside.but other that that we will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Danydd87,         Thank you for your nice review from your recent stay with us last week.  I am very glad to hear you had an amazing experience and that we seem to be in a perfect location for you!!    I do apologize about the view from the renovations, but i am delighted that the service was so great and hopefully made up for that.      I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Disneyland and for you to see the beautiful hotel we will be when our renovations are completed soon!

Summary: Location is perfect and the staff is one of the friendliest I've ever encountered at a hotel. Rooms are very nice and comfortable. The construction didn't bother me because the rooms are so comfortable and the hotel made arrangements for guests to use the amenities at the neighboring hotel which was really nice.
Manager Response: Rosie F,         Thank you for taking the time to leave such a nice review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am glad that we are in a perfect location for you and so thrilled to here how we have one of the friendliest staff team you have ever encountered at a hotel!!       I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!!

Summary Heading: Under construction but still great rooms
Summary: The hotel was under construction so the building was in disarray, but the staff was very accommodating and rooms were comfortable. However there was a Pokémon convention and nobody was helping handle crowds that were blocking traffic entrances/exits.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to provide a review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am glad to hear that our staff was so accommodating for you and the rooms were comfortable.  I appreciate the feedback about the crowd control and do apologize about the inconvenience.  This is great to know so i can anticipate this for the future.     Thank you again for your time as it is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests.

Summary Heading: Service was great but when we made reservations we were not...
Summary: Service was great but when we made reservations we were not advised that they were under renovation and the appearance was horrible
Manager Response: alexandracR8825PH,         Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback from your recent stay with us.  I am sorry that the renovations were not communicated to you upon booking your reservation.  We do have the renovations posted on all web outlets and our staff is all trained to notify guests prior to booking when they book directly with us.  I will definitely follow up with all staff and channels of booking to ensure this is being properly communicated.  I am glad to hear that our service was great and as we are nearing the completion of our renovations, i do hope to see you back so you can enjoy our great service combined with the outstanding product we will have!  Thank you again for your time and for being our guest!

Summary: I was blown away by the rooms here. We had stayed a couple years ago and they have done quite a bit of upgrading. The manager Ozzy was great, very welcoming and helpful. I didn't even notice the construction going on
Manager Response: 42meaganr,         Thank you for taking the time to leave such a wonderful review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am so glad to hear that you were blown away by the newly renovated rooms.   Thank you for personally mentioning Ozzie.  He is a big asset to us and i am so glad that it showed with you!!       Thank you for being our guest and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: This hotel was under renovation, so a few inconveniences from that, but the staff made up for it. They were always friendly & greeted when we came & went. They found out why we were there & took an interest in how things were going. The room was clean, roomy & pleasant. This is by far the best Ramada we've stayed at. I give cleanliness a lower rating only because of the renovation. I never give excellent ratings. Really enjoyed our stay here.
Manager Response: Jim L,        Thank you for the great review from your recent stay!  I am glad that you enjoyed our new rooms, and that our staff was so great to you and made up for the renovations.  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: The room we stayed in was beautifully redecorated.  BUT, we were on the 4th floor just below the AC compressors and it was very noisy all day and night.  The room never really cooled down.  Thumbs down for the noise.  Thumbs up for the room.
Manager Response: jamesmI2009AN,         Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your recent stay, and for making your wedding stay with us!!  I do apologize about the noise you incurred during your stay with us.  Please do not ever hesitate to let us know right away so we can fix anything that may be wrong for you right away.  I am glad that you enjoyed our newly redecorated rooms!!    Please do not hesitate to contact me during your next trip to Anaheim, or if you would like to stay at your wedding hotel again in the future!!

Summary: Got a special discounted rate since they are undergoing construction on the outside.  Inside the room is really nice and new.  Since we are out the entire time at disneyland anyway, the outside construction doesn't bother us at all.  It's a good 10 mins walk to disneyland.  Very convenient.
Manager Response: MyTravel2013,        Thank you for the great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am so glad to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms and that the renovation process did not bother you at all!    Thank you again for your time and I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: We used this hotel for a quick weekend trip to Disneyland. The lobby staff was great, they answered all of our questions and provided she me good tips about public transportation to the park. The room was very clean and upgraded. We had 2 queens and a pullout sofa and it fit our family of 5 comfortably. Construction was still going on when we were there but that wasn't an issue for us. The kids like the fact that there were 2 Pokémon go stops that could be reached from our room. This was a great room at a great price and the construction was not an issue.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Front desk staff= Amazing, they were an absolute joy to speak and work with! Great team. We got to the room and it was so clean, modern intererior, the shower was beautiful ( was hoping for a bathtub?) We had 2 queen beds and the blankets didn't feel like " icky" hotel blankets. It was EASY to fall asleep in that delicious bed . Thank you Ramada
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was undergoing major construction so upon arrival I was very nervous about my future experience. The staff were the friendliest staff I've ever experienced at a hotel, the rooms were modern sleek clean and new. Construction was during a reasonable hours and did not begin until 8 AM which ensured that guests were able to receive quality sleep.  If construction had been occurring I didn't notice because the staff were kind enough to place our room on the opposite side of the building. Parking was easy in the underground parking garage once we received our room keys.  We were literally across the street from the Anaheim convention center and within a five minute walk of the garden walk at downtown Disney. For that location and cleanliness and friendly staff I would have
Manager Response: none

Summary: I made reservation online, but I did not know they are making renovation the hotel. When we got there at night I thought the hotel was closed, but when we park we saw the sign lobby hotel. I was expected the room is dusty or not a good room, so when we open our room I was surprised, because the room was cleaned and new wood floor and a bed. I told the front desk that we really enjoyed staying the hotel and we will come back again soon. 😊
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is located within walking distance of the garden walk and other restaurants and shops. Great location. Regardless all the renovations going on, the hotel staff made all of the accommodations to meet our needs. The room was recently remodel. It felt new and it was clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Don't judge a book by its cover
Summary: WOW! The outside of this hotel looks like something from Frankenstein meets the Werewolf. The room we stayed in was recently remodeled and was awesome. The staff is over-the-top great and super kind.  It got even when we realized that it really was a very short walk to Disney. Noise? What noise? We never heard a thing.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Not what you think it is
Summary: Clean room, somewhat friendly staff. Totally under construction though! It was a mess!  Didn't even know where to park my car to check in. Construction debris everywhere, pool not open or gym. They said if we wanted to use the hotels next door to let them know :(   My daughter left her brand new glasses on the nightstand. Called them right after we checked out to head home, said that it wasn't there. We had just checked out, really ?!! Would not recommend this place at all.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great staff very helpful. Nice rooms and a perfect location to everything. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Went on trip with my daughter.  Absolutely love the new room remodel!! Will definitely stay again and again. The staff was so very kind.  They were under construction but we still enjoyed our stay!  Highly recommend this Ramada!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: It was the best of times and the worst of times ...
Summary: I'll summarize our 3 night stay in 3 categories; the good, the bad and the ugly. The hotel room was recently remodeled with stunning décor! Awesome walk-in glass door shower with a "rain" shower head and a hand held wand.  Well lit vanity (light from above and from the perimeter of the mirror!), with an above vanity bowl sink. Wonderfully soft pillow top beds.  Very cushy carpeting.  Nice flat screen TV with good DirecTV channels.  USB charging outlets.  Medium sized refrigerator with a freezer.  NFC room key.  Nice ambient lighting.  The people at the front desk were OVER THE TOP nice. They were even nicer than the cast members at Disneyland.  Now for the bad.  The hotel was still in the process of being remodeled, which was NOT communicated to us.  During the week days
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beds and pillows were very comfortable. Loved that room had a fridge since we didn't have access to ice machine. For the high price we paid, hotel really need to update their tv. They should add a few complimentary items to make their customer feel special since they do not offer breakfast. Most likely won't stay their again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This property was under complete renovation outside, and some inside. We called and asked for a Disney view and they did admit that there could be "some scaffolding". The entire building had scaffolding and plastic covering the windows. The entrance was literally a hard hat area. The pool and work out room were unavailable but you could go next door to the hotel that was there and use theirs. The restaurant that is attached is an Indian restaurant. Not good. Don't try it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: There Ramada Plaza Anaheim is a great hotel. Although parts of the hotel is still under construction (the exterior of the hotel is fully.under construction and doesn't look the best), but all the rooms are already fully renovated and they are very nice and clean. Construction starts around 7:30 am in the morning but it's not too loud. If you're staying here for Disneyland, you probably won't be in the room during construction hours any way. So that's good.  A few reviews have mentioned that it's a 10 min walk. But it's more of a 20 min walk. But it's not too too bad.   Overall it's a very nice and newly renovated hotel and would recommend it to friends if they go to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a mixed review.  The Ramada is under significant remodel, so I am trying to be somewhat fair. So, while the ROOM was nice, the rest of the hotel was a mess (first floor, parking lot, exterior, etc.) .. it didn't give a very good first impression.  The employees were nice enough, and apologetic.  When I asked about an exercise room, I was told that the exercise room and pool and bar were available in the 'sister' hotel the Hotel Indigo  across the parking lot, BUT, in the exercise room - 2 out of the 3 machines were broken, there was no water, the exercise balls were underinflated... Overall, relatively disappointing.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The hotel exterior is undergoing extensive renovation, so...
Summary: The hotel exterior is undergoing extensive renovation, so guests need to use the pool next door, and the temporary lobby is a bit snug. But that pool is wonderful and every person on each property staff was warm and accomodating
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Being remodel, and new rooms are nice.  10 min walk to Disneyland.
Summary: Stayed with family (five) in room with two queen beds and one sofa couch.  Room, newly renovated was very nice.  Except, yes always a but, for the Air conditioning.  The A/C system is a vented system in the ceiling.  This system dripped water, forming several puddles.  We had to to have them fix it.  However, even with the fix (stopped leaking) the room still had high humidity.  We noticed that even with this remodel, there is already water damage to the plaster (so it's been happening for some time).  When I spoke with the front desk they indicated this has been an issue.  We were surprised when we arrived, that the hotel was in renovation.  The website and booking never indicated that it was in repair.  It didn't affect the our stay, and the new rooms are really nice.  The
Manager Response: none

Summary: We first came here back in Feb and they were finishing up renovations on the rooms. Luckily during our 4 day length of stay, not once did we get bothered by any noise or construction. Our room was clean, bed was very comfy, everything inside was brand new, and air conditioner kept us cooled throughout the night. But what really made our stay memorable was the customer service. One of the staff members, Stacey, greeted us with a smile every single time and always offered us water bottles. She made our entire stay so pleasant that we knew this would be our go-to spot the next time we came down. Come July during our second trip here, Stacey actually remembered us and her customer service was still top notch. It's one thing to stay at nice hotels, but it's the customer service that
Manager Response: none

Summary: i would like to say that even though the hotel is going thru construction, considering, it was very clean.  the only issue was no new wash cloths were replaced following day.  The staff is unbelievable great, always with a smile, they made you feel welcome and at ease, even though they are working in dire straits.  the pool situation is not so good right now only cause it is under construction. new room is awsome , beautiful.  love it
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: It should be great when it's done...
Summary: This is a little more difficult than other reviews. We went into this stay knowing that the hotel was under remodeling. But, "remodeling" was an understatement!  The style and finish on the remodeled rooms is incredible!  You can see that they are definitely planning on moving up a few steps in their transformation from Ramada to Wyndham. That being said, the A/C in our first room stopped working and we had to change rooms at midnight. With two kids this was not a pleasant experience. That being said, the staff was very helpful and apologetic. My biggest complaint is how extensive the construction is at this time. There is not a single area of the hotel that doesn't have construction going on. The scalfolding, closed areas, dust, noise, plywood, rubble, no pool, no laundry
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Free Parking, Friendly Staff, Renovated Rooms
Summary: Pros: Free parking (they will let you check in early to park there as well as leave your car all day on the day you check out), renovated room (gorgeous!), friendly staff, walking distance to Disney.  Con: Actively under construction while we were there (we didn't mind as we weren't trying to sleep in, but I can see how this might be a big deal to some)
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice place to stay even though it was under heavy external remodeling. Staff was very friendly and the rooms we're really cleaned and remodeled. It's within walking distance to Disneyland. No need to pay for a shuttle.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff was very friendly and helpful. Even though the hotel was under renovation (which was stated when we booked the hotel) we were never bother by any of the construction. Had a renovated room that was really nice. Also nice that the hotel is a short walk to Disneyland. Overall was a great hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary: Booked Ramada Plaza Anaheim on Hotels.com. Website did not state this hotel was under construction. Pool was not in use and Monday morning the construction noise was loud.
Manager Response: none

Summary: While the hotel staff was great and the room was nice, the hotel was completely covered by tart and construction equipment which took away from the hotel's views.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: False advertising. The hotel is completely understand construction!
Summary: Pictures at all search sites are great, only at the bottom of the page , it states that the hotel is under construction. That is an understatement! When you get there, it feels like you are in the middle of new housing construction - hard hat area. Unbelievable that someone would think of renting during such construction! They do offer your money back if you don't want to stay, but by the time people arrive there and realized the extent of "under construction" , it is  nearly impossible to get another place. Construction starts loud and early!  Beware! If you wouldn't want your vacation to be in a serious construction zone, do not  come here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: tho it was under construction my room was awesome! I love the rain shower. I wish they severed free breakfast but having the keriug was nice
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: We learned the hotel is under construction upon arriving...
Summary: We learned the hotel is under construction upon arriving. Had we known it was going to be in that state, we would've gone somewhere else. It looked like a construction site and it was pretty noisy throughout our stay. In fact, we woke up one morning to find a construction worker right outside our open window in the fourth floor! I honestly don't know why they didn't close it down while making such extensive renovations. The only reason I didn't run out was because my company paid for it and the room itself was renovated (although it did have a very strong chemical odor that I can't pin down). The only good thing about our stay was the staff, who did the best they could to manage the situation.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If you are a Wyndham Rewards Member in the Diamond or Platinum tier, don't bother with this one. They do not honor the perks with the program. Very disappointed, the room is decent, nothing special.
Manager Response: travelerB1633CA,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback from your recent stay with us.  I am extremely disappointed to hear we did not meet your expectations and do sincerely apologize for that.  We very much value all of our guests, especially our Diamond and Platinum members.  I will be sending you a private message in hopes of finding out a little more about how we failed to honor perks for you.  We like to always start your stay off with a nice little welcome amenity and based on availability we strive to honor a nice upgrade, early check in, and late check out.    I look forward to speaking with you to find out a little more information as well as to have the chance to welcome you back so we can ensure you have a great stay and receive all the perks you deserve!!

Summary Heading: Would not stay here until construction is completed
Summary: the parking was horrible especially if you have a large truck or SUV. It was very hard getting out of the parking structure and we actually scrapped the side of our truck. The construction noise started around 8am. Not good if you planned on sleeping in. But the beds were comfortable but my daughters bed had a stain on her sheets.
Manager Response: janetlF8860ZJ,  Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback from your recent stay with us.  I am sorry to hear that the renovation impacted your stay so much.  I do hope you reached out to our staff in regards of any problems you had with your vehicle.  If not please feel free to reach out to me at any time!   I have addressed the tight parking situation which will be rectified very shortly, and i will definitely address your housekeeping concerns.  Although you experienced these inconveniences, i hope the beautiful new rooms were great for you and that i get the chance to welcome you back once the renovations are complete.

Summary Heading: This is a great hotel to stay in.  EVERYTHING is within...
Summary: This is a great hotel to stay in.  EVERYTHING is within walking distance.  Yes it is under renovation and the outside looks awful but the rooms are fully renovated so they are clean and everything is new....   Disneyland is within 10 minutes walking distance and a bunch of restaurants in the area plus  Free parking.... front desk staff are amazing.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms were newely remodeled and very nice. Staff was great. The whole building was under construction or I would give perfect review
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a wonderful stay, Andrew from the the front desk along with the rest of the staff we encounter we friendly. The manager Joshua provided us with some helpful recommendations on beaches in the area. Even during renovations the our room looked amazing and the hotel was very clean. We look forward to staying here again soon.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is under renovations but rooms are very nice. A short walk to Disney. Parking was a little hard there isn't a lot of spots and were blocked in one day. Management handled the issue within minutes. We had an issue with housekeeping entering the room while we were still sleeping. The issue was addressed by management. Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Even thru renovation they went above and beyond to make out stay comfortable. Great parking  Brand new rooms very modern.  Outlets everywhere to charge our devices. There was no pool or laundry room Bhalani ut they offered us to us the facilities of their partners across the street.
Manager Response: none

Summary: About 10 min walk to disney, also there's having lots of restaurant near by. Also the front desk are really friendly and sweet. The room was clean and the restroom are clean as well. 前台很友善，走路至Disney大約10分鐘，附近有很多餐廳都很好吃。 房間算乾淨還可以，浴室是乾淨的，入住經驗佳。
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Will be nice once remodel is over
Summary: Beds & pillows comfy. Roms nucely decorated.House keeping service was poor. We were not aware of remodel. No pool. No laundry or gym. Could use those facilities of hotel next door but that wasn't convenient. No continental breakfast. 'Consolation'  was a coupon for one free appetizer next door at Bubba Gumps but we still paid $165/night.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: the hotel is under contruction with noise at 7am and people walking near window on 4th floor
Summary: first the good part, the hotel is very conveniently located.  the local front\room service staff was nice and prompt.  parking and wifi available.  rooms were ok.  cons. construction in progress.    nowhere on the site or booking, this was called out. our second day after disney, we have loud banging noise from work  above our floor.   not a good feeling if you are dead tired to wake up in the morning after a hectic day.    the whole building is covered with construction railings i.e people can walk by your window at the 4th floor when they are working.  this kinda scared my family at first.  we had to close the windows and keep the curtain down for the entire week.  i responded to a initial feedback from the booking site and got a response from Ramada, "We will address this
Manager Response: none

Summary: Newly remodeled rooms. Nice interior. Walking distance to disneyland. Friendly staff. The only problem i had was there wasnt enough parking space to accommodate all guests. We had to park to a non designated spot cause they jad to block off some of the spots due to construction.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was very clean it with it being so close to Disneyland, shops, and restaurants. We stayed in a newly refurbished room is very spacious. The staff was very friendly and nice and accommodating. The only con for us would have to be the foul  odor the came from the bathroom sink!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My daughter and I spent one night here to go to Disneyland. The staff is very nice and accomodating. The best part is the proximity to Disneyland (10 minute walk) and free parking. This is the only place I found that didn't charge an additional fee to park. The rooms are updated and clean. The only thing was that we were on the street side and it was a little noisy. But we were pretty tired from our night so it was ok. We will stay here again!  It will be really nice after the construction is finished.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff & service was excellent. We would recommend this hotel to family and friends. And we will return back to stay on our next visit. Give our thanks and hospitality to your staff for a very comfortable and friendly visit.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Under construction so amenities are limited. We were 3rd floor and the rooms were newly remodeled. While they were beautiful, the bathroom floors were slippery getting out of the shower and my mobility challenged dad slipped and fell. They were slippery for me as well. There are no grab bars and as a designer, I would put them in all the bathrooms. You also have to slightly step into the shower to turn it on. The rooms were a little noisy, could hear everything in the other rooms and hallway and I would think if you are newly remodeling you would want sound barriers. The beds and pillows were super comfy but they didn't have extra pillows in the closet for the sofa bed. Everything was clean and new and for that alone I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Room renovation wasn't impressive. No soap holder, no tub, rotten sewer smell coming from the sink. Patch work.
Summary: Great location, very nice employees! Room renovation ideas are great but execution leaves a lot to be desired.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Although the hotel is getting major renovation from the outside, but the rooms are fully renovated now. The rooms were absolutely beautiful. The staff were very helpful. The parking was rather easy.  Very close to many restaurants and convenience stores. And if you love Arabic food like me, there are plenty of places only 2 miles away. Disney land is very close if you are   Planning to go there.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great place, great location gornour needs.
Summary: Walking distance to the Anaheim Convention Center where our event was. There was some remodeling being done so there was no lobby and we had to use the laundry and pool at the neighboring hotel. Even so, the staff made it seem less of an inconvenience. They were great.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: No mention of deep construction before arrival
Summary: I was very disappointed to arrive at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and find that it was under deep construction. We booked through hotels.com, and we were not made aware of the situation at the time of our booking or in any following correspondence, including confirmation email. If we had known, we would certainly have booked elsewhere, as we were in Anaheim to run a half marathon and hoping to relax at the hotel. Instead, we woke up to drilling in our ceiling (we were on the top floor) at 7am. Some amenities, like the pool and laundry, were closed, and while there was an alternative pool at a property on the same street, we needed to be escorted by the front desk each time we wanted to use it, hardly ideal. Scaffolding covered the entire building, preventing us from being able to
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel , although under renovations, the rooms , location across the street from Disneyland and staff were 100% excellence!  Rooms are spacious, super clean , great location. We knew ahead that there was renovations going on and that the pool was closed ( but another adjoining pool was available) . We were greeted or two of the best hotel representatives anyone could ever want. I believe the gentleman's name was Andrew, and possibly Erin ? Sorry if I did not get that right, but throughout our five night stay, they called us by name every time we entered and left and asked us how our day was going, offered us water, a little gift bag when we left, and gave us wonderful instructions on where to go, things to see,. THAT is how you take care of your customers. Because it was a
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Everything was good with the exception of the appearance...
Summary: Everything was good with the exception of the appearance, the registering, the construction taking place.
Manager Response: Mirella1916,   Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your recent stay at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.    I am sorry to hear that the renovation and appearance was such a negative for you but am delighted to hear everything else was good!  I hope you enjoyed our new rooms and that they gave you a little taste of how great our hotel will be once completed.     I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: The outside of the hotel is under construction.  The entire building is wrapped in black netting and construction scaffolding.  We even had a construction worker walk by our 3rd floor window on the scaffolding one morning.  None of the hotel amenities were functioning, we had to walk across the parking lot to the hotel next door for laundry, the pool, and the exercise room.  Very inconvenient and disappointing.  We paid way too much per night for this hotel, they should not be charging their guests full price!!!!!!
Manager Response: E6066NRtracyc,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your recent stay.  I am sorry to hear that our renovations impacted your trip so much.   Although, as you touched on, some of our facilities are being renovated our sister property right outside our door does provided our guests with every amenity that we have to offer.    If you would like to discuss your stay please don't ever hesitate to contact us directly at any time, or please never hesitate to speak to us during your stay so we can ensure you have a great experiance.

Summary: We booked this hotel to meet my new sister whom I found on Ancestry.  We were scheduled to first meet in the lobby and sit and talk for a couple of hours before going to dinner.  I must admit when we pulled in to the driveway my heart sank.  The hotel is under heavy construction and the lobby was a small make shift area with no air conditioning and no room to sit.   We arrived early so after flying in I could take a shower and change my clothes before my new sister arrived.  Check in was at 3PM and I arrived at 11AM.  What could have been a disaster turned into one of the best experiences of my life.  The manager, Joshua Gitsham, and the staff gave 110%!!  They found a room that was available (I must say the room was absolutey beautiful.  Very artistically appointed and
Manager Response: belizejo,   Thank you so much for leaving such a great review during your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  It was truly wonderful meeting you and being able to witness such an amazing meeting.   When I saw you and your sister meet for the first time in our lobby and the instant connection you two had i couldn't stop smiling. The moment your sister started to tear up and compared your eyes to the rest of the family was priceless and heart warming! I am so glad we were able to assist you to make this one of the best experiences of your life!!  As much as we were able to help you, you helped me in showing my entire staff why we are in the guest service industry and how we can make lasting memories for our valued guests. For that i can't thank you enough.    I hope when you have the chance to come back and visit your sister again, you will come back and visit us as well!!  Thank you again for taking the time to leave such nice words and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip and hearing all the wonderful updates you have on your family!!

Summary: The hotel was being remodeled, so parts were kind of a mess, but the staff was extremely friendly and the rooms were very clean.  The beds were extremely comfortable.
Manager Response: Kelseyk559,   Thank you for your time in leaving a review during your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am so glad to hear how extremely friendly our staff was for you and that you had a comfortable rest in our new beds!    I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip!

Summary: This was a wonderful experience! The only reason they didn't receive 5 stars was because they were renovating the entire property and the outside was covered by scaffolds and tarps (very understandable) and while the room was so wonderful there was a sewer smell coming from the bathroom and there was water condensation dripping from the A.C. However it wasn't bad enough to make me get out of the most comfortable hotel bed I've ever slept in and complain. The staff was so pleasant and helpful and accommodating. The staff was so friendly that you barely noticed the construction. I can't wait to go back for our next stay!!!
Manager Response: T1892URjenniferc,  Thank you for taking the time to leave a review from your wonderful experience with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am sorry to hear that you encountered issues with the a.c. and bathroom.  Next time please do not hesitate to let us know so we can fix these issues, whether minor or major right away so we can ensure your full comfort.   I am so glad that our staff was so pleasant and helpful and i can't wait to welcome you back during your next stay with us!!

Summary: The hotel was going through a renovation so the entire outside and lobby was in construction.  The room was great and the staff super friendly and helpful.  I could not park in the parking garage due to my car topper but they found a space for me right in front.  The staff more than made up for the inconvenience of the renovation.
Manager Response: Buddy C,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am so glad to here that the room was great and that our staff was so friendly and assisted you with your car.  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disney trip so you can see how beautiful our finished product will be!!  Thank you again for your review!

Summary: Bathroom stunk so bad  The cleanliness of the bathroom was not too good The place being under renovation made the place so unappealing  My reservations were cancelled even though I had the room for 3 days
Manager Response: vanjohnson2017,   Thank you for taking the time to leave a review of your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am so sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations during your trip.   I have sent you a private message to follow up with you and i would like to speak with you further if you have the time.    Thank you again for your valuable feedback as it is through feedback both positive and negative where we are able maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests.    I look forward to hearing from you soon,

Summary: Awesome stay in June 2017! I booked this hotel the morning after a horrible stay at a different hotel - Needed to get out of the other hotel ASAP & was quite happy to land at the Ramada that evening. Comfortable & clean beds. Pretty decor. Booked via hotels tonight a double queen bed and received a double queen plus sofa bed. Huge room with plenty of space for a stroller & 3 luggage bags. Fast Wi-fi and nice Kurgig. Appreciated the charging station between the beds with several outlets! AC room temp was easy to adjust and stayed proper temp while away. Shower water pressure was great & the double shower heads were great for both the tall 6' people & short (kids) in our family. Hotel was under construction so we didn't have pool access but the staff there was super friendly &
Manager Response: Gail T,   Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!  I am sorry to hear you had such a horrible stay elsewhere but am so glad that we were able to turn your vacation around!!  It is nice to know that you were able to enjoy so many aspects of our new rooms and that our staff was so friendly and helpful for you!  I can't wait to welcome you and you back during your next trip to Anaheim so you can see how truly amazing everything will be when we are complete!

Summary: This hotel is in a great location with a great underground parking garage, within a short walking distance to Anaheim Gardenwalk, restaurants, Anaheim Conv Center and Disneyland parks! Our room had been recently renovated -- was spacious and beautiful. The outside looked horrendous (June 20-25, 2017) and no amenities available during our stay due to a complete renovation of the outside and lobby area, but the kindness and enthusiasm of the staff, convenient location, and great condition of our room made up for the disappointment when we first drove up. Also, they provided access to the pool and laundry facilities at the hotel next door, so it was fine. This hotel will be smashing when it is all done!
Manager Response: Leo1934,  Thank you for taking the time to review your Great stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!  I am so glad that we are in the perfect location for you and that the kindness and enthusiasm of our staff was a high point!     Thank you again and i can't wait to welcome you back personally so you can see what a smashing hotel we will be!

Summary Heading: Don't stay here.  Major hotel renovations
Summary: Don't stay at this hotel.  Major renovations going on although rooms are finished. Lots of dust and noise everywhere.  Makeshift lobby check-in area and hallways, meeting rooms, restaurant, etc all under construction.  Outside of the hotel all in disarray with scaffolding everywhere and huge chucks of the outer walls torn out.  I want my money back!!!!
Manager Response: Albert M,   Thank you for taking the time to leave feedback from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. It is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests.  I am sorry that throughout our renovation process we did not meet your expectations.  I would like to know how you booked with us as all of our staff is trained to explain the renovations, and we have it posted on all booking websites.   Although our lobby and some facilities are being currently renovated, i hope you enjoyed our newly finished rooms and our current lobby with complimentary coffee, tea, water, and snacks.  At this time some facilities are being renovated, but we have our sister property right next to use that our guests can utilize all of their facilities whenever they would like to.    If you would like to discuss anything further please do not hesitate to contact me at any time!  Thank you again and i hope to hear from you and to be able to welcome you back when our project is complete in a matter of months so you can see why we will continue to be one of the best destinations in Anaheim!

Summary: Our family enjoyed the stay.  The hotel was clean and close to DL and restaurants. We were worried it would be noisy with the renovations but we didn't even hear it.  Can't wait to see what it looks like when the renovations are finished.
Manager Response: Sfamily20172017  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a great review of your travel experience with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am so glad that we are in the perfect location for you and your family.    I can't wait to welcome you back so you can see the amazing product we will have to offer in a matter of months!!

Summary Heading: The nicest staff and only free self parking hotel! Even under construction it's a great hotel!
Summary: It's our second time staying here and we feel comfortably at home here. We will only stay here to go to Disneyland! How can we even say no to free self parking! We booked last minute both times and we got a great deal each time!
Manager Response: Mish M,   Thank you so much for leaving such a great review of your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am so glad that we are your home here during your Disneyland trips!!  I am also thrilled to hear you feel we have the nicest staff!!      Thank you again and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next Disneyland getaway!

Summary: Great Service, Beautiful renovated rooms. They are still working on the lobby and hopefully they get rid of that Indian restaurant attached to it. They offer at 11.99 breakfast buffet that is just ok. And the only other food you can get there besides breakfast is all Indian. I love indian food but do not want that to be my only option while staying somewhere.  The pool was out of order due to renovations but guests had access to the pool at the hotel next door, walking distance. Small but lovely pool area.
Manager Response: Milly N   Thank you very much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am so pleased to hear that you enjoyed our beautiful new rooms and that our service was so great!!  We definitely pride ourselves on our service and i am so thrilled that it shows!   In regards to the restaurant i am so disappointed to hear that the breakfast was just ok for you and did not meet your expectations. Although they are primarily an Indian food restaurant, they do have a selection of american cuisine that can be ordered off the menu during your next trip.   There are also multiple eating options in the Garden Walk that is about a 3 min. walk from us that include Roy's, California Pizza Kitchen, Cheesecake Factory, and many more! For something quicker there is a corner shopping center behind us that has a variety of cuisine from Mexican food, Korean Food, Mediterranean Food, and even a Subway and Pizza place!  Thank you again for taking your time to leave us a review and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: This hotel is an excellent option for a few reasons.  First of all, our destination was Disneyland and the hotel is located within 10 min walk from the park! Second, the hotel is very clean and always quiet.  They were going through renovations, so for a second I didn't expect for the hotel to be that peaceful. We never heard a noise!  The best part of our experience was the exceptional customer service provided by the staff at the reception. Stacey treated us wonderfully.  We made our reservation at the last minute and she went above and beyond to accommodate our family. She always had a smile and something that pleasantly surprised us was that she always called us by our family name and even knew our room number; all these made us feel great throughout our stay at the Ramada
Manager Response: Berenice R,  Thank you for your excellent review on your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am so glad that we are in the perfect location for you  and that the best part of your stay was our customer service!   Stacey is definitely a huge asset to our operation and i am glad that it shows!  Thank you again for taking the time to review your stay and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: In town for VidCon, so this was a great location and price. Even though renovations were in progress the rooms are wonderful, recently renovated, well appointed and surprising quiet. Mini frig, micro wave, rain head shower, etc. Walked to convention center, Garden Walk and Disney. Tons of nearby restaurants and 24hour stores for those last minute needs. Staff was friendly and helpful. Definitely on the list for future visits.
Manager Response: Sharon P,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. I am glad to hear that our location and price were perfect for you, and that you enjoyed so many features of our newly renovated rooms!  The best part for me to hear is how friendly and helpful our staff was for you!!  I am glad to hear we are on your list for future visits and i look forward to welcoming you back!

Summary: Stayed here with my family in June 2017. They are going to renovations, however that was never told to us when we booked. The Wi-Fi in the rooms is terrible, and you can't turn down the air conditioning passed the 70° or the room may get condensation on the floor. There's dead cockroaches in the stairwells. And the bathrooms in the lobby are disgusting. The mini fridge has a terrible fish odor.
Manager Response: Thank you for letting us know about your concerns. I apologize the renovations were not clearly addressed during the time of your booking. This is something that is normally relayed to our guest during phone bookings, in person and online (include outside booking sites). I will address this with our team to insure the mistake doesn't happen again. In regards to the air conditioning our units can go below 70° however as with most things condensation can occur after a certain decrease in temperature. Guest safety is a top priority so we do have notices posted by the air conditioner instructions as a precaution. I am concerned to hear about the encounter in the stairwell and odor in the refrigerator. Even while undergoing renovations we do a daily walk through and cleaning of the property. I will address the cleaning with our housekeeping and do ask that you take the time to contact us in regards to your stay. Its much better to address a concern from a valued guest at the moment something unpleasant is experienced rather than a few days later. I hope that outside of the concerns mentioned you had a good stay and I look forward to hearing from you so we can welcome you back for a more positive memorable stay.

Summary: Room was clean and spacious. However, there was heavy construction all around. We were on the 4th floor and about 8am, there was pounding directly on the outside of our wall. If we didn't already have to get up early, it would've been impossible to sleep through all those noises. However, for the money I paid, it was worth it!
Manager Response: Meex8,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us!  I am sorry to hear that the renovation disrupted you so early during your stay, but am glad to hear that you were up and going and that we were a perfect fit your your budget!  Our renovations are a matter of months from being completed and i can't wait to welcome you back during your next trip to Anaheim to see how amazing our property will truly be inside and out!

Summary: We were there for a volleyball tournament at the convention center. Room were almost brand new. Very nice and very clean. Easy walk to convention center and lots of choices to eat nearby. Only negative construction going on on the outside of building and lobby still under construction. But we will definitely stay there next year for the tournament.
Manager Response: TBHanmer,        Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am glad we are in the perfect location for you and that you enjoyed our nice and clean new rooms!!    I hope the volleyball tournament went well for you and i look forward to welcoming you back during the next tournament!

Summary: Site is currently under renovation. However, we were given a newly renovated room and it was beautiful. Located on the top floor (4) looking towards Disney, relatively quiet even with A/C units on roof next door at a lower level. No access to properties amenities as they are being updated. Restaurant and lounge were open, but did not visit. Ate breakfast next door at a sister property, and it was very good. I believe you could use their amenities at this time if you desired. We did not.  Under ground parking and free.
Manager Response: Dear teady2014  Thank you for sharing your recent review with us! We are thrilled that you enjoyed your stay in our newly renovated rooms. Currently we are using our sister property pool, hot tub and exercise room while ours are being renovated. We greatly appreciate all of your feedback and we hope to welcome you again soon.

Summary: hotel was under renovations so not much to review but the rooms were done, very nice room, comfy bed, awesome shower, and was able to leave my car there and walk to disneyland. kinda had a weird smell but was probably due to all the construction.
Manager Response: Jaredd40,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  Although i am sorry to hear that there was a weird smell due to the construction that inconvenienced you, i am thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our new rooms and that you were able to take advantage of our free extended parking during your day of check out to enjoy another day at the park!    I look forward to welcoming you back during your Disney vacation!

Summary: Family used to stay here every time we came down, but it had been a while. It is currently urrently under remodel, but stayed in a room that was finished. The changes were amazing. Staff is friendly and helpful. Room was reasonably priced. Location is great. In walking distance to Disneyland, a small outdoor mall with a bowling alley,  a CVS and a Walgreens, and several off site restaurants like Cheesecake Factory, PF Chang's, California Pizza Kitchen and a Danny's. Once you park, you rarely need to move your car if at all.
Manager Response: lleonardo2017,  Thank you for the outstanding review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!   I am so glad that we are in the perfect location for you and that you like the changes so far!   I can't wait to welcome you back so you can see how amazing our property will be inside and out!

Summary: The exterior of the hotel was undergoing renovations but it did not affect our stay.   Our room was beautiful, quiet, clean,  and comfortable.  Within walking distance to Disneyland.   The staff was super friendly.
Manager Response: Connie C  Thank you for the great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  It is nice to hear that our new rooms are so great and that our staff is friendly.  We definitely pride ourselves on our customer service and feel that is what makes us such an outstanding hotel for our guests!   Thank you again for taking the time to leave a review and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Customer service was great, newly renovated rooms very comfortable and clean.  There is construction going on as they continue to refurbish, but we were pleasantly surprised that it did not interfere with our vacation.  Only reason I gave appearance a low score, was the construction going on.
Manager Response: M7937DYrebeccap,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am glad to hear that our renovation did not interfere with your vacation and that our Customer Service was so great!!       I can't wait to welcome you back so you can see our new 5 star appearance when our renovation is complete.

Summary: I stayed in a newly renovated room and it was beautiful! It was a five to ten minute walk from the parks which was great. But at night I was alone and felt slightly uneasy as a female. I would stay there again but only with another companion. I would also tell my friends to stay there.
Manager Response: 31danaw  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am glad to hear that we are in a perfect location for you and that you like our beautiful new rooms!!    I am so sorry to hear that you felt uneasy being here alone.  We have staff available 24 hours a day that would be more than happy to assist you or escort you anywhere around the property.     Thank you for telling your friends to stay here and i hope i personally get to welcome you back during your next trip to Disneyland!

Summary: I got this for under $100. Then they do not charge any parking! They let you stay as long as you need to! Clean , new, nice and reasonable price! My kinda place! I will be going back for sure!!!! If you want a reasonably prIced clean  hotel and they don't charge you an arm and leg for parking? This is your place! Walking distance to Disney!
Manager Response: Theresa L,   Thank you for for taking the time to leave such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am so glad to hear that we are your kinda place!   I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: We stayed here for a couple of nights for a family trip to Disneyland. It was perfect. The room was brand new and very spacious. There was still remodeling being done in the lobby and outside, but as far as our room, it was perfect. It was about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland. Great price! Would stay here again!
Manager Response: A8158GIemilyg,   Thank you for taking the time to share your travel experience with us from your recent stay at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am glad that our new rooms are perfect for you! I can't wait for you to see our final product when we are all complete!   I look forward to welcoming you back on your next Disneyland trip.

Summary Heading: Wonderful hotel even when it is under construction!
Summary: We were a little hesitant when we walked in due to the construction, but we were welcomed and assured right away by the friendly staff at the front desk.  Our room was wonderful and everyone made sure we were well taken care of during our six night stay.

Summary: Awesome hotel, very close to Disneyland and a short walk to the convention center and miscellaneous restaurants.  The staff was so friendly and made our experience amazing.  We were able to check in within 5 minutes and were able to get a parking pass, drop off our stuff in the room, and get to the park in less than half an hour.  Checkout was also a breeze and there were no issues with getting charged through hotels.com.    There was construction going on during our stay, but it did not bother us at all.  The staff was very accommodating and made sure that there were plenty of signs to guide us to the right places.  We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great remodeled room even during remod
Summary: I stay here because it's near Disneyland, affordable, and accommodations are good. They're remodeling and I got one of the new rooms. It's better than it used to be. Even though the they're still going through the remodel, it was still worth it. Staff is friendly too. I'll be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great stay despite the major renovations
Summary: We recently stayed at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim while we were visiting Disneyland and had a wonderful time. Yes, there is a massive remodel underway, so there were limited amenities, but the front desk explained that we could utilize the facilities of the boutique hotel next door. During our stay, it felt like we were the only ones there. It is possible that construction is louder during the week, but we heard nothing while we were there. The room was standard but completely updated and nicely appointed. I especially appreciated the Keurig and k-cups in the room, though I would have loved some liquid creamer as well. The front desk was very friendly and helpful and the wifi was able to withstand our collection of devices easily. Parking is a little tight, but free. And, it's
Manager Response: none

Summary: hotel was in the early stages of a major remodel. no pool, no gym, no any amenities available. kind of a bummer. room was adequate though.

We are working hard to have our guest as comfortable as possible while renovating. Thank you again, and I hope you choose us for your upcoming return visit.

Summary: I work in the industry of customer service in Las Vegas, the staff of this Hotel Ramada in Plaza in Anaheim, CA is outstanding!!! Make feel welcome, really high customer service, thank you from Rivas Family.

Summary Heading: Our Stay at the Ramada Plaza for June 2-4

Summary: Recepcionist charged me for room even after I gave him a reservation number and showed him on my phone that I paid full price for room I agreed to pay forit because I was tired so, I paid for room twice

Summary Heading: If you can ignore the renovation

We will stay there again. One small inconvenience, no bath tub in the room we stayed in. Downside until the renovation is complete, no pool or fitness room, not a problem for us:)

Summary: Front desk people were excellent. Renovated rooms were excellent. Renovated areas were very nice. Outside and lobby still under renovation.

Summary Heading: Disney hospitality without the Disney price!

I only had quick interactions, but Stacey was super sweet and friendly and was genuine as was every staff member I encountered. The room itself is gorgeously updated, large, and spacious, and above all else very clean. The bed was also very comfortable. We had stayed at the Park Vue Inn the previous week, but these rooms were simply better all around. I'm a flight attendant for a major airline and stay in many hotels throughout the world and I can honestly say these rooms, for the price, are phenomenal. The walk to
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Even Under Construction this place was great.

Summary: Even through the remodeling the hotel continues to provide excellent service and accommodations. We've stayed here several times in the past and will continue to book rooms here in the future. Thank you Ramada!
Manager Response: Dear adavalos1996  Thank you for taking the time to let us know about your recent experience at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We truly appreciate your loyalty and want to thank you for your patronage, we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: This property was under going renovations when we stayed there but it was still a pleasant experience. The updated rooms were beautiful and very nice. The staff was excellent and so friendly and helpful. We will definitely stay here in the future.

Summary: We booked this hotel not knowing they were under renovations. Nevertheless, check in was smooth, we checked in late Sunday and Andy was very helpful, super friendly. The rooms are amazing! They are modern, and specious. There is also restaurant all around the hotel! We will be coming back to this hotel for Christmas.

Summary: I was disappointed to learn on arrival about the renovations which put certain areas such as the pool put of action. We were not made aware of this before hand, hence the four stars. That said, given we spent most of our time at Disney, we were not impacted too much. The room was modern, comfortable and clean. Staff were friendly and helpful and Disney was just a short walk away.  We would stay here again.

Yes, we have been undergoing renovations for some time and we have advised all online booking websites about it. Again, we want to thank you for your feedback and we hope you come back next time you're in town.

Summary: I was in town for the Tinker Bell races for a weekend in May. From walking into the lobby to check-in, to walking out for an adventure, to the neighboring property's pool (due to construction, the property's pool is closed but you have access to another), to check-out, every single staff member we encountered was the most friendly and accommodating I've ever come across at any hotel I've ever been to. I would definitely recommend staying here- within walking distance of Disney, many restaurants, stores, and shops.
Manager Response: Dear elizp221  Thank you for sharing such a wonderful review of your recent experience. It is always a pleasure hosting for our Marathon runners! Your feedback, reassures me that we are holding true to our goal of providing memorable experiences from the moment you arrive until you depart. Thank you again, and please visit us again.

Summary: I chose this hotel because of the proximity to Disneyland. It's about 2 blocks from the main entrance to Disneyland. Although the hotel was being renovated, our rooms were already completed. Underground parking is a plus.
Manager Response: Dear sgtb2017  I am glad to know you enjoyed the proximity to the parks and thank you for sharing your experience with us. Thank you once again for your feedback and we hope to welcome you back again.

Summary: The Ramada was a very nice little hotel located close to Disney and all of their attractions in Anaheim the staff was very nice professional in the rooms have been recently renovated and are very nice as well when the renovations are finished of course the pool and the athletic center will be open but until then this is a very nice place to stay and a great bargain to be located so close to Disney and other activities
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked last minute and didn't realize the hotel was under renovations. I was prepared to be disappointed by noise and a mess. Instead, we were pleasantly surprised by every part of our stay. Parking was free, the hotel staff was SO FRIENDLY, free wi-fi, beautiful new rooms, breakfast, and within a walk to Disneyland. We checked out the next morning since we'd be at the park all day and they let us keep the car parked (for free) until we came back from the park.  The staff even remembered us as we returned from the park.  I give them 5 stars for service and accommodations. well done
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great room, exterior construction going on
Summary: Hotel is surrounded in scaffolding, and the check-in area is obviously temporary. Staff were very friendly and helpful. Room was great, all new. No bathtub, but large shower. Beds were comfortable. TV size seemed small for the room (but it was 32", I think). Interesting tree canopy picture on the wall. Catty-corner from the southeast corner of California Adventure, so within walking distance.  Another person staying there mentioned that you can buy Disneyland/California Adventure tickets there but you must pay in cash.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was the second time staying here and we love it. I think the room's are really nice and them being close to Disneyland is a plus.The people are friendly too. Even with all the renovating our stay was great.

Summary: While the outside of the hotel is undergoing a renovation, the rooms are newly renovated and fantastic.  We really enjoyed our stay and the staff was very helpful.  For instance, we had forgotten our children's toothbrushes and the front desk staff gave me toothbrushes and toothpaste for them.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wow were we disappointed when we arrived to see our hotel wrapped in plastic!! BUT the staff are amazing!! So friendly and went out of their way to assist you in any way. We arrived early so our room wasn't ready but our luggage was stored and we were given a parking permit for our car. When we got into our room we were so surprised given the hotel exterior. It was gorgeous!! Brand new looking, modern and spacious. We were disappointed that we were only staying the one night!
