Summary: The hotel was undergoing renovations as we visited, making the entrance and lobby a bit disheveled. But once we got to our third floor hallway, we could see the improvements they were making. Our room was recently remodeled and looked great. It was bright and clean and the bathroom spacious.  It was a short walk to Disneyland. If you're not going to be there while they are doing their work during the day, you can still have a great stay during renovations. And based on what we saw, when finished this place will look great.

Summary Heading: Don't let it's appearance fool you. It's what's inside that counts.
Summary: We stayed 8 nights at this hotel.  We would have rated it a 5 if not for the remodeling, but our stay was still very enjoyable despite the remodeling. The exterior looks like a scary Disney ride, but it's what's inside that counts. The location is great. We walked to Disney the first day, but we're getting older and took the ART shuttle the next day. The hotel is a short stroll to the Garden Walk, and we hardily recommend visiting this collection of shops, dining, and clubs. As mentioned in other reviews, the staff is very friendly and knowledgeable and provided us with great recommendations for transportation and dining. Our room was very comfortable, the beds were awesome, and the shower as good as I have seen. We were never disturbed by the construction. Don't be fooled by
Manager Response: William S,        Thank you for sharing your travel experience with us during your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Summary: The hotel was under renovations BUT we were assured the rooms were updated and the place was quiet, which it totally was.  The front desk folks were very accommodating and nice.  They even called us when we left a camera behind and offered to mail it to us.  Now THAT, is customer service.  The beds were very comfortable, especially the pillows! (I'm going to send them a separate email for the pillow type information!)  The rooms are updated and clean with a microwave, mini fridge and a Keurig.  Will definitely be back!

Summary: My family and I had amazing trip. This is the second time I stay here and it's now the place I always want to stay while traveling to California. It's like a home away from home and it's so comfortable!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great spot (but a bit of a walk)
Summary: This hotel is currently undergoing renovations but we got to stay in one of the updated rooms and it was really beautiful.  The staff were all super nice and helpful - some of the best customer service I've experienced in a long time. My husband and I come down to Disneyland a lot and stay at various hotels and this was one of our better experiences. There is a great little restaurant next door at Hotel Indigo that has a delicious happy hour. It was a bit of a hike to ESPN Zone (where my husband and I go a lot) so a shuttle option would have been nice. However, the walk to the main gates wasn't too bad (note: we don't have kids and we're both in good shape, so this might be a bit more of an issue for others). Overall, I would definitely recommend this hotel to others. Can't wait

Summary: The room was newly remodeled and came with refrigerator and microwave.  The hotel is undergoing exterior renovations. The pool, laundry, & gym are not open, but access to those amenities at the neighboring hotel was available if desired.  The hotel is nice and close to Disneyland only a couple blocks.  The staff was EXTREMELY friendly and offered goody bags to the kids upon our check out.  I was very happy with our stay here. The only reason I gave it a very good review instead of excellent was because with the remodel going on you have to kind of walk the long way around everything, but that should be over soon.

Summary: This was my first time staying here. And I didn't know the place was under construction. But I enjoyed my stay. The staff were all friendly and helpful. My room was comfortable and clean. The pool was closed but they walked us across the parking lot to their sister location and we had a swim over there.    Wasnt a bad walk to Disneyland. Def plan on booking here next time!

Summary: Renovations were going on, but my room was already done and just beautiful. Front desk staff were very friendly and helpful.

The light from the hall comes in, and the noise from other guest talking on their cellphones comes right through. The walls are not very soundproof, and you can hear EVERY motorcycle that goes up and down Katella and Harbor. Th light from the alarm/charging station is like a beacon. We had to place a towel over it. The staff there is wonderful!! Everyone is very friendly. Probably would not stay there again. The sounds from the fireworks are right outside your window. They were loud and go on forever.

Summary Heading: Nice hotel and very convenient to Disneyland

Good place to stay if you just need a clean room to stay without any added amenities.

Summary: They are currently going through remodeling however don't let that stop you.  Our room, #228, had a view of the parking lot but we never heard cars.  The shower had a large rain shower head, the floor was cushy felt like it had a two inch pad underneath, there was a kuerig for coffee and tea, a microwave, and refrigerator.  The beds were very comfy.  A great room for a Disneyland trip.  Price was great and o ly a short very easy walk to resort.  Highly recommend

Summary: Although the exterior of the building and common areas were under construction it bothered us very little. Our stay was awesome, the newly remodeled room were clean modern and comfortable. Great property for visiting Disneyland and the many restaurants down the block really helped.

Summary: Rooms were cleaned and just renovated :-)  Staff was professional and friendly, no complains here. Location is great, within 10 minutes walking from Disneyland. Expect loud tractors, sledgehammers and small earthquakes from 7:30 AM!!!! Of course, since were there for Disneyland, we were already awake. But of look a place to rest, avoid this hotel for the moment.  Also, no pools, sauna or fitness rooms are available. When we get there (at night) wife and I thought the building was scheduled for demolition. There is no lobby (unde renovation). You have to walk in by a service entrance.

I am glad to hear that we are in a great location for you and that our staff was so friendly and professional.  I am sorry you were not informed of the renovation.  The renovation is noted on all web based sites and we inform guests who book directly.  I will revisit how it is descried on the web based systems moving forward. Please do not hesitate to contact me personally during your next trip to Anaheim so i can ensure you have a memorable trip!  Thank you again for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback.

Summary: I woke up at 2am to find myself being rained on. The roof leaked seriously into my room. I had to move to the other bed and had trouble going back to sleep because of the noise of the rain dropping into the room. They actually expected me to pay for this experience. After asserting myself, I was afforded a 50% discount. I would never stay in this hotel again.
Manager Response: 474eileend,   Thank you for taking the time to share your travel experience with us during your stay at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   Although an apology does not change the experience you had, i do extend one with all sincerity.    I am glad to hear that the staff was able to take care of you in the end with a discount, but in the future, i do hope you give us the chance to show you the great hotel we are, and that you would contact me personally so i can ensure you have a fantastic trip to Anaheim!

Summary: It would be nice to inform travelers if you are under renovations prior to us reserving rooms. I honestly felt we should of received a large discount for staying there during the commotion. Also, we were on the top level and when it rained, the ceiling leaked right onto one of the beds making it unusable. The staff were great, but the situation was horrible.

Please do not hesitate to contact me when planning your next trip to Anaheim so i can ensure you have a memorable one!

Summary: This is the second time I've stayed here and I'm now considering my new home when visiting Disneyland. Despite the exterior being renovated, it did not spoil my experience, mainly because of the fantastic staff that works there. I never feel like a number when I'm there. They know who I am every time I came through the lobby doors. They check on me. And, when my scooter broke down using one company, they made a call to get me a new one and took care of my old scooter. This is exactly the kind of customer service I like and should be a template for all hotels. I really came back because the personalized service Stacy gave me and there were so many others who helped. I am ashamed I didn't get their names. Also, the rooms are modern and there is a lot of thought about the number of

It absolutely made my day that you feel we should be a template for all hotels in customer service!  Stacy and the entire team are such an asset and their customer service is what makes our hotel stand out and i am glad it is noticed.    I look forward to welcoming you back and meeting you during your next visit to Anaheim!

Summary: The Rooms have been Redone.. BUT.. The Rest of the Property is Under MAJOR CONSTRUCTION. Loud Tractors & Sledgehammers.. Dust Everywhere Was NOT Good for Allergies.. 8am til Check Out was like CONSTANT Earthquakes.. Building Moved So Much it was Causing Motion Sickness.. We Didn't Sleep AT ALL. Total Nightmare to say the least.
Manager Response: JennifermN825WS,     Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback during your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I do sincerely apologize that you experienced so many issues in regards to renovation.   There was a brief period where they had to extract some cement and some marble flooring, but that has all been completed at this point.   I do hope that you will call me personally during your next trip to Anaheim so i can ensure you have a fantastic trip and that you can experience the great property we truly are!

Summary: When we pulled up my kids started yelling is this  a haunted house and did not what to stay. The inside was OK not completely finished, but the outside was draped with netting as they were redoing outside. make shift lobby. My Friend was scared for me as I was walking in to registrar. I booked through Wyndham site and did not see anything saying in the middle of major remodel.
Manager Response: 814cynthiaw,         Thank you very much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am sorry to hear you were not informed of the renovation prior to booking.  Wyndham is aware of the renovation, so i will follow up with them to ensure they are informing guests prior to booking.   I do hope you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms, and that in the future you call me personally so you can enjoy our property to the fullest!  Thank you again for taking the time to provide us with this valuable feedback.

Summary: The whole of the outside of the hotel appears covered in depressing looking construction cladding. I currently have scaffolding right outside my window which means anyone can look in! My partner has significant respiratory problems and I would not have dreamed of booking here if I had known this was ongoing due to obvious risks of dust! Major parts of the hotel are closed off (including the pool and lobby) and the walls all peeled back and exposed. I am so disappointed this was not made clear when booking through expedia who clearly show pictures that look NOTHING like the current hotel. The only mention of renovations is in the fine print and not mentioned at all in any of the confirmation emails! Been told that construction only goes on between Monday and Friday and it is
Manager Response: Alan B,   Thank you for taking the time to to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am so sorry to hear how the renovation and dust impacted you and your partners stay. Also i am disappointed to hear you experienced this during the weekend as well.  This might have been on site maintenance, as the renovation crew is only here Monday through Friday.      Please do not hesitate to contact me personally when you are making plans to visit the Anaheim area again so i can update you on the renovation process as well as ensure you have a memorable next visit!

Summary: Excellent hotel. The hotel was very clean and updated. The staff was AMAZING, so friendly and professional. I was always greeted so nicely every time I came in or out of the lobby. I will definitely be returning again.
Manager Response: 136wyattw,   Thank you for taking the time to provide such a great review from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am so glad to hear that our staff made your stay so special!  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: I had no idea the hotel was covered in construction material. Drilling started at 8:00am after a long day at Disneyland. No pool access and no gym, we had to use the hotel next door. The front desk attendant was nice and accommodating, but bummed I didn't know about how extensive the "renovations" were.
Manager Response: Kristen P,   Thank you very much for taking the time to provide feedback from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  Although i am very excited to hear how great our front desk staff was, i am sorry to hear you were not informed fully about the renovations.  I do appreciate you informing us of this so i can revisit all sites to ensure the accuracy.  In regards to the pool and gym i hope the newly renovated facilities next door at our sister property worked well for you.      Thank you again for taking the time and providing us with such valuable feedback!

Summary: Nice crew, remodeled hotel. Very nice! All perfect. Need improve only the parking space. Good beds and pillows. Bedroom and bath very clean! Food and Pharmacy close! Walk distance to Disneyland! All perfect
Manager Response: ElianaGrelletNicolas,   Thank you for sharing your travel experience with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am so glad that all was perfect for your stay and that you enjoyed our recently renovated rooms!    I appreciate you expressing your concerns about parking to us so we can address the amount of parking we have to ensure all of our guests are satisfied.    Thank you again for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary Heading: STAY IF YOU'RE OK WITH 7 AM CONSTRUCTION WORK
Summary: Our room (2 queens, sleeper sofa) was fine. The fact that they are HEAVILY under construction was not fine.  The notice in the room says construction will begin at 8 am. WRONG. At 7 am we woke up to hammering, heavy items being dragged across the roof and loud yelling/talking outside. I was here for Disneyland. The park doesn't open until 9 am... I was hoping to still be asleep at 7 am.  One morning my group was leaving the hotel parking lot, following the walkway and a construction working on scaffolding above us noticed and kindly told us, be careful. OK, we thought, we will. He hurried down and yelled at another construction working to stop hammering/chipping away at the building above us. That was nice. When we returned later that night, our usual walkway was marked off,
Manager Response: none

Summary: We got to the hotel the night before our Disneyland visit to find out the water was to be cut from 11am-5pm the next day. The hotel was already undergoing major refurbishment and looked really crappy from the outside. It's a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, which was the main reason we got it. My partner and I wanted to get to Disneyland at 8am, do heaps until about 3, then come back, rest/shower then head back again. Of course, the hotel did not allow this because of the water being cut. When I raised this with the hotel staff at reception, at first they were rude and gave me the "we told you yesterday" excuse. After pushing them a bit, they offered free breakfast vouchers, and after pushing a little more, we got 50% off our second night stay. The bathroom wasn't very clean
Manager Response: Erdemk4,   Thank you very much for taking the time to provide feedback from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   It is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guests.   I am sorry that the water shut off inconvenienced you the way it did.  Unfortunately we did have a pipe during that day that needed replacement.  What disappoints me more is that you felt our staff was rude to you.  Although an apology does not change the experience you already had, i do extend one with all sincerity.  Our outstanding guest service is what tends to make us stand out the most!  I am glad that in the end our staff was able to take care of you, and i will definitely follow up on the concerns you have expressed.     Thank you again for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback, and i do hope you will contact me personally during your next trip to Anaheim and give us the chance to show you how we exceed expectations and help create memorable experiences.

Summary: I'll start by admitting my review is probably higher rated than it ought to be, but this hotel was great for what I needed it for.  The reason one star was taken off, and probably more should have been: The hotel is going through a MAJOR remodel. Indeed, we drove right past the hotel the first time as we were checking in at night and the entire property is covered in a black tarp and scaffolding. I went back to check the AAA review on the site (where I had booked) and other than reviews, there is no mention that the hotel is being renovated. With this came a closed pool and spa, so be warned if you wanted those amenities.  That being said, the stay itself was not bad. Throughout the three nights we stayed, I did not hear ANY construction noise from our room. The bathrooms seemed
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everyone is so nice and helpful. My room was amazing and The location is perfect. I will be back to the hotel on my next visit!
Manager Response: Dear U9999VMstephenm  Thank you for taking the time to leave such a kind review. We work hard to ensure that all of our guests enjoy their stay. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: The building was under construction near the lobby and first floor. All rooms in the second floor and above. Some construction noise but we were out early for Disneyland anyway so really was a nonissue for us. Rooms were updated, clean and good for our family of five. Two kids slept on the pull out sofa bed, two on one bed, and adults on the other bed. No breakfast offered here, though I guess there's a buffet restaurant on the property but it was mostly occluded by construction. Parking is included, and they let us keep our car parked on site while we walked to Disneyland even though we checked out early that morning (and didn't leave until 8pm). That factors into the calculus of the value of the hotel. And we needed some random odds and ends and the reception desk workers were
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our favorite hotel to stay in every time my daughter and I visit Disneyland, which is several times a year.  We love the staff! They always seem so happy to see you every time you enter the lobby😁 The location is perfect and the rooms are very comfortable! There's a mini fridge and microwave in each room which is a must for us. The underground gated parking is also very nice! It seems a bit more secure than just out in the open. There was remodeling going on this last time, but was still very quiet in our room. I would highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: With only a 10- to 15-minute walk to Disneyland, this hotel was in a ideal location to major restaurants and the parks. The staff members were very friendly and very accommodating; thanks, José and Stacey! We were greeted every morning and evening with a bottled water and a friendly smile.   Our room had recently been remodeled to a clean and tasteful design. The walk in shower had the option of a handheld or rainfall shower head. The hotel was undergoing a major renovation, so construction noises were from roughly 7 am to 4 pm. However, the staff's hospitality more than made up for this minor inconvenience. This will end up being a 5-star hotel (a Wyndham) once the renovations are complete.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Should have read about the construction first
Summary: This hotel was under construction and I wish I had known that before. The first day wasn't too bad as the staff was nice enough to put us in a room that was the last to be erected with scaffolding. However, waking up the next morning at 7am to hammering and drilling right outside your window really sucks especially when you are not getting back from Disneyland until 1:30 in the morning. Pool was also closed so kids had no access to swim. In my opinion, if you are going to have paying customers during construction the least you could do is offer a discount or comp a meal due to the inconvenience to your customers. I would never not compensate my customers somehow. Note the remodeled rooms are very nice. Large fridge and keurig coffee maker. Internet worked fine. TV had plenty of
Manager Response: Dear Mopar12  It is disappointing to read your expressed displeasure regarding your stay. I assure you that we have advised all third party websites of our renovations, I'm sorry if you might of missed it.  Please know that we will speak with the appropriate management to discuss the issue with the bedding of the sofa bed to make sure it doesn't happen again. We want to thank you for taking the time to share your feedback, and we hope you will keep us in consideration when you make your next visit, as we would take that opportunity to deliver the kind of quality service you expect and deserve.

Summary: The new rooms are great and I think the new remodel will be awesome but to stay there now is frustrating and the restaurant for breakfast was disgusting the plates were dirty the food was old and cold and the restaurant itself was dirty and outdated.
Manager Response: Portabelladesigns,   Thank you very much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am very please to hear that you enjoyed our recently renovated rooms.  Although i am glad to hear about the rooms, i am really disappointed to hear about your experience with our restaurant.   It is through feedback both positive, and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve upon the services we provide to our valued guest.   Our restaurant has been here for almost 15 years and is very well known withing the community.  We have very high service standards throughout the hotel, as well as the restaurant, and i will be assured to address these concerns right away.     Thank you again for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback, and i hope during your next trip to Anaheim you will contact me personally so i can ensure you have a memorable experience!

Summary: In spite of the exterior being under construction (resulting in no ability to see out the windows, having to use a temporary lobby, pool out of order), our one night stay was still very pleasant and we found the room to be very nice and clean.  I especially appreciated the multi-port shower head and the updated room.  With regard to the service, all of staff were very polite and made a personal effort to find parking for all even though all available slots were taken in the small underground secured garage.  On our way out the next day, staff made it clear that we were more than welcome to leave our vehicle there all day, at no charge, to visit the park. And finally, it's located right next to a strip mall that has 5-6 eateries that were all very busy and priced for locals.
Manager Response: Bob D,      Thank you very much for taking the time to review your recent travel experience with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I appreciate you staying with us through our remodel stage.  I am so glad to hear that you were able to enjoy our newly renovated rooms, as well as hearing how polite and personal our staff was!   As you mentioned our pool is currently out of order, but we have our sister hotel that is right next door to us that has a beautiful pool that has been recently updated that our guests are more than happy to utilize.  I am glad that we are in a perfect location for you and i cant wait to welcome you back to our property in the near future so you can see the progress we have made in our remodel, as well as to enjoy all the amenities our property has to offer!  Please do not hesitate to contact me personally during your next trip to Anaheim so i can ensure you have a memorable experience!  Thank you again for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback!

Summary: I absolutely LOVED our room. The shower was high so that was nice for my 6'3" son :) The bathroom, the beds, the refrigerator were all awesome. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars was because the food was horrible and the hotel was under construction which I wasn't aware of until I arrived. Thankfully I wasn't there during the day so I didn't hear the noise but our friend went back to the hotel to take a nap and was frustrated with all the noise. Great hotel staff though :) Very friendly and very helpful.
Manager Response: sheribrown805,   Thank you for your review of your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am so glad to hear you love our newly renovated rooms and the amenities we have to offer.  I am also glad to hear how great, friendly, and helpful our staff was for you, as we pride our self on our customer service!  I am glad your son was able to enjoy the the shower as well. Being 6'1" myself, it is sometimes difficult to find a shower that i can fit under comfortably.  :)    Although it is disappointing to hear about the food in the restaurant, i do really appreciate you bringing this to our attention so we can address this concern.   In regards to not being notified about the renovation i do sincerely apologize.    I would like to know how you booked the renovation so i can do some follow up as every site that sells our rooms has been notified and has posted on there site, as well as our staff has been trained to ensure all of our guests are aware of the renovation.    Thank you again for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback to us and please contact me personally during your next trip to Anaheim so i can make sure you have a fantastic vacation!

Summary: Great hotel. Very nice rooms which included a coffee pot and refrigerator. Comfy beds. Room was remodeled. Loved the shower and shower head. Very close to Disneyland. About a 10-15 minute walk. Very close to restaurants within walking distance. Less then 5 minute walking distance to the restaurants. Very nice hotel staff at the front desk. On day of checkout they let us park our car there until we were done at Disneyland. Great price for this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Richard J  Thank you for your kind remarks and detail review on TripAdvisor.  I loved reading that you thoroughly enjoyed our renovated rooms. W look forward to welcoming you back next time you are back in Anaheim.

Summary: I've stayed at this hotel the past two times I've gone to Disneyland and I will always stay here! The rooms are being remodeled and during my recent stay during Easter weekend, it was wonderful! Super clean and the rain shower is to die for. Even before the remodeling it was great. I'm a big clean freak when it comes to hotels and this one is by far the best. It's a half a mile walk to Disneyland and the customer service is beyond amazing. Definitely recommend
Manager Response: Dear byasay  We appreciate you sharing your genuine feedback on TripAdvisor. It is wonderful to hear that you enjoyed our renovated rooms. I would also like to thank you for highlighting the exceptional service you encountered from of our staff. It lets us know that we are holding true to our five star experience to our guest. We would be delighted to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: The rooms are new, everything is very clean. Love the coffee in the room... delicious!!!  All the people in the hotel is very nice and do everything to help you.  The only flaw is breakfast ... not very good food.
Manager Response: Dear joanna a  We appreciate taking the time to share your comments on tripadvisor. I am pleased to hear that our staff was great as always. I do regret to hear about the breakfast not being as great as it should be, we will be reaching out directly to the restaurant's manager to seek improvements on the breakfast options and it's quality. We certainly value your feedback and we hope you stay with us again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great stay, we all loved it!
Summary: Spent a night here after a long day at Disneyland and we couldn't be happier! The rooms were newly renovated and it was perfect! The kids loved it and even asked if we could stay here every time! Thank you for a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear s_agbayani  Thank you for taking the time to write to us after your perfect experience at Ramada Plaza Hotel. I am also delighted to hear your kids loved it as well. Again, thank you for your five star review, I look forward to welcoming you back again soon.

Summary Heading: great rooms & excellent staff but...ugh...SO MUCH CONSTRUCTION
Summary: The staff here is top-notch. Incredibly helpful and kind. The rooms are remodeled and quite lovely, though the old wall a/c units don't provide the comfy sleep temps you'd get with a more updated system. Also, no ventilation in the bathrooms, this makes for a very muggy environment even hours after someone's taken a shower. The property's location can't be beat--easy, 7 minute walk into Disneyland. the downside, and we were not notified of this upon reserving, is that the entire exterior of the building is under renovation. Scaffolding outside of every window. Quiet time is supposed to be between 6pm-8am, however the construction guys were outside BANGING around by 7:15 all three mornings we were there. I mentioned that to the staff and while they were empathetic to the
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim for a week in April as a family of 6 in a family room. The location was excellent- a 5 minute walk to the Disney parks with shops and restaurants within walking distance. I booked via Booking.com and it did advise that renovations were taking place during the stay and some facilities would be unavailable, however I didn't expect it to be on the scale that it was as during the stay it was like a building site with the reception moved to a corridor and the swimming pool, etc out of use. Alternative facilities were available at neighbouring hotels. The pool is currently in the car park and doesn't look like it gets much sun but I think they are adding a rooftop pool which should be nicer when the renovations are complete. The rooms had been
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed here in the past and always had a good experience. It is in walking distance to Disney and the rooms have been recently renovated so they are pretty comfy.  My only complain is the pillows are a bit uncomfortable and the really strong smell of curry in the lobby is off putting. Don't get me wrong, I like curry but the restaurant at the hotel is an Indian restaurant and the smell is sooooo strong that hold my breath from the elevator to the outside because of how strong it smells. With that said, I have not set foot in the restaurant so I can not rate the food.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here this past week for a short trip to Disneyland. The hotel was under construction, but it was still great! The room seemed to be brand new, very comfortable bed and everything was very clean! Staff was very nice and attentive! I would definelty stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear  Emma C  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience. I understand there are many travel options when visiting Disneyland, and we sincerely appreciate and thank you for choosing The Ramada Plaza Hotel to host you during your recent visit. We hope to see you back with us again soon.

Summary: I really did not want to write this review.  I never write negative ones, but feel I must.  I stayed there for 3 nights over the Easter holiday.  My 89 yr old dad from Pennsylvania, sister, neice and granddaughter.  The lobby closed and relocated in the basement t without us ever knowing.... we couldn't find my dads electric scooter.  The noise was unbearable. It was like a war zone.  My dad was totally disoriented, just wanted to find a chair to sit in, but couldn't find one.  He was told to go next door to sit in their lobby.  We finally found his scooter, parked in the corner by a registration table.  Why weren't we told about the move?  Disaster
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had an awesome stay here. Very close to all of the activities in Anaheim. Newly remodeled rooms, very nice and clean. Extremely nice front desk staff. We would stay here again for sure. Great hotel for Disney or Anaheim Convention Center. We are at the convention center a lot for volleyball and so happy to have found this Ramada and will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Tiffany R  Thank you for your gracious feedback from your recent stay. We are delighted to hear that our hotel and staff met your needs while visiting the convention Center. It was our pleasure hosting you, and I look forward to welcoming you back .

Summary: Good place to stay for family trip to Disneyland. Make sure you have a stroller to use and from hotel if you have children because the walk is a bit difficult with young ones (we used them for infant, toddler, and young elementary and it was a lifesaver).
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Recent stay at Ramada Plaza Aneheim
Summary: Excellent room, very friendly staff and great location for the Convention Centre and Disneyland. The bathroom was a good size and the King size bed was perfect for a 6' 3" person. Would strongly recommend for business or holiday clients
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: OK Stay - renovations ongoing by day
Summary: The hotel is being renovated.  The rooms which have been renovated are excellent.  Renovations included scaffolding outside the guest rooms, drilling noises, and water shut off.  So it is unfair to ask for a review of the hotel at this point.  The renovations look very promising, but while they are ongoing guests should be advised that they are ongoing by day - by night the hotel is very quiet, restful, clean, and comfortable, and recommended, the renovated rooms are outstanding, the beds comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was under renovation. We were given a newly remodeled room. It was very beautiful and modern. The bed was super soft and comfortable. The staff was very friendly and efficient. Location was close to Disneyland (5-10 walk).
Manager Response: none

Summary: It is excellent location close to all things you want to look disney rental cars and its very clean rooms excellent service for shuttle go around
Manager Response: Dear prithipalg  Thank you for your review. We appreciate you taking the time to comment on our hotel. Please do come back again to see us. Thanks again.

Summary: I think this was a great place to stay. Rooms were clean, excellent condition and updated/modern. I loved all the plugs and ports to charge devices in the room. This was awesome. The only reason why I didn't give it a 5 star rating is that the restaurant at the hotel wasn't the greatest. We were quoted one price for the breakfast buffet at the front desk, but then the owner of the restaurant tried to charge us $3.00 per person more. We did address this and he did lower the price. But the whole thing seemed kind of shady, and the food wasn't that great.
Manager Response: melissasX2116CT  We appreciate that you selected Ramada Plaza while staying in Anaheim. After reading your comments regarding the breakfast buffet, I assure you we will make sure that our staff and the restaurant's  staff is quoting the right prices for the breakfast buffet. I hope you'll decide to stay with us again to provide you with even a better service.

Summary: It was fine even with the construction going on but the horrible Crap smell from the bathroom sink ! They did come immediately fter my wife called to come clean an fix it . The next 2 days things were fine for the rest of our stay .
Manager Response: none

Summary: Close to Disney, not the cheapest place to stay but very nicely redone, fast internet and close to basic shopping and restaurants. Currently under construction aril 2017 and some noise during the afternoon as a result and not good construction access to the pool and hot tub right now.
Manager Response: Dear juanw204  We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your comments with us. As mention, we are going through renovations to improve our property. However, we continue to strive for excellence so we look forward to sharing an even better experience with you in the future.

Summary: Remodeled rooms are nice, nice shower. I like it better when the vanity area is separate from toilet and shower area though.  They do not have suites.  Staff very nice.
Manager Response: Dear 498kristinp  We are so pleased to learn that you enjoyed our remodeled room.  I hope we will get a chance to welcome you back to our property in the future.

Summary: Very friendly staff, very clean rooms. We only stayed one night and we were able to keep our car there all day while we went to Disney. A very close walk to the parks, very comfortable beds, lots of places to eat right around the corner!  We will stay here again!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was not a but quiet. Had kids above me running up and down the halls all day and night. Restaurant was strictly Indian food. Very disappointed, not a single American dish on the menu. I had no idea if anything that was on the menu.
Manager Response: Dear gingerb831  Thank you for taking the time to share your valued impressions regarding your stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We strive to provide an outstanding resort experience and it is disappointing when our guest are not satisfied with their stay. I am unaware if you let our staff know about the noise in the hallways, but I assure you we would of made sure to solve this issue. As you mention, our restaurant is Indian and does have only Indian dishes but there are many other options for restaurants nearby walking distance. Feedback is critical as we look to improve our performance moving forward. We hope you stay with us in the future and allow us the opportunity to restore your faith in our property.

Summary Heading: Quick stay in a great hotel
Summary: We only stayed one night so we could be close to the house of Blues , hotel was close to where we wanted to be, it was very clean and staff were very polite and helpful. The front desk called once we were in our room to make sure everything was as expected, which is always a nice touch. We would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Peter H Thank you for taking the time to comment on tripadvisor. We appreciate the chance to leave you with such a remarkable impression and hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary: The hotel is nice and close to the theme parks. The staff was very helpful and kind. The room was nice and very comfortable. I would stay here again. The breakfast buffet was good and economical. Just what we needed to get the day started.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here for a night and the staff is really awesome. We even got an upgraded room. Every hotel should have a Stacey in their staff that's willing to do things above and beyond for their customers. The hotel is walking distance from disneyland. They also offer free parking. Will I ever stay here again? Absolutely.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very walk-able distance to Disneyland. The hotel was undergoing renovations but we didn't feel any disruption during our stay. The check-in was really pleasant - since we checked in late at night, they had blocked off a parking spot for us! The restaurant serves decent choice of hot breakfast and overall a good experience for our trip to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear  saikatpaul  Thank you for taking a moment to post a review on TripAdvisor. We are thrill to hear that you enjoyed your stay and had the opportunity to try our hot breakfast. Thank you again for a great review and we look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: I normally stay at the Hilton hotel when I go to Disney but decided to stay somewhere a bit closer this time so I stayed at two different hotels this one being the first one. And I absolutely loved it!!!!!! The staff was super friendly and always greeted us with a smile by far they have the best customer service I have ever received!!!!! Even though the hotel was being renovated we never heard a sound well inside the room! Check in was super smooth a big thank you to Andy!!!!!! And check out was very quick thank you Ozzie!!!!!! Definitely regret not staying there all 4 nights!!!!!!! But this hotel has won me over and will now be my go to when ever we visit Disney!!!!!! Thank you again ramada staff!!! Hope to see you guys soon!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Liset M Thank you for giving our hotel the chance to meet and exceed your expectations. Thank you for making note of our excellent customer service as well as are checking in and check out smooth process. We are sincerely gratified by your commentary, and anxiously await your return.

Summary Heading: We had an awesome experience here! The hotel was partially...
Summary: We had an awesome experience here! The hotel was partially under renovation but it didn't interfere with our stay at all.  The front desk staff was super friendly and helpful! The restaurant staff was also friendly and the food did not disappoint! Highly recommend staying here! Super close to Disney. There was also a PF Chang's and Cheesecake Factory just down the street.
Manager Response: 207karlened,   Thank you very much for the wonderful review of your recent stay at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am so glad to hear that you and such an awesome experience!  I am pleased to hear that our staff throughout the hotel were so friendly, and that our location is perfect for you to Disney and multiple dining options.  I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!  Thank you again for your great review, feedback, and valuable time,

Summary Heading: Proximity to parks a real plus!
Summary: This property is in the process of being fully renovated, but in the meantime there are some issues.  After we left for the parks for the day, someone turned our thermostat to 53, and we could not get the room warm upon our return due to a frozen pipe caused by the unit. The night manager finally moved us after we insisted to not sleep in a freezer.
Manager Response: juliebR8465YY,  Thank you for taking the time to share your travel experience during your recent stay at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am glad to hear our location is perfect for you!   Although our night manager was able to get you moved into a new room where the temperature was more comfortable for you, i do sincerely apologize about the inconvenience of having to move upon your return from a day at the park.   Please feel free to contact me personally so i can assure you have a perfect stay during your next Disney vacation.   Thank you again for your time and feedback,

Summary: This place is not right on the Disney park but they are close that you can walk from and to hotel. They are renovating when we are there, but you don't hear or feel that they are working. The hotel staff are friendly and accommodating. The restaurant close to the lobby can improve more. But this place is close to other restaurants so you and your family will not starve and can get more family bonding.
Manager Response: Rjamito,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am very glad to hear how friendly and accommodating our staff was for you.  We definitely pride ourselves on our great service and i am glad it shows!  In regards to the restaurant, i would like to hear your thoughts on how we can improve more as we value our feedback from guests and want to do as much as possible to ensure a memorable trip.  Please do not hesitate to contact me personally any time if there is ever any feedback you would like to provide.  Thank you again for your valuable time and feedback and i look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: The Ramada Plaza is conveniently located next to Disneyland and House of Blues Anaheim. I was there for a concert with my friend. The rooms have just finished being re-modeled and are really nice. Really nice modern shower/bathroom. The bed was amazing and really comfortable. Had the pleasure of speaking with the new GM, Josh Gitsham, who is extremely welcoming, nice, and really has the property heading in the right direction. Will definitely return to see the fully finished remodel, and to stay for more concerts.
Manager Response: Cable37,   Firstly, thank you very much for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.    I am so glad to hear you like the new rooms as well as the direction we are going in.  It is definitely something we are proud of!   Secondly,  it was a great pleasure talking with you while you were here as well, and thank you for the kind words.    Please do not hesitate to contact me during your next concert so i can give you a nice warm welcome back to our home.   Thank you again for your time and feedback,

Summary: This hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland and the Convention center.  The price was also great.  They were in the process of remodeling the hotel when we stayed, however we stayed in one of the newly renovated rooms.  It was really nice. The bed was very comfortable especially after a long day of walking in the park.  The only downside was the limited parking.  Parking was free and in an underground facility that requires room key to access, so safe, however there was very limited parking. We arrived late on Friday night and there were only three spots left.  Not sure if this will be expanded after the remodel, but that is the only negative i can think of. Staff was super friendly and check in and out process was easy and fast.  Definitely would recommend.
Manager Response: Lisa O,   Thank you for sharing your travel experience with us during your recent stay at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am glad that our location, price point, and friendly staff was a perfect fit for you!   I do apologize that the parking was limited and you experienced difficulties finding a spot when you arrived on Friday night.   Typically this isn't an issue we encounter often.   This could have been due to the large amount of guests we had for a major convention that was in town.  I do appreciate you sharing this with me, as it is a perfect time to visit this concern as we get closer to wrapping up renovations.   Thank you again for taking the time to share this feedback and I hope to see you again during your next trip to the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Great location, friendly staff and clean property even...
Summary: Great location, friendly staff and clean property even though renovations were in progress.  This property is very close to the park but the noise level was not over the top.
Manager Response: 594carib,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am glad to hear our location was great for you as well as how friendly our staff was.      We hope to see you back during your next Disney vacation!

Summary: We stayed for three nights and had a great stay.  The hotel is situated within all the main action of Anaheim, just a short 5 minute walk from Disney and also the new Anaheim GardenWalk shopping area where you'll find Cheesecake Factory and Bubba Gump for dining.  We had a newly renovated room which was lovely.  Simple but clean and effective décor, nice beds and a light, modern bathroom.  The rooms all come with a microwave and fridge too.   The staff were all friendly wishing us good morning and evening when passing through reception.  For the price and location this hotel is definitely recommended.
Manager Response: Andew G,  Thank you for sharing your experience during your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am glad we are in the perfect location for you in Anaheim and that your stay was so great!  Thank you for going into detail and helping spread the word about our newly renovated rooms!     We look forward to wishing you more good mornings and good evenings during your next trip to Anaheim.   Thank you again for your time,

Summary: Hotel staff is very friendly and pleasant. Hotel offers free underground parking for guests and the hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland, so it makes for very convenient access to park and car.  Rooms are clean and recently remodeled. Lobby has yet to be remodeled, but doesn't matter as your private room is newly upgraded. I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: LSMitchell000,  Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am glad to hear we are in the perfect location for you, and even more so that our staff was so friendly and pleasant.   I am so happy you like the new rooms, and can't wait to welcome you back so you can see the completed remodel!   Thank you again,

Summary: Clean and renovated room. Friendly staff. Walking distance to restaurants, store. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Marissa M,   Thank you for taking the time to share your travel experience with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am glad you liked our new renovated rooms and that our staff was so friendly!      I look forward to welcoming you back during your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Renovated room was awesome. Clean nice decor. Only problem I had was the bad sewer smell I got after we took showers and it did not go away. Came back from Disney around 1230 and the room still smelled. The next morning I get woken up by the construction that's going on next to the room and on top of the room. Way to kill my relaxing time. Overall the staff and pool was super clean. They still renovating so I'll just wait till it's done. Left a review with Wyndham let's hope they read it that's why I left 3 stars
Manager Response: Jose A,   Thank you for taking the time to provide such valuable feedback from your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   It is through feedback both positive and negative that we are able to maintain, and where need be improve on the services we provide to our valued guests.   Although I am very happy to hear how good our staff was, and that you were able to enjoy our pool, I am disappointed to hear about the smell in your room and sincerely apologize that it was not taken care of by the time you arrived back from your day at Disney.   In regards to the renovation I also apologize about you be disturbed in the morning.   To update you on the project, we are only a couple rooms away from having all of our rooms redone and looking brand new!    I do appreciate you leaving feedback with Wyndham about your stay, and please do not hesitate to reach out to me personally during your next trip to Anaheim so I can assure your stay is a memorable experience!   Thank you again for your valuable time and feedback,

Summary: The room was clean, roomy and updated. Everyone was so nice, welcoming and friendly. Parking is free and this hotel is walking distance to various restaurants for early or late dining. We would definitely stay here again!!
Manager Response: Lyzac2017,   Thank you for taking the time to provide feedback from you previous stay with us.  I am very glad to hear how welcoming and friendly all of our staff was to you!    It seems like we are in the perfect location for you as well.      I look forward to welcoming you back on your next trip to Anaheim!

Summary: Walk to Disneyland parks.  Very accommodating staff.  Clean and modern rooms and very comfy beds.  Easy access to Harbor Blvd for the best steak restaurants in town. I loved the lobby where the oriental blue and white jar collection were displayed.  I am a collector too, so that was a real treat for me to see.
Manager Response: lindagomez49,   Thank you for taking the time to review your stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am so thrilled to hear that you enjoyed our collection in the display, and that we are in such a perfect location for you.    I do hope to see you again on your next trip to the Anaheim area!

Summary Heading: Close to Disney, Nicely Renovated Rooms
Summary: The hotel is within walking distance to Disney (about 15 mins) which was the main reason for my booking. Based on the price, room, and location it was a far better value than any other hotel I saw in the area. It's a perfect hotel for a Disney vacation. The rooms are large and very nicely renovated. I especially liked the updated walk-in shower. The staff always greeted us when we were coming in and even let me check in early when they had a clean room prior to check-in time. I can't wait to come back for my next Disney vacation!
Manager Response: Kamchenry,   Thank you for taking the time to review your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  I am glad we are the perfect hotel for you during your Disney Vacation.   I am also very delighted to hear you liked so may aspects of the room, and that our staff always welcomed you back upon your return to the hotel.  I look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel during you next Disney vacation!   Thank you again,

Summary: had a great time on our vcay with my family! what really made it amazing was the staff and their great personalities very helpful very knowledgeable to truly grateful to them for making my experience a great one.This definitely going to be our hotel whenever we're in town.
Manager Response: Debz D,  Thank you for taking the time to share your travel experience with us during your recent stay. I am so glad to hear that you feel our staff is so amazing and that they were able to help you throughout your entire stay.     Also thank you for making our hotel your home away from home when you are in the Anaheim area.   I look forward to welcoming you back home during your next stay in Anaheim!  Thank you again,

Summary Heading: Great Place to stay while at Disneyland.
Summary: We had a wonderful time while in California.  Ozzy and Stacy made our stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim so much more enjoyable.  They went way beyond the normal to make our day enjoyable. They both greeted us with a smile and a good morning every day.  The room's were recently remodeled and looked great.  The best part was it was about a $7 cab ride from the Hotel to the entrance to Disneyland.  Ozzy and Stacy called the cab for us and it arrived within  5 minutes every time. Overall we had a wonderful experience here.
Manager Response: Dear steve5515  Thank you for a great review! We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to sharing your kind words with our team, and we hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: great location, friendly staff and updated room was very...
Summary: great location, friendly staff and updated room was very nice. Would definitely recommended this hotel
Manager Response: Dear 200adrianah  We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our renovated rooms. Thank you for your kind review and we look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: I love all the new up grades.  Hotel was amazing and looked brand new. 10 minute walking distance to Disneyland made it spey eat to get there and save money on shuttle or parking.   We will be staying there again next trip. Thank you Ramada.
Manager Response: allysa147,   Thank you very much for sharing your travel experience with us at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   I am glad to hear you like the new look of our property, and that we are located in a perfect place for you.     I cant wait to welcome you back so you can see the end results of our upgrades!  Thank you again,

Summary: We stayed here a few weeks ago and were very impressed with this hotel. We visit Disneyland fairly frequently (and have a few favorite hotels in the area), but this was the first time at this one. We booked through the Hotel Tonight app, and were not given even an eye roll or "look" like you sometimes get when you've booked through a discount site. Alex was at the desk both when we checked in and out, and she was extremely friendly. We were given a recently remodeled room which was fantastic. The bathroom was great, the shower was awesome (especially after a long day at the parks), and we didn't have any issues with construction noise like we expected we might. The only downside I can think of were the pillows. They were super tiny, and really uncomfortable. I actually ended up
Manager Response: Dear Kacie B  Thank you for sharing your amazing feedback about your recent stay.  I am pleased to know you enjoyed our renovated rooms and that you felt our property is at the top compared to the many other options near by. We certainly look forward to hosting you once again during future visits to Disneyland.

Summary: Our room was ready at our early morning check in time. We had a beautiful, clean room. The bathroom was top notch. The beds were very comfy. The room was spacious for the 3 of us.
Manager Response: Dear michellemS4948TA  Thank you for selecting Ramada Plaza Hotel to be your host during your recent visit to Anaheim.  We truly appreciate your feedback and look forward to welcoming you back again in the near future.

Summary: The two hosts during my stay were professionals at there best. I had an issue with the room I checked into and addressed it to them. Without hesitation both were courteous and always smiling. On that note they made my stay at the hotel a pleasure.
Manager Response: Dear davidrF633XJ   We are thrilled to hear you enjoyed your stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We appreciate your kind comments and we  hope to have the pleasure of welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: We had a pleasant stay at the Ramada Plaza.  The staff was very helpful and courteous. The room was clean and all the amenities worked great and/ or was present.  The room was quiet and clean. I would definitely stay here again if the opportunity came again.  The room price normally for me is a little steep but well worth it using Wyndham Rewards point.
Manager Response: Dear tbrock68   We are happy to hear from you and glad to know you enjoyed your stay. I’m pleased you found our staff helpful and courteous as always.  It’s encouraging to hear that our hard work is affecting the guest experience. We look forward to seeing you upon your return to the area!

Summary: Loved staying here. The staff is amazing and so kind. Only issue i had was aith the room, the housekeeping did not clean out the mi rowave as there was another guests food left in there from who knows when. I let Stacey (who is fabulous) know, while checking out and she apologized profusely. Staff is wonderful there I could not have had a better experience for my daughters first trip to Disneyland. Definately will stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Y6103YEvictoriaw  Thank you for your recent stay and for the compliments, we appreciate you sharing your feedback. We will share your kind comments to Stacey. Once again, thank you for making us your preferred destination. We look forward to your return.

Summary: Friendly staff. Newly upgraded modern room. Clean,  comfortable, and good size room. Walking distance to Disneyland and to many shopping stores including Garden Walk. My kids enjoyed every minute of their time.
Manager Response: Dear gayl724  We are sincerely grateful you gave Ramada Plaza a chance to serve your needs. We are glad our location, our renovated guestrooms and customer service all helped you make your stay enjoyable.  We hope to welcome you back again soon.

Summary Heading: Nicest front desk staff we have ever had!
Summary: We stayed with our family of 4 at the Ramada Plaza from March 18-22.  The girl at the front desk checked us in and took our bags as we arrived at the hotel around 10:00am after just getting off a cruise ship.  Our room wasn't ready yet which wasn't a surprise given the time of day.  She was so friendly and helpful and gave us bottles of water before we went to Disneyland.  Disneyland is very close to this hotel.  It's only a 5-10 minute walk away.  When we arrived back at the hotel we got our room and it was huge and newly renovated and very clean. The staff called us to see if we liked the room.  On our last day when checking out the man at the front desk gave us goodie bags for the airport with chips and granola bars.   I will definitely stay here again on our next trip to
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean and beautifully renovated rooms. Reception is very accommodating and they gave us water all the time.  Disneyland is about 20 minutes with my husband pushing me in a wheelchair. It's really a 10 min brisk walk if there is no traffic. Safe to walk late at night - just make sure you are with other folks coming from Disneyland.  Lots of eating places nearby and they open late or 24 hrs. Practically next door to the Anaheim garden walk. Great location and free parking.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I decided to stay at this hotel after reading all the amazing reviews. I brought my family to Disneyland and the location was so convenient with just a 10 minute walk to the parks. We checked in late and after a long ride, we were really tired so I was pleased on how fast the check in process was. Andy was very friendly, he answer all our questions and recommending us to amazing restaurants, he truly has amazing customer service. He also delivered the extra towels and blankets himself in two different occasions. The staff greeted us every time we pass by the front desk.  The evening staff was superb!! and the morning staff provided us with complementary water bottles.  The hotel is still being renovated so I'm sure it will look amazing when it's all done. I will be returning to
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was only 2 (very long) blocks from Disney which is what we were in the area for. The staff was VERY friendly, helpful and Courteous! They are doing renovations to the rooms and ours was one newly renovated! While it was very pretty and modern, my ONLY "complaint" was you could tell the renovations had been rushed.  The bathroom door lock didn't line up, the dead bolt on the door as well didn't line up, so you couldn't lock them, the bathroom tile work was shotty and the "hard wood" area looked unfinished. But the room was clean and comfortable which is all we could really ask for. I would stay here again!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I recently stayed for three nights at the Ramada Plaza for a work/leisure trip. We were pleasantly surprised by the newly renovated rooms and the great price we received for the room. The hotel was an exceptional value for our adults only trip and provided for a short walk to Disneyland.                  Our newly renovated room was very impressive and included modern amenities and furnishings and an exceptionally nice bathroom.  The double beds were very comfortable as were the plethora of pillows.  The new carpet was like walking on a cloud as you could tell they opted for a higher end carpet pad. The décor and artwork was a very nice touch and added great visual appeal and contrast to the room.  The wood look tile entry and sliding barn style bathroom door were
Manager Response: none

Summary: Well located hotel, very close to Disneylan, shops and restaurants. Lovely lobby and people at reception. Our room was adequate but tired and worn. The "gym" was a tiny room with some basic equipment. The pool was nice but on the edge of the carpark so less than inviting.  A good basic hotel if all you need is a place to sleep.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms were just remodeled and very nice, staff was really friendly and helpful.   Nearby CVS and Walgreens for easy snack/forgot stuff shopping, but most importantly,  really easy,  fast walk to Disney!
Manager Response: Dear ppannell1   I am pleased to see that you enjoyed our proximity to the parks and our convenient location to all the near by shops and restaurants.  Thank you for your review, and I truly hope for another opportunity to welcome you back to in the future.

Summary: Great location, between DCA and Garden Walk. Nice to have two drug stores across the street too. The room was very big and newly renovated. Bathroom had shower nozzle and rain spout from above.  Two small issues: on a busy cheerleader competition weekend, too many teens running the halls and 9 (yes, 9) crowding the hot tub. The AC was very loud too. We let the front desk know, and they said they'd notify maintenance.
Manager Response: Dear VictoriaK2   I appreciate you sharing your genuine feedback on TripAdvisor. While I am thrill to hear that you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms, I do apologies for the AC issue not being taken care of. We work very hard to provide a great experience  and will certainly utilize your valuable feedback in an effort to continue to improve. Thank you again, and I hope for the opportunity to welcome you back in the future.

Summary: Th room was great, the location was great, and the customer service was outstanding! Thanks to Stacey Bui, she was so helpful and so welcoming.
Manager Response: Dear Sara M  Thank you for sharing how our customer service was outstanding and how great and welcoming Stacey was. Reading your review was an absolute pleasure, and I look forward to your next stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel.

Summary: My boyfriend and I decided to take a day trip to Disneyland for my birthday. I have never stayed at this hotel. Brittany made me feel very special the whole trip. It's walking distance to the park. The room was wonderful and there were TONS of pillows which is my boyfriend's favorite thing. Definitely staying here again!!!
Manager Response: Dear  Sheila D  Thank you for taking the time to write a review on TripAdvisor.  We truly hope for another opportunity to serve you in the near future.

Summary: Lovely accommodation, great rooms, breakfast so so, a bit of a walk to Disneyland but worth it.  Friendly staff, very helpful.  Restaurants very close and takeaway places not that far either.  Would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good hotel, clean, very friendly staff, super convenient location to Expo West and restaurants in the area.  Would recommend to anyone looking for a nice hotel and convenient location to Expo West or Disney Land.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The new remodel is very nice.  The staff were very friendly and helpful.  The parking was no additional charge and very secure. The location was very convenient for the convention center and dining options.
Manager Response: Dear U5299ORalang  I am so happy you enjoyed our newly renovated rooms. We strive to provide a hotel that is both inviting and comfortable so I am pleased to know you experienced just that. We look forward to the privilege of welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: The hotel is very nice and conveniently located. Uderground parking is secure. Lobby is clean and welcoming. Staff is very helpful and friendly. Room is nicely equipped and recently redecorated. Very relaxing.
Manager Response: Dear Brrenda859   We appreciate your kind remarks of our staff and our property. We hope that you will stay with us again the next time you are in town.

Summary: The service was excellent, people are very friendly and heplfull. The room was very nice, freshly renovated. This hotel is well located when you need to go to the convention center. My only negative comment: there was no thin pillow...
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Stay here every time I visit Disney.
Summary: I love this hotel. The staff are all awesome. They are always so willing to go beyond what is expected. We were there four years ago and we're happy with what we got for the price but now I feel like we got a huge deal for the price, the remodeled rooms look great!
Manager Response: Dear stefanier791  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel. Your observations are extremely valuable for us, as we aim to provide our guests with great service. We value your loyalty and we hope you continue to stay with us when visiting Anaheim.

Summary: I would highly recommend the Ramada Plaza in Anaheim. The service was great - the staff was helpful, kind and courteous. The room was clean, spacious and nicely updated. The price was very reasonable and the location was just a short walk from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear pamela_berger  We are delighted to hear that you our staff was helpful as always, your comments are extremely important to us. We look forward to serving you again hopefully very soon.

Summary: this hotel is being renovated but don't let that scare you off.  Excellent service!  The staff was absolutely amazing.  Early parking so we could go to Disney and check in later.  Letting us enjoy there quiet clean pool even though we checked out.  Our flight was delayed so rather that wait it out at the airport they offered for us to lounge poolside to accommodate our 2:30 departure. Providing cold bottled water to boot!  The rooms are completely renovated. Spacious and lovely.  Its a 10 min walk to Disney from the hotel which was no big deal. Lots of great restaurants close by.  I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you for sharing your outstanding comments on TripAdvisor. Your feedback reassures us that we are successfully fulfilling our mission of providing extraordinary experiences. It would truly be my pleasure to welcome you back for another delightful stay.

Summary Heading: Greatest  One Night Stay We've had in a While
Summary: Check-in was flawless and the clerk was super friendly. Room was extremely clean and comfortable. Love the free self parking too!! We drove in from a storm in Palm Springs and arrived at 7pm, easy to find, parking was a breeze, and were so relieved when we got up to the room. It was so cozy.
Manager Response: Dear jnugen  It is gratifying to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. It will be an absolute pleasure to provide you with many more remarkable stays in the future.

Summary Heading: Alex from front desk was so sweet and very helpful! She was our favorite! :)
Summary: Cleanest Ramada I have stayed at yet! The room was so cute and modern. The employees are super sweet, especially Alex from the front desk! Alex was very helpful and made us feel welcome. I would definitely recommend this hotel to anyone, great rooms and service. Will definitely be coming back (:
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great property. The staff was beyond great! Parking was a breeze and FREE! The room was very clean, the beds and pillows were VERY comfortable (this is always important to us). The property is about a 10 minute walk to the main gate. There are a lot of food options around the hotel and it's close to Orange county airport. We highly recommend this hotel and will be back in a few months!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our stay at this property was from start to finish the highlight of our vacation. We were celebrating our 20th anniversary and the staff, Jose and Stacie's  kind accommodations and attention to detail in particular, ensured our visit was an absolute delight. The foyer's atmosphere is both elegant and cheery and our room was clean, lovely and inviting after a long day at Disneyland. The hotel does not charge a parking fee and the walk to Disneyland is only a few blocks, very manageable and in my opinion better than using a shuttle or paying for parking at the park. I will personally use this hotel exclusively in the future and recommend it specifically to anyone who will be traveling to Anaheim.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Only stayed for one night and wished it was longer! The beds were very comfortable! Absolutely loved the renovations that they had done to the room. The bathroom was very modern and quite spacious. The shower had great water pressure and temperature. Disneyland was within walking distance along with so many different options to eat. Would absolutely stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel while going through upgrades, was able to make my stay comfortable and convenient.  Nice linens & furniture.  Easy parking, for in and out needs. Friendly staff, large atrium for large groups.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Honestly, the best hotel by disney to date!
Summary: We took my two year old nephew to Disney, the rate was great, the room was great, the walk to the park isn't bad at all! The staff suggested walking was better than paying for the shuttle that came by every hour-ish.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The front Desk staff was Excellent! Our Room was great ! The bed was so nice! I would recommend this hotel to my family and friends! The only thing that was not that impressive was the restaurant American breakfast 😔
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was under refurbishment. The rooms were outstanding and clean. Very Short walk to Disneyland. Block and half. Will stay here again for the cost of the room and location was great! Very helpful staff was very pleased.
Manager Response: Dear tampabay_05  It is magnificent to hear that you enjoyed the proximity to the parks and our renovated rooms. We also appreciate your heartfelt remarks about the service. Thank you, and it will be our pleasure to welcome you back for another incredible stay in the future.

Summary: The newly remodeled rooms were wonderful but the rooms open to a hallway that looks like war zone.  Construction is going on in all of the hallways.  The people who worked there were very friendly and helpful.  This hotel provides on site parking but at times there were no spaces available due to construction.  The lobby, restaurant, and elevators have not been remodeled and are very dated.  I was told by the front desk that renovations will be complete at the end of summer 2017.
Manager Response: Dear V2432RFmaryd  I appreciate you sharing your genuine feedback on TripAdvisor. As you mention, we are doing renovations and in the process, some hallways may show it. We are working very hard to make sure are guest are taken care of and are not disturb by the renovations.  We look forward to welcoming you back to our renovated hotel in the future.

Summary: Room was nice and the staff was very friendly. The one major problem was the ventilation or ac or water heater was messed up in some way. It would be incredibly warm if the ac was off but once turned on gor very cold so basically we were stuck with one or the other. But besides that it's a nice little hotel!
Manager Response: Dear rubyjenine  Thank you for your recent stay with us at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We appreciate letting us know about the AC and heater situation, we are looking into it. Thank you and we look forward for the opportunity to welcome you back to Ramada Plaza.

Summary: Wonderful rime a5nthis hotel. Facility is clean and bright. Services of hotel staff are world class as well.
Manager Response: Dear quocn239  We are delighted that you enjoyed your recent stay with us. Please come see us again, the next time you come to town.

Summary: From the moment me and my GF walked in to the lobby we felt welcomed and knew it was gonna be a good stay, even if for one night. Desk clerks were extremely friendly and got us into our room in seconds... and this is not an exageration (sp?). The hotel is going through a remodel, but that didn't takeaway from anything. The room itself was one of the newly remodeled rooms and it rivaled that of The Linq in Las Vegas. Beds were comfy, bathroom was clean, water pressure was just right, heating system was on point.... not complaint in the world... Alex at the desk was great at time of our departure, offering water and candy.  The location was also a plus, in that it was 7-10 minute walk from the lobby to the maingate at Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear rtype9  Thank you for sharing your gracious review with us. It is a sincere thrill to know you had a great stay with us even if it was just one night. We look forward to your return.

Summary: We booked our room last minute and got a great deal. We were visiting Disney for one day only and arrived at the hotel at 10.00am to see if we could park the car in the hotel car park even though check in wasnt till later in the afternoon.  The people at the front desk took our name and said that we could in fact use the car park and also that our room was ready early!  The staff at the front desk were super helpful and very very friendly.  They even gave us bottled water each as we left to go round the park with.  Disneyland is an easy 5-10 minute walk away from the hotel. The walk felt safe even at 11.00pm returning as everyone is walking to and from the parks/downtown disney area. The hotel is so close that we returned back in the evening to grab sweaters as it was chilly and
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was newly renovated, it was beautiful! The staff was very friendly and helpful! Room was cozy and bed was comfy! Very close to Disney, within walking distance with kids! Great location! I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here during a trip to Disneyland.  Easy 10 minute walk to the entrance and hotel was great.  Our room was recently remodeled and it was really nice.  Free parking and wifi and the people at the front desk were great to deal with.  The restaurant has an indian food theme, but they make traditional meals too, plus there are plenty of restaurants well within walking distance.  The remodeling is almost completely done and I think everyone is getting reservations in the remodeled rooms now, so I wouldn't let that affect your decision.  I'd stay here again in a heartbeat.
Manager Response: Dear albertlP649QZ  Thank you for choosing to stay with us on your trip to Disneyland. We appreciate your kind and detail review. It's great to hear that you will stay with us again. We hope to see you soon...

Summary: Loved our room and the service. Very close to Disneyland. About 5-10 minutes away in terms of walking distance. They're updating all their rooms and the rest of the building, so it has a more modern and updated feel.
Manager Response: Dear samanthanarban  Thank you for sharing your gracious review. We appreciate your feedback regarding our renovations. We hope to welcome you back again soon.
