Summary: Great hotel, great value. Rooms were large and very clean. Bathroom was great and had a waterfall shower head which was a hit. No continental breakfast but free secured parking.
Manager Response: Dear W8808QOjessicag  Thank you for choosing to stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel. It is good to hear that your stay was great and you liked our waterfall shower head. Although there is no continental breakfast, we do serve all you can eat american hot breakfast in the lobby restaurant. We hope you stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: Great customer service. Wifi was kind of weird and only worked for one out of 4 devices we had. Room was beautiful. Parking was included in price. Had some hair in the bed tho.
Manager Response: Dear K6665ISericg  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review. We hope to welcome you again for another great stay! and thank you for the 5 star review.

Summary: Perfect hotel. The staff was super friendly. They had smiles and greeted guest. The newly renovated rooms were nice with new carpet smell.  Overall, great little hotel that is walking distance from Disneyland, shops and restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear O3946DrAnthony  We are delighted to learn you had such a pleasant experience here at Ramada Plaza Hotel. Your compliments about our friendly staff are very encouraging. We hope to welcome you back again in the near future.

Summary: My family was in town in January 2017 for a group trip to Disneyland in memory of my mother that passed earlier that month. The staff were able to accommodate us with several rooms on the same floor and were very kind to us during the booking process and the stay on sight. We did like the bonus of having the restaurant on the floor level as a budget friendly breakfast buffet option. We never had the opportunity to try the Indian options available their for lunch or dinner through. Our room was roomy and stylish. The in room refrigerator is always a nice find. When we eould leave through the lobby the staff would always offer us water bottles to take with us as we headed out and upon checking out they sent us on the road with a sweet bag of candies. The hotel is within walking
Manager Response: Dear  Michelle W  First and foremost, we regret to hear of the passing of your mother and we thank you for choosing to stay with us in this special occasion. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed our accommodations. We appreciate your review and look forward to your return.

Summary Heading: Dissapointing ending to a great weekend
Summary: My rating is based solely off of what my husband and I experienced when we checked out of the hotel. Upon checking out, I let the staff know that I wanted to pay cash for our stay. After paying, I was told that even though I had paid the balance in full, our debit account would still be charged the FULL amount of the stay...what??? I am used to a one-night hold/deposit that drops off in a few days, but the full amount? Something to remember is that debit accounts take the money OUT of the patron's account, then refund it after about 10 days. Had I paid in cash, I would have had NO money. I am sorry, but you cannot expect hardly anyone to be okay with having $350+ taken out of their bank account in addition to $350+ paid in cash, meaning someone has paid about $700.00 in total. A
Manager Response: none

Summary: I relocated from a different chain due to subpar rooms and the hotel staff at this hotel was very helpful in my doing so.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here February 14th until the 16th and have to say it was a wonderful experience! Comfortable bed, loved the rain shower head, service, parking and closeness to Disneyland! I loved how the parking was free and just for the hotel guests! Very quaint underground parking! This hotel is going through some remodeling but you can't hear any of it! Friendliness of the check in desk, how helpful and nice they were!
Manager Response: Dear kirstyn_else  It is great to hear that you enjoyed our accommodations and close proximity to the Disney Parks. Thank you very much for your thorough review. We hope to welcome you back soon!

Summary Heading: Great hotel if you are going to Disneyland. They do NOT...
Summary: Great hotel if you are going to Disneyland. They do NOT charge for parking and it is walking distance to Disney! Clean and brand new! Great location, friendly staff, and not expensive! Can't beat it!
Manager Response: Dear laurief884  Thank you for your generous 5 star review! We're thrilled you enjoyed your stay. We hope to welcome you again for another great stay!

Summary Heading: Water in bathroom smelled of sewage
Summary: The water from the bathroom fixtures smelled like sewage which made the whole room stink. The pillows are lumpy and square- no bigger than a throw pillow. The wifi didn't work at all and the window shade was definitely not black out. The upside? The staff was very friendly.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Free parking in gated underground garage. The rooms have been updated and were better than some 5 star hotels I have stayed in. They were in the process of updating the hallways, but have not yet updated the lobby. They had signs up informing of renovations in progress, but I heard no noise. Very clean and housekeeping & front desk staff were friendly and helpful. Would stay again as long as prices stay reasonable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Went on a girls trip to Disneyland and stayed the night at The Ramada Plaza Hotel.  This hotel was great!  The entire place was clean, the room was very nicely updated, and the staff was extremely friendly and helpful!  I will definitely be staying here again and will recommend this hotel to friends and family.  It was also a very short walk to the parks which was very convenient.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A comfy stay within a short walk of Disneyland
Summary: It seems that this Ramada was recently renovated. The furniture in the rooms seemed brand new. The beds and pillows were comfy. The room itself (double queen) was huge, and even had a couch. If I had to make a suggestion, it would be to upgrade the quality of the shampoo and soaps, but that's a minor thing.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff were welcoming and attentive to all our needs. The new rooms were fabulous. Even though there are renovations going on there was no noise from builders even on the day we slept in. The wording noise on the roof (also being repaired) was a little annoying on the first night but we quickly got used to it and we could have moved rooms if we had a problem with it. All good and I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear jamesmL2155WS  Thank you for your recent review of the your stay in Ramada Plaza Hotel. I am pleased that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you in the future!

Summary: Great hotel. Internet was super slow and would randomly disconnect you. Pretty frustrating. They didn't have room service options or anywhere to get food in the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear cristianpL9470GU  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. We appreciate you feedback. We actually do have a restaurant in our lobby that does provide room service, I'm sorry if we did not communicated that with you. We look forward to seeing you in the future. Thanks again for taking the time to give us feedback.

Summary: Very clean and comfortable hotel. Beds were very soft, the bathroom was very clean, plenty of towels. Close to Disneyland. In convenient location, with cvs and liquor store etc. across the street. Free good parking. Staff was very very friendly, approachable and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear P8342QYjenniferc  It is great to hear that you enjoyed your accommodations and close proximity to the Disney Parks. Thank you for writing your review. We hope to see you again soon!

Summary: Utterly no complaints aside from subpar pillows. Beautifully updated resort with midcentury modern design and little touches here and there. Just as nice as the Hyatt House across the street that we stayed at the week prior. Great $108 rate too! I'll stay here again. No noise problems. Very friendly front desk staff. Clean. Just an overall satisfactory experience.
Manager Response: Dear annaaltheide  Thank you so much for your kind review. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our renovated rooms. We will appreciate if you recommend us with your friends and family. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Newly remodeled room, very nice.  Loby and entry are clean and inviting. However, the loby furnitire is showing wear and needs replaced.  The restaurant/bar in the hotel needs to be remodeled.  It appears dirty and dated.   Not inviting at all.  I only at breakfast there once and opted to eat elsewhere the following day.   The exercise room is curently out of service during the remodel, but they will let you use the one in hotel next door. The staff is super friendly and very helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great price for quality room and location
Summary: We had a great experience-rooms are currently cheaper than surrounding hotel offerings d/t construction, but the construction was on the other side of the building from room 413 (newly renovated).  Parking was free and felt safe and secure (underground). Also, my husband was so pleased by the wonderful Indian lunch buffet offered at the attached restaurant.  Only tiny issue was that that the thermostat in room had note suggesting that it not be turned below 70 degrees.  We did turn to 68 (with no issues) once or twice because the room got stuffy!  Otherwise, comfy beds, very spacious rooms and bathrooms, and short walk to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: If I had to complain about anything at all,  the toilet paper holder was too far from the toilet!! Other than that everything was perfect. The staff was very nice, helpful and welcoming. The room was very nice, clean and comfortable. The location was perfect for everywhere we wanted to walk to. We were very happy and will stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I found my new home at Disneyland! I very much enjoyed staying at the Ramada Plaza. It's convenient to Disneyland as well as places to eat. The rooms are modern and clean. They have a lot of convenient outlets for all your technology. There is also a refrigerator and coffee maker in the room. But the thing that really made staying at the Ramada Plaza special was the amazing customer service. When I walked in, the staff greeted me with a smile. They had everything ready for me, including a mobility scooter I rented off site. I called in advance for my special needs and the woman I talked to on the phone - Stacy - remembered me when I checked in and made sure all my needs were met. When I got to my room, she called to make sure I had everything I needed. And, one night, when my
Manager Response: Dear lorenj63  Thank you for sharing your comments on tripadvisor. We truly appreciate the detail of your review. Our staff is delighted to hear we are now your home when coming to Disneyland. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary Heading: Great location you can easily walk to both parks I did...
Summary: Great location you can easily walk to both parks I did however pay for a king bed and received 2 queen beds instead they are too small if you are a couple just sayin and was a bit upset that I did not receive what I paid for
Manager Response: none

Summary: I honestly have nothing bad to say. Staff was awesome. Always friendly. They went above and beyond my expectations. The rooms are nicely renovated. My one issue was the placement of the toilet paper roll in the bathroom but when I mentioned it staff said they are trying to remedying it asap. This hotel is a easy 5-10 minute walk to Disneyland. We will definitely be placing the hotel on our list of places to stay while in Anaheim. We loved it!
Manager Response: none

Summary: I will definitely stay here the next time I go to Disneyland. The whole staff was very nice.  The rooms were clean and the beds were very comfortable.  I have to say Stacey at the front desk made my stay.  She was so sweet to me and my family.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It's within walking distance to the parks, so it saves you roughly 20$ a day in parking. There was construction going on, but it was relatively quiet and they ended pretty early in the evening. By the time renovation is done, this place will be wonderful. Wonderful staff as well.
Manager Response: Dear kmhg2017  We appreciate your kind review. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay and the proximity to the parks was close enough for you. Thank you for the feedback on our renovated rooms. We hope to welcome you back soon.

Summary: Had a great stay! Room was very newly renovated, clean, and modern. Staff were very nice. They greeted us every time we walked through the lobby. Andy offered us snacks and water for our Disney day! Checkout was a breeze.
Manager Response: Dear labriea  Thank you for letting us know about your recent stay! We appreciate your feedback and we are happy to hear you enjoyed our renovated rooms. We hope you choose to stay with us again in the future.

Summary: Of about 20 people stay here last weekend. It was by far the most personal experience I've had at a hotel. Stacy at the front desk was more than accommodating and acquiring all the rooms needed for my large party, as well as greeting myself and my son with water and candy bars after a long drive. We will definitely be coming back.
Manager Response: Dear allum85  Thank you so much for your kind review. I am happy to hear you enjoyed your stay and that Stacey was accommodating as always. We look forward to having you back in the future!

Summary: I was in town recently for a convention.  I've been to three different hotels previously for the annual convention and this was the best of the bunch.  The staff was fantastic and the recent renovations are very nice.  I hope to book this hotel in the future for the convention.
Manager Response: none

Summary: They were doing construction, however I knew that going in. It was written on the website, and posted everywhere at the hotel. Our room was amazing. It was so nice, and clean. The staff was wonderful and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear smorr9  We appreciate your kind review. We are glad to hear that your stay was amazing and you enjoyed our renovated rooms. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I enjoyed my stay at this hotel. Yes, it was under remodeling process but the staff totally made up for that. There were small issues like ano soap holder in the shower and a couple of other minor issues but they just hadn't got to them yet but all were very easily remedied. The front desk staff and manager were to say the least exceptional and super helpful.I would recommend this property highly !!! I did have an issue by not being able to connect to the internet, 2 staff people tried & even Time Warner couldn't resolve it over the phone.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Friendly staff and very efficient at remembering our names and helping with our needs.
Summary: Nice accommodations for our family of 6. I went online to rebook it for a time in April but noticed after rooms remodeled they raised the prices that's too bad. It will make a difference if we get to book here again or not.
Manager Response: Dear rhondal131  Thank you for taking your time to review your recent stay with us. As far as a future reservation, I encourage to also contact us directly to compare prices. Rates do tend to change and vary depending on our occupancy. We hope to see again soon.

Summary: aside from the construction and the occasional smell..almost like sewage..The staff and the accommodations were first class! The front counter staff was always so cheery and going the extra mile t make sure we had what we wanted
Manager Response: none

Summary: Used Priceline to book stay. Placed in older room next to the rooms gutted due to renovations. Not sure if discount reservation site put us in the ilder room but there seemed to be plenty of spaces already completed that were not filled. Hotel not busy at all it seemed. Pounding started in next room before 8am the day after running a marathon. No chance to sleep in as planned. Packed and left. Probably a good hotel when renovations are completed.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Beautifully renovated rooms. Loved the shower. Rooms were clean and tidy when we returned from our day at Disney. Friendly guest services as well. Very helpful staff, will stay again very soon. Put hot chocolate in the rooms with the tea selection please.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great time and stress free stay at Ramada Plaza Anaheim!
Summary: We recently stayed at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  Our stay was wonderful our room was clean, recently remodeled and comfortable. Location was perfect.  A short walk to disney, shopping and restaurants close by and plenty of free parking.  Staff was warm and friendly especially front desk personal!  We couldn't of asked for a better stay. Great time and stress free!  We will most definitely stay at Ramada Plaza Anaheim again and will recommend it to our friends!
Manager Response: Dear rael6123  Thank you for a wonderful review! It is great to hear that you stay was wonderful and that you enjoyed our recently remodeled rooms. We look forward to hosting you again in the near future.

Summary: We had a good stay and the staff was very accommodating! The room was clean, free and enough parking, and quiet. The only issue was we got a newly renovated room and the wax on the floor came off on my feet while I was drying my hair. That was just really weird...
Manager Response: Dear lanasb  We appreciate you taking the time to write a review. Thank you for pointing out the issue with the bathroom floor, we are taking care of that issue. We truly appreciate all feedback. We hope you visit us again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Renovated rooms are quiet, comfortable, and attractive!
Summary: We were extremely impressed with the room renovations.  The beds are super comfy.  After a long day at Disney, it felt great to relax and sleep in the new rooms.  The hotel is walking distance to the Disney parks and next door to several food options.  We will be back!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great stay for a great value
Summary: The location of the hotel was terrific and the rooms were exceptional. I'm a Disneyland annual pass holder and I love the value of what you pay for staying at this hotel. Will definitely stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I would definitely stay here again. My wife and I and another couple stayed here for the Disney 1/2 Marathon recently. The location is definitely convenient. It's about a 15 minute walk to the main entrance/Downtown Disney. There's a shuttle service that picks you in front of the hotel and drops you off (for a small fee). The hotel itself was just renovated and the rooms are very nice. Everything is new and clean. Staff are super friendly and helpful. Free parking and wifi! Only negative would be that the water for showering was luke warm at best. We didn't use many of the other amenities, but we wouldn't hesitate to stay there again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great hotel with awesome costumer service! Less than a 10 minute walk to Disneylands main gate. We got there super early and they were so kind to give us complimentary early check in. Though there was an oil spill in the parking lot and we had to wait a bit to take the car down into the garage. We had a newly remodeled room and it was lovely! The decor was nice and welcoming. My only complaint was that the pillows are far too small and there were a couple of stains on the furniture and some of the towels. I felt as though a newly remodeled room should be in tip top shape! But the stay was great none the less. All we did was sleep there anyway.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We chose this hotel because it was close to Disneyland and had read previous positive reviews about the hotel. We were not disappointed. The rooms are newly remodeled. The beds were very comfortable. The staff was very friendly. We will make this our go to hotel for all our Disneyland trips.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location for a great price!
Summary: I went to Anaheim for a convention, and the location for the hotel was great! Within walking distance from the Convention Center, Disneyland, and many other restaurants. The hotel staff was excellent, and the room itself was very suitable for what I was looking for. The only downside was that they were in the process of renovating, and my room just happened to be on the floor they were working on at the time. Wasn't really a disturbance though, as I was gone the entire day and work was over by the time I got back to my room. Other than that, I enjoyed my stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was great for our overnight. The only problem was upon getting to our room we noticed a terrible smell coming from the bathroom. I called the front desk and he said they would send someone up. That didn't happen, so once we returned at midnight and the issue was still there we had to change rooms. I'm disappointed that I didn't receive a call or a message regarding the issue and we had to pack up our things so late at night. The person at the desk did however apologize and gave us another room.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed in this property with family for one night.  It is located near the Disneyland. Room size was big with comfortable beds and free internet.  Hotel provides free parking.  Had a nice sleep.  Front desk and house keeping staff was very nice and well behaved. Breakfast served was delicious.  Recommend this property for a comfortable stay.
Manager Response: Dear  Ashwani C  Thank you for your kind comments. We are delighted to hear that you as well as your family had a great stay and a nice sleep. We really appreciate you recommending us. We hope to host you in the near future.

Summary Heading: Nice, clean hotel with great location
Summary: The hotel totally exceeded my expectations. Such a short distance to Disneyland and restaurants in the area, and the staff was SO friendly! They greeted me by name every time I left and returned. My boyfriend and I were taking a last minute trip and it was one of our best yet and it was so nice to have a comfy clean room and bed to come to after a long day of walking at Disneyland. Hotel is under some renovation right now, so there is some noise during the day but not a big deal for us as we were gone most of the day. But, we had absolutely no trouble getting a peaceful nights sleep. Would definitely recommend.
Manager Response: Dear SarenaC125  We are delighted to read that you and your boyfriend enjoyed your stay with us. Our team aims to exceed expectations, and we are happy that we did. We look forward to hosting you again in the near future.

Summary: Clean comfortable recently remodeled friendly staff.  From San Francisco Bay Area. Showers work well. Remodeled bathroom looks good. USB connection for phones very modern rooms comfortable beds.  Here for Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked this hotel last minute end it turned out to be really nice good location only about a 10 minute walk to Disneyland front gates
Manager Response: Dear devonm146  Thank you for a wonderful review! It's great to hear you enjoyed our proximity to the Disneyland parks. We look forward to hosting you again in the near future.

Summary: We absolutely loved this hotel. It was beautiful, reasonably priced and convenient to Disney and the Marriott Anaheim. Would love to stay again.
Manager Response: Dear O3095MZamym  Thank you for your excellent review. We are pleased to hear that our hotel was reasonably price and convenient for you. We hope to have the chance to host​ you in the future.

Summary Heading: Excellent Customer Service from start to finish
Summary: From the beginning, its the little things that made a difference. From the Hello's, Good Mornings, to Have a nice Day, everything was excellent. The phone call 1 hour into your stay to see how everything was going to the friendliness of all staff. It was much more than we expected.
Manager Response: Dear mariatl2017  We appreciate your kind review. We are glad to hear that the little things we do, do make a difference. We hope to host you in the future for another five-star stay.

Summary: I stayed for New Year's weekend. I thought the hotel was nice. I was given a remodeled King room that was a really good size. It had a mini-fridge, microwave and keurig in it.  The hotel staff was very friendly.  The hotel is about 5-10 min walk to front gate of Disneyland.  It is situated in a location that has plenty of food options.  What remains with me is the customer service that was provided!  In all of my stays, I have never received a call about 10 minutes after check-in from the front desk to make sure that the room I was given was clean and free of problems.  I think that is a really nice touch.  The front desk staff also greeted me every time I came into the hotel and left.  So why not give 5 stars!?! I have to knock a star because the A/C unit was not upgraded to at
Manager Response: Dear NAJI A  Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us. We are delighted that you decided to stayed in our hotel for the New year's weekend. We are happy to here that you were impressed with our customer service. We will definitely share your comments regarding the A/C to our maintenance department. We hope to welcome you in the future for another incredible stay.

Summary: Nicely done. Still under renovations when we stayed, it was a New remodeled room.  We've been here before and we liked then, now it's much nicer. Staff was great, coffee in the lobby was a plus, and the morning paper too.....
Manager Response: Dear anthoglez  Thank your for your kind comments. It's wonderful that you found our staff to be great.  We really appreciate your feedback and hope to host you for another incredible stay

Summary Heading: Bad place to stay during remodeling
Summary: The hotel is located 2 blocks from Disneyland which is grear, area around it is great. Unfortunately they are remodeling at the moment and I got a room next to the remodeling area which was terrible, dust and noise since 6 am was very bad. I reported it to the front desk, they didn't offer anything to make up for the inconvenience, they were very nice but kind of careless. The temperature on the jacuzzi was way below average which was a rind down. Other than that it's an ok place.
Manager Response: none

Summary: From check in to check out a great experience. The font desk was so friendly, an important part of your experience. Staci went above & beyond to be sure we had what we wanted. The rooms are newly remodeled and beautiful w/ great showers! The location is just 2 blocks from Disneyland. This was our 1st time we chose to walk instead of shuttle! Though the hotel does offer shuttle service every 20 mins. We didn't try the restaurant/ bar but they looked nice. We did have complimentary coffee bar in lobby. Our car was safe in the under ground free parking garage. We do Disney several times of year & this was our 1st time staying here, but it's definitely not our last! Looking forward to coming back soon!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The renovations are making the stay just awful
Summary: The location of the hotel is great. Just about 10mins within walking distance from Disneyland. The room looked great after the renovation, but the biggest turn off was a terrible smell from the sewer in the bathroom. The bathroom smelled awful throughout our entire stay. We stayed for 3 nights and we had to have the bathroom door closed at all times, but when we had to use it, it  is was just awful! I'm guessing this is related to their ongoing renovations. The whole floor we stayed in was undergoing renovations.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed here once before. It is just a few blocks from Disneyland. We had a very nice room but the heat did not work. The gentleman at the desk jumped into action and got us another room after he found there was an issue. He took care of everything. When I had issues like this in other hotels, they would say come get another key. He brought us a new key and also made sure the heat was working in the new room. We were on our way to Disneyland and got free bottles of water at the desk. Great customer service!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Brand new renovated room, they had issues with people smoking in rooms, non smoking hotel, smoke alarms went off periodically, suggestion put more no smoking placards in motel.  Nice clean rooms, quiet. Did not have opportunity to utilize swimming pool and sauna, looked to be clean and maintained,  Large exercise room, overall motel kept very clean.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was nice and clean, also walking distance to disneyland park. Cheesecake factory restaurant just next to the hotel and also have to pizza shop, and subway. Hotel have a buffet breakfast. We will come back again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had been planning our trip to Disneyland for a few months before we decided to book our rooms. After some research and many websites, we finally chose the Ramada Plaza Anaheim to stay with our children. It was a great experience for our 4 children with the staff going over the top in courtesy, hospitality, professionalism that won us over as repeat guests...
Manager Response: Dear kurtdaniels66  Happy New Year!! We appreciate your kind comments. Thank you for choosing to stay with us! We would love for you and family to make our property your home away from home.

Summary: We wanted a "decent" room that was within walking distance from the Disneyland Resort, but didn't think we'd get a room as nice and affordable as the one we got. Ahh, the power of prayer! It turns out that they have been remodeling and renovating this hotel and it was nicer than some of the boutique hotels that we've stayed at for hundreds more. The staff was super friendly, the rooms were very clean and it was about a 10 minute walk to the parks! Once the word gets out, this place could get harder to book so take advantage of it while you can.
Manager Response: Dear coachmike2468  Happy New Year!! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. We love to hear our guests feedback in regards to the renovations, thank you. And yes, with our location and our competitive rates, our hotel is ideal for anyone visiting the Disney parks or convention center. We hope to see back soon.

Summary: Everyone super friendly and welcoming, rooms remodeled and extremely clean, great service and amenities. Specially General Manager Jane! Thank you guys!!
Manager Response: Dear jorgerL8941DG  Thank you for writing a review on our property! Our staff takes pride in providing the best possible service to our guest. Thank you for staying with us and we hope your return to our hotel, we would love to accommodate you again!

Summary: My daughters wanted to spend a day at Knott's and a day at Disney so we neeededxa place to spend the night. We were very pleased when we entered the hotel. It was very clean and the staff was overly nice. We received a goodie bag and I was granted a late check out for the next day since I was not going in to Disneyland with the girls. It was a wonderful experience!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent Value and a Great Staff
Summary: I want to first put in a good word for Stacey who checked us in when we arrived.  She was very friendly and really made us feel welcome.  I also want to commend the Ramada Plaza on the clean comfortable room they provided us.  As Season Passholders of Disneyland, we stay in this area often.  It's nice to know that we will always have an excellent place to stay every time we come to visit the park.  For the money, this is an excellent value and the Ramada Plaza exceeded our expectations in many ways.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great staff and spacious, beautifully remodeled room
Summary: The staff was very courteous and helpful. The room was spacious and newly remodeled.  Walking distance to Disneyland. Very happy with the price and hotel.   And I can't tell you enough about how great the staff was!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked this hotel for a last minute Disney stay. The service was excellent and our room was much better than expected for such a great price. Less than a 10 minute walk and you are in the park. Also in walking distance to many restaurants.  The room itself was brand new, clean and very spacious. It has everything you need including a small refrigerator which is a must with kids. True that there is construction happening, but it only happens from 9am - 5pm and didn't bother us in the least because we were out all day. I would highly recommend and we will definitely stay here again when we return to Disney.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We recently needed a new hotel for our frequent visits to Disneyland. We've found the Ramada Plaza to be conveniently located for walking to the Resort. More important the staff is always friendly and accommodating. Most important the Hotel is CLEAN!
Manager Response: Dear millerkustoms  Thank you for writing a review on our property! Our hotel is perfectly located only a short walk to the Disney parks. We appreciate your comments on how clean our rooms are, we will make sure to let our housekeeping staff know your satisfaction.

Summary: Since last year they have renovated and it is a lot nicer now. A quick walk to Disneyland and all staff were extremely friendly and helpful. We have stayed there twice now and both times have been great. The restaurant is good too!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice updates to the entire hotel, all new rooms and...
Summary: Nice updates to the entire hotel, all new rooms and facilities. Great service, Stay was very enjoyable
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed on the 3rd floor which was recently Renovated. Looked nothing like the pictures from the website. Excellent surprise. Definitely would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Richard Z  We are thrill to hear that you were pleasantly surprised! Thank you for staying with us and we hope to recommend us with friends and family.

Summary: They are currently doing construction to the hotel, which we knew going in however I didn't expect to be in the room right next door to the construction, the dust was unbearable. Broken ice machine on the 4th floor and every time we left we had to walk through the dusty hall. We asked for a king size bed but we were told they only had dual queens.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Love this hotel. Walking distance from Disney, great price! They even let us leave our car parked at the hotel after checkout. Service with a smile, very clean and updated. Highly recommend for anyone!
Manager Response: Dear irenesalazar90  Thank you so much for taking you valuable time to write a review. We are delighted to provide our guest with the best service possible with a smile on our face. It is good to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that you recommend us. We hope we come back again soon.

Summary: Overall I'm extremely pleased with this hotel. It is exceptionally clean even through the renovations. Which I didn't even hear through our stay. The beds were comfy, even the pull out sofa for my two 8 year old boys. It's close to a mall and great restaurants. The staff is friendly, knowledgeable, helpful, and professional. My only complaint, which it isn't even a complaint really, was the toilet paper roll is too far away from the toilet even for my 5'8 frame. Other than that I'd stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear  Michelle M  We appreciate you taking the time to share your recent experience from your stay. We are delighted to hear that our location was perfect for you since we surrounded by restaurant and convenience stores. Thank you for making us aware of the paper roll being too far, we will informed upper management. We hope to see you again soon

Summary Heading: Recently remodeled rooms a welcome surprise
Summary: Several upside surprises to my recent trip to Disneyland and the LA area. The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is in process of remodeling their rooms. My family booked two rooms, and both were newly updated. Carpets still had the fresh chemical smell and the padding underneath felt firm and springy. The flooring was new, as was the bathroom.  The rooms had a microwave, and a small fridge plus coffee maker. We did not use the coffee maker in the rooms, as there was fresh hot complimentary coffee in the lobby.  The friendly cheerful staff at the service desk was also a surprise. I've been to many hotels in many different cities. The friendliness and service level was one of my best experiences. Good Job! Ramada Plaza Anaheim
Manager Response: none

Summary: Only a few blocks from Disneyland so we walked back and fourth, so the location was very appealing, especially to avoid disney parking fees. We had a nicely renovated room with an amazing shower, but a bit of advice for the hotel is to install a small shelf in the shower for soap and shampoo so you don't have to put it on the floor. Pretty good breakfast in the restaurant as well. Mostly chose this location for its close proximity to Disney and we paid with Wyndham points.  I'll be back on my next Disney trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is truly a great hotel at a great price. The rooms are espically clean. The parking is fast and easy. They don't charge you for parking like most hotels. Your about a 10 minute walk from Both parks. Fast easy and continently located. Highly recommended.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Looking for a last minute weekend getaway to Disneyland or the surrounding? This is is the place to stay! While all the other hotels, directly across Harbor from Disney parks, were either outrageous in price or totally booked (AGAIN last minute and 'peak' season for the area), Ramada Plaza Anaheim was not only amazing in price for last minute they had recently renovated and the place is immaculate. The in-hotel restaurant 'Ghandi's Palace' offered a pretty exceptional breakfast buffet, as for their dinner menu, not my type of eats. After an ALL day venture at Disney, walking the distance to the hotel is not so awesome but we chose to make the trip last minute and it didn't kill to walk a couple 'Disney-blocks' LOL.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place is under construction and we stayed in the new section which was very nice, clean and big.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The visit was great. The rooms were above average for the price. Staff was extremely friendly. We are a pretty low maintenance family and don't need much in the way of "service".   They were renovating when we stayed there but were able to get one of the renovated rooms. Extremely nice and plenty spacious. Above all, THE BEDS WERE AMAZING! We decided to stay another night in Anaheim and booked another room with them for the final night of our stay.  The breakfast buffet is the way to go. Fill up nicely before heading out to DisneyLand.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This place was so convenient!! About 5 blocks walking from the park!! They have breakfast which we did not partake in but for 7.99 and all you can eat buffet style you can't really beat it. Free parking.. let me say that again.. FREE parking. Every other resort charges a fee for you to park at their hotel.. it's something that is taxed by the city.. this resort DOES NOT!! Friendly staff, clean and updated amenities!! Would absolutely recommend this to anyone and will stay here again!!
Manager Response: Dear Ashley M.  We truly appreciate your comments! Thank you so much for a great review. We are one of the very few if not the only property with no resort fee and free parking. Our location is ideal for Disneyland visitors since we are just a 10 minute walk to the gates. We are thrill to know that you will stay with us again and we thank you for your recommendations.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with amazing service!
Summary: The rooms are big and comfy. Just remodeled. Completely upgraded.  Skip the restaurant. They have terrible service but I was told they only lease the space and aren't part of the hotel.  The hotel staff however are excellent! From the housekeeping staff to the front desk! Thank you for making our stay great! Only about a 7 minute walk to Disneyland. Our kids ages 2 &6 loved it!   The room was huge with 2 queen size beds and a pull out sofa bed
Manager Response: Dear jennybuenrostro  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience from your current visit to Ramada Plaza. We are delighted to hear that our hotel staff was helpful and friendly as always. We hope you visit us again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Excellent place for a visit To Disneyland.
Summary: Clean, remolded rooms.  Short walk to Disneyland.  The staff was very helpful and friendly. Perfect place to stay for a trip to Disney.  The hotel pricing was excellent as well.  Would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed in a newly renovated room and it was spectacular! Very comfortable room and the staff is warm and friendly. Would stay again and recommend to all!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was very clean. Modern and stylish decorations really pulled the room together and made it feel very zen!The bathroom was very spacious, but the toliet paper was a long ways away from the toliet so maybe the property can look into that. The managers at the check in counter were very friendly and helpful during our late night check in making it easy breezy ! Wish I had caught their names, lovely people! I would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Tiffany K Thank you for taking your valuable time to review your recent stay with us. We appreciate your feedback on our new rooms. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Really nice hotel. Hotel staff VERY friendly and professional. Stayed in a beautifully renovated room. Free parking, park shuttle $5 per person each way. Lots of cheap to upscale restaurants in short walking distance. We will stay here again in future!
Manager Response: Dear 0judy  Thank you for choosing to stay with us! I'm glad you enjoyed our amenities. It would be our pleasure to welcome you back again.

Summary Heading: Good Place to Stay While at Disneyland
Summary: Really enjoyed staying at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim! My husband and I stayed here while running a Disney race at Disneyland. The hotel is conveniently located within walking distance to Disneyland and is very close to other restaurants. Our only negative about our stay was that the restaurant in the hotel was closed. We love the Indian restaurant inside the hotel so we were bummed to hear it was closed. I can't say enough wonderful stuff about the staff. Amazing customer service! The staff knows how to deliver the best of care. Special thanks to Jose for taking care of my fleece when I was headed out to our run and realized it was too hot to take it with me. He kept it at the front desk while we were out.
Manager Response: Dear Andy  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with our Tripadvisor readers. It is great to hear your positive thoughts about our customer service and our staff. We hope you book your next visit with us again.

Summary: Loved the location.  It was minutes away from Disneyland.  I also liked how CVS and many small restaurants were located right around the corner from hotel.  Most stayed opened until midnight.  Website indicates check-in is at 3 p.m  but we were able to check in at 9:30 a.m and enjoyed the free parking.  We just walked for about 8 minutes and were at Disneyland. The front desk staff was very friendly and welcoming.  I would have given the Ramada a 5 star but at the moment I can't only because the hotel is under remodeling.  I knew this beforehand.  It was noisy during normal working business  hours due to the construction and the fire alarm went off  twice.  We just happened to be at hotel resting during fire alarms going off.  I'm sure once remodeling is done all of these small
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Newly renovated room, very modern and spacious. Could have...
Summary: Newly renovated room, very modern and spacious. Could have done with some more furniture and/or storage space to put luggage/clothing somewhere that wasn't the floor, as well as some more counter space in the bathroom, but it was a very minor issue. Staff was helpful and accommodating, made checking in and out very simple. Good distance from the Disney parks.
Manager Response: Dear 432403sd  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay in our renovated rooms. We will take your suggestions in to considerations regarding extra counter space in the bathrooms. We hope that when your travels bring you back to the Anaheim area, we can accommodate you again.

Summary: The room was beautiful, spacious, and comfortable. The check-in staff was very friendly, especially Edna.
Manager Response: Dear Jody  Thank you so much for your comments. We are glad to know that you loved our beautiful and spacious rooms, and that Edna was friendly as always when checking you in. Hope to see you back soon..

Summary: This particular location is going through renovation & transition but we were lucky enough to stay in the renovated side.  It was beautiful, clean & comfy!
Manager Response: Dear shaekhajustme  We appreciate you taking the time to share your comments with us! Thank you for choosing to stay with us and we wish you recommend us with family and friends.

Summary: We've stayed at this hotel a few years ago, it was a great experience then. We decided to try staying there this past month on our trip to Disneyland. The hotel is newly remodeled, and the rooms are very nice, very clean! The stay was incredibly friendly, the whole process was so easy, the price was right on target. They are just a few buildings down from Bubba Gumps, Cheesecake, and a mall to walk around in.   The hotel has a nice breakfast set up that you can pay $8 a person, for a buffet. Great deal and the food was good. The hotel is only 2 (long) blocks from the park, but walking distance. I would stay there again! The rooms were very nicely remodeled. My only complaints are that the beds were terribly hard, and the pillows were very cheap small pillows. But bring your own
Manager Response: Dear jasongC8848US  Thank you for sharing your comments with us! Yes, our location is ideal for guest going to the Disneyland parks since we are only about a 10 minute walk. Glad to hear you enjoyed our breakfast buffet. Thank you for recommending us, we hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: The staff was excellent, very friendly and responsive.  The...
Summary: The staff was excellent, very friendly and responsive.  The hotel is being renovated but we did not experience any inconvenience.  The new rooms are beautiful.
Manager Response: Dear lisav797  Thank you for taking the time to write your review. We appreciate the your feedback in regards to our renovated rooms. We hope to see you back soon..

Summary Heading: Great Room, Breakfast not so much
Summary: Our room was fantastic. Very clean and recently remodeled. The only negative part was the breakfast buffet. It opened at 6:30am which was awesome, however, when we were there at 7:00am, pretty much everything was cold except the hard boiled eggs (which ironically you normally eat those cold). The oatmeal was like water (normally oatmeal is my favorite part of hotel breakfasts). The pancakes tasted like pure Bisquick. The french toast was probably the only thing that was okay to eat.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff were always quick to greet or address you as you entered and left the lobby, and offered help in several ways. The room was clean and although they were remodeling, no significant dust or noise was seen. The only complaint we had was our AC unit made a clicking sound, not one I was familiar with.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were placed on a hallway under construction. We were the only room not under construction. The noise was loud and constant. The hallways were filthy because of the construction. They could not move us the first night because they were booked. The toilet was broken, and we called in the morning for it to get fixed only to find in the evening it still hadn't been fixed. We had people in our room over half an hour while we were trying to get our toddler ready for bed. In the end they said the plug was warped and just jiggle the handle. At that point in time we were moved to another room at 9:30 at night.  There was no mention of construction when we booked the room. We would have reconsidered had this been known.  My family enjoys visiting Disneyland, and will choose other
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had a family reunion at Disneyland and many family members participated in the Dr Strange 10K run. This hotel was in a perfect location with a short walk to the parks which was crucial with a 5:30 am start to the run! We were placed in a newly renovated room which was clean, modern and spacious. Beds were very comfortable. The front desk staff were friendly and helpful. They booked us cabs, offered us water and always had a cheerful greeting whether we were coming or going. We didn't eat at the restaurant as it was being renovated. Would definitely stay at this hotel again and highly recommend!
Manager Response: Dear Susan F  Thank you so much for your kind comments! We appreciate the feedback. We are looking forward to welcoming you again in the near future.

Summary: Stayed while under construction. But overall not too bad... expected more but didnt know they were remodeling. Maybe next time it will be done and everything will look nice... service was well. Parking was well. Just the look could have been a little more nice. Thank you.
Manager Response: Dear U3057UPandreaa  Thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza for your travels. We appreciate your comments from your recent stay. We hope you visit us again once all renovations are done.

Summary: The customer service couldn't have been better.  The staff was extremely nice and helpful.  The renovations are beautiful and very modern.  The 2 queen room we stayed in was very roomy.  The hotel is walking distance to Disneyland and in a good location.  The big perk is you can park for free, which is a big savings.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I will absolutely stay here again. The rooms are clean, modern, and spacious. The bed was the most comfortable bed I have ever been in. I slept like a cozy rock. The staff was extremely friendly and genuinely kind.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We appreciated the front desk staff very much, especially Stacey who was very pleasant and helpful.  Even though the hotel is undergoing renovations, we were not disturbed by noise or inconvenience. The location was excellent because we were able to see our family members running in the Disney marathon weekend, as the race went by the intersection a half a block from the hotel.  We would highly recommend this hotel. The restaurant in the hotel, operated by a private owner, was not the greatest. The breakfast food was not really hot and the coffee was not hot at all! Requested 'hot' coffee and got reheated old coffee. Went to iHop down the street the next day.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Renovations happening but a good stay for families
Summary: We enjoyed our three night stay here. It was a relatively short walk to Disneyland and very close to convenience stores. They were doing renovations while we were there but that didn't bother us.   The staff were helpful and friendly even when I asked therm in the wee hours of the morning if the couple in the room next to us were staying another night (they were having a very good time against our bedroom wall). The room was nicely furnished and had the added benefit of a sofa in addition to two queen beds - very helpful when travelling with two kids. It was one of the few places where my hubby and I didn't have to share beds with the kids.  The buffet breakfast was pretty good in general.  All in all, a good stay and I would stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: It will be phenomenal once construction is done as long as........
Summary: I can see what there end goal is with the renovations, and yet they have aways to go beforw they achieve.  You need eyes like mine to pull this off.
Manager Response: Dear Tawana M  We appreciate you taking the time to leave your comments regarding your stay. Renovations is a long process but we have a great team working everyday to make sure that our hotel get's the upgrades that's needed. We hope you come back once is all done and share your thoughts with us.

Summary: The staff went out of their way to make our stay comfortable and easy.  The decor is modern and clean, very relaxing.  I would definitely stay there again.  Just a short walk from Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear E501KNjulieb  Thank you for a wonderful feedback! We are happy that you enjoyed our modern rooms and the short walk to Disneyland. We hope to see you back soon!

Summary: Extremely friendly front desk staff.  Newly renovated rooms are great!  Pool is very cold and in unfortunate location (parking lot!)  Great location, easy walk to Disney.  Free parking and Internet.  Breakfast not included but very reasonable prices.   Be aware renovations are going on and very loud!
Manager Response: Dear  Jennifer W  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We are thrill to hear that our staff was friendly as always and you enjoyed our renovated rooms.  We are looking forward to welcoming you again in the near future.

Summary: Staff was great. Room was clean, very quiet and comfortable. Superior location for the areas activities. My only issue was with the parking. Few outdoor spots and the parking garage was tight and very dark.
Manager Response: Dear  krist173 Thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza Hotel for your travels. We appreciate your feedback and will look into the lighting in our garage parking.  We hope to welcome you in the future for another great stay!

Summary: The hotel was nice except the vent was super loud when the heat kicked on. Also the smoke alarms went off twice waking me up. When I asked the front desk the didn't not seem to care.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Upon our arrival we were greeted by a very friendly staff. We stayed in this hotel for our visit to Disneyland. In the morning there was a staff member that greeted the kids with a huge smile and got them pumped up for their trip to Disney. When we came back late at night, we were greeted the same exact way. Even offered us some water bottles as they could see mom and dad were dead tired :) I would sty at the hotel again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: They were remodeling during our stay. Which we didn't really notice.  Our AC did quit working in our room however, but they promptly moved us into a new room with working AC. The breakfast area is interesting as its usually an Indian restaurant, but has a normal breakfast buffet, the food was okay for the price.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed here several times over the past few years while visiting Disneyland. The rooms are nice and the staff is always pleasant and helpful. However, they are currently under MAJOR renovations which does make it less welcoming. They charged high rates the week of Halloween even more then we have paid in the past when visit during the holidays. They really should be discounting their rooms while under this major construction and maybe the guests would tolerate the inconvenience. Gave a rating of 4 out of 5 due to the staff and past experiences. Looking forward to remodel.
Manager Response: Dear Lorine C   We want to thank you for taking the time to share your experience with Tripadvisor. We apologized if the renovations were in anyway discomfort for your stay, but it is a process to improve our hotel for our guest. We appreciate your feedback and we hope you come back to visit us in the future once we are all renovated.

Summary: Comfortable nicely remodeled, but I did have to specifically request a remodeled room at check-in. I appreciated the air conditioning.
Manager Response: Dear CleverHarer  Thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza for your travels. We are thrill to hear you enjoyed our remodeled room.  We cannot wait to have you back in the near future.

Summary: If you're sensitive to the smell of new construction, like new carpeting , I wouldn't recommend staying on the third floor for a while. I can't speak to the other floors. The room itself was lovely, and the staff was some of the friendliest I've ever seen. Exceedingly helpful as well. I'll be going back!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: This was a last minute reservation. The employees were...
Summary: This was a last minute reservation. The employees were super nice. There was construction on our floor but it was not disrupting to us. I look forward to visiting this location again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed in one of the renovated rooms, the concept was good and the room was clean. Although, the room was not finished in my opinion and while the design was good, I noticed some very poor fit and finish on the contractors part (ie: sliding bathroom door for bathroom was rubbing on the upper cover- tile in bathroom was uneven - the carpet at the transition to the tile had been cut short and there was a gap and fibers sticking out - could not see through the peep hole in the door - a terribly uneven gap around the door that goes to the adjoining room - the handles on the dresser drawers were bent out of shape - the channel listing guide for the television was incorrect) none of these are major things, just observations of poor contractor work. Overall, it was very good. Stacey
Manager Response: Dear edward_frazier  Thank you for taking the time to share your most recent experience while staying at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We are delighted to hear that you had a good stay. We also appreciate all observations you mention with our renovated rooms, thank you for bringing this to our attention. We will let upper management  aware of these issues so they can be taken care of as soon as possible. We want to thank you for commenting on how friendly and extremely helpful Stacey was during your stay. We look forward to welcoming you again next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Hotel is under construction... First room we went in was old, dirty and musky... went down to check out and go home or for get a renovated room. They were happy to accommodate. My only gripe is why not give a renovated room first if available. They saw us check in late with 2 small sleeping children. All in all everything worked out and I will stay again when  construction is completed.
Manager Response: Dear jasonlavoie  We greatly appreciate you taking the time to share you comments with us. We are under renovations but not yet completely done with our rooms. When you checked in,  a renovated room was not available, until later one open up and that is why we were able to accommodate you. We thank you for your feedback and look forward to extending our hospitality to you on your next visit to the Disneyland.

Summary: We were so impressed with the people at this hotel the beds were extremely comfortable and extremely clean the rooms were immaculate and it was probably the easiest to check into 100% satisfied
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a Disney vacation with my sister and her family...The staff was very friendly and accommodating.  We felt very welcome...they were able to get us in rooms on the same floor in their remodeled rooms.  The rooms were very spacious and having the fridge and microwave were very helpful.  The Cons:  The beds were not very comfortable for our liking, the bathroom needed a toilet paper holder, we came back to our room and the bed sheets had been taken off but the bed was undone and they never came back to fix that.  But I would say overall the stay was pleasant and I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear gabypm7  Thank you for taking the time to write a review. We apologize for not coming back to your room to replace the sheets.  Reviews are helping us improve our hotel so that we can meet our guests expectations. We hope you visit us again in the near future.

Summary: They were currently remodeling and it'a going to look amazing. The employees were friendly and helpful. I arrived off the Shuttle sick as a dog and we were in our room as soon as it was cleaned, I was so appreciative. There is a great pizza place next door and a 7-11 across the street as well as a Walgreens and CVS. It's a little walk to Disney but we did fine and appreciated the places close to our room. We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear heidia245  I am happy to read that our staff was friendly and helpful. We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience with our TripAdvisor readers. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: We didn't get a renovated room but it was still nice and clean. Microwave in room. Small coffee pot. Hairdryer in bathroom. Bed was comfortable. They have a inexpensive breakfast buffet for under 10$. I would definitely stay here again!!! Loved the front desk staff all super Friendly 😀
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is great. They have recently updated the rooms since the last time we stayed there. I was very impressed with the change. I feel the room was a little pricey, but overall we were very happy. The only problem are the pillows. This seems to be a problem with most hotels in the area. The pillows are tiny and not as comfy as they should be. The restaurant is wonderful offering a buffet for a great price.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Dawn L  Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. We are thrill to read that you are a returning guest. We read every review closely for any suggestions and we will look into the pillows that you mention. We hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I like Ramaf because it's close to Disneyland you can walk but if you dont prefer to walk there is a bus to Disney that stop in front of the hotel every 20min.  And, staff are very friendly.
Manager Response: Dear annalouy2016  Thank you for staying with us. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed the proximity to the parks. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: I stayed 2 nights with my mother for a quick trip to Disneyland before heading to a big concert out in Palm Desert. Everyone was super accommodating during our late check in (11pm) and then they happily greeted us when we were out the door to Disney before 8am. It's only an easy 10 minute walk to the front gate Disney. Rooms were big, clean and nice. There was construction at the hotel during our stay but we didn't notice (however, we were out all day). Oh, and parking was free with the room. Would definitely stay here again and hopefully for longer next time!
Manager Response: Dear krisbr  We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. As mention, parking is free and we do not have a resort fee! We hope to have the opportunity to host you again the next time you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary: Stopped for a night and really enjoyed this modern, clean friendly hotel. Front Desk staff were fantastic. Very helpful and friendly as well as courteous and professional. We were upgraded to brand new rooms on the 2nd floor. Lovely spacious room with super comfortable beds. Bathroom is lovely too. We had dinner at the Indian restaurant and it was great too.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We booked this location without knowing they were in a complete room remodel. We were in a room that was not yet remodeled but found it to be clean with great beds. We did not get disturbed by any noise eve though we could see construction happening in our floor. We would stay here again. It was in walking distance to Disneyland, closer than even one of the parking lots we've parked and walked in from before.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Don't let reviews put you off
Summary: Before we stayed we looked at some of the reviews on this site. The most unfortunate thing about some of the reviews is that I think they would be very hard to please anywhere any time. ALL the staff at this hotel are to be commended for the effort that they are putting in to make the best of trying conditions. during the renovations. The impact is absolutely minimal. My wife and I arrived early on a flight from Australia and knew we were too early for check-in  but as soon as our room was ready we were able to move in WELL ahead of regular check-in and even caught an easy hour's rest whilst work was going on next door and hardly noticed it.  The room was lovely, quiet and clean. Ossie and his staff could no do anything more to make our stay better. The location is excellent for
Manager Response: none

Summary: Close enough to walk to Disneyland daily.  Very clean rooms.  Great customer service, had a problem with hot tub one day, they got us in next door.  Very friendly and helpful people.  Esther and Stacy were outstanding, greeting us daily and even finding a screw driver for me to fix a kids toy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was very good I like the people from front desk they were really nice! I like the rooms. It was super close to Disney. That is what I like more!!! What I see t it was that 3th floor was a little messy.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Ramada staff was the friendliest I've ever encountered.  They were so helpful and available.  Obviously since the place was under renovation, it wasn't the cleanest or quietest, but was still a delightful stay.  Very convenient to Disney and restaurants etc.  We will definitely stay there again once the remodel is done.
Manager Response: Dear 861gerik  Thank you for staying with us. We truly appreciate the compliments for our staff. It is great to hear that you were understanding of the process of renovations but yet you still had a delightful stay. We look forward to having you stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: Easy walk to Disneyland, several restaurants, and Walgreens/CVS. The rooms had a fridge and microwave, which came in very handy for breakfasts. Front desk people were friendly, knowledgeable, and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Judy M  Thank you for staying with us. I'm glad to read that you enjoyed the proximity to the parks as well as the amenities in our rooms. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: The staff was very nice and it was a clean room.  Construction was a bit annoying (would have been nice to know that ahead of time) and problems with the toilet in our room, but other than that it was a great room.
Manager Response: Dear scottmY1478HZ  We appreciate taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. We are working very hard on improving our hotel, we ask for just patience and understanding as we become a better renovated hotel. We hope you let us welcome you back when your travels brings you back to Anaheim again.

Summary: This hotel is fantastic! We arrived at 12:30....the check in time was 3pm. I figured there was no way they would let us check in early but they absolutely did. Room was nice and spacious, extremely clean. On our first walk to Disneyland the girls at the front desk gave us waters to make sure we had something to drink on our way. My husband got very sick and came back from the park early. The maid staff saw he was not doing so well and made sure he got to the room okay and got him an ice pack as he was overheated. Everyone at this hotel has been so friendly and accommodating. They all went the extra mile to make us feel welcome. I highly recommend this hotel and will be back on our next Disneyland trip.
Manager Response: Dear Teresa P  Thank you for your kind review!  I am very happy to hear you enjoyed your visit with us. We take pride in providing the best service we can to every guest. Thank you for recommending us to our Tripadvisor readers. We are already looking forward to your next visit.

Summary: It's a average room, good place, good location, walking distance to the parks. 2nd time staying here the 1st time was way better. Remodeling the whole place so hopefully the upgrade helps. The noise wasn't a problem or inconvenience, but this time in 3 nights of the stay our trash wasn't thrown once & now complimentary breakfast is 6.99 a person even if it's a bowl of cereal that was a surprise.  They should offer breakfast vouchers
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our stay was pleasant and mostly comfortable. The staff is the best thing about this hotel, currently undergoing renovations. Staff were always genuine, friendly and helpful. Once the remodeling is done and if breakfast is included again (it wasn't when we stayed and we were expecting it as in prior stays) THEN I can recommend the Ramadan Plaza Hotel, Anaheim.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Not bad but will be a lot better after the renovation my 8 month old was crawling around on the floor and picked Him up to go out and he was covered in filth they are working on a complete renovation it sounds like it should be amazing when they're done. Had a bit of a noise during  time  for my kids it didn't wake them up the staff was really friendly I like Indian food the restaurant downstairs was too much of a smell great location great walk if you're not lazy about a half a mile.
Manager Response: Dear mikejV744EW  Thank you for your staying with us and taking the time to post your experience on Tripadvisor. We are currently working really hard to improve all that was mention in your review. We are eager to see our results from the renovations and we hope you return to experience the transformation.

Summary Heading: Need place near Disneyland to join Grandkids with parents
Summary: It was every bit as accommodating as the Disneyland Hotel for 3 times as much! Caring staff, clean as could be, close parking.
Manager Response: Dear Rose F.  Thank you so much for your kind review! Glad to read that we were just as accommodating as a Disneyland property. We look forward to seeing you again when visiting Anaheim.

Summary: I have stayed at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim several times and always a great experience. The hotel staff is the friendliest staff I have come across. They make you feel special each and every time you enter the lobby. The rooms are spacious and clean!
Manager Response: Dear  Tink8269  We love to hear reviews as kind as yours, thank you. Our staff takes great pride in providing a friendly experience and a home like feel to our guest. Thanks so much for staying with us and please come and stay with us soon.

Summary: Hotel was a really good price. Construction was going on while we stayed there but we knew of that! Our AC wasn't working really well and the people above us had SCREAMING kids but it was clean & comfortable!
Manager Response: Dear warriorfamily06  We are thrilled that you and the whole family enjoyed your time here. Thank you for providing our your review for our fellow Tripadvisor readers. We hope you stay with us again whenever you are in town.

Summary: So we didn't know about the renovations but we had booked a month before so too late to change but unlike other guests my family of three had a great stay. It was a Disney trip so we weren't bothered by noise or dust because we were at the park all three days we stayed. The beds are super comfy and the shower nice and hot and the room was clean. The bonus was everyone was really nice and was quick to solve any of our issues. The ice maker wasn't working so they brought us ice and it was after midnight when we called. Our fridge wasn't cooling and they fixed that for us. It didn't bother us that they were under construction. We peeked into a few of the completed rooms and are looking forwarded to staying in those upgraded rooms. the customer service was excellent. Super close to
Manager Response: none

Summary: hve stayed here before, one of my favorite properties to stay at in Anaheim, even though the property was undergoing renovations it wasn't intrusive
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Major Renovations Going on during stay.
Summary: We stayed at this property for our Disneyland trip. When we made the reservation there was no notice or indication that the property would be under renovation. More than half of the floor we stayed on was under renovation. There were issues in the room regarding the refrigerator not working and we had to be moved to three separate rooms before finally settling. The toilet wobbled on its base and the handle stuck.  The Internet Wi-Fi never worked the entire time we were there and we were there for six nights.  There were issues with the property in general.  At the hotel been forthcoming with the information they were under such major renovations we would never have stayed on the premises due to the fact that the renovations caused some owls including burning smell in the
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband and I stayed here for our anniversary trip.  We spent 2 nights here.  At hotel check in, we were advised of some renovations and construction going on in the hotel.  We were not notified at the time of the booking.  However, the only signs of construction were visual, in the halls.  We didn't hear any noise, we weren't bothered by construction at all.  I am extremely grateful for them letting us know.  It was one of those times where you expect the worst, but it actually ends up being extremely pleasant.  Which is good in our case since we will be back this weekend for another trip with family.  We were not bothered by hotel staff, or construction.  We were greeted every time we left, or walked in.  I was very happy with everything.  The room, the cost, the staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location, walking distance to nearby amusement parks and restaurants.   Staff accommodating to travel needs with children. Nice room.  Very friendly helpful staff.  Only drawback was construction going on.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Undertaking renovations at the time of stay, but I knew this prior (thanks TripAdvisor!). Close to Disneyland - a 10-15 minute walk to entrance or 3-5 minute drive to pickup point. Also close to Anaheim Stadium - 10 minute drive on game day. Excellent reception service & undercover car parking.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The Ramada in Anaheim is in a wonderful location.  The...
Summary: The Ramada in Anaheim is in a wonderful location.  The staff was very curtious and helpful.  The room was clean, large and comfortable.  They are undergoing renovations, we were not disturbed by noise or dust.  Would love to stay again to see the upgrades.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Even though a serious renovation was underway we were treated special and every effort was made to make us feel welcome.
Manager Response: Dear  GenevieveMc  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of your recent stay with us. Thank you for pointing out that our staff made great efforts to make you feel welcome. We are trying really hard to make sure that regardless of the renovations, our guest have a great stay. We look forward to seeing you back again the next time you are visiting Anaheim.

Summary Heading: This place will be great, when the renovation is done
Summary: The staff is really great. But they were renovating most of the rooms (which they needed to do BTW) so there was a lot of dust, noise starting at 9am, and a lot of extras people running around the floors which could make some people uncomfortable. They did have to more us to another room because he AC was broken, but even that wasn't a big deal because the staff is great!
Manager Response: Dear Thomas H  We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed your stay in the middle of our renovations. We hope that you will allow us the opportunity to host you again in the future.

Summary: Nice hotel, good location. Renovations were being done so dusty and a little noisy. It's good their doing reno's as its pretty dated and our toilet handle was broken so hoping if we stay again all the reno's will be done. Hotel laundry could use a serious update as it was cheaper to go to the laundrymat. I was also dissapointed there was no complimentary breakfast. Hope they change the curtains as they didn't stay together and were also pretty dated.
Manager Response: Dear jamesv402  Thank you for your candid review of our property. We value your feedback regarding the toilet handle and the curtains. We will have every inch of the rooms renovated so everything will be change and new. Should your travels bring you back to Anaheim, we would be thrilled to host you again in the future.

Summary: Stacey at the front desk was very nice and welcoming. As far as the rooms, they are a little out dated, wall are thin to where you can hear your neighbors conversation clearly.  I'm a light sleeper so wasn't able to sleep due to my neighbors. I would spend a little more just for that reason... to have thicker walls.
Manager Response: Dear achelgH2564JA  Thank you for taking valuable time out of your day to share your experience with us. We appreciate your comments for our team member Stacey. We assure you that we are doing everything that we can to make the necessary improvements. We aim to have our our guest make this hotel their home away from home. We hope that you allow us an opportunity to exceed your expectations in the future.

Summary: The people behind the desk did all that they could to make up for the fact that the hotel  every floor!!! were under construction !! major construction!! Had I known when I made the reservation, I would not have stayed there, But again the people did all they could to  make our stay as good as it could be.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room itself was clean, but could really use a new air filter which was filthy. They are renovating which wasn't a problem since we were out during the day and stayed there on a weekend. The front desk staff was very helpful with questions we had.  The restaurant that is attached to the hotel was awful. The breakfast buffet had cereal that was stuck inside the container and couldn't come out. The milk that was set out for the cereal was sour. So definitely don't take a chance of getting sick while at Disneyland and go to one of the many mich better choices near by. On our next visit to Disney would I stay there again? Probably not.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a trip to Disneyland
Summary: The hotel exceeded our expectations for the price we paid. It is going through some renovations but the staff went out of their way to make sure we had a great experience.we will definitely be back on our next trip to the park.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had a lovely couple of days at the Ramada Plaza in Anaheim. The rooms were large, the beds comfortable and the staff very friendly and welcoming. It was very clean.
