It is walking distance to Disneland. There are a lot of food outlets nearby. The hotel was being remodelled when we were there so no doubt it will be better if we go again.
Manager Response: Dear  Rosie S  Thank you for taking the time to review your experience. We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our comfortable beds. We hope to serve you again when your travels bring you back to the Anaheim and you get a chance to enjoy our remodel hotel.

Summary Heading: I wouldn't stay anywhere else when going to Disneyland or a convention!
Summary: You are surrounded by restaurants, shops and of course, Disneyland and California Adventure! Everything you need is within walking distance and there are many options close by to eat and shop. The rooms are VERY relaxing and the staff is exceptional!
Manager Response: Dear Vanessa R  Thank you so much for your review and for being a loyal guest. It’s heartwarming to read your comments and to hear that we are the only hotel you stay at every time you are in Anaheim visiting the parks. Our staff is delighted to serve you and your family. Have a wonderful weekend, we will see you soon.

Summary: Good location, walking distance to Disney, garden walk and close too many restaurants and convenience stores. Beds were comfortable, room on the small side, bathroom and entry way very dated. Good value for price. Currently undergoing renovations.
Manager Response: Dear Veronica g  We truly appreciate you taking the time to share your experience on your recent stay with us. We are working hard to ensure every guest has a wonderful experience. Our renovations will certainly improve our hotel and we hope you return to experience those improvements and give us a chance to serve you again.

Summary Heading: Old, smells disgusting, unsanitary and too expensive.
Summary: The customer service was excellent. But the rooms are too expensive for the quality. The rooms smelled horrible, the toilet had dried feces, and the toilet was broken. The breakfast sold was also expensive for poor tasting food.  Disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear CAMILLE P  Thank you for sharing your experience with our Tripadvisor travelers. While I’m glad you to hear that staff provided you with excellent customer service, I’m sorry you did not thoroughly enjoy your stay. We have shared your comments with our team as we are always looking for ways to enhance the guest experience. We hope to have a second opportunity to serve you should your travels bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: We had a late arrival time due traffic & we were welcome, assisted with parking & getting a quick checked in.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was very convenient for our trip to Anaheim. 10 minute walk to Disneyland. Clean rooms and excellent staff! Rooms are a little dated but they're doing a renovation. Parking was easy. Didn't try the restaurant. Definitely will stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: 주차 무료에 주차 보안이 잘 되어 있어요 전자레인지도 있고 냉장고도 있어요 디즈니랜드까지 도보로 15분정도로 걸을만 했어요 트레인은 유료라 타지 않았습니다 2층에 묵었는데 지금 공사중이니 이제 방문하면 더 좋은 룸에서 머물수 있을거 같네요  This hotel was comfort and great. I will be visited again if i come
Manager Response: Thank you for review of our hotel. I am thrilled that you enjoyed your stay and greatly appreciate the kind review. I hope you make our hotel your home away from away.  We look forward to your next visit.

Summary: The staff was really friendly and accommodating.  We arrived a little early for check-in with no rooms available until much later so they upgraded our room to their sister property next door for immediate check in.
Manager Response: Dear Kira J   Thank you for posting a review. I am glad that you had a pleasant and accommodating stay. We hope you choose stay stay with us again in the future.

Summary: My first review but felt it was necessary.  I just stayed here for 6 nights during a conference and I cannot remember the last time that I encountered a more friendly and kind front desk staff.  All day and every day, smiles, hellos, how can we help, how was your day...they even remembered your name in most occasions.    Properties of all levels, even up to 5 stars, can learn a lot from this operation and the great, consistent experience that these front line people provide to their guests.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff for so nice and accommodating it made the trip that much more wonderful. They are renovating but it didn't bother us at all. The rooms are dated, but clean. That seems to be the norm around the Disneyland area. Close to the parks for the price!
Manager Response: Dear  juliahO536DQ  We want to thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza Hotel for your travels. We appreciate your kind review. Hope to see you back soon.

Summary: The hotel was being remodeled while I was there but the room I was in had not yet been updated.  It was a clean room with a nice size flat screen television, refrigerator, microwave and room safe.  Walking distance to Disneyland although I chose to use the ART shuttles to save energy for the parks.  The shuttle passes are very reasonably priced at the hotel and well worth the money as the drop off is right in front of the hotel.  They also have underground and gated parking and a small pool and jacuzzi.  They also have a small workout room and dry sauna.  Overall I think the hotel was a good deal and the hotel staff was incredibly friendly and helpful.  I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear kevman2016  Thank you so much for your kind comments and great feedback. We are so delighted you found our rooms clean and comfortable and you were able to use the ART shuttle service to the parks. We hope to be your first choice for in the future for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation.

Summary: For the price I should've stayed at a better hotel instead as the bed made me really itchy and there were ants in the bathroom. Also the place was quite old but it looks like they're remodeling. On a positive note, the check in process was really smooth and employees were nice. Just wish the cleanliness and hotel overall was better.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything about this property made my visit and run at Disneyland awesome! The room was very well kept modern and clean. Housekeeping does an amazing job keeping the room Neat and tidy.  Having a refrigerator and microwave and coffee maker helps in the mornings prepping for a race. But perhaps the best part of the stay was the front desk personnel. They were all very helpful courteous and just overall very happy every time I walk through the door.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The property is being renovated , which is challenging, but the personal service of the staff is unparalleled compared to anywhere I've stayed - the staff is cheerful, recognized me every day, and made me feel like a VIP.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed at the hotel on a vist to Disneyland for the half marathon. Staff was very helpful. There were extra rooms and they let us check in early. Was also understanding when we needed extra time before check out. Allowed us to park our car after checking out to spend the day at the park.
Manager Response: Dear maples230  We are thrill to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us for the marathon weekend. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Nice property, friendly staff, great stay!
Summary: Very friendly staff, nice room, pool, hot tub 7 sauna were nice. Just a short walk to Disneyland!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Usually I would give Ramada Plaza a 5 but they were working on the plumbing and that made things a little inconvenient sometimes!  It's a close walk to Disneyland.  Staff are always friendly and helpful!
Manager Response: Dear Susan I  We want to thank you for taking the time to share your experience with Tripadvisor. We appreciate the 4 star rating but we hope in the near future you visit us again for a 5 star experience. Hope to see back soon.

Summary: I can't even begin to explain how satisfied we were with out visit to the Ramada this past weekend. The staff went above and beyond to ensure that every aspect of our visit was flawless and hassle free. Stand outs were Stacey and Katie who made us feel like friends rather than just another guest at the hotel. We were so please with our visit we were planning to book rooms for our upcoming visit but found out the hotel is sold out. I guess the secret is out- the Ramada Plaza is THE place to stay!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is the first time staying here and I was quite surprised on how extremely friendly and attentive the hotel staff were. From the front desk personnel to the house cleaning personnel, they all made us feel at home. The rooms are very spacious and clean, rooms have refrigerator and microwave, which I didn't expect, the walk to Disneyland is about 5-7 minutes. Our stay was wonderful and will stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great stay close to the park
Summary: The Ramada Plaza is a nice hotel with incredibly friendly staff.  It is walking distance to the Disneyland Parks and there are many nearby restaurants.  The pool,spa, and sauna were a welcome treat after walking the parks all day.  Coffee in the lobby was a nice touch each morning.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our room was clean and the hotel staff was friendly.  There was a shuttle service which got us to the parks so that was nice too.  We asked for a late check out since we were doing a Disney run so that gave us time to clean up before flying home.
Manager Response: Dear jenniferhL3175SM  Thank you for sharing your experience. I am thrilled to know you had a great stay during the Disney Marathon. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: The hotel was great. Beds were comfortable. Staff was friendly. My complaint is with the restaurant.  It was horrible. The creamer had mold in it. When I showed the man working there he just shrugged and took it. He didn't apologize. He didn't check the others. The food wasn't good and quite frankly I was worried it'd make me sick after seeing the moldy creamer.  Best to avoid this place and walk to a restaurant nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Rdy2travel9   Thank you for taking the time to review your experience. We are pleased to hear that you were satisfied with our rooms, beds and our staff. However, we're sorry to hear that you were disappointed with the restaurant. We appreciated your feedback and will be passed on to the restaurant staff to make the necessary adjustments. We hope to have the opportunity to host you in the future and to make sure your 4 star stay becomes a 5 star stay.

Summary: I would definately stay here again. The staff was extremely friendly. Hotel was very clean. Even wit the remodeling going on, it was still very quiet. Pool and spa clean. Rooms very nice. We could actually walk to Disneyland, in about 15 minutes. Would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Jacqueline L  Thank you for your excellent review. It's pleasing to hear that you enjoyed the wonderful staff and the proximity to the Disneyland parks. We hope to welcome​ you soon for another incredible stay in Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Absolutely Terrible.  Under Renovation no excuse!
Summary: Room had "funky" smell.   Windows didn't close properly.  Drapes did not reach to cover the windows to darken room.  Hallway full of sawdust and dirt.  Water turned off during the day.  Air conditioner was like a swamp cooler very humid, wet and smelly.  Staff very friendly and helpful but the manager acted like a weasel.  Will never ever return.  Absolutely Terrible!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The two queen bed suite for two couples and sofa beds for two teenagers was comfortable while a bit snug for 6 people.  However, we survived the night.  The suite itself was very well furnished and the air conditioning worked fine!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were on the second floor where they were in the process of renos. We weren't disturbed at all by the renovations, but now know we should have asked for a renovated room. Our room was alright. Nothing spectacular. Service was extremely friendly (Esther was super helpful at the front desk). We didn't eat in the restaurant so can't comment here. The location is perfect for a Disney vacation. As well close to shopping and really good restaurants down Katella.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed at the Ramada before and enjoyed its proximity to Disneyland front gate. This time we were surprised to walk onto the 3rd floor and find half of it under construction. There was no mention on their website or trip advisor. I have a dangerous allergy to paint fumes and would have appreciated a heads up. That said, the management was very accommodating and found a room as far away from the construction as possible. We like how the staff greet us as we come in and leave. Our stay was pleasant and we will probably book with them again. We just wish we would have had a heads up about the renovations.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Free Parking Easy Walk to Disneyland :)
Summary: As an Disney Annual Pass Holder I have stayed many many times in different Anaheim hotles  and at least 8 at what used to be Ramada Main Gate now Grand Legacy.( Which used to be my first choice, until they changed parking from 5 dollars to 12...The Ramada plaza is not as close a walk but about 6 minutes further. 10-15 min EASY walk to Disneyland t..The hotel is being re-done not sure to what extent but that makes me happy..  How I rate this hotel, staff great.. Location Great.. Free Parking A HUGE PLUS. Has good closet space, AC microwave and fridge . Beds are ok pillows so so..  Bathroom shampoo is matrix brand which is good. Bathroom is where you can really see it needs TLC, but I did not knock off any points because it is being re-done . Price is great. I did not taste any
Manager Response: Dear Nitzky  Thank you for writing a review of our property! Our hotel always prides itself on our staff and our amenities. We are glad you found the proximity to the parks to be minimal. We want to thank you for understanding that we are in the process of renovation and we hope we become your home away from home.

Summary: The Hotel is normal, nothing spectacular. The front desk attention was excellent. Location was perfect for Disney (just 1 block away). It is a good place to stay for one or two nights if you're going to Disney and want to spend just a few bucks, you get what you pay for.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family was very happy with our stay here. Despite the renovation going on, it didn't bother us while we were trying to sleep. Our room was spacious and clean. The beds were comfy after being on our feet all day at Disneyland & DCA. Walking distance so we don't have to deal with buses, it's 2 (longish) blocks. The staff was so friendly. The parking was gated and we didn't have any issues finding parking. Only bad thing was bathroom did not have vents. I totally recommend staying here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I almost choose to stay here whenever my wife and I go for a Disneyland trip. It's is just down the street from the main gate, about 20 mins walk. The rooms are clean and come with frig and microwave. There is free parking in the gated underground garage. Some rooms aren't as good as the others though, our last one did not have any counter space in the bathroom that was really inconvenient, and the frig didn't really work that we'll either, but other rooms I had were better. It does get a noisey when people are walking by in the hallway or if you have a connecting room. But the price isn't too bad, definitely cheaper to be had. No free breakfast either. Wi-fi is shotty at times. But with all that being said, the staff is nice, and it is comfortable and convenient for a
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had a great stay here the staff was great.We will definitely be back again. Your close to lots of nice  restaurants, Disneyland, you can basically walk everywhere from here. I would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Anaheim Plaza was located perfectly for my and my two children's vacation to Disneyland. It's just a ten minute walk from the hotel to the front entrance of Disneyland. The hotel has five restaurants conveniently located next door so I did not even really use my car forcthextwo days we were going to the park. Rooms were clean and staff wax extremely helpful and courteous. Highly recommended
Manager Response: Dear Henry O  Thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza for your travels. We are thrill to read that your stay  was great and the proximity to Disneyland was just as great. We appreciate your recommendation to our TripAdvisor readers. We cannot wait to have you back in the near future.

Summary: The front desk attendants remember our names and are very friendly. There's an Asian woman ( wish I know her name) particularly, who greets every time she sees us and offers us water for Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Teresa S.   Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us. I am thrilled to hear that our staff took care of you. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit the Anaheim resort area.

Summary: From the moment I called to make the reservation and get information, all the way until after checkout, Stacy was an excellent help! She was so sweet, and took time to answer all of my questions, as well as making sure we had everything we needed during our stay. The hotel was nice, within walking distance to Disneyland, and close to restaurants and stores. But the best part of the hotel was Stacy behind the desk. Oh, the hotel is under construction but we weren't affected by that at all. And we were able to see Disneylands fireworks from the window in our room!
Manager Response: Dear Marie012345  Thank you for your 5 star review of our hotel. We are pleased to hear you felt the services and amenities provided were up to your expectations. Thank you for recognizing the great service that Stacey provided, she will be pleased to read your comments. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel.

Summary: What a pleasant experience my family and I had staying here. The staff was A1! They were very friendly. Every day we departed, the front desk always said have fun with a smile. The housekeeping did in impeccable job! They even put all the stuffed animals on the bed from Disneyland (we had quite a few). This made our kids smile. The location was just a 10 walk to the park. We vacation at Disney every year. I would stay here again and again.
Manager Response: Dear Tyler H  Thank you for taking the time to write us a great review. We are pleased to hear that our front desk and our housekeeping staff provided you with great service. We would love to welcome you back for your next visit in Anaheim.

Summary: We had to make a last minute reservation here because the hotel we originally picked was horrible! Then we arrived here and we were so happy. The hotel was very pretty and clean, the location could not be better! Friendly staff!
Manager Response: Dear  Laura C  We are delighted that you stayed with us even though it was a last minute reservation. We hope that you stay with us from now on when visiting Anaheim/Disneyland. Thank you for your review and we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: About as Good as it Gets 2 blocks from Disney
Summary: The walk I could do in under 15 minutes, which even straight across the street takes at least 5-6 minutes, so this truely isn't bad. There is also an ART bus pickup directly outside the main doors if you really don't want to walk, but their bus drop at Disney is closest to street so is really only saving 2 blocks of walking and no time.   hotel had some construction but didn't really affect us.  Beds were good, not great, but good.  Clean, tidy, great great customer service!  Everyone was super friendly and ready to help, even gave us a few bottles of water for our long drive home.   Noise was low, however people above us were not.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff was fantastic, everyone we dealt with was friendly and helpful. The hotel was in the middle of a remodel and it was obvious we got a room that had not been remodeled yet. The beds were nice but the bathroom had issues such as the toilet would not flush unless the handle was held down and the shower curtain rod was barely attached to the wall, I thought for sure it would fall every time I touched the shower curtain. Also the wifi was very slow.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is close to Disneyland, which was about within 10 minutes walking distance. Free wifi and free parking. The staffs are super nice.  Now, the hotel does need some update. The bathroom was outdated and felt dirty, our blankets had hair on them and the walls are thin.   Overall the hotel was ok.
Manager Response: Dear 332kim408  Thank you for sharing your experience with us. We appreciate and valuable your feedback. We are renovating our property, so please visit us again to provide you with another comfortable stay in a modern up to date hotel.

Summary: Great Hotel! Very nice and clean. Employees very friendly and helpful. Pool, spa and Sana we're very clean and maintain. Parking is awesome Never tried the restaurant but heard it's very good. I recommend this hotel to anyone going to the Parks
Manager Response: Dear  Jessica K  Thank you so much for staying at our hotel on your recent trip to Anaheim. We appreciate your review your recommendation to our hotel,  we hope you stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: All personell are very nice and helpful. The building is a bit old but currently is undergoing renovation. Free parking and free wifi are excellent.  Location is good. Close to Disney Parks and many restaurants around.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked the Ramada Plaza Anaheim based mostly on location. It was ideally located near both Disney parks. Upon checking in I was assigned to a room on the second floor. When I exited the elevator on the second floor I noticed half off the rooms in the hallway were under construction. When I entered my room I was not in the least bit impressed. The room was drab & obviously hadn't seen any maintenance in awhile. After a long day of work and travel I wanted to shower before dinner, I pulled back the shower curtain to notice long hairs on the shower curtain and walls of the shower, not a big deal but still gross. The shower had a hard time keeping temperature, it was either scalding hot or freezing cold, rarely anything in between. Next I went to brush my teeth, and as I
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was OK overall and the location was good (Disneyland walkable, a mall walkable, and drug stores walkable).  However there were oddities.   On 3 out of 4 nights there, we found a hair on our pillows or sheets (must have been left by the cleaning staff).  The trash cans didn't have any sort of liner.  There was a strange hum above us some nights (4th floor) that must be from the AC units on the roof.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice facility but is under construction
Summary: Although it stated that the building is under construction it didn't tell u that the bathrooms were falling apart. Overall I liked the location and I'm sure once the construction is done the rooms will be beautiful but at this point the only negative I will give is our bathroom. Literally impossible to shower. The rod holding the shower curtain was almost about to fall off the wall and the curtain wouldn't stay closed so water got everywhere.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The best part about this hotel experience was the Amazing staff! They were the best hotel staff I have ever experienced. Not only were they friendly, but always went above and beyond including calling us by name each time they saw us and offering us bottled water each time we left the hotel. The rooms were great and always clean and the beds were super comfy! The location was perfect and centrally located between the Convention Center, Disneyland, the GardenWalk, and several restaurants to where everything was within walking distance! I would definitely recommend this hotel to everyone!
Manager Response: Dear amberhQ2844WP  Thank you so much for staying with us and taking the time to share your kind and detailed review. We are thrill to read that our staff was friendly and welcoming as always. Thank you for recommending us and we hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: This hotel is well situated for those wanting to visit Disney, being just an easy 15 minute  away. Our room was comfortable and clean. The pool and laundry were good. The staff were friendly and helpful. We did not eat at the hotel. There are lots of dining options in the vicinity.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good hotel, clean and comfortable rooms, had a little problem with the bath tub drainage in the room but the Great Staff at this hotel took care of it quick.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very close to convention and convenient to shops and amenities needed. Right on was small considering.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Short walk to the Disneyland and many different restaurants! Very kind employees. You've got all you need there. Parking structure is availible. We had to turn off the refrigerator, it was too loud for us to sleep, but that wasn't a big thing.
Manager Response: none

Summary: beside the comfort of the beds ( and yes that is truly important), this had to be one of the worse stays in a long time. Terrible wifi, non existent "business" lounge.  Front desk people who barely acknowledge you.  Construction (which I understand has to be done, if you want to upgrade your hotel) zone on the same floor as guests.  No separation between the two.  If you are going to renovate, why not close the floor, or at least the section you are working on.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff is really excellent: as I was attending a conference starting at 8 am, they use to open the swimming pool just for me at 7 am. Always helpful!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great place to stay; staff very friendly and accommodating; close to the Convention Center and Disneyland; would recommend this hotel to anyone!
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is great!!!! The staff went out of their way to take care of my daughter and myself. We felt so comfortable during our stay here and loved the amenities! The pool is superb. Rooms are so nice and beds are really comfortable.  Highly recommended hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Friendly and comfortable but some rooms have seen better years
Summary: I stayed at this hotel for one week while attending a conference.  What I liked: - room comfortable and clean; - front desk staff friendly and helpful; - location great for Convention Center, restaurants and convenience stores.  What could have been better: - room fittings and decor had seen better years; - air conditioning too noisy to leave on at night.  The hotel is currently being renovated so the negative points may well be remedied.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff was great even when a problem presented itself at check-in. Hotel in renovation mode at the present time but did not really effect the stay. Really confident to several food options and Disney Land. Roll away bed arrived to room without clean linen.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good value for money particularly if you are Rewards member and need to visit Disney or attend a conference in Anaheim.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Friendly staff, clean, generous space but noisy
Summary: The hotel is located a short walk from the Disney parks entrances and is convenient. The staff was friendly and the room was clean. However the lack of isolation transform the floor in a big open space in term of noise. We could hear our neighbors talk, having intimate moments, watching TV and of course we had the roof ventilation getting you the flight-modus sleep. Avoid top floor.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Ask questions about checking in early for a room I reserved and right away they checked if there was a room available even though it wasn't the time to check in. Other questions I've asked they gave me and answer right away, front desk was very helpful and gave me a positive vibe to talk to them about anything in the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear luisfW1046SB  Thank you for sharing your experience. I am happy to hear that our front desk staff was helpful and were able to answer all your questions. Thank you for your time and we look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: Seriously doable walk to Disneyland and restaurants, same rate as other hotel rooms that only accommodate 4 people and here we had a huge room for the six of us.  They even had a crib ready in the room.  Also, a big plus, we checked out Friday and they let us keep our car there all day while we were at CA adventures.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stay at Ramada on Katella Ave.  The personel were very nice, the room was clean. 10 mins walk to Disney shops and restaurants close. We had a good experience.
Manager Response: Dear  juanlG2367VF Thank you for a great review. I’m very happy to know you found the hotel nice and clean and you enjoyed a quick, easy walk to Disney from our hotel.  We look forward to welcoming you in the future for another great stay.

Summary: Easy check in. Nice room.Extremely comfortable bed!  I appreciate the fact that the instructions for the Heating / AC controls were very clearly labelled. ALSO.  You could make it as COLD or as HOT as you needed for sleeping and comfort. Not like so many places which cap the limits AND/OR require the Maintenance Man (Oh he Jusssst left.)  OR  We have to reprogram the computer...... Bull. That's typically the hotel being cheap IMO ;)  Now for something Positive!  The day shift led by Ozzie and crew.Stacie and Katie are some of the nicest friendliest people you could ever hope to meet. and i can honestly say that having "been around the block" more than a few times:)  this was an overnight get away.  I'll be returning here whenever i have the chance.
Manager Response: Dear Tom S  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your review of your recent stay. It was a pleasure having you as our guest. We are glad that you enjoyed our accommodations and that our staff was always attentive. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: I work in Las Vegas and after 12 years working in a hotel and casino I understand what customer service means, the staff of this Ramada plaza in Anaheim reach the highest levels!!! If you will be in that area no doubt to stay there, Alejandra, Esther and the GM Jean are the best!!! You won't regret it, plus the safety, that hotel offers you high levels of safety, the room are super clean
Manager Response: Dear  jorgerL8941DG  We appreciate you taking valuable time out of your day to share your positive experience from your recent stay. Thank you so much for your kind comments towards are team members. We appreciate you and we hope that we become your home away from home when traveling to Anaheim.

Summary: The hotel was perfect, very clean and excellent customer service! I would stay here again! We stayed for 2 night in a room with 2 beds and it was comfortable for the whole family. I am very picky about where I take my daughter .
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Added joy to our Disneyland experience
Summary: Awesome room, comfy beds, delicious Indian food in the restaurant located in the restaurant. Easy walk to Disneyland
Manager Response: none

Summary: After a long days at amusement parks, All I wanted was a nice shower and  a comfortable bed... And The Ramada did just that! The staff was very friendly, hotel was nice and clean. Parking garage was very well lit. We loved it!
Manager Response: Dear mikencookie2230  Thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza Hotel for your travels. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and all the amenities we offer here at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Thank u for all the help everytime we have problem in our room.they try to fix it or solve it.we didnt drive there but the staff help us how we get to theplace where we want to go and how to get there.thats why we enjoy our trip and were happy to be in ramada.thank you so much for everything,hope see u again in case we go back someday.

Summary: The was a great hotel within walking distance to Disneyland.  Also, there are a bunch of stores and restaurants around within proximity of the hotel.  But for me, it was the extremely friendly and helpful staff that made the stay!

Summary: We have tried several hotels around Disneyland but this one was absolutely the best so far! If there's a killer deal on HotelTonight again I will be booking

Summary: The staff were very friendly, fresh coffee in the lobby 24/7, walking distance to the Anaheim convention center and Disneyland. There is buffet breakfast for $7.99 at the restaurant in the lobby. Parking is free. The room is quite bigger than other hotels, and clean. Overall, the money we paid is all worth it!

Summary: This hotel was perfect for walking to Disneyland! There were some improvements being made, so initial parking for check in was a little confusing. Summary: Great guest services.  Hospitality was above and beyond and unexpected at the level they provided. Walking distance to park and not far but after a long day it felt like a journey, but that's because we went the whole day walking without breaks.  Parking was free and safe underground.  I would stay here again for sure, we enjoyed our visit.  They did a great job here.

Summary: There was a couple of black marks on the shower curtain. Got a floor that was being remodel could smell paint. No a/c in the hallways, it was easy to found. Only about 5 or 10 minute walk to disney. For two nights it was decent.

Summary: As always we were very please to see Stacy the clerk at the front deck. Please be careful of the alarm system its wake me up in the afternoon for no reason.

Summary Heading: Over all experience are pretty good.
Summary: Very nice and convenient, the staff are very friendly. Close to stores Chinese restaurant, 7eleven, Walgreens and CVS re just right accross the street.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a good priced hotel located very near to Disneyland. It is not exactly right outside the main gate, but a fair priced enough to make the walk worth it. The rooms are clean, dated but good sized.   The staff is friendly and very informative, which is a big plus for the information overload of searching anything about Disneyland! We paid additional for breakfast here, and it is basic. Good enough for a hungry family eager to get the day started is Disneyland!  We like this hotel too for its proximity to CVS. - Perfect for last minute purchases of sunscreens or chapsticks.  Another great thing is that Subway and some other restos are just right around the corner. - a penny pincher way to save on meals inside Disneyland.   Lastly, check out the flyers by front desk. We found
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was old style but good bed, coffee and tea making facilities and a fridge. The air conditioning is old and noisy. Also there are nearby take away fast food places which have their exhaust vents next to the hotel. The position is convenient to walk to Disneyland. The staff were very helpful and pleasant people

Summary: Hotel was nice,part of it was under construction,would stay there again.5 to 10 minute walk to Disneyland.

Summary: This hotel is located close to Disneyland. A shuttle comes out front for $5 each way. So if you want a hotel close to Disneyland to minimize driving this works. I tried to turning our frig to be colder and that caused it to not work at all. Also, the shower knob was lose and would not stay in a position causing the water to be either too hot or too cold depending on where the know rotated on its own. Or if you are more talented than I am you could choose to hold it in place as you showered. Finally, the A/C was weird as you you had to turn it up or down in TWO degree increments instead of one. Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice, clean, Internet connection is okay not great.
Summary: After spending a couple of nights at super 8 next door.  The grandparents drove in to stay with us, so I move our stay (my son and I) to step up hotel at the ramada plaza inn.  The room was a little more spacious for 4 occupants, since there was a sofa (which may pull out to a bed) along side the 2 queen beds.  I paid about 125/night total at super 8 and fifty dollars more for ramada plaza.  There is no free breakfast as at super 8 (if read my super 8 review the breakfast wasn't anything special but good enough for us) but for about 8 per hotel guest  you can get the buffet downstairs.  We didn't try it though.   My son and I had cereal small boxes and oatmeal packages which I took from the super 8 stay ;). So we would have a quick eat before going to Disneyland.  In the ramada

Summary: The smell of curry was overwhelming in the lobby, that the smell stayed in our clothes for over an hour. Summary: The staff were amazingly helpful and the room was clean and tidy. A little bit of a walk to Disneyland but there is a shuttle service that you can pay for. Surrounding restaurants were quite expensive but close to grocery stores. A good experience, would recommend to friends
Manager Response: Dear kristymarieb2016  Thank you very much for sharing your positive experience with us! Summary: We enjoyed our stay. It was a good value for the money. One small detail I loved was that they already had the sheets on the sofa bed, which was nice instead of having to make it ourselves like at other hotels. It is walking distance to Disney, but not quite the 10 minutes they tell you every time you ask. Especially with kids it did take longer. Also, note that if you are going to Down Town Disney you still have to go through the really long security line, which adds even more time. Which can be a hassle if you are rushing to a dinner reservation. Just make sure to leave with plenty of time.  But as I said the hotel was fine.

Summary Heading: Good stay, will choose ramada again
Summary: Clean hotel, close to Disney parks, and friendly staff. The hotel was being remodeled, but the stay was still comfortable. Wish there was a continental breakfast, but there are close places to eat around the hotel.

Summary: Average. The service at ramada was great! It's just that the room and hotel it's self was dirty, the laundry room needs A LOT of maintenance, and so does the sauna. The jaccuzi needs cleaning too......

Summary: The pros:  the staff here is really impressive.  Very friendly, super helpful in every way.  The hotel is obviously well managed.  The proximity to Disneyland is great.  There is a shuttle but it's only a 15 minute walk, and both options work well.  The pool is small and unremarkable but good enough to cool down on a hot day.  Beds were comfortable and the rooms felt clean.  Parking is free and convenient. Cons:  The hotel itself feels a little run down, which is probably why they are in the middle of a renovation.  It looks as though they just started...this review will be outdated in another six months.  Carpets have holes in them, there are marks all over the walls giving the long, dark hallways a dingy feel. The windows look as though they were insulated for noise at some
Manager Response: Dear paris4awhile   Thank you for taking your time to write us such a nice, detailed and honest review! We invite you to visit us when it's all set and done to experience an amazing stay with us, again thank you for choosing us and we hope to welcome you back in the near future!

Summary: I've stayed in the hotel quite a few times, and it usually is my go-to place to stay whenever I visit Disneyland! It's about a 7 minute walk to Disneyland and if you have kids and are too tired to walk back there is a shuttle that picks/drops you off in front through ART. The prices are very reasonable and I love the fact that they do not charge for parking and have free Wi-Fi. I love the size of their rooms it is perfect for my family of 6 with 2 queen beds and a pull-out couch! Whenever I ask for extra towels or blankets or pillows they are quick to come and deliver the items! Staff is very nice! And they have so much parking it doesn't make it hard to get in and out of their property! A huge plus to this property is the fact that they have a refrigerator and microwave already
Manager Response: Dear  isacruz78  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We love to hear that you found our staff to be friendly and the proximity to the parks to be ideal when visiting Disneyland. We truly appreciate your loyalty to our hotel and we will be delighted to welcome you back in October.

Summary: The lobby is nice, room quite comfortable and spacious, just got outstanding service from Stacey.  *She* did a 5 star job!  This location is very fortunate to have her.  She just made our stay fabulous, and treated us like total VIPs.  What an angel!  As a bonus, had a really delicious vegetable curry in the rather sleepy restaurant after a day at Disneyland.  Sauna didn't heat up though.  All in all an outstanding stay made special by an employee worth her weight in gold.
Manager Response: Dear 79lauren  Thank you for sharing your positive comments about your stay with us on TripAdvisor. Your kind words and positive feedback assure us that we are delivering the exceptional service that we aim to provide to are guests. And we are glad to hear that Stacey made your stay fabulous. she is one of our great members of our team as she always goes the extra mile for our guest. We truly look forward to welcoming you for another magical experience!

Summary: After reading several reviews on this hotel, I was worried about the condition of the rooms and the construction noise. However, our 2 rooms were both very clean and very comfortable. We saw some evidence of construction but never heard anything (of course we were only in the room at night as we spent most of our time at Disneyland).  The staff was very friendly, professional and helpful. We couldn't have asked for a better Disney Good Neighbor hotel! My only complaint was that the shuttle bus was full in the mornings and sometimes didn't show up for over 40 minutes. But, it was very reliable at night when we needed it most. I recommend walking to Disneyland in the morning and using the shuttle to get back to the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear  Jill B  Thank you for taking valuable time out of your day to share your candid feedback with us. We are pleased to read that you enjoyed our close proximity to the Disney parks and the friendly staff. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Convenient location to theme parks and restaurants. The room was clean with good walking space for a family of five. There was enough basic amenities provided. But continental breakfast was not included. The hotel staff were courteous and helpful.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed for 5 nights at this hotel. The room was very clean and the front desk staff always greeted us and were extremely  helpful with directions. Every employee we ran into was so nice. The restaurant has a nice breakfast buffet that is very reasonably priced. There is also a little strip mall next door that has a bunch of restaurants and a cool little souvenir shop. Plus, there is also a CVS close by as well. About a 10 minute walk to the Convention Center and Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Short stay at Ramada Plaza, Anaheim
Summary: My family and I were in Anaheim for just one day. The hotel was cozy, the staff was helpful. Decent place for a short stay. Not the most luxurious hotel, but comfortable and comes at a decent price.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I travel quite a lot and this hotel provided me with some of the best customer service I have ever experienced. I definitely will be staying here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: My daughter and I stayed here for 2 nights while attending VidCon and taking in all things Disney. On the plus side, our early check-in request was honored and our room was ready when we got there at 11am. We made the same request last year at the Marriott and they could not accommodate us. Room was clean, beds comfy (though the pillows were a little stiff for my taste). Though we didn't make too much use of them, we had a microwave and fridge. I can see how that could come in handy had we stayed longer or had the whole family with us. Did have a rowdy neighbor next door - loud talking, laughing, etc. when we arrived back from a full day at the theme parks at 11:30pm. But a phone call down to the front desk quieted them down without too much hassle. I think the biggest culprit
Manager Response: Dear 37anney  Thank you for choosing to stay with us on your most recent trip to the VidCon. We are delighted that you enjoyed our location and our amenities. As far as our wifi connectivity, we are in the process of installing more routers and improving our connectivity. Please feel free to contact me personally should you return to the Anaheim area as it would be my pleasure to assist you with any requests you may have. Once again, thank you for staying with us.

Summary Heading: We loved everything about this hotel!
Summary: Great location. Awesome staff!  Clean and spacious rooms. Comfortable bed. Fridge, microwave, coffee maker, safe, and the front desk will give you complimentary water.  The restaurant in the lobby was good and very affordable.  Free parking was a plus!  The WIFI wasn't great, but it was free.
Manager Response: Dear Danielle M  Thank you so much for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. I am delighted you enjoyed your stay and all the amenities we offer here at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary Heading: We got the last 2 rooms during vidcon
Summary: What a relief to come to this hotel, we were staying in a "suite" a few doors down that was definetly not a suite.  It was a room with a bed in a closet. Everyone was super nice and they held the last few rooms for us for an hour so we could sort out or other hotel issue.  I specifically want to give Stacey a shout out for her excellent service and friendly demeanor.  The only reason I did not give Ramada a 5 star rating was the location of our room on the 4th floor has an airconditioning unit outside on the roof that was so loud, I wore ear plugs at night.
Manager Response: Dear Pamela M  Thank you for taking your time to write us a review! We are glad you have had a great time at the Ramada Plaza Hotel. Summary: The location was perfect.  All we had to do was park the car underground and we could walk to any restaurant.  The staff was extremely nice and helpful.  The room was clean and nice.  It was worth the stay.
Manager Response: Dear 2crystalp  We appreciate such a positive review! We are thrilled to find out you have enjoyed your stay with us. As you mention, our location is ideal for guest that are visiting the parks and we hope keep us in mind when visiting Anaheim resort in the future. We hope to welcome you back soon. Kind regards !

Summary: We spent the night before going to Disneyland the next morning. Staff was friendly and helpful and the hotel let us keep our car in the parking lot all day after we checked out. Anaheim ART Shuttle stopped out front of Ramada and took us to the park for a small fee.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was nicer than the Travelodge we stayed at in Anaheim, but with the higher price of the room we did not get breakfast included, the beds were smaller, there was no freezer in the fridge, no fan in the bathroom, and the pool was practically in the parking lot.  All that aside, the underground parking was nice, the room was clean, and the blankets were comfy.  It was also nice to have an ice machine on our floor.  They also accommodated us when we requested a later check out time.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Quick walk to Disneyland.  Helpfull staff.

Summary Heading: Great hotel for weekend trip to Disney!
Summary: My husband and I are Wyndham rewards members who are also AP holders so we frequent Anaheim several times a year.   In this case we found a great deal on Hotel Tonight for $99/night and couldn't pass it up. It was our first stay at this hotel and we enjoyed it greatly. We checked in around 1am and the kind lady was very cheerful and efficient.  Our room was quiet upon arrival and only started to hear noise outside and above once it turned 6:30am , the usual for a Disney area hotel from people and families so it doesn't bother us.  Parking is free which an be hard to find in Anaheim too! Our room had 2 queen beds and was very spacious even with a mini fridge and microwave. The flat screen tv had a good selection of channels and the bathroom was also good size. The parking garage

Summary Heading: Good location; medium walk to the Disneyland Resort
Summary: I was pleased with the proximity to the Disneyland Resort.  There is a shuttle that travels to the Disney Parks and it has a stop right in front of the Ramada Plaza. However, I opted to walk because it was a manageable distance and I didn't want to take the chance of waiting for the shuttle, only to find it was too full and I'd have to wait another half hour or so for the next one.  The parking during your visit to the Ramada is in the garage below the hotel and is free self parking.  I was comfortable leaving my vehicle in the hotel garage while at Disney for the day which saved the additional cost that would have been incurred by parking at Disney's lots.

Summary: We were upgraded to a bigger room immediately, they have underground locked-gate parking, cleaning was very well done. Staff were all very pleasant and friendly and helpful. We even got a coupon for a nearby restaurant! No complaints here!

Summary Heading: The staff make it all worth it...
Summary: Every tourist knows that Americans can be a bit over the top when it comes to engaging and being friendly. I don't mind. The staff at this Hotel showed that they appreciate their workplace. Summary: In all ways this is an excellent hotel. The housekeeping staff went out of their way to be certain the room was well kept and comfortable. I must say the housekeeping was among the best I have experienced anywhere. I reaffirm all the positives written by other reviewers about this property and look forward to returning in the future.

Our only issue was the noise of the air conditioning unit and where it was placed it blew the cool air up behind the curtains and not out to the room, so in the night we got quite hot. It also did not seem to have a very good thermostat so it kept going. This is not the only hotel we stayed in where the air

Summary: The front desk staff could not have been more pleasant and helpful. Our room was clean and spacious and just a short walk to the Disnayland entrance. We would not hesitate to stay here if returning to Anaheim.

Summary: I love how the front desk were kind and remembered us as we went to and from the hotel.  the water bottles were a plus! thank you for the stay.  I would suggest this hotel to tohwr travelers.   the walk to DIsnyland was easy too!

Summary: Checked out day early because of water interruption scheduled due to maintenance. Exercise equipment not working. Not notified upon check in that rooms are being remodeled in the 3rd floor where we were booked for 4 nights.

Summary: No water for most of the days we were staying...and when they did get the water running we had no hot water. Rooms were clean and it is a good location, easy walk to Disneyland ,but I will never be back.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Nice place. Will choose it again.
Summary: Nice rooms, staff was friendly . Rooms were clean.  We stayed at the red lion the night before, this place was nicer and cleaner.  We used the hot tub and it was awesome after a long two days at Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear mbanales   It was a pleasure having you as our guest. We are glad that you enjoyed our accommodations and that our staff was always attentive.  We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Anaheim/Disneyland trip.

Summary Heading: The Ramada was like a mirage
Summary: So I want to start my review by saying everything on the whole was perfect, but why was my experience terrible, you might ask? Well, after checking out we were fraudulently charged $400 from the hotel.   The Stay:  The stay was excellent, the maid service was superior to any other place I have ever stayed before. They cleaned and made the beds and even cleared out some trash that we had no other place for. They always offered us plenty of towels and soap/shampoo. When I checked out our bill was the agreed price, plus a breakfast bill from the restaurant which was all correct. I commended them on their amazing service and ease of the overall experience.   Post Stay: After checking out (2.5 hours to be precise) we attempted to use our card at Disneyland and it was rejected. We
Manager Response: none

Summary: Ozzy, Andy and all the front desk were very kind and helpful. Comfy beds, rooms are so clean they sparkle.
Manager Response: Dear Cande2015  I want to thank you for taking the time to share your comments from your recent stay. I'm glad you enjoyed our services and our rooms. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: This hotel is very close to Disneyland and Anaheim Convention Center.  Staff was top notch, friendly and efficient.  Bathroom was large but lacked counter surfaces, so that was a draw back.
Manager Response: Dear bethrW7018MS  Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your wonderful comments with our fellow TripAdvisor travelers. We hope you recommend us to your friends and family.  Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The hotel was in a great location for local attractions. The beds were very comfortable and the staff were very friendly. The walls are a bit thin however. Hearing children screaming next door at 6:00 am wasn't great.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff is very friendly and accommodating.  The hallways are clean and so re the rooms. There are no unpleasant smells which is a big deal for me!  Parking is underground through a gate which is nice and secure.
Manager Response: Dear Margarita M  We appreciate you taking valuable time out of your day to share your positive experience from your recent stay. Should your travels bring you back to Anaheim, it would be our pleasure to host you again.

Summary: I've been staying at this hotel for many years now and I've never been disappointed. The staff is very friendly and helpful. The hotel is in a good location and is within walking distance to Disneyland and several good restaurants plus there is an ART Shuttle stop out front (Route 6). The rooms are nice, clean and comfortable and I always sleep well. This hotel Is my home away from home. I can't wait for my next visit!
Manager Response: Hello Leslie R.   We are always happy to see you when you visit us. We want to thank you for being a loyal guest to our hotel all these years. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: The hotel feels clean and fairly well maintained. There was some internal construction work going on during our stay but it didn't bother us too much, just not very attractive. At least they're putting in the effort to make any necessary improvements.   The beds were comfortable and the bedding was very nice and plush. There were obvious signs of wear on some of the bedding that should probably be replaced but it didn't affect the comfort.   The room itself was very large. We had a family room with 2 queen beds and a sofa bed. Even with the sofa bed pulled out there was a LOT of room to walk around.  The noise was sometimes an issue. I did not hear much of anything from neighboring rooms but the room above us was extremely noisy. We may have just been unlucky with that, though.
Manager Response: Dear nicaliw  First and for most, thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a detail review about your stay. I'm sorry to hear you noisy guest upstairs, we would of definitely asked them to bring the noise level down or we would of moved you to a quieter room. We are doing renovations to our hotel and we can't wait you our guest to see the new property when it's all done. Again, thank you for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Not too satisfied with the room
Summary: Good costumer service, but rooms need upgrades (e.g. bathroom exhaust fan needs to be added). Our bathroom had no fan. When we took showers, moisture formed and it was annoying. It made the bathroom and the rest of the room smell bad and musty (humid).
Manager Response: none

Summary: Grea customer service, 15 minute walk from entrance to Disneyland. CVS n food options with in five minute walk. Room was nice n clean. Room with two beds n sofa perfect for larger family group. Small fridge n microwave a big plus.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel within walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Hotel staff are friendly, helpful and accommodating.  Easy walk to Disneyland even for a 6 year old.  Room was spacious and clean.  Would recommend this hotel for anyone looking for a family hotel close to the park.
Manager Response: Dear Andrea B  Thank you so much for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: Our favorite place to stay in Anaheim
Summary: My wife and i spent three nights here and already the hotel has become our favorite place to stay.  We were here three months ago and enjoyed it so much that we chose to return. The rooms were clean and comfortable, and there was plenty of parking in the basement garage.The staff  was friendly and professional and went out of its way to help us with maps, information, etc. If you like Indian food, you're in luck as the restaurant attached to the hotel is an authentic l Indian Restaurant where we enjoyed our first meal on the day we arrived. Thoroughly recommend this hotel for its location, attentive staff and much more.  Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Ernesto P  Thank you so much for choosing us for your travels. We take pride on our customer service and we are happy to see that it shows. It would be very much appreciated if you do recommend us with your friends and family. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: The hotel was located within walking distance to Disneyland, the room was awesome, service was great, the only problem we had was the wifi internet was very weak. The price was very reasonable, and the parking was free.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Have spent over 50 years travelling and staying at hundreds of accommodation places and this Ramada would rank as one of my favorites . The staff , from Alex initially welcoming us in with a warm , friendly and effortless check in thru to Stacey who followed thru with a similar friendly checkout 5 days later could not complimented enough .  Our room was clean ,  comfortable and adequately supplied with extra pillows , plenty of towels , toiletries and coffee making utilities . Adequate basement parking , several computers  and free coffee available in the lobby with plenty of tables ,chairs and sofas . Even when we put the do not disturb sign on our door when leaving for the day , they followed up with a message saying they were sorry that they could not clean our room and if we
Manager Response: none

Summary: To start when we first made the reservation we made it for a king size bed but when we got to our room it was two queen size and there was no warning ahead of time that they changed the room. Second when we made the reservations website said free breakfast but when we arrived the breakfast wasn't free again no warning that it changed. Finally the room was just bad no outlets worked the toilet never flushed properly and the shower head was too short for me. Worst hotel ever
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel needs some refreshing, but for the price and convenient location, it was fine. Front staff were wonderful, very friendly and helpful. We arrived at noon and they gave us our room early so we could sleep, given we had been up since 4 am. We were pleasantly surprised that there was no charge for parking.
Manager Response: Dear 857kathleenp  Thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza Hotel for your travels. We are happy to hear that your our staff was helpful and friendly as always. Parking and Wi-Fi is always complementary for our guest. Once again, thank you for staying with us and for commenting on Tripadvisor.

Summary: Neat and clean. Walking distance to both convention Anaheim and Disneyland. Free parking is a plus!  Cons, a little old however clean and comfy overall! The buffet next lobby looks very nice. I didn't get chance to try due to busy convention. Should try next time!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great stay. Wheelchair access excellent in standard double queen room. In room amenities rival large expensive hotels. Quiet. Desk personnel are friendly and helpful. Will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear GenevieveMc  Thank you for your review. I'm glad you enjoyed our services and our rooms. Thank you for staying with us, we look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: You can also buy your Disney tickets at the front desk.  About 7 minutes away from Disney. Staff was helpful and very informative.  Unfortunately, the Jacuzzi was out of order and breakfast is extra. Will stay again!
Manager Response: Dear daveaT6600JH  Thank you for staying at Ramada Plaza Hotel. I appreciate the positive comments about the staff. We hope you stay with us again soon and get to enjoy our Jacuzzi.

Summary: Room was mediocre. AC was loud. Nice that parking was on site. Workers were doing very loud construction on the next door room at 8AM, with no warning to us. Then, we were charged $250 after we checked out, without any warning or notification, for smoking in the room, despite not smoking in the room at all. How nice!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Hotel for a trip to Anaheim
Summary: This is a great value and service hotel . Very friendly and great attitude We will stay here again
Manager Response: Dear William A  Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your wonderful comments with fellow TripAdvisor travelers.  We hope to see you again real soon. Kind regards!

Summary: The AC made load noises. The furniture was old and very worn. Chips in the table and desk. The bath tub facuet you had to pull tightly or it leaked.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was a good walking distance from Disneyland. The first impression walking into the hotel we were greeted by the friendly staff. The room was clean and had a microwave and a fridge. I stayed for the Tinkerbell Half Marathon weekend and I will stay again! There are many good places to eat near the hotel! The staff was AMAZING!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We Absolutely loved our stay here! The staff was incredibly friendly and helpful, everything was spectacularly clean, and I LOVED how close we were to Disneyland park- right across the street! The staff helped us find other activities nearby to enjoy, and our rooms were incredibly comfortable. The building was quiet, too- and we slept wonderful. I definitely recommend this hotel!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great place I loved the hospitality. Plus the free coupon to a restaurant helped as I was headed to that exact place to eat
Manager Response: Dear  32jacb  We would like to thank you for your review from your recent stay. We appreciate the feedback and look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary: Short walk to Disneyland, great area. Had pizza delivered to room. Clean rooms and prompt when I asked for more towels. I will definitely be staying here again. Great for families. Didn't get to try restaurant.
Manager Response: Dear 241happymom  We would like to thank you for staying with us recently. We appreciate the feedback and it was nice to hear you will be staying with us again.

Summary: The room was average. The refrigerator did not keep anything cold even after reporting the issue to the front desk. The bed was very soft, not to my liking. Every time the a/c came on,it was very loud and woke you up. The ceiling was patched in several places like they had a water leak from the room above. Very mismatched.
Manager Response: DearRobert V   We would like to thank you for your review from your recent stay. We appreciate both the positive and not so positive feedback as it gives us room for improvement. We appreciate you taking the time to write your review and hope you give us another chance in the near future.

Summary: Fantastic group of employees. Clean, quiet, and friendly. Close to convenience store, eateries, and Disneyland. Desk was extremely helpful and always treated us like special guests. Comfy beds, great pillows, big towels, I'll stay there again. Pool is small, heated, plenty of towels and I enjoyed the swim.  We Ate out so can't comment on the food.
Manager Response: Dear  E8163VDjosephl  We would like to thank you for taking the time to write your review from your recent stay with us. We appreciate the great feedback and hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.

Summary Heading: Amazing lobby... Not so nice rooms
Summary: The hotel has obviously put a great deal of time into the lobby area; beautiful chandelier and flooring. The customer service is exceptional with the staff all remembering my family and me even after only one encounter. They were thoughtful and accommodating. I was disappointed in the room especially from judging the lobby. The floors in the room were dirty and had horrible patch work done. There were black sticky spots and I regretted not packing socks.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Service was great!!!  I would highly recommend this Hotel to Everyone.  Great place to stay.  Very Friendly Staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff was very friendly and helpful. I liked that they called the room after I checked in to see that everything was ok.  I did have a problem with the room next to mine. They were drinking and playing music and I had trouble sleeping. They were not overbearingly loud, but the walls were so thin you could hear everything.  The housekeeping staff did a good job each day, but on one of the days the chain fell off the toilet so it would not flush.
Manager Response: none

Summary: It was a great stay. The hotel was going through renovations and my friend I happen to get stuck on the floor they were doing it on. Other than that I have nothing horrible to say. The staff were very friendly and funny; down to earth. The hotel was just a hop, jump and skip away from the Anaheim Garden Walk. The pool and jacuzzi were awesome. If you're looking for a nice hotel at a good rate while still being able to walk around town near the Disney parks this is the one.
Manager Response: Dear xcruor  Thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza Hotel for your travels. We are delighted to read that you enjoyed our proximity to the Garden Walk, our Jacuzzi and our friendly staff. It was our pleasure having you as our guest and we hope to have you back in the near future.

Summary: We bought the room on Hotwire but didn't realize we would be staying in a room that wasn't remodeled. Construction and dirt in the hallway and adjacent rooms. Water took a long time to get hot.  King bed was very short and the pillows were AWFUL!! Definitely the worst I've stay at in awhile.   On a positive note, front desk staff were very pleasant and helpful!! If you are going to stay here, be sure to wait until it is fully changed to a Wyndam hotel. Hopefully, it will be better!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: So clean ! I walked in and could smell the cleanliness of...
Summary: So clean ! I walked in and could smell the cleanliness of the room. Excellent customer service !! Def will use them the next time I stay there!!
Manager Response: Dear 6alyshar  We are thrill to hear that you enjoyed your stay and was able to tell that our housekeeping staff does a great job keeping our rooms clean. We cant wait for you to visit us again. Thank you for your comments.

Summary: Room was nice but 2 out of the three nights it was incredibly noisy. One night couple fighting next door and next a family was arguing. Walls must have been paper thin
Manager Response: none

Summary: First....very nice staff. It's always refreshing having smiles greet you at check in.   The hotel is in a great location if you plan to go to Disney. The shuttle is $5/adult per day and runs every 15 minutes. The walk is about 10 minutes.   Rooms. Average. Our carpet was actually damp (based on reading all of these reviews I think they cleaned them recently). Bathroom is outdated as is entire hotel. This translates into a broken shower head and grungy toilet seat, carpet in hallways is dirty, elevator smells funky, etc. The A/C is horrible. They need to replace all of them (read the reviews)!!!! I would advise you NOT to stay here during the summer. You'll roast.   With all of the choices close to Disney, we'll likely stay somewhere else next year for our annual trip.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great Location, Great Price, Good Hotel
Summary: The location and price of this hotel were great. A king room cost us right around $100 and I could look out the window and see the sun setting behind California Adventure's Tower of Terror. The staff was friendly, the parking was easy, and the property was well-kept. The only negatives to our stay was the bed was a little more mushy than we prefer, the wireless is a little slow, and there are no complimentary breakfast options. But overall, a great location and a great value.
Manager Response: Dear Soren B   Thank you for taking the time to post your comments regarding your recent stay with us. I'm glad to hear you enjoyed the wonderful view of California Adventure from your room. Although breakfast is not included, the all you can eat breakfast is at a discounted price for our guest. We will continue to provide great service and great value to our guest in hopes  stay with us again and again in the near future. Once Again, thank you for review.

Summary: Although employees were extremely friendly,  especially Alex, who made me feel at home, I will probably not stsy there again because there was no hot water I could not take a shower because the water was too cold
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff was very friendly and had no problem checking in very late. Free in room wifi. The property was a bit outdated in decor but didn't notice anything in disrepair. Rooms were clean, again dated & a bit worn but fine. Carpet in the room was the worst part of it, it was filthy. I just kept sandles on and we spent most of our time at Disneyland so who cares. Was a 10 minute walk to the park. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Close to Disneyland and on the Anaheim Shuttle route. The room was nice, quiet, and the beds were comfy. We liked that the parking was underground and right off the elevator. It made unloading and loading the car much simpler. Within walking distance to restaurants and 7-11.
Manager Response: Dear shangust   We truly appreciate you taking the time to post your comments on Tripadvisor. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay. We will certainly be sharing this with the staff, and hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Internet is pretty much nonexistent but...
Summary: Everything else was good. Relatively close to park about 10 min walk. Next door to tons of restaurants open after park closes. Beds were comfortable. Room comfortably slept 6 people. Underground secured parking garage was nice too.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff was very friendly, efficient and responsive. Nice location and able to see Disneyland fireworks from our room. Had to pay for breakfast that I would consider mediocre even if free. Cold eggs and pancakes, thin bacon, and sparce offerings. Infrastructure could use updating--rug is worn, refrigerator barely cools, iron spit out water and didn't remove wrinkles and ironing board wouldn't stay up. Staff replaced iron and ironing board right away. Bed was nice and comfy, good location, and staff was outstanding.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stay was wonderful for the most part... only 2 down sides of the stay- 1 being the plumbing and drainage of the shower... and second the A/C in our room quit working... but it was nice enough that the window did open and we had a cool breeze come through our room. I would stay here again on our next trip to Anaheim. The staff there were all very friendly. Rooms were quiet and clean- no complaints there... Bed was amazingly comfortable..
Manager Response: Dear SillaM623 Thank you for choosing to stay at Ramada Plaza hotel. We are thankful for your review. I hope we were able to fix the A/C if not a least offer to move you to a different room. We look forward to having you back in the future.

Summary: Stayed here for two nights in April 2016 with my son for a trip to Disneyland.  The pros: - An easy 10-minute walk to Disneyland - Front desk and housekeeping staff are very friendly and helpful - Room was spacious and clean - They have discount tickets to Disneyland (same prices as the So Cal resident discount) for sale at the front desk - You can get room service from the nice American restaurant, Chambers, at the hotel next door - There's an IHOP across the street  Cons: - They have a pool, but it's kind of depressing. It overlooks the parking lot, the gates are rusty, and there was not attempt to landscape it to make it at all inviting. - The on-site restaurant is an Indian restaurant, which wasn't very appealing to my 9-year-old son. The atmosphere in the restaurant is a
Manager Response: Dear riotbrrd  Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are sorry to hear you were not completely satisfied during your recent stay. We will continue to improve to provide the best service possible to our guest. We are currently upgrading our property and will improve in all the areas that you mention. We hope you give us another chance in the near future.

Summary: Stay here in April for Disneyland... half mile walk to front gates. Surrounded by quick foods or fine dining. CVS across the street. The hotel is very nice. One complaint are the pillows are cheap cotton filled no bend or adjustable you them. For 94 Bucks great stay
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was very outdated especially the restroom. We had issues with the AC not making it cool. The walls seem very thin because I could hear every sound coming from the rooms next door and the hallway very clearly.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed to go to Disneyland. Compared to other places this was just ok. No breakfast and the wi-fi went down. The carpets in the hallway are very dingy giving an unclean feel before getting the to room. The bed was very comfortable and the room was cleaned nicely everyday for our 3 day stay. Would I stay there again? Not unless the price was under $80 a night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel in in a great local for Disney, Downtown Disney and the Convention Center. There are many local eateries close by as well.   The beds sleep wonderful! I travel a good deal and these are some of the better beds. Everything was clean. Housekeeping was a little bit of a hassle. They wanted to clean super early before we were even up and out for the day. It came off a little pushy.  The breakfast that is included is horrible. It is in the Indian restaurant inside the hotel. The food was not cooked through and of very low quality. Walk to IHOP! (its close also)  The front desk staff were wonderful. They greeted you coming and going, every time. They were helpful in directions and they really pushed for my early checkin, 6 hours ahead of schedule. I even wanted to extend my
Manager Response: none

Summary: Facility was clean, staff was very friendly and helpful, located close to Disneyland...about a 15-20 minute walk.  The only downside was the restaurant staff had a little blip the first morning so there was no breakfast the first morning but there is a 24 hour Subway next door so we ate there.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a great place to stay.  The staff is very friendly, rooms are nice and you are a 15 minute walk from Disneyland.  It would be nice if the breakfast was complimentary; however, there is a microwave and fridge in the room if you plan ahead.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Everything was fantastic. Friendly employees. Clean and comfortable room    Great rate. What else can I say. Excellent. Great location. Can't say more. Two hundred characters is hard when everything is great
Manager Response: Dear Gloria F  I am delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and I thank you for your kind comments. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: My mother and I stayed for four nights and found the price perfect for our minimalist budget.  Stacey B working at the front desk was very delightful and always greeted us with a sincere, warm smile.  Great customer service from all the front desk girls.  The rooms were clean and the location's very close to Disneyland, a drug store and some great restaurants.  I would stay at this Ramada for any future return trips!
Manager Response: none

Summary: When booking online, the only room available was a double queen. The toilet didn't flush unless you held down the handle, the room faced the parking area which was very noisy with trash trucks coming and going.The window was extremely hard to open.The drain in the tub /shower was slow and the drain plug was off.  The door slammed shut when closing. The following day, I asked for a room change, however there were none available.Staff was friendly and courteous, however, could do nothing to accommodate us.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The staff was great. They greated you everytime you appear...
Summary: The staff was great. They greated you everytime you appear in the lobby. The room and bathroom were very clean. Whenever I go back I would stay here again
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel is very average.  Service I felt was poor.  I was never asked if I was a Wyndham Rewards member.  Toilet over flowed multiple times.
Manager Response: Dear T4110HDmichaelm Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. Your feedback is greatly appreciated and will help us continue to improve. We really hope you give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future.
