Summary: The staff is really amazing, very courteous and helpful. The housekeeping staff does an amazing job keeping the place very clean. Room is big. Location is awesome, walking distance to Disney and some amazing restaurant just outside the hotel
Manager Response: Dear 308lornag Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us. We are so glad to hear you appreciated our location and exceptional service. We will make sure to share your comments with our staff. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary Heading: Walking distance to Disney main gate
Summary: The staff was extremely friendly and helpful.  We loved not having to park at Disneyland but could walk from our hotel.  The rooms were not as clean as I would have liked.  They needed a good deep cleaning.  But having a fridge and microwave in our room was a plus, especially for a quick breakfast before getting to the park.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great hotel within 1 block of Disneyland!
Summary: Very very friendly and helpful staff.  High quality rooms.  Walking convenience to Disneyland.  Highly recommended for families going to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear christina912  Thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza Hotel for your travels. We are happy to hear that your stay was our staff was great. Thank you for recommending us. Hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Our usual place had no vacancies but I had a Wyndham rewards to redeem so thought I'd give this place a try. It was a closer walk than we were expecting, yeah! The staff at the front desk were all friendly and helpful. The waters offered were an unexpected and very welcoming treat after a long drive down. The beds were unbelievably comfortable. I fell asleep almost as soon as I laid down and didn't wake again until my alarm went off. We will definitely be staying here again!!!
Manager Response: Dear Jamesfamily129  We will like to thank you for trying us on your recent visit to Anaheim. Our location is ideal with just a ten minute walk. I'm glad to know that you enjoyed our beds and that you will be staying with us in the future. We hope that we become your home away from home for your future visits.

Summary: We are regular Disney visitors.  We have stayed at the Indigo a number of times, Fairfield by Marriott as well as a number of others.  The dates we tried to secure were not available for my wives birthday at our usual places, so we tried The Ramada.  We were pleasantly surprised.  The staff were exceptional.  They all went out of their way to make sure our every need was met.  I believe the hotel has recently been updated.  The room was spacious and very well kept.  We skipped a day of housekeeping over our 4 days so housekeeping made sure we had double and personally checked on us.  It felt more like a boutique hotel than a large chain.  We will certainly use this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear  DCH50   It was a pleasure having you as our guest. We are glad that you enjoyed our accommodations and that our staff was always attentive. We are actually in the process of renovating our property, so next time you stay with us, you will be pleasantly surprise. Once again, thank you for staying with us and for review in us on Tripadvisor.

Summary Heading: very close to Disneyland and clean room
Summary: had a very clean room and bathroom, 10-15 minutes to Disneyland.. Hotel management let us leave our car in the parking garage till midnight even though we checked out in the morning. I'd stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Decent location. Definitely needs remodeling which I believe they are doing now. Service was above average.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The customer service was amazing! Everyone was very welcoming! Loved the free covered parking! Only thing the rooms needed a little TLC. But they were clean!!!
Manager Response: Dear Arturo R We really appreciate you taking the time to let us know about you stay. We hope to be your first choice for accommodations when planning your next Anaheim/Disneyland trip.

Summary: Hotel was very nice and clean.  Staff was friendly.  It was very close to Disneyland. There were plenty of towels!!  Will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was a comfortable hotel that would recommend to friends and family. Staff were friendly and happy to help with any questions and give reccomendations.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I got a great price for a weeked, and the room was great. One small issue with a spider though. Check in was less that 5 mins. Parking is easy, and underground. The staff was very friendly and nice in all hours of the day. We come to this area 5-6 times a year,  and these folks were among the most pleasant to deal with.
Manager Response: Dear Roy O  Thank you for visiting with us and for sharing your kind comments regarding your stay and our friendly staff. We take pride in making sure our guest feel at home and your review re insures us that we are doing our job right. We hope that we become your home away from home for your future visits to Anaheim.

Summary: Everybody was friendly and nice at this hotel! Clean rooms and close to Disney. I will stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and providing your valuable feedback. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Great place to stay!  Clean and comfortable. Water offered when I came back every night. Staff had great suggestion on restaurants and activities.  Try the little Mexican place around the corner for quick lunch or dinner. Also great breakfast burritos. The place is Sabrosada. It us in a mini strip mall next to the hotel. The hotel is safe and very clean. Staff very welcoming.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I was very satisfied the employees at the counter were very friendly and welcoming. Every time we left and came back we were acknowledged. Rooms were comfotable  and I will return  soon.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I just needed to get some sleep.
Summary: I arrived at the Ramada Plaza for a Convention center conference. When I got there at noon they told me check in time was 3pm and no room ready. They stored my bags. I was skeptical about the stay and was tempted to see is there was a vacancy at the Marriott across the street.  I had to get up at 3 am eastern time to make my flight. By the time I got back to Ramada at 8pm pacific time I was beat. A 20 hour day with time zone changes will do that. I got to my room and within minutes realized that there was and family group of 4 adults in the adjoining room (doorway between the two). They were talking and laughing. Nothing outrageous,  but I need sleep now! I went down and asked if I could have a room change because the family was fine, but I'm beat. They moved me without question
Manager Response: none

Summary: This was hands down the WORST stay i have ever experienced in my life. I stay in hotels two days a week and have done so for 22 years , this is one place I will warn everyone about. Not only did they state when I booked my room there would be a FREE continental breakfast with my stay but they charged me and my family $50 for a joke of selection. The dishes were filthy and food cold .  Our room was made to look as if they had cleaned it .. however that was not the case . I will not waste anymore of my time even writing about this HORRIBLE hotel .
Manager Response: none

Summary: First of all I wanted to single out Front Desk Employee Esther on going above and beyond during my stay at the property this past Easter Weekend.  Another guest had inadvertently let in a non-guest into the Pool area and Esther did a fine job of removing the Unauthorized guest.  By the way, it was an outdoor heated pool located on a second floor roof top.  The location of the property was walking distance to Disney Parks, In house restaurant fine Indian cuisine, I enjoyed the Tika Massala and the tandoori chicken at the restaurant.  As a guest, travelling with children, I appreciated onsite guest self laundry.  I felt that the stay was a tremendous value.
Manager Response: Dear Ramon E C  Thank you very much for sharing your positive experience with us! We will share your comments with Esther. Now that you had a great experience with us, we only hope you come back to visit us when you travel back to Anaheim.

Summary: I booked this hotel for my 8 year old and I. It was difficult to tell just how close it was to the park from the map on Expedia. Turns out it's down the street and over a block. Took about 12 minutes to walk. Not bad. Only one corner where the bus stop is was a little sketchy, the rest was safe. It's the closest hotel you'll get for the price. So I was happy to save some dollars and still stay somewhere nice and nearby! Front desk was really nice and accommodating. Quiet hotel. Comfy beds. Next time I may pay a little more to be closer, as we had to walk back to our hotel twice and we already walk so much inside Disneyland that that 12 minute walk adds up!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean but could use couple upgrades
Summary: Overall the staff and cleaness was pretty good.   Only thing would be there bathroom had no vent inside which made it kinda hard to get ready because the steam would stay inside the bathroom and take a while for it to go away with the bathroom door open. The room would get a little stuffy if AC was not on the entire time.  We also took my daughters milk and yogurts since we were staying for a couple days. We placed in the little fridge that was there but then realized it wasn't on (would've been nice if it was turned on before hand) Well after more than few hours our water wasn't cooling down so before stepping out I asked the staff to check our fridge (again we had the milk and yogurt for my daughter I didn't want going bad) When I returned the front desk advised they checked
Manager Response: none

Summary: My wife and I stayed for seven nights in late March in a 4th floor room facing disney.  We could see the Tower of Terror from our room.  The people at the front desk were very helpful and the cleaning staff was excellent.  The bed was perfect.  The bathroom was adequate.  The shower head seemed lower than normal; but great water pressure and plenty of hot water.
Manager Response: Dear Henry H  We appreciate you taking valuable time out of your day to share your positive experience from your recent stay. Should your travels bring you back to Anaheim, it would be our pleasure to host you again.

Summary Heading: Easy walking distance to Convention Center
Summary: Have stayed here past three years for a convention and it is very convenient. The rooms are comfotable.  This year, it appeared that they have been doing some upgrading...that's great!   They really need a new restaurant to go where an Indian food place is now - it isn't  very good. A more classy restaurant will make the entire hotel more classy.
Manager Response: Dear 23travelinfool23  Thank you for continuing to stay with us and for your comments. We are doing some upgrades and renovations, so we hope you visit us again soon to enjoy our upgrades. We will be continue are commitment to customer satisfaction.

Summary: Chose this hotel as it is about 2 blocks from Disneyland. Good decision! The customer service at this hotel is fantastic, staff were welcoming and helpful, easily the best customer service I experienced in the USA! Pool and spa were great after a long day at the theme parks, Indian restaurant was OK for 1 night but very close to other alternatives. Rooms are clean and comfortable, I highly recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear  killer_seahorse  I am delighted you enjoyed your stay with us and I thank you for your kind comments about our great customer service. We look forward to seeing you again soon.

Summary: Nice clean hotel, about 15 minute walk to Disneyland.  Quiet location.  Friendly staff. Nice parking in underground parking structure with gated security.  Would have been nice to at least have a coffee bar in the lobby for the morning.  But there is basic coffee maker in the room.
Manager Response: Dear 634jennifer  Thank you for choosing to stay with us on your most recent trip to the Anaheim. We actually do offer complimentary coffee in the lobby but there were a few days that we removed the coffee station due to redeveloping of lobby area. We hope you visit us again soon and once again thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza for your travels.

Summary: March 2016 I was in Anaheim for the Natural Products Expo. We were did not staying at this hotel, rather were there for dinner at the Indian Restaurant on site. I noticed how friendly the desk staff was when we entered and after dinner, we needed help with printing some electronic tickets of one person's phone. The entire staff of helpful and offered some suggestions and came up with a solution so our tickets could be printed out. They even offered us bottled water. This team serves as an excellent example of the lasting good impression that a great hospitality team can on future guests.
Manager Response: Dear Tossim  Thank you for your kind comments. I do recall you and your colleagues paying a visit to our restaurant in the lobby. We are delighted that we were able to assist you with the printing. We hope next time you are in town either for Natural Products Expo or for pleasure, you can stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel.

Summary Heading: Great staff made this trip a success!!
Summary: The staff here is fantastic! We had issues with another hotel that some of our people were staying at and the Ramada staff went to great lengths to get our other travelers switched to here. Saved the day!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Love the Location, Hated The Room
Summary: Where do I begin. The only good thing is the location - near Disney, the convention center, and GardenWalk. But, other than that, the only thing worth the money was the shower, which was actually pretty decent for a hotel this price. The hotel sheets were itchy, way too over bleached. NONE of the 10 pillows were comfortable and I struggled to sleep on them. There were TWO windows, both of which opened to the third floor without any window - dangerous anyone? The air felt great, but within a few minutes, all the cold air had left the room - perhaps the double paned window which had no sealing was the blame. OLD school microwave and fridge. No way would I trust those. The bathroom toilet rocked so hard every time I sat down and I had to hold the handle for it to properly flush.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stayed at this hotel during the huge natural products Expo West show, in March 2016.  Although the hotel was undergoing renovations, my room was quiet.  The staff was stellar!  So helpful and friendly.  Free onsite parking and no charge for FedEx or UPS deliveries - THANK YOU!  About a 10 minute walk from the Anaheim Convention center and conveniently located close to the Anaheim Garden Walk with many restaurant choices.  Also, there is an Indian restaurant adjacent to the hotel that offers a very nice lunch buffet.  Rooms are clean and quiet.  Flat screen TVs and free Internet.  Thank you Ozzie, Stacey and the whole Ramada Plaza staff!  See you next year!
Manager Response: Dear Amy T  Thank you for choosing to stay with us on your recent trip to Anaheim. We are delighted that you enjoyed our location and our friendly service. I know our team is delighted to provide exceptional service to each and every guest. We look forward to seeing you again next year.

Summary: Every year we attend a convention in Anaheim.  This is the 5th year we have stayed at this property.  The staff is extremely friendly and accommodating and the hotel is walking distance to the convention center and Disney. They have been updating and renovating the property for several years and it is looking good.  The prices are reasonable and the parking is free.  My wife and I highly recommend it.
Manager Response: Dear Richard J  We are delighted that you have been a loyal guest to our property. Thank you for posting your comments and sharing them with our fellow tripadvisor readers. We hope you continue to stay with us as we continue to upgrade our property. King regards!

Summary Heading: It's Great to be back at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim
Summary: Overall this is a good hotel and location, but the people who work there comprise the 'Great' part of the review.  I was always greeted and asked if I needed anything whether I was coming into or leaving the facility.
Manager Response: Dear 555judig  Thank you so much for your kind review. Our staff takes pride in their jobs and taking care of our guests and they too appreciate when guest take the time to write positive comments such as yours. We hope we see you again soon.

Summary: This hotel was nice, it is about a 10 min walk to Disneyland, which isn't too bad on the first day. But after 3 days at the parks some of us resorted to taking the bus back. I traveled with 7 adults and 4 kids. They had breakfast every morning which is nice although the food was the same everyday and not much of a selection. The rooms were nice and the beds were comfy. it's also a plus that we got free parking. I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very nice accommodating staff, look for Esther, decent nice comfy beds, we haven't tried walking from Ramada to Disneyland but actually takes maybe 10 mins .Surprised to see cute little greetings with a disney touch for our birthday celebrants as we checked out. That was a cute surprise.Thank you Ramada  Hotel. The  only thing i recommend is I  hope theres a complimentary breakfast and very clean carpet .But overall the hotel is nice.
Manager Response: Dear blesildas2016  Thank you for staying with us and for the kind review. We know that there are many hotels to choose from near by but we are happy you chose to stay with us. And yes, the walk to Disney from our hotel is just a 10 minute walk which is very convenient for our guest. I hope we see you again real soon.

Summary: I stayed here with a performing group. The hotel was very accommodating at helping us all stay close together. The rooms slept 6. The 2 Queen beds were extremely comfortable as good as any 5star hotel bed I've stayed in. The pull sofa however was equally UNcomfortable. The front desk was nice about sending up extra blankets to try and make it better. They informed me that they are under going renovations and that they would be getting new sofa sleepers. The do need some room renovations our curtain valance was ripped and the breakfast is just decent. But I gave four stars because the customer service was fabulous, location to Disneyland was great and all the recent renovations were spot on so I'm expecting this hotel to just get better and better.
Manager Response: Dear H58NL  We are delighted you stayed with us. Thank you so much for posting a review of your recent experience with us. As you mention, we will be doing renovation this year and everything will be up to date, modern and of course new sofa beds. We hope you come back to our property when you travel to Anaheim in the future.

Summary: Pleasantly surprised with the service, everyone was very welcoming and accomodating.  The young woman at the front desk gave us a corner room which suited our family well since i was more worried about my 2 young kids being too loud for a neighbor.  Checkin was 3 minutes flat, and our room was thouroughly cleaned and ready upon arrival.   Favorites: Heavenly beds comparable  to marriot  Fun heated pool and spa Cons:  laundry room innadaquate  Cant comment on ghandi palace for food but staff was friendly.
Manager Response: Dear romacandy1  It was a pleasure having you as our guest. We are glad that you enjoyed our accommodations and thank you for your kind comments about our staff. As for the laundry room, we will have a new laundry room soon so when you come back, you can take full advantage of it.  Again, thank you for staying with us and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: Very clean and friendly staff. Only 20 min walk to Disneyland. I only stay here when we go to Disneyland. Every time we enter the lobby the staff always greets you. Edna was very nice during checkout.  We are always able to check in early.
Manager Response: Dear Chad K  Thank you for taking the time to post your comments regarding your recent stay with us. We are in a ideal location for all of our Disney travelers and for accommodating families. Edna is a great member of our team and we will make sure to share your comments with her.  We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

Summary: Very comfortable stay here. Good for Disney and knots berry farm. Also nice shopping near by approx 20 mins distance. Quiet, comfortable and clean. Welcoming staff as well
Manager Response: none

Summary: You get what you expect from a Ramada - however, I found that the staff were particularly helpful - certainly very friendly, and acted immediately I had any issues (only one really which was sorted promptly) - room clean; cleaners excellent advert for the hotel as well. Would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Bob-sdb  Thank you so much for your kind review. Our Ramada Plaza staff takes pride in our customer service. I'm thrill to know that the issue you had was taken care of. We will see you in the near future.

Summary: The staff at the hotel are very warm and friendly. They greeted us upon arrival, were very helpful while checking in and then also called us after we settled into the room to find out if everything was ok. The room was very spacious. The beds are comfy and sized nicely. The bathrooms are ok-ish. They are showing a little bit of wear and tear tile wise and the toilet flushed a bit slowly...there is also no fan in the bathroom. Aside from those few issues with the bathroom, the room is lovely and the hotel is very nice.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Old, semi clean, below average place
Summary: Looks like a very old place, I don't mind that, but at least it should be clean right.. The very first thing I noticed was the bed sheets were dirty. The room as such is pretty small said that it is supposed to be for 6 people. The sofa bed was really pathetic. The bathroom was just average. I will not stay here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were happy to stayed in Ramada Plaza, because we receive a awesome treat. The front person desk spoke our language and they gave us clear directions.  All the staff were very friendly and respectful. We found a lot of friends from San Diego. We probably are going to come back next year for the congress again and I definitely will recommend it to my friends.  Thank You!!! and congratulations!!!!!  Gracias amigos!!!!! Alicia Gutierrez from San Diego, Ca
Manager Response: Dear  906aliciag  It is always a pleasure having the Religious convention stay with us. We are happy to know that you enjoyed your stay and that our front desk staff was friendly as always. We want to thank you for recommending us with family and friends. We will be waiting for your return....Saludos a todos!!!

Summary: This was my first stay at the Ramada.  The hotel was clean and had a great location just a quick 5 - 10 minute leisurely walk to Disneyland.   There was free parking and WiFi which is a huge plus.  My other hotels in the resort area charge for both.   The staff was very friendly and helpful.     My only complaint about the hotel was the bed.   I'm not sure if this was only in the room I stayed in or if this is in all the rooms but, the bed was very short. (I am of average height)  I found the beds extremely uncomfortable and did not get much sleep.   That was unfortunately because the hotel was otherwise an enjoyable stay.   If I were to stay again I might try to get a room with a different size bed.
Manager Response: Dear WaltNV  Thank you for choosing to stay at Ramada Plaza hotel. We are thankful for your review. And yes, most properties in the are charge for parking and WiFi but it's complimentary with us. The beds are standard queen size beds, but we do have King size available for a future stay. We will continue to strive for excellent customer service and hope you and your family will come and stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: The Ramada is now part of the Wyndham chain and the changes show.  Checking in was a very pleasant surprise in that i had miscalculated the dates, however Stacy quickly made the changes with a smile and no additional charges.  The room was clean and neat although the mattress might need to be changed.  Parking was another pleasant surprise in that it was at no charge and underground.  The Ramada is within walking distance to Disney so for families this should be a plus.
Manager Response: Dear Henry C  It is great to hear that our wonder staff was able to help make the necessary changes with your reservation. Free parking is one of our many amenities which not too many hotels offer. We look forward to having you back in the future.

Summary: The place looks and feels great, so I was really surprised when I got to my room and found the toilet wasn't working properly. I had to open it up and play with the fill valve and other parts in order to get it to work, and basically it needed to be manually flushed each time.  I also had a difficult time with the shower. The handle was stuck and I felt like an idiot trying to figure it out. Determination and brute force eventually cleared the way. Basically the stuff was too old and needed to be replaced.
Manager Response: Dear E8599JEderekh  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay. I do want to apologized in regards to the toilet issue. I am positive that if you would of made us aware during your stay, we would of taken care of the issue immediately as well as the shower handle. I hope the next time your travels bring you to Anaheim you give us another chance and stay with us once again.

Summary: This hotel is great! Loved that the parking garage is hated and need an active room key after 10pm to get in. Room was huge compared to what I expected. We had 8 of us (1 infant) and we all had more than enough room. The rooms were clean and they came in and even picked up and remade our beds after we had left In the mornings. Let me tell you trying to get 5 kids ready for Disney the room was destroyed by time we left. The beds were great with the exception of the sleeper sofa. For kids it was fine but if your gonna have adults sleep on it I would bring an air mattress. The buffet they offer down stairs is ok. I don't think it's worth they $$. My kids just ate cereal. So we ended up getting stuff from target for the next 2 mornings. Overall great place to stay if your going to
Manager Response: Dear Vegas-Aguilars  Thank you for posting a review of your recent stay. We are happy that our rooms are big enough for your family and that our housekeeping staff continues to work hard for our guest. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.

Summary: The staff provided a consistent, genuine and friendly "Hello" every time I entered or exited the entrance. It felt welcoming. Rooms were clean, lobby sparkled and the location for my conference and Disneyland was perfect. CVS with all kinds of food was right across the street. I would absolutely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear 693kathleenn  Thank you for taking the time to post your comments regarding your recent stay with us. We are thrill to know that you felt the warm hospitality that our staff provides to our guest. We will be waiting for you to return in the near future.

Summary: I chose this hotel over the Hilton and other because this was half the price of the others and very close to the Anaheim Conv Cntr and Disneyland. The staff was very friendly, place was clean. Only negative was that the internet speed was painstaking slow. We were not able to stream any video or music. Fine for email, but forget gaming, video, and music. Our room was clean but thin walls. Awoke in night to hear person next door snoring. Could hear so clearly, I felt like I could reach out and poke him. Need better sound insulation.
Manager Response: Dear jamesbV2948JY  Thank you so much for sharing your recent experience with us! We are sorry to hear you were not completely satisfied during your recent stay due to poor Wi-Fi connection. We value each review and we do our best to improve where needed. We hope you decide to give us another try and allow us the opportunity to better serve you in the future!

Summary Heading: Very welcoming, clean and pleasant stay.
Summary: The first impression was being greeted by a friendly and welcoming front desk staff who told me to let them know if they could be of any further assistance. They called the room shortly after to check in to see that the room conditions were fine. The room was pleasant and clean. The facilities were nice and it was a very easy walking commute to the convention center and bus stops for Anaheim transport to and from the airports.  I would definitely stay here in the future.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff was great, very friendly and accommodating. The room was a little outdated, but comfortable and very quiet.  The serve yourself breakfast buffet is all that is offered, but at a reasonable price if you're a hotel guest. We would definitely stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I could not connect to WI-FI from my room during my 3 night stay, only in the hotel lobby. I spent close to 1.5hrs on the phone with their tech staff on the first night. Then there were promises that they were looking into it the following day. Not good if you're on a business trip.
Manager Response: Dear merasmuspe  Thank you so much for staying with us and sharing your comments. I do recall us having a few WI-FI issues a few days ago. We had a couple routers fail but we were able to fix the problem. I do apologize we weren't able to take care of that problem when you were our guest. I assure you that we are doing our best to make the necessary improvements. I hope you choose Ramada Plaza once again for your travels and give us another chance in the future.

Summary: I was in town for a convention but it's also easy walking distance to Disney as well.  Very convenient, decent rooms and lots of places to eat nearby - no meals at hotel.  I'll plan on staying there again.
Manager Response: Dear floydguy  We truly appreciate you taking the time to post your comments on Tripadvisor. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Very Nice Hotel - but needs some technology upgrades!!
Summary: One of the best things about this hotel is the friendly and helpful staff. The room was clean and spacious.  It seems this hotel specializes in catering to non-business guests, because the amenities were all quite nice.  However, WiFi speed & bandwidth, and public computer and printing support was quite limited. I was traveling with 8 other business associates, and I and several colleagues experienced great difficulty with slow, congested internet connections.  Not much WiFi bandwidth because you may get connected, but then the page would freeze and it would not be possible to log back on.  While connected, downloads were very slow.  The public computers and printers were also of vintage  technology, and we were not able to print MS WORD documents because there was no Office
Manager Response: Dear 646keith  Thank you very much for staying with us recently. We appreciate the detail review. I believe there was heavy usage of the WI-Fi and that made the speed limited.We are looking into expanding our bandwidth for the WI-FI real soon. As you mention, our staff is always happy to help our guest and make our guest feel at home. Once again, thank you for your review and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My son had a 3-day basketball tournament in Anaheim, and I was exhausted driving back and forth to/from San Diego in unpredictable traffic. My daughter had been at the same sports center for volleyball the previous weekend and has more upcoming tournaments. I decided to stay overnight vs. commuting again. I wanted a reasonable hotel that was quiet, clean and convenient to food and fun for the family. The Ramada was all of the above. As a walk-in, we were immediately greeted graciously. The reservation agent could tell I was exhausted and took great care of me. As another perk, The hotel also offers discounted Disney tickets for sale.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Excellent experience.  Friendly staff.  Had a unique situation happen and staff and management were awesome!!! We will stay again.  Internet was slow connection.  Very convenient location.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Strange odors and loud ACs throughout the hotel
Summary: I stayed here on a business trip with a large group of colleagues, and we found ourselves laughing about the intense smell of sewer permeating several of the hallways. We noticed that the hotel was remodeling their first-floor bathrooms, so perhaps that was the source of the problem? The persistent smell of cheap cologne in both elevators was also pretty bad, though. After one terrible breakfast here, we also learned to have our morning company meetings at the IHOP around the corner. Some of my colleagues complained about ACs that were so loud, they were forced to pick between I ende heat or being woken up by AC-unit rattling every few hours. My roommate and I didn't have that problem, and found our beds at least to be very comfortable.
Manager Response: Dear clechick2016  First and foremost we want to thank you and your colleagues for staying at Ramada Plaza Hotel and for taking the time to post your comments. Please rest assured that our staff is looking into the sewer smell you described. I'm not aware if you contacted the front desk, but if you did we would of certainly place you in a different room. We are improving our hotel this year by doing renovations, I hope you give us another chance and stay with us when visiting Anaheim Resort in the future. Once again, thank you.

Summary Heading: Best overall hotel for the price
Summary: We usually try to find the best deals when we get away to Disney, but I've found that some of the closer hotels on Harbor Blvd. are lacking in sound-proofing, and parking is at your own risk in tight spaces.  The proximity doesn't always equal a better value when it comes to getting rest after a long, exhausting day in the parks.  We were pleasantly surprised at the Ramada Plaza though.  The front desk staff were very courteous, allowed us to check in early when we call to say we had arrived early that morning from a 6 hour drive in, and parking was ample and easy in the underground complex.  We had a view of the street and the back of DCA from our room, but we never heard the usual street noises or traffic sounds that we had come to expect from other experiences.  The room was
Manager Response: Dear PetiteArtist83  We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and for taking the time to post your review. As you mention, the proximity to the parks is just a 10 minute walk and with all the shops and restaurants surrounding us, Ramada Plaza is an ideal location. We are glad you enjoyed our beds and was well rested to enjoy your day at Disneyland. We would love for you to stay with us again in the near future.

Summary: We have a Disneyland Season's Pass and this is the first hotel that I would give a 5 Star Rating.  The front desk staff are so extremely warm and welcoming, there is just no comparing them to the other hotel staff that we have encountered, they are just so incredible.  It means something when you are greeted with a smile and then they ask if there is anything that they can do to make your stay more comfortable.  Each time we passed the front desk on our way in and out...same warm greeting "hope you had a great time at the park!" or "have a wonderful evening!"  It matters.  Our room was very clean and the bed were the most comfortable that I have slept on in any Anaheim hotel.  There was little to no noise from the street or other rooms which made for a good night's sleep.  Being
Manager Response: Dear Jason L.  Thank you so much for a great and detail review. We are glad to hear that our friendly staff treated you so well.  We will certainly be sharing this with the staff, and hope to see you again in the near future.  Warmest Regards,

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for 6 nights while visiting Disney Jan 29-Feb 4th, 2016.  The front desk staff was very friendly at check-in and was always willing to help when we had questions and always made us feel welcome when we arrived back after a long day.  The hotel location is great, walking distance to Disney and you have your choice of many restaurants in the area.  We didn't try the onsite restaurant for breakfast or supper so can't review that.  The outdoor pool and hot tub were great and at a comfortable temperature.  We had a 2 queen bed room with a pull out couch and had plenty of room.  The only thing we noticed was during our last 2 days the bathroom had a bit of a smell (sulphur?) but nothing too strong, we didn't even call the front desk about it.  I would
Manager Response: Dear TESS1936  Thank you very much for staying with us recently. We appreciate the great review. I will share your comments with our staff. We look forward to seeing you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay for a disneyland holiday
Summary: We stayed in a queen room, it had two queen beds and the bathroom was a great size. There was a laundry to use, which was handy and there are plenty of close eating places.  Only disappointment was no continental breakfast offered like many other resorts in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Emily B We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your recent visit to our hotel. Although the breakfast is no longer included with the stay, we provide our guest a discounted rate if you choose to eat breakfast at our lobby restaurant. We appreciate your feedback and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I was very impressed with the level of customer service from this hotel!  We called a day in advance to be sure that we could park our vehicle at the hotel and walk to Disney. During that initial call, the front desk staff was very knowledgeable about Disneyland ticketing, parking etc. When we arrived the next morning, the staff greeted us warmly and inquired how they could help us.  Our rooms were available for check in at 9 am!  What a pleasant surprise!  We checked in and purchased our Disney tickets.  They even informed us of the Southern California tickets that they had available for us, which saved us more than $30 a ticket!   As we were heading out, they provided maps and provided information for the shuttle to the parks, which was steal!  We did choose to walk, since it
Manager Response: Dear blfechts  Thank you so much for staying with us at the Ramada Plaza Hotel and for your lovely detail review on TripAdvisor. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay. I will definitely let our staff know of you kind review. We look forward to having you as our guest the next time your travels brings you to Anaheim/Disneyland.

Summary Heading: Pros and Cons... Overall Good Experience
Summary: I'm a review freak and read all reviews on this place for months leading up to our trip. 1st off you have to know what to expect when you are staying near Disneyland. Most hotel are old, dated, and run down so have realistic expectations. I've stayed at dozens of hotels in the area so this will give a thorough review of the hotel compared to those around it.   Pros: Friendly staff, flat screen TV, lots of channels and not the crappy stuff, comfy bed, clean sheets/bedding, cold fridge, microwave, free parking garage, good soap and shampoo that actually lathers, spacious rooms, location (10 min walk to Disneyland, close restaurants/shopping)  Cons: Room was overall clean but floors were in desperate need of shampooing. My daughter walked barefoot on the floor for a few minutes and
Manager Response: Dear Ausitn C Thank you for choosing our Ramada Plaza Hotel for your Disney trip. We are delighted to hear you enjoyed our many amenities.We hope on your next visit, you call us directly to personally make your reservations and to make sure you we provide you with a room that fits all your needs. Hope to see you soon.

Summary: picked for location & pool for my sons 13 & 6. Following check-in walked to pool and there was sign closed for renovation. When asked front desk why this wasn't on their site or upon check in..I was told my could swim next door at their sister hotel.
Manager Response: Dear MGaviAcuna  Thank you for taking the time to post your review about your recent stay in our Hotel. We did have the pool close for 2 days for maintenance. As you can imagine it takes a couple of days, but we had a solution which was to direct our guest to use the pool on our sister property next door. We hope you can see that our staff looks for ways to meet every guest needs. Once again, thank you for your review and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: When we checked in we were advised about construction however assured it would end on Friday by 6 and there would no construction on the weekend, however early Saturday morning we were woken up to hammering and construction.  Complained to front desk. They apologized and offered discount to be credited to my hotels.com booking.  Only got a 35% reduction for 1 night 1 room.  I had 3 rooms booked for 2 nights.  The compensation should have been at least  50%, which is what they told one of the members in our  party.  I had called the week before arrival and not only not told about the construction nor was I advise that they had exceptional deal for Disneyland tickets that would have save me $400. Disappointed!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Very Nice Place to Stay and Affordable
Summary: It can be difficult to locate affordable hotels near DisneyLand, but the Ramada Plaza at Anaheim has never disappointed me. I've stayed here a few times, and each time the rooms were very comfortable and well taken care of, and definitely affordable compared to local competitors. Plus, the staff is just top notch.
Manager Response: none

Summary: First off the staff was awesome, extremely polite and helpful and every morning as we left we got a big smile and a Have a Great day from them.  The microwave and fridge was very handy.  The fridge we had in our room wasn’t getting cold so we called the front desk and told them and within minutes we had another fridge brought up.  The parking was great and it’s short 20 or so minute walk to Disneyland.  The front desk called to make sure everything was ok and if we were happy with our room which was nice of them.  The rooms a very clean and the beds are great.  Price is good for the location.  I’d love to stay there on our next trip.
Manager Response: Dear JOHN K  We appreciate you taking the time to review our Hotel on tripadvisor. We understand that our guest want to enjoy and relax while staying with us and we are committed to make it happen for them. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you are planning a trip to the Disneyland area.

Summary: January 15, 2016:   we were in a 2 queen + sofa bed room (very large!), Check in - 3pm, Check out - 12pm, parking is included  Pros: about a 20 minute walk to Disneyland, friendly staff, free wi fi (but very slow), heated pool + jacuzzi, 40+ inch TV with tons of channels, microwave + refrigerator + soap + shampoo + conditioner + lotion provided, average of $175 per night (after taxes), nice restaurants all within a 5 minute walk: Bubba Gump, Roy's, McCormick & Schmick's, P.F. Chang's, CPK, Cheesecake Factory as well as the Anahem Garden Walk  Cons: wi fi is free but unreliable (very slow), no included breakfast (although they have an Indian restaurant adjacent to the lobby called Gandhi Palace - did not try the Indian food, but they do have a breakfast buffet that is at a
Manager Response: Dear  jojo-diaz  Thank you for staying with us recently and for a wonderful detail review. We truly appreciate every comment on tripadvisor, positive or negative. We will share your feedback to all of our team members and will continue to improve where it is needed.  We do hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: We were very satisfied overall with our stay. the staff was extremely polite and helpful.  They went out of their way everyday to make sure everything was in order for us.  We loved that there was a microwave and fridge since we have very young kids and needed both for milk & bottles.  The only real cons to our stay was that the floor was a little dirty (everything else was super clean) and I was kinda shocked at the $5/person per day shuttle fee to Disneyland  So we walked and it was fine.  It didn't take us that long.  I would for sure stay here again in the future!
Manager Response: Dear Julie R  Thank you so much for your kind review about Ramada Plaza Hotel.Our proximity is perfect for Disney and as you mentioned. We do hope you come back to Anaheim again and if you do we would love to accommodate you again.

Summary Heading: Worst hotel stay I have ever experienced
Summary: We were kept up until 3 am on the first night by very loud neighbors. We could hear every word they said through the very thin walls and adjoining  door.  Then the very next morning, constuction in the room right next door at 8:00 am. When we spoke to the front desk about it on the first morning (saturday) they assured us it was only going to be that morning (didn't offer to switch our room). Sure enough Monday morning at 8 am they were hammering away again!  We spoke to front desk again and all they did was take $20 a night off our bill. What a joke! Room cleaniless was ok but bathroom was really run down and not very clean. Never will we stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location, nice room, friendly staff
Summary: We were glad we found this affordable hotel near everything in Anaheim. We loved that the elevator from the parking garage takes you right up to your hotel floor so it was very easy to get around with kids and strollers! The staff was very nice and accommodating and the room was cleaned daily and fit our family well.
Manager Response: none

Summary: They are very friendly service and we feel welcome there. They did help us to solved the problem they give us other room after had a toilet problem. We will go there again in the future. They do very good job!!!!
Manager Response: Thank you Rhonda S. for you kind review, I will share it with our staff. I hope you come back to our area, and if you do, we would love to have you stay with us again.

Summary: The staff were very friendly, courteous and helpful. What stood out the most was How helpful the Front desk are, they checked in on us after we checked in  our room and got situated and remembered us every time we entered the Hotel. I left my One of a kind Personalized Phone case at the hotel after my child dropped it in the coffee cup and they went over and beyond the call of duty to assist. They took it upon them self to call me and let me know the Fedex had arrived and my package was on the way. They are the reason behind my 5 bubble rating. House keeping were sweet and helpful as well and attentive to our needs in the room. I also had room service from the restaurant next door who delivered to our room CHAMBERS my families personal favorite are the amazing waffles!! Yummm :)
Manager Response: Dear Roxan C.   We are overjoyed to hear you family vacation went great during your stay with us. All of our team members are looking for ways to assist when we can, even if it is not hotel related. Thank you for taking the time to let us know you had a great experience. Hope to see you on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: We checked in on Friday afternoon. After arriving in our room and unpacking we started hearing really loud banging and noises coming from the adjacent room. Turns out the room was under renovation and was being worked on. We went to the front desk and were assured that the workers would be gone by 6pm and that they would not work on the weekend.  Annoyed but satisfied we went on with our evening and stayed out late with our young kids near Disneyland. At 7am Saturday morning, the banging resumed, waking our already overtired kids and causing them to be generally cranky the whole day. The work continued all day long, making staying in the room impossible.  I was extremely disappointed to be lied to by the front desk. If there's no work allowed on the weekend, then it's the
Manager Response: Dear Michaelkipper  Thank you for taking the time to write a review of you recent experience at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We are doing are best for all staff to be on the same page about our renovation. We will be making an extra effort to take immediate actions if a guest has concerns about our renovation period. We hope you will give us another opportunity when we are completely renovated.

Summary: Very affordable for family of 4. Spacious room, comfy beds. The only reason not a five star rating was the bathroom was very small and the shower leaked. It would have been nice if the sink was outside of tub/toilet it allows families to get ready quicker. Otherwise great stay!
Manager Response: Dear lisabP852VU  Thank you so much for staying with us at the Ramada Plaza Hotel. We are so glad you enjoyed your stay. In the near future, our rooms will be remodel and the bathroom will be more spacious. Again, thank you for staying with us and we hope you visit us again.

Summary: Overall, good experience. Extremely nice staff..beyond friendly! There was noise at times, due to construction down the hall, but otherwise good.
Manager Response: Dear Skeletal33  Thank you so much for staying with us at the Ramada Plaza Hotel. We appreciate your kind comments about our staff. We look forward to accommodating you the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Ideal location for a Disneyland trip!
Summary: So convenient! I stayed here when I went to Disneyland with my brother and the location was ideal, we did not have to worry about paying for a taxi or anything of that sort. The staff was very friendly and helpful and the place itself was very beautiful
Manager Response: Dear bloya95  Thank you for your recent visit and comments regarding our hotel. Our focus is to provide the best possible experience for our guest. We look forward to having you as our guest the next time your travels brings you to Anaheim/Disneyland.

Summary: Staff was amazing.    Location is amazing.  Walk to Disneyland and convention center.   Building and room was nice except bathroom was a bit run down
Manager Response: Dear 900triciap   Thank you for sharing your experience. I’m thrilled to hear you had a great stay and that are amazing staff took care of you. We look forward to welcoming you back to our hotel the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary Heading: No more breakfast and half cleaned room
Summary: I have been coming to this hotel for over 4 years now and have never had a bad experience, but this time I was not as happy.  The first day I got there and went to my room all seemed well. I then noticed that I didn't receive my breakfast vouchers. The front desk notified me that they were not doing that anymore and I could go and get a discount. I was dissapointed but it was still ok. The rooms are clean and the beds are comfortable so I wasn't to upset. But, later that day when I went to use the microwave to hear my babies bottle it did not work. It turned on but was not heating. The one they replaced it with didn't do much better. What I would normally heat for 30 seconds to iver a min. Not very fun when you have a fussy baby. Then the 3rd day we stayed there the room was
Manager Response: Dear 138denisej  First and foremost we want to thank you for returning to our property. We encourage our guest to post their comments on tripadvisor to make us aware of anything we need to work on and we always review the feedback. Please rest assured that cleanliness is at the top of our list so we will review your issue with our staff. I just wish you would of requested Housekeeping service to our front desk staff if you felt strongly that your room was not well cleaned. As far as the breakfast, it is still serve but no longer included with the stay since the beginning of 2015. We made sure to let all the third party websites aware of this. It is always a pleasure to welcome back our repeat guest. We hope you will continue to stay with us and give us another chance. Once again thank you for your comments.

Summary: The front desk staff was extremely accommodating by allowing us to check in at 1130 on NYE. The room was well kept and cozy. The bathroom was small for my taste, really a frivolous thing to complain about. The best we're comfortable, although the pull out sofa could have been more comfortable. It's a pull out sofa though, how much can we really expect. Overall the stay was fantastic and all of the staff were extremely courteous.
Manager Response: Dear garrettpwns  Thank you for writing about your recent stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We are glad that you had a fantastic stay. As far as the sofa-beds, we will be changing them when we renovate the hotel this year.  It was a pleasure to have you as our guest. We do look forward to your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Perfect hotel to stay at. 30 min to beach. Free Underground Parking. Hotel staff were so nice and accomodating. Hot water went out. They gave Breakfast Buffet vouchers for India Restaurant in hotel. GREAT location!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Our stay the Ramada while on our trip to Disneyland.
Summary: My family of four stayed at the Ramada during the busy Christmas season while on our trip to Disneyland.  The hotel was great walking distance from Disneyland with plenty of resturants close by.  Our hotel room was a great size for the four of us and very clean.  We will stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Has a beautiful entry to register, was greeted by the front desk in a kind way.  I suggested a room with a view, it was granted.  We needed some assistance from housekeeping they delivered promptly.  It was quite, bed was very comfortable the room was perfect.  I would certainly stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear florap459  Thank you for taking the time to share your positive experience with us. It thrills us to read that your visit was enjoyable due to are front desk and housekeeping staff. We look forward to hosting you again in the future!

Summary Heading: Good Value and Great Location for Disneyland Visitors
Summary: We were looking for a decent place to stay within walking distance to Disneyland. This hotel was exactly that. Not exceptionally clean or fancy, but the bed was comfortable and there was a decent sized fridge—a plus for us. I also liked that there was a parking garage underground and parking was free with our stay. Our heater didn't work and we called to have it fixed. A couple of women came in to look at it. From what I overheard, the thermostat was bad, so they were going to replace it. When we returned later that day, the heat still didn't work. Luckily the weather wasn't extreme so we didn't bother with it again. The price was the best I found compared to neighboring hotels.
Manager Response: Dear ccorrell  We are delighted to read that you enjoyed your recent visit to our hotel. I do want to apologize for the heater issue. Although the weather wasn't extreme, our heater should of been up and running. We are making sure this does not occur again. We hope you give us another chance and visit us again. Thank you for taking the time to post your comments.

Summary Heading: Hotel was walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Booked this hotel out of covenience to Disneyland as we were able to walk to the park from the hotel. The pricing was still pricey with my travel discount. There were several issues I found as I woke up to no hot water so could not take shower unless I wanted to do a cold shower. Went downstairs to notify them of this and they said hot water was out so had to go next door. They offered us a comp breakfast ticket and said that they extended time for us to do breakfast. I mentioned we may need more time to check out which they say ok. My bf proceeds to go shower while I head back to room to make some coffee only to find the coffee machine is missing a piece so can't make coffee. I then get a call from reception telling me it's time for me to check out which doesn't make sense
Manager Response: none

Summary: PROS - 10 minute walk to Disneyland; close walking distance to many local restaurants; my 4 kids and I were able to sleep in 1 room; washer/dryer available; weight room; and staff were amazing. CONS - Deep clean needed to be done in room and bathroom; only 2 washers/dryers available and 1 dryer was broken; broken equipment in weight room and not much to choose from; and noise level high with neighboring guests either because they were loud or thin walls. This hotel was 1 of few that allowed for my 4 kids and I to sleep in 1 room. Others were either too high priced for this or required I get 2 rooms. I didn't complain to front desk about loud neighbors - included man, woman, and 2 rowdy young kids - because we were up early every day and with how loud they were my kids - ages
Manager Response: Dear angelatR4511ZN  It is a pleasure to read of your positive experience at our hotel. Our staff is delighted to hear that they are doing things right and making sure our guest are comfortable. That being said, I wish you would of let us know of the noise coming from your neighbors. We would of called them to make sure to keep it down. We understand that most families arrived with exiting kids, and they might be loud for a while, but our guest are also understandable and when ask to keep the noise down, they usually do. Thank you for staying with us and we hope you visit us soon, it would be our pleasure to host you again!

Summary: The front desk employee (forgot to get his name, but he was Filipino and maybe mid to late 20s), was quick to check us in and very friendly. Our room with 2 double-beds and a pull out sofa made the room spacious, and the microwave and mini refrigerator were really convenient to have. The bathroom was fairly clean, and the pressure of the shower head was on point. Free parking is a major plus here! It's also an easy 10 minute walk to the Disney Park entrance and has a variety of stores/food places near by. Definitely plan to stay here on future visits!
Manager Response: none

Summary: All the staff are friendly. Our room is clean and spacious. Tha location is good 10 minutes walk to Disney. My only suggestion to the management is to put exhaust fan in toilets.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your experience with us. We are glad to hear that our rooms were clean and spacious for you. We love to receive new suggestions and we will definitely let management aware of this. We truly appreciate your recommendation and look forward to hosting you again

Summary Heading: Excellent location, clean, and good amenities.
Summary: We had a great stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  It was perfect for our visit to the Disneyland parks, the staff were very helpful and kind, and having the restaurant on the bottom level was convenient.  There was some construction going on in the restroom area, which caused a bit of noise and was slightly inconvenient since we had to use the pool bathroom instead of the lobby bathroom, but nothing serious.    Rooms were clean, there is a nice mini-fridge and microwave available.  However, the mini fridge didn't quite seem to get down to the temperature needed to really refrigerate food - was more like a cooler - and the knob that I assume was supposed to be used to adjust it was broken off.    Good stay for a family trip to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Hi  Sukeshi M  We would like to thank you for staying with us recently and providing your review from your stay. We appreciate the feedback and will continue to improve in the areas where is necessary. Our staff will be delighted if you return to visit us. Once again, thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Definitely will stay there again-Close to Disneyland
Summary: Im pretty picky about cleanliness and smell-this pace was clean smelled clean! Nice sized room, bed was very comfortable and firm. Hallways well taken care of carpets looked nice and clean.  good bang for your buck!
Manager Response: Dear  Margarita M  We truly appreciate your comments on TripAdvisor. It is nice to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that the cleanliness was up to par. We our proud of our housekeeping staff that makes sure everything is clean and taken care of. We thank you again, and hope to see you in the near future.

Summary: Pros: The staff was very friendly. they let me check in before 10 a.m. even though check-in time is officially at 3. We parked there and walked the half mile to Disneyland and saved $20. The room was clean. Cons: the bathroom was kinda falling apart (loose and mismatched tiles, etc) although I realize this is wear and tear from rowdy guests. It needs a renovation, but they are working with what they have. I would stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer O  We are overjoyed to read of your positive experience at Ramada Plaza Hotel. Our helpful and friendly team members always try to accommodate our guest when checking in before checking time, of course if it's available. As far as the bathrooms, we are aware of some wear and tear, and it's why we will be renovating in 2016. We hope you visit us again and see the improvements in our property. Thank you for posting your comments on TripAdvisor.

Summary: This place met my family expectation. It is located within walking distance, room was nice and clean, enough towels for four people.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our room was spacious with 2 queen beds which were quite comfy and the room was quiet as it was at the back of the hotel.  However, there was a water leak into our 4th floor room when it rained.  The front desk did offer a room change but we had so much to pack up we decided to stay and manage the leak.  The next morning when we woke the hotel was entirely without hot water so showers were not an option.  The front desk again tried to appease us and offered a room to shower in at the neighboring hotel but that was another inconvenience.  Instead they gave us a free breakfast and we went on our way.  Our overall comment would be that the hotel requires some much needed maintenance and a little TLC.  The front desk staff was very apologetic and tried to accommodate so bonus points
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were disappointed that we were unable to book a hotel closer to the Disneyland entrance. However, the Ramada was very pleasant with a congenial staff.  The hotel was spotless and our room was large-2 queen beds and a sofa bed. The bathroom was large and stocked with plenty of towels and toiletries. The restaurant on site is Indian which our small children have not developed a palate for, but there are plenty of family style restaurants in the area. It was a short walk to the resort and all in all, it worked out great. Very pleased!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was very clean. The beds were comfortable. It was nice to have a refrigerator and microwave in the room. The hotel is within walking distance of Disneyland.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Victoria R  Thank you very much for taking the time to share your positive experience with us.  We eagerly await our next opportunity to host you!

Summary: The room was good for the most part, the sofa sleeper was very uncomfortable and the legs were broken. We had no hot water in the morning on our last day. The other two beds in the room were comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I arrived earlier than scheduled check-in time, so was a little worried if could get parking permit. I just wanted to save trouble to park in the crowded Disneyland parking lot. I was surprised the room was actually ready for check in, and the better part is I am still able to get permit even room not ready. They are really understanding what their customers want.   Room is big and clean. Bed is firm as we like. We had a good time to live there. Thanks.  The only thing I think they may improve is the Internet(wireless) connection. I just cannot get it worked, but anyway who has energy to surf on Internet after whole day walking in the Disneyland. Not me.
Manager Response: Dear jasonhI6677GC  We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel. Our staff understands that guest are trying to enjoyed Disneyland as much as possible, so when we are able to check in a guest early or provide parking before checking time, we gladly do it. Thank you for staying with us and We sincerely look forward to hosting you again in the future!

Summary: My husband and I stayed here during our Christmas trip to Disneyland.  To be honest, the room itself was only average, but what earned this motel a better rating was the staff at the front desk.  They were always very welcoming and helpful.  On our last day there, we had a very negative experience at the restaurant on the property, and the motel manager on duty that day, Edna, did everything she could to make things right. Even though the restaurant is not actually a part of the motel, Edna went above and beyond to try and help us. We really appreciated her assistance.  The ART bus picks up right in front of the motel which made getting to and from Disneyland without a rental car easy.  I highly recommend this motel.
Manager Response: Dear  Valerie S  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments about your stay with us. Thank you for recognizing our team of professionals who are always working hard to ensure that every one of our guests are comfortable and well taken care of. We are glad to know that you recommend our hotel. We hope to you again in the near future.

Summary: Our first morning we woke up to no hot water. Our family was up early ready to head over to Disney and we were forced to take chilling cold showers. They offered us free buffet vouchers to their buffet, which did not make the cut either. The limited variety of food was terrible.
Manager Response: Dera ritah751  First and foremost we would like to apologize for any inconveniences from not having any hot water. Our front desk staff tried their best to keep everyone happy during a chaotic morning. This type of machinery malfunction is a rare occurrence and we are doing are best for this not to occur again. We hope you are willing to look past of having no hot water and give us another chance. Thank you for your comments and we hope to see you again.

Summary: We arrived found checkin and parking very easy, we got to our room to find 2 full/queen beds , more on the full side not queen, sleeper sofa was also in room was very beat down mattress and springs it needs to be replaced. NO hot water first night, seams there boiler was broken. Ants on the table by the window on 2nd day, near a soda that was left. Carpet in hallway by our door was lumpy and needed to be restretched. Restuarant in the hotel only served Indian food, no American. Probably not going to stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was nice but the remodelers were not very detail oriented. Staff was friendly. We had to have the card fixed 2 times in our 4day stay. There was a fridge, microwave & coffee machine in our room. We did not eat at the restaurant located in the hotel & too cold for a swim. I'd definitely stay again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice big room, sauna, hot tub, and pool area all also were nice and clean.  Parking area nice and lite and had a elevator.  Very close to walk to Disneyland. 10 minute walk.  I have to keep typing to get to 200 characters :/
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: House keeping AMAZING,staff great, very clean, restaurant waste of money
Summary: Housekeeping was amazing very fast had our rooms made up before noon, the staff was great, the only reason the review isn't perfect was the boiler broke while we were there so we had no hot water for about 20 hours so that sucked but they comes us our room for that night so reLly loved the staff and will stay here again, they also gave us vouchers for. Free breakfast in their restaurant but it was horrible won't eat there again
Manager Response: Dear Kassi S  Thank you for taking the time to review us. We are so happy to hear you had a wonderful experience despite our boiler malfunction. Your patience and understanding was much appreciated during a hectic morning. We hope you visit us on your next trip to Anaheim.

Summary: I was expecting better but my expectations are always too high I guess. Bathroom was okay during my last day the hot water didn't work cause they were putting in a new boiler . the outlets didn't seem safe, we didn't know If the fridge was working or not. It was basically just a place to sleep[which is what it's supposed to be] but it wasn't my cup of tea.. I'm sure they had better rooms? But I just happened to have a bad?  one. I appreciated their customer service though they were really helpful. Maybe it's because I booked from Groupon lol. 😝
Manager Response: none

Summary: Staff was very polite, informative and the stay a pleasant one. The rooms were comfortable and clean however, had a few issues which made the cost not a good value.  One day hot water was not available and traveling this is very important.  Floors transmitted sound easily which was difficult to sleep because tenants above were either stepping hard or just making loud noise. A few other minor details the bathroom light was intermittent, shower name plate was loose and coffee maker didn't have a tray to keep water draining into the cup for tea.
Manager Response: Dear Francisco F  Thank you so much for staying with us on your recent trip to Anaheim. I am delighted to hear that our beds were comfortable for you. As you mention we did had a mishap with our water heater but took care of that as fast as possible, our apologies. We are taking every comment and review seriously to make the right changes so our guest have a better and enjoyable stay. We thank you once again, and hope you visit us again.

Summary: The rooms are clean .. The staff was very nice and welcoming !! It was close to Disneyland .. We had one issue in the morning the water was cold .. However it was fixed before we got back to the room I was very happy to take a hot shower that night  I would recommend my family and friends to stay at this location .. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear  ANNMILPITAS  Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your comments on TripAdvisor. We would love to welcome you back in the near future. Kind regards!

Summary: The employees here go above and beyond with a smile on their face the whole time. Best hotel staff EVER!!!! Pay a visit to the bar, the bartender HOOKS you up with generous shots and drinks!!! My room was spacious and clean with really comfortable beds. I came during Christmas time and the lobby was beautifully decorated!! The location was perfect for Disneyland and is an easy walk there. Right next to the Ramada Plaza is a little strip mall with delicious Mexican food and many other food choices as well as being close to CVS and 7-11. In the strip mall, second store from the end, is a shop that sells souvenirs for 1/3 the price of Disneyland. I stocked up!! I will ALWAYS stay here when I go to Disneyland. Thank you Ramada Plaza for such a wonderful weekend!!! You all are doing
Manager Response: Dear  wendyartdance  Thank you so much for staying with us. We appreciate your kind review. We are delighted to hear that are staff was helpful and cheerful as always. It is truly our pleasure to provide each and every guest with the best service possible. Thank you for your lovely comments and we hope to see you back soon.

Summary: We really enjoyed this hotel. It was two blocks from Disneyland Park which was a great plus for us and a short walking distance. The hotel staff was friendly and courteous. The room was clean and fresh. The double queen size beds were very comfortable and soothing. My only complaint is that the bathroom didn't have an air vent to flush out the steam after a shower. I had to apply my makeup and style my hair in the room. Thankfully the closet had mirrored doors. But all in all the room and the hotel was great...I would highly recommend this hotel...Thank you very much
Manager Response: Dear star2340  Thank you so very much for staying with us and for sharing your wonderful comments. I'm glad to hear you enjoyed are comfortable and soothing beds. Please recommend us to family and friends. We look forward to seeing you again real soon and please feel free to contact us for future reservations.

Summary Heading: Comfy beds and Walkable to the park for older kids
Summary: I enjoyed our stay at the Ramada Plaza for our weekend trip to Disneyland! The beds were extremely comfortable and the facilities overall were very nice! My only complaint is that we ended up in an ADA room and I must say that the shower was extremely weak! I am not sure if that is a problem in regular rooms, or only because the ADA room in particular has a handheld shower head, but it was like a soft rain! We did also have some troubles getting the toilet to flush without holding the handle down for a long period of time. However, seeing as we are in a drought, my guess is that everything is set to as low a flow as possible. It was a little bit of an inconvenience, but nothing to ruin the trip or anything like that. The staff were all quite friendly, which I always appreciate.
Manager Response: Dear  Melissa E  Thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza Hotel for your weekend trip to Disneyland. We are sorry to hear you only complaint is about the ADA room. Since we have limited amount of King rooms at times the system selects the ADA rooms as Kings. We hope for your next weekend trip you book with us and give us a call to confirm the room preference and we would do our best to accommodate you and your family.

Summary: The room was rundown and not well maintained. Stained carpet, rusted and dusty vents, holes in curtains. PVC pipe sticking approx 9 in out of ceiling over shower. Requested new room.
Manager Response: Dear MelissaIP7627TK  Thank you for taking the time to write a review to help us improve in areas that were not up to your standards. We hope you were satisfied on how quick we were to respond regarding the PVC pipe in the original room you were assigned. We, the staff, try our best to quickly resolve any issues you may come upon your stay no matter how big or small your request may be. By giving us another chance in the near future you will not be disappointed with our site because we will be renovating our hotel.

Summary: Only down fall was bathroom needed some minor repairs but other than that it was great super close to everything
Manager Response: Dear Valenzuela2  Thank you for staying at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We appreciate and will share your comments to are wonderful team. We will continue to make improvements where is necessary. We hope you visit us again, as we will be renovating soon.

Summary: The nite agent did not answer phone the ringer was turned off. I physically went down and he turned it back on but as I walked away he shut it off again. The breakfast buffet was terrible. Barely any good and it was cold. Ketchup was spoiled
Manager Response: none

Summary: I really enjoyed staying here. It was a good location and the rooms were really nice. I was always greeted by the front desk staff. My family and I plan on staying here for all our trips to Disneyland from now on. Since we're annual pass holders it will be a lot!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Rooms are Nice but Avoid the Buffet!
Summary: Good service, nice people, reasonable walking distance to Disney.  Room was clean and spacious, bed was comfy, water was hot when asked to be. Covered underground parking was awesome as it was cold and rainy when we arrived.  I would totally stay there again - but the $8 breakfast buffet is to be avoided at all costs.  It is an Indian restaurant by night, an odd combination, and I think we were the only people they served that day - which means the food was hours old, and basically inedible by the time we got to it.  Other than that, success!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was spacious and I spent several feverish moments trying to figure out how to get the mattress and bedding into my car as I left.  It's the most comfortable bed I've slept in on the road.  Alas, I left it there. Next trip to Disneyland, we'll stay at the Ramada.
Manager Response: Dear Wturk3187  We are so happy to read that your recent visit to Ramada Plaza Hotel was enjoyable. As you mention, are beds are really comfortable and new. We can't wait to see you again and provide you with our great service.

Summary: Older property, but renovated and clean.  It is very close to all Disney attractions.  Comfortable beds, but not enough soundproofing. Neighbors can be loud.  Breakfast restaurant downstairs was served at a discount to hotel guests at $7.99.  The fact that it was empty on our arrival at 9:30 should have been a warning.  The food was very sub-par, to say the least.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean, seamless process, good service and near Disney
Summary: We enjoyed our stay here because of the free parking, seamless check in/out, nice rooms, and attentive staff. i also asked frontdesk where i could buy extra bottled water and the frontdesk staff readily gave me 2 bottles for free. i also printed our disney ticket at the lobby PC  and i was not charged anything. other hotels would charge you for anything that they could!!!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We are delighted that you enjoyed our  amenities. We hope you visit us again in the near future. Once again thank you for your kind comments about our property!

Summary Heading: Nice from a distance, old up close
Summary: Ramada Plaza looked great when we walked into our room, and from first glance, looked big, clean and fresh. But throughout our stay it was clear that this hotel room could use some work. It wasn't super clean, from the bathroom to the bedroom. I will say that the bed was fairly comfortable, and the service was really nice. Also free parking was a big plus, since a lot of similar resorts are $10 a day. Overall it was a nice visit, but they could spend a few bucks to make the room much nicer.
Manager Response: Dear  lucassV1741VX  We truly appreciate you taking time out of your day to share a review of your recent stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We are happy to announce to our recent guest that we will be renovating soon. Therefor we want all are past guest to return and enjoy our new update property in the very near future. Once again, thank you for your feedback.

Summary: I have stayed at this Ramada 5 times in the last 4 years, the December family trip to Disneyland.  Each time the accommodations were excellent.
