The rooms are clean, spacious, the Front Desk staff are professional and welcoming.  This Ramada is within walking distance, about 10 minutes, to the Park.  There is a breakfast buffet ($7.95) for guest which is very respectable and easy to access.  The only reason this was not a 5 star review is the tub was very slow to drain.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for staying with us and being a repeat guest. Your detail feedback helps others know about the property and the amenities we provide. We hope to continue to be your top choice for accommodations when planning your next Disneyland vacation!

Summary: Comforter was stained, desk and headboard had stuff stuck on them  and windows needed a clean. We would pull the door closed hard when we left but the cleaning staff wouldn't so when we would get back from our day we could open the door without a key (which was concerning with laptops on the room!). You could hear our neighbors every word thru the adjoining door when they would come home at 1:45. The front desk was friendly and helpful
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was clean and very nice. Only a 10 minute walk from Disneyland. we didn't have any problems with staff or hotel. Everyone was friendly. We would definitely recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Thank you for visiting with us and for sharing your kind comments. We look forward to seeing you again real soon. Please recommend our hotel to family and friends.

Summary: the Hotel was decent and the staff I talked to was friendly. I liked not having to pay for parking and I was aloud to leave my car the next morning after I checked out while I spent the day at Disneyland so that was great. Room was comfortable and was exactly what I needed of a place to sleep and get ready for the parks. the restaurant downstairs needs lots of work. I wouldn't recommend it to anyone. Breakfast was a good price for a basic breakfast buffet but food was cold and not fresh by any means. the only thing any good was the cereal and fruit that was as cold as the "hot food"
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms were nice, we had a view of the Disneyland fireworks which was an added bonus. The staff was very friendly and the location was good for our trip.. Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. I'm glad you got a room with view of the fireworks, remember it's first come first serve for future reference. We look forward to seeing you again

Summary: i've stayed at many hotels in the anaheim area and the ramada plaza is in my top three ! from walking distance to disneyland to cleanliness and overall hospitality ! will be staying here again ! very friendly staff
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel staff was friendly and helped us with every need. Like the free parking and no resort fee. Close to park, and food. Staff moved us to better room when asked, bed was comfortable, and Internet was free. Not a fan of restaurant in hotel though. Treadmill was good, wish for more equipment though. Would recommend hotel .
Manager Response: none

Summary: I booked this hotel simply because it had less fees than other similarly priced hotels in the area. However, this hotel won me over immediately upon arrival with the ease of their underground parking structure, clean and comfortable rooms, and friendly staff. The staff never missed an opportunity to say hello and handled all interactions with professionalism and respect. I will absolutely be staying here again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Walls were very thin and you can hear everything in the room next door. The hallways need to be updated, there was a musty smell sometimes. Overall we would stay there again but really needs updating.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: A reasonable base for a Disneyland trip
Summary: My wife and I stayed here for three nights, based in large part on the reviews here. We weren't disappointed. The room was clean, bed was comfortable, free wi-fi was reasonably fast, and the fixtures all worked well. The hallway noise was a little loud, but that's not unusual in a hotel, especially in one that you'd expect to have several families visiting. My wife appreciated the free in-room coffee.  Check-in was a breeze, even at 1 AM. Checkout was similarly painless, and the front desk was ready, willing, and able to hold our bags during our last day. Using Uber in and out of here was a bit challenging because of the divided roadway, but otherwise, road access is unremarkable. The lobby is shiny and clean and pleasant to wait in.  We didn't try the on-site restaurant, but
Manager Response: none

Summary: Very happy we chose to stay here on a quick Disneyland visit.  Hotel felt relatively new and was certainly well maintained.  Stylish well kept clean rooms, comfortable bed and pillows, perfectly fine bathroom with no surprises.  While not the closest hotel to the parks main gate, we were still able to walk to Disneyland in about 10 minutes, which is a huge bonus.  Was nice having an interior room entrance instead of the more common motel type exterior entrances featured at most hotels in this area. Small pool in the parking lot, though wasn't something we were interested in using.  Very friendly and helpful staff, for us worked out just right.
Manager Response: Dear UWSGUYNYC  We want to thank you for the kind words and detail review of our hotel and services. We take pride in making our guest feel special and welcome. Our goal is for our guest to continue to choose us for their travels. Thank you for taking the time to post your comments and we look forward to serving you in the future.

Summary: Our room was large and comfortable - beds great.  It was a 10 minute walk or less to Disneyland which saved us time and money and no charge for parking here! I wondered if the bathroom floor had been swept/cleaned before we came and a closet mirror needed cleaning but that is easy to overlook.  The restaurant - which apparently is leased and not run by Ramada looks very nice but the food was not worth the money.
Manager Response: Dear edwarda320  Thank you so much for your review. All feedback is important to us, positive or negative as we continue to look for ways to improve. I hope you will one day give us another opportunity to show you that we do care and to show you our improvements. Hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Our towels that were used the first day came back without washing. The blood stain in the towel from my daughter's nose bleeding is the same towel that was stored in our bathroom. It was disgusting. We found out after we used the towels. Poor housekeeping.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Ramada Plaza Anaheim - You get what you paid for
Summary: Though hotel advertises as 4 start. Its just a 2 1/2 star. Overall room is fine with comfortable beds. But other than that everything is as expected in any 2-3 star hotel. Wifi justn't work. We had to call 10 times so that they reset router. There are better hotels around for better price.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was nice, beds were comfy and hotel staff was very polite and helpful. The location is convenient enough to Disneyland as well. I will stay here again and give the recommendation to my friends. I recently stayed at the Ramada Plaza in Dayton Ohio and it was an absolute nightmare, so I have to admit I was leery of staying at another Ramada but I was pleasantly surprised.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed there two nights, to start off, the drapes were broken. We were in a handicap room. So it was good. They told us about the breakfast lunch and dinner buffet. We tried the breakfast buffet 2 times. Both times they were late on opening by 20 minutes. Then the pancakes were cold, the eggs and potatoes were like day old. They were cold as well. The coffee wasn't done even after we got done eating. We had to settle for basically a cold breakfast. So we didn't even try the lunch r dinner after 2 bad experiences.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Hitel with bed bugs and room heater was not working
Summary: We found bed bug in the room and the heater in the room was not working. The staff was friendly but rooms were horrible. I would not believe Ramada is part of Wyndham.
Manager Response: Dear 985Guest  Thank you for staying at Ramada Plaza and for taking the time to post your review. I personally spoke with you over the phone days after you checked out to let us know about the bed bug. It was immediately reported and we had Eco-lab inspect the room. The results came out negative; no sign of bedbugs. Sometimes when guest are traveling they obtain bedbugs from their travels. As for the heater  I do apologize for not functioning, if reported, we would of immediately fixed the issue or moved you to another room.  We greatly appreciate your comments and feedback and hope you give us another chance in the near future.

Summary: I I wasn't thrilled to find stained bed sheet and duvet. There was hair in bathroom sink which didn't belong to me and coffee pot poured out coffee grounds instead of tea I was making. No breakfast or shop in hotel,but several within walking distance   Close to Disney!
Manager Response: Dear Rita W  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to write a review. I'm sorry for the hair you found on the sink, and as far as the coffee maker, did you ask front desk to switch it for you? We actually do have breakfast in the restaurant that's in our lobby. It is not included but it is served every morning from 6:30AM to 10:30AM, we tried to informed our guest upon checking in about the breakfast, but I apologized if we didn't. Once again thank you for your comments which we will use to improve our service.

Summary: Checked out today after a four night stay. A friend and I were recommended this hotel by a family friend who visits Disneyland frequently and always stays at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim! We had a great experience. We arrived ahead of schedule and were able to check into the room early, check in was fast and easy. The parking feels safe and is complimentary, it also has two elevators at opposite ends of the hallways which is convenient. The first day we went to Disneyland we used the shuttle that stops outside but we ended up walking back because the bus was full and we didn't want to wait. It was a 12 minute walk down Harbor back to the hotel. We stopped for pizza at the place next to the hotel which was great. There's a CVS at the corner and the hotel is on Katella near a few
Manager Response: Dear MEJ2010  Thank you so much for staying with us and for such nice review. We are glad to hear that you are satisfied with our guest services and the location. Thank you for choosing to stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel when visiting Disneyland in the future.

Summary: Front desk was great, very polite. They greeted us every morning and night as we came back from Disneyland. Our room as ready for check in when we got there a little early and they accomadated us very quickly.
Manager Response: Dear Charles P  Thank you for choosing to stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We are delighted to hear you were able to obtain points through Wyndham rewards program. We hope to see you back in the near future, and please recommend us to your friends and family.

Summary Heading: Our Stay at Ramada Plaza Anaheim.
Summary: Overall it was clean - both the room and the office area, and convenient to Disneyland.  They applied our Wyndham Rewards Points with no problem for two rooms.  We felt parking our car was adequate and secure.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room excellent staff even better, one of the best experiences I have had in any hotel. Highly recommend this place. covienent to Disney you can walk but a cab ride is only 7 Dollars well worth it.
Manager Response: Dear DONALD W  We truly appreciate your kind review. We are thrill to hear that you had an awesome experience and that you would recommend Ramada Plaza Hotel. We hope to see you back soon. Thank you for thanking the time to post your review.

Summary: Very nice and clean hotel. Walls and ceilings are thin.  Could hear every foot step in room above us. American breakfast in lobby restaurant cold and not good.  Easy walk to great restaurants and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear happyI6468MG  We truly appreciate you taking time out of your day to share a review of your recent stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel, your feedback is very important to us. We will continue to improve in areas where improvement is needed. Once again, thank you for your comments and we look forward to hosting you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great hotel at a decent price!
Summary: The room we stayed in was great! Nice and comfy. Walking distance to get to Disneyland. Walgreens and 7-11 right across the street. Wifi is strong as well which is always a plus in my book! It even has a gym! Other place charge more just because Disneyland is just across the street. If you dont mind walking 5-10 minutes to get to the park then this hotel is right for you!
Manager Response: Hi akumaken2004  We are so happy to read that your recent visit to Ramada Plaza Hotel was enjoyable. Thank you for mentioning that Ramada Plaza Hotel is walking distance to the parks. We take pride in providing great service and making our guest feel welcome. We hope to see you again soon in the near future.

Summary: Great location, walking distance to either entrance to the park which I like since it can get backed up at the main entrance at times, but being able to enter by the back side/downtown disney  from katella is good too. Clean lobby, and room and  friendly staff.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Ozzie was the person I remembered the most during my 3 night stay here. He was very cheerful & a pleasure to speak to as I was checking out etc. Room service was great & very organized. The only reason I am Givin 4 stars instead of 5 is the first night my fiancé & I arrived the party next door to us was ridiculously loud until almost 4am. We were exhausted. All we heard all night was cursing, loud talking, for hours upon hours it was quite frustrating seeing how we had just drove from Las Vegas and we wanted to ask to change rooms but we're just too tired to get out of bed. We had to wake up early the following morning. Granted we should have called front desk and asked to be moved or asked for security. But even when I asked the party to please keep quiet they stopped for 5mins
Manager Response: Dear ARiSNiCKERz   We truly appreciate you taking time out of your day to share a review of your recent stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel. I just want to apologized for your first night stay, I really wish you would of called the front desk for us to immediately solve the noise coming from the room next door. We strive to provide to our guest a great experience and a great stay, and we hope you stay with us again when visiting Anaheim in the future. Once again thank you for your feedback.

Summary: Easy to find the place and accessible to Shuttle bus going to Disney, secured parking lot, people in the registration desk are pleasant and helpful, there's a restaurant close by and other employees greets you with a smile
Manager Response: Hi evangelineo621  We are so happy to read that your recent visit to Ramada Plaza Hotel was enjoyable. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary: Stayed here for a long weekend trip to Disney for a RunDisney event.  Great location, easy walk to Disney or take the shuttle. Really great staff and amenities , dining are close by.  Good breakfast buffet next door.  Would definitely stay here again
Manager Response: Dear jaypE9344TN   Thank you so much for taking the time to post a kind and detail review. We hope you choose us again on your next visit to Disney for another exceptional stay.

Summary Heading: First time trip to Disney Land, and this hotel was a great...
Summary: First time trip to Disney Land, and this hotel was a great location. Two issues though were that there was nothing offered in the morning  for food, and they use square pillows which was a weird to transition to and caused issues falling asleep on the first night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Rooms were large and clean  Requested connecting rooms and that was arranged upon arrival.  Convenient to buy the bus passes at the front desk   Easy free parking, good location with nice restaurants within easy walking distance
Manager Response: none

Summary: It's a nice hotel, clean and comfortable with friendly staff and a great location close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear JMBR28  Thank you so much for you nice review! I am glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary: We found the facilities to be clean and well kept, despite the obvious high traffic area near the Disneyland Parks. The staff were friendly, helpful and professional. The cleaning staff even added a personal touch when they remade the beds, they tucked in our kids' teddy bears as though they would greet us when we returned to the room. It was cute for us as parents and the kids noticed immediately.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent value!  Close to Disneyland and very friendly staff
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. It was a nice walk to Disneyland and the rooms were very clean.  The only criticism I really have is the water pressure of the shower was very low.  I ended up having to use the bath spout to get all of the conditioner out of my hair.   But for the price it is excellent and close to a lot of dining.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a good hotel if you want to be close to Disneyland California/Disneyland,  some shops available, good restaurants all within walking distance, nice rooms and services.
Manager Response: Hi Valerie C  We truly appreciate you taking time out of your day to share a review of your recent stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel.  We look forward to hosting you again in the future.

Summary Heading: It's OK for a 1 night stay.
Summary: The negatives: I was not impressed with the bed or the pillows. When I woke up in the morning my neck, back and hips were hurting.  The next morning at 6 a.m. I was woken up by kids. Sounds like they were jumping off the beds above us.  I also thought it was a little pricey and it did not include breakfast.   The positives:  Close proximity to Disneyland and the Garden Walk.  I also liked that the elevator went down to the parking garage...very convenient.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Booked through an agent, thought there was a continental breakfast included but was told it was $10 pp when we went in to eat. Bathtub tap did not stop dripping. Housekeeping walked in to do room even though we had the DND sign out, and we were sleeping.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The Ramada Plaza was quite adequate for our short 2-night stay.  Clean, spacious, refridge, hair dryer, hot water, coffee maker all made for a good stay.  We were only in the room from about 9 p.m. to morning as our primary reason was to be at Disneyland.  The location to the park was great and easily walkable.
Manager Response: Dear 680beverlyc  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent experience at the Ramada Plaza Hotel. I am happy that you enjoyed our close proximity to Disneyland and our clean rooms. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Anaheim

Summary Heading: location is in between Diseny Land and Restaurant...
Summary: location is in between Diseny Land and Restaurant (Excellent) decoration is not so good (old) but the room was big.
Manager Response: Dear khaleda471  We truly appreciate you taking time out of your day to share a review of your recent stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel. Our rooms are specious and our housekeeping staff do their very best to keep them clean. We will renovate soon so we hope you experience our newer modern property in the near future.

Summary: Lobby was nice. Room was very standard and could have used some updating and better decor. But it was clean. The staff was friendly. Parking was easy. Not far of a walk to Disneyland and close to Anaheim City Walk.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Bed was extremely comfortable.  It was the first good night sleep in awhile.  Front desk was nice and helpful for some activities in the area.  It was next door to multiple Resturaunts and of course Disneyland
Manager Response: Hi jn2790  We are so happy to read that your recent visit to Ramada Plaza Hotel was enjoyable. Thank you for mentioning that Ramada Plaza Hotel is walking distance to restaurants and Disneyland parks. We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: I was upset when I went to check in to find out that this hotel no longer offers there free breakfast. This has been a plus since you didn't have to find a place to eat when you had tours planned. The desk did say that they still offer it but you know have pay for it. My wife and I did luck out to find a pizza place, like a few min. walk, that offered a good breakfast. They offered a good selection for a good price. As a matter of fact it was enough that my wife and I split it. So we only had to order one. The room is fine. Stayed on the fourth floor. Another bummer was we wanted a two day hopper ticket for Disney. They had a paper saying that they offer this, but found out what the paper said and what they offer was two different things. So we got the tickets from the Ramada
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have stayed at the Ramada Plaza before and choose to stay again because of the convenience and value of the hotel. There are many comparable hotels located close to Disneyland but this hotel is extremely reasonable for the price. The price includes parking and Internet which other hotels charge extra for. The staff is always helpful, cheerful and welcoming. Our room was cleaned daily and  towels/toiletries restocked.  The Internet was a bit unreliable and slow but we weren't on vacation to use technology!  Overall, we'd stay here again and again! Word has it that this hotel will be going through a renovation in the near future :)
Manager Response: Dear 781tiffanyg  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a kind review. I was very pleased to read that you enjoyed  your stay and that our staff was helpful as always, as we take pride in providing great service and making our guest feel welcome. We hope to see you again soon in the near future.

Summary Heading: Decent hotel but the walls are too thin.
Summary: I stayed here with my family for 3 nights.We usually do our research on trip advisor before booking but it was a last minute booking and they were one of the few hotels within our budget that had rooms available.The rooms were decent but the carpets were filthy.There were several dark stains on the carpet which did not make for a good first impression when entering our room.The staff was great when trying to accommodate guests.We had to ask to be moved to a different room after the first night because we were awakened at 5:00 a.m. by a child crying in the adjoining room.The second night we could hear what sounded like a herd of elephants running back and forth in the room above us.The pros:The hotel is about a 15-20 minute walk to Disneyland and the ART bus stops conveniently in
Manager Response: none

Summary: Thank you for the great stay. I was very unsure after reading other reviews, but so glad I realized that it's just other peoples hear say.  The front desk service was beyond the call of duty and was very clean and secure. Thank you again
Manager Response: Dear Christine C  Thank you for giving us a chance, It is always a pleasure to hear such favorable feedback. Thank you for highlighting our friendly service, clean rooms. We look forward to seeing you again!.

Summary Heading: The WiFi didn't work. We had to leave the building due to...
Summary: The WiFi didn't work. We had to leave the building due to water problems and fire alarm going off. My kids were in the pool and wet. Had to sit in the car. The hotel was close to Disney and clean. The beds were comfortable. The food was just ok.
Manager Response: Dear O7851ZLandreap  Thank you taking the time to share your feedback with us. It is unfortunate you had to wait in the car while we took control of the situation, but it was for everybody's safety. This was a one time occurrence and we had to comply with the fire department. We truly appreciate your feedback and will continue to improve. We hope to see you again during your next visit to Disneyland.

Summary: The hotel is in a great location. Also, the underground free parking is very convenient. As others have mentioned...the rooms are very tired. Ok...I understand that it's due for a re- furb ...but it should be well maintained until then. The curtains would not close over and .the beds and pillows were uncomfortable and the room cleaning was hit and miss. The empty cups were not cleared and the carpet was very dirty and furniture very dusty. There was candy along the base of the bed...wonder how long it had been there. The restaurant served good Indian food, with very indifferent service. Bill brought the instant the desert was served...without so much as a goodnight once tip received. It's ok if you want to be in walking distance to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear John O  We appreciate your time in writing this review.We value your feedback as they enable us to further improve the quality and services we offer. We will continue to improve and we hope that you will give us another chance to provide you with an exceptional stay in the future.

Summary Heading: Great Location, Beautiful Lobby, Decent Room.
Summary: We wanted 1 room that could sleep 6 (3 adults, 1 teen and 2 under 5's) for 2 nights. Ramada Plaza was one of the few left with large rooms and it is in easy walking distance of Disney. Only one complaint was that there was a long tear in the carpet near the window. Otherwise the room was clean and well appointed and exactly what I expected at that price.
Manager Response: Hi WRGantes  Thank you so much for your review of our hotel. We know you have many choices when it comes to lodging and we hope you will continue to choose Ramada Plaza Hotel when visiting Anaheim.

Summary: Hotel staff was great. Parking is underground and safe. We walked to downtown Disney and Disneyland on separate occasions. It took us about 10-15 minutes (with red lights) to entrance of Disneyland. Overall great experience and plenty of restaurants near hotel.
Manager Response: Dear rektyayo  Thank you so much for you nice review! I am glad to hear you enjoyed our hotel. We look forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: It was very nice and clean room I had during my 7 nights...
Summary: It was very nice and clean room I had during my 7 nights stay.  The front desk staff were very kind and willing to help you with big smile.
Manager Response: Dear 872jaec  Thank you for your review, 872jaec. I'm glad you enjoyed your stay with us.We hope to you come and visit again soon!

Summary: The front staff friendly and welcoming . The room nice and clean crisp. Close walking distance to Disneyland resort , the restaurant below has great breakfast buffet. This is a new treasure for me and family in the resort area.
Manager Response: Dear erniemadera  Thank you so much for taking the time to post a kind review. I was very pleased to read that  you enjoyed the breakfast and that you have found the Ramada Plaza Hotel to be a destination for your family. We look forward to seeing you back here soon

Summary Heading: Good for family visiting Disney Land on a budget
Summary: First the slight cons -Slightly dated inside (but clean), don't expect much from the pool and we didn't bother with the in-house restaurant.  Now the good - very accommodating and pleasant staff, spacious rooms, competitively priced and around the corner from Disney Land. Free parking and internet was good.  We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear rossk803  We truly appreciate you taking time out of your day to share a review of your recent stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We are delighted to read that our property was accommodating  and spacious. We look forward to hosting you again in the future.

Summary: We were very pleased with our choice in hotels. The mini suite was so nice. The extra space/larger room with a microwave and fridge made the stay much more enjoyable. We would leave for the day and when we returned everything was clean and tidy, beds made, and bathroom cleaned and fresh towels stocked. Those who greeted us at the front desk were always smiling and very helpful. A very good experience ! The only thing we missed was a continental breakfast. That would have made the whole experience perfect....
Manager Response: Dear 504lanaw  Thank you for taking the time to write a detailed review of your stay. I'm glad you enjoyed the amenities and the room. We hope you come back and stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel.

Summary: Hotel was very nice, easy to deal with. Rooms were clean. The beds were very comfortable, the pillows could use a little diversity. All of our pillows were very thick causing some uncomfortable neck positions. I would like to see a combination of thick and thin pillows, maybe 2 of each on both beds. This way it will accommodate any type of sleeping preferences. Over all very nice place to stay, staff was great, walking distance to both Disneyland and other restaurants. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear bhuckaby  We are so happy to read that your recent visit to Ramada Plaza Hotel was enjoyable.It thrills us to read that you were pleased with our staff and the close proximity to the parks.We appreciate your feedback on our pillows and we will make sure to share your comments to  management. We hope to welcome you back in the near future.

Summary: First off I don't like this review where I have to write something. This should be optional. It was a nice place the staff were very friendly and helpful. Your breakfast not so good, next door has a better one.
Manager Response: Hi 847starlet  Thank you very much for sharing your feedback with us. We aim to provide the best possible service to our guest, that being said we hope that you will consider allowing us another opportunity to exceed your expectations.

Summary: We had a pretty good stay.  This hotel has a beautiful lobby.  The rooms are nothing fancy, but we were just looking for a place to stay while we visited Disneyland for a couple of days.  It was a perfect locations for us with restaurants nearby.  The one disappointing thing was that on the site I booked it said there was a complimentary breakfast.  There isn't.    They do have a restaurant onsite that has a very expensive breakfast buffet, but I would not eat there.  It is horrible!  Yuck!
Manager Response: Hi Jaclyn P  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent experience at the Ramada Plaza Hotel. As you mention in your comments, breakfast is no longer included but it is still being served in our lobby restaurant. We appreciate your comments and we will share them with the restaurant's management to improve the quality and service for our guest. We hope you give us another chance as we will eagerly await our next opportunity to host you!

Summary: The staff was very kind and welcoming. Room and facility was clean and nice. We'll stay here again for sure! It was located super close to Disneyland and the buffet breakfast was VERY reasonable. Parking garage was spacious (I drive a large truck) and it felt safe and secure.
Manager Response: Dear gnelson1975  Thank you for the kind words about our hotel. We are in a ideal location, with restaurants near by and of course just 10-12 minute walk to the Disneyland parks. We are happy to know that you will stay with us when you visit Anaheim again. Thank you once again.

Summary Heading: Really good hotel with just a couple of hiccups
Summary: My sister and I just stayed at the Ramada Plaza in Anaheim while on a Disneyland vacation.  The hotel itself is very nice, as were the front desk staff.  Very friendly, very helpful and approachable  They always welcomed us back to the hotel and wished us a good day when we were leaving.  The room was far bigger than I had expected, which was nice.  Beds were very comfortable, everything was nice and clean and well maintained.  The shower was great.  Consistent water temperature, and a decent shower head that wasn't just a wide ring of trickling water.  Non-slip surface in the bathtub, and the bathroom itself was spacious and bright.  The very minor cons were noise levels, a big old bug in the shower (thankfully small enough that we could just wash it down the drain), and the
Manager Response: Dear Heather B  Thank you for choosing to stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel and for taking the time to write a review. We are very pleased you enjoyed your stay and appreciate your comments and compliments. We hope we will see you again soon.

Summary: The hotel staff were extremely friendly and very efficient. The room was clean and the beds are very comfortable. We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear 301julieannc   Thank you for a great review! We strive to provide to our guest a great experience and a great stay.  We look forward to welcoming you back the next time you visit Anaheim.

Summary: I absolutely loved everything about the hotel except the noise factor. I could hear footsteps and the people talking in the rooms on both sides. Other than that, it is a fantastic hotel in every other way.  Free parking. Great air conditioning. I would stay there again as long as I bring a fan and stay on the 4th floor.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: We were very pleased with the hotel, we have stayed at...
Summary: We were very pleased with the hotel, we have stayed at hotels closer to the gate but were more dated and not as nice. We found that although we had to walk a but further the hotel was clean, staff helpful and decor to be contemporary and done reasonably well. We ordered takeout from the Indian restaurant which was one of the best Indian restaurants we have eaten from and we have tried many. The food was extremely flavourful and of good value.
Manager Response: none

Summary: All of the staff were pleasant and helpful. They made us feel welcome and special. The room was large and the bed was very comfortable. Disneyland was a fairly easy walk. but the ART bus stop is right in front of the hotel. There are many places to eat near by.  I really have nothing to complain about. I look forward to staying here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good budget accommodations for visiting Disneyland. Rooms are quiet and nice. The only issue I had was some pretty worn down bathroom fixtures in our shower. I would stay here again if they have a better price than the Ramada Maingate. Its not always the case though.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a good Disney area hotel, updated, clean and good service. Parking and Internet included in room rate. 100 yards from Garden Walk and about 1.5 miles from DL enterance. Overall a good value for the area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The location was great and the free parking was great. Service was pretty good. They were nice and friendly. However, the rooms were poor. Tile was old and broken. The shower didn't even have matching tile. You could tell the rooms were old and not updated. Just patched together. Holes in carpet. Floor tiles broken. Doorways painted over too many times to count. Wear and tear on the rooms was obvious. The fan didn't work, either. Temperature controls were rudimentary. I'd stay farther from the park and get better quality accommodations. Beds and pillows were VERY uncomfortable. Not recommended unless the only thing you care about is a short walk to disneyland. Otherwise, stay elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear L6375SHmattheww  Thank you for taking the time to post your comments. We are happy to announce that we will be renovating our hotel soon. I assure you we are doing our best every day to constantly improve our service level. We hope for you to visit us again and with our new improved property in the near future. Once again thank you for staying at Ramada Plaza Hotel and for your review.

Summary Heading: Uncomfortable bed. Width of a queen but short like a full...
Summary: Uncomfortable bed. Width of a queen but short like a full size. No working exhaust fan. Safe was not bolted down, therefore useless.
Manager Response: Dear davidrN298GG  We appreciate you taking the time to post your review. I assure you that our queen beds are queen size. I wish you would of communicated with us the issues with the fan and the fact that the safe was not bolted so we could of taken care of the problem.  Your satisfaction is important to us and we try hard to make sure all of our guests have a rewarding experience at our hotel. Thank you for staying with us and we hope that you would consider staying with us again in order to show our improvements.

Summary Heading: Proximity to Disney made the hotel worth staying
Summary: The room was a decent size, but the bathrooms were very small.  The bathrooms especially seemed very run down and not well maintained.  The housekeeping was hit and miss with emptying garbages and restocking cups, etc.   For the price and proximity to Disney it was ok.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: I only interacted with someone 3 times. Check in, to get my...
Summary: I only interacted with someone 3 times. Check in, to get my room changed because they put my husband and I in a two bed room. They ran out of single bed rooms so we got stuck in a wheelchair accessible room. There were no other measures taken. And the last time was check out.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Parking was excellent and the staff were great. The room was satisfactory. I made use of the pool and spa and found both clean and very satisfactory. For an older facility this hotel was maintained very well.
Manager Response: Dear edwardsY3030FH  Thank you for taking the time to post your review. We are happy to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and we hope to see you again soon

Summary: Close to Disney land, very clean with great staff, the daycore is a little dated but after theam parking all day u just need a swim and a sleep.  Our deal was great value for moneHiy
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was clean, safe, family friendly, and within 10 min walking distance from the parks! The staff was friendly, helpful, and very prompt if we needed something. We would highly recommend staying at this hotel. I know, given the opportunity, we will stay there again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We had an amazing trip! Ozzie at the desk was phenomenal, and everyone was very friendly and helpful. We got directions to whale watching, we had the most comfortable and gorgeous room, and the pool was really quite nice. It was a short walk or very cheap and quick bus to disney. I would certainly stay again.  I also liked that we had a microwave and fridge, which meant I could snack before the races and after
Manager Response: Hi KrystanO  Thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza hotel for your marathon weekend stay. We are extremely glad to hear that you enjoyed your stay and that our staff was friendly as always. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: Rooms were decent. Basic needs met. Beds were pretty comfy. The coffee was absolute garbage. I couldn't force it down. Nice to have a refrigerator in the room. We usually have to bring a cooler so that was nice. The water pressure though for the showers was awful. So wash your hair before you stay here. The rest was pretty decent. Staff was very nice and pleasant.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good value stay walk to Disneyland
Summary: Hotel was nice, well priced and we walked to Disneyland each day which is not far away. Restaurants and convenience stores are close by. Staff were very friendly and keen to do anything to help. We're started in the Marriott near the front gate of Disneyland last year and it didn't do a lot for us. Staying here was a similar experience and saved us heaps.
Manager Response: Dear ally c  Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. As you mention, our location is quite convenient because of all the restaurants surrounding us and the quick 10-12 minute walk to the park.  We greatly appreciate your comments and compliments and hope to see you again soon.

Summary: Our "go to" hotel was booked for this trip, so I had to find another one. I looked at specials that the Ramada was running and chose it. What a find! It was a Fantastic room and helpful staff. Will be back!
Manager Response: Dear gkbaum  Thank you for your valuable feedback on your recent stay. I am extremely pleased we exceeded your expectations. We cant wait for your return to Ramada Plaza Hotel.

Summary: The room was nice and roomy, we did have to have room service come up and get us new linens for the pull out because they had been used and never changed. The pull out was very uncomfortable. But service was good and they were very friendly.. Clean comfortable Hotel
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were very happy with this hotel not only is it only a 10min walk to Disneyland but there were plenty of restaurants and a CVS across the street (so handy if you forget something)  I also really enjoyed how clean the rooms were.  Although my husband and daughter did not have an interest in the hot tub and sauna it was so easy to sneak down after they went to bed to take a nice soak after a long day of standing and walking. (it was also nice because it was so quite)  Plus they had a laundry room which was great so we could pack less.
Manager Response: Dear S726HWrichardd  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent experience at the Ramada Plaza Hotel. I am happy that you enjoyed our close proximity to Disneyland and our clean rooms. We look forward to welcoming you back on your next visit to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary Heading: great place to stay for Disneyland.
Summary: We chose this hotel as they were able to accommodate 6 in a room which our family needed. Rooms were nice, clean, and quiet.  There is a pizza place and Subway restaurant next door, and down the block sit down restaurants (PF Changs, Cheesecake Factory, California Pizza Kitchen). We used the A.R.T. Transportation to and from Disneyland, and while they stop right in front of the hotel, we found it more convenient to walk to the corner nearby where almost all the shuttles stopped. Room has a mini fridge and microwave we utilized. There is a CVS at the corner where we could grab drinks and snacks to keep in the room!        Only 2 minor disappointments this trip- one was that there is no continental breakfast (when we stayed 5 years ago there was a free hot breakfast buffet),
Manager Response: none

Summary: We have a great experience at this hotel. We drove throughout the night from Arizona arrived and was able to check in early to rest before we went to Disneyland. Service was great! Room was clean and definitely would recommend this hotel to anyone.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The rooms where quite nice,they were big enough for my family of 4 plus infant.They were clean and tidy,the beds were comfortable, and the view from our room at night was great(we could see the fire works from disneyland).the pool was handy after a day at disney,the people were friendly around the pool area(it was nice to meet other families from other countries).The staff were helpful and polite.One downer was the restaurant,I payed $50 dollars for breakfast ,it was terrible, the milk was off,the glasses were dirty,the pancakes seemed to be there for days, do yourself a favor dont eat there.Good walking distance to the parks,the walk home though seemed a bit longer.Overall had a great time.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for 3 nights due to the location to Disney. Easy to find, smooth check in and all staff at reception were friendly and helpful. Disney parks 15 mins walk away which was perfect to walk, you can catch a shuttle if preferred. We went for breakfast at the hotel Indigo next door which was convenient and fine. We did try the breakfast in the on site restaurant but we found the Buffet a little lacking.  Would recommend going to the ihop opposite entrance to Disney. hotel is also Great positioning to go down to Newport Beach area.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean hotel with underground parking. Friendly staff and very helpful. They let my husband keep his scooter downstairs and charged it each night for him. The sofa sleepers need updated but the beds were newer and had new comfortable, thick mattresses. It was a short walk to Disney entrance. For those of you who know the area it is across from Radiator Springs in CA adventure. The downfall was that it did not come with free breakfast this making the price a little higher than we normally pay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed there on a business trip.  Within walking distance to Anaheim convention center, shopping, and restaurants.  Pros:  Reasonable price, free internet, free parking, friendly staff, clean, comfortable beds, free bottled water at the front desk.  Cons: Very slow internet (even at off-hours), breakfast buffet not free and not very good.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Clean and close to the park
Summary: We only stayed one night but thought it was define. Bathroom was clean, room was a decent size and the beds were comfy. Walk was maybe ten minutes at a brisk pace (we didn't have kids with us). Tried the little Mexican place at the corner and it was cheap and really good. I would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is our 3rd time staying at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, but this time we were disappointed in our stay.  We have come prior in 2012 and 2013 with our kids and it was a perfect location that met our needs, so when we did a couple trip last week, we just immediately booked Ramada Plaza Anaheim without hesitation. First off we checked in on a Thursday and discovered the breakfast buffet was no longer included in our stay.  This took in affect in January 2015.  We were so bummed, but it was our fault we didn't read that when we booked and just assumed it was included.  Thank goodness we didn't have the kids with us or this would have been nightmare as the breakfast buffet makes it easier for us to feed the kids before heading to disneyland without having to figure out what to eat
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for a Disney Visit
Summary: We wanted a "reasonable" priced Hotel that was close to the Park. I liked the fact that there was free parking available and there was NO resort fee. The room was clean and the staff was super friendly. Several times we returned to the room after 1 to rest up before returning to Disney and found the room had not been cleaned yet. After calling Housekeeping the were willing to postpone cleaning until 3:30 or so. The room had a small microwave and refrigerator that we found to be very useful. The Hotel is only 1/2 mile from the park so the ARTS pass is not really necessary. I also liked the fact that we could adjust the thermostat to below 60 at night (we like to sleep cool) and the room would actually cool. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I requested a taxi at the front desk, 29 minutes went by checked with front desk another 15 minutes asked again finally asked the desk to call again and was told some one else was picked up??? Came back to the hotel and the AC had been turned off making the room very hot. No coffee replaced and the towels not serviced. Mattress had a "dip" in it.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The front staff was awesome!! They were all very sweet and greeted both coming into and going out of the hotel.  The staff both day and night were very attentive and kind to my children, which is important to me. The room was clean and ready when we arrived. The hall had a musty smell but it did not venture into our room so it was of no consequence to me. Beds were comfortable and staff was great. We were more impressed with the hospitality of the hotel than our experience with Disneyland. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: THERE'S A LOT OF BETTER CHOICES THAN HERE
Summary: Thought this place would be ok for a weekend trip to Disneyland but.......not so much.  The hallway of our floor smelled nasty.  Maybe some plumbing issue had damaged the carpet?  But gross nonetheless.   Rooms are very tired and worn and in need of a makeover.   There are a lot of new hotels being built in the area and a lot of quality existing ones.  Choose one of those.......
Manager Response: none

Summary: We recently stayed at Ramada Plaza Anaheim hotel. We arrived late at night and asked for a store to buy water. They supplied us 4 water bottles and cookies for the kids. CVS is right up front. Secure parking, great staff at front desk. We kept a picture of their sign outside and will stay there next time. We were delighted to stay there.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great time was everything we wanted
Summary: It is in a great location, the room we had we quite and apart form he joining room door it was heaven. Ample room and great beds. The only gripe was the bathroom tiles and shower was not good pressure due to the selection tap leaking to bath outlet. will stay here again. the staff are the best for helping out and very friendly. Teh inernet comes and goes. thanks guys
Manager Response: none

Summary: The front desk staff were so welcoming, kind & helpful.  Every time we entered the Hotel going to and from we were greeted with smiles and kindness, our room was perfect and easy access to parking & to the pool & the shuttle to Disneyland picked up & dropped us off right in front of the Ramada.  We were sorry that we didn't get to try the food @ the Hotel Restaurant due to our busy schedule.  I recommend this wonderful hotel to anyone that wants a clean & respectful place to stay for vacation or business.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nice place to stay. Clean and confortable. Real walking distance from the parks. 10 minutes are enough to get there. You have a 7-eleven and a big CVS on your way to the parks, 2 minutes away from the hotel. CVS is a mini mart, very convenient. Free Wi-fi is only for 2 or 3 devices but depends on where you are located in the hotel the connections keeps disconecting every 5 minutes. At lobby works perfect but once you get to your room if it's far, you are out. About internet limited and poor service, not near my expectation.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed 10 nights walking distance to DL 5-10mins walk breakfast at the ghandi was thrown in for free we only ate there once as it wasnt to our taste we had to change rooms 3 times due to air con issues but staff were very accommodating......
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is good, about 10 min walk to Disneyland. Reception staff are courteous and helpful. Breakfast not included any more. Close to restaurants eg Bubba Gump and Cheesecake Factory. Affordable family accommodation.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We were greeted almost every time we entered the hotel.  It was close to many places to eat and the rooms were cozy.we were very disappointed to learn there was no continental breakfast.  Even just a muffin and some milk would be great.  Otherwise, awesome time!
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was clean and the employees were helpful and nice. The only problem I had and it's only a minor issue is the plumbing. Had to flush twice for the toilet for it to actually flush all the way thru. Other than that I had a great stay at the hotel. Have enough towels for everyone in the room. It was clean and modern.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I stay in Anaheim at least once a month and go to Disneyland. I have stayed in several hotels in the area, and this one is awesome! The bed was soft and comfy, like sleeping on a cloud. The room was clean and quiet. It had all the amenities that you could need, including flat screen tv, microwave, frig, and a good ac unit. Even the sitting chair in the room was really nice! We fully enjoyed staying at the Ramada Plaza and would do it again!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Was a pleasant stay at the Ramada. Friendly staff and easy to find parking and room accommodations. Fair prices especially since we are down the street from Disney land. Room was clean and nice to relax in. Quick room service when needed. Diner closes early but it was overall a nice stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was clean and had a newer flat screen tv. Only complaint I had was that the shower had very low water pressure.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel is in a good location.  The rooms are needing some upgrades and fixes but they are clean and quiet.  The halls and elevator aren't air conditioned so they can get stuffy.  The staff is the best.  I arranged to move to a different room and Edna told me she would have it taken care of.  She did it personally so it would be done correctly.  Great service.  I can't say enough about that.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good location, Great staff, but the only thing i didnt like was the rooms and hallway were super outdated and they didnt put bags in the trashes which wasnt cool. Felt creepy and not too relaxing. I would suggest a upgrade and would be perfect!!
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Yet another Fantastic stay ❤ Our 'go-to' Hotel
Summary: So ~ this is our Family's 3rd stay at the Ramada Plaza Hotel, in the past 4 years, & for good reason!  From the Staff: management to front desk clerks to housekeeping to maintenance workers ~ absolutely Fantastic service. They truly go above & beyond to make your stay a Welcome one.  For a place to 'lay your head' while busy busy busy at the Parks, may I say that the beds are SO comfortable, prefer to never leave! Everything is clean & bright. From the lobby, the hallways, the pool, to the rooms themselves. What a joy & a pleasure to come 'home' to after a day at Disneyland, our home away from home!  Daily housekeeping, sparkly white, clean & soft towels, flatscreen tv, free internet, free parking, onsite laundry,pool & hot tub, in-room fridge *with freezer, microwave, coffee
Manager Response: none

Summary: This hotel was a short walk from the Disney parks 10-15 minutes, our room was clean and quiet, the staff was great we were able to check in early thanks to Ozzie he was very helpful. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff is very friendly and the hotel is clean.  The room are very large and comfortable.  It is walking distance to the Convention Center and has a shuttle to Disneyland.  I was there at a conference and it was nice to be able to walk to the Convention Center and not have to fight for parking.  There is no breakfast, just coffee but it does have a restaurant and bar.  It has secure underground parking and close to other restaurants and shops.    The problem is that the fixtures are worn out and not mounted properly.  The faucet and the toilet tank are sideways and the toilet ran almost all the time, and in So Cal where there is a water shortage that is not good....  The bathtub fixture was coming apart too, so the overall look ended up being not well kept by the maintenance
Manager Response: none

Summary: Wifi not working in room, staff tried to fix; couldn't had to change rooms, which solved problem.  Indian restaurant in the hotel had a buffet, $10 per person, not too much variety of food, offered more at other hotels  continental breakfasts; ALL FOOD WAS COLD; HAD TO HAVE STAFF HEAT IN MW; found out later that even at 6am food was cold, and that some at reunion were comped for meal. Not happy about this restaurant and really is a black eye for Ramada and Wyndham,
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was excellent. Personnel were very professional and helpful. It's hard to find one that works well for my husband's wheelchair. Normally we don't book a handicapped room because they have roll-in showers. He needs a tub. Most standard rooms don't have a wide bathroom door and room to maneuver. We had both. Very clean and had all the amenities. We were within walk/roll distance to Disneyland. The smell from the Indian Restaurant in the lobby was heavenly. We will be back!  Booking through Trip Advisor did not allow Wyndham Rewards... Darn.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was very clean and well stocked, everything worked, beds were comfy.  I didn't get to avail myself of the restaurant, bar or pool downstairs but atmosphere looked inviting.  Hotel in Good location near good restaurants, etc.
Manager Response: Dear Y4002RBmichellet  Thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza for your class reunion, It was great having you guys as our guest. We appreciate the review and hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary Heading: My suggestion would be to put families with children on the...
Summary: My suggestion would be to put families with children on the lower floors.  My husband was awoken each morning earlier than anticipated by "thundering" footsteps from above our room.  Other than this the stay was terrific.
Manager Response: Dear 162katherinee  We appreciate the review you recently posted from your stay with us.  It was very nice to hear you enjoyed your stay. I do apologize on behalf of our staff for not providing a quieter room. I'm unaware if you made a request to move or made a complaint about the noise level from other rooms. We would of certainly done something to fix the problem. For future reference, because we are a Hotel close to Disney, we have lots of families staying with us, request a room on the top floor  so there is nobody above you.  We pride ourselves on our guest service, so thank you for mentioning this in your review. We hope to see you again in the near future.

Summary: We have stayed in this hotel for the past 7 years and have always enjoyed our stay.  The proximity to Disneyland and other venues is super convenient. Our favorite hotel desk manager, Andres, always makes us feel welcome and special like VIP'S!  Thank you Andy!! :-)
Manager Response: Hello Vanessa R  We are thrill to have you stay with us every time you visit Disney/Anaheim. Thank you so much for you kind review. We will see you back soon...

Summary: Nice, bed comfortable, room clean, staff friendly Not good dining facility, but restaurants within walking distance        Close to Disneyland and California adventure parks.                                        I'd stay there again.                                                          Helpful staff
Manager Response: none

Summary: The staff was very friend and helpful. The room was ready when we got there, didn't have to wait for them to finish cleaning it. Parking was free and easy. Our room was nice and clean. Super comfy bed and pillows. Slept like a baby. I only heard our neighbors once and even then I could barely hear them. Only two things wrong. 1. Weird smell right out our door, but wasn't in room. And 2. Our fridge didn't work very well. Other than that our stay was great. Only 10 min walk to Disneyland. And there is a CVS, 711 and an ABC store right across the street. Was nice having those there because we had to make a few trips over there for some items we forgot to bring. Great Hotel. Will stay there again.
Manager Response: none

Summary: I have stayed here before while attending a conference but this will be the last time.  The room was ready for checkin 3:00 as promised and the check in was efficeint.  The room was clean as expected. Ut when I turned my bed down I discovered a long, black hair on the sheet, GROSS.  The noise from the closed "adjoining room" was very loud till almost 1 AM.  Even after tapping on the door it continued.  Those room to rooom doors are just not thick enough.  Afger discovering @ 7 AM. They now CHARGE for breakfast I  checked out and ate at McDonalds, not my preference.  Last year breakfast in a lovely setting was included.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Excellent Hotel , Close to all amenities , beautiful staff
Summary: We spend 4 nights at the Ramada from 8 to 12 of September , our room 237 was very clean and large and quite with a free fast wifi in the room , our room was facing Disneyland a benefit we were watching the fire work every night , a pleasant 10 minutes walk to Disneyland ,variety of restaurants next to the hotel plus there is a supermarket opposite the hotel and bus stop across the street, our great thanks goes to Ozze who would do anything for the guest, our thanks goes to the front desk girls Lupe & Alegandra who helped us with our query and made our check out a breeze , thanks to all the staff at the Ramada plaza for a job well done , we will definitely be back .
Manager Response: Dear Vince L  Thank you kindly for your lovely review from your recent stay. We are glad to hear that you enjoyed our clean and spacious rooms and that our staff was able to assist you with anything that you needed. It is gratifying to learn that you will be back and we look forward to welcoming you back to the Ramada Plaza Hotel.

Summary: The service here was wonderful, and the free parking was very nice. We only stayed one night, but went to the park for two days. The hotel staff was more than happy to let us stay parked at the hotel the day after our one night stay while we enjoyed the park, and drive home after the park closed that night. Being just a 10 minute walk from Disneyland, it was ideal for us.  I had actually lost my keys in the park on our first day, before the night stay. The wonderful woman at the front desk that afternoon and evening (I have forgotten her name, my apologies to her) was very understanding, giving us advice on the lost and found at Disneyland, and working with us in the worst case scenario that we would not be able to find them. That we could possibly leave the car in the lot for
Manager Response: none

Summary: We did enjoy our stay with you. However, there needs to have attention to the condition of the hotel.  We have tried the restaurant several times and find the food quality and selection unacceptable. Should you like to discuss this further please give me a call.  The hotel is in a very good location and makes access to Disney Resort easy.  Could walk if you choose to.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Good place to stay for a Disneyland visit
Summary: Stayed two nights while enjoying Disneyland's 60th birthday celebration.  Good location for walking to the park - it was about a 10 to 15 minute walk from the room to the entry gates.  The room was clean, quiet, and comfortable.  The pool area leaves a lot to be desired, pretty small and shady, but it did the trick for cooling off during a break from the heat of the park.   The Indian restaurant in the hotel is really good.  Right at the end of the block on the way to Disneyland is a strip center with a Subway and some other quick restaurants and a convenience store is just across the intersection.  No breakfast served at the hotel unfortunately.    There are so many choices of hotels right around Disney - there are others that are a bit closer but for the price the extra few
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good place to stay near Disney. I highly recommend this hotel which offers free parking and wifi. Near to restaurants, 7-eleven and about 5-10 minute walk to disneyland main entrance. Staff are nice and helpful, rooms are clean and well kept. Will definitely come back to stay here again.............................................................................................................................................................................
Manager Response: Hello r_markanthony  Thank you for your review. We appreciate you sharing your feedback for other travelers and we thank you for recommending us.

Summary: We had a great stay here...friendly staff and great location...about 10 minutes from Disneyland.  The underground parking is definitely a plus if you want to leave your car when you go to the park.  The room was nice and clean and had everything we needed.
Manager Response: none

Summary: This is a totally awesome hotel!!!  The staff is super friendly and helpful.  Rooms are very quiet.  We could see Disneyland from our hotel room.  The walk to Disneyland was super easy.  This is a highly recommended hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We check in around 3pm after the Disney half marathon. The receptionist gave us the key, stated "you're room is ready in 15 min because their still cleaning the room" after 15 min waiting in the lobby, I decided to go to our room, the ladie still cleaning the restroom so we ended up waiting another 15 min in the lobby!!! I understand she cleaning it, but the receptionist should give us the dirty room at first!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great service, clean, comfortable. Everything we needed for our stay. We have six in our family and it was perfect. We loved it. One room for all of us two queen beds and a pull out full sofa for our two small ones. Great price!!!
Manager Response: Dear jsgirl2010  We appreciate the review you recently posted from your stay with us. We are glad that your family of six was comfortable in the room. We look forward to welcoming you back in the near future.

Summary Heading: Staff was very friendly, Room was nice
Summary: To be honest, I didn't spend a great deal of time at the hotel or in my room during my stay. But when I arrived that afternoon, my room was ready, check in was a breeze, the staff was very friendly and knowledgable, answering all my questions. Parking was easy enough, garage under the hotel, easy elevator access, and best of all it was free. I was only there one night, in town for the half marathon. The bed was comfortable, room was spacious, clean, modern, and well appointed, including fridge. Also standard checkout time is noon, which was great for us so that we could finish the race, come back to shower, rest and little bit, then check out. The hotel is a stones throw from Disneyland, completely walkable, but if you need a bus for the 1/2 mile or so to the main entrance,
Manager Response: Dear benjaminsE8584DH  Thank you for choosing to stay with us. I'm Glad to know you enjoyed our room amenities. We truly appreciate your business and look forward to serve you again in near future.

Summary: Clean room and facility, secure parking garage, walking distance to Disneyland. The front desk was friendly and helpful.  This is the second time we have stayed here for the Disney 1/2 marathon and it worked out great!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Stayed here for 4 night with my twin 2year olds and had a great time.  The manager gave me a room facing Disney so my kids could see the fireworks show from the room.  Totally appreciated it.  The hotel is was very close to Disneyland (a 7-10 minute walk).  Lots of food places around hotel and I absolutely loved my stay and room.  Will definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Tasha405  We would like to thank you for your recent review of your stay with us. We are happy to hear that your family had a great time here. We hope you will consider the Ramada Plaza Hotel again, when your travel plans bring you back to the Anaheim Resort.

Summary Heading: Nice room, walking distance to Disneyland
Summary: Room was perfect size.  The atmosphere was very quiet.  Location is within walking distance to several restaurants.  Location is off the beaten track from Harbor Blvd which is constantly busy ... it was a wonderful stay.
Manager Response: Dear 226marioh  We are delighted to hear that you've enjoyed your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Hotel. As you mention, we are indeed in the corner of Harbor and Katella ave. which makes us have a close distance to Disney, restaurants and stores. We hope you return soon for another wonderful stay.  Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: We booked this hotel for 3 days while visiting Disneyland.   It's a 10 minute, two stoplight distance from the park.  The price we got was very reasonable, for late August  - Monday thru Wednesday.  The staff was very attentive and helpful, and did their best in answering all of our questions.  It was a warm day so we had the AC running most of the time, and, we were on the top (warmest) floor.  At night the AC was so loud that we either had to turn it off (and get hot) or turn the AC on but not be able to sleep because the fan is loud.  Also, the windows do not open to the outside, making the AC as the only method of temperature control.  The next morning I asked to change rooms,  and they readily reassigned us to a 3rd floor room, which would be cooler and therefore the AC
Manager Response: Dear RL  Thank you for taking the time to review us on TripAdvisor. We are truly sorry you had noise issue with the A/C in your room. The windows can be open, they just have a security lock for safety. Did you ask for assistance? one of are staff members would've happily assist you with opening the windows. We do have a couple rooms quieter than others. We hope you give us another chance to make your next visit to Anaheim a greater one. Thank you once again for stay with us and pointing out something that we will certainly fix.

Summary Heading: Awesome stay front desk ladies are great.
Summary: Great room, comfortable beds, clean and neat rooms. Its a great location to walk to Disneyland, and California Adventure. Came to Orange County to visit family and i am planning  my next vacation here at the Ramada Plaza Hotel. Pool , Spa, and Sauna available!!! yay
Manager Response: Dear Roxan C  Thank you for choosing to stay with us and taking the time to share your experience. We are glad to hear you will be staying with us again.

Summary: Stayed at this hotel for one night before heading back home to Australia. Fantastic location near the Disney parks of Anaheim, comfortable walking distance 15-20mins. I was also able to purchase park ticket at reception, and have my luggage stored since I arrived before check-in time. Room cleanliness and facilities were very good. Huge bed and lots of TV channels to flick through, all I really needed for my short stay. Front desk staff friendly and helpful, and after 12noon checkout I was allowed to sit in the comfortable lounges of the lobby to wait for my airport transfer a few hours later. Located close to 7-11, ABC Mart (great for cheap souvenirs), pizza place, pharmacy and other shops, 3-5min walk away. Overall a pleasant stay, thank you!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Good beds make for a good nights sleep. Clean crisp linens. Quiet rooms. Safe and secure building. Miss not having the continental breakfast anymore, that was a true plus for this place. Great location.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location to Disney! Great location to Bubba Gump and other shops! Can walk about 10 minutes or get picked up at hotel by DisneyShuttle! Nice scenery! Would recommend for couples and families!...
Manager Response: Dear Paulette P  Thank you for staying with us and taking the time to write a review. We enjoyed having you as our guest. We hope you will come back and stay with us again. Thank you and take care.

Summary: I have stayed here before and it seems that the management has changed for the worse. When we arrived there was a leaking ceiling in the lobby. There were no breakfast vouchers like in the past. On our last night the water was turned off for matence, and lasted 6 hours past the time they promised for a total of 15 hours. We couldn't shower nor use the toilet so our room smelled like feces and urine. When we went to the front desk, the manager on duty was very rude and short. I asked to speak to her superior and she informed me she was there but not talking to guests about the situation to call her and leave a message. This will be the last time I stay here.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Location was great. 10-15 min walk from Disneyland.  The staff were very friendly and helpful.  The room was ok, bed comfortable but carpet wasn't vacuumed properly. Air conditioner was far too loud to sleep properly. The room overall was a bit dated but ok.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location for Disneyland and Anaheim Convention Center
Summary: This hotel provided a large room adequate for 3 adults. We could walk to our convention.  The underground parking is a great idea. Only problems were the included breakfast was dropped without an email notification and the last night the city turned off water service. The outage started at 11pm and lasted past 6am. I heard a clerk offer a guest a shower at a nearby hotel. I thought Ramada should have taken something off the bill for the inconvenience even though it started as a city issue.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Great location for family visiting Disneyland
Summary: Gods location, and easy to access the Disney parks.  Hotel was clean and accommodating for a family with a small baby.  Only complaint is weak wifi in the room.
Manager Response: Dear crs88  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel. We are delighted to know that your stay was great. The WI-FI does tend to slow down a bit when we are full house and everybody is logged in, we will bring this up to management so that hopefully we can have faster internet connection. Thank you for choosing us, and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary Heading: Poor internet connection, no complimentary breakfast. No...
Summary: Poor internet connection, no complimentary breakfast. No one is trying to help us with the internet problem. front desk is not accomodating.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Service was nice, walking distance to the entrance of Disneyland, free parking (which is a plus in that area), reasonable price, clean rooms, and the pizza place down stairs sells cheap pizza by the slice to die for, which is a nice snack or dinner after the parks!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Quick stay for a day in Disneyland.  Hotel staff was so great to let us keep our car there past check out since we were at the park.  Great breakfast included and just an relaxing stay.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was comfortable and the walk to Disneyland was a short 10 min walk. Would stay there  again! The girls at the front desk were very friendly and knowledgeable about the area. Great vacation!!!!!!!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Lobby is nice.  Very convenient underground parking.  Room was spacious and beds were comfortable.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: An OK place to stay near Disneyland
Summary: This is an average mid range hotel, convenient for Disneyland. We found our room a bit dated and worn, but it was spacious, clean and had adequate facilties. The hotel has a corporate hotel feel about it. We did not eat here so cannot comment on the food. There was a bit of noise from other rooms, but not enough to disturb our sleep. Front desk staff courteous, without being friendly. We got the room for a reasonable price and overall we were satisfied with our stay. If the price was right we would consider returning, but there was nothing special or memorable about our stay at this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Clean, pleasant, quiet, friendly staff, safe parking great location as positives.  Small pool and internet speed varied a bit as negatives
Manager Response: none

Summary: Location was excellent to Disneyland. Front Desk staff were great and very helpful.  Buffet in restaurant was terrible, only ate there once and was definitely overpriced. Had some issues in our room and mentioned it and nothing was done about it.  Took to long for the rooms to be cleaned, late afternoon and our room was still not done so we just asked for clean towels.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel staff was very friendly however the room was to say the least tired. Broken and chipped tile, leaky faucets and bathroom fan wasn't working. After speaking with the front desk the response was " well it is peak season and the hotel is full " Some how an excuse that the hotel industry can get away with in busy areas. We were with a group of 50 rooms and most stayed for extra time in Anaheim however chose to move to a different hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Only a few minutes walk to Disneyland
Summary: We will return here on our next visit to Disneyland; our stay was very memorable. The parking and pool were excellent, and everything we needed was only a short walk away. The staff was genuinely helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Sandrocas  We appreciate your kind review and thank you for staying with us. We are thrill to know you made great memories while visiting Disney and staying at the Ramada Plaza Hotel. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: Reasonable walking distance to Disney entrance, and located near lots of dining options for evening as well.  Adjoining rooms made family stay fun! Would be nice to have a breakfast options in the hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: everything great. and very close to Disney, all the hotel clean. it is very close to Disney, 5 minutes walking, the pool area is very nice and clean and all the staff of the hotel have a very good attitude. definitely will be back to this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Nothing spectacular about our 3 night stay. The room was clean and the location was an easy walking distance to Disneyland.  The breakfast in the morning was good (buffet style). The staff was friendly and helpful. The private, secure underground parking was a plus!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed here because the hotels closer to disneyland were full or to expensive. It's about 5 minutes to disney,not to far to walk for a siesta. The hotel is newer than the ones at the disney pedestrian crossing on harbour blv and has lots of free parking.the breakfast is good and free,plus there are some nice resturants next door. The hotel is typical ramada,clean large rooms.
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: Every year this place gets better and better
Summary: Nothing left to say that hasn't already been said. If you are coming to Disneyland or a convention in Anaheim, there is only one place to stay and that is right here at the Ramada Plaza. Exceptional in all area. Well done once again.
Manager Response: Dear Jeff S.  Thank you for being our guest at the Ramada Plaza hotel in Anaheim, we are honored to have you.  We are happy to know that you loved our clean accommodations. Hope you visit us again.

Summary: Had a two stay at the Ramada. The hotel is close to Disneyland. Our room was clean and modern. It met our expectations. We brought our swimming suits, however we did not find the pool area inviting. It was very bland with minimal shade. It was warm during our visit and we found the elevator area and the elevator very stifling. The water in our shower would not turn off completely. We reported it after our first night, but nothing was done about it. The hotel is close to Disneyland - about a 10 to 15 minute walk?
Manager Response: none
