Summary: No complaints.clean rooms fast check in and check out.room location is far near exit door but thats ok.very comfortable bed and sheets.outdated bathroom facilities but clean.affordable price good stay.
Manager Response: Dear 774elaine Thank you for you comments. Our housekeeping staff take pride in their job, and we are glad that it shows. We appreciate your business. We will look forward to welcome you back soon when you are in back in town.

Summary: Booked my room with a group performing at Disneyland.  The room was clean, comfortable and quiet.  Hotel is within walking distance of park entrances, and breakfast and parking were included at no extra charge. Morning juices were watery, but a good variety of plentiful breakfast items.
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed 5 nights just last week and the service was outstanding!  Everyone from the front desk to housekeeping were very helpful, made things really easy and always had a smile and positive attitude.  From my experience that can be hard to find at a hotel so close to Disneyland.    Our room was big enough to fit my family of five comfortably with two queen beds and a sofa sleeper.  The room was clean and smelled good.  We inspected the room on arrival and all was good.  I could even walk around the room barefoot without concern or feeling like I was sticking to the floor.  There was also plenty of room to lounge around if we wanted.    The pool is a little small but average for this area.  But let's be honest, not too many people are hanging around the pool a lot.  There were
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room we received was bigger than we expected. Very pleased, rooms clean. And staff was very helpful and professional. Will return next year. Was walking distance to Disney and many great Resturants near by.
Manager Response: Dear Adell L.  Thank you for taking the time to write a review about your recent stay with us! We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Please feel free to give us a call when making your future reservations.

Summary Heading: Close to disneyland, mostly underground parking
Summary: We spent one night at the Ramada Plaza hotel.  The lobby was nice and the lobby staff were friendly.  Our room was large with two queen beds and a pull out sofa bed.  The room and bathroom seemed to be clean.  The pool area looked fine but we did not have time to use it.  One elevator went out of service during our stay so we ended up using the stairs when we were not moving luggage.  We noticed a huge cockroach near the coke machine right down from the lobby and informed the lobby staff.  The breakfast buffet which we paid for was average.  However, the buffet room was very warm & humid in the early morning.  The hallways had music playing but sounded like rap music.  We had someone yelling in a nearby room or floor during part of the night.  I don't know if anyone called to
Manager Response: none

Summary: There was no fan in the bathroom and it was very uncomfortable when people were taking a shower.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Great location within easy walking distance of Disneyland. Also, just a half block from a number of good restaurants, including Roys, Cheesecake Factory, California Pizza Kitchen, etc. The best part is the FREE easy parking under the hotel. Always space available close to the elevators. The rooms are dated and a little wore out looking, but a fair trade off for the price, location and convenient parking.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Our check in time was at 3:00 pm, but we were not able to check in until 4:10 because our room was not ready. They had us waiting in the lounge for over an hour. This delay made us late to an event in Anaheim. To top it off, when we finally got into our room one of the beds was still being made and there was no shower curtain!!
Manager Response: none

Summary: Before our visit I wanted to see the room, so I went to the hotel & the lady at the front was very nice & helpful & she let me look at a room similair to the one we were going to have. The room was perfect room for us.  There were two queens & a pull out couch.  When we checked in the room was great. The room was clean and housekeeping made our beds, emptied the trash & gave us fresh towels every day.  There was a mini frig & microwave in the room.  There isn't a free breakfast but Target was up the street so we grabbed some yogurt & fruit & it was great.  The first three nights were great. The only down side was the people that checked in the last two days we were there were so loud talking & with their TV.  The only other thing was the hot tub was broken. But if we were
Manager Response: none

Summary: My family and I really liked our stayed at this hotel we because we were satisfy with their services and overall appearance. It has lots a near by stores and restaurants and its also close by Disney land parks. I recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Hotel was a comfortable walk to the Disney parks and a short drive from Santa Ana airport. Spacious room. Clean, comfortable and had no issues whilst staying there. Parking was free and although there was a parking garage we had a space right outside the hotel the whole time we were there. Free internet. The "gym" had 3 different machines in it and was quite small but was empty when my son went down to use it so that wasn't a problem. The pool and spa were good but slightly on the chilly side. Again, it was empty when we used them. All in all we had a great stay and I would stay there again without hesitation.
Manager Response: none

Summary: For the price it was decent. We only slept in our room and kept busy at Disneyland. No continental breakfast included. Jacuzzi was out of order. Pool is located basically in the parking lot. Upside however, staff is friendly. I did not like how I witnessed housekeeping employees being treated by their boss, though. But the walk is not bad at all to Disneyland.
Manager Response: none

Summary: The room was very nice and clean, and the staff was very helpful and very kind. Perfect location for a Disneyland vacation. Nice pool, too. I'll definitely be staying here again the next time we go back.
Manager Response: Dear Cher S Thank you for staying with us during your recent Disneyland vacation! We are glad to hear that our staff provided great customer service. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: The place is good for the price. Walking distance to Disneyland and restaurants which is a plus.  The decor is a little dated.  The bathroom tailor grout was cracking and coming out.  The shower drain was slow which was gross.
Manager Response: Dear ejpcardona; Thank you for your comments. It is unfortunate that you were not completely satisfied with our rooms. We are thrill to announce that we will be renovating by the end of the year. We hope you return to our property then, for a better experience. We will continue to improve in all areas. Once again, thank you for your comments.

Summary Heading: Very good hotel for big families
Summary: We stayed 5 nights at this hotel in July 2015.  After reading tons of reviews on tons of different hotels in the LA area, we booked 2 connecting rooms with 2 queen beds and 1 sofa bed in each. It worked out perfectly: we were 12 persons total, so 2 people per bed.    Each room came with a microwave and small fridge.  The plug in the sink was broken and would not go up anymore, but it was fixed in a timely manner.  The shower faucet was a little hard to turn, but worked.  AC worked fine.  We liked that we were able to open the window a little in one room.  Towels were clean, and each day, the staff did a good job taking care of our rooms.  Laundry room had 2 washers and 2 dryers.  $2.00 to wash per load, $2.00 to dry per load (very old equipment).  We were so busy, we never got a
Manager Response: none

Summary: Had a great excellent expirence with the hotel staff. They are all very polite and nice. I loved how easy it was to acess the garage and how secure it was. I would recommend this hotel to family and friends
Manager Response: none

Summary Heading: The visit overall was great.... Within walking distance to Disneyland which is a huge plus.
Summary: Loved that it was close to Disneyland. Even got to check in early cause the room was ready. We drove 6hours so we greatly appreciated that! The hallways were overly hot but I guess that doesn't really matter since you just go through them to get to your room.... Felt there should have been some sort of free breakfast but we knew there wasn't so we prepared for that. I would probably stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest: The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear about your  stay.  In regards to the hallway being hot, we apologized. We might of forgotten to set the temperature at a cooler degree. The all you can eat breakfast  buffet is served in our lobby restaurant at a great value price for our guests. We thank you for sharing your comments and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!

Summary Heading: Perfect for a night out at The Gardenwalk
Summary: Perfect hotel for a girls' night out at The Gardenwalk!  5 minutes walking - so you're there before you know it and you're back in your room in no time when the night is over.  No line at check in or check out.  Free parking - for 2 cars!  Room was clean and a decent size.  Didn't really try any of the amenities since our goal was The Garden walk, but I would definitely consider staying here again - especially since the price is decent for a Friday night.
Manager Response: none

Summary: Accommodations were fine accept for the wifi kicking me offline constantly. When it did work it was super slow. I wasn't able to get any work done. When bringing up to the front desk as I was checking out, all they said is they would look into it. Well, that doesn't help me. No effort was made to make up for the poor experience. I won't be staying here again
Manager Response: none

Summary: My husband, daughter, and I recently stayed at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim for four nights (June 29 - July 2).  We were warmly greeted upon our arrival.  We were a bit early so our room was not ready yet, but we were able to leave our luggage in a secure room off of the lobby and went to eat/shop nearby.  Check in was quick and easy.  All of the staff were very helpful, especially Edna.  She explained everything very well and answered all of our questions.  Thanks Edna!  We were given a welcome bag, which included bottled water for each of us and chocolate chip cookies.  That was a very nice touch!  Our room was on the fourth floor and it was clean and spacious enough for the three of us.  We appreciated the free wifi.  The microwave, mini refrigerator, and coffee maker area was
Manager Response: Dear lisaM1043  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback. It is nice to hear that you found value in your stay and that our staff took great care of you. We are looking forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the wonderful city of Anaheim.

Summary Heading: Good customer service saved a buggy stay
Summary: Checked into our room on the 4th floor to find that the bathroom was very humid and buzzing with lots of small fruit flies. Notified the front desk and the staff were happy to move us to a different room. The new room was much better but it made us wonder and worry what everyone else was staying in or if they addressed the bug issue for the next guests.  Underground parking garage with easy access to elevators was very convenient. Swimming pool area was small, with space for about 4 patio tables. Breakfast buffet was decent, but at $10 for adults and $8 for kids make sure you fill up enough not to need lunch.  Location is excellent in proximity to Disneyland. About a 2 block walk to the main gate. A 24-hour CVS/pharmacy located catercorner across Harbor/Katella, and it looks
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the issues with the flies. I assure you that this is not a normal occurrence, but more a fluke of nature. We are happy to hear that our staff was able to resolve the issue to your satisfaction.  Thanks again.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Just returned a couple of days ago from our 1st family trip to Anaheim and Disneyland. Arrived to Ramada Plaza around 3pm in afternoon. Check-in was pretty fast and easy and staff was very friendly. We had requested a room away from main elevators and on the Disneyland park side, both requests were honored. The hotel is an easy 10-15 minute walk from the Disneyland entrance which is really nothing given all the walking you will do at the parks.  Room was clean and comfortable. Nothing fancy but good for family with kids. There was a larger mini-fridge, microwave, and little coffee pot in the room which made it nice for breakfasts on the go before hitting the parks. Beds were clean and comfortable. There was a flat screen tv with decent channel line-up, desk, little table, a
Manager Response: none

Summary: We stayed in the Ramada for 3 nights, we did not have any problem, the rooms are bigger than any normal size we have seen before, at least the one we booked. Shorts distances to everything including Disney but still is a 10-15 min walk to the park, the hotel does not have a courtesy bus and any of the transportation systems around have does not have a stop near the hotel, but a taxi one way was about 7 dollars, which it was around the same price as the bus for 4 people. The Hotel staff was very courteous and help us with any questions we had, to be the perfect 5 should include a basic breakfast. We should recommend this hotel for families, for its convenience. We also liked that we did not have to pay for the parking, last year was $14 a day in the Sheraton. The only odd thing
Manager Response: none

Summary: The hotel was acceptably clean, front desk was helpful, parking is good for the area. The room was large and had three beds, which eas great. Not super close to Disney, but not a bad walk. I would recommend this hotel to families visiting Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Kristine:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim appreciates your recommendation of our hotel to future guests. Further, thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We hope you had a great time at Disneyland and look forward to welcoming you and your family back to the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This room was exactly what I expected it to be. comfortable, convenient, clean. I found a couple of lights burned out, bathroom door not locking and left a note on my bed for housekeeping. By the time we returned everything was in working   condition. The Gandhi Resturant buffet breakfast wasn't the best. The scrambled eggs were too runny, the toaster didn't toast the bread. So next time I will stay at hotel, but look for breakfast some place else.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  An enjoyable experience is what we aim for when our guest stay with us. Thank you for letting us know that we are on the right track. We do apologize that you did not find the restaurant's Hot Buffet Breakfast satisfactory. We will pass the word on to the ownership of the Gandhi Palace. We look forward to hosting your next stay.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is close to Disneyland.  It is within walking distance. This is a very nice hotel.  Rooms were clean, and the bathrooms were nice and clean.  The décor, which is more ornate, may seem to make the room look a little dated, but everything was very nice and comfortable.  We were next to the elevator, but never heard anything.
Manager Response: Dear Dena:  Your feedback is valuable so the Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for taking the time to share it with us. It sounds like you had a great Disneyland trip. We hope to welcome you back the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Everyone was so nice and helpful. They went above and beyong to make sure we were satisfied. The Indian restaurant was very nice as well! I will definitely be coming back! Thank you, Ramada Plaza Anaheim!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for sharing your experience. It is nice to know that our staff did not let you down. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The service was excellent. The restaurant was good I wish it accommodated individuals who do not eat pork. The location work well for our group. It would be helpful if the hotel had van to provide transportation for the guest.
Manager Response: Dear Joseph:  We hope you had a successful volleyball tournament. Thank you for making the Ramada Plaza Anaheim your hotel of choice and for sharing your experience with us. Your feedback is valuable and we will use it as we continue to strive to make our hotel better for future guests. See you next year!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: A good hotel that's reasonably priced and within walking distance to Disneyland or you can catch the ART bus which stops right out front. Rooms are large and comfortable, bathroom spotless and large, fluffy towels. Hotel is quiet with free wifi in each room, although we did have a few problems connecting to the wifi. Tea and coffee facilites along with a fridge and microwave made life a bit easier. I would suggest they put in a small smoking are though for those guests that wish to smoke.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback.  We would like to offer our sincerest apologies for the issues you experienced with the wifi and we are hard at work to correct the problem. For future, we do offer a smoking area for guests in the back of the hotel.  We are sorry if this was not communicated properly to you. Looking forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: During my recent stay, the hotel staff was incredibly helpful. We were visiting Disneyland and anxious to get to the park. The staff offered to check us in quickly early in the morning, and let us access the room, or check in and leave our bags with them to save even more time. Of course they would have held our reservation and we could have checked in later, but we were able to leave our car in their parking lot and walk to Disneyworld!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear that storing your luggage was a plus during your stay. We were happy to accommodate. Looking forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Everything was great about the stay. Rooms were clean, has a great pool, laundry, walking distance to disneyland. Only thing I would like to recommend is for them to have a bell desk do when you get there with a big family and all kinds of luggage and all tired you don't have to haul in your baggage to your room otherwise 5 stars !!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for choosing the Ramada Plaza Anaheim to host your stay. We are happy to hear that you had a great Disney vacation. Your feedback is appreciated. True, we do not have a bellman service at our hotel. However,  if needed, we are happy to try and assist guests with their luggage.  Looking forward to hosting your next Disney trip.  Sincerely,  Management Team Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I expected better for price and housekeeping rude!!! Rooms were bigger than average!! Elevators and hall leading there 98 always was hot going to room and was much farther from entrance to Disneyland then stated!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations so we are disappointed and sorry to hear that your stay was only "so so." We normally have excellent reviews on the friendliness of our staff so we would be interested to know more about the housekeeper you felt to be rude. We do apologize if such a behavior took place. We are looking into the issues with the hallways being warm. Thank you do much for giving us the feedback we need so that we may continue improving.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel, within walking distance of Disney
Summary: This was our first stay at Ramada Plaza. We have stayed at several properties in the area, and this is the nicest one we have stayed at. Parking was plentiful (and free), the room had a microwave and a decent sized mini-fridge. It was also a larger room, so our toddler had room to run around and we didn't feel like we were tripping over each other. We stayed in a room that slept 6 (two queens and a sofa bed), but there were only 5 towels in the room. The room was generally clean and in good repair, but we did notice that their were handprints from the prior occupants on the window. Their was not a free breakfast included, but we knew this beforehand and picked up breakfast foods on the drive in. Their were two elevators, so we never had to wait long for one to arrive. The walk
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are glad to hear that you had a very nice stay. Please accept our sincerest apologies regarding the fingerprints you found. "We do windows" but somehow we must have missed yours.  Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Good hotel for visiting the Disney parks
Summary: Stayed at this hotel for a couple of nights whilst visiting the Disney parks. Found a double room at a relatively decent price on Hotels.com, with no hidden charges. Rooms are pleasant enough if a little dated with a smallish bathroom. The shower had hardly any power which was a pain and they did not offer shower gel just a bar of soap. Room included free wifi and Air Con. Bed sheets were very rough like cardboard which was not the most comfortable nights sleep ever.  Reception staff were really friendly and helpful. Baggage store available all day long which is great if you want somewhere to store your bags if visiting Disney on your last day like we did.  Parking is completely free and the underground car park is locked at night with key access. Hotel is in a great location
Manager Response: Dear Ashley:  Thank you for sharing your feedback. Your comments will assist us in making improvements for future guests.  See you next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Didn't stay but walked through impressive hotel! Awesome location about a 5 minute walk to disneyland. The food was so tastey and reasonably priced with a good selection to choose from. Don't drink the water they give you. Taste like chlorine
Manager Response: Dear Siska:  Thank you for your review. We are pleased to hear that you enjoyed the Indian food at the Gandhi Palace.   Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Family vacation to disney. Rooms were very roomy and enjoyed the mini refrig, microwave, and coffee maker. The front office staff were very friendly and helpful. I would stay here again
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback and for recognizing our wonderful Front Desk Staff. We value your opinion and are happy to hear that you found your room to be "enjoyable and roomy." Looking forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Good hotel for the price. Free parking and wi-fi can save you a lot of money. Locked parking garage after hours, and it is only accessible by room key. Room is spacious. Walking distance to Disney is great and place to eat around the area. Housekeeping staffs are great.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback and for recognizing our wonderful Housekeeping staff. Your comments put a smile on their faces. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Location to Disneyland was good, room tidy and basic. We booked for two adults and two kids and the room configuration was a bit tight for that. Staff were nice and friendly. We had breakfast included in our rate and that was a disappointment, would recommend eating elsewhere if you are staying here. Next time we head to Disneyland I think we will look at other options.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback and for recognizing our awesome staff. We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed with the Hot Buffet Breakfast. We will pass your comments onto the restaurant so that they can review and we apologize that you were disappointed. Thanks again.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Wonderful Stay, Great Service, Awesome Buffet + Disneyland Biew!!!
Summary: We were very leary at first because of all the bad reviews, but the Ramada proved to be an awesome hotel. Cleanliness, orderly, lots of amenities, free upgrade to disney view upon availability, AC free WiFi and parking. Great food served at the buffet, by far the best service and great rates and no resort fee! Walking distance from disney parks and right next to inexpensive restaurant's. Our disney trip was super enjoyable, if your looking to save on your hotel accommodations but still looking for great service and cleanliness stat at the Ramada plaza at Anaheim you will not regret it one bit.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest: The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear about your "Wonderful stay." Thank you for sharing your comments and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Nice for a Ramada, 2 blocks from the main gate.  The restaurant needs a lot of help.  They offer breakfast but it's horrible and the Indian food has much to be desired). Overall, the hotel is great and I will be back!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We value your feedback as we move forward to improve every day. Sorry to hear that you were disappointed with the restaurant. We will forward your comments on to the restaurant manager.  Looking forward to surprising you again next time.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Pleasant stay after an all day Disnelyand trip
Summary: We drove up to Disneyland Saturday morning and did not check in till 11:00 pm exhausted from an all day excursion to Disneyland. The parking area to check in was full of vehicles and 2 buses were blocking the entry but managed to park by moving one of their cones over. We checked in very quickly and received the 2 rooms we reserved with 2 queen beds and a fold out couch. The rooms were very clean and beds were very comfortable after a long day of walking and standing in lines. It was quiet no surrounding noise. We were on the 4th floor with a nice view. We will stay there in the future. The high speed internet was wonderful and allowed me to upload all of our photos of Disneyland to the cloud overnight. That was great.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest: The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is smiling to hear that you had a "pleasant stay." Sorry to hear that you had some issues with the parking. We do have to block out certain parking spots in order to have space for our group busses to park since they will not fit in our underground parking.   We hope this was not too much of a n inconvenience. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I was very happy with the cleanliness of this hotel. And the staff was very friendly and helpful. My only complaint is that the beds are really firm so after a staying there for a week, by back was hurting a lot. Also, when we've stayed here in the past they have provided complimentary breakfast buffet. This is why we love to stay at this hotel, because the breakfast is fantastic! Unfortunately, only upon checking in did we find out that they no longer provide this service. The only breakfast provided is $10 per person.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your patronage and for sharing your feedback with us.  As a Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we are not required to provide a complimentary breakfast since we are a full service hotel.  We had done it in the past as a trial period. However, the breakfast is still available now for a minimum cost.   Although most people are happy with the bed comfort, we do apologize that you did not find your bed to your satisfaction. Again, thank you for your feedback and we look forward to making your stay a better one next time.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I booked a hotel during memorial day weekend for June 12-14. I didn't really take note of which site I was using that the time or memorize the hotel I was staying at. That's why we all book online - so things are easy and accessible via email when we need them.   The Wednesday before my trip I spent an hour SEARCHING my inbox, spam, and trash folders for keywords such as, "confirmation," "hotel," "Anaheim," "June 12," with find NOTHING.   It would be impossible to call every hotel in Anaheim to see if I had made a reservation. At this point, I thought perhaps I didn't booked a hotel, though I was 100% positive I had. I booked a different hotel because I had no idea I was supposed to be at the Ramada, how was I?   I was charged and both the hotel (Ramada Plaza Hotel Anaheim) and
Manager Response: none

Summary: Room was very clean, safe neighborhood, very comfy bed and pillows. Only issue was with a few of the front desk workers. Very rude for no reason. Just asked a few questions and seemed like I was bothering her. Very rude back. All other staff was very nice.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim high when it comes to guest service so it saddens us to hear that one of our staff was rude during your stay.  This is totally unacceptable. Please accept our sincerest apologies. If you would like to speak with us further regarding this situation, please feel free to contact our management team.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I checked in on 9/06/15 along with my family. The check in was smooth and when I went up to room We found no water or a kettle to make Tea as we dont drink coffee. Called up housekeeping and was told to go to CVS and buy water or from the Vending machine on the floor. Called up front desk and was told by a young man that I should leave if I dont like the hotel by forefitting one days deposit. So far so good for Ramada group of hotels. Then comes the role of Steppahine ,the front desk staff who calls herself Manager of the hotel.Ask any employee or the staff of the Gandhi restaurant and the reply will be to stay away from her if u dont want to ruin yr stay. At all times u will find 2 emplyees running this hotel, One at front desk and one in housekeeping who cant speak or
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations so we are disappointed to hear that we fell short during your recent stay. True, we do not offer kettles in our rooms, but most hotels do not.  One is still able to heat up water in the coffee maker provided in the room. However, I did speak to our Front Desk Manager and he said that he was able to assist you in finding one.  We consistently have positive reviews on the friendliness of our staff so of course we are disappointed and surprised to hear that you found them to be otherwise. We do apologize for any issues that occurred. If you feel you would like to speak with us further regarding your stay, please feel free to contact us.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The good news is the location is great and parking is free, convenient and secure which is a nice change from others in the area.  The rooms are okay, a bit dated but okay.  Bed is comfortable enough.  We had two queens and a fold out couch that would be good for a family on a budget.  Workout area and pool are small.  I was not a fan of the Undian themed restaurant and even the American Breakfast did not look appealing enough to prevent us from going to the hotel next door for an expensive but appealing meal two days in a row.  Overall, if you are just looking for an inexpensive place to stay for the night it is a good deal but would not be my first choice if looking for on site amenities.
Manager Response: Dear Dave:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are always looking for ways to improve so your comments are helping us along the way to make daily improvements.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Nice hotel, close to everything. Breakfast was very good as was service and staff. Would stay here again. Kids loved the pool and spa too. We had coffee maker, fridge and microwave in our room. Good value
Manager Response: Dear Denise:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for posting your kind review.  Your words make a difference and your experience during your stay is important to us. We'll see you next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great Room, Great Location, Great Price
Summary: After a full day at Disneyland, we stayed here....we had two adjoining rooms....very quiet, very comfortable beds, nice staff....across the street from Disneyland...and affordabley priced....we will stay here again on future visits
Manager Response: Dear Raymond:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are looking forward to hosting your next adventure in the Disneyland Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This is a decent hotel for the price. Walking distance to Disney(less than 15 mins). Breakfast buffet is nice for $10, better than the IHOP across the street. Do ask for Breakfast tickets/coupons. I am very pleased with the staff. We forgot a small bag at the hotel , called back a couple of days later.. they  said they will ship to my house. Me happy.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your kind words. We are happy to hear that you found the Ramada Plaza Anaheim to be a "Good and Convenient" place to stay. Your feedback is important to us and we are looking forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Found this hotel the perfect fit for us.  We spent everyday out going to theme parks or tours, so booked this hotel as a mid price hotel not expecting much.  The hotel overall is very clean and tidy.  The room was spacious and well maintained.  We had the two double bed room.  The staff were very helpful, from the day staff though to the night staff.  The pool is basic but we were out all day and never intended to spend much time at the pool.  It is situated in a great place with a short 10 min walk to Disneyland.  It has great restaurants both sides of the hotel, some casual like Denny's, IHOP and Bubba Gump Shrimp. Also their are some new restaurant that a bit more upmarket.  The staff are happy to organise tours for you, if you need it.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. We are smiling to hear that your theme park holiday was  a success. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Convenient location within walking distance to the parks which is a must. Rooms were clean, wasn't too afraid if my toddler walked around the room barefoot unlike some other hotels with dingy carpets. Service was friendly and accommodating I would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  We are happy to hear that you had a "Great Stay."  Your feedback is appreciated. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great hotel walking distance to Disney
Summary: We've stayed at this hotel 1-2 times a year when we visit Disney. It's clean and walking distance to the Parks. Free underground parking is also nice. The biggest let down this time was they no longer offer the free continental breakfast. No where upon booking did it state this change. In fact it still lists it as available. Thankfully there is a CVS on the corner and we picked up cereal/bagels there. I wish we would have been notified of the change. Other than that the stay was great. Beds are comfy and rooms are clean.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  First, we would like to say thank you for your patronage to the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Second, thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We are sorry to hear about your disappointment with our discontinuation of our complimentary breakfast. As a full service hotel, we are not actually required to serve a complimentary breakfast. We did give it a trial and found that guests liked to choose their own options when it came to breakfast. We do still serve a Hot Buffet Breakfast in our restaurant each morning for a minimum fee of $9.95 per adult if one were to choose. I checked our Ramada website and did not see a listing for a complimentary breakfast. If there is another website listing this information incorrectly, please advise so that we may correct it. Thank you again for taking the time to share your thoughts with us. Looking forward to seeing you the next time.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Courteous staff. Nice room, but couldn't find the AC control for the room. The fan in the room was way too loud. Got a little warm at night, but couldn't adjust it. Otherwise, room is spacious and clean.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for helping us see where we need to make some improvements. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience of your temperamental a/c unit. We are working on correcting this issue for future guests. We would also like to thank you for recognizing our friendly staff. Your kind words go a long way. Look forward to seeing you again next time.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Everything was perfect. Rooms, restrooms, outside view mean to say that i really enjoyed there. in future if i plan a trip in Vegas i will definitely be there to make my trip more interesting. i luv it..
Manager Response: A "Perfect Experience" - we couldn't ask for any better than that. Thank you so much for your kind review and for staying at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We look forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed in the King room for 4 nights. The bed was so comfy, the room was perfectly sized and clean. Loved that room service provided us with fresh soap every day after cleaning the room. The staff was super friendly and helpful. I would definitely stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Bianca:  Thank you for staying at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and for sharing your feedback with us. Our goal is to exceed guest expectations and so thank you for recognizing our efforts. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Front desk staff were super friendly and very helpful !!!   Always very happy and full of great info for the area, things to do and help with directions!!! Thank you for an amazing stay.  Great location to Disney and the Gardenwalk !
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are all smiles to hear that you had a "Great Stay" and that you found our location to be great and our staff to be friendly as well as helpful. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Brenda was great and very accommodating. Proximity to  places to eat  was good. My only complaint was the in hotel  restaurant.  None of our group  was interested at all in indian fare. Too bad because we would have ate there for every meal every day.  We had around 12 young  soccer players and they wanted to eat anywhere but there
Manager Response: Dear Ron:  It was nice to have your group stay with us. I am only sorry that we never got to meet in person. I hope your team had a great time at their tournament. We appreciate you staying with us as well as your feedback on our restaurant. The Gandhi Restaurant does serve some wonderful Indian food but we can definitely understand how it might not have fit the taste buds for your young soccer players' palettes. But, Glad to hear that you were able to take advantage of the other great restaurants walking distance to the hotel. Hope to see you and your team back again.  Sincerely,  Brenda Harris Director of Sales

Summary: Room was clean. I asked for a cot, but apparantly the room I got didn't qualify for a cot. Breakfast included would have been nice. Bathroom towels were very rough and felt like cardboard against your skin.
Manager Response: Dear Dawn:  We all need people who will give us feedback. That's how we improve. (Bill Gates)  Thank you for helping us to improve.  Unfortunately, as much as we would have liked, we were not able to supply you with a rollaway in the room for safety reasons. The Fire Department dictates these standards in order to keep you, as well as the rest of our guests, safe in case of an emergency. In regards to the towels, we do apologize if you found them to be a bit rough around the edges. We have taken note and have already ordered new linen. Thanks again for your feedback and for giving us the chance to listen.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I stayed here while I was visiting Disneyland so I didn't spend a lot of time in the hotel but it was perfect for what I needed and you could walk to Disneyland! The rooms were clean and had nice amenities. I also wanted a late checkout and they accommodated me without hesitation! Would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Natalie:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback. It is nice to hear that you found value in your stay and that our staff took great care of you. We are looking forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Happiest Place on Earth,  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel is conveniently located within walking distance to the Disneyland parks.  The hotel and lobby are beautifully clean and our room was super spacious and very accommodating, even with our four kids.  The front desk staff were very welcoming and my check in was quick & easy.  The staff are customer-oriented and pleasant.    CUSTOMER SERVICE - A++++ After leaving the hotel, we later noticed that we forgot an item.  I called back that very night and spoke to a staff member in regards to the item, but since housekeeping was gone for the evening, they recommended me calling back in the morning.  I called back in the morning, literally today (5/25/15), and spoke to the most helpful person I have ever encountered  at a hotel - Stephanie Ramirez.  I told Stephanie about our
Manager Response: Dear Thai:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations so it's nice to hear that you found our service to be A+. We appreciate you recognizing our employee Stephanie and the wonderful service she provided.  Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great location, reasonable price and free parking
Summary: Stayed here for Disneyland trip. The price was great, considering the location (one big block to Disney) and the free parking. The room we had was really large but the amenity was just ok since we had to bring our own toothbrush and stuff.
Manager Response: Dear Diana:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim appreciates your feedback regarding your recent stay. We apologize that you found our amenities to be lacking. We do provide the  normal amenities in all rooms: shampoo, conditioner, and hand lotion. However, other items such as a toothbrush can be provided by the front desk if needed. We appreciate your feedback as we continue to make improvements for future guests.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The room was spacious, clean and comfortable with a large bathroom for a Hotel room. A 10 to 15 minute walk to the Disneyland Resort. Our room was on the 3rd floor on the Katella side of the building and it was still very quiet. We will be staying at the Ramada Plaza again.
Manager Response: Dear Brook:  Thank you for staying at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are smiling to hear that you had a "very nice" stay. Looking forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: My boyfriend and I decided to go on a last minute trip to Disneyland and booked at the Ramada Plaza and we are SO glad that we did! They allowed us to check in early (no FEE) and leave our car safely parked for the two days we were at Disneyland even though we only booked for one night! They even upgraded our room since we checked in early and our room wasn't available! Super accommodating staff...great food around the corner...super close to the park...and CLEAN CLEAN CLEAN room!! I loved it! I will definitely be coming back!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us on Tripadvisor. We are smiling to know that you had an "Amazing" stay and we appreciate you recognizing our staff.  Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Convenient location at a good price
Summary: I booked the Ramada because I was going to the Convention Center and this it is walking distance.    I arrived at about 11:30 am (checkin is at 3:00) and they were able to give me a parking permit so I could leave my car there.  They also let me keep my car there until about 1:00 on Sunday.  Parking at the CC is $15/day so this saved me a few bucks.  Checkin was fast and convenient and the room looked like it had been recently remodeled.  I had a king on the 2nd floor, directly above the Indian restaurant.  You could open the windows but there's a LOT of street noise.  The AC blows very hard and very loudly so I used it as little as possible.  There's a fridge and microwave, though the fridge didn't do a real good job of keeping things cold.  There's no free breakfast but you
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for staying with us while you were visiting the Convention Center. We are happy to hear that you found our location of being walking distance to the Convention Center a help as well as being able to park your car early. We would like to apologize that your refrigerator was not being cooperative and that your a/c unit wanted to speak loudly. We have informed our maintenance staff of the issues and plan for both your refrigerator and the a/c unit to be more well behaved next time.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Close to Disney and restaurants. But the worst service ever! We spent all the day @ Disneyland, we only stay to sleep and every time that we arrived front desk call us complaining about been very aloud. First step in the room and the phone rang (12-1 am) kids sleeping after spending all day long in the parks (in strollers)
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for giving us the chance to respond to your experience at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. There are times when our Front Desk is informed by other guests of noise issues in the hotel. At that time, they usually point out a location or room number. We are obligated to contact that room number or room numbers in that area to correct the issue. If we contacted you incorrectly, we do apologize for the inconvenience. We can definitely understand how this would have been frustrating at the least. Please feel free to contact our General Manager if you would like to discuss this issue further.  If we haven't already, we would like to make the situation right.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: One of the best rooms I ever been! Very clean clean sheets very sophisticated I was impressed, better than Vegas! It was great.!!!  The only problem was I use two credit cards and I got charged twice the total of room in each card, but I over all it was excellent! Definitely I would recommend to my family and all friends and coworkers, thx remada Kees the good work
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your kind review. We are glad we were able to "wow" you.  We would like to apologize for the incident with you billing. We hope it did not cause too much of an inconvenience. Looking forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Everything I needed - and then some.
Summary: From the first greeting by the check-in counter person to my final conversation upon check-out, I found staff to be well-trained in respecting the guest.   And my entire stay confirmed the impression that this Ramada is well-managed right down to the last detail.  Grounds, halls (and most importantly) my room were immaculately clean and were kept that way throughout the long (three-day) convention weekend.   Room featured a well-running, roomy refrigerator, microwave, widescreen TV - room AC was quiet (when selecting "sleep" feature on its controls) to run overnight, which was a necessity for this slightly-humid, slightly-warm May in Anaheim.   Room itself was very quiet - even though the hotel seemed to be well-booked.   Near Disneyland, Anaheim Convention Center - and many
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations so we are happy to hear that we succeeded during your recent stay with us. Thank you for your review and for recognizing our hard working staff. Your comments go a long way. We look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel was great. Very reasonably priced, clean, nice size room, friendly staff. The pool and sauna were nice. The look of the hotel was updated. Best of all we could watch the Disneyland fireworks from our room :)
Manager Response: Dear Karrie:  Thank you for staying at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and for sharing your feedback with us. We are smiling to know that you found us to be a great hotel as well as our staff to be friendly and the rooms to be clean. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: It is a clean hotel with great service and very close to the parks Only if you're too tired to go out, it may be a bit far to walk out
Manager Response: Dear Jorge:  Thank you for your feedback. The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had a great stay and are looking forward to seeing you again next time.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: My daughter participated in the Tinker Bell 1/2 marathon and we stayed the weekend at the Ramada Plaza and it was awesome. Close to all the activities and the both parks, the staff was friendly, professional and considerate of our early arrival. The hotel was clean and the room amenities were very good. Thank you for making our weekend memorable.
Manager Response: Dear Barbara:  Thank you so much for you kind review and for acknowledging our friendly staff as well as the cleanliness of the hotel. We feel our employees do a great job and it is nice to hear that you felt the same. Hope you and your daughter had a great time at the Tinkerbell Marathon. We are looking forward to seeing you again next year!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Cons: Stayed prior at this location and Breakfast was included in my past stay.  On this one we did not realize that the breakfast which is provided by an in hotel restaurant was not included in the price that we had.  So we needed to make arrangements to get some items for Breakfast from the 7-11 across the street.  The Refrigerator worked but did not keep things as cold as needed.  Needed to get Ice and pack the fruit drawer to ensure that the Milk we purchased stayed cold enough.  Pros: Rooms are good for my family of 5 which include 3 young children.  Price is comparable to a bit better for this location.  It is about a 10 minute walk to the entrance of Disneyland which is the reason we stay here when traveling to Disneyland.  Best thing about this location is the parking
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your honest review regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We would like to apologize regarding the issues with your refrigerator and for the inconvenience you experienced. Regarding the breakfast.. we are a Ramada Plaza and being such, the brand does not require that we offer a complimentary breakfast since we are a full service hotel and guests are able to purchase a Hot Buffet Breakfast at our restaurant. We are glad to hear that you appreciated the value that our complimentary parking added to your stay and our great location of being walking distance to Disneyland. Looking forward to hosting your next stay!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Convenient location to Disneyland, just don't eat or swim there!
Summary: I would recommend this hotel if you are looking for a convenient place to stay near Disneyland.  The cleans are room and our beds were comfortable.  The front desk staff are friendly and helpful.  We chose to go in the hotel restaurant for breakfast.  The food tasted terrible and the food choices were unappetizing. The eggs were cold.  The toasters did not work.  The swimming pool area is very outdated with broken and dirty pool chairs.  The hot tub looked scary.   Very moldy and dirty.
Manager Response: Dear Laurie:  Thank you for staying at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and for sharing your feedback with us. We are sorry to hear about experience with our pool and restaurant.  However, we appreciate your feedback so that we may work to improve these areas.   Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: My wife and I stayed in ramada  ,for 2 nights , we wanted a close spot from Disney, ramada is perfec located about 10 min walk, front desk is very helpful, hotel is very clean ,I will definitely come  back , yes I recommend ramada , for your next vacation to anaheim california
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are happy to hear that you had an excellent stay and that you appreciated our great location of being walking distance to Disneyland, as well as the cleanliness of our hotel, and our friendly staff. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is ok.  It was a quiet and clean experience and the staff was nice, but the hotel is showing signs of age especially in the bathrooms and around the window frames.  The hotel is not keeping up with the other hotels in terms of amenities such as free breakfasts and shuttles.  The pool area could use some upgrades as well. I would only recommend this hotel as a last resort.  The internet is very slow.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback as we continue to make improvements at our hotel. We would like to sincerely apologize for the issues that you experienced. We can definitely understand your frustration and are presently working to correct the problems.    Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed for a trip to Disneyland and a half marathon in the park. Overall, decent accommodation that is clean but starting to show a little wear and tear. Staff was super friendly. It's about a 10 min walk to the park and ten minute walk to Garden Walk for many restaurants. We didn't try the pool or restaurant (Indian) but seemed clean.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. Our goal is to exceed guest expectations and your comments will help us to move forward in doing so. Thank you also for appreciating our friendly staff and for noting our great location of being walking distance to Disneyland. We hope you had a great time at the Disney Marathon and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: simple place to stay close to Disney
Summary: I was there for two nights with 5 people. it was just very simple and quite enough to sleep. close enough to walk to the park and other places around. if you are in a budget then this is a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Luis:  Thank you for you kind feedback and for recognizing the value in your stay and for pointing out our great location - walking distance to Disneyland.  Looking forward to hosting your next stay!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Stayed for one night , forgot some clothes there , called next day , their house keeping refused to give back and lied nothing found , be careful staying at Ramada inn guys!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  First, we would like to apologize for the confusion that took place regarding your misplaced items. We can definitely understand how frustrating this was and we are working on making the communication regarding our Lost and Found items a better one between departments. If you would like to speak with us further regarding this incident, we would be happy to talk to you.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel was lovely. Our room and our beds were super comfortable. There are many restaurants nearby and a 7 eleven around the corner. Disneyland is only a short leisurely 10min walk away
Manager Response: Dear Betty:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had a lovely stay. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Located a block from Disneyland, the Ramada Plaza was priced very well, was clean and quiet (4th fl). Front desk staff were exceptionally friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Stephen:  Quiet, close, and comfortable - we are happy to hear that we succeeded in all these areas. Thank you for your review. We look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed there at the end of the month and it was wonderful! Friendly and efficient staff, close to Disneyland, air conditioned rooms and a fun pool! We had a great stay!! It's within walking distance to Disneyland and when we got too tired to walk the front desk sells the shuttle passes to Disneyland so you can take the shuttle! Wonderful,  wonderful Wonderful!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are glad to hear that you had a great stay. Looking forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We spent 2 nights in the Ramada whilst visiting Disney. Great location so you can walk in 15mins. In the opposite direction are a number of restaurants (Cheesecake factory. PF Changs etc) so if you don't have a car, the cost can be kept low.  The front desk staff were very helpful but the free breakfast was pretty ordinary, served in the in-house curry restaurant so there was a curry aroma which didn't feel right first thing in the morning. I am sure their curries are better than the buffet breakfast.  Not sure what they use to clean the rooms but the odour isn't that nice.  The room was clean however
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim appreciates your feedback. We will use your comments as we move forward in making improvements at our hotel for you and future guests. Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: It would have been nice to have a welcome book "binder" in...
Summary: It would have been nice to have a welcome book "binder" in the room tell you about the hotel amenities and a map of the hotel. The curtains balloon out when you turn on the AC and traps the air near the window. I had to open the curtains to cool off the room and now I have bright lights shining in my room
Manager Response: Dear Richie:  Great feedback!  We appreciate your time in sharing your comments with us. It helps us to know where we need to make improvements.  Thanks Again!  Sincerely,  Management  Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great Place, Walking distance to Disney Parks
Summary: My family stays here every time we go to Anaheim. Free Parking, Breakfast included rates. The staff at Ramada Plaza Anaheim has the Disneyland spirit. Always Smiling and very kind and helpful...LOVE THIS PLACE
Manager Response: Dear Tony:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for your patronage over the years. With so many hotels in the area, we truly feel honored that you chose us. See you next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Decent stay near Disneyland and the convention center
Summary: I stayed here while I attended Star Wars Celebration Anaheim 2015 and went to Disneyland.  It was a decent stay.  Rooms seemed older but fairly well kept.  The staff was very courteous and helpful.  Probably the best feature of the hotel.  They always greeted and smiled at you as you came in.  They even went out of their way to help me when my bag was delivered late from my flight.  I ate breakfast at the attached Indian restaurant.  They had a very good and cheap ($10) breakfast buffet.  Far better and cheaper than anything else I found in the area.  It also had free WiFi.  I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Glad to hear that your stay was successful at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We truly enjoyed hosting the attendees of the Star Wars Convention and welcome you back anytime.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Definitely Recommended to stay with when visiting Anaheim.
Summary: Booked this hotel due to it's close proximity to both the Anaheim Convention centre and Disneyland. Excellent value for it's location, facilities, (free breakfast, parking and room wifi), and most importantly, good service. Definitely staying here again if I am visiting the area. Thanks Brenda!
Manager Response: Don:  What can I say?  Your energy and smile brightened our lobby and our day throughout your entire stay. We appreciate your feedback and kind words.  Come back soon. We miss you!  Sincerely,  Brenda Harris Director of Sales Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Room was clean and comfortable.  Close to Disneyland. Easy walk to the main gate. Although it would have been nice to have had a continental breakfast offered.  But overall was a good experience.  Staff were friendly and courteous.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for sharing your feedback and for recognizing our great location - walking distance to Disneyland, as well as our friendly staff. We appreciate your patronage and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Really great within walking distance of everything.  The wifi was slow but the room was awesome.  Clean and well maintained.  We stayed there for 4 nights.  The staff was very friendly.  They had really good breakfast too.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback. Thank you for recognizing our friendly staff and for noting our great location - walking distance to Disneyland.  Looking forward to seeing you the next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Good hotel & location but is in need of a refurb
Summary: Hotel was in a good location with only a few minutes walk to Disneyland, the Anaheim convention centre or a number of restaurants  As I was the rid for a convention it was perfect for my needs of free wifi and a place to put my head at the end of a long day at the con.  It is in need of a makeover or at least some maintenance and TLC as powers socket covers, toilet handle, sink plug, and shower all were in need of repair/replacement. I noticed a new Ramada was being built nearer Disneyland so possibly when that one opens this one will get a refurb maybe?  Staff were very friendly and helpful though so can't fault them there
Manager Response: Dear Matthew:  Thank you for staying with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim during your convention. We appreciate you recognizing our great staff and for your honest feedback.  It helps us to see where we need to improve as we move forward with improvements for the future. Looking forward to hosting your next stay.  Sincerely,  Management  Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The room was fine - 2 queen beds and a modest bath.  The bath didn't seem to have a vent fan which made using the bathroom a bit difficult after showering but not a major problem.  The room was quiet and had all the basics covered well.  Overall, a good room.  What made it even better was the location of the hotel - directly between the Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland.  Made it possible to walk everywhere we wanted to go.  Very convenient.  The breakfast buffet was a nice addition.  It was included in the price of the room but the food was only of average quality.  Still beats not getting any meal at all.  Staff was very friendly and fixed a glitch when the room price showed up higher than what was on the reservation.  They also quickly fixed a defective room safe.
Manager Response: Dear Eric:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience of the bathroom fan not working properly. We are looking into the issue and are glad you brought it to our attention. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed here while attending an event at the Convention Center. Positives - it was a quick, five minute walk to the Convention Center so we left our car at the hotel, we could see the fireworks at Disneyland through our window, and the walls in the rooms were thick so we slept well. Negatives - this hotel definitely needs a facelift. Everything needs paint, new carpet and updated decor. Also, breakfast was included with our room. It was served in an Indian restaurant downstairs. It was totally unappealing even when compared to other bad hotel breakfasts!! For the price we paid I wouldn't stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Mindy:  Thank you for your honest feedback. We will take your comments into consideration as we strive to make improvements for the future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel location was prime, but the facilities seemed outdated.  The food was of poor quality, and the pool is awkward.  The staff was friendly at least.
Manager Response: Dear Allie:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations. We are sorry to hear that we did not succeed during your stay, However, we will review your feedback as we make strides to continue to improve for the future.  Thanks Again,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great Location - Great Hotel - Great Staff!
Summary: I have taken large performing groups to Disneyland 14 times.  For the last few times, I have chosen to stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and now I won't go anywhere else.  Whether you are alone, with a family, or have a large group, this is the place to stay.  I could not have been more impressed with the staff, the hotel itself, and the location.  The staff was accommodating and polite.  I highly recommend and when I come back to stay with just my family, I plan to stay here as well!  Thank you to the staff for a very enjoyable stay!
Manager Response: Dear Mark:  Thank you so much for the kind review you gave the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. It was a pleasure to work with you and to serve your group. We welcome you back anytime!  Sincerely,  Brenda Harris Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Average, in need of a re-vamp, but some good points too
Summary: I guess you get what you pay for and I suppose I would rather pay a little more and get a nicer hotel .... Personal preference! The hotel has a fab location, only 10 mins walk from Disney and surrounded by handy shops and restaurants. The staff are friendly and helpful. They offer complimentary parking and breakfast, which is good. The pool area didn't look very enticing, a fenced raised area in the carpark and I admit we choose not to visit it. Generally the decor was a little tired, thread bare carpet in the hallway,  tatty sofa in our room. But it was all clean. Wifi was a bit flakey too! With a little investment this would be a great hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim appreciates your honest feedback.  As we move forward to make improvements at our hotel, we will keep your comments in mind. Thanks again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We were very happy with our room, service and location of the hotel. We will definelty recommend to friends and family! We bought discounted night stay through Travelzoo which was an amazing deal. I was thankful the hotel staff allowed us to stay parked at the hotel during our last day at amusement park even though we had already checked out. Thank you
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your experience with us on Trip Advisor.  We are happy to hear that your Disneyland trip went well and we look forward to welcoming you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This is my only choice for a hotel when I stay for a Disney trip.  The staff is super nice and very helpful! The rooms are very clean and beds comfortable.  Amenities are great!  Nice walking distance to Disney.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for making us your choice when travelling to the Disneyland Resort Area.  We know you have many places to choose from and we truly appreciate your patronage as well as your feedback. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This is one of the better hotels I've stayed at super convenient Disneyland was around the corner and lots of good food at the other corner. They could invest in towels they were kinda hard and a bigger trash can at the end of the hallways so I could throw my trash I don't like letting it collect in the little trash can in the room my OCD sorry but so glad I got this hotel the other ones were just as close buthe looked ruined down a little
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim appreciates you taking the time to share your feedback. We will take your comments into consideration as we continue to make improvements for future guests. Looking forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Beds weren't comfortable. Towels are not soft. Room size is...
Summary: Beds weren't comfortable. Towels are not soft. Room size is good. Pool is only 4 feet deep, our kids didn't like that. Close to Disneyland and the Convention Center. We had lots of problems with our internet not working. It went down several days in the week!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback on Trip Advisor. We appreciate your feedback and will use you your comments to improve for the future. Although most people find our beds to be very comfortable, we can understand that everyone has different preferences. We are presently reviewing new towel vendors and hope that the next time you find your towels more to your liking.  Thanks Again!  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We have stayed here multiple times because of the central location to Disney and the convention center. The included breakfast is ok, could use some change from day to day. The parking is good. The staff is really friendly. There was some confusion on our reservation but the staff took care of it. They are going to have to drop their price or do some major remodeling to keep up with the newer resorts.
Manager Response: Dear David:  Thank you for your patronage and for sharing your feedback. We appreciate you noting our friendly staff, great location, and complimentary parking. Further, we will review your comments as we continue to strive to make improvements for your next stay.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: It was a nice cozy not too expensive hotel.. Rooms were good sized close walking distance to disney parks.. Good breakfast and nice heated pool.. Rooms were clean and beds were comfortable.. Our stay was excellent we realy enjoyed it and i cant think of anything that went wrong..
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Wow! Thank you for your kind review. At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations. Therefore, it makes us happy to hear that we are on the right track and to know you experienced a great stay. We hope to see you again soon. Thanks again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed here when we went to Disneyland. The hotel is in a great location, very centrally located. We were able to walk to Disneyland (about a block away) and there are lots of places to eat around the hotel. The room itself is nice and clean and has everything you need. We will stay here again for sure!
Manager Response: Dear Angela:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback. We are happy to hear that you found our location convenient and our rooms nice and clean. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel was clean, comfortable and quiet. Parking was easy and walking to the park was a piece of cake! We just wished the onsite restaurant was more generic. Indian food, although might be good, just not our cup of tea.
Manager Response: Dear Lisa:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is pleased to hear that you had a wonderful Disneyland Trip. Thank you for your feedback and for recognizing the value of our complimentary parking and the convenience of being walking distance to Disneyland.  We hope to see you again the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I've stayed here many times over the years during the Los Angeles Religious Education Congress and it has always been very comfortable.  The hotel is clean and the employees are very friendly.  The rooms are kept updated and you get a free breakfast also.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for patronage. We are glad to hear that you had another comfortable stay and that you found the hotel to be clean and our staff to be friendly. We strive hard to exceed guest expectations so it is nice to hear that we are succeeding. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Great hotel highly recommended staff was friendly and very helpful. Rooms were very clean and up to date highly recommend hotel good location with plenty of entertainment within walking distance.Underground secured parking was a big plus.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback on Trip Advisor. We appreciate you noting our clean rooms and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Hskp entered our room removed the wet towels and even took $10.00 we have left next to the tv. We were going to leave the $$for the housekeeper any way.  But definitely  that was not the way to do it since we had placed our "do not disturb " sign.
Manager Response: Dear Vanessa:  First, we would like to apologize for our staff not respecting the Do Not Disturb Sign on your door. This is definitely not acceptable and we have addressed this issue with them. Regarding your other issue, we are researching the matter. If you would like to speak with management further, please feel free to contact us.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: I will never stay there again
Summary: I was having a family trip and as I was opening the sofa bed I find the most disgusting thing I found men's dirty underwear and to the fact that I was gonna put my baby girls to sleep there I will never return there it just shows how bad your housekeeping does their work....
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  First of all, we would like to apologize for the embarrassing situation that took place during your recent stay. We promise you that this is not the norm and we can definitely understand how this would have been an unwelcoming surprise. We have made some changes in our inspection of rooms prior to a guest's arrival in order to prevent such an incident to occur again. We do hope that you would consider giving us another chance.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Great location(walk distance to Disney), very clean, safe(I was there with my 3 children without my husband) and great Indian Restaurant. Near convenient stores, pharmacies and restaurants. Would stay there again if we go back to Disney!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Glad to hear that you loved the Gandhi Restaurant and that our close proximity to Disneyland worked well for you family. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is well-located for walking to the Anaheim Convention Center, several other big hotels, and to pick-ups for Disney. It's a good place to stay if you want to get away from CC work or business meetings in the area. The hotel staff is smart, young, energetic, and helpfully efficient. The rooms are pretty safe and quiet, and the hallways are hushed and inviting; sleep comes pretty easily. The Ramada has restored its free, daily American breakfast service which is a big plus. A number of decent restaurants are nearby (e.g., PF Chang's, CPK, Cheesecake Factory). I really enjoy eating too @ the Ghandi Palace (Indian cuisine of course) inside the Ramada's main building. This was my second business-related stay at this property. I will go there again in a few months.
Manager Response: Dear Butch:  Thank you for your patronage and for sharing your experience on Trip Advisor. We are glad you found the Ramada Plaza Anaheim to be a perfect fit for your convention stay needs. Looking forward to seeing you again next year!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Staff was amazing.  Hotel is nice clean rooms clean. Within walking distance to restaurants and Disneyland. Would recommend this to anyone. Great location to Disneyland beat for families. Will stay again.
