Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Your weekend getaway sounds like it went well. Thank you for recognizing our amazing staff and what a wonderful job our housekeeping staff does in maintaining the cleanliness of the rooms.  We are happy to hear that you found the easy walk to Disneyland a plus. Hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Location Excellent within walking distance. Parking excellent too. Breakfast was excellent, just need to have extra cooking ready at beginning, because it goes very fast at beginning.  Would like to have some yogurt in the future.  Rooms were excellent, well taken care of by Susie, very nice lady, Thank You. Front desk was excellent.
Manager Response: Dear Eduardo:  Thank you for your feedback and for recognizing our wonderful staff. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable time at your conference. Your feedback is valuable and we will take it into consideration as we continue to make improvements at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We enjoyed our stay at your hotel.  The desk personnel were very friendly and helpful.  I wish your dinner could continue breakfast vouchers or if there is a  cost problem; at least have breakfast for a reasonable price $5-$6 range. My only complaint was the cleaning staff helping themselves to money left in a drawer when we were at the conference.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  We appreciate your review and are glad to hear that you found our property well maintained. We will take your comments regarding our breakfast into consideration. In response to you comment regarding our housekeepers...we have not experienced such issues before so this concerns us. If you have not already spoken to our General Manager about this matter, we encourage you to do so in order to clear up the situation.  Regards,  Management Staff Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I have been staying at this hotel for 5 years now when coming to Los Angeles Religious Education Congress at the Anaheim Convention Center. This hotel is excellent. I have no complaints. The breakfast buffet is delicious. The rooms are clean and well maintained. And it is ideally located to the Anaheim Convention Center. I will continue to use this hotel in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Dan:  Thank you for your patronage to the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are glad to welcome you back year over year. Thank you for your feedback and for acknowledging our great location to the Anaheim Convention Center. The Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland Park are an easy 10 - 15 minute walk from our front door. Looking forward to seeing you next year!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Aging worn rooms and 2015 no longer includes breakfast
Summary: We have been visiting Disneyland almost exclusively using this hotel since early 2009. In 2009 the excellent attached restaurant breakfast buffet included, flat screen TVs, and well maintained rooms, made it an excellent value.   My review is based primarily on the 2 Queen Deluxe room with sleeper sofa. Though I have tried the non-sofa rooms in the past. We stayed here for 4 nights.  While my review below may look critical, I still give the room and hotel 3 out of five for average. And even at average, I find it much better than many of the closer hotels that either charge way too much per night. Or that have terrible rooms and poor amenities. I still recommend this hotel, but aging will need to be dealt with soon. This is still my main recommendation for a value stay within
Manager Response: Dear Shawn:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would first like to thank you for your patronage. We truly value guests like yourself.  Further, your feedback is important to us as we move forward in ways to continue improving for the future.  Some of your issues have already been addressed. We have recently re-wallpapered our hallways and new carpet has already been ordered.  We are also working on new bedding.  Rome wasn't built in a day and, unfortunately, our Anaheim gem of a hotel takes time as well to make all the great improvements we have in store. We thank you for your patience as we take one step at a time. Hope to welcome you back again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The staff at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim were extremely amazing and friendly, Stephanie at the front desk went above and beyond her duties to make my stay as pleasant as possible, my job takes me to  Anaheim quite often, I will continue to stay here as long as there is employees like Stephanie working there. Look forward to visiting soon!! Thank you, Joe F.
Manager Response: Dear Joe:  Thank you for the kind review and for recognizing our staff member Stephanie. We value your patronage and look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: The property was well maintained and up to date but I felt...
Summary: The property was well maintained and up to date but I felt the food left something to be desired. The in room internet could have been a little stronger.
Manager Response: Dear Mark:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and sharing your experience on Tripadvisor. We apologize that you had some issues with the internet and are working on correcting the problem. We can definitely understand how this might have been frustrating.  Hope to see you back soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Recommend this Hotel for Disneyland Family Vacation
Summary: My family of 4 plus in-laws stayed at this hotel for a 2 day trip to Disneyland (our first).  Hotel is in a very good location, approx. 15 mins walking from the park entrance (very easy walk).  Parking is included in the stay - outside or underground.  Free breakfast buffet for all of us was also a big reason to stay here.    We required a crib in the room and the hotel provided that at no charge.  We were also able to buy Disneyland admission tickets at the counter (at a wonderful discount!).  Parking was extended past our checkout for the entire day we spent at the park - this was a huge convenience.  Free wifi in the room was very good - had no trouble streaming through Netflix, for example.  Room also included a fridge, microwave, and safe.  Lots of space for families!
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Jeph:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for writing such a nice review.  Your feedback shows us that we are on the right track.  We hope that you give us the chance to host your next stay,  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is really nice for Anaheim. It was clean and spacious and has great beds. We had a couch and a little coffee/fridge area and coffee table in our room. The TV's are great. I love that they offer free parking and the hotel is so close to Disneyland. The rooms are also clean and have great showers. The hotel staff wasn't that friendly of accommodating, but they weren't exactly Rude either. All in all, this is a great hotel and we would definitely stay here again in a heartbeat!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback regarding you recent stay. "A Great Hotel"  are words that we appreciate hearing.  We take your comments seriously and will use them as we continue to find ways to improve in the future. Looking forward to hosting your next stay!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great place to stay with your family for Disneyland
Summary: Within walking distance from Disneyland and save yourself $15 for parking.. plus you will need that extra money for  Disneyland.. the restaurant at the hotel smells great and you must take a walk down to the restaurants and eat at The Cheesecake Factory!!!
Manager Response: Dear Mark:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is all smiles knowing that you found us to be "A Great Place to Stay With Your Family."  Your feedback is important to us and we appreciate you taking the time to share your comments with us and Tripadvisor. Looking forward to seeing  you the next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: As annual pass holders, we wanted to a bit closer then we had in our previous trips to Disneyland. This hotel fit the bill - It was about 1 1/2 blocks away and real close to some nice restaurants (P F Chang's, Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gump Shrimp) Our stay was pleasant and the room was clean and comfortable. However, we went during a week that is very slow and quiet in Disneyland and the hotel was not even 1/2 full. We were placed next to a family who were up at 630 am with screaming children. They did leave with in an hour of getting up but we felt that there was no reason for them to place a couple in an adjoining room next to a family of 4. This is our only complaint and like I stated otherwise it was a pleasant stay.
Manager Response: Dear Lorine:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We understand that overall, you had a great stay except for some noise issues from the family next door.  Unfortunately, we cannot predict such incidents ahead of time. However, we can definitely understand your frustration and apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you.  Thanks again for letting us know.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great hotel near Disneyland but the best was the person at...
Summary: Great hotel near Disneyland but the best was the person at the front desk soo kind and friendly the room was pretty good !!!
Manager Response: Dear Vanessa:  Thanks for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and thank you for acknowledging our Front Desk staff and what an amazing job they do. Looking forward to hosting your next stay!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The ultimate convenience location. Not only is it a quick 10 minute jaunt to Disneyland, it's a 5 minute walk from nice (if unoriginal) dining and shopping. The rooms were ideal; spacious, clean, and contemporary. And, on top of it all, the price was near unbeatable. We will stay here every time we go to Disneyland from now on.
Manager Response: Dear Frank:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is all smiles knowing that you had the "Perfect Disneyland Stay." Thank you for sharing your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you back soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: great hotel.  Rooms could have been a little cleaner,  the first room they gave  us just had construction done in it and was still dirty.  They promptly switched us to a other room with no hassle.  10 minute walk to disneyland.  I'd stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback on Tripadvisor.  Your comments are valuable to help us in order to know where we need to improve.  Although we are not doing major construction at this time, we are making some minor improvements in certain rooms that we are excited about. We are sorry to hear that you got caught in the middle of it. We clearly did not communicate well. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the mishap and we are happy to hear that you still found us to be a "great place" to stay. Looking forward to seeing you next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We spent 2 long days at Disney Resort and it was nice to come back to a clean, comfortable and quiet place to recharge. The staff was welcoming and helpful. It was nice to have a place a park without charge. Just a couple of things, not complaints really, but things you may want to know. The restaurant downstairs is an Indian Cuisine place although they did offer a breakfast buffet. We were looking for a place to order alla carte but that was not offered so we passed. The room was good sized and the bed comfortable. The only thing I will mention that was a negative to us was the bathroom. The bathroom was huge but had absolutely no counter space. First thought on seeing it was "what were they thinking?"
Manager Response: Dear Dave:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for your feedback on Tripadvisor.  Further, thank you for recognizing our "clean and comfortable accommodations."  We are sorry to hear that the Gandhi Restaurant did not meet your needs but,  hope that you were able to find something more to your liking in the numerous restaurants that are walking distance to our hotel. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I've been to Disneyland so many times and have never stayed at hotel so close in walking distance as The Ramada Inn. Location was convenient and close to resuturants. I really enjoyed my stay here, I highly recommended this Hotel. I will difennetley stay here again in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Missy:  Thank you for recognizing the convenience of the Ramada Plaza's great location to Disneyland Park, We are happy to hear that you had a great stay and are looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Very clean hotel, friendly and helpful Staff. Hotel is close to theme parks (10 min walk) and shops (restaurants and small boutique style shops) 3 min walk away.  Free coffee making facilities in front foyer.
Manager Response: Dear Kevin:  We couldn't be happier to hear that you found our hotel to be "Clean" and our staff to be "helpful."  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you the next time you are  visiting the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Forgot a few things and they had them there at the front desk and had a problem with noise from the room next door and they moved me no questions asked! I enjoyed my stay! Will defiantly be returning! Everything was clean in order and the staff were great! Quick check in & out!!
Manager Response: Dear Tiffany:  Thank you for your feedback. We apologize that you experienced some noise issues during your stay but are happy to hear that we were able to remedy the situation. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Near everything you need. Shopping , restaurants, Disney etc. Small pool that feels like it is in the parking lot though. We parked our car to check in and never used it after that. Disney right accross the street. Well lit at night. A lot of people walking around. Clean and safe feeling.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for recognizing the convenience of our location and our proximity to Disneyland and other great places in the area. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and look forward to hosting your next stay!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Everything is good. We didn't have a window toward Disneyland Park, therefore, we didn't see the firework. Anyway, it's very convenient to walk to the park. Nice spa and pool area. Next time, we can make a reservation directly with the kind staff and get the breakfast included.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  "Nice and Convenient" are good words to describe the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Thank you for sharing them on Trip Advisor. We look forward to hosting your next stay!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: My wife and I stayed there about 5 years ago didn't have a problem with the room or anything else  . But on this stay we weren't happy this time , housekeeping didn't do a very good job cleaning,  we found a condom wrapper between the nightstand and wall . Then we had to get up at 1:30 in the morning and switch room's because the air conditioning in the room stopped working.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim aims to exceed guest expectations and we are disappointed to hear that we fell short during your recent stay. By all means, these incidents are unacceptable and we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. We are working quickly to correct the issues for future guests. If you would like to speak with us further regarding any of these incidents, please feel free to contact our Management Team  Sincerely,  Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: After our reservations were mixed up at the hotel next store, Stephanie at the front desk gave us a great deal and made sure our work trip went smooth.  She went above and beyond and made sure I had a late check out while waiting to be picked up. Thank you!
Manager Response: Dear Cory:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and that you found our staff to be "Awesome."  Also, we appreciate you acknowledging our Guest Service Representative Stephanie. Looking forward to seeing you soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Our family of five was very comfortable here. We had plenty of space and it was clean, comfy, and affordable. It was such a short walk to Disneyland that we even popped back to change out of wet clothes and shoes.  The free parking, no resort fee, and free breakfast made it an even better deal. Also near shopping for those inevitable things we forgot to bring. Definitely worth it. Oh, and the rooms are inside, not like most of the motels a tad closer to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Cindy:  Thank you so much for your kind review. We are happy to hear that you had a great stay and hope to see you and your family back again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaeim

Summary: Not the best ,but for a short stay ok .young man and young lady in the eve really nice at front desk .but in the morning very rude lady's running the front desk ,poor guest service could really start treating guests like you would like them to return instead of making them go elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we take customer service seriously so we were saddened to hear that you experienced some issues in this area and apologize for the inconvenience. We will not take this information sitting down, In fact, we are already up and running to make your next stay a better one.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: For the valué and the location is what you world expect,and the personnel are very helful and professional. Also the calentones of the premises as well as general location is close to everithing that your needs coild be and if you need entertainment tickets they will do everithing in theire power to acomodare your needs.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  We are happy to hear that you had an "Excellent" stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  Your feedback is valuable as well as appreciated. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The only reason I didn't give 5 stars, is the rooms are a little dated but they were clean and good sized and the pool was not heated. Other than that the staff was great, kudos to Sandra at the front desk, we enjoyed  our stay and would definitely stay again. This was a Disneyland trip so it was a perfect location. I would rate this hotel 4.5 stas overall.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  We appreciate your feedback and thank you for acknowledging our Front Desk staff Sandra. We apologize that you had some issues with the temperature of the pool. We are monitoring the pool on a daily basis now so the same problem does not reoccur. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Located within walking distance to Disneyland, shopping and dining. Rate was reasonable, rooms were clean and staff was friendly and helpful. If you choose not to walk the block (or two) to Disneyland for a small rate you can catch ART (Anaheim Resort Transporation) that runs every 25 minutes and can caught right outside the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Trish:  Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The rooms are clean and nice.  Staff is very nice.  There's a bar on site, but we didn't go because we didn't know about it until the morning we left.  The restaurant has a very nice waiter but the breakfast wasn't that great.  They serve Indian food for lunch and dinner but we didn't get to try it due to or travel schedule.  It was a quiet hotel and in a perfect location for Disneyland.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review on Trip Advisor. We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback. I am sorry to hear that you found the breakfast not up to standards. We have shared your review with the owners of the restaurant so that they  may continue to make improvements in this area in order to serve you better next time.  Thanks Kindly!  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I chose this hotel for my daughters birthday trip to Disneyland, and I'm glad I did! After a 3hr drive, we arrived just before 12pm. Our room was ready for us and we were allowed to check in early! I was happy to learn of their underground parking (which is gated at night). The girls at the front desk were friendly and helpful with all our questions. The hotel has a beautiful lobby, and everything was clean and tidey. We stayed on the 3rd floor and it was blissfully quite for our stay. The room (2 queens) was nicely decorated, and clean. We found the beds to be very comfortable, and slept well. Bathroom was a little small, but fine for the two of  us. No,they no longer offer breakfast,but we found it fun to pick up some goodies from CVS on the corner so no biggie at all.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  We are so happy to hear that you had a "Wonderful Stay" and Happy Belated Birthday to your daughter. Looking forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I have stayed @ this Ramada for years. Never was excited to use reservations in Manilla to book thru my Rewards Program, but worth the inferior doesn't understand call center. NOW... Hotel no longer has the complimentary breakfast... Price doesn't go down. I like the covered parking & you can walk over to Disneyland. Microwaves & Refrigerators in the room still wonderful pluses. Staff @ the front desk still terrific while they have to apologize for the many changes to the hotel.. I will go back to my Hilton Family properties & Marriott Family/ this is probably why I have more points @ those locations.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for sharing your feedback with us. We are sorry you were disappointed with our discontinuation of our complimentary breakfast. As a Plaza, we are not required to provide a complimentary breakfast, but in the past, we did it as a courtesy. Unfortunately, with the increase of food items year over year, we felt that we could no longer offer the service complimentary. However, we do still offer a nice breakfast for an economic cost. Further, as you mentioned, we do not charge for parking (many hotels in the area charge $10.00 to $35.00 a day). We do not charge for wifi, and we do not tack on a dreaded Resort Fee.  All of these are added value into the rate that many hotels in the area would add on as an additional costs. We value your patronage and hope that you would reconsider staying with us the next time you are in the area,  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Nicely updated, good location, horrible breakfast.
Summary: The staff was very nice and friendly, the rooms were clean and comfortable, but the breakfast was the same bad eggs, spongy potatos, dry bacon and greasy sausage every day.  The orange juice was good and there was hot coffee.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us regarding our hot buffet breakfast. We are always  looking for ways to improve and your comments will help to lead us on the right track.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: If you're coming to this hotel simply for a vacation stay, then I'd recommed it very highly. The staff are friendly and helpful. The rooms are spacious and clean  (althouygh could use an "update") and it's plenty close enough to the main attartactions that bring you to Anaheim. However when it's convention time, the Ramda Plaza raises its prices (just like everyone else in the area) to take advantage of the convention crowd, so I don't think its unreasonable to evaluate it as a business hotel. From this point of view it is lacking. These days email is esssential to modern international business travel and with a wi-fi connection that is intermittent at best, important work was not getting done. Update your wi-fi guys.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us on Trip Advisor.  We agree that good wifi is important to business as well as leisure travelers.  We are working with our vendor in  order to improve for future guests. Thanks again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I was in town on business, the front desk folks were very helpful, the breakfast was fine and the room was clean and pleasant. I would skip the Indian restaurant in the lobby, I love Indian food and am sorry to say the food there was just awful. I ordered onion Bhajees and when they came they were just regular fast food onion rings. My stomach was upset all night after the meal. Stay away from the restaurant and you will have a very pleasant experience...
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. Sorry to hear that your stomach did not agree with our restaurant. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: nice place, old bathrooms, bad breakfast
Summary: I enjoyed my recent stay, the hotel is well placed and the staff were exceedingly friendly. Generally the hotel was clean and well appointed. However the bathrooms were terribly outdated, fixtures were rusty, tap flowed terribly and there was zero counter space (just a sink).  The complimentary breakfast was consistently cold (eggs and bacon). After the third day i decided to go out for breakfast. I'd consider other hotels in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  We appreciate your feedback. If you aren't satisfied than neither are we.  We have taken your comments into consideration as we continue to strive to make improvements each and every day.  We are sorry that you did not find the breakfast and bathrooms up to par and we have added these items to our TO DO LIST.  Thanks Again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We do a convention in Anaheim every year.  And we stay at this hotel every year.  And every year we remember why.  Parking is a breeze and no extra charge.  WiFi is free (albeit a tad unreliable sometimes).  No extra charge for receiving packages, etc.  And the front desk staff is fantastic.  They are nice, personable and eager to assist.  They have everything prepared before you get there and when we have any needs, they are happy to help.  Breakfast has improved this year.  Not a 5 star meal of course, but good eggs, bacon, etc buffet style.  Fine for breakfast before you get the day started.  Very convenient to Disney or the Anaheim Convention Center.  The rooms are spacious and the beds are comfortable.  Refrigerator and flat screen in every room.  It's not a huge hotel so I
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel is clean, tidy and the room was comfortable and clean.  However, the wifi is very unreliable, and when it goes down it is down for a long while as the IT support is apparently based remotely and has to travel.  Also, the fact that the breakfast is served in disposable crockery and with plastic cutlery appears cheap and is out of sync with the appearance of the hotel.  The exercise room is poorly equipped for a hotel of this size, is very small and the TV remote control was missing rendering the TV unusable.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  We are sorry to hear that you experienced some issues with your wifi. We recognize the importance of wifi during a business trip and that is why we are working hard to make it run smoothly for the future. We appreciate your comments and will take them into consideration as we strive to make continuous improvements.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I arrived at the hotel early in the morning and had asked if they would let me park there (for an extra fee if needed) so that I could take my kids to Disneyland for a while and come back and check in for the night. I was so surprised when the lady at the front desk said that I could do an early check in because my room was available and the best part was that I didn't even have to pay extra for the parking. And as everyone knows parking is a big deal all around Disneyland. The room was great, the beds were comfortable, I even liked the pillows (sometimes they can be a little flat). The walk to the park is only down the block which after a day of walking was even manageable. Overall this place was great. A little pricey but I would pay that again for the convenience.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Met our expectations, we would stay here again
Summary: The staff was very nice and helpful. We didn't arrive until after hours and the staff working around midnight was impressive. Kelsey was really good about combining our 2 reservations so we wouldn't need to change rooms during our stay. The room was very spacious and allowed us plenty of room for the 5 members of our family. The hotel was about a 15 min walk from Disneyland and had plenty of food options next to the hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback and for acknowledging our Guest Service Representative Kelsey. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed at this hotel December 28, 2014 - January 2, 2015 for a Disneyland trip.  I planned the trip a little later than I should have for this time of year so this was the only hotel I could find with decent reviews.  It is about 15-20 minutes (not 10 minutes) walking distance to the actual entrance to either park.  No shuttle service. Our adjoining rooms were not ready for 3 hours after check-in time!  Once we got into the rooms, they rooms were fine.  The breakfast was gross and no one in the breakfast area spoke English. I asked for bacon (because there was bacon the day before), and the Indian lady looked at me like I had 2 heads. It is not the hotels fault that many of the guests were sick and sneezing, blowing their noses but it just seemed like a breeding ground for
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations so we are disappointed to hear that we fell short during your recent stay. However, we do not take your feedback lightly and are working quickly to turn these issues around. We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced and hope that you will consider giving us a second chance.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I've stayed here numerous times and have always had good service.  The rooms are clean and very well maintained, and it's conveniently located to the Anaheim Convention Center, The Garden Walk, and Disneyland.  It could use a remodel, and the walls are a bit thin (can hear quite a bit from the hallway), but the price makes that easy to overlook.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Our 2nd stay - highly recommend this hotel
Summary: This is our 2nd time staying at this hotel, our first trip was Christmas 2013, our 2nd trip January 2015.  It is very clean - their housekeepers were the sweetest and friendliest that we have met while travelling across America.  Location is excellent - it is situated on a major intersection, Kapella and Harbour and the OCTA bus stops are at each of the 4 corners, so really convenient if you want to catch a bus anywhere.  Disneyland is about a 10-15 minute walk - close enough to head back to your room for an afternoon nap before heading back to Disney for the fireworks or the World of Color.  Our room was on the third floor and overlooked Harbour, so we could see the Disney fireworks from our window. Some great little food/souvenir/alcohol/convenience shops next door and across
Manager Response: Dear Tracy:  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us on Tripadvisor. Sorry about the tea but glad that we were able to accommodate. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: My husband and I have already decided this is going to be our hotel again the next time we go back to Disneyland. The hotel workers were consistently helpful. The room was clean and quiet. Great place to rest your feet after walking around the theme park all day. And speaking of the theme park, it only took 15 minutes to leaisurely walk to Disneyland's gates. !!! We totally recommend this place.  Oh! They no longer do complimentary breakfast tho.  Just FYI. ...but really, we wouldn't have needed that perk anyways when there are so many great restaurants nearby!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disneyland!
Summary: We stayed here as a family group over the 2014 Christmas break, and found the hotel to be all that we had hoped for. Everyone at the front desk was extremely helpful and accommodating, the breakfast was very good, the rooms were clean and well maintained.  All rooms are inside the building (interior corridors) which makes the place desirable even in bad weather.  Also, the secure, free parking is a real advantage!   From the entry of the hotel to the Disneyland entrance, it is about a 15 minute walk, if you walk quickly. Our only wish was that breakfast started at 7 AM--6 AM would have been better, for some of the "earlybirds" in our group!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. Your opinion is valuable as we move forward with ways to improve for future guests. We are tickled to know you found us to be a "Great place to stay near Disneyland."  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Perfect location and amenities for Disneyland
Summary: Very nice mid-quality hotel.  Not the Hilton or Marriott but also much more reasonable.  Breakfast buffet was very nice - hot waffles, pancakes, eggs, sausage, etc.  Room was pleasant and served our needs.  CVS is across the street so that is very convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim we aim to exceed guest expectations and your comments will help us to go forward in making improvements for the future.    Thank You,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Very nice looking and clean hotel. The bed was pretty firm, maybe a little too much for our liking. Also the rooms let in a lot of noise (hall,neighboring and room above,outside). Nice breakfast and the staff was top notch. It would be nice if the breakfast started at 6 instead of 7 for those who need to leave earlier. I would definitely do it again with my own pillow and some ear plugs.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We would like to apologize that you experienced some noise issues during your stay. We do try to address such occurrences immediately when we receive a report. We can definitely understand your frustration.  We will review your feedback as we continue to make strives to improve each and every day.  Thanks Again!  Sincerely,  Management Team Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Our stay at Ramada Plaza Anaheim was fantastic. The staff was very accommodating, each and everyone of them were courteous and went above and beyond to make sure we had a great stay. Upon our arrival we were greeted by Edna, not only did she greet us with a bright smile and warm welcome but also commented on what a pleasure it was to meet me in person after talking with me on the phone when making reservations. Edna actually remembered all the details of our conversation, she and the rest of the staff did all in their power to meet our needs. We were amazed at the detail cleaning the staff does. Not only were our rooms very clean but I  looked out one day and the staff was cleaning the outdoor fountain and also scrubbing the  pavement around it. A couple days later the ladies
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback and for recognizing our Guest Service Representative Edna. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel. Would recommend it and we will definitely...
Summary: Very nice hotel. Would recommend it and we will definitely stay again. Couldn't connect to the WiFi though
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience of not being able to connect to the internet.  Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Friendly and courteous front desk staff! Great free breakfast AND free on-site underground parking. They had so much food to choose from at breakfast that my kids went crazy trying to decide what to eat and they ate so much we didn't even have complaints about being hungry at the park. It took us about 10-15 minutes to walk to the front gates of Disneyland. It can be a hard walk for little ones but if you have a stroller you're set. We paid to in a lot at the park the first day and had to walk further to our car than to the hotel (this lot didn't offer a shuttle). Some great decent priced food places around and lots of little stores with cheaper quality Disney souvenirs but if you're on a budget its an idea. We ate at a good pizza place and taqueria next door. It's not a fancy
Manager Response: Dear Adam:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for your review. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: It was a good hotel, the location was perfect all the attractions were closed also the convention center in a walk distance. In general every thing was excellent except the wi-fi was low special and the breakfast was the same everyday.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are happy to hear that you had a very good stay and look forward to welcoming you back in the future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great Christmas vacation at Ramada Plaza Anaheim
Summary: We were pleasantly surprised by the size of the property and hotel rooms. The staff was amazing; restaurant, front desk and housekeeping! A special thank you to Sandra who was always above and beyond helpful. A wonderful Disney location property!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your review and for sending kudos to our Guest Service Representative - Sandra. We are happy to hear that the Ramada Plaza Anaheim was able to contribute to your great Christmas vacation. Looking forward to hosting your next stay!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This might be a good place to stay if you do not need a room safe (they could not fix it despite four attempts), enjoy cold eggs, cold sausages, cold pancakes and raw potatoes for breakfast - the warmest item at the buffet was the cereal. Perhaps some guests might enjoy the novel experience of the hotel misplacing airline tickets, passports, and other documents that were to be kept in the hotel safe (since the room safe was not fixable). Added to this fun filled little slice of heaven are paper thin walls through which one can hear your neighbour snoring, then yelling at the children starting as early as 6AM. While the staff will tell you that it is only 'two blocks' (therefore no need for a free shuttle), what they do not say is the 'blocks' are 400m (1/4 mile) EACH before you
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim we aim to exceed guest expectations. Therefore, we are disappointed to hear of the experience you had during your recent stay. In reference to the noise, we do try to address any noise complaints immediately after being notified. Further, as of January 1st, we have made some great improvements to our breakfast and have had positive feedback from our guests.  Although most people find the 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland reasonable, we do understand that the distance might not be for everybody and in such a case, we would recommend the Anaheim ART bus which is $5.00 a day for adults, picks up in front of our hotel ,and may be purchased at the Front Desk or we might also suggest taking a short taxi ride.  We would like to extend our sincerest apologies for the inconveniences you experienced. If you would like to speak with us further regarding your stay, feel free to contact our management team.  Sincerely,  The Management Team Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great Hotel right across the street from Disneyland
Summary: We got a great rate through Expedia $200 per night, for 6 adults with a decent breakfast buffet and the room was really nice.  Staff were helpful and there were NO hidden parking or resort fees on top of what we paid Expedia.  Check in was fast, parking plentiful and check out was simple.  I will use them again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest: Thank your  for your kind review. At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations so we are happy to hear that we succeeded during your recent stay.  Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The Ramada Plaza exceeded all of our expectations and I highly recommend it, especially for families who would benefit from the all you can eat breakfast buffet included in the cost. The free on-site parking, free Wi-Fi and close proximity to the Parks were appreciated as was being able to check into our rooms upon arrival at 8am.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your kind review. The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you felt you received value for your money. Looking forward to hosting your next stay!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The room was comfortable. Staff was friendly. Rooms and bathrooms need updating.  Low water pressure and the toilet ran all night.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your review. We are sorry to hear that you had some issues with your bathroom. Please accept our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience. However, we thank you for bringing it to our attention in order to correct the problem for future guests.  Sincerely,  Management Team Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: we enjoyed our stay at this hotel. the people were nice and friendly and they treated us well, but I would recommend eating elsewhere because the food even though it was free with our stay wasn't all that great. the walk to The parks was not bad. only 10-15 minutes but the walk back was a bit hard I agree. they should think about shuttle service to and from the park. all in all I would recommend staying there and if I ever went back I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Laurie:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your experience with us on Trip Advisor. We appreciate your positive review and look forward to hosting your next visit to the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  The Management Team Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: All in all, not a bad experience
Summary: This is the second time we have stayed in this hotel, and we have had a pretty good experience here. We stayed here in March and December 2014 for Disneyland trips. It is about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland/California Adventure, which is fine in the beginning of the day, but a bit harder at the end of a long day, though this has nothing to do with the hotel. :) The parking is free, which is fantastic. They also have free wi-fi, though it is fairly slow. We stayed in a suite the first time, and an ADA room the second time as that was all that was available. The suite was phenomenal as it had tons of space, and wasn't too expensive. The ADA room was smaller, and not much cheaper. There was no counter space in the bathroom, which was a bit of a bummer. The toilet made a very
Manager Response: Dear Chris:  First of all, The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for your patronage. We are glad that you find the Ramada Plaza Anaheim a good fit for your traveling needs. We apologize for the noisy toilet.  We can definitely understand how frustrating that would be and we apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced.  Looking forward to seeing you again in 2015!  Sincerely,  Management Team Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Clean rooms, great location! Housekeeping was awsome we forgot shampoo at home and we were 6 they helped us out. At time of check out we seen our housekeeping crew as they were coming in on shift they thank us for staying at Ramada. They were more awesome than some of the front desk
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your positive review on Trip Advisor. The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback. We are happy to hear that you found our Housekeeping staff to be friendly and efficient. We have shared your review with them and your comments are more than appreciated. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Hotel needs to be renovated a decade ago! Hotel is very close to Disneyland - this is it's main advantage. That is all. I would not stay there if I new this before. Internet was working unstable. Breakfast was regular.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are sorry to hear that you were disappointed in the decore of the hotel. However, we do feel confident, no matter what your tastes, that the Ramada Plaza Anaheim offers our guests a consistently clean room at a great value. We appreciate your feedback and will use it as a way to continuously strive to improve.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We came for a conference and the hotel was extremely close to the conference center. The front desk staff was extremely nice. Parking is plentiful; which is nice. However, the hotel is extremely outdated, which makes it feel dirty. The carpet in the main hallways seemed old and dirty. The sheets on the beds are absolutely horrible. It felt like you were sleeping on a plastic tarp.  The rooms are large, which is nice for families with small children going to Disneyland, however the couch in the room looks like is extremely old. The restaurant in the hotel lobby is an Indian restaurant, so when we walked in we we greeted with a very strong smell of Indian food which is not that pleasant. Breakfast is included, which is very nice, but the hotel was extremely busy, so a lot of the
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we strive to exceed guest expectations. Therefore, we are disappointed to hear that you experienced less.  We feel that cleanliness and customer service are the most important  areas in a hotel, and we feel confident that we do meet these expectations. We are sorry that you felt the Ramada Plaza Anaheim didn't meet your standards. However, we will use your feedback as a way to continuously improve for you and future guests.  Thanks You Kindly,  Management  Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: So I stayed here in early October 2014 with friends while visiting Disneyland. Our room was pretty big for adults, and very clean. It was on the 4th floor and quite, didn't care for the fact that it was an adjoining room and the door was unlocked. The central air conditioning started leaking one afternoon by maintenance was prompted to fix.  Front desk staff was great they let us store our bags on checkout day while we wrapped up Disneyland as well as free parking.  The breakfast was good. It was a bit of a walk to disneyland and the shuttle was ok, sometimes unreliable.  But what grossed me out was when we went to the pool after a long day at disneyland to relax our legs and feet.  The pool was incredibly dirty with some kind of manual or instruction booklet and garbage at the
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your review with us regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are sorry to hear that you experienced some company while enjoying our Jacuzzi.  Unfortunately, we do not have control over nature but we do exercise preventative maintenance to ward off such intruders.  We assure you that this is no sign of the cleanliness of our hotel. if you read other reviews, you will see that we receive numerous positive comments on cleanliness. However, we do apologize for the inconvenience and hope that you will consider giving us another chance.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel is very nice, the room is big and the breakfast is good. It's very close to Disney.Staff was good but when I chek out I had dificulty understanding many thinks that she told because my Inglish is bad and she was not patient to explain more calmly
Manager Response: Dear Laura:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are glad to hear that you had a nice stay but are sorry if you felt that your check-out  lacked the patience we feel that all our guests deserve. We are deeply sorry for such an experience.  However, we thank you for bringing it to our attention so that we may address our staff how to handle such situations with more sensitivity in the future.  Thanks again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: The distance of the hotel to Disneyland was convenient...
Summary: The distance of the hotel to Disneyland was convenient. That was the only benefit of staying here. The girl that checked us in was sweet but the ladies that checked us out were rude. Stephanie couldn't stop rolling her eyes and Kirn was too busy wrapping something to look into our eyes to speak to us. They both acted as though they hated their jobs. The rooms were okay but the bathroom in one room smelled the entire stay and in the other room the bathtub faucet leaked. Neither room had a working air conditioner and the heater set off the smoke alarms. The bathroom doors are HUGE and one wouldn't lock. One room had a nice fridge and the other the fridge looked overused and gross. The beds were okay but the pillows were terrible, they were like beaten up travel size pillows.  All
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we strive to exceed guest expectations. Therefore, it saddens us to hear that you experienced less than that.  Guest service is very important to us, and we believe that if you were to read our other reviews, it would be quite noticeable that "Friendly Staff" is one of the most mentioned comments we receive.  We have reviewed the situation with our staff and have spoken with them on how they might have handled the situation better.  They are truly sorry that a miscommunication could have been mistaken as rudeness.  Again, we appreciate your feedback in all areas, and we will use it as a way to keep on improving for the future.  If you would like to speak with management further regarding your stay, please feel free to call us at (714) 991-6868.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Very close to disney, and did not break the bank. The hotel was nice, not a Ritz, but it did its job. Safe,clean,comfortable, and hospitalible. Beds were good the breakfast was more of grab and go and you can't conplain about that since most of us are going to Disneyland right away. And the price was always lowered as usual with my Wyndham rewards.
Manager Response: Dear Travis:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback on Trip Advisor. We are pleased to hear that you had a " Safe, clean ,comfortable,  and hospitable" stay."  We hope to see you again the next time you are visiting the "Happiest Place on Earth."  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Paid extra for a pull out couch that was so uncomfortable, they had to give us 2 comforters to place on top of it for it to be useable. They made splitting the bill very difficult and we almost never seemed to have room keys that worked. The "free internet" was one code given per room that only allowed 3 devices to use it. I've never been limited with my internet use at any hotel in which I was paying over $170/night for. Absolutely ridiculous. Would never stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Monica:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are sorry to hear that you experienced some difficulties during your stay. We understand that the internet is an important part of any guest's stay so we apologize that you experienced some difficulties. We have recently upgraded our wifi system in hopes to correct such issues in the future.   Thank You Again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel was just average.   Close to Disneyland and Convention Center.  However, breakfast buffet was very limited and not good. Low quality food options. Also required eat there,  not able to take anything to the room for children sleeping in.  Wi-fi was spotty.  Staff was friendly and accommodating.  Also Ice machines not working. Found only one ice machine working out of all the floors. Would not be my first choice.
Manager Response: Dear Snoopy Fan:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim thanks you for your feedback. We are always striving for ways to improve and your comments will help us to move forward on the right track. We apologize for the issues you experienced. We have ordered new ice machines and are awaiting their arrival. In regards to the breakfast...our breakfast is a sit down, dine- in, hot buffet breakfast. This is why we do not allow food to be taken out of the restaurant. Thank you again for your feedback. It is appreciated!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Overall, the staff was courteous but was not well trained...
Summary: Overall, the staff was courteous but was not well trained in answering questions beyond the normal guest service scope. Unfortunately, there was a smell issue in our hotel room where it wreaked of a poo smell. We couldn't figure out where it was coming from as we were able to smell it throughout the room and not so much in the bathroom. Yet, they insisted it was a plumbing issue with our sink. They poured some chemicals down the sink drain and called it a day, yet the smell slightly returned the following day. Please note that we were out of the room for most of our stay because we had to attend the convention for most of the day. The supervisor was really courteous and tried her best to resolve the situation, but I don't think she had enough support from upper management.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim strives to exceed guest expectations. Therefore, we are extremely disappointed to hear of your experience.  We can definitely sympathize with your situation and offer our sincerest apologies for the inconvenience that occurred.  Some times things happen beyond our control but,  we believe it is how one handles the situation that is most important.  It appears that we could have handled your situation a bit better, so thank you for bringing this to our attention. It is clear that we need to schedule some additional training for our front desk. Again, we apologize.  If you feel that the situation has still not been addressed to your satisfaction, we ask that you please contact our General Manager.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel is within walking distance of the parks. The breakfast buffet was good and the front desk staff was very nice. The room looked old, we had a light hanging out of the ceiling, the fan vent was broken and hanging off the wall. The toilet did not flush properly. The beds were fine, the sofa bed was not in good shape but are they ever? I won't stay here again, there were several options priced in the same range just as close to the park.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim aims to exceed guest expectations. Therefore, we are disappointed to hear of the issues you experienced during your stay. We can understand your frustration and we sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced.  This is not the impression we choose to leave with our guests and that is whey we are working quickly to correct these issues. Thank you for your feedback and we do hope you will give us another chance in the future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This was a very close and reasonably priced hotel for Disneyland.  Upon entering the hotel we were greeted warmly and given precise directions and details of the Hotel.  The complimentary breakfast was worth the stay.  Our room was very humid, we had to leave a window open to let all the moisture out and that let the noise in.  The Pool/ Jacuzzi area was clean, with fresh towels. The laundry area was clean and the Workout room, though very small had working equipment.
Manager Response: Dear Merrilee:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had a great stay in Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and are looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: There were so many things wrong with this hotel. First the headboard came off the wall and could have hurt my children. The air conditioning in the room did not work. The curtains were broke and would not close. This is the third time I have stayed at a wyndham resort and every time there are issues. I was very disappointed.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations and it is clear that we fell short during your recent stay.  These issues are disappointing and we extend our sincerest apologies to you and your family for any inconvenience you experienced.  We would love to speak with you further about the issues. If you have the time, feel free to contact our General Manager - Jane Bondoc.  We thank you for your feedback and giving us the opportunity to correct the issues for future guests.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great hotel for a Disney vacation
Summary: The Ramada Plaza sits 2 blocks away from Disneyland on W Katella Ave.  It's not the nicest hotel you'll ever stay in, but for the price you can't beat it.  It's about the same walking distance to the Disneyland parks as the Disneyland hotel, which sits at the far end of Downtown Disney.  The free breakfast buffet is great and saves you a meal in the park and you get free parking as well.  We've stayed in this hotel several times over the past year since we invested in an annual Disneyland pass and the few times we haven't stayed here, we've regretted it.  Overall, no major issues with any of the stays.  Breakfast for a family and 2 days of parking adds up to almost half the cost of staying here for a night, so you really can't beat it!  If you like Indian food, we'd also
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us on Trip Advisor. Your experience matters to us and we appreciate your patronage. We'll see you the next time you are visiting the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We travelled to Anaheim to attend an Anaheim Ducks hockey game and went to Disneyland while we were there as well. The staff at the hotel were very friendly and helpful; they provided us with information on the best dining options and what their location had to offer. We were able to buy our tickets for Disneyland right at the front desk - very convenient! Breakfast buffet was quite good as well.  Overall, the location was fantastic - plenty of restaurants within a couple minutes walk, very close to Disney, and a short drive away from the Honda Center.   Fantastic trip, would stay again!
Manager Response: Dear Anna:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had a great "Trip to Anaheim."  Sounds like you experienced a lot of fun things.  Looking forward to seeing you again the next time you visit "The Happiest Place on Earth!"  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The staff was very nice and helpful. Especially Edna and Bella while we were checking in. This hotel is very close to Disneyland and great restaurants within easy walking distance. The breakfast buffet was okay; the fruit always looked a little questionable but there were other choices. Our room was comfortable but could use a little updating. Otherwise not a bad hotel. The staff really make it shine.
Manager Response: Dear Araya:  Thank you for your kind feedback and for recognizing our staff Bella and Edna.  We think they are pretty special too. See you on your next visit!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Nice property.  We reserved as a last minute trip to Disneyland and requested adjoining rooms. I was pleased that my request was accommodated.  Easy 10 minute walk to the park.  Lots of restaurants nearby.
Manager Response: Dear Linda W:  Thank you for choosing the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and for sharing  our feedback with us. We are happy to hear that we were able to accommodate your request and that you had an enjoyable stay.  Look us up the next time you are in town!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Thanksgiving stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim
Summary: I'd rate our stay at the Ramada Plaza over the Thanks Giving break as an average with some positives and some not so positive experiences.  Positives: 1. great location within 10 mins from Disney parks and a variety of restaurants within mins from the hotel. 2. Very courteous and helpful staff at the front desk. Not so positive: 1. Gandhi restaurant was very disappointing...below average food and equally sub-average service...food was extra spicy and we had to literally flush down the food with water and beverages 2. Breakfast buffet at Gandhi restaurant that is attached to the hotel served the same menu everyday! 3. The air conditioners in our room was noisy...we ended up sleeping with windows open as the hotel couldn't move us to another room
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for choosing the Ramada Plaza Anaheim for your Thanksgiving stay and thank you for recognizing our friendly front desk staff.  We are sorry to hear that you had some issues with the restaurant and that your a/c unit was noisy.  We aim to succeed guest expectations and we are disappointed to hear that we fell short in these areas during your stay. We have passed your comments onto the appropriate departments so that we may improve for future guests. We hope to see you again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anahein

Summary: A good hotel.  The building was clean, and staff was friendly and efficient.  The complimentary breakfast was average, but they had a decent enough spread and it was all-you-can-eat so no complaints about that.  The room was clean and well appointed with a very comfortable bed, mini fridge, microwave, and coffee maker- but what hotel doesn't have a coffee maker these days?  And free wi-fi!  My only complaint is the noise level.  The a/c sounds like a plane taking off, and when the a/c wasn't running, I could hear my neighbors clearly enough that they may as well have been in my room.
Manager Response: Dear Hotel Visitor 91:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback. We apologize that you experienced some noise issues. We can definitely understand how this could have been frustrating. In regards to your neighbors, we will always address such issues directly with the room that is causinng the problem as long as we are notified. In regards to the a/c unit, we have passed the word onto maintenance in order to fix the problem for future guests.  Thanks Again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Pleasant Stay. This hotel is very close to Disneyland and great restaurants within easy walking distance. The staff was very nice and helpful. Especially Edna and Bella while we were checking in. They also provide decent breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Baskar:  Thank you for your kind review and for recognizing our wonderful front desk staff.. Your feedback is valuable as well as appreciated. Looking forward to seeing you again when you visit the "Happiest Place on Earth!"  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: best place to stay around disneyland
Summary: Family of 8 with 4 kids, breakfast is great, fresh and many options to choose from, we walked to the park easily, friendly staff, great beds, we were on a budget and didn't wanted to spend $$ in breakfast so this was a great choice. I will come back again for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Adan:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We appreciate you noting us as the "Best Place to Stay around Disneyland."  Looking forward to welcoming you back soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The staff was very nice and helpful. Especially Edna and Bella while we were checking in. This hotel is very close to Disneyland and great restaurants within easy walking distance. The breakfast buffet was okay; the fruit always looked a little questionable but there were other choices.  Our room was comfortable but could use a little updating. Otherwise not a bad hotel. The staff really make it shine.
Manager Response: Dear Stacey G:  Thank you for your kind feedback and for recognizing our shining stars Edna and Bella. They were happy to her your feedback, Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: My sister and I just got back from our third stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. It is located within walking system to both Disney parks. There are several restaraunts and other eating locations very close to the hotel. The people who work at the hotel are very kind and are quick to answer questions. Our room was very clean and except for a light that was not working everything was perfect. If and when we go back, we will stay at this hotel again. Oh yes, Internet speed was a bit on the slow side but it is free and so I am not going to complain.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your positive review on Trip Advisor. We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback and look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: While the entrance to the lot can be a bit small and nerve wrecking for people unfamiliar to the area, its location is ideal. Its located next to some local eateries and convinience stores, also a 15 minute walk to either downtown disney or the convention center, which sure beats paying for a cab or parking at the lots.  The rooms were clean and well stocked with even extra towels to accommodate larger parties.   While the complimentary breakfast isnt top tier, it does the job to get you started on your day.  Overall friendly staff and great stay everytime we book.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us regarding your recent stay. It's good to know that we are on the right track. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Little worse the second time around but still good
Summary: I booked this hotel November 2013 and had a wonderful experience. Everything was clean and well maintained, pool and hot tub were great. Breakfast isn't amazing but it is much better than most other hotels. Staff was awesome and the location is perfect. I decided to book it again this year but had a slightly different experience. The rooms were still in great condition and the fridge and iron worked fine. My complaints were admittedly small but annoying nonetheless. The elevators were not making very comforting sounds and the ice machine was out on every single floor. We would set our air conditioner as low as 56 degrees and the actual temperature of the air would never drop. This left the room a bit stuffy at night, making it a little uncomfortable to sleep in considering the
Manager Response: Dear Liz G:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback. We are sorry to hear that you had some maintenance issues with certain items during your stay. We can definitely understand your frustration and we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. We have passed these items onto our Maintenance Department and they are presently hard at work to correct the issues.  Thanks Again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Very handy location, walk to garden shops, disney and dining.  Best breakfast i've had so far on our journey throughout the States, large rooms, clean and tidy, not noisy an enjoyable stay.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Pros: I really liked everything. The friendliness of the staff really stood out as did the cleanliness and security of the parking lot. Cons: The ice machines were not working. I am not sure if this was due to the drought and wanting to save water, or they needed to be repaired. Location: The location is fantastic. It was an easy walk to the convention center. Lots of people heading to Disney which was quite close. We stayed here for BlizzCon 2014. I chose this hotel primarily for the location as it's but a 1/2 block to a block down from the Convention Center. The check-in staff were extremely nice, helpful, and pleasant. The entire facility is spic and span clean and well maintained. Our room had 2 queen beds with crisp sheets and plenty of pillows. The bathroom was immaculate.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience of the ice machine not working. It has been fixed. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: My stay was great and I had also stayed at this location the previous weekend of November 8th 2014 and I liked the property so much I selected to stay again.  The workers were friendly and helpful and the rooms very clean and beds very comfortable.  I would definately stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Glad to hear about your great stay. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Free parking a plus, large room with two beds and pull out sofa a plus and friendly staff. 5 minute walk to Disneyland and to popular restaurants, Cheescake Factory, California Kitchen, Bubba Gumps etc.... Free hot breakfast wasn't very good, food cools off too quickly in buffet trays. Place needs an upgrade.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Good standard hotel close to Disney
Summary: The hotel itself is up for a remodel. It's dated but well looked after. The room was big and had a separate couch and room to move. Everything was clean and worked.   Requested early checkin, but didn't get it due to the hotel being fully booked. A gaming conference and Veterans Day weekend were on. So once that was explained I was ok. Staff called me as soon as room was available.   The included breakfast was pretty standard fair but edible, with eggs, bacon, sausages, French toast, oats, cereal and toast.   You are about 10-15 minutes walk from Disney, and close to other amenities.   For Disney the hotel was great for the price.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for the feedback regarding your recent stay. We appreciate your comments and are working on ways to keep improving.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Pleasant staff but would not stay here again
Summary: This is a hotel that I am surprised has so many positive reviews. It was very mediocre, the pool is in the parking lot and our room smelled very strongly of bleach.  I was pleased we could open the windows as it was really overwhelming.  The room was small, dingy and we did not have a Disney view.  Breakfast was included but the dishes in the restaurant were not clean and I wasn't comfortable eating from them.  I was glad we were only there a few nights and had Anaheim not been booked up for a trade show I would have moved hotels on arrival.
Manager Response: Dear Mrs. EJ:  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us on Trip Advisor.  Your comments help us to see where we can make improvements for the future.  Although we do have some rooms that have views of Disney's fireworks, not all of our rooms do. Nor, do we advertise as such. We apologize for any confusion as well as the other issues you experienced.  We have passed your comments on to the appropriate areas and are working hard to make immediate corrections.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed 4 nights with our three kids (+ infant). The staff was awesome- and was very friendly. They gave dining tips, directions, and helped with everything. The room was clean. The hallways and doors are outdated, but that is about it. Breakfast was great- hot breakfast that was very well put together. We had no problem walking with a stroller the 15 minutes to the front gate of Disneyland. There are lots of food options around too. We felt safe the entire time too. We will definitely stay here in the future for Disneyland trips.
Manager Response: Dear Brandon:  We appreciate your kind review on Trip Advisor and are glad to hear that you found everything up to your standards. Looking forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This is the second time we stayed here. We like it because they have clean rooms, great breakfast, and the Disneyland main gate is a short 10 to 15 minute walk away. The front desk crew was very friendly. Nice place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Francisco:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would first like to thank you for your patronage. We appreciate you recognizing our staff and the value you received by staying with us.  Our doors are open for you and your family the next time you visit "The Happiest Place on Earth."  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I had 3 rooms reserved for our trip.  When we get there, we were told that someone checked into one of our rooms early.  I had to figure out that this person was not with our group.  After I told the front desk about this, they gave us another room and more breakfast vouchers but never offered to comp us for their mistake.  Don't get me wrong, the front staff was very nice and apologetic.  The breakfast
Manager Response: Dear Chris H:  Thank you for your feedback. We sincerely apologize for the mistake that occurred at check-in. The guest that was accidentally checked into your room had the same first name as you and almost exactly the same last name as you, so as you see, it was an honest mistake, We are glad to hear that our staff was able to correct the problem and that overall, you found your stay to be a "Good Value."  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: For a family of 4 this hotel saved us alot of money. Free breakfast, Free wifi and Free Parking. The walk to Disney is not that far.  I was able to buy tickets in the hotel and go straight to the main entrance of the park. They were really helpful. The front desk checked me in quick. I will return once again for the holidays.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We value your comments and look forward to hosting your next stay.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel looks old so that explains the stains but other than that everything's okay.  The room was big, a decent selection for breakfast, Wifi was fast, Staff was superb especially stephanie, Walk to Disney was less than 10 minutes, Walk to Garden mall was less than five, CVS, 7-11, panda, subway and other stores are a stone throw away.  The pool was nice and warm but the kids never got to use it 'coz they're all tired from walking all day.  Overall the hotel was excellent for the price. Ended up extending for two days more.
Manager Response: Dear Adec 96:  Thank you for your feedback and for recognizing our front desk staff Stephanie. We are happy to hear that you found the Ramada Plaza Anaheim to be a "Great Value."  Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Overall the hotel was clean. The shower head leaked when someone took a bath. We stayed  4 nights and the ice machine on our floor was broken the whole time. The sleeper sofa was uncomfortable to sleep on. I have a food safety certificate so it really bothered me when they put new food on top of old food at the breakfast buffet. The restaurant had a Serve Safe certificate posted therefore they should have known that was wrong to do. It made me wonder what they did in the kitchen how they prepared food to begin with.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to succeed guest expectations and we are disappointed to hear that we fell short during your stay. However, we appreciate your comments and will use them moving forward in order to improve.  A new ice machine is already on its way!
