In regards to the breakfast , the food brought out and the food already there were cooked at the same time. Hope this clears things up for you. We do hope you give us a second chance.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Cocroach infestation!! From the elevator on the 4th floor to the hotel room
Summary: We showed the half dead cockroach in our room to the hotel manager, they did give is a full refund but nevertheless it was disgusting and a huge inconvenience. I packed our bags right away and moved to another hotel at 10pm with my husband and 2 little kids.
Manager Response: Dear Purple:  Thank you for your feedback on Trip Advisor. We are sorry that you experienced some inconvenience during your trip but are happy to hear that management took care of the issue and compensated you for your stay. We do have a pest control company come on a monthly basis to prevent such issues. This is not a normal problem and in all fairness, I think it is safe to say that half of an insect would not institute an infestation of the hotel. We will continue to work to prevent such an issue for our future guests.  Again, we apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: My wife and I visit Disneyland several times a year, and we always stay at the Ramada Plaza in Anaheim. Every since discovering this hotel years ago, we always look forward to staying there on our trips to Disneyland. The rooms are wonderful, and the prices are great! The free breakfast buffet is a real bonus. We come so often that the staff greets us by name, making us feel like family. We wouldn't stay anywhere else! Can't wait to go back for our next visit!
Manager Response: Dear Shafter 11:  First, we would like to say thank you for your patronage to the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and for being part of our family,  Your feedback goes a long way and we appreciate you taking the time to share it with us.  Looking forward to welcoming you home on your next stay!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Exceeded expectations.  I came for a family vacation and this hotel provided everything we needed. Free breakfast for the 5 of us, was plenty of food to choose from and tasted really good.  The staff was amazing. Super friendly and helped us with everything we needed. Specially Bella and Kirn. Our room was super clean and very specious.  Housekeeping staff was very nice as well.   Will be staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Martha:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and for recognizing the efforts of our staff. We don't like to brag, but we too think we might be "the Best Hotel Near Disney." However, it is nice to hear someone else say it as well.  Looking forward to hosting your next stay!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Excellent choice for a Disneyland visit
Summary: Great service, clean comfortable beds and great location! (In the middle of Disneyland and the garden walk) I just love the front desk staff they are so wonderful and helpful! The hotel includes a free hot breakfast which is amazing and saved us a lot of money! Rooms were clean and I wished I could take the mattress home with me! We can't wait to come back to this hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Aurora:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us on Trip Advisor. We are happy to hear that you found us to be an "Excellent choice for a Disneyland Visit."  We thank you for staying with  us and look forward to seeing you soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The best part..the hotel :D , staff was amazing the girl that was in front desk that saturday and sunday was super friendly and she helped us to find the Disney tickets, also she arranged a transport for us , even if the hotel was 2 corners away.I didn't ask her name but she has beautiful grey eyes and she speaks spanish as well. The room was comfortable, clean, great view, location, with pool, sauna and the breakfast was delicious, a lot of choices and it was included with the stay.Parking free and very spacious, our stay was amazing I would come back again or chose Ramada hotels in my next trips.
Manager Response: Dear Ivetta:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay for your first trip to Disneyland. We appreciate your feedback and we thank you for recognizing our front desk representative with the beautiful eyes - Bella. She was happy to read your feedback.  Hope to see you again for your second visit!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Best Hotel in the Disneyland area
Summary: We arrived to the hotel early in the morning. We knew that we couldn't check in but we came inside to get a parking permit. Kirn at the front desk said that she will work her magic and she checked us in. She was amazing....she helped us purchase our tickets online and gave us all the information for Disneyland. If I wasn't for her we would be completely lost.  The  breakfast was great. The pool was open until 10pm and very clean. The room was very clean thanks the housekeeping Rocio.  I would definitely come back to the Ramada Plaza Hotel!  I recommend to ask for Kirn when you check in.....she has all the Disney info.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback on Trip Advisor. We appreciate you recognizing our Front Desk Agent Kirn and are glad  that she could assist in making your Disneyland trip a better one. Hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We have stayed at this hotel a few times and have been happy with our stay. I am a bit of a clean freak and this hotel was clean enough for me. One time it had a slight stinky smell coming out of the bathroom sink but not enough for me to not come back. Free breakfast, friendly staff, 10 min walk to Disney Land, and a very short walk to lots of places to eat AKA (The Garden Walk). The pool is tiny but they do have a work out room and covered parking. I stay again that is for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Gardea:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback. We pride ourselves on cleanliness so we are happy to hear that you found us up to your expectations.  Looking forward to seeing you again in the near future!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Another great stay! The check in and check out process was seamless. I asked for a room with views of Disney fireworks and the front desk was wonderful in finding me one. Beds were beautiful and comfortable and the hot morning breakfast is the best in town. Can't wait to go back in a few weeks!
Manager Response: Dear Christine:  Thank you for your kind feedback regarding your recent stay. We value your comments and are looking forward to seeing you again in a few weeks!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: A pleasant stay with great staff
Summary: My trip was hectic and and the traffic was brutal coming out of the airport... the headache type of trip.  IT WAS SUCH A RELIEF to come in to great staff and a smooth and easy check in plus my room ready ! which was spotless by the way. I had to write a review here to give kudos to you guys specially Bella at the front desk, she made my stay feel like a breeze. Professional and respectful. Also an employee that stood out was Rocia a very nice lady from housekeeping.  Cheers.
Manager Response: Dear Karina:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback on your stay. We are happy to hear that you had a pleasant visit. We appreciate you recognizing our wonderful staff members Bella and Rocia. They were happy to see your comments. Looking forward to hosting your next visit at the Happiest Place on Earth!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We got a room that slept 6, even though there was only 3.  That gave us all our own bed!  Room was very spacious.  We were there 5 nights (off season for Disney) and the place was very quiet until the last night when there was clearly an excited child in the room above.  But that happens.  Edna at the front desk was very helpful when our safe battery died.  All other staff at desk were friendly.  Free breakfast was good.  I have a 5 yr old, and we found the walk to the park nice and close, even at the end of the day.  No stroller!  Lots of restaurants nearby should you need them.  We did not move our van for 5 days.  The only thing the room needed was a small table and chairs, there was plenty of floor space for it and I think that would have been a nice add.
Manager Response: Dear Tinaka:  Thank you for your feedback and for recognizing our Front Desk Supervisor Edna. We value your comments and will take them into consideration for the future. Looking forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This is the second year we've stayed in the hotel for our Disneyland trip and will stay a third.  The staff is extremely friendly and helpful and it is within walking distance to the park.  They have free parking, continental breakfast and a later check out time than most hotels which works out nice when you are at Disneyland until midnight.  This is my go to hotel for all our family Disneyland trips.
Manager Response: Dear Disney G:  Thank you for your feedback and for making the Ramada Plaza your "Go To Hotel." We appreciate your patronage and look forward to welcoming you and your family back soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed recently (Oct 26-29) and enjoyed this property. Rooms were clean and very comfortable. Breakfast was good (hot, plentiful, options, etc.).   Staff was very welcoming and engaging from the onset. They handled issues as best as they could - within their ability - when they came up.  Our only issue was the wi-fi connection. We couldn't connect to the internet one time while we were there. This was a huge factor for me since I was supposed to do some work in-between personal time. The staff had no way at fixing this issue and was given lip service as to why this was happening.
Manager Response: Dear Patrick:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are happy to hear that you appreciated the value received during your stay. We are sorry to hear that you had some issues with your wifi. We can definitely understand your frustration. We have made improvements on our wifi recently in order to improve connection for future guests.  See you next time!  Sincerely,  Management Rammada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Rooms very clean, friendly & attentive staff, (Kirn & Andy are Amazing) convenient shuttle to Disneyland. We chose Ramada Plaza because of the great reviews on TripAdvisor and we were not disappointed! Great deal! We will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Cindy:  Thank you for your kind review on Trip Advisor. We are blushing. We appreciate you recognizing our staff and the wonderful service they provide.   Looking forward to seeing you the next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Our stay at Ramada was way better than many hotels we have stayed in. Very clean and on top of all things we needed.
Manager Response: Dear Kristi:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is pleased to know that you found our hotel to be "better than others." We appreciate you r feedback and look forward to hosting your next stay soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: My boyfriend and I stayed here Oct'14 for two nights during a Disneyland trip.  Great choice, for the price of the room the short walk to the park was well worth it.  Plus the hotel is situated in an area with a variety of dining choices..subs, pizza, Chinese, a liquor store...not to mention the whole Anaheim Garden Walk is just a block away.  The location certainly earned 5 stars. The room itself was also great, we had a large room with 1 King bed, overall clean and had a mini fridge and microwave.  The only minor downside to the room was how the shower curtain did not really serve it's purpose, with it stretched as far as possible water still flowed out onto the bathroom floor and created a small lake every time we used the shower.  Even with the shower curtain fail I would
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for sharing your feedback with us on Trip Advisor. We are happy to hear that you found our hotel to be of great value and that we exceeded your expectations.  We apologize about the shower curtain. We have brought the issue to the attention of our Housekeeping Department so that the issue will be resolved for future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Clean, friendly, and lots of food
Summary: We stayed on the fourth floor.  It was clean and the furnishings were new.  The rest of the hotel was very clean.  The staff, especially Edna on the night shift, were really nice and helpful.  The breakfast was awesome, there was a great variety and you were free to eat as much as you wanted.  Location was awesome, close to everything like groceries as well as Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Monie:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for your review on Trip Advisor. We are happy to know that you found our hotel up to a rating of 5 stars. Further, we appreciate you noting the exceptional service you received from Edna. We think she is very special too. Look forward to hosting your next stay!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We just stayed at the Ramada Plaza for our Disneyland Vacation. Walking distance to the park was about 10 mins, so that was pretty great. The staff was amazing and super friendly and we loved the towel elephant on our 1st and 4th night. The breakfast was nice, had a lot of choices. However our air conditioner was very noisy and we could hear the guest in the next room due to the adjoining door.
Manager Response: Dear Debborg:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim thanks you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback with us.  We are happy to hear that, overall, you had a nice stay. However, we are sorry to hear that you had some issues with noise. We can definitely understand how this would be frustrating and we do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced.   Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: great stay friendly service definitely come back
Summary: very comfortable stay spacious rooms great breakfast and lunch buffet friendly staff great location. Could upgrade the coffee machines with better coffee and the pool is a bit small but other than that it's a great place to stay with definitely recommend and would come again.
Manager Response: Dear Mya:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had a "great stay" and that you received "friendly service."  Your feedback goes a long way and we appreciate you taking the time to share it with us.  Looking forward to welcoming you back!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Nice stay overall but could do better
Summary: General maintenance seems to be a little lacking, eg safe not attached to wall properly, doors with patched up parts, walls with open screw holes where things that have been attached to the walls have been removed.  Air conditioning works great when it's on but it's loud. There is no low or medium fan setting - it's either max speed or off. So you need to run it overnight to keep the room cool so it goes on and off as per the thermostat. When it comes on during the night when you're asleep you think there could be a 747 about to land in the room.  Overall though the great location near to Disneyland (15 minutes walk), comfortable and clean beds, good size rooms, plenty of towels, proximity to good restaurants, and free parking make it a great value hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Alan:  Thank you for your review on Trip Advisor.. At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim we aim to exceed guest expectations.  This is why your feedback is so important. We appreciate you bringing the issues to our attention regarding your room and have put our maintenance staff to work right away to make corrections in order to serve the next guest in a better fashion.  Thanks Again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stopped by to get directions to a restaurant.  The staff at the front desk was very helpful and also offered us a deal for the next night. We switched hotels, trying the Ramada for the 1st time.  From check in to check out it was a fantastic experience!  Their jacuzzi was open an hour later than most hotels!  The room was clean, beautiful and well stocked.  The employees were welcoming and committed to making our stay a delightful one!  Overall it was top notch!!!!
Manager Response: Dear Karen:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had an "awesome" stay. Your feedback is well appreciated and our staff looks forward to welcoming you back in the future!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I just stayed at the Ramada Plaza while attending the PMA convention. The location is excellent..  walking distance to the Convention Center. The desk staff were great..  very nice. The restaurant, on the other hand was not great. Breakfast buns were stale, bacon (when they had it, was cold and tough.  On the day we were leaving for the airport and had a tight schedule, we waited for the 7:00 am restaurant opening to grab a quick breakfast but it did not open till 7:20. Apparently the cook didn't show up. Food was terrible..  Will stay here again just because of the location and price but will always eat elsewhere..
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay.  We hope you had a successful time at your convention. We do apologize that you had some issues with the breakfast. The restaurant is now under new ownership and we are working on making improvements day to day. We can definitely understand your frustrations and hope that you will be able to see the improvements on your next stay.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Love the location and service. As for our room we found used earplugs in chair and paper in drawers was written on. makeup on doors.. walls and carpet. Water stains on ceiling and walls. looked liked they never vacuum due to food and safety pins and clothing label on floor. Black hand marks on bathroom door. And windows had oily hand marks on it. Yuk...yuk...yuk.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim thanks you for your feedback on Trip Advisor. Further, we would like to apologize for dropping the ball when it came to the tidiness of your room. We assure you that at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we take cleanliness very seriously and are disappointed  to hear of your experience. We have brought your comments to the attention of the executive housekeeper and we assure you that this is a rare occurrence. Please accept our sincerest apologies for any inconvenience and we appreciate you bringing this to our attention so that we may work on correcting such an issue from occurring again.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We always stay here we feel comfortable. The only thing is this time when we got to our room they were not done cleaning it so we got grossed out. they should of never put us there in the first place. The breakfast was good and not that far from the park if you wanted to walk.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. It appears that there was some miscommunication between our Front Desk and Housekeeping at the time of your check-in and we do apologize. We aim to set a good first impression when you open your hotel room door and unfortunately this miscommunication did the opposite.  We are working on correcting this issue for future and we hope that we get a chance to set a better second impression on your next stay.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great place for a Disney vacation.
Summary: The rooms were adequate, and the staff was very accommodating. They knew the best food places around and helped get our rental vehicles on and off the property.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had a great Disney vacation.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us. Hope to see you again in the future!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We reserved a king room and upon check-in was not available. We were given a room instead with two smaller beds and upon inspection found them to be used/unclean sheets with long hair and the floor wasn't vacuumed. Called the front desk and was advised no one was available at this late hour, 12am, and we would get a new room tomorrow. We laid towels down and went to sleep. The next day we received the room we were promised. Upon check-out we were told that Jane the GM would contact us about this matter and we never heard from her or anyone else from Ramada.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we strive to exceed guest expectations so we are disappointed to hear that we did not succeed during your recent stay. To my understanding, I believe that the GM compensated you for your inconvenience as well as tried to contact you by e-mail. If you would like to speak with her further, please feel free to contact her at (714) 991-6868. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: It's a nice place to stay but when my husband and I were walking to the pool my husband saw something fall from the ceiling. We walked to it and saw it was a cockroach. As I started to walk to the desk I saw another cockroach close to the first. When I told the front desk they quickly responded and had someone on the phone and had someone else follow me to the cockroaches and she was using her walkie to talk to someone. We left for the pool and never saw a cockroach for the rest of our stay. We wondered if seeing the cockroach was a fluke. The place was really clean and the staff was friendly. You have been warned and if seeing the cockroaches was chance I would highly say this is a great place to stay.
Manager Response: Dear Kyrstin:  Thank you for your feedback. We are glad to hear that you had a good stay with the Ramada Plaza Anaheim with the  exception of the little guys you saw trying to take a swim at the pool. At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we do have a company service us on a regular basis in order to prevent such a happening.  However, we do not have complete control over nature and some times these little guys like to hop a ride in a box and show up to take a vacation like everyone else at the "Happiest Place on Earth." We do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced and we assure you, as well as future travelers, we operate a clean and professional full service hotel.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: This is what I wish I knew before staying here
Summary: We recently stayed here for four nights. We had never stayed at this Ramada but given what others had said on here, we gave it a shot.   Pros: * The rooms are good space complete with fridge and microwave. * The complimentary breakfast was good due to the selection and space to eat. They had pretty much anything you would want and lots of it.  * No parking or resort fees and plenty of parking in an underground garage.   Cons: * The WiFi was the worst I have ever experienced in any hotel ever. We could not get connected to any device. I called down to the desk and they tried to fix it but we could only stay connected for two minutes tops. it was very frustrating. I could get connected to the hotel next to me (but obviously could not be on their network without a password) but not
Manager Response: Dear Seniority:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We are sorry to hear that you had difficulty with your wifi. We can definitely sympathize with your frustration. We are presently working on correcting the issue and hope that you would give us another try in the future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: It was very accommodating, a little further than I would have like to Disney Land. But it was a pleasant experience. Liked the parking set up! The breakfast was really good. Only thing was it was warm in the elevator area and elevators ran slow.
Manager Response: Dear Stephanie:  Thank you for your feedback. We value your comments and will use them as ways to improve in the future. We are sorry to hear that you found the elevators to be warm and slow. We have recently improved on the a/c and ventilation in our hallways as well as in front of the elevator entrance to alleviate future issues. We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced and look forward to seeing you again on your next visit to Disneyland.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed at the Ramada by Disneyland for 1 week. It is about a 7-10 minute walk to the park. The staff were very friendly and the hotel room was bigger than the two other hotels by Disney I've stayed at.  They provided is a rollaway bed for our 3rd child. The staff always greeted us with a smile when we walked through the lobby and asked how Disneyland was.  Breakfast was provided as part of the stay and was actualLy really good and diverse. Fruit, juice, bacon, oatmeal, eggs, yogurt, cereal, muffins, milk, etc. Parking was a breeze and no stress as it was provided for as part of our stay and readily available. There is an ABC store close by the hotel for your needs. There was a fridge but didn't keep things super cold even on max however this is usually the case with these
Manager Response: Dear Jared:  Thank you for your blushing review regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are ecstatic to know that you found our hotel to be a great hotel and  noted are folks to be friendly.  Looking forward to hosting your next stay!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Good for the distance from Disney
Summary: Average room but pricy. Nothing fancy. Breakfast not the best. Great location from Disney, free parking at hotel and no need to drive so you save money on parking at DL which is great. Good to have restaurants within walking distance.  Internet was horrible, free wifi but it did not work very well.
Manager Response: Dear Nikki:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We apologize that you had some difficulty with our internet and were not happy with our complimentary breakfast.  We are presently working on improving in both areas and are aiming to have these issues corrected before your next stay.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Second time stayed at this hotel. Great location for disneyland which could be walked to in 10 minutes. Convenient buffet breakfast. As we were using public transport the corner of katella was a great place to catch buses to beaches, downtown , local shopping malls and pretty much everything else.
Manager Response: Dear Trevor:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you found our location a "Great Place to Stay."  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I went with family 2+2. Hotel looks ok from outside but needs a lot of improvements inside, especially the hallway carpets are really dirty. Room decor and furniture needs updates as well, they are kind of stuck in 90s. Hallways are pretty hot as they don't have any center AC. On our arrival the AC for room was turned off and it was hot like hell. It took the unit an hour to get the temperature down. Only two good things: Very close to the Disneyland and free hot breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Spotty:  Thank you for your feedback. Yes, we did experience some record breaking  hot weather recently in California that put our a/c units on overdrive. We have repaired any previous issues and look forward to greeting you to a cooler climate next time. We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Of the seven hotels we've stayed at along the 'golden mile' on S.Harbor Blvd, Ramada Plaza Anaheim tops our "best value" list!   Check in was a breeze, as was check out. Staff were the perfect mix of professional and friendly!      ROOMS:Good sized rooms(we booked a family room), comfy beds, fridge (make sure it's cold before you head out shopping) and microwave, an in room safe, and a nice TV.  Note: If you aren't comfortable with your room at check-in, be sure to ask to see another room. The front desk staff were accommodating when we requested a different room. We were very comfortable with our second room, which was brighter and had a fresher feel. Rooms were very clean and the service staff were lovely.     (side note: I did the white sock test on the carpet; not bad at
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your positive feedback regarding your recent stay. We are happy to hear that you had a great experience and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Kind Regards,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Breakfast is the worst I've ever had. Compliment to SB the front desk staff for her excellent services that help to make our stay more pleasant. No bell boys there to help with your luggages so prepare to carry them
Manager Response: Dear May N:  Thank you for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that you were not satisfied with our complimentary hot buffet breakfast. However, we are happy to say that the restaurant is now under new ownership and we are already seeing some great improvements in just one week. We can't wait to see what they have in store for us in the future! Thank you for noting the great service of SB. We look forward to hosting your next stay!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Stayed at Ramada Plaza Anaheim for 1 week.  A nice hot breakfast was included with plenty of selection to please adults and kids.  Rooms were cozy and maid service very good and we were given plenty of towels.  Within walking distance of Disney, the convention center and lots of shops and restaurants.  Was able to buy discounted Disney tickets from hotel staff.  There is a laundry available if needed.  The fridge was a nice size and kept our food and drinks cold.  The microwave was a bonus for us and we were able to reheat leftovers and make microwave popcorn for snacks.  This is a great option if you don't want to pay extra for parking, a hot breakfast and internet.  There were no surprise charges.  The hot tub was clean and hot and the pool refreshing.  It could use some
Manager Response: Dear Rachel:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim appreciates your feedback on Trip Advisor. Thank you for recognizing the value received in your stay and for pointing out our great location. We hope that you visit us again the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Overall good.. Clean central ..staff polite breakfast decent.. Shower was ok too..foyer area very nice.. Walk to Disney land and California Adventure Park.. No really big/bad issues for us!! Pool closed at 10 so good for a after dinner swim/spa.
Manager Response: Dear Valued guest:  Thank you  for taking the time to share your feedback with us regarding your recent stay with us.  We value your feedback and are glad to hear that we are on the right track. We welcome you back on your next stay in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great location. Friendly staff. All in all great time
Summary: Stayed here for our recent trip to Disneyland. It's a great location. They have a very friendly staff. And the rooms were great. We had no issues at all. I would definitely stay there again. And I highly recommend it to all my friends.
Manager Response: Dear Travis:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for your wonderful review on Trip Advisor. We appreciate you acknowledging our staff and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Regards,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This was a total win! It was super close to Disneyland (10min walk). The beds were comfy. The free hot breakfast was really good. And the staff was super nice! We will be coming back for sure. :)
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking  the time to share your feedback with us. We value your comments and look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great place to stay near Disneyland!
Summary: My family had a great stay at the Ramada Plaza!  The staff was friendly, the room was very clean and comfortable and the free breakfast was very good. The hotel is within walking distance of the Disneyland resort.  There were four adults and a teenager in our party and the room had plenty of space. The free breakfast included eggs, potatoes, cereal, bagels and more. The free wi-fi was great too!  I would not hesitate to stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Disneyfaen:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us on Trip Advisor.  We are happy to hear that you found the Ramada Plaza Anaheim a great place to stay and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Regards,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is about 3 blocks to Disneyland. We stayed 4 nights. We were pleasantly surprised that the free breakfast was more than just carbs. There was eggs, sausage or bacon, potatoes or hash browns, oatmeal, fresh fruit (oranges, bananas or watermelon), toast, bagels, donuts, muffins, 3 types of cereal, orange or apple juice, milk and yogurt available everyday. We are gluten free so this was excellent! The hotel is a little old and shows signs of wear in the rooms, even though the lobby has been updated and was very beautiful. The rooms were clean and cleaned well everyday. One maid even left our towels folded to look like a duck. The kids got a kick out of this. The front desk people were pleasant and were quick to respond to requests. It was great to have free covered
Manager Response: Dear Wendy:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim thanks you for your review and for sharing your comments regarding your recent stay with us.  We apologize that the hot tub was not working during your stay. We can definitely understanding how this would have been frustrating,  The repairs have been completed and it is now up and running again.  We look forward to hosting your next stay when you are visiting the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Business turned to worry free stay and pleasure
Summary: I stayed recently for 4 nights for business.  The rooms were very comfortable and clean and  the staff was so friendly and helpful.  I was nervous and they made me feel right at home.  I wish I would have been there for pleasure and could have stayed longer.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  We are happy to hear that you had a great business trip and that our staff was able to assist you and make you feel at ease.  Your comments are appreciated and we are looking forward to hosting your future stay. Hopefully the next one will be a leisure trip for you.  Regards,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Our stay this past week was wonderful at Ramada Plaza hotel.  Staff friendly, meals sufficient for our five person stay. Close to Disneyland made walking each way easy. Rooms were very spacious and clean.  Beds wonderful and bathroom huge. Had to put a towel in tub to ensure no one slipped when showering.  Bath mats should be supplied.  Toasters in breakfast room need replacing!  Hot tub was done while we were there, and only used pool once.  Too busy with the parks!   Such a hot week!  But the room was always cool, when arriving back to the room. We seen fireworks from our room window which had great darkening curtains. Loved our stay, and would stay again.  Used the Super shuttle to get to and from the airport, that worked well.
Manager Response: Dear Linda:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim thanks you for your kind review regarding your recent stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and have shared your comments with the appropriate departments in order to better serve our future guests. We aim to exceed guest expectations and value your comments. Looking forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Rooms are always clean and parking is great for my large SUV. Very close to Disneyland, Convention Center and Garden Walk Shopping Center. Internet access could be better, but works.  This is my second choice to the Disney Hotels.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  We are happy to hear that you had a great stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and that your SUV felt right at home too. We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback and we look forward to seeing you again.  Regards,  Management Ramada Plaza  Anaheim

Summary: We didn't need much. Just two double beds and a refrigerator. The location is close enough to the Disney main gate, we always walked. Also a short walk to Anaheim Gardenwalk. BUT...the hotel was so hot! The AC in our room would blow all night and if I stood next to it, I could feel cold air, but the moment you were more than two feet away, it was as if it didn't work. The thermostat said 52 degrees! The hallways were also hot. Only the lobby felt cool. If you are there during any kind of hot weather, be warned. Otherwise,although it does look rather tired and outdated, it was tidy and sufficient for our needs. The front desk was very helpful and friendly.
Manager Response: Dear Kimberly:  Thank you for your feedback.  We are sorry to hear that you experienced some issues with your a/c unit. California has been experiencing some major heat waves lately and our a/c has been on overdrive. We apologize for any inconvenience this caused. We have had repairmen out to rectify the issue. Hopefully next time we can make everything "just right."  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great Place for a Disney visit
Summary: We needed a place near Disneyland so we could watch our daughter run the 10k and spend time at the park with her and her family (including 3 grandchildren). We were a little late finding out, so we could not get space at a Disney hotel. After our stay, we do not feel that was a problem at all.
Manager Response: Dear Marty:  We are happy to hear that you found your way to the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We hope that your daughter had a successful race at Disney.  Hope to see you again at the Avengers Super Hero Marathon in November!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Could use some updates, but overall very nice stay!
Summary: I am a bargain shopper.  I have a large family (6) and need a hotel that has at least 3 double/queen beds, free breakfast, was in walking distance to the Disney resort and had free parking.  This hotel was the most reasonably priced, with the most reasonable reviews that included my criteria.  I will say most of the reviews I had read on TripAdvisor were very accurate.  I had read the tub was slippery, my 2 year old son, slipped as soon as he got in, hit his cheek on the edge of the tub and had a bruise for the rest of the trip. I had read that there were quite a few issues with the door closing properly/securely and this was very accurate.  One morning we left, went downstairs for breakfast and I had to run back up to room, only to find the door bolt had somehow came out and
Manager Response: Dear Jen:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for your honest review. Your feedback is important to us and provides us with a direction in where we need to improve. We are sorry that you experienced some difficulty with your door. We can definitely understand how this would have been frustrating and are working on correcting the issue as well as looking into the situation with the tub in your room.    Looking forward to your next visit with us!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We only stayed for one night but the hotel staff was exceptionally nice! They allowed us a very early check in and gave us a free upgrade so we didn't need a roll away. The room was big and clean and comfortable. Breakfast was good and the staff was very friendly and helpful there as well. Would definitely stay again and recommend to others. Also, it walking distance to Disneyland!
Manager Response: Dear Amy T:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are happy to hear that you found us to be a "Great, clean hotel."  Recognition is always appreciated. Look forward to seeing you next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Returned guest but this is the last time!
Summary: My family came here 3 years ago and we were so happy with the hotel, it's closeness to Disneyland and the breakfast. But this stay has changed our mind. We have paid for a 12 day stay and we have had nothing but problems our entire stay. The staff has been friendly and I have heard a lot of 'I am so sorry' but now I am getting annoyed cuz talk is cheap.  Quick summary: on arrival we get keys for another guests room which while we are trying to get the door to open the guest (who was sleeping) comes to the door to tell us the room is occupied. The next day we come back to our hotel after a long day at Disney to find our door is propped open with a latch and no one seemed to know how long the door was kept open. Luckily nothing was missing! Our water in our room is so disgusting
Manager Response: Dear Lindy_0007:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, it is our goal to exceed guest expectations and we are disappointed that we fell short in your case.  It appears a string of bad incidents  have put a damper on your stay and we can definitely understand your frustration and are sincerely sorry. I understand that the GM has made some compensations for your inconvenience. We do appreciate you bringing these concerns to our attention and will use them as a guide to retrain employees to improve in the future.  Kindly,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: The staff was pleasant & professional.  The rooms were...
Summary: The staff was pleasant & professional.  The rooms were clean & cool during the SoCal heat wave.  The breakfast was tasty & plentiful.  The couch was worn but the mattress & linens were good quality.
Manager Response: Dear Tom:  Thank you for your kind review and for recognizing our staff at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Your comments are truly appreciated. Look forward to hosting your next stay!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel was exactly what we were after - clean, close to Disneyland, effective a/c, friendly staff and an impressive breakfast. Lovely outdoor pool, very spacious room for family of four and quiet at nighttime. Thanks
Manager Response: Dear Jenny:  Thank you for your review on Trip Advisor. We are happy to hear that you found our staff to be pleasant and professional. We'll see you the next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Quiet, close to disney. About 15 mins walking with 2 y/o...
Summary: Quiet, close to disney. About 15 mins walking with 2 y/o and 4 y/o kids. Good selection for breakfast buffet. A/C in room 234 doesn't cool as fast as we wanted too but it did'nt really cause any discomfort to our stay. Need a menu available for public to see. Wanted to try some Indian food but did'nt bother to ask for menu. Ana from buffet breakfast area is very welcoming while Brenda is the opposite. There are good budget selection of restaurants about 5 mins walking distance and Cheesecake Factory and California pizza on the other side of the hotel, also about 5 mins walking distance. Ask for bus ticket and schedule if you need it. Otherwise you will have to pay $3 per adult and $1 per kid one way. Get ready for exact change, route 2 is the bus you need to take from disney.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Few steps away from everything. Location excellent.
Summary: Location - it's ten minutes away from Disneyland.  Nearby restaurant just three minutes away.  If you're on a budget there's a 7/11 convenient store nearby.  There's an ABC convenient store next to 7/11.    Free breakfast included which is not bad although they serve the same food everyday and not much to choose from.  Huge savings because of the free breakfast.  However if you're a picky eater there's lots of restaurants around the area and if you're heading to Disneyland, McDonald is not too far away.  Room is clean although dated.  Air condition makes an awful loud noise.  Bed is comfortable and clean.  Housekeeping ladies are really nice and friendly.  Front desk are lovely and very helpful and friendly. Free wifi although only three guests can use it per room.  Fridge, safe
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your kind review on Trip Advisor. We know your time is valuable and we appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback.  Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Good value close to Disneyland.  Room needs updating
Summary: This hotel was a great place to stay close to Disneyland.  We had a room with king size bed.  There was a safe and in room fridge which was nice for having cold bottled water.  The front desk staff were always very friendly and helpful.  The bathroom in our room however needed some serious updating.  The level of the shower was made for somebody under 6' and I found myself constantly crouching to get water on my head.  There was a slider to move the shower head up and down but it was loose and kept sliding down.  You also could not adjust the direction of the stream so it was spraying nearly straight down.  The sink looked like it had been broken off the wall at some point and stuck back on.  There was absolutely zero counter space in the bathroom so we had to bring in a chair
Manager Response: Dear Rob:  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us regarding your recent stay. We are sorry to hear that you had some issues with your bathroom as well as the construction going on next door and we apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced. We have taken your comments into consideration as we move forward with plans to improve for the future. The Ramada Plaza Anaheim hopes to make your next stay a better one.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Clean, comfortable rooms with fridge and microwave!  Free parking, wifi and breakfast are added plus!
Manager Response: Dear Susan:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to know that we are your "Favorite Hotel Near Disneyland." Thank you  for your kind review and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Nice clean hotel and walking distance to Disney. One pleasant surprise is we discovered a newer development called Gardenwalk with nice restaurants & shops just around the corner from us. Daily breakfast was a good full meal. Book it!
Manager Response: Dear Douglas:  Thank you for your review on Trip Advisor. The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and that your daughter received a good "sendoff."  We wish her luck in her future endeavors.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This was our (2 adults & 2 children) first staying at this hotel. Rooms were nice. Beds were decent. Bathroom was clean and everything worked great. We requested extra towels, and extra blankets and they brought them up right away. Breakfast was included, had the basics and it was buffet style. Good selection of food. Parking was free and was garaged/gated. Entrance to Disney/Adventureland was 2 blocks away (10 minute walk) CVS, resturarants, gas stations are all walking distance. Would stay there again
Manager Response: Dear TheTruth 415:  Thank you for your positive review on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are happy to hear that you found your stay to be a "Great Value" and we are looking forward to hosting your stay again the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: All of the staff at this hotel are courteous and gracious and always go the extra mile!  Kirn Siha and Andres, two of the managers, greet us like family each and every time--that makes our trip more special!!
Manager Response: Dear Vanessa:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us on Trip Advisor and for acknowledging our staff Kirn and Andy. We appreciate your patronage to the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and do consider you to be like family.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is located within a comfortable walking distance to the main entrance of Disneyland.  The underground parking is convenient and free, unlike many other hotels in the area.  The room itself was about average.  It was not dirty, but was also not overly clean.  The bathtub has a significant slope and was slippery. Some type of grips on the floor of the tub would help.  Breakfast was free and okay in terms of variety and quality.  Not great, but not bad.  The walls do seem to be very thin and you can sometimes hear your neighbors, but for the most part noise was not a problem.  We did not interact with the staff much, but they seemed to be friendly and approachable.  Checkin and checkout was pretty easy.
Manager Response: Dear Tom: The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for review regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We value your feedback and will use it to make improvements for the future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel Walking Distance To Disneyland
Summary: We stayed at the Ramada Plaza in August 2014 for 2 nights. Its close to Disneyland and right next to the Garden Walk and a ton of restaurants. The hotel has gated underground parking. The rooms were comfortable and the beds were surprisingly comfy.  The walls are thin so you can hear the excitement from the other rooms as people come back from Disneyland late at night.  Overall its a 3 star property.
Manager Response: Dear Aero E:  Thank you for choosing the Ramada Plaza Anaheim to host your recent stay. We are happy to hear that overall, you had a good stay. However, we apologize that you experienced some noise. We can definitely understand your frustration. When brought to our attention, we do address noise issues. We hope that despite that, you will visit us again.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada PLaza Anaheim

Summary: This place looks like one of those hotels out of an 80s movie. It definitely needs a lot of upgrading! Yes it was close to Disneyland and other shops but for the amount I paid for this hotel I wish I would have booked somewhere else.
Manager Response: Dear Heather:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim appreciates your feedback.  We are sorry to hear that you did not feel our hotel was worth the money. Further,  we believe that we offer our guests an additional savings by providing a complimentary hot buffet breakfast, complimentary parking, and complimentary wifi since many of the other hotels in the area do not provide these. As we make plans to improve for the future, we will take your comments into consideration, and again, we thank you for your review,  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: My family and I stayed there over the Christmas holidays for 12 nights.   We chose it for its proximity to Disneyland and because breakfast was included in the price.  The rooms are a good size with comfy beds, but the walls and floors must be paper thin because all we could hear was toddlers running around and jumping from the floor above.  It was constant.  We could also hear the people next door very clearly.   That said, it was good for the price we paid.   Being Christmas it was quite busy and we found that we had to wait for the breakfast foods to be topped up each morning and in the end gave up on the hot foods.   The staff were very friendly and helpful so overall our stay was pretty good for the price we paid.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim  appreciates you  taking the time to share your feedback with us regarding your stay in December.  You brought up some valid concerns and we will definitely look for ways where we can improve in the future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: It was a wonderful stay and about 3/4 mile walk to the entrance of Disney.  It is a 2 full block walk and another 3 to the gate.  There are plenty of restaurants near by walking or driving.   The staff was so helpful and the hotel was so clean.  The pool was on the smaller side but our time was to be spent at Disney.  Free wifi, breakfast and eAsy walk in a nice neighborhood.  The Anaheim Garden walk is block away.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had a "Wonderful Stay."    We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Happiest Place on Earth.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Nice room, nice hotel and efficient friendly staff. I requested a roll away bed at the desk and by the time we got to our room the bed was there for us (at no charge), The gentleman who brought the bed in was very helpful, helped with our luggage, setting up and he even brought the luggage carrier/cart back to the lobby. Free breakfast was nicely done in the restaurant. Free WiFi - WiFi was in and out but fixed immediately. Took walks around the hotel area, felt safe, lots of food choices and had a lot of fun.
Manager Response: Dear Momknowsbest4u:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you found our hotel "great for your family." We appreciate your patronage as well as your feedback and we look forward to seeing you again in the near future.  Regards,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I didn't have high expectations when I booked this hotel.  It was the free breakfast (delicious), wifi, and parking that made my choice easy.  Once there, I was very impressed with the size of the room (2 queen beds and pull-out couch).  There was a microwave and mini fridge which was a plus for our 5 night stay.  The pool was small but great for my kids, the hot tub was great for the adults.  Very friendly staff, they helped us get our Disneyland tickets and gave us tips on transportation.  The bonus of the whole experience was that we were 2 blocks from Disneyland.  I would recommend this hotel to anyone with kids and I would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is pleased to hear that you had a better than expected stay. We appreciate your kind feedback and are looking forward to hosting your stay again.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza anaheim

Summary: This hotel was great! I loved the breakfast offered every morning, great way to start the day. The kids loved ending the day in the pool, within full view of the fireworks.
Manager Response: Dear Valerie:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim thanks you for your wonderful feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We appreciate your patronage and are looking forward to seeing you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: The presentation is better than the reality.
Summary: I do not feel my family and I got our money's worth. The hotel looked better online than in person. Would I return to this hotel? Probably not. It was too inconvenient for my family. The tub was slippery and my son fell, there wasn't a valet service, and the luggage carrier was broken which made bringing luggage to room and then back to my car was a difficult task.
Manager Response: Dear Summer R:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we strive to exceed guest expectations.  We are sorry to hear that we fell short during your recent stay.  We will take your comments into consideration to make improvements for the future. We sincerely apologize for any inconvenience you experienced. Thanks again for your feedback!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland with friendly staff
Summary: My best friend and I stayed at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim for two nights last month. It was our first trip to Disneyland and we wanted to be in walking distance to the park as we didn't have a car, but wanted to be able to escape the crowds after a long day. The Ramada ticked all the boxes.  Their complimentary breakfasts provide a great, early start with a good range of food (eggs, bacon, pancakes, oats, toast, cereal, fruit, bagels, etc.). We had a decent sized room with two double beds, which were comfy.  They're in walking distance (maybe ten minutes?) to Disneyland, a 7-11, and several eateries (Tony Roma's, The Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gump, etc.). And the staff was always happy to help by storing our bags, calling a cab on our departure, and we had a lovely chat with
Manager Response: Dear ntawali:  Glad to hear that you and your friend made it home safely. It was a pleasure to chat with you both as well. We appreciate your kind feedback and hope to see you both again in the future.  Sincerely,  B. Harris Director of Sales

Summary: Close enough to walk to and from Disney Land and the surounding convention center, but far enough to avoid the crownd and the noise. We have young teenagers and the location could not be better. We're sure will pick this hotel again in the future, or would  recommend it to friends.
Manager Response: Dear M.T.  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had a happy stay and thank you for sharing your thoughts on Trip Advisor. We'll see you the next time you are visiting the Happiest Place on Earth!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Excellent service, mainly Bella at the front desk was a huge help always smiling and willing to solve anything. Breakfast was standard, room were OK, the walking distance to Disneyland was not too bad, in general I would be back to this Hotel.
Manager Response: Dear  Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback and for honoring our employee Bella. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and are looking forward to welcoming you back!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Overall the motel was fairly decent. The common areas were clean & well lit. The pool & hot tub were nice. Although, the pool is a bit small, and it only ranged from about 3' - 4' deep. The breakfast buffet was actually suprisingly complete. Parking is underground which can help keep the car a bit cooler in the summertime. Rooms are your standard fair with each room having their own HVAC unit under the window. Some of the other reviews reported that their AC did not work. Luckily, ours easily kept the room in the low 70 degree F range. And, for anyone that does a Google search, they will see that it is indeed within a ~20 minute leisurely walk from Disney's front gate.  When we first entered the room, we found that there was a pool of water gathered just inside the bathroom. We
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your feedback. The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is extremely disappointed to hear that you had a less than enjoyable stay. We can definitely understand your frustrations with the situation you explained and we will make no excuses for dropping the ball. We clearly should have been more on top of the situation and we apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced. I sent you an e-mail to contact our GM and she said that she had received a call from you and was handling the situation Again, we offer our sincerest apologies.   Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Will stay here again and again...
Summary: This was the second year in a row I chose this hotel for my family vacation.  We have older teenagers, a boy and girl, who refuse to sleep in the same bed anymore.  With the suite set up, we all had our own bed!  My son and daughter flipped a coin to see who got the bed first versus the pullout, but neither complained when it was their turn on the sofa bed.  There was adequate drawer space, enough hangers in the closet, and a free in room safe.  There was even enough room for a desk with two chairs!  Parking is underground and secure, needing a key card to open late at night, so no one other than hotel guests could park.   Breakfast was always good every morning.  A variety of potatoes, meat, and fruit with scrambled eggs,  toast/bagels, oatmeal, and yogurt were the staples
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Please accept our sincerest thanks for the great review on Trip Advisor. We are happy to hear that your stay went well and we are also looking forward to you staying here "again and again.!"  Regards,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Nice place for a Disneyland stay
Summary: We enjoyed our stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. The room was a nice size for the four of us, beds were comfy. Breakfast wasn't great, but serviceable for our weekend stay. Nice to have free parking and WiFi.
Manager Response: Dear Marissa:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are happy to hear that you found us to be a "Nice place for a Disneyland Stay."  Looking forward to seeing you again next time you are in the area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Hotel was basic - toilet got plugged but was promptly cleaned. Good friendly staff  always ready to assist. The hotel property as such requires upgrade. The property is maintained to a base level - so as long as you keep expectations low you will be okay. At breakfast - the utensils were not properly cleaned - management needs some Q&A person to monitor upkeep and general cleanliness.
Manager Response: Dear AJ:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We value your comments and will use them as ways to improve in the future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed here on our part of our family vacation. As mentioned in other reviews, Brenda, The Director of Sales, was amazing. She remembered my kids names immediately after meeting them, which was no small feat given their were at least 25 other kids in the room the next morning. She was very helpful in helping us juggle our reservations when we had a change of plan. The hotel is a very good value for the price. No charge for parking, free breakfast, and a ten minute walk at most from the main gate of Disney were all nice features. Highly recommend for a Disney visit or even an Angels game.
Manager Response: Dear John S:  Thank you so much for your very kind review.  Guests like you make it a pleasure to serve. Let's do it again soon!  Sincerely,  Brenda Harris Director of Sales

Summary: good location easy walk to Disney. Friendly and helpful staff. Breakfast so so,( cold eggs ) room comfortable but needs a refresh. Stayed at this hotel 3 years ago had a great experience, the experience was only okay this time.
Manager Response: Dear Trent:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim appreciates your patronage as well as your feedback. We are sorry that some of your breakfast items were not up to par. We will pass this information onto the management staff there, Looking forward to seeing you again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Sold on their Director of Sales
Summary: We stayed here twice on a split vacation. After 2 weeks, Brenda, the Director of Sales, remembered my kids' names and made us feel very welcomed and comfortable. Because of her and because it's a 10-minute, leisurely walk to Disneyland Main Gate, we'd stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Noah and Family:  Thank you so much for the kind review. It was a pleasure to meet such a nice family as yours and I enjoyed speaking with you each morning. You are truly missed at breakfast time so hurry back soon!  Sincerely,  Brenda Harris Director of Sales

Summary Heading: Overall love the hotel... Definately would come...
Summary: Overall love the hotel... Definately would come back...awesome view of the fireworks... Love that you had an underground garage...
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is tickled to hear that you "overall, loved the hotel."  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel is less than a 10 minute walk from Disneyland and with free parking and within walking distance of dozens of restaurants, it is great for a family. The room is clean and confortable, the breakfast is decent, but very no variety if you are spending more than a few days. Wifi is free and fast - but if you have more than 2 devices you will be calling then often to reset your access as the account blocks after the second. Outdoor area is very small, but enough to let small kids left of some steam and cool off. One disappointing thing was that they only accept cash for Disney tickets - don't know who keeps that much cash around any more.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us on Trip Advisor and for pointing out our great location.  We are sorry for any inconvenience you may have experienced purchasing Disneyland tickets. Yes, for hard copy tickets, we do only accept cash. However, you may purchase tickets through our link with your credit card ahead of time. We have a computer located in our lobby, We apologize if this was not communicated well to you.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Take a walk thorough hell and India
Summary: Our family booked through Hotwire, it was a decent price. The walk to the elevator and downstairs was simply too hot. It was actually unbearable. Our toilet clogged, shower curtain was missing a hook, sheets weren't changed. Furniture worn out and stains on some towels. The free breakfast was helpful, however it was so gross. The bacon looked like oil was splashed on, and I saw the server save the closed yogurts left on tables and add them to the buffet. The breakfast is held at a restaurant called "Gahndi??!?"  What bothers me about that is that who knows how long they were out for already.   The free parking was convenient since we walked or took public transportation to Disneyland, it is underground.   I would not visit this hotel again, I enjoy a simple and clean room and
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is saddened to hear that you had some issues during your recent stay with us. We can definitely understand your frustration and we do offer our sincerest apologies for these issues which we are working on correcting. Thank you for bringing these issues to our attention.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We enjoy Ramada Plaza hotel we been here several times and every time we come here we treated us wonderful the staff was very friendly and helpful, the breakfast was great it has several of food to choice from, love it!!!.
Manager Response: Dear Mark:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had an "excellent" stay. We thank you for your patronage and for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We'll see you the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This place has some positives yet there are definite negatives.   Pros:  -Free breakfast (decent food to fill you up before you head out, time saver too) -Walking distance to Disneyland -Refrigerator  -Microwave  -Free parking (rare!)  Cons: -Thin walls/gap in door allows for all kinds of noises to penetrate the "privacy" of your room. We could hear the neighbors microwaving their food for goodness sakes.  -The air conditioner was loud and by loud I mean obnoxious. First night, we were so exhausted We didn't realize what a nuisance it was  until 1/2 way through the night. The weather was in the upper 90's so the cold air trumped the noise level.  -Blood stain on  pillowcase -Maid service was slow on second day. We didn't get service at all.  We reserved through Priceline's
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  We would like to thank you for choosing the Ramada Plaza Anaheim to host your stay and also for sharing your feedback with us. We value your patronage and your opinion on ways we can improve for the future.  We apologize for any inconvenience the issues you mentioned may have caused.   Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: For the most part you won't spend much time in your room as you will likely be at Disneyland or California Adventure but when you are in your room you will find it to be comfortable and located near restaurants and the park.  WiFi works great, parking is free, breakfast is enough to get your day started but the pool leaves something to be desired.  Minuscule outdoor facility that is not really worth the time it takes to prepare for.  Again if Disneyland is your destination the price and location of this hotel is very good.
Manager Response: Dear Raza:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for your patronage and for sharing your feedback with us. We are happy to hear that you appreciated our Good location and great amenities. We are looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management

Summary: Toilets left a lot to be desired and the rooms we stayed in were dirty. Can't imagine the hotel claims its the best kept secret in Southern California. Breakfast was good and the staff were very friendly
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations and so we are disappointed that we fell short in your case. We apologize for any inconvenience these issues may have caused and we are busy at hand trying to correct these problems so that we may improve for the future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is close to Disneyland and can sleep 6 people in one room, it has free parking, internet and breakfast - we choose it for all these reasons.  The staff, however were less than hospitable.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us on Trip Advisor. We are disappointed to hear that you had "Mediocre Service" when we are striving to exceed guest expectations. We apologize for any incident that might have occurred and would be interested to learn more about the service you received.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I like their service and most important they serve breakfast for guest wonderful they have different verity of breakfast they serve every morning.  excellent!!!!  Thank you Ramada INN for excellent breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear 380 Amy:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are happy to hear that you received "Excellent Service." We hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Perfect family hotel so close to Disneyland!
Summary: This hotel exceeded our expectations! The staff was very friendly and helpful. Our room was comfortable - we had 2 adults,2 teens, & 2 kids & the 2 queens w/ sofa bed option was great! We even had an awesome view of the Disneyland fireworks! The free breakfast was wonderful - there was a large selection - something for everyone! The parking was secure & just a short walk to Disney! We would definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for your patronage and for sharing your feedback with us on Trip Advisor. We are happy to hear that you found us to be the "Perfect Family Hotel" and that you enjoyed the fireworks view from your room. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel was worth it in relation to its proximity to Disneyland, barely 10 minutes walk, the staff where very professional and helpful (especially one called Stephanie - she was awesome) The breakfast was a whole lot better than the breakfast you get in other American hotels of the same value.  Only problem we were disappointed by was the plumbing system, it was a real nightmare,family  my and I ended up using the lobby toilets more than the one in our room. But through out the staff where cautious and apologetic.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim enjoyed hosting your stay and getting to know your wonderful family.  We are truly sorry for the inconvenience  that you experienced regarding the plumbing issues.  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us so that we may take steps to improve in the future! We hope to see you again the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Location was great,just 10-15min walk to Disney.Small but cosy pool area,free parking,internet and breakfast-wish to see more fruits,and frankly porridge was awful,but anyway i consider overall it was a good value and I would recommend this hotel. ps. upon checkout one agent (i believe her name was Kirb) was very helpful and arranged for me a late checkout for a decent price-my baby sleeps till 2pm,so it was important for me.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and we appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us on Trip Advisor. We will use your comments to improve for the future. We hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Clean and neat rooms, great customer service, convenient location and underground parking with elevator that takes you directly to your floor. Great breakfast. Best of all the price was very comparable and it offered the parking and breakfast for free. Great benefit :)
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had an "Excellent Experience" during your recent stay with us. We know your time is valuable and we appreciate that you took a few moments out of your day to let us know how we are doing.  Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I just finished another wonderful stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Whenever I go to Disneyland, and that is frequent, I stay at this hotel. I've had many stays over the past 10+ years ranging from 1 night to 10 nights and I've never been disappointed. The staff is very friendly and accommodating and the rooms are comfortable and nice. In fact, I sleep better here than I do at home! The hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland but if you don't feel like walking, there is an ART shuttle (Route 2) stop right out front the hotel. You can purchase a one day pass in the lobby. For more frequent pick ups, just walk around the corner to  Harbor to the bus stop in front of Subway and for a return shuttle, try Route 3 or 9. There is free wifi in the rooms and also included is a hot
Manager Response: Dear Leslie R:  On behalf of the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, I would like to thank you for your kind review on Trip Advisor and for your continued patronage to our hotel. We are happy to hear that you found our hotel to be "wonderful."  Looking forward to hosting your next stay!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Nice place to stay. 15 minutes to park if you are walking. Had a view of the Disney fireworks from the room.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your view and that you had an enjoyable Disney Trip. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Showers were good. Beds were comfortable. Breakfast was ok. AC only effective with the curtains open. If the curtains were closed it blocked the cool air from coming into the room. Definitely plan on walking to Disneyland. The ART bus service was horrible! Free wifi ONLY for 3 devices. Difficult with a family of 5 each with their own devices.
Manager Response: Dear Mary:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay in our "Comfy beds" but are disappointed to hear that you had issues with the internet,  We are working on correcting the problem for your future visit.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: This Ramada Hotel was in a great location to walk to...
Summary: This Ramada Hotel was in a great location to walk to Disneyland. It was also a short driving distance to the Anaheim Angels baseball stadium. We were able to walk to some excellent restaurants and have a wonderful dinner.  The staff was very helpful with directions to beaches in the area.
Manager Response: Dear Joyce K:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are  happy to hear that you had a positive stay and look forward to hosting your next stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Positive:  Located within walking distance of Disneyland and the Garden Walk, free full hot breakfast and friendly staff.  Negative: Extremely poor plumbing throughout hotel and dated bathrooms/accommodations.    Our first night we noticed our bathtub was not draining.  The next morning we were told it would be fixed. Upon our return at 10pm-- our room was clean but we were greeted with six inches of reddish water and waste backed up from the toilet in our tub.  We changed rooms to find another room which had wet towels all over the bathroom floor and a toilet that would not flush.  We were then told only one more room was available (handicapped with one bed for our family).  By this time it was midnight, we were exhausted and frustrated to say the least.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations so of course we are disappointed with the issues that you brought to our attention during your stay as well as on Trip Advisor.  We can definitely sympathize with what you went through. This is why we felt strong about compensating you for the problems. Again, we apologize for the inconvenience and thank you for sharing your feedback.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim
