Summary Heading: Close to Disney but rooms were horrible.
Summary: I've never reviewed anything before but I feel like I should to help others.....We had to change rooms due to air conditioning problem and our sink didn't drain properly. My sister and her family had to move rooms twice. Once when we came back from a long day at Disney their shower was full of poop. It was the worst thing I'd ever seen.
Manager Response: Dear Jamiekap:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. It appears you experienced some issues at our hotel that we can definitely sympathize with.  Please accept our sincerest apologies. This is not the norm at our hotel and we are working on correcting these issues presently.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Would not stay at Ramada again
Summary: On arrival noticed unusual musty odor in bathroom, got air freshener from housekeeping and sprayed entire room and bathroom, smell didn't go away, notified front desk, had housekeeping pay special attention to odor, didn't matter,odor was still present upon departure.Sink started to leak one night out of nowhere. Washed a load of clothes in hotel's laundromat, clothes came out filled with lint and sand, notified front desk, had housekeeping run washer thru cycle, inspected dryer, dryer full of sand, had to use outside laundromat. Very disappointed
Manager Response: Dear Jerome B:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim aims to exceed guest expectations so we take your feedback seriously when it comes to correcting the issues.  We can definitely understand your frustration with the mentioned items. Please accept our sincerest apologies for any inconvenience you experienced. We are working hard to correct the issues.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Very nice hotel and convienient for our Disneyland vacation.
Summary: This was our priceline hotel picked for us. We were very happy with our stay there. Room was nice and clean. Location was good even though kids thought it was a long walk at the end of a long day at Disneyland lol. Great breakfast and service was good too.
Manager Response: Dear Johannamtz24:  Dear Johannamtz24:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast and service.  Although only a ten to fifteen minute walk, we can definitely understand why you could still find the walk back from Disneyland tiring after a long day at the "Happiest Place on Earth."  Thank you for staying with us and we look forward to hosting your future stay.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: staff was friendly, we were able to check in early and the only problem was with the air conditioning and was promptly fixed. great breakfast and pool.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us on Trip Advisor. We are happy to hear that you had a "comfortable" stay and look forward to seeing you the next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Would come back just to see Brenda
Summary: First family trip to Disneyland, hotel was ok it takes 10-15 minutes to the Disneyland gate. Rooms and hotel are not really updated but clean, price was right but seeing Brenda every morning for complementary breakfast was a highlight of the hotel, really helpful, knowledgeable and happy, when we come back we will stay there again to see her, thanks Brenda
Manager Response: Dear Jacob:  Thank you so much for your kind review. It was a pleasure to assist you and speak with you each morning. Look forward seeing you the next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Enjoyed my stay here very much.The rooms are very nice and the beds are comfortable. The A/C was so cold I could hang meat in my room and being from Canada that was wonderful. The walk to Disneyland is a good 10-15 minutes but after a long day at Disneyland it feels like I just crossed the Gobi desert. Keep that in mind if you have little ones.
Manager Response: Dear Saintdoman:  It has been a pleasure meeting such a nice family as yours and we appreciate your patronage to our hotel as well as you taking the time to share your feedback with us on Trip Advisor. We look forward to hosting your stay next year!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Not a very nice place to stay in. Faucet was broken in the...
Summary: Not a very nice place to stay in. Faucet was broken in the bathroom sink and breakfast was less than desirable.
Manager Response: Dear Chris B:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we strive to exceed guest expectations so we are disappointed to hear that you did not have an enjoyable stay. However, we are taking your feedback and using it as ways to improve for the future. Please accept our sincerest apologies for any inconvenience you may have experienced.   Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Some people were rude at the desk, they need to improve Customer Service training overall, not just because of the rudeness. Also I called beforehand to secure my room because I arrived really late, aaaaand they gave it away, THANK YOU! Rooms need improvement and the bathroom had mold. Also the General Area Male Restrooms were SUPER dirty, really disgusting.
Manager Response: Dear Beatriz:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay. At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we strive to exceed guest expectations. We are sorry that we fell short in your case. We apologize for any inconvenience and will user your feedback to improve for the future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Stayed here for Vidcon 2014, the staff were really friendly and kind, the room was very comfortable
Manager Response: Dear David L:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and we hope you had a great time at Vidcon!  Looking forward to hosting your stay next year!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Upon check in found roaches in the closet. I couldn't tell my wife since she would have insisted we left that hotel. The towels and washcloths were old and hard. The room had an odd smell, and the breakfast was not appetizing. The room service was very good. The computer center was slow and left me unable to perform simple tasks such as checking my checking acct.
Manager Response: Dear Sean:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we strive to exceed guest expectations so we too are  disappointed to hear that you found your stay not up to par. It appears you had numerous issues with your room and we do apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced.  Our hotel is serviced by a pest control company on a monthly  basis (like most hotels) to prevent problems as you mentioned.  This is not a common occurrence and we would have been glad to have switched your room immediately if we had been made aware of your issues during your stay. Again, please accept our sincerest apologies.  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: This is the second time our family stayed at the Ramada...
Summary: This is the second time our family stayed at the Ramada Plaza and we love it! We have two older teenagers, a boy and a girl, who will not share a bed.  This property has rooms with two queens with a sofa bed, perfect for our family.  This room also has a fridge, microwave, coffee maker, and desk with two chairs. Extremely friendly and helpful staff, oh and did I mention free full hot American breakfast?  Eggs, potatoes and meats (different each day), pancakes, and fruits (different each day). Secure, free underground parking,  decent size pool and hot tub.   My one and only complaint, if you can call it that, is you can only connect three devices to the free WiFi.  For a family of four, all with iPhone's, this was a challenge..... I wish we had found this hotel years earlier as
Manager Response: Dear Lisa O:  Thank you for your patronage to the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are happy to hear that you had another enjoyable stay and thank you for letting us know about your issues with the internet. We will take these comments into consideration as we strive to make improvements for the future. We wish your oldest the best in college and we'll see you the next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Our teams were treated like ROYALTY by the staff at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim during a recent girls volleyball tournament.  The rooms were large, very clean and comfortable.  The location of the hotel was wonderful...easy in and out and walking distance to both the Convention Center and Disneyland. The complimentary breakfast provided was amazing.  Lots of great options. But best of all, the staff (especially Brenda Harris) went out of their way to acknowledge our groups and to ensure that they had everything they needed.  Our chaperones and coaches (the adults in the group) commented on how pleasant and accommodating everyone was..from the breakfast people, to the front desk.  Such a pleasure to be treated so well!  Thanks to everyone on duty last week and this past weekend!!!
Manager Response: Dear dkesea5:  We are blushing. The Ramada Plaza Anaheim sincerely appreciates your kind review. We have shared it with our staff  and they were happy to hear your feedback.  It was our pleasure to serve such a  nice group as yours and we look forward to doing it again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I'll start off by saying there was nothing blatantly wrong with this hotel, it was within walking distance of DL entrance and on the ART route as well. The room was clean enough, but just barely. There were a few stray hairs in the BR upon arrival. The sheets were starched into a cardboard-type texture that was rather uncomfortable. The free breakfast was uninspired but substantial. The areas surrounding the lobby were un-airconditioned which led to a dank smell that had me taking the stairs, rather than waiting for the elevator. Never looked at or used the pool, so I can't comment. The restaurant was entirely empty the whole of 4 days we were there. Overall, I felt like the property needed some TLC and a little bit of personality because above all else, it was bland, bland,
Manager Response: Dear AJeanneM:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations so we are disappointed to find that we did not succeed during your recent stay with us. However, we will take your feedback and evaluate how we may improve for future guests. Please accept our sincerest apologies for any inconveniences you may have experienced.   Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: My stay at ramada was amazing the room was a perfect size it was perfect walking distance to every restaurant. The pool was perfect size. Movie's were good food was fare .next time I vacation im choosing the same hotel thanks for building blessed memories with my
Manager Response: Dear Sonia C:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is glad to hear that we could help your family build some memories while visiting the "Happiest Place on Earth." Thank you for sharing your feedback with us and we look forward to hosting your next visit.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed there during Vidcon and although very busy they were always accommodating and friendly. Breakfast and parking included which is great considering the area. You are close to great restaurateurs :-)
Manager Response: Dear mammi1964:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you found our staff to be "Friendly and Accommodating." We hope that you had a great time at Vidcon and look forward to hosting your stay again next year.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Well, everything as expected, clean, nice, good location, 10mins walk to disneyland.  The Fan at the bathroom is very noisy, can't turn it off..... The free breakfast is just very simply.... well it's free, so can't really complaint about it....  Still recommend.
Manager Response: Dear Wenbin X:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us regarding your recent stay, We apologize about the noisy fan and appreciate you bringing it to our attention so that we may correct the issue. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort Area. ] Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The location was great - closely located to the Convention Center, Disneyland and shops/restaurants.
Manager Response: Dear MLG_Visitor:  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and look forward to hosting your next stay in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The Ramada Plaza was a great place to stay.  Wonderful service and great location for our Disneyland resort visit.  Hilary was at the front desk when we arrived and she was awesome.  She was very friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Daniel T:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had a "Great Stay" and thank you for recognizing our employee Hillary. We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback and look forward to seeing you  the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort area.  Sincerely.  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel is well situated, clean, with complimentary breakfast. But.... They say that " wifi is complimentary to all our guests " , that is true if you are two people/room! We're a party of four, and two of us couldn't log on to the wifi. Checked it out with the front desk, and they say it is only two accesses per room.  That's not complimentary to all guests! It's ok, but please share that information on the website so you have the possibility to book another place if wifi is important to you!
Manager Response: Dear Once 56:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim thanks you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback on Trip Advisor.  We are pleased to hear that you recognized the value in your stay and we offer our sincerest apologies in your frustration with the internet. We are evaluating the issue and looking forward to making improvements for the future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I had researched hotels near Disneyland for a couple of weeks, and decided on this one, in part due to the reviews on TripAdvisor.  I'm sorry to say our experience was not what we would expect of a hotel with those reviews and a hotel at this price level.  First, the room.  When we arrived fairly late in the evening, the handle on the toilet spun out of the slot in the tank the first time we flushed it.  Really weird - I had never seen anything like it.  The next day when we flushed it dislodged again and water poured out of the tank.  My husband shut off the valve and we called the front desk.  They repaired it while we were gone that day, but I have to wonder - does housekeeping not flush the toilets when cleaning between guests?  It was impossible to flush without that handle
Manager Response: Dear NightOwl California:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim strives to exceed guest expectations. Therefore, we are saddened to hear that you had a "disappointing stay."  We can definitely understand your frustrations with the events that occurred and will use them as a way to improve in the future. In regards to the breakfast- our breakfast is a hot buffet breakfast. We do not precook the food. It is cooked freshly each morning. If the food runs out, we strive to fill the food as fast as possible.  However, there are rare occasions when guests will all arrive all at the same time causing a slight delay in refilling since we aim to serve fresh food.  It doesn't happen often but we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you.  We have one restaurant employee whose main job is to refill the food.  We are sorry if you felt that the other employees had no urgency in refilling but most likely, they already knew that the food would be coming out soon and after speaking with you, offered to double check on it. In response to the dishes, we have informed the restaurant operator of this and look to see improvements in the future. Further,  we have also informed our executive housekeeper of the situation with your room.  Again, we offer our sincerest apologies.  Management - Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is 2 blocks from Disney entrance.  My youngest is 8 and he fell asleep at disney and was still able to walk back to the hotel.   Breakfast had a good variety, so everyone could find something to eat.  Helped save money for the $70 minimum lunches/breakfasts per day for a family of 6. Room was good sized and we had a view of the back of the cars ride and could see the california screaming ride.  Parking was easy.   Staff were friendly. Our bath tub leaked non stop, so I'm disappointed in the waste of water.  I live in California and we are in a SEVERE drought and this room just wasted gallons of water every day.
Manager Response: Dear Jennifer:  Thank you for your feedback and for recognizing the added value that the Ramada Plaza Anaheim offers with our complimentary hot buffet breakfast, and our great location of being walking distance to Disneyland. Thank you for bringing the leaking issue to our attention. We too want to conserve water in this drought, Look forward to seeing you the next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel was a great place to stay. Close to Disney and lots of restaurants.  The complimentary breakfast was great!  The pool and hot tub were clean and the water wasn't too cold.  We discovered the hotel is a closer walk than the Disney parking lot!  And it was fun to meet other Disney guests on the walk over.  We had a great stay!
Manager Response: Dear Tracie:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is smiling knowing that you had a great stay with us. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to hosting your next stay in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The room was large for the 3 of us Close to the Garden Walk Shopping Center and  Cinema. Priced right. Convenient shuttle service. Great hot breakfast. Discount Disney tickets. Free convenient parking.
Manager Response: Dear Rik C:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations.  Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Was a great location within easy walking distance to Disneyland. Much cheaper option than staying at a Disney Resort. Room was small for the 6 of us. No separate living area, all in the one room. Was good overall
Manager Response: Dear Doggieschic:  Thank you so much for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We are sorry that you found the room to be small for six people. We are not sure which type room you reserved but we do have a room type with two queens and a sleeper couch that comfortably sleeps six.  Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We reserved 2 rooms for 4 nights.  We were happy that our rooms were adjoining.  One of the rooms had a foul smell in the entry and bathroom. The smell progressively got worse throughout stay.  We didn't spend a lot of time in the rooms except to sleep and shower, so we didn't report it until checkout, but wish we'd asked for a change from the begining. There are no fans in the bathroom, and lighting is dim, so the rooms feel stuffy. Floors were dirty. We found trash from previous guests around. Breakfast was average, but all the staff were very friendly and nice.  The pool and spa were great! Very clean and well kept.
Manager Response: Dear Leslie:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim appreciates your feedback regarding your recent stay with us.  We are sincerely sorry about the problem that occurred during your stay. We can definitely understand your inconvenience and we only wish that you had informed us during your stay so that we could have corrected the issue, or like you said, change your room.  If you would like to speak with us further regarding this issue, please feel free to contact the management of the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Last time staying here after 4 visits.  Front desk was pleasant but housekeeping was HORRIBLE! 1.Hair in tub when arrived. 2.Left cleaning solution in room 3. Maids were folding towels on floor in hall.
Manager Response: Dear mrsmommy24:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We strive to exceed guest expectations and we are disappointed to know we fell short during your stay. We will take your comments and use them as a way to improve for the future. We have received numerous positive feedback regarding our housekeeping department. However, we have hired some new staff in the housekeeping department and it is clear that we need to do some additional training with them. We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We drove in from Albuquerque and timed it a little off, so we ended up getting  there early (before checkin).  The team there made an accommodation for my family to check in early. During our whole visit they were super nice!  For the price they were very close to Disneyland and I would recommend staying there anytime!  AWESOME!
Manager Response: Dear BeepBeepdad:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for your kind review. We are thrilled to hear that you felt like you received "World Class Customer Service."  We hope to accommodate you again in the near future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Location is excellent, within walking distance to Disney´s main entrance. It offers free breakfast and free parking. I would totally stay there again when I return to Disney! Bella from the front desk was very helpful.  A lot of restaurants to choose from in the surroundings.
Manager Response: Dear Memechuy:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim appreciates you noting our great location of being walking distance to Disneyland.  Further, thank you for also acknowledging our Front Desk staff Bella. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Great location to Disneyland.  We needed a larger room so that we didn't have to book two rooms for our large family and we were happy with the price. Having a shuttle would be nice, sometimes the kids are too wiped out for the walk after Disneyland.  There were a few minor things in the rooms, like the fan in the bathroom wasn't worth much and they didn't put garbage bags in the garbage cans, but other than that it was pretty good for the price.
Manager Response: Dear Tammy G:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and that you had a great Disneyland Trip.  We appreciate you letting us know about the issues with your room and we will address your comments with our staff.  See you next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I love that this hotel is very close to Disneyland.  Me and my family was very happy we chose this place.  The breakfast buffet was good! Everything was great except for the front desk employees. They are not welcoming at all and if you ask them a question they are not sure how to answer so they have to ask each other to get the right answer.  I'm not sure is they are new or what? At least a smile would do. I was going to give 5 stars but  Poor customer service except the lady in the breakfast area.  She was very accommodating.   Thanks again for a great stay!
Manager Response: EluckTraveller26:  Dear EluckTraveller:  Thank you so much for your feedback. We are sorry to hear that you found the front desk to be unfriendly. To answer your question: Yes, we do have some new employees at the front desk that are still in a training phase. This would account for the situation you experienced. We do apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and we look forward to seeing you again with a friendlier welcome!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The location of the hotel was great.  There are tons of restaurants within walking distance.  We did take the shuttle/bus to Disneyland daily.  The free breakfast in the morning was not that great and the staff in the restaurant were not that friendly.  We ended up going out to breakfast the last day of our stay instead of taking advantage of the free breakfast.  Our room walls were paper thin because we could hear every word of our neighbors conversation along with their screaming child at 1 am in the morning.
Manager Response: Dear Angela G:  Thank you for you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We are disappointed to hear that our normally friendly staff had a bad day.  We will address the issue with our staff to get them back on the right track.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Breakfast was not that great. It took a while to refill the egg and bacon trays. Rooms were clean but the bathroom shower curtain was ripped and shower knob wasn't working well. Overall, I wouldn't come back again.
Manager Response: Dear Madeline:  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Our goal is to exceed guest expectations and we are disappointed that we fell short during your stay.  We will make no excuses but instead, will use this as a way to improve for the future. We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced. Thank you again!   "We are working on a better tomorrow."  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Not good enough for the price
Summary: This is not an inexpensive hotel, but hotels charging a lot less in Anaheim are doing as good if not a better job. We stayed in an hotel, the year before, who charged $500.00 less for the same time period and the service and amenities were almost the same if not, at times, better . The room was showing its age. Lots of the room showed age wear and tear, also the phone didn't work properly, the air con rattled, the bathroom extractor was broken and the toilet blocked {nothing we did I assure you} and was never fully fixed. The breakfast was good, but poorly organised, it never opened on time, breakfast items ran out and were only slowly replenished and two toasters {one broken} is not enough for 20-30 people eating at the same time. As always, some of the staff we friendly others
Manager Response: Dear Michael: The Ramada Plaza Anaheim aims to exceed guest expectations and it appears we fell short during your recent stay with us. For this, we are disappointed. So,  please accept our sincerest apologies for any inconvenience you  may have experienced. Yes, one of our toasters in our breakfast broke and it was replaced right away and yes, there were some issues with a room accidentally locking themselves out of their room that proposed a tricky situation for us all. Although  both these situations were beyond our control, we did try to handle them in a timely manner.  We have also reviewed your additional comments and will use them as a way to address and correct any other needed issues so that we may improve for future guests.  Thank you again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Staff were not friendly - they were defintiely not welcoming and couldn't even say hi when you walked into the lobby. Wifi was terrible.  We stayed 4 days and were only able to access wifi for 1 day (and that was after asking staff about it). Replacement of bathroom accessories could have been better - 5 of us were using the last bit of soap for 2 days. Continental breakfast needs a big improvement.  Same food every day even though menu lists bacon and pastries we never saw anything.  It was the same sausages and doughnuts every day.  The toaster didn't work properly either - could do with a waffle maker. Restaurant food was good - although very pricey.  Staff could be friendlier.
Manager Response: Dear Jas B:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim strives to exceed guest expectations and we are disappointed to hear that we did not succeed during your recent stay with us. We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced.  However, we will evaluate and review your comments and strive to improve for the future. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel was fine for the price paid and great that there was free parking and breakfast.  As others had mentioned, the walls/floors are thin and it can be noisy.  There was a lot of noise coming from the people above us, but after a day at Disneyland there was not a problem going to sleep.  The free wifi was only limited to 3 devices, which is a challenge when you have multiple phones, computers and tablets within a room.  Based on the location and price, I would definitely consider staying here again.
Manager Response: Dear Glenn C:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. The Ramada Plaza Anaheim will evaluate your comments and use them as a way to improve. We apologize for any inconvenience the noise may have caused you.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Very nice room, Very nice price.
Summary: The staff were great and the room was clean. Was very impressed with the price and location. Would recommend this hotel to anybody that wants your money's worth, and great service. The breakfast buffet wasn't that bad either.
Manager Response: Dear David D:  We are so happy to hear that you had a great stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Thank you for sharing your feedback and we look forward to welcoming you again the next time you are in Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The free breakfast was just ok. It was very clean and lots of variety but certain things could have tasted better. The walls are super thin and people have no consideration for others. Coming and going all hours of the night. Very little bed covers and sofa bed was very small and hardly any mattress. It was ok for a couple of days.
Manager Response: Dear Chicapink1:  We value your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced and we will evaluate your comments regarding the sofa bed, noise, and covers so that we may improve for future guests,  Thanks again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Great value! Very friendly staff. Allowed us early check-in so we could maximize our time at the parks that day. Hot and cold breakfast was good, convenient, and an awesome cost saver for 6. The rooms are average but sufficient for our need...shower and sleep. Close enough to walk to the parks but too far to carry a small child back after a full day of walking. Once again...great value and staff! A definite do over in the future.
Manager Response: Dear Ks96717:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and we appreciate you taking the time to let us know. We strive to exceed guest expectations and our staff appreciates feedback to know that we are on the right track. Thanks again and we will see you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Very helpful and accommodating  front desk and room staff. Breakfast was suitable with multiple hot and cold items. Rooms were tidy and spacious. Great perk having a fridge AND a microwave in room. 5 min walk to Disneyland front gates. Will stay again. Thanks Ramada.
Manager Response: Dear Explaur:  Thanks so much for your kind review. We are blushing. Our staff is rewarded knowing that you found your stay and our staff accommodating. Thanks for choosing the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and we look forward to seeing you the next time you are in Anaheim!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Rooms had enough space for six adults and one child. Had issues with tub and sink  drainage. Toilet broke but the maintenace was able to fix it in a timely manner. Breakfast was ok. Workers need to smile more in the restraunt. Spa was broke.(Was looking foward to using it after 5 days of theme park hopping) Parking was great with security gate for the lower level. Location is awesome. Everything to include Disney in a short walking distance. Great dining restraunts next to hotel.
Manager Response: Dear P Moto:  We appreciate you noting the great value and location while staying at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are sorry to hear that you experienced some maintenance issues during your stay and we apologize for the  inconvenience. We are glad that our maintenance department was able to correct the issue in a timely manner.  Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Plaza Area.  Regards,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: It was our first time taking the 22 month old to Disneyland. Her first time staying in a hotel. I though it would be really nice based on the pictures. It was not. The outside was beautiful, but the room was old and looked dirty. There was even a spider in the bathroom sink (same sink I used to clean my baby's bottles. Not cool. I wanted to leave but my husband talked me into riding it out. Never will stay at another Ramada.
Manager Response: Dear Jovonne P:  We appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback with us regarding your recent stay. We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not meet your expectations.  We strive to exceed guest expectations and have consistently received positive reviews when it comes to housekeeping and cleanliness. This is one of the reasons our hotel was awarded The Best of Ramada Award in 2013.   You mentioned that you found a spider in your sink. We can definitely understand your shock in this discovery and apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. Unfortunately, we do not have 100% control over nature. We do preventative pest control in our hotel on a monthly basis and for the most part, we do not have any issues. Again, we apologize and would hope that you would consider giving us another chance in the future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Walking distance from disneyland, good rooms.   Except for the spa pool not working my entire 3 night stay, the overall experience was great  This hotel has a Disneyland shuttle stop too.
Manager Response: Dear Rohit:  Thank you for your feedback. Yes, we had a few kinks in our spa tub and we apologize for any inconvenience. We have corrected the problem and the spa tub is ready to go for some relaxing time on your next visit to the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza anaheim

Summary Heading: Sign you up for "Loyalty" scheme without asking
Summary: I stayed here at short notice in order to attend a conference locally. The hotel was reasonably priced, albeit basic. It was clean and comfortable and the front desk staff were friendly, welcoming and helpful. HOWEVER I was signed up for the hotel chain loyalty program without my consent and I have subsequently been bombarded (SPAM) with emails. I have complained about their use of my data (not in compliance with their so called Privacy Policy) and unsubscribed from the program, their emails, etc and yet still they pollute my Inbox. It would be easier to leave a cult than leave their loyalty program. Be warned.  Oh and the hotel WiFi was slower than an arthritic snail tiptoeing through molasses.
Manager Response: Dear Chrisjo06:  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us. Although we feel strong about the benefits of being a Wyndham Rewards Member, we can definitely understand your frustration with being signed up for a program you did not choose to participate in and will review this process with our employees. We apologize for any inconvenience  you may have experienced. If you are still having issues, we encourage you to contact our management so that we may further correct the problem.  Thank You again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I research things to death and this was the one that came out the winner because it offered a pool, spa, mini-fridge, free parking, free wi-fi (3 devices), free breakfast and walking distance to Disneyland.  Since we were doing this whole thing on a budget, we wanted to avoid eating at the resort.  The breakfast filled us up before our adventurous day, it wasn't spectacular, but it was as expected.  The mini-fridge gave us a cool place to stash the many snacks and sandwich fixins' we packed for lunch in the park and keep some milk fresh for the littles to have before bedtime after an exhausting day.  Our dinners were so easy, take-out from CPK and PF Changs (order things from the kids' menu for all to share and save a ton of money!) which we ate in the room, or down by the pool.
Manager Response: Dear Mrs. B:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim appreciates that a smart shopper like yourself recognized the "bang for your buck" while staying with us.  We apologize about the issues with the spa tub.  We have corrected the issue since your last stay and will keep the water hot and bubbling for your next visit with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Staff helpful, big room, no frills
Summary: First the good - free parking, free wifi, really helpful staff, big room with two beds, free tea/coffee in the room with a fridge and microwave and a quiet nights sleep.  House keeping were great - friendly and the rooms were left very clean.  Close to the convention centre, Disneyland and near PF Changs and Cheesecake Factory.  Now the not so good - the pool is tiny and in the parking lot so not very inviting.  The free breakfast wasn't very healthy (lot's of beige food and sugary yogurt, cereals, donuts) - the only fruit on offer some of the days was banana.  In the room the fridge was pretty loud, the tea/coffee machine smelt a bit weird, and while there was a microwave there were no plates or cutlery to eat anything you might be heating up.    The room wasn't done up the
Manager Response: Dear Dublin Girl 30:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us regarding you stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We value your comments and will use it as a way to continuously improve.  We appreciate you recognizing the value received with our complimentary parking and wifi, as well as our great location, clean rooms,  and friendly staff.  However, we also recognize that there are some areas where we can improve. As we move forward, we will take your feedback into consideration. Thank you again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I stayed at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim to attend meetings.  It was close to restaurants, transportation, ball park and other services.  Looked like kids and parents were having fun going to Disneyland.  Rooms were clean, comfortable and quiet...  Could not ask for more for the price.
Manager Response: Dear JLPALP:  We hope that you had a successful meeting while staying with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Thank you for appreciating our great location and for taking the time to share your feedback with us on Trip Advisor. We look forward to hosting your stay the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: It was a place to shower, change clothes & sleep
Summary: Rude front desk people, not helpful at all.  Shower curtain rod falling off wall and broken faucet in tub/shower!  Ceiling panels outside bathroom disgusting and in disrepair, as well as dusty, filthy air vent in ceiling.  We booked this vacation through GetAwayToday.com and were supposed to get some freebies like a commemorative lanyard and luggage tags we were planning to put them in our grandson's keepsake box as his 1st trip to Disneyland.  Of course the front desk showed nothing like that for us so I wouldn't be surprised to know one of them kept them or gave them to someone else.    But best of all when I called the front desk the night before we were to leave to ask if they knew the Disney Express Bus schedule I was told they needed 24hr notice, but she would gladly
Manager Response: Dear Vicki G:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim appreciates your feedback.  We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not go as well as expected. We would first like to address the free giveaways you mentioned that you should have received by booking through Getaway Today. Getaway Today does not provide the hotel with the mentioned items. We have contacted Getaway Today on your behalf to follow up with these items. We believe that they should have been shipped to your home address. In regards to the shuttle service -  we believe this might have been a misunderstanding on our part.  We do have numerous shuttle services that guest utilize at our hotel and one  of those services does require a 24 hour advance reservation.  We do have some new employees and it is clear that we will  need to revisit training our front desk staff in this area.  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we take maintenance and cleanliness highly.  The bathroom items you pointed out are not acceptable by any means. We only wish that we had a chance to correct the issue prior to your check-out.  On behalf of the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we apologize for any inconvenience these issues may have caused. If you would like to speak with us further, please feel free to contact our General Manager.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Everything was fine except that the window didn't open.  I...
Summary: Everything was fine except that the window didn't open.  I don't like air conditioning, it would have been perfect if I could have gotten fresh air from outside.
Manager Response: Dear Gary F:  Thank you for sharing your feedback with us.  We are sorry that you experienced some difficulty opening your window.  Our windows are double pane windows for safety reasons. However, they do open.  We understand the importance of getting fresh air so we hope that the next time you stay with us, we can assist in opening your window to get a fresh breeze.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: A great property to stay at!
Summary: From the moment we arrived at this property we were made to feel welcome.  The front desk staff were extremely kind and helpful.  Kudos especially to Hillary and for all the help she gave to us regarding our luggage, water and the back and forth trips into their office.  Our room was clean and very comfortable with 2 queen size beds (new décor and linens).  Our view was that of the parking lot however we did not book this hotel to remain in our room and look out our window.  We were there to go to Disneyland and our walk was a mere short 2 blocks (average walking time, with a tired end of the night 9 year old, was maybe 10 minutes).  The free breakfast in the morning was perfect and healthy options were available!  Nice to have started our day off with a good breakfast and full
Manager Response: Dear Kelli R:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you found us a "great property to stay at!" We appreciate you acknowledging our wonderful Guest Service Representative Hillary and she was all smiles when we shared your review with her. Thanks again for staying at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and we look forward to seeing you the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Really, I could not find anything negative worth mentioning.  If fit all our need!  Very clean room Friendly staff Great hot breakfast and on property restaurant and bar Quiet and comfortable rooms with safe and free Internet free parking And walking distance to Disneyland.  Definitely worth the money.  I will stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear BigChill 4:  Thank you for your positive feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are happy to hear that you had a "near perfect" stay.  We pride ourselves on our attempt to exceed guest expectations. This is why we are going to aim for a "perfect" on your next stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Thanks again for your feedback!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Horrible experience at their breakfast restaurant ( Gandhi Palace)
Summary: The hotel is very close to Disney and that's the only advantage. The quality of the rooms and wi-if is very average. My poor ratings is more towards their breakfast staff at Gandhi Restaurant. Except for the lady Brenda (I suppose that's her name and she was extremely friendly), the 2 men managing breakfast were extremely rude, discourteous and had no hotel management skills whatsoever. Considering that this location is near Disney  and will be frequented by families with kids, these 2 men (who are Indians and I am an Indian too so this is an unbiased feedback) refused to warm up milk, or even allow us to take 2 small yogurts outside of their breakfast area!!!! Upon being confronted, we were told that since they close at 10 am ( we had gone there before 9:30 am and many came
Manager Response: Dear NJ:  Disappointed and saddened would be the words that come to mind after reading your review.  I remember meeting you in the breakfast room and found you to be a very nice lady and your described treatment is not tolerable for you or any guest staying at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. True, our breakfast is a sit down meal and not a take out, but the restaurant employees definitely could have handled the situation in a kinder and more professional manner.  The restaurant employees are not Ramada employees. However, I will share this review with them and inform them that this behavior is not acceptable by any means.  On behalf of the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, please accept our sincere apologies for this incident. We truly do value you as a guest and hope that you would consider giving us another chance in the future.  Sincerely,  Brenda Harris Director of Sales

Summary: Staff helpful and friendly Room a little dated.  Rug and couch fraying Bed comfortable Hot tub nice and warm Close to convention centre and Disneyland
Manager Response: Darlene P:  We hope that you had a productive time at your convention. Thank you for your feedback. We are always looking for ways to make the Ramada Plaza Anaheim a better place to stay.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Hotel lobby area provides free wi-fi, coffee and a wide screen tv for entertainment. Plenty of comfortable seating while we waited for our group to arrive. The room was clean and the air conditioning was working. Only 2 hiccups: room safe was not working and housekeeping forgot to replace the coffee cups. Overall it's a good value.
Manager Response: Dear Reginald L:  Thank you for bringing these "hiccups" to our attention. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.  No need to drink water or for us to scare you to make your hiccups go away for we have shared your valuable feedback with our Executive Housekeeper so that your next stay will run smoother.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Overall, this was a great place to stay! 15 - 20 minute walk to Disneyland. Free, hot breakfast (although it got monotonous after 4 days). Clean pool. They even sent a guy out to clean it during a wind storm when leaves kept blowing into the pool. The Internet connection was not good. It was VERY slow and I had to keep logging in multiple times while I was browsing for an hour. The Internet on my phone was much faster and reliable, so I just used that while we stayed here. The fridge would not get cold. We called the front desk and they said we could put stuff in their fridge if we needed to. So we just used bags of ice from the ice maker.
Manager Response: Dear Logan BT:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we understand the importance of having speedy internet and a cold refrigerator.  We are working on correcting these issues and appreciate you bringing them to our attention. Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience you may have experienced.  We hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is a short walk (about 3 blocks) to the Convention Center.  I was looking for something close by that was less costly then the convention hotels.  This fit the bill.  Reasonable rates, free parking, breakfast included.  Lots of kids as this is also close to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear COCO:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is appreciative that you recognized value in your stay with our complimentary buffet breakfast, complimentary parking, and the fact that we are walking distance to Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center.  We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort Area so that we can, again, put a little extra money in your pocket with these savings. Thanks again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Hotel was located within a short distance to Disneyland and rooms were very quiet.  We stayed for 4 nights and loved being able to come back mid-day to rest before heading back to park.  Complimentary breakfast was very good quality however the dishwasher was not. Restaurants nearby were amazing especially the Cheesecake Factory!
Manager Response: Dear MattyTerriyaki:  We are happy that you had an enjoyable stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We too find clean dishes to be important!  This is why we have spoken to the dishwasher to relay the message.  Thank you for bringing this to our attention and we look forward to greeting you again during your next stay in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: The staff were appropriate for their positions.  The...
Summary: The staff were appropriate for their positions.  The cleaning staff did well with what they had, but the place needs to be updated, renovated, renewed.  The bathroom smelled of must and mold.  The fridge did not work, and the carpets were dirty.  I am sure there are so many people that come and go in that place, that it is well used, but I did not feel clean there.  I was afraid we would catch a disease of some sort.
Manager Response: Dear Korey R:  As a 2013 Ramada Award Winner, we are disappointed to find that you did not find your room up to standards.  We do wish that you would have informed us of your issues during your stay. I guarantee you that we would have corrected the problems.  However, we would like to apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. If you would like to speak with us further regarding your stay, please feel free to contact our General Manager.  On behalf of the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we hope to see you again so that we may show you that we do take customer service and quality assurance seriously.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We were looking for a hotel that was within walking distance of Disneyland, of a good standard, and at a reasonable price.  The Ramada Plaza delivered on all three for us.   It took between 10 and 15 minutes easy  flat walking to get to the Disneyland Plaza.  The room was in good condition, included a room safe, and the beds very comfortable.  Our only negative comment echoes another reviewer in that it seems to be difficult to get the cleaning staff to change the sheets, in spite of leaving the card on the bed instructing them to do so.  This was not a deal breaker for us however.  The breakfast was okay with a reasonable range of food on offer  - a tip - there is a big peak in patronage at about 8:30 to 9:15 so if you like your breakfast a little quieter go before or after
Manager Response: Dear JilRick:  Thank you for bringing to our attention of the issue you experienced.  We do offer guests an environmental choice of saving water by not having their sheets washed every day. However, if you do place the card on your bed, this means the housekeeping will change your sheets. It is clear  that we need to revisit this area and do some training with our new staff members,  We thank you for your feedback and are happy to hear that, overall, you enjoyed your stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We look forward to seeing you in the future!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Pleasant stay.. will come back again!
Summary: Staff are courteous and accommodating with my requests. Clean and spacious room when I requested for an oversized room. For a family of five we all had a pleasant stay with free breakfast daily and complimentary parking. Also, the hotel location is close distance to Disneyland that we can just walk.   Just a note for improvement.. sofa bed is not that comfy and some water leaking on the shower, air conditioning in the room is a bit noisy.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us on Trip Advisor. We are happy to hear that you found our staff courteous and accommodating. Further, thank you for informing us regarding the maintenance issue. We would like to know the room number so that we may attend to the issue.  If it is not of any inconvenience, we would love it if you could notify us at info@ramadaanaheim.com.   Thank you again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I would recommend that housekeeping staff be instructed to replace all bedding after 3 days. Even after leaving tips to have bedding changed out, only one bed was tended to and we ended up changing out the other one ourselves. The pool deck was littered with cups/debris and and remants of cups and even gum was observed in the pool. Hot tub water was murky.  eventually cleaned up after a couple days. One evening kids refused to enter pool due to uncleanliness. I don't think it should be up to hotel users to inform staff of uncleanliness. Hotel cleanliness should be continually monitored by staff. Poor water pressure in shower. Guest rooms & hotel in general could use remodeling.
Manager Response: Dear Clint B:  Thank you for bringing such issues to our attention. At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we take cleanliness seriously so of course we are disappointed to hear that such issues occurred during your stay. If you look at other Trip Advisor reviews, you will see that excellent cleanliness is a comment we get quite often. We have hired some new room attendants and perhaps it is necessary to provide additional training to correct such problems for the future. Thank you again and we hope that you would give us another chance the next time you visit the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Location great to walk to Disneyland. Clean and affordable. Breakfast included which was easy with the family. Indian restaurant on location very popular and serves authentic Indian food.
Manager Response: Dear John R:  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Thank you for recognizing the value you received with out complimentary hot buffet breakfast and thank you also for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We value your comments.   Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We originally booked for 2 nights this past week (April of 2014) and extended it for 4 nights.  We were only there for business but wanted to relax a bit as well since the hotel was so comfortable!  We stayed in Room 223 which is the only suite and I definitely recommend it!  With two full bathrooms, a living room/office space, large flat screen, minifridge, safe, microwave, coffee maker and a nice and comfortable king bed it was exactly what we needed.  I did see the other room types as well while there (2 queens, 2 queens with a pullout sofa and a 1 king room) and all looked very comfortable.  It's great that hotels like this exist when so many others are just focused on getting people in and out to the theme parks.  The hotel also has a pool, hot tub, sauna and gym but we
Manager Response: Dear Stephen:  Thank you so much for your kind review of your stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Your input means a lot to us and we appreciate you taking the time to share your feedback on Trip Advisor.  It was a pleasure to meet you in person. I enjoyed talking with you. On behalf of the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we look forward to a continued relationship with you and your company. We'll see you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  B. Harris Director of Sales

Summary: This hotel had breakfast and parking and had quite clean rooms. There was a good lunch buffet of Indian cuisine. This combined with the free wifi makes it a great value. Not only this but it is in walking distance if the Anaheim convention center an you can buy Disney tickets
Manager Response: Dear World CR:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim appreciates you taking the time to share your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. Thank you for recognizing the value received with our complimentary breakfast and complimentary parking.  We do believe it helps our guests save on extra spending during their trip.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We were there for the Disneyland trip for 3 nights, we were surprised to see that rooms were clean and pretty big room. The staff were friendly, too. Downside were one of our luggage went wrong airport and we were expecting to deliver to the room. Somehow they put under friend room and we did not get it until the next morning. Also it would be nice if they had little more variety for breakfast menus.
Manager Response: Dear Ganbaresue:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We can definitely empathize with you regarding your situation with your luggage. It must have been a great inconvenience. However, we are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and look forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I was travelling as a single mom with 3 12-year old girls.  I did not expect to have an easy time but the Ramada Plaza made it so easy!  Breakfast had enough choices so all the girls were happy.  The Ramada Plaza was an easy walk to and from Disneyland even when we were all worn out.  And the staff was amazing - not only was the hotel clean but the employees made us feel welcome.  We stayed 3 days and the breakfast hostess and the desk clerk remembered conversations with us and asked follow up questions the next day.  So nice and so personalized!  I highly recommend the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Anonymous:  As I mentioned to you, it takes a special person to take her daughter and two friends on a road trip to Disneyland. Kudos to you!  We are only happy to know that we succeeded on our end and that you all had an "Excellent" stay.  It was enjoyable talking with you each morning and we look forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  B. Harris Director of Sales Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: An excellent relocation due to overbooked from first choice hotel. We're lucky to have this area which is quiet and clean. A free breakfast and parking which is hard to get from the Disneyland Area. Also, friendly and courteous desk attendant. Thank you for a very good experience
Manager Response: Dear Nicasio:  We are sorry to hear that your trip started off on a bad foot due to another hotel overbooking but happy to hear that the Ramada Plaza Anaheim was able to turn it around to make it a "memorable stay."  We appreciate your feedback and look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I love staying @ this property!! You can walk right over to Disneyland. The parking is free of charge- which is rare for a hotel so close to Disneyland resort. Breakfast is complimentary @ Ghandi Restaurant. The rooms are comfortable & very clean!! Quiet- which is rare where families stay -ANYWHERE by the theme parks!!
Manager Response: Dear Bev B:  We are so happy to hear that you had a "Top Notch" stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We appreciate your feedback and hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We Picked this Local for the proximity to Disney Land. The Staff was Great They helped out with our questions and were always there when you needed assistance. The property is wonderful, rooms are really nice.
Manager Response: Dear SZ:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had an outstanding stay with us. Many of our guests appreciate the close walking distance that we are to the park and we see you also found this to be true. Looking forward to seeing you again soon and thank you for your feedback!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: I should have stuck with our favorite Ramada, the Maingate
Summary: We usually stay at the Ramada Maingate Hotel right next to Disneyland. We come down at least once per year and always stay there. This time the price of that one seemed a bit higher than normal, so we tried this Ramada instead. This was a huge mistake! We knew that this one wasn't located as conveniently to Disney as Maingate, but did think that Plaza meant that it was at a higher tier. We figured a cheaper place, higher tier, a little more walking to Disney, let's try it. Why? Why? Why? The service was not good, the  lobby smelled like Indian Food because their restaurant attaches to it, the walk was much further than expected, the rooms weren't as nice, the wifi wasn't working.......We won't make this mistake again!
Manager Response: Dear Tony L:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations. We are disappointed to know that we did not succeed regarding your recent stay with us. However, we will evaluate your comments with eagerness in order to correct the problems so that we may make improvements in all areas of our hotel.  True, we are not located directly across from the Disneyland Resort Area. However, we are 10 - 15 minutes walking distance to the Disneyland Resort Area which most guests find to be reasonable.  We make a strong attempt to keep our rates competitive taking into the consideration of location,  we are a full service hotel, offer complimentary parking when most hotels charge $10 to $35 a day to park a car, offer a complimentary hot buffet breakfast each morning even though we are not required to do so, and also offer complimentary wifi..  We apologize for any inconvenience  you may have experienced. If you would like to speak with us further regarding your stay, please feel free to contact the General Manager.  Thank you again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Had a great time! Enjoyed the pool and hot tub!  Service at front desk could have been a little better.  Pool was small but still had fun.  Breakfast was free which is a plus but it could have been a little better.  Great location and room was decent.  Very comfy beds and pillows.  Enjoyed my stay overall.
Manager Response: Dear Hector C:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We are always aiming to make our guests' stay " a little better" and will continue to work on all areas to do so. Thank you again for your comments.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: The room smelled like there had been water damage.  No...
Summary: The room smelled like there had been water damage.  No working fan in the bathroom.  Stained sheets on the beds.  Disappointing conditions.  Pool tiny.  Internet didn't work.
Manager Response: Dear Marlena S:  We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay with us. Your comments help us to find areas where we can improve. Therefore, they are  welcomed.  We apologize that you did not find your room up to standards. We take these issues very seriously and will investigate and review how we may fix such issues for future guests.  Thank you again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for the first time April 2-6, 2014 for a trip to Disneyland.  I chose this hotel over others because it offers free parking, Wi-Fi, and breakfast buffet and is within walking distance to Disneyland.  This hotel did not disappoint!  I saw many reviews saying that the breakfast was below par and I totally disagree!  There were plenty of eggs, fresh fruit, pancakes, sausage or bacon, cereal, bagels, etc.  It saved us at least $25 a day that the two of us would have spent at IHOP or Denny's.  The hotel was nice, clean, and staff was friendly.  The bed was comfortable and offered many pillow choices.  Along with it being close to Disney, it is very close to many restaurants as well.  We were very happy with our stay and will make this our hotel of choice every
Manager Response: Dear Kimberly:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had a "Great stay for Disney." We appreciate your feedback and thank you for noting the amenities that we believe make us stand out from the other 110 Anaheim hotels: complimentary breakfast, complimentary parking, complimentary wifi, walking distance to Disneyland Resort and numerous restaurants such as the Cheesecake Factory, We hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management The Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Stayed at the Ramada Plaza for two nights.  It is very very clean, microwave is very convenient if you have children.  The fridge in the room. Free breakfast and free newspaper to your door in the morning. It's about a 15 to 20 minute walk to Disneyland.  Free parking free Wi-Fi and the staff is outstanding. This is our second time staying at the Ramada Plaza and will be back for many more trips to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Chad K:  Thank you for your loyalty to the Ramada Plaza Anaheim as well as taking the time to share your feedback with us. We couldn't ask for more than a "perfect" review so thank you. We will share your feedback with our staff who work hard to create that "perfect" stay.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Room was clean, nice facility, service was great, front desk staff was most helpful.  Loved the view from 4th floor, front with tall palms.  Wished the windows would open!  Complimentary breakfast and staff were great, too.
Manager Response: Dear Holly W:  We are so happy to hear that you had a pleasant stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Your satisfaction is important to us and it is rewarding to know that you were satisfied. We apologize that you had difficulty getting your window open. The windows in our hotel are double windows that do open but perhaps yours was a bit tricky.  Thank you again for staying at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: I enjoyed my stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. The room was...
Summary: I enjoyed my stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. The room was clean and I didn't have any noises waking me up at night. I was in an adjoining room, but thankfully the other occupants were quiet. The staff was great and helped ensure I received my luggage that was delivered to me late (airline lost it). I do wish the Ramada had a bar/restaurant like the resort across the street, but overall I enjoyed my stay. The location was great and at a reasonable price. I would recommend this place to others.
Manager Response: Dear David H:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim would like to thank you for staying with us and for sharing your feedback on TripAdvisor. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and look forward to seeing you the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed here 2 nights on our CA road trip. We had a suite room that had 2 queen beds & one sofa sleeper (7 in our group...1 baby in a pack-n-play). The room was nice & spacious, clean, and comfy beds. The breakfast will be worth the stay!!! A true hot breakfast, with different items daily: fruits, donuts, yogurts, cereal, bacon or sausage, eggs, oatmeal, seasoned potatoes, pancakes, etc. (served on a hot buffet)...really good! Staff was all helpful & nice, which we had parking issues as our vehicle would not fit in the parking garage (SUV w/ a cargo topper)...and a bus was parked taking up at least 8 spaces. They allowed us to park in the staff space until a spot opened up. We walked to Disney, which was not a problem for our 3 kids (baby in a stroller, others were 7 & 4
Manager Response: Dear Jana:  We are so pleased to hear that you had a great stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate you recognizing the value received with our complimentary hot buffet breakfast as well as the convenience of our location being walking distance to Disneyland.  Thank you for choosing the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and for taking the time to share your feedback with us on TripAdvisor.  Have a Great Day!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We were a family of 6 and stayed in the standard room with 2 queens and a pull-out. The room was very spacious and large enough for all of us and our luggage. Room had a frdige, microwave and safe. We were able to get groceries down the street and there was a 7-11 and strip mall within a 2 minute walk from the hotel. Included buffet breakfast each morning was an excellent value and consisted of hot eggs, bacon, sausages and pancakes. also had toast and cereal available. Other places nearby were charging $10 a person for the same type buffet. Housekeeping was great and front desk was always accomodating. Shuttle bus pickup was literally steps from the hotel door and Disneyland Resort was a short 10 minute walk away. Great value hotel and would definately stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Michael P:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim appreciates you taking the time to share your comments with us on TripAdvisor, We are happy to hear that you appreciated the value in our complimentary hot buffet breakfast as well as the convenience of being walking distance to Disneyland. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Great breakfast.  Big clean room.  Close to Disney- an easy walk even with little ones.  Safe parking.  Nice pool- except one time I was using the whirlpool and the maintenance guy said, "I'm going to need you to get out so I can add some chemicals."  Then he turned on the jets for fifteen minutes or so, and said we could get back in when it stopped bubbling.  It was less than 60 degrees Fahrenheit out, and the pool guy left without putting up a sign or anything saying not to get in the hot tub, so I felt cold and annoyed as I sat there waiting for the bubbles to stop.  I would have just gone inside except I didn't want someone else to get in the chemical pool unaware.  If the management is reading this: the pool has hours posted for use.  Have the guy dump the chemicals in on
Manager Response: Dear Pamela:  Thank you so much for sharing your feedback with us regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are glad that overall, you had an enjoyable stay.  We can definitely sympathize with your situation at the pool. The man you encountered was actually an outside pool man, and not the hotel's maintenance person. Usually they notify us when they are putting chemicals in the pool so that we may temporarily close the pool area. We will talk with him about having better communication for the future and we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Nice hotel but the worst internet service imaginable. Need to work on the road? Stay somewhere else.
Manager Response: Dear Linda:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim appreciates you taking the time to share your feedback with us regarding your recent stay.  We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with the internet and can understand how this would have been frustrating.   During peak conventions, the high usage all at the same time could have been a factor in slowing the internet down.  Again, we offer our sincere apologies.  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: PRO: Hotel was clean and very close to the Anaheim Convention Center.  CON: Kids/families up and down the hall at all hours (Disney).  Key locks were inconsistent (had to get new card keys 4 times on a 5 day trip).
Manager Response: Jason M:  Thank you for choosing the Ramada Plaza Anaheim to host your stay while attending your conference.  We appreciate your feedback and will use it as a way to improve in the future. Please accept our sincere apologies for the issues you experienced with your keys.  This is not a typical issue. We usually only have problems with keys when guests place their card near a cell phone or other object that can demagnetize  the magnetic strip.  We are not sure if this was the case in your situation. Either way, we can definitely understand your frustration. As for the noise, we make a serious effort to address noise issues as soon as they are brought to our attention.  We encourage our guests to notify the Front Desk immediately so that we may take care of the problem promptly so that everyone can get a good night's sleep.  Thanks again!  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We were very pleased with this hotel with 5 of us staying in the room with the sofa sleeper; it was spacious, Good location and close walking distance to restaurants and to the parks. Free Breakfast was good. The pool was okay,  We were able to view the fireworks from the window in our room. The staff was friendly and efficient.
Manager Response: Dear 1 Cot Traveler:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us. We are pleased to know that you appreciated our close proximity to Disneyland as well as our complimentary buffet breakfast. Thank you again for sharing your feedback with us and for choosing the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  Sincerely, ]  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: One of the best hotels I've ever stayed at!
Summary: The rooms were so clean, the complimentary HOT breakfast was great, and the staff was beyond friendly! Also only being 2 blocks away from Disneyland, it was easy to come and go from the park. We will definitely stay here again!
Manager Response: Dear Lizzie 14:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. We aim to exceed guest expectations and we appreciate your feedback letting us know we succeeded. Thank you again for staying with us and we look forward to seeing you again the next time you  are in the Anaheim  Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Large sized rooms, breakfast included, good location to Disney Land and restaurants, staff very friendly and helpful. Would stay here again. Pool was great to come back to after a long day walking around DL.
Manager Response: Dear Kathy C:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. We appreciate you recognizing the full sized room, great location, relaxing pool, and our friendly staff.  Thank you again for staying with us and for taking the time to share your feedback with us on Trip Advisor.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel staff was very helpful in checking our bags.  The hotel is within easy walking distance to the Disneyland gate. I would stay there again if I go back to Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Glenn:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim thanks you for your review on Trip Advisor. We are happy to find that you appreciated the close proximity to Disneyland. We hope to see you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The bathroom is poorly designed. Small basin and no counter space surrounding left me holding my glasses so I could put on makeup, brush teeth, etc.  Bath towels are located opposite of bathtub/shower above the toilet - which has no lid to close especially when flushing.
Manager Response: Dear RCoven 8134:  Thank you for your feedback regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are sorry that you found our bathrooms too small for your liking. We will definitely keep your opinion and suggestion regarding our bathrooms in mind for the future.  Thanks Again!  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Nice room, but did not get what I paid for
Summary: My family paid extra for a one bedroom suite specifically so we could have a separate sleeping area since we have a four month old and a toddler. When booking I was told there was a separate sleeping area, but in fact what we ended up with was a large suite with a huge king size bed in the room.  No separate bedroom. It was a nice room...appears to have been two rooms converted into one.  The bed was very comfortable, lots of space in the room, but had I known it would be just one large room, I would have saved some money by booking a regular room instead.
Manager Response: Dear Travel Grl:  We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are deeply sorry if there was any miscommunication on our room types. We actually only have one suite total at our property and it only has one bed. We do have rooms with two beds and a sleeper couch which fits up to six persons. We do call this our  "Deluxe Room" but we do not refer to it by any means as a suite.  There is only a $10.00 difference from a standard room with two queen beds (that only sleeps four persons). Again, we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Hotel was very nice, we stayed 5 nights.  The staff was very friendly and helpful.  Underground parking was nice, though maneuvering a Yukon XL down there was a bit tricky.  The pool was warm, towels provided as well as outdoor showers to rinse.  Our room was very clean but the bathroom floor was sticky(hairspray?).  Typical of most hotels the shower head was way to low for anyone over 5ft tall.  We were here for Disneyland and the hotel is about 2 1/2 blocks from the entrance which is well within walking distance.  It was spring break and there were about a hundred cheerleaders staying in our hotel that were competing at the Anaheim Convention Center, so it wasn't the quietest.  Compared to other hotels the noise in the room was pretty low despite this.  Only thing I was really
Manager Response: Dear Krause 810:  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts with us regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback regarding our hotel and will use your comments to make improvements in the future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We loved the rooms and the staff was excellent. Just around the corner was a partner hotel at twice the price. Lots of eating places and convenience place within walking distance.
