Parking under the hotel. Breakfast had good variety. Disney was easy to walk to and we took a cab back for $8 for all 6 one day. Ask to buy Disney tickets from the desk when you call them.
Manager Response: Dear Laurie D:  Thank you for sharing your recent experience at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are pleased to hear that your stay went well and that you appreciated the room size, complimentary parking and breakfast, as well as our friendly staff.  We hope that you stay with us again.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Staff were excellent. Friendly, helpful, professional and accommodating. Room was large. Hotel was quiet.  Checked us in early. Beds comfortable. Close walk to DL and restaurants. Would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear LareenBC63:  We are  so happy to hear that your stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim exceeded your guest expectations and that you enjoyed the room size, the location, and our friendly staff. We hope to see you again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: The facility was convenient, clean and had excellent...
Summary: The facility was convenient, clean and had excellent service. The noise level outside the room could be heard to clearly.
Manager Response: Dear Rachelle:  We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We apologize for any noise issues you may of experienced. We do our best to address such situations immediately  when we are notified of the problem. We are glad that other than that you had an enjoyable stay.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: You guys made us feel at home
Summary: I loved the whole experience and the friendliness and great customer service I received from Hilary at the front desk. She was very knowledgeable and well informed on all the promotions and even Disney ticket information, she helped us figure out the affordable way to meet out needs so that we felt we were doing business with a kind and fair company that cares about their employees , the Filipino lady that works at night at the front desk was also so sweet and nice. I will definitely recommend people to come here whenever they visit Anaheim .
Manager Response: Dear Karen Estela F:  Thank you so much for sharing your kind words regarding our staff as well as your stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. It is our goal to make our guests feel at home and we are happy to know that we succeeded in your case.  We will be sure to pass your comments on to Hilary and Edna, and look forward to seeing you again in the future.  Sincerely,  Management

Summary: Stayed at Ramada Plaza Mar 16-21 for our trip to Disneyland. Traveled with kids ages 9-11. Overall a great stay. The hotel is showing signs of wear, and could definitely use some freshening up, and some sound proofing, but otherwise everything else was great. All the staff we spoke to at the front desk, the restaurant, and the house-keeping were super friendly and helpful!! We were greeted by everyone at the front desk whenever we walked through day or night. We always had lots of fresh towels, the beds and linens were clean and comfortable, and the microwave and fridge in the room were convenient. The air con unit was a bit loud, but it worked well. The bathrooms could use an exhaust fan as the steam from the shower took a while to clear. The kids enjoyed the pool, and the
Manager Response: Dear Afon 2012:  Thank you so much for your kind review regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We are happy to hear that our staff exceeded your guest expectations and that you found the easy walk to Disneyland as well as the restaurants at the Garden Walk convenient. We hope to see you the next time you are visiting the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Great hotel! Very family friendly but still quiet. Walked with our 4 kids to Disneyland with no problems. Close enough we could go back for naps. Breakfast was great and the staff was amazing. They remembered us every morning and went out of their way to talk to the kids. Beds were comfortable and everything was clean. Will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Julie B:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us. We appreciate you acknowledging our staff as well as the convenience of being walking distance to Disneyland. We hope to see you and your family again in the future!  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The room and bed were decent enough for the price and distance to Disney. Bathrooms were pretty run down and in need of maintenance. Staff had been very friendly during our stay, but once we left it was a different story. We stayed here to celebrate a birthday at Disney and ended up leaving a stack of birthday cards with cash in them in the room. We understand fully this is our fault, but called to see if they were being held at the desk by any chance. The first call the guy on the phone just simply said "nothing was found in that room at all." We called a few days later and asked to speak to a manager. She was very nice and said she would see what she could find out about the room and said she would call us back the next day. No call. We called her a week later and she just
Manager Response: Dear Chelsea W.  Thank you for providing us feedback regarding your recent stay. We can definitely understand your frustration of losing something as valuable as birthday cards with money inside. True, we did not find the cards. However, I would like to kindly point out that this does not insinuate that our housekeeping staff stole the money.  We have had the same housekeeping staff for quite some time and find them to be quite honest and trustworthy.  Is it possible that they saw some cards in an envelope and assumed that they were trash? Yes, this could be a possibility. We have a firm policy that housekeeping must follow: Any items left or found in the room must be delivered the same day to the front desk.  I understand that you spoke to one of our Front Desk staff regarding the situation. She said that she spoke to you twice and let you know that nothing had been found and said that she took your number in case something did show up, but nothing did. If there was some kind of confusion in our communication to you, we do apologize.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Staff is wonderful and very helpful.  Hotel very close to D-land and was perfect for us.  We stayed there 2 nights...breakfast the first day was ok..much better the second morning...we will stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Tess 591:  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your Disneyland stay with your friends and that you found the Ramada Plaza Anaheim a good fit for your needs. We appreciate you taking the time to give us feedback and hope you visit us again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel was very conveniently located to Disneyland (a short walk), great parking, spacious room for two adults and three teenagers.  Free breakfast was good and they graciously allowed us to keep the car parked until late afternoon the day we checked out.  Very helpful front desk staff!  Just a great bargain and actually a really nice hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca C:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations and are happy to hear that we were successful during your recent stay with us. Thank you for recognizing our staff and we look forward to seeing you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Great location. Breakfast was great was a great start to the day. Beds were a little short and rooms were a little tired. Overally, the hotel was perfcetly located for the Convention Centre.
Manager Response: Dear MH:  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed our complimentary breakfast as well as appreciated the short walk to the Anaheim Convention Center. We are sorry you found the beds too short for your liking. Most guests find them satisfactory but we do understand that  each guest has a different preference. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused. We look forward to hosting your next stay when visiting the Anaheim Resort Area,  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The staff at the Ramada Plaza of Anaheim is great! The location is prime for Disneyland and the Convention Center, and you cant beat the free breakfast!
Manager Response: Dear NS:  First, we'd like to thank you for your long time patronage.  We appreciate your loyalty to the Ramada Plaza Anaheim as well as you taking the time to share your comments with us on Trip Advisor.  We look forward to seeing you again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Everything was excellent from the moment we arrived. The only issue we had, was that our key cards kept deactivating, but the staff was always friendly and more than happy to reactivate them. Great customer service friendly staff, great hotel, great rooms, and the pricing was great, too.
Manager Response: Dear Tanya J:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is pleased to hear that you had an excellent stay and we appreciate your feedback. We apologize for the inconvenience you experienced with your key cards and are happy to know that our staff was able to accommodate you. We hope to see you again soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We recently stayed at the Ramada Plaza due to the fact or usual Holiday Inn was booked for a last minute trip to Disneyland. I really wish the other hotel was available. The room was clean on the surface but not very well. Our shower curtain was stained with what looked like blood. The air vent was loose and covered in dust. We asked for an infant crib for our son which was fine but the blanket they brought us was ripped and stained. I'm so glad we brought our son's favorite blanket. The breakfast while great to have available to us every morning was not great. The food barely kept us fueled for an hour in the park. We ended up snacking when originally we hoped a hotel with breakfast would have cut down on that. It was an easy 15 minute walk to Disneyland which was the best part
Manager Response: Dear Patrick G:  Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guests' expectations and it is clear that we failed to do so in your case.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you and will pass these comments on to the appropriate departments in order to improve for the future.  Regards,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Stayed 5 nights for business -- the hotel is great. Close proximity to convention center and comfortable. Just try to not get room 410. There was a constant humming vibration coming from above us (assume the roof - machinery of some sort). This may be the case for all rooms on the 4th floor - I do not know.  Then to top it off the air conditioner in the room was very loud and clunked and vibrated every time the cooling unit came on. We ended up turning the AC off and opening the windows so we could sleep.  We still give the hotel itself a very positive rating!
Manager Response: Dear 23TravelinFool23:  Thank you for staying at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. It is nice to hear that you appreciated our close proximity to the Anaheim Convention Center.  It  is unfortunate that you experienced some difficulties with your air conditioning. Thank you for including the room number. I will pass this on to the Maintenance Department so that they may correct the problem. We do not normally have complaints about 4th floor rooms experiencing noise from above but we will investigate this as well.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: A great place to stay and visit Disneyland! The staff here are amazing! They are friendly, helpful and accommodating! They acknowledge everyone coming through the lobby and help with directions and tips! I can not say enough good about Stephanie Ramirez, she went above and beyond the call. The staff really makes the stay pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Cathy:  Thank you for acknowledging our staff member Stephanie. We are happy to hear that you received excellent service from both Stephanie and the rest of our staff. We aim to exceed guests' expectations and it is rewarding to know when we succeed.  See you the next time!  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Nice place - clean, friendly staff.  Not noisy.  Very adequate for a stay at Disney or for business.
Manager Response: Dear Michael:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is happy to hear that you experienced an enjoyable stay with us. We look forward to hosting your next stay while visiting the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We had a pleasant stay in this hotel near Disneyland (walkable distance), clean and nice staff.   Positive points : free Wifi, free parking, and free hot breakfast (toasts, bagels,english muffins, fruits, eggs (hard boiled and scrambled), bacon, pancakes, oatmeal, muffins, mini donuts...), the room was very quiet (couldn't hear other guests). This only negative point that I would have is that I had to remind the front desk 3 times to bring us more blankets to our room...
Manager Response: Dear Philip M:  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and that you recognized the value received in our complimentary hot buffet breakfast, complimentary parking, as well as complimentary wifi.  Further, thank you for bringing to our attention the issue of not receiving blankets in a timely manner.  This is unacceptable and we will look into this situation in order to make sure it doesn't happen in the future. We feel strongly that all guests' requests are important and should be responded to and corrected in a reasonable amount of time.  Thank You Again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Excellent stay for our large group!
Summary: We stayed here on our last trip to Disneyland.  We booked with our cousins and it was their first trip to the park.  We arrived and it was super clean and the location was excellent.  Close enough to the park for all 5 kids in the party to walk (ages 6, 7, 8, 12 and 12).  I personally like staying a few blocks from the park to get a slight break from Disney.  The pool and hot tub were great and the kids liked that we could see the fireworks from the pool patio.  The breakfast was just what we needed to start our day and we appreciated the hot items as well.  The hotel is close proximity to so many other great restaurants to fit all budgets.  The kids liked being right across from the 7-11 so they could get slushies after a hot day of walking around the park!  The staff were warm
Manager Response: Dear Amien Sean:  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim is pleased to hear that your group had an enjoyable stay.  We appreciate your comments and  look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Just returned from a five night stay at this facility. From check in to check out we were very happy with the desk staff. It was nice to be acknowledged when walking thru the lobby. Our room was always very clean. It was nice to smell that bleach was be used. There were a few minor (paint, cracked tile) issues in the room, but the overall condition was as good as the condition of our house. The king size bed was very comfortable and the air conditioner was quiet allowing for a good sleep. Our room was located at the back of the building and was very quiet. The complimentary breakfast had enough selection for us. We are in our 50's and didn't find the 10 minute walk to Disney to be a problem. The only suggestions that we left with the hotel was that we found the pool area needed
Manager Response: Dear Jimy 10:  We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay during your recent visit with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We hope you had a nice time at Disneyland and are glad that you found the walk reasonable. We will pass your comment regarding the oatmeal on to the restaurant staff. Thank you for choosing the Ramada Plaza Anaheim!  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I completely understand that sometimes there will be issues with your hotel room. I travel enough that little things don't bother me. But when there are multiple issues, and when hotel management doesn't take action, well, lets just say that there are plenty of alternatives in this same area. To be clear, the staff was very nice and sympathetic. But, my issues were never addressed. The drain in the bathroom sink was broken - it really wouldn't close, but it wouldn't really open either - there was always a slow leak. This would be no big deal, but then I found out that the shower head was clogged with mineral deposits. And, most importantly, the hotel internet didn't work for more than a few seconds at a time.  I travel a lot, and try to keep an open mind about these issues. I
Manager Response: Dear Gizmosda00:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations. Unfortunately, it appears we came up short during your recent stay with us.  We also believe that issues that might occur during a guest's stay should be addressed and handled in a timely matter. We offer our sincerest apologies that this did not happen during your stay. We take your feedback seriously and have already started addressing these issues with our staff and management so that a valuable guest like yourself does not fall through the cracks again. If you choose,  management would love to speak with you further regarding your stay. Please feel free to contact us. Again, we apology for any inconvenience this may have caused. We do care about resolving the issue.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: If you just need a place to sleep
Summary: The good: price was good quiet hotel close to convention center  Bad: internet was horrible, never connected over 3 day stay shower curtain was torn continental breakfast was marginal at best  I would not return to this hotel.  there are newer and better chains for the same price.
Manager Response: Dear Peter B:  Thank you for your comments on TripAdvisor.  We apologize for the issues you encountered during your recent stay with us. We aim to provide our guests with a valuable and comfortable stay and we are disappointed to hear that we fell short during your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We value your feedback and will use it as a way to improve for the future.  Sincerely.  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I travelled to Anaheim with my children, their spouses and grandchildren for the express purpose of being close to Disneyland. As we were a large group requiring several rooms, and with budgetary constraints in mind, we chose this hotel for the following reasons......comments in brackets follow each point...... 1 Flat walking distance to the entrance to Disneyland. (Yes, very easy access. Not an onerous walk at all.)   2 A reliable hotel chain where we could be fairly certain that the rooms would be clean and well appointed. (Basic, but spacious, quiet, very clean rooms. Well maintained common areas and attractive foyer with plenty of room to wait for others to be ready for the day.)  3 Good value for money with a buffet breakfast included. (Great value for money hotel. Very
Manager Response: Dear Ros 2:  We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. It is our goal to provide our guests with a stay that exceeds guest expectations. We will see you the next time!  Management Ramada Plaza ANaheim

Summary Heading: The stay was great.  Facilities were clean.  Only real...
Summary: The stay was great.  Facilities were clean.  Only real complaint is that the dinner option is only one type of food (Indian food); no other variety.  Breakfast was okay.
Manager Response: Dear Saro M.  We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Thank you for taking the time to share your feedback with us. We'll see you the next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: It was quite a job to choose where to stay for our trip to Disneyland.  The Ramada Plaza turned out to be a great choice!  Friendly staff, clean, quiet (that could have had something to do with the time of year we stayed!)  Easy walk to Disneyland.  We didn't use the pool or even have a chance to look at it.  I couldn't connect to Wi-Fi, but there are two computers in the lobby for guest use.  The A/C was very noisy.  Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Smartea:  Thank you for sharing your "Great stay in Disneyland" with us.  We apologize that you had difficulty with the internet. We can definitely understand the frustration and we apologize for the inconvenience. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Disneyland Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: It was a very nice stay. The service received was very good. The location of the hotel was ideal for my business travel, so closed to the Convention Center. If something needs to be improved is the breakfast selection of food.
Manager Response: Dear Gabriel:  We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and that you found the walk to the Convention Center convenient.  We will take your comments regarding the breakfast into consideration as we continue to strive to make improvements.  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: WIFI is very slow. We were staying for a business trip and required high speed internet to upload video footage. Connection was WAY too slow for our purposes.   Had a very nice stay. Rooms are clean, included breakfast was great.
Manager Response: Dear David M.  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us on TripAdvisor. We apologize for the difficulty you experienced with the wifi. We will look into improving the situation for the next time you are in the Ramada Plaza Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Room ok; breakfast so basic but good (scrabble eggs, bread, and bananas every day). And two people in front desk, when we check out their smiling finished and they didn´t have the same good attitude. Unhappy ending after one week, what a shame. Names: Stephanie and Kirn. thks!
Manager Response: Dear Ricardo:  Thank you for feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We value your comments and will use them as a way to improve in the future.  We are sorry that you felt that your trip did not end on a good note.  We will pass these comments on to the Front Desk.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Overall this hotel is an excellent choice for business or pleasure. With the ideal location close to Disneyland or the Anaheim Convention Center, the access to events or locations is ideal.
Manager Response: Dear Harry M:  We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us and we appreciate your feedback. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are visiting Anaheim!

Summary Heading: The best place by Disneyland to stay!
Summary: I have been staying at this Ramada Plaza hotel now for about 6 years and would not stay anywhere else!  Whether I am there to go to Disneyland (which is most of the time) or on business, the reasons I come back really have to do with the GREAT staff!!  From Jane the Manager to Kirn, Stephanie, Hilary and Andres, they are ALL the absolute best!  We always feel welcomed and special and they go out of their way to make sure anything and everything we need is taken care of.  When I am there by myself I feel very safe and when we have a group going to Disneyland they make sure we know anything about the parks and events going on in the area.  We always feel like we are being welcomed by family and love coming back again and again.  It is also a great value with free parking, full
Manager Response: Dear Vanessa R:  Thank you for you loyalty to the Ramada Plaza Anaheim! We appreciate you acknowledging our staff and their hard work and will pass your comments on to them. We'll see you the next time you are in the Ramada Plaza Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel has a three star rating with a two star feel.  I think the only reason it rates a three star is it has interior doorways.  The sheets were clean, but the carpets were super dirty.  We had a room that could accommodate up to six people, however, we were only able to use wifi for three devices.  When we called the front desk, they were unable to fix this.  Also, the breakfast was DISGUSTING.  We are not picky eaters, but we looked at the food and walked away.  They were even out of butter lol!  After not using the breakfast tickets for 3 days, I went down to get a banana, yogurt, and toast for my daughter who was not feeling well enough to go to a restaurant.  I brought the ticket and explained what I was doing.  I was treated as if I was stealing, they even asked my
Manager Response: Dear Dawn J:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we strive to exceed guest expectations. Therefore, we are sorry to hear that we fell short in your case.  We understand that you found our complimentary buffet breakfast not to your satisfaction.  The breakfast is a dine-in only breakfast due to it being a buffet and not a continental breakfast.  We strive to communicate this to our guests at check-in so we apologize if we failed to tell you such.  We are not sure if you stayed with us during the NAMM Convention. If so, our hotel was running at full occupancy and perhaps this could have been a reason for your internet difficulties if everyone was logging in at the same time. Either way, we can definitely understand your frustration. If you would like to speak with someone further regarding these issues, please feel free to contact our General Manager.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: We really enjoyed our stay. The rooms were clean. The pool...
Summary: We really enjoyed our stay. The rooms were clean. The pool and hut tub are nice and warm. The only thing that I would have liked to be different is the breakfast. The staff were not friendly at all.
Manager Response: Dear Jana:  We are pleased to hear that overall you had an enjoyable stay. Yet, we are sorry to hear that you found the breakfast staff to be unfriendly. We will pass your comments on to them. Hoping to see you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is within walking distance to the park entrances, right next door to a little strip mall filled with food court type offerings, has huge rooms, good internet, a decent pool and hot tub, and THE GREATEST COMPLIMENTARY BREAKFAST BUFFET IN THE HISTORY OF HOTELS.  My family will be coming back to this hotel many times over for the breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Lojurive:  We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and that you especially enjoyed our complimentary breakfast. We will pass your kind words on to the restaurant and look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The reception staff were very attentive and the room was nice and clean.  I did have some difficulties connecting to the free WiFi.  Even though there was a bus stop right outside the property the walk to and from Disneyland was very doable, even late at night.  They do have a nice parking garage underground with amply spots.  We did eat breakfast one morning and found it pretty sparse with many tables needing attention. Once the manager showed up they got things in order quickly.
Manager Response: Dear Snowmiser:  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim on Trip Advisor. At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we strive to exceed guest expectations and your feedback helps us to see where we can improve. We are happy to hear that, overall,  you enjoyed your stay and we look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Location was perfect for a Disneyland vacation. Free breakfast was great and all the staff seemed to want to help to make the stay the best possible. Pool and hottub were always clean during our stay. I've stayed at least at 8 different hotels around the Disneyland area, and I would Definatly choose the Ramada Plaza again for my next stay! The only negative comment that I can say is that one morning I wanted to bring a milk from the breakfast room up to my room for my grandson, and one gentleman from the breakfast room came up to me and my wife and made a big scene in front of other guests that I wasn't aloud to do that, made us very uncomfortable. Older east Indian should learn a little bit more about costumer service. My wife was so embarrassed that she didn't join the family
Manager Response: Dear Willie S:  We are happy to hear that you had a great vacation!  And, thank you for bringing to our attention the unfortunate occurrence during breakfast. Since our breakfast is a dine in only breakfast, the restaurant does not allow food to be taken out of the restaurant. We try our best to inform our guests of this at time of check-in.  If we failed to do so, we apologize.  Either way, we do feel that the restaurant staff could have handled the situation more professionally. We have shared your review with the restaurant and have discussed how they might handle the situation better in the future.   Thank You Again!  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Construction site at hotel right now!!!!! So after a full day at Disneyland be prepared for LOUD noise at 7.30am! So disappointed with this aspect. Would have rated higher if we had been warned at least. Staff great. Rooms clean. Convenience to Disneyland and restaurants excellent. NOISE for family after staying at Disneyland all day AWFUL. Just ask when you are booking that you  get a room away from all the work or make sure the work is finished. :-(
Manager Response: Dear Erica 3101:  We appreciate your feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced regarding some construction that took place. Based on the time you stayed and the time you mentioned, I am assuming that the incident mentioned might have been when our restaurant decided to do some repairs without notifying us. We addressed the issue with them immediately and they stopped the construction at early hours the next day. We can definitely understand how this would have been inconvenient and again we apologize. If you would like to speak with us further regarding this issue, please feel free to contact us.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great value for staying near Disneyland
Summary: Quality has slipped a little in the past years but it remains one of the best value suite hotels near Disneyland.  Most hotels do not accommodate families of 6 while this large room with double queen and sofa bed will do so.  Free breakfast is helpful but when it's busy they tend to run out although they will bring out more.  We've found holiday periods are a bit hectic! Overall, a great deal for an economy family visit.
Manager Response: Dear Bayareafam:  Thank you for your sharing your comments with us regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate you recognizing the value received for our complimentary breakfast. Yes, the holidays in this area can be crazy. We apologize that we ran out of food sooner than we expected. We found that during the holiday times, most of our guests were sleeping  in after a long day at Disneyland. Therefore, they were all coming down to breakfast at the same time - a half hour before the breakfast closed. Since most of our breakfast items are cooked freshly and served hot, we did run out sooner than we expected, but replenished as fast as we could to insure that all guests went away full. We have some future plans for renovations and look forward to sharing those with you soon.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I stayed here during the Veteran's Day holiday, and I would often pick this hotel when I would go to Disneyland. (I had originally meant to write this review much earlier, but I forgot about it, due to other circumstances.)  This is one of my favorite hotels in Anaheim,and I stayed at this hotel numerous times during my trips to Disneyland.  The hotel staffers were friendly & helpful as always, and some of them even knew who I was, when I would return to the hotel.  The hotel room was quiet & clean, and I slept like a baby. Some people had complained about the thin walls, but I was probably too knocked out to care.  The free hot breakfast of scrambled eggs, bacon, and sausages is also one of the biggest pluses for the hotel. Some hotels in Anaheim just give you some stale
Manager Response: Dear Hakaider:  We are so happy to hear that you again enjoyed your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We value your patronage and appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts with us on TripAdvisor.  We can definitely understand how walking back after a long day at Disneyland could be rough.  We might suggest that the next time you visit and feel tired on the way back, you can purchase tickets from the driver for the ART  bus. You can buy an all day pass at the front desk before departing to Disneyland, or if you walk and decide you don't want to walk back, you can purchase a one way ticket from the driver on your way out. The shuttle runs every 20 minutes.  We'll see you next time!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: In this case, the high room rate is not reflected in the level of service or amenities.  Only plus here was the reasonable proximity to Disneyland.  The key card lock to the room was erratic and finally failed - not even maintenance could fix without a major repair - luckily the final lock failure occured upon checkout.  The self service breakfast was adequate - but disappointed in no fresh eggs.  Only hard boiled.  Some items on Buffet took a while to replenish.  TV blaring in the main lobby was disconcerting and not condusive to a serene welcoming atmosphere - Rooms were clean and nicely appointed, but not enough counter space in bath room - freestanding sink.  Hallways always noisy - lots of kids (expectedly)!  Pricey (over $200 night) for the downmarket experience, but did
Manager Response: Dear Scarlett:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We strive to exceed guest expectations and are disappointed that our efforts only lead up to "mediocre" for you. However, we appreciate these comments and will use them as a way to continue to improve for the future.   It is true that during your stay we were running at high occupancies due to the holiday season and the breakfast area can be a bit hectic as a reflection of having a full house. We do our best to prepare for such an occasion, and although we serve breakfast from 7am to 10am, we found that people were all sleeping in after a long day at Disneyland and  the majority of the hotel all came down for breakfast at 9:30am. Since our breakfast items are hot items and cooked freshly, we did run out faster than we expected due to the mentioned circumstances. So, we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused as well as the problems with the lock system.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The hotel needs some updating, but it was clean. I would recommend that they get new carpet in the hotel rooms. There were some stains on the carpet. We slept comfortably and had a good breakfast in the morning. The breakfast is basic eggs, bacon, sausage, etc., but much better than a continental breakfast. I would stay again for the price of the hotel and the included breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Rachel C.:  We are so happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate your feedback and look forward to hosting your stay the next time you are in the Anaheim Plaza Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We like to stay at the Ramada Inn. The staff are friendly and professional.  Rooms are clean and comfortable.  Rates are great and it is walking distance to Disneyland.  and you receive a complimentary breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Rebecca N.  We are so happy to hear that  you had an enjoyable stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and we thank you for sharing your kind words on TripAdvisor.  We look forward to seeing you again the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great hotel. Fantastic location; Disney is 15 to 20 minutes...
Summary: Great hotel. Fantastic location; Disney is 15 to 20 minutes walking.  Food is not the best but is good to have complementary breakfast.  Staff is very friendly and helpful.  Rooms are clean and comfortable, no need for luxury.
Manager Response: Dear Brenda Julieta:  Thank you for your positive review on TripAdvisor. We are rewarded to know that you enjoyed your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts on TripAdvisor. We look forward to seeing you again the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: My 17-yr-old daughter and I stayed here for 3 nights in early December. We thought the location was excellent - a 10 minute walk to Disneyland, if that. Two doors down from Bubba Gumps and the Anaheim Garden Walk shops. Just down the block from the Cheesecake Factory, which was cheap and delicious! The reception staff were always very friendly and helpful. We discovered that my daughter's shampoo bottle had burst in her suitcase on the flight from Australia and asked them if we could wash (rinse) her clothes. They kindly unlocked the guest laundry for us even though it was late at night. We had no problems with our bathroom and enjoyed the space of 2 double beds. The pillows looked very lumpy, but I honestly didn't notice after my head touched down after a long day at Disney. We
Manager Response: Dear Maree 41:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, it is our goal to exceed guests' expectations. Therefore, we are pleased to know we succeeded during your recent stay.  Further, thank you for recognizing the value we try to pass on to our guests by offering complimentary breakfast. We understand that vacations can become expensive while traveling with a family and every bit of savings is a help. We truly appreciate your comments and look forward to seeing you the next time you are back in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: After looking forward to a stay at this hotel and trip with our grandkids to Disneyland I have to say that we were quite disappointed for what we were charged as well as how the management handled situations.    1. The hotel was having their driveway and outdoor parking area painted.  The paint being used was extremely noxious and basically gave us headaches and left us feeling light headed.  The smell was in most hallways, the main lobbey, the elevators and the emergency stairwell exits.  When the management were told of the overly strong odor permeating the hotel they basically said sorry, nothing we can do about it.  The smell was so bad in the elevators that I believe if a health dept official had brought in a device to test the air quality those elevators would have been
Manager Response: Dear Deeleedog:  We thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. It is our goal to exceed guest expectations and we are disappointed that we fell short during your stay. However, we take your comments seriously and will review them as a way to continue to improve.  It is apparent that a few situations going array created a bad situation all around. Some times attempts to make improvements can cause inconveniences to others which appeared  to be the case with our parking lot improvements. I personally had spoken with the repairman regarding the smell. They do this daily for a living and had responded that they did not feel the need to use a mask while using the materials they were using on our parking lot. They said that other materials they did use a mask but these were fine. In regards to our Jacuzzi, it was inconvenient that it was not operable during your visit. Unfortunately, the repairmen do not come out on holidays and we were waiting for their availability to fix the problem.  We agree that having to ask for an item to be repaired three times is unacceptable. We have brought this situation to management and will continue to correct the issue. Overall, we receive numerous compliments on our housekeeping staff and the cleanliness of the hotel.  Therefore, your comment regarding small pieces not being picked up off the floor alerts us to maybe there was a problem with the vacuum and we are looking into this. Again, we thank you for sharing these issues with us. We sincerely apologize for any inconveniences you encountered. If you would like to speak with us further regarding your stay, please feel free to contact management directly at (714) 991-6868.  Sincerely,  The Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This is a clean,quiet, hotel with excellent service and friendly staff. The complimentary breakfast was outstanding.
Manager Response: Dear Mary Jean:  We are thrilled to hear that your stay went well at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and that you found our staff friendly and helpful. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I have stayed here before and it was fine.  This time the breakfast was horrible and the front desk was no helpful and rude.  I had to shower in a tub that filled with 3 inches of water within minutes...nasty!!  I asked the front seat to please fix it and try assured me try would...well they didn't.  When I mentioned how disappointed and grossed out I was try basically played dumb and ignored me.  I was a fan but am not anymore of this facility.  Will definitely book elsewhere.
Manager Response: Dear Robert B:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we strive to exceed guest expectations. It saddens us to know that we failed during your recent stay with us. We take guest service very seriously and find rudeness from any employee to be unacceptable.  Further, we make it our goal to correct any guest issue in a timely manner. And, we expect every employee to take ownership of problems and to follow through quickly and efficiently to make sure that a problem has been corrected in a timely fashion and to the guest's satisfaction. We recognize that this did not happen during your stay and we apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you. If you would like to talk with us further regarding this issue, we encourage you to contact our General Manager. We value your patronage and would hate to lose you as a valued guest.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Excellent location!  Close to Disneyland, shops, restaurants & highway
Summary: My mom & I stayed here from dec 17-dec 22. The service was exceptional! I have been to other hotels but this is yet an outstanding one. I wish I got the people's name and wrote them down because they made our stay relaxing & comfortable. The free parking & free breakfast buffet everyday was wonderful. You can't complain about that! It's free :) although the parking lot going down underground was a little nerve wrecking a times because you couldn't see oncoming traffic in & out of the parking garage. I wish they would have put a big mirror just for safety. The elevator was very close by. It was easy access. The lobby was beautiful. Love the decorations!! Christmas season was really the theme of the lobby! Complimentary coffee was amazing! Checking in was a breeze. People said hi
Manager Response: Dear CandyDandy26:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim we strive to exceed guest expectations and it pleases us immensely to know that we succeeded during your stay. Thank you also for appreciating our added benefits of complimentary parking and breakfast.  Although not mandatory for us to offer either, we feel strongly about providing these services to our guests because we believe that it saves our travelers a substantial amount of money. Our staff is tickled to know that you noted their services and we look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The room was very clean and the mattresses were comfortable. The breakfast was just OK. One in my party wanted to eat somewhere else after the first breakfast. But I thought is was good enough, being included in the stay price, so we ate here every time.Desk clerks made sure to greet us whenver we walked in and were very efficient upon check in.
Manager Response: Dear Pianozanne:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on TripAdvisor regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are happy to hear that our staff exceeded your expectations  when it came to  guest service. Each day we strive to improve our complimentary breakfast. Comments such as your will help us to grow in this area. Thanks you again and we will see you the next time you are in the Anaheim area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The room was clean, but dated. Room set up was nice with desk and chairs. Beds were hard with small pillows. TV was nice. About 3 blocks from Disneyland gates. Not too bad of a walk there, but after spending all day in the parks, it's a long walk back. The hotel does not offer free shuttle service either. Oh you can pay.. $5/person (adult:9yrs old and up) per day if you want. Oh and wifi... this hotel's wifi doesn't work. It wasn't just us either. We had many different devices that couldn't connect. The staff: didn't deal with them much. They pretty much just stayed behind the counter talking with themselves.   The worst part about our stay was the free breakfast. It really wasn't much more than a continental breakfast. There was "hot food" that was cold our first day. The first
Manager Response: Dear Wade 1972:  We appreciate you taking the time to give us your feedback regarding your recent stay with us a The Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Your candid comments help us to see where we need to improve in order to make our hotel better for the next guest. We are saddened that you did not find our complimentary buffet breakfast up to par. We have been presently working with the restaurant operator to make improvements in this area as well as mix things up on a daily basis and we will continue to try and improve. We offer this breakfast as an added benefit and the cost of breakfast is not added into the room rate of your stay. However, it is still our aim to exceed guest expectations.  We did have some recent issues with the wifi and have addressed these issues as well. Thank you again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Pros: Good, safe location for disney vacation, nice room size Cons: Very poor internet connection, breakfast buffet was just okay, some taste of curry in food, no variation in menu items, some hotel staff could use some education in customer service Would not be my first choice for another stay
Manager Response: Dear SJ:  Thank you for your feedback on Trip Advisor. We appreciate you noticing the added value of our complimentary buffet breakfast and we have noted your comments regarding our bathrooms and will take those into consideration when we move forward with our future renovations.  We look forward to seeing you again soon!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Need the improvement on basic utilities
Summary: I stayed here for 4 nights. Stay was very comfortable and accessible to Disney park.   Few areas of imporement  Breakfast - just for sake of feel good  factor that you got deal on Hotel   Bathroom - old and antique most of the utities are loose   Room space - major factor to stay it is very comfortable   Kichen - No utilities  Overall rating - 3  Thanks,
Manager Response: Dear SJ:  Thank you for your candid feedback regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  Your comments are apprciated and will be taken into consideration as we move forward in the near future with some renovations. We'll see you the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Perfect for our Disney vacation.  Clean, safe, easy, free parking and Wi-Fi.  Breakfast incl. was OK.
Manager Response: Dear justlesliehere :  We are so glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and that you recognized the added value in the complimentary parking, breakfast, and wifi. We look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: the bathroom need to improve by adding a small cabinet or a...
Summary: the bathroom need to improve by adding a small cabinet or a small table so customer have a place to put their stuff, other than that I had a good experience with your hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Thuan D:  We appreciate you taking the time to share your comments with us regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We will take your feedback into consideration when we remodel our bathrooms. Hope to see you again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Have been here several times.  Located on street running behind California adventure so in walking distance, with shopping and movie theater half a block away and lots of restaurants in the area from discount to fancy. Can even get a ART bus pass to take you to Disneyland if you are doing the week long visit and want to help your feet out.  We were doing 3-days so skipped it and walked. Beds were clean and nice. TV newer and plenty of local tv cable choices and your very basic internet for free (always nice since some of the pricier hotels in the area have actually charged me for the same).  Which reminds me they also have parking (something I also had to pay for at the pricier hotels). Bathroom floor had some questionable spots under the counter and toilet whistled annoyingly
Manager Response: Dear Shininglsta:  Thank you for your patronage to the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We are pleased to know that you continue to have an enjoyable stay and that you recognize the added value in our complimentary parking, buffet breakfast, and wifi.  We look forward to seeing you again on your next visit!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Love the place...easy access to Disneyland entrance, close to restaurant and room is very clean.
Manager Response: Dear Jackie S.  It is nice to hear that we met your expectations during your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate you taking the time to give your feedback and look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: room was big for 2 adults & 2 small kids, bed very comfortable, samsung tv with great cable service, micro/fridge ok, clean tub & bathroom, quiet room seemed sound proof. small drawbacks-coffee maker missing filter drawer & sink handle not bolted on but coffee freely available in lobby & sink worked fine.
Manager Response: Dear Pnob:  We are so happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We will take your feedback into consideration as we continue to make strides to improve our hotel and guest service. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Basic hotel, could use some updating
Summary: The lobby is very nice. We were only there one night. The front desk was very accomidating and friendly. The room could use some updating but was clean and good size. The sleeper sofa was not in any way comfortable for my son, in fact he ended using the cusions on the couch to sleep on. Breakfast was pretty bad. Hard boiled eggs that were already cracked, which I thought was weird, potatos, not so good french toast and bagels if you were lucky. Overall, I'd stay here again for the price and location. If you're looking for fancy, this isn't the place but if you're looking for close to Disney, clean and average, this place will do.
Manager Response: Dear Elaine B:  Thank you for your taking the time to share your comments with us regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We have been working with the restaurant for ways to improve in our breakfast area and will keep your feedback in mind while doing so. We apologize for any inconvenience the sleeper couch may have caused. We have plans in the near future to do some renovations and will definitely keep this in mind as we go forward.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Good value within this price range (detailed breakdown)
Summary: This is not a luxury hotel. However in this price range near Disneyland, you will find this hotel gives more for your money than the others in the range. What it lacks in fanciness it makes up for with useful included amenities you would otherwise have to pay for.  PROS: Here is what you get included that other hotels in the price range may not offer: 1. Location - 15 minute walk (room to disney gate) including time waiting for lights to change. Plus you can see the fireworks from your window if you ask for a higher room on that side.  2. Full Breakfast 7am-10am - Not gourmet, but full breakfast included. It changes every day, but the basics include some type of egg, some type of pancake/waffle/french toast, some kind of potato, a breakfast meat, (store bought) muffins or
Manager Response: Dear JD:  Thank you for sharing your honest feedback on TripAdvisor regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we have consciously made an attempt to provide our guests with the added benefits of a complimentary buffet breakfast, complimentary wifi, as well as complimentary daily parking. Understanding that these items can add up easily on  a daily basis to both our family and business travelers, we feel that these complimentary amenities are all an added value to the traveler visiting in the Anaheim Plaza area. Therefore, we appreciate that you recognized this.  We will take all your thought out comments regarding your stay and will use them as a way to continue to improve future guest stays. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The employees at the restaurant are not very nice. The full American breakfast was a joke- hard boiled eggs, weird looking French toast and powdered donuts! It was cold and yucky! The room itself was okay. The beds were decent but the fixtures in the bathroom are rusty.
Manager Response: Dear Teachwords:  Thank  you for your feedback on TripAdvisor regarding your recent stay. We value your comments and will use them as a way to improve in the future. We are sorry that you did not enjoy the breakfast. We have been working on trying to improve in this area so we will definitely share these comments with the restaurant operator.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Overall the stay was very good. We didnt have any trouble...
Summary: Overall the stay was very good. We didnt have any trouble checking in and our room was clean. Breakfast was good and the distance to where we were going was perfect. The only issue we had was the ice machine on our floor was broken so we had to go to the floor above us to get ice.
Manager Response: Dear Marksatoy:  We are so pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We do apologize about the ice machine. We can definitely see how this would have been an inconvenience. Hope to see you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: What can I say about this hotel ? It has free parking , free breakfast , free internet and clean rooms. For the price and location this is the best for the value. I won't mind coming back here and staying again.  I booked through Hotwire with a no name hotel deal and I wasn't expecting it to be this clean and nice.
Manager Response: Dear Marksatoy:  We are so happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations during your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate you letting us know that we are on the right track. We look forward to hosting your stay the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Started on the wrong foot when the person on the phone lied to is about the location so when we showed up at the other ramada they told us they lie all the time to get people to book. When we got to the hotel however we were pleased to find a larger than normal room that was very clean. It had comfortable beds and a high pressure shower (which is a plus!) it was walking distance from Disneyland as well as a little smoothie place, subway, pizza place and more! (We barely used out car the whole time we were there!) they seemed to take pride in their cleaning and even went so far as to scrub the entire hall carpets by hand! The pool was nice and quiet so we had it to ourselves most of the time we were there. The hot tub however, had a green ring of algae around the top. There was
Manager Response: Dear Cynthia S.  Thank you so much for your candid comments regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We will take these comments into consideration as we make way for future renovations to our property, in specific, the laundry and fitness center. We have presently been working on improving the breakfast area and trying to mix things up for guests such as yourself who stay for long periods of time. We will continue to look for ways to improve in this area. Thank you again for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you in the near future at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed here for 3 days.  We arrived late (1am) checked in no problem. Got to our room and had hard time opening the door as it was "stuck" and made a horrible noise when you opened it. We weren't even in our room 5 mins when the front desk call to tell us to be quiet cause other guest were complaining! All we did was open the door we weren't making any noise! Finally settle into bed and got our two year old to sleep when the smoke detector start to chirp every 20 seconds cause of a low battery! We called the front desk who had to bring a ladder up to replace the battery! This woke our child up. Also my hubby had to replace the battery himself ... Which is how we found out the alarms were not hooked up to the alarm system which made me feel extremely unsafe. Now on to
Manager Response: Dear lblanc33:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us on Trip Advisor.  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations and we can see that we failed in your case which we find very disappointing. However, we will review these issues as a way to improve for the future. First, we can see how we did not start off on the right foot immediately as you entered the room. Of course, it was no fault of yours that the door was jammed. Yet, if another guest has a concern about noise, valid or not, we still have to respond to it. We hope that you understand. I assure you that we take guest safety very seriously.  Therefore, we do a regular check on the smoke detectors in our rooms. We can definitely understand how the beeping would have been a great inconvenience to you and we do apologize,  but it is the beeping that lets us know that the batteries need to be changed so that we may offer better safety.  There is no excuse why the maintenance person did not return to repair the problem or to notify you if the problem could not be repaired. We have communicated this issue to the department head. In regards to the shuttle  we do not operate this shuttle service. The city of Anaheim does. We only recommend it as an alternate option to those guests choosing not to walk to Disneyland Resort.   The bus runs approximately every 20 minutes and is usually very reliable. We are not sure how long you waited but if you felt it was way more than 20 minutes, we would suggest contacting Anaheim Resort Transportation. Again, please accept our sincere apologies for these accumulative inconveniences, We assure you that this is not the normal service provided at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and we would only hope that you gave us a second chance in the near future,  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed at this hotel for a week and it was great! Very quiet even though it's on a main street and it's in a great location. Close to shops, restaurants and of course Disney which was literally around the corner! We could even see the fireworks from the park each night. It was also very clean and had a comp breakfast that was good for my family and I. The staff were extra friendly and even helped us find some cool places to eat. I would absolutely recommend this place to anyone staying in Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Kristen:  We are delighted to hear that your stay was a success. We aim hard to exceed guest expectations and it is always a pleasure when we see that we have succeeded. Looking forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Very good hotel in good location
Summary: Our family stayed there for a trip to Disneyland and LA.    1) The hotel room is very clean and quiet.  Can't hear anything outside. 2) Air conditioning is easy to control temperature and quiet. 3) Hotel staffs are very friendly and took care my several requests promptly.   4) Cover parking keep the car cool too.   5) Breakfast is full american.  The are good if you have time to sit down and eat.  Small selection if you would like just some pastries or bagels. 6) Nice big TV with HD channels.  Price is great for the quality I got.
Manager Response: Dear David:  We are pleased to know that you had an enjoyable stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. It is our goal to exceed guest expectations so thank you for letting us know that we are on the right track. We hope that you visit us again the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Convenient location, 15 minute walk, comfortable beds. Would have liked a fan in the bathroom. The breakfast was pretty good. Coffee in room better than the brewed downstairs though! Great tv. Love the free parking, breakfast & wifi (though it was sloooow).
Manager Response: Dear Sensit:  Thank you for your review on Trip Advisor and for staying with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We understand that you have many choices when it comes to staying at a hotel and we are appreciative that you chose the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and that you took the time to share your comments with us. It is nice that you noted our complimentary parking as an added value to your stay.  We are proud to say that we are one of just a few hotels in the Anaheim Resort Area that still offers complimentary parking. Most hotels charge $15.00 to $30.00 a day. In regards to the fan in your bathroom - we do have fans in each bathroom so perhaps yours was not working properly at the time. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you.  Hoping to see you again the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Not really  close enough to say walking distance  to Disneyland- Especially with children. You reach Disneyland property  but still quite  a walk to entrance. Nice to have free parking and  in a covered lot..Short drive to parking lot at the Resort.  There was a free breakfast with several choices but the coffee was awful and the food  was  not the best tasting.  We were  there  for 5 days ate  there 2 days . Rooms  had fridge & Microwave and  coffee maker. Better than the brewed coffee in the dinning area.
Manager Response: Dear Lili M.:  Thank you for choosing the Ramada Plaza Anaheim to host your recent stay. We appreciate your feedback on Trip Advisor and will use it as a way to continuously improve. Although only 10-15 minutes walking distance from the Maingate to Disneyland Resort, we can definitely understand how it  might seem longer traveling with young children. For future, the Anaheim Resort offers a bus that picks up and drops off right in front of our hotel for a small fee. This might be a better option for the next time you stay with us.  Thank you again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is newly remodeled - new beds, nice bathrooms, nice TV, and free buffet breakfast in the restaurant. It is also within walking distance of Disney (about 10 minutes), and you are saving over $300 for a similar room in the on-site Disney hotels. Their wifi is slow, however - once you have more than one device working at the same time, you're basically screwed. Also the "fitness room" has things to be desired - right now, it has one treadmill. That's it.   But other than that, it's a great place to stay and save some $$$ while going to Disney!
Manager Response: Dear Samantha W:  Thank you for sharing your positive comments with us on Trip Advisor. We value your opinion and use it as a way to make sure that we can improve in the future. We are sorry that you were disappointed with our fitness center. Although small, it does hold one treadmill, a stair master, and a bicycle. We plan on doing some renovations in the near future and will definitely take your feedback into consideration.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Great place to stay. Close to the Convention center. Great service. Had an issue with the room next to us which was resolved quickly. Would definitely stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Adam B:  We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and that your issue was quickly resolved.  We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts with us on Trip Advisor and look forward to hosting your stay the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland, great value, great breakfast.
Summary: I have actually been using this hotel for many trips to Disneyland over the past few years. This most recent stay was a little disappointing. My review scores are mostly based on a collection of all my stays here.  First I prefer the rooms close to the elevator and facing the pool so that I am not on the road facing side. This likely improves noise while sleeping.  I did notice that Floor 3 seems quieter than Floor 4. All the rooms I have tried seem to have bathroom wear and tear that needs attention. While clean, the bathroom floors are always sticky as if they don't rinse the floor after mopping.  I would normally rave about the breakfast as I love all you can eat bacon, eggs, hashbrowns, and more. Thursday morning had all that. But then Friday morning it was hard boiled eggs,
Manager Response: Dear Sean L:  First, we would like to thank you for your patronage. We appreciate your loyalty to our hotel.  We are sorry that you did not like the changes to our breakfast.  Since you have always had the same breakfast and have come to expect such, we can definitely understand how you would have been surprised to see something different. On the other hand, we have been trying to respond to our numerous comments from other guests saying that they wish we would mix it up a little more and see more variety day to day.  We are still experimenting with this so your feedback is important, In regards to the bathrooms,  we are also evaluating this area as well in order to make improvements for the future.  Thank you again for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor. We look forward to hosting your stay the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Very pleased with our stay at this hotel. The staff were...
Summary: Very pleased with our stay at this hotel. The staff were very friendly and efficient. The room had everything we needed and the location is excellent. Will be back next year for a longer stay.
Manager Response: Dear Bette S.  We are so pleased to hear that you had an enjoyable stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and thank you for sharing your comments on Trip Advisor. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Reception staff were very friendly and helpful. Our room was spacious for our family of 5. It is in walking distance from Disneyland and there are lots of meal options very close by. The heated pool was thoroughly enjoyed by the kids, breakfast included was great. We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Groovy Doovy:  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations so we are pleased to know that we were able to achieve this during your stay. We appreciate you taking the time to share your thoughts with us and look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is very convienient for Disney, the rooms are comfortable & fairly quiet, I did like the lighting in the room most hotel rooms are pretty dark my room had plenty of lights which is good if you have work to do. I would recommend this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Alan Mr. B.:  Thank you for staying with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and for sharing your thoughts on Trip Advisor regarding your stay. At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations and we are happy to know that we succeeded in your case. We look forward to hosting your stay the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Breakfast is in an adjoining Indian restaurant. Quality of breakfast is below average. Previous comments suggested more variety and better rotation. It fell on deaf ears! Suggest you eat out.  The rooms have thin walls. Easy to hear what is happening next door. Noisey neighbours up above as well.  Staff are friendly and helpful. Room cleanliness spot on.  Good location for Disney and restaurants. I'd give the hotel another go, but not the restaurant, unless there is a marked improvement.
Manager Response: Dear WanderingWillie08:  Thank you for sharing your comments with us on Trip Advisor. We value your feedback and use it as a way to improve our quality and service.   We are not sure what date you stayed with us in October. However, we have been experimenting with mixing up the breakfast and making improvements as of October 21st. Perhaps you stayed before this date. We assure you that we do not let our customer feedback fall onto deaf ears. We take it very seriously.  We have realized through our Trip Advisor comments that most of our guests stay three days or more so we have been working on alternating items and adding new ones to our complimentary breakfast buffet in order to keep it fresh daily.  Although the Ramada Plaza is not required to provide a complimentary breakfast, we do so as an added benefit to our guests and at no additional cost.  We will continue to work with the restaurant operator to improve the breakfast and thank you again for your feedback, We look forward to hosting your stay the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed here with our teenagers for our visit to Disneyland. It was a perfect base as it was only 10 minutes walk to Disneyland, close enough to wander back during the day if we wanted a break and great that we didn't have to take the car out.  The room had everything we needed - daily renewal of toiletries, hair dryer, fridge, and lovely comfortable beds.  It was beautifully cleaned each morning.    The staff were lovely and friendly and very helpful.  We loved the fantastic selection of breakfast foods apart from our last morning which wasn't so great.  They have the best sausages!  Brilliant having such a late checkout of 12 noon.
Manager Response: Dear Denise:  Thank you for staying with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate you taking the time to share your kind comments with us on Trip Advisor.  Your feedback is valuable to us and helps us to measure how we are doing. We look forward to hosting you again the next time you are visiting the Anaheim Resort area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza ANaheim

Summary Heading: Within walking distance of the parks
Summary: Nice clean room with comfortable beds within a 15 min walk to Disneyland. Staff was nice and helpful. Free hot breakfast, but would of been nice if they could mix it up some instead of the same food every morning.
Manager Response: Dear ChicaCheryCola:  Thank your for taking the time to share your comments with us regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We value your comments and appreciate your patronage.  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us. Further, we have taken yours and other guests' comments into consideration when it comes to "mixing up" the breakfast a bit.  We are presently working with the restaurant operator on improving our breakfast as well as providing different options from day to day. Again, thank you for your feedback and we look forward to hosting your stay the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Wish I could have stayed longer!
Summary: Great location, and amenities.  Very friendly staff, and Free breakfast Buffet.  Not just bagels and cold cereal.  There were eggs, bacon, sausage, pancakes, and more.  We stayed there one night as part of a weekend trip to Los Angeles, and I wish I could have stayed there longer to enjoy the pool, and other aspects.  The hotel is walking distance to the Disney parks which makes things easy when you stay with children as well.  I would certainly stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Ryan H:  Thank you for your kind comments on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are happy to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and we wish you could have stayed longer too.  We'll look forward to hosting your next stay while visiting in the Anaheim area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The staff is great, room was clean, breakfast was good, and we got a thank you card under our door when we woke up our last day.  I thought this was an awesome touch by the manager.
Manager Response: Dear Robert B.:  We just wanted to take a moment to thank you for staying with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim and to also thank you for your kind comments on Trip Advisor. They are well appreciated. We look forward to hosting your stay the next time you are in the Disneyland Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Acceptable hotel, great location, TOO EXPENSIVE
Summary: Stayed here in early October for a quick trip to Disney & the beach with hubby and 3 kids. The price is ridiculous for the quality of the hotel, but you are paying for the location. Price is comparable (if not a little cheaper) than most of the hotels along Harbor near the DL gates. We walked from the hotel to the gates in 10 minutes (0.6 miles).   Overall the hotel is one I would visit again IF I could find a good deal on the price. Everything is great for $80/night (unfortunately, the going rate in Oct was $160/night). Again you're paying for the awesome proximity to DL.  We can't help but compare to Holiday Inn Express (where we frequently stay) and the Ramada Plaza, while acceptable, just didn't quite measure up. Beds were NOT as comfortable (loudest sheets I've ever slept
Manager Response: Dear SlickVick37:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us on TripAdvisor. At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations and your feedback will be used as a way to improve in the future.  Although the price you paid for at a peak time may seem high to you, it is competitive to neighboring hotels within walking distance to Disneyland. Further, please consider that the Ramada Plaza Anaheim does not charge the $15 - $30 a day parking fee that many other hotels charge and we have also included the complimentary buffet breakfast as an added amenity even though we are not required to do so. We are meeting with the restaurant owner to discuss your issues with the complimentary breakfast in order to make improvements. Thank you again for your response. We look forward to hosting you the next time you are in the Disneyland Resort area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Very friendly and helpful staff.  When we arrived and...
Summary: Very friendly and helpful staff.  When we arrived and checked in, the original room that I received had an outdated bathroom.  I asked the staff and they got me another room that was much better.  The full breakfast and free parking were other nice perks.  The hotel is within walking distance to Disney, and there are many shops and restaurants that are also within walking distance. Excellent place to stay if in Anaheim
Manager Response: Dear Cory Y.  Thank you for sharing your kind comments with us regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We strive to exceed guest expectations and are happy to know that we succeeded in your case. We look forward to hosting you again the next time you are in the Anaheim Plaza area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim "Walking Distance to all the Magical places you need to be."

Summary: Overall it was good.  The breakfast was ok.  The eggs were good, bacon had a lot of fat, and the sausages were cold. But it was FREE!!!  The pool area was good they did provide towels, but on the rim of the jacuzzi there was some crusty film that didn't look too sanitary so I stayed away from there but the pool was nice to swim in.  The room had a microwave and refridgerator which we used and was nice to have.  When you flushed the toilet it would constantly run due to the handle getting stuck, you needed to push the handle back up.  Our last day sucked because there was an issue in the boiler room and we had no hot water at all!  The water in the shower was F'n COLD!  We had planned on giving the kids baths prior to leaving back home but couldn't and when I had to shower I had
