Manager Response: Dear Ricky A.  Thank you for sharing your comments with us regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We value your comments and utilize them as a way to improve in the future. At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we strive to exceed guest expectations. We are disappointed that we fell short in your case. Unfortunately, during your stay, we did experience some unforeseen issues with our boiler.  We had hoped to have been able to repair it immediately but unfortunately, it needed to be replaced entirely.  We can definitely understand your frustration with the situation. Please except our apologies for any inconvenience this may have caused you can your family.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim "Walking Distance from all the magical places you need to be."

Summary: This hotel is ideally located in great walking distance to Disney. They are close to quick food and convienence stores. Hotel is clean but maintenance suffers. We experienced several problems with the bathroom and Wi-Fi. To the hotel's credit, they let us use their headlined computer to close the deal on the sale of our house and compensated us for the room issues since they had a full house and couldn't give us a new room. Staff was helpful and friendly. Breakfast is a full on buffet. You won't leave hungry that's for sure.
Manager Response: Dear Nigel707:  Thank you for your comments regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.   We are happy to know that, overall, you had an enjoyable stay. We apologize that you experienced some problems with the bathroom and Wi-Fi but are glad to know that our staff was able to resolve the issues to your satisfaction.   We look forward to hosting your stay the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim "Walking distance to all the magical places you need to be."

Summary: We stayed here October 6th-11th, and had a great time!  We arrived at the hotel right at check-in time, and because the room we'd booked wasn't ready yet we were upgraded to a bigger room with 2 queen beds.  The hotel is only about a 10-15 minute walk to Disneyland, and right next to the Garden Walk so we had plenty of nearby options of things to do and places to eat when we weren't in the park. The free WiFi and cable TV were also good bonuses for when we were just lazing around in the room.  The breakfast buffet (eggs, hash browns, sausage and bacon, pancakes and cereals) was a great added value, and the perfect way to start the morning!  Rooms were clean and included a fridge and microwave.  Front desk and housekeeping were always friendly and attentive.  I thought this was a
Manager Response: Dear Ja-Boogie3:  Thank you for sharing your comments with us regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We strive to exceed guest expectations and are glad, for the most part, that we were able to do so in your case. Please accept our sincere apologies for the problems we were experiencing with our boiler.  This is not a reoccurring problem at our hotel. Unfortunately, during your stay, we actually had to replace the entire boiler.  We can definitely understand your frustration with the situation, and again, we are sorry for the inconvenience. We hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The Hotel is in a good location, About a 15-20 minute walk from the Disneyland main gates. Newer hotel.  Also located next to several Fast Food and Quality Restaurants, so not end of eating options.  The Hotel was clean and well maintained.  Comfortable beds and linens. (bed was a little firm for my taste, but that's just me) Staff was friendly, helpful and attentive.  Cleaning staff made several rounds, so if they had to skip you in the morning, they would catch up later in the afternoon.  The Free Breakfast Buffet was very good.  A wide assortment of hot and cold options.  Internet connection was a little unstable, but you could tell that someone was always working to fix it.  Only two issues.  Noise from the hallways and room above were very loud. (It's at Disneyland, there
Manager Response: Dear Les S:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We value your feedback and use it as a way to improve future guests' stays. We are happy to hear that overall, you had an enjoyable stay and glad to know that your internet issue was handled promptly.  Thank you also for informing us regarding the problem with the bathroom fan. We will get right on fixing that. We look forward to hosting your next stay when you are in the Anaheim Resort area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I have stayed here before. And it looks better than before. The rooms are spacious and a good value for your money. The free breakfast is great!! And the staff is very helpful! Also it's is close to Disney and food places. Also the parking is very convenient.
Manager Response: Dear Griselda:  It was great to have you back at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Thank you for your kind comments on TripAdvisor. We are happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations during your second visit with us and look forward to seeing you on your 3rd!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I stayed here 10/7 & 10/10. Both rooms were clean and no major complaints. The bathrooms could use a little maintenance including the shower heads. Flat-screen TV, microwave and fridge were nice to have. The included breakfast buffet (eggs, bacon, sausage, hash browns, biscuits & gravy) was a nice start to the day, but the beverage machine needs to go. Watered down OJ and other juices were no good. 15 minute walk to the park was no problem. Unfortunately, some PATHETIC hotel patron(s) decided to spoil our last night by complaining about our 9 month old child crying for MAYBE 10 minutes. As soon as we were able to calm him down and get him to fall back asleep the front desk called (at 4am) and almost woke him up again. This did not make us very happy. I am assuming the hotel
Manager Response: Dear Wildkat 520:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on TripAdvisor regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are meeting with the restaurant operator to discuss the issues with the juice provided at our Complimentary Breakfast Buffet.  We are sorry that we had to call your room in regards to your baby crying. Of course, we can sympathize and know that it is natural for children to cry and that it is also out of your control. On the other side, if another guest does complain about noise, we are still obligated to follow up with the issue. We hope that you understand. We are happy that your stay, overall, was an enjoyable one and we look forward to seeing you the next time you visit the Anaheim area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Stayed here Fri 11th-13th..I'm very picky on cleanliness..although the hotel has a great outside appearance the rooms say something different.queen beds are just way to hard..the sofa bed obviously isn't intended for comfort..all you feel is the bars..the blankets and and throw pillows were stained..carpet is stained.found hair on edge of bed on arrival..other than that price and location was nice..get what you Pay for
Manager Response: Dear Stevenina:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We strive to exceed guest expectations and are disappointed that we did not meet yours.  However, it is feedback such as yours that will help us to improve for the future.  Although we receive numerous positive comments regarding the cleanliness of our hotel and were awarded the "Best of Ramada 2013" for excellence, it appears we might have fell a bit short during your stay.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused and will pass these comments onto our Housekeeping Department in order to make improvements.  Thanks again!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: This hotel is in a good location to access Disneyland without having to pay a lot to be across the road from the funpark. We left the car in the hotel carpark and it was a ten minute walk to the Disneyland entrance with no wasted time waiting for shuttles and closer than the Disneyland carpark. The hotel room was clean and adequate size for our party of four. Beds were comfortable  and breakfast was ok. There are eateries next door with choice of pizza, Chinese, Mexican and Subway and souvenir shops with reasonable prices.
Manager Response: Dear Wooly-Bully 63:  We are happy to hear that you enjoyed your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We strive to exceed guest expectations and to make our guests feel like they are at home. We are pleased to know we succeeded during your visit and look forward to hosting your next stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: When we informed the front desk of the issues with the room...
Summary: When we informed the front desk of the issues with the room they wanted us to wait and for them to come and fix them. I am sorry but I am not stopping my vacation for to wait for them to repair items that should have been noticed and corrected before the room was sold.
Manager Response: Dear valley:  Thank you for sharing your comments with us on TripAdvisor.  At the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, we strive to exceed guest expectations. We are sorry that we fell short during your stay. Although we do preventative maintenance on all our rooms, unfortunately, it appears your room must have slipped through the cracks. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you and will share your comments with our Maintenance Department so that we may do better in the future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Excellent service from this hotel located about 1 block  from the main gate to Disneyland.  Staff was very courteous and helpful, rooms were clean & had  microwave and mini refrigerator.  Landry downstairs also no need to pack too much. Hallways were enclosed & not exposed to rain & cold.  Parking covered with elevator service direct to rooms .
Manager Response: Dear Cora:  It was a pleasure meeting and talking with you during your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. Thank you for your kind comments.  We are glad to hear that you had an enjoyable stay and look forward to seeing you the next time you and your family are visiting from Hawaii.  Sincerely,  Brenda H. Director of Sales

Summary: I've stayed at this property before and thought it was better than its value. Now it seems to be showing some age and would say you get what you pay for. It was clean but stopped there. The shower head was a trickle and the towels were stiff. It was like drying your face with cardboard. The hallway smelled like insect repellant, but the room smelled fine. It's only a 15 min walk from Disneyland. It is what it is.
Manager Response: Dear Gregory:  First, let me say thank you for staying with us again. We appreciate your patronage and welcome your feedback since we use it as a way to make improvements.  We apologize that you did not find your showerhead and towels up to standard. We will share your feedback with both the maintenance and housekeeping departments in order to rectify these issues. Thanks again and we look forward to seeing you on your next visit to the Anaheim Plaza area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Nice hotel.  We would stay here again but it does need some work.
Summary: Great Hotel and we would definitely stay here again!  But this place needs MAINTENANCE and a DEEP CLEANING!  There are also issues with the restaurant that I will discuss below.  7 of us booked the Ramada Plaza Anaheim for our visit to Disneyland.    PROS -   Location - It's very conveniently located and is a super-easy 10 minute walk to Disneyland.  The hotel is also just down the street from the Garden Walk -full of restaurants for lunch and dinner!  Cleanliness - Generally, the hotel is clean.  We thought our room was very clean, but there are a few issues that need to be addressed - see below.  Parking - Very convenient.  There is also a parking garage available too during busier times.  Laundry - The hotel offers a laundry room and laundry service (for a fee).  This was
Manager Response: Dear BilinDenver:  Thank you so much for staying with us and for sharing your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. I enjoyed meeting and chatting with you and your family at breakfast and hope that your feet have recovered from your days in the park. We will truly miss you all! We appreciate your kind words regarding our staff as well as your feedback on ways that we may improve.  We are in the process of setting up a meeting with the restaurant owner to discuss with him ways we may improve on  our complimentary breakfast in the immediate future. Thanks again and we hope to see you the next time you come to the Anaheim Plaza Area.  With Kind Regards,  Brenda Harris Director of Sales

Summary: Very good location, but bad room odor. The first room we received had very strong odor. After we informed the hotel stuff about it, we were upgraded to larger room. It also had a kind of old furniture/carpet smell, but at least it was not so strong as in the first room.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for choosing the Ramada Plaza Anaheim to host your recent stay and also for taking the time to share your comments with us on Trip Advisor. We apologize that you experienced some odor in  your room but are glad to hear that the issue was taken care of and that you were moved to another room.  We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you and hope to see you the next time you visit the Anaheim Resort area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I'll open the review by saying that few people book rooms in this area for any other purpose than sleeping in them - since most spend their days at the resort. With this in mind, the room served it's purpose well. The beds were clean, and of average comfort. Besides that, the room was beginning to show signs of wear and tear. There was a stain in one the corners from an apparent leak in the past The ceiling tiles above the entry way, along with the fan intake area were dirty. The fan cover on the wall didn't fit all the way around the actual hole, and sat a bit crooked. The bathroom sink wall was chipped near the edges and did not cover the plumbing down below the sink. The shower head leaked. I could not log on to the internet, as the logon page would not load, but to be fair,
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate your comments and use them as a way to improve so that we may provide a service that exceeds guest expectations. We are sorry that we failed to do so during your recent stay with us. We have shared your comments with the maintenance department to amend these issues. Please accept our sincere apologies for any inconvenience this may have caused you and we hope that you would consider giving us another try in the future. Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim “Best of Ramada Award” – 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2006, 2005, 2003

Summary Heading: Excellent place to stay if you are going to Disneyland...
Summary: Excellent place to stay if you are going to Disneyland.  Comfortable, quiet and walking distance from Disneyland.  Breakfast offered was excellent
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for sharing your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are glad that your stay exceeded your expectations. We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We foound ourselves back at the Ramada again after other successful stays. We always find it to be fairlly quiet (we travel off season) and the weather nice. The desk staff is always happy to help us, and welcoming when we come through the doors. The housekeepers are good too. And work hard. We asked to stay an extra hour and were granted without having to pay an extra fee. That was a nice surprise. Especially since their check out time is noon anyway. If it had been mid summer vacation time I wouldn't have even asked. But they were more than willing to let us. We appreciated that extra hour before the taxi came. We also like the free wifi.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  We are so glad that you had another enjoyable stay at the Ramada Plaza Inn. We appreciate your comments and look forward to seeing you again.  Sincerely,  Management

Summary: The staff were lovely and one of the gentleman on the desk was excellent and went out of his way to help when my shutte was late arriving to take me to the airport The internet worked well and the breakfast was a lovely bonus. Close to Disney and there is a bus right outside if your feet are too tired to walk back!  Overall a nice hotel and I would happily stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to review the Ramada Plaza Inn on Trip Advisor. We value your comments and patronage. We are glad you experienced an enjoyable stay and we look forward to seeing you again at the Ramada Plaza Inn!  Management Ramada Plaza Inn

Summary: we like the place, employees, the guest room.... but the pillows causes backaches. The internet service was so bad... first, it didn't work... when works, it works so slow and sometimes dosen't open the requested pages... it could be better. The bathtub faucet was leaking all the time. Also, the coffee-break could be better too... don't offer much options everyday.  Against these things, Ramada is next the Disney's parks, (we go on foot from Ramada  to there in less then 10 minutes), Ramada's neighborhood is a beautiful place to visit, with markets , pharmacy, restaurants near and good persons... we enjoy it
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to review the Ramada Plaza Inn on Trip Advisor. We value your comments and patronage.  We are glad you had an enjoyable stay but understand that there were a few areas where we could improve.  We will take these comments into consideration and do our best to amend them. Again, thank you for your feedback and we look forward to seeing you in the future!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn

Summary: Ramada is the place to stay with family or as a couple. Very happy with the morning breakfast buffet that is included at this hotel.  So, management please continue to offer that benefit to your hotel guests as with a large family it is helpful with budget.  The food choices were diverse and healthy at the restaurant that facilitates the breakfast.  The hotel is also located a few feet away from great restaurants such as Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gumps, Calif Pizza Kitchen, PF Changs Bistro, and others.  We would choose to stay again in the future.  Thank you - Ramada!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to review the Ramada Plaza Inn on Trip Advisor. We are glad that you had enjoyable stay and that you were able to take advantage of the added benefit of our complimentary breakfast. We look forward to seeing you in the future. Happy Anniverary!   Management Ramada Plaza Inn

Summary: This is pretty much no frills hotel but it is clean, great location for Disneyland, and free Breakfast. I have to say that the check-in, check-out process is the most efficient I have ever experienced. The staff are friendly. The rooms are clean, smoke free. Parking was included, and no crazy resort fees were added on.  The free breakfast was better than average with hot and cold options.  The walk is very doable to the maingate and Downtown Disney. We've stayed at Paradise Pier and Grand Californian, and the walk was shorter from the Ramada. Disneyland is expensive--spend your money at the park and sleep well in a non-Disney hotel!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to post your comments regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Inn.  We value your comments and appreciate your patronage.  We look forward to seeing you on your next stay at the Ramada Plaza Inn!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn

Summary: It is really three star hotel from infrastructure prospective. Good and helpful staff. I stayed for 2 days and stay was satisfied.
Manager Response: Dear Kamaljit S Thank you for your review. I see you were satisfied with your stay but from your rating, maybe there was something we could have done different? I do hope you visit us again and give us an opportunity to make your stay better than the last one.

Summary Heading: not the best hotel in this area, not the worst!This is...
Summary: not the best hotel in this area, not the worst! This is certainly a safe choice, but, if I come back to this area,  I would like to explore more options.
Manager Response: Dear Guest, Thank you for staying with us and for taking the time to write a review. I am so sorry to see you did not enjoy your overall experience with us. We are always looking for new ways to improve our service. That being said we hope you return so we can make your stay memorable.

Summary Heading: We enjoyed the friendliness of the staff, the location, the...
Summary: We enjoyed the friendliness of the staff, the location, the breakfast and view. We could see the Disneyland fireworks.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience! We are so happy to hear that you enjoyed our location and our service. We hope to see you on your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: Fantastic all around until check out. It seems the afternoon and evening front desk staff  are amazing and friendly (can't say the same for the morning staff)  Front office manager and GM need to polish up on customer service skills. Common courtesy can go along way. Houskeeping staff is great and always with a smile.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your Review Evette G, We are sad to hear our service didn’t meet your expectations one hundred percent during your stay.  At Ramada Plaza Hotel, we pride ourselves in providing the absolute best service we can to each and every one of our guests.  Shortcomings are never excusable but we hope this isolated incident does not discourage you from visiting us again in the future.  We’d love the opportunity to serve you again.  Best Regards,

Summary: Pillows were very uncomfortable.They were too bulky and not soft. Didn't sleep well at all. There were little flies in the room. They were mostly in the bathroom. Other than that, the beds were comfortable and clean.Nice room.Very quiet. Didn't have any rude neighbors. Very friendly ladies at the front desk. They offer free wi-fi, free hot breakfast, and free parking. Breakfast was pretty good. Just like any free hotel breakfast. They also gave us a coupon for a free kids meal or appitizer at Bubba Gumps. We got the free kids meal.Great location. Accross the street from Dineyland parking lot. Great value for the money.
Manager Response: Dear Brenda D, We are sorry to hear that the pillows did not meet your standards.  During a busy summer time some of the items and equipment in our guest rooms do experience wear and tear and we apologize for not replacing it on time. We are very thankful for your positive comments and concerns as they help us target the areas we need to address and improve.   We hope to have you back at Ramada Plaza hotel during your next visit to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary Heading: Very nice place to stay near Disney!
Summary: The Ramada Plaza was a great place to stay, very clean, nice bedrooms, only one block from Disney and good offers for breakfast (better than what we expected!). If you are looking for a very good hotel to stay with your family, breakfast included, near Disney and other good places to walk around, this is it!
Manager Response: Dear Aixa, We are thrilled to hear that your stay at Ramada Plaza Hotel exceeded your expectations! Thank you so much for taking the time to provide your feedback. We hope to be able to serve you during your next visit to the Disneyland resort.  Best Regards,

Summary Heading: Disneyparks were open till 12midnight and the kids did not...
Summary: Disneyparks were open till 12midnight and the kids did not want to get up for breakfast. I took the tickets to the restaurant and made bacon & egg on english muffins for them. The mgr would not let me take them to the room or leave with them. He said it was my problem & kids had to come down. I explained I had 5 tickets and 5 sandwiches... they were not coming and I was not coming back to raid his buffet (btw it was closing and dismantled by then-so nothing left to take!)  After a back and forth he let me take them bc I was leaving them there to waste.  Also...all the juices are watered down. If the room includes breakfast and I handed over the tickets, I don't understand why this is a big problem. If you hand over the ticket and leave, you are done. No in and out.  There is no
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to post your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Inn. We value your patronage and will take your comments into consideration when we look for ways to improve the operations and service of the hotel.  At the Ramada Plaza Inn we do offer a complimentary dine-in breakfast for our guests.  This breakfast benefit is not a required benefit, but one we have added in order to provide a special experience for our guests to the best of our ability. As stated, this is a dine-in breakfast, not a continental breakfast. Also, this service is provided by our onsite restaurant who is not set up as a take-out or delivery service.  We can understand how this might have been frustrating in your situation and we do apology if the restaurant manager appeared to be uncooperative. However, we do try to inform our guests that the breakfast is a dine-in experience. If this information was not relayed to you at check-in, please accept our sincere apologies. We look forward to seeing you in the future!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn

Summary: We stayed here for a few nights for Disneyland and thought it was okay Pros. -Very close to Disneyland -Reasonably priced -Comfortable beds -Good service  Cons -althought not filthy, it's not the cleanest either -the breakfast was pretty bad, cheap hotel breakfast
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Inn.  We value your feedback.  We are sorry that you did not find our complimentary dine-in breakfast up to your satisfaction.  Although it is not required that we offer a complimentary breakfast to our  guests, we have extended this benefit at no extra charge.  This is a hot breakfast that includes: scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, hashbrowns, pancakes as well as bagels, english muffins, oatmeal, cereal, fruits, yogurt, coffee, juices, and milk.   We are sorry that you did not find the cleanliness of the hotel up to standards.  We have continuously, year over year, won "The Best of Ramada Award." This award takes into consideration the condition of the hotel, cleanliness, and guest service. Again, we appreciate your comments, and hope that you give us another try in the near future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn

Summary Heading: Great balance between frills, price, and proximity!
Summary: We have stayed at most of the hotels in the Anaheim/Disney Resort area, but this was the first time we stayed at the Ramada Plaza and I was very happy with it. For me, staying near Disneyland is all about striking the right balance between frills, price and proximity. Some of the "nicer" hotels are a mile or two down Harbor.   In fact we had one of the big name hotels down Harbor booked because they offer suites and we were traveling with four kids (three of whom are teenagers). So we needed space to spread out a bit. But I canceled it in favor of the Ramada Plaza to be closer.  The challenge is finding a good suite accommodation that is still walkable to Disney. I've done the shuttle buses several times, and really don't like them. It just feels limiting to have to travel on
Manager Response: Dear Vaslued Guest:  Thank you for your kind comments regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Inn. We are glad that our service exceeded your expectations and we look forward to seeing you in the near future at the Ramada Plaza Inn!  Sincerely,  Management

Summary Heading: Ok if other locations are sold out
Summary: DON'T LET THE NICE EXTERIOR AND PRETTY LOBBY FOOL YOU!!!  I was very disappointed with the quality of the hotel for the price that was paid. I have worked in hotels before as well as management for over 10 years and they did almost everything wrong. While the staff was friendly when you talked to them, they did not follow the standard hotel 15/5 policy when it comes to greeting guests. All but one time was I acknowledged before I reached the front desk counter. I had an issue during the stay that I addressed face-to-face with the front desk staff and they assured it would be taken care of, but it was not. I also asked for a late check-out of 12:30pm due to the fact that we had just ran the Disneyland Half Marathon. It was granted, but at 12:01pm a housekeeper knocked on the door
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us on Trip Advisor. At the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim, we aim to highly exceed guest expecatations.  So, we apologize if we fell short during your recent stay.  We appreciate the valid concerns that you brought to our attention. These are definitely not the norm at the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim and we will take firm actions to correct these issues. We apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused you during your stay and would love to see you again at the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim

Summary: The hotel was within walking distance although, the hotel staff were very friendly and helpful and got us free transport with our Disney tickets. The hotel was clean and tidy, but the room walls are paper thin and noise from other guests was more than annoying. Breakfast was very average to say the least! Almost in edible. Over all you get what you pay for and this was a cheaper hotel. There is a 7/11 at the gas station on the corner which is useful as is the other shops and restaurants close by.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us on Trip Advisor.  We value your opinion and will utilize your comments as a way to improve. We can understand how noisy neighbors can be disturbing and this is why we encourage guests to notify the front desk in such cases so that we may address the problem.  It is not a requirement for the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim to provide complimentary breakfast to our guests. However, we have included this hot breakfast as an added benefit at no extra cost to our guests. This breakfast  includes scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, hashbrowns, pancakes,breads, cereal, fruits, juices, and coffeeat no extra charge to our guests. We apologize if you did not find it satisfactory to your liking, Again, thank you for your comments and we hope to see you in the future at the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anahein

Summary Heading: Great choice within walking distance of the Mouse
Summary: We stayed here a few weekends ago when we visited Disneyland. It is the perfect place to stay if you want to be within walking distance of both parks and Downtown Disney. 15-minute walk to all entrances from here. It is especially nice that you can walk down Katella to visit the far side of Downtown Disney, as Earl of Sandwich was our destination there and we were able to avoid the crowds coming from that side. We got a family suite for 3 adults and 2 children. The beds were adequately comfortable and everything was very clean. Breakfast is free, and a very decent free meal at that: scrambled eggs, yogurt, bacon, toast, pancakes, grits (or was it oatmeal?), cereals, juice, coffee, and tea. That right there is worth paying a little extra for a hotel of this proximity to DLR,
Manager Response: Dear Brittany B Thank you for staying with us and commenting about how wonderful your stay with us was. Like you mention, not only is our breakfast delicious but families can really save money having breakfast with us than going out to eat. Thank you so much for your business and we look forward to seeing you in the future.

Summary: Rooms are good size, with fridge, microwave, coffee and great air conditioning.  Also, the included breakfast was a great plus.  A real breakfast!!!  The restaurant also offers a very good Indian-style dinner.  Much to be enjoyed, especially that it is within walking distance to Disneyland!!  Plan to go back.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  At the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim we aim to exceed guest expectations. We are glad that this was the case with your recent stay with us.  Thank you for taking the time to share your thoughts on Trip Advisor and we look forward to you staying with us in the near future!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim

Summary: I stayed here on 8/30-9/1 and was shocked to find that upon check in that my reservation had been cancelled.  With no notice to me, someone at their corporate center cancelled my reservation.  Thankfully there was one room left and I was able to book that but had it not been, I would have been totally screwed.  I was told there was nothing they could do.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us regarding your recent stay with us at The Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim.  From reviewing our records regarding the cancellation of your reservation, we were able to conclude that the reservation had been cancelled through our Central Reservation System and not through the hotel directly. Whether this was done by human error or computer error, we cannot say. However, we do understand how frustrating this would have been for you at time of check-in and we do apologize for any inconvenience this may have caused.  Despite the error, we did honor the reservation and even provided a free upgrade for the inconvenience. Thank you again for your review. At the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim, we aim to exceed guest expectations and your comments help us to continue to improve in order to do so.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim

Summary: Decent hotel with parking and breakfast included; within walking distance to the Parks. Staff are eager to help. We originally booked for two nights and decided to add one more night. No problem. The front desk told us--they would give us the low rate. Next day, surprise, the price was even lower than the price I booked, so they gave the best price. It's these little things that make you feel good.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to write such a generous review. When available, we do try to give our guest the best rates possible. Please contact us for a future stay to accommodate you and your family again.

Summary: Very nice overall.  Clean, organized, employees were attentive and breakfast was delicious!  I was very impressed with the work ethics that the employees have, specially the ladies that cleaned the breakfast room on August 27th, Monday morning.   We had a family of 10 and the only table big enough was dirty, I asked one of the ladies if she could clean it for us, and she did it right away!  I told her to not worry about changing the table clothes, that it was fine, and she responded by saying that it she wanted to give us an excellent experience, and dirty table clothes was not part of it. Even after we told her to not worry about it, that it was fine.  i was VERY impressed by this and hope someone could extend my gratitude to that morning crew.
Manager Response: Thanks for a great review. Our staff takes pride in offering the best customer service and we are glad it shows. We will make sure extend your gratitude to the morning crew. We hope you stay with us again.

Summary: Pool was great (not that we planned to spend that  much time there, but we ended up visiting each day). Excellent welcome, parking worked well. The room was fine; bathroom could have used better ventilation, but that's about it for criticism. Breakfast was a mob scene! I'm not sure if there's a good time to go--we tried a couple  of different times--but they were always swamped and running short on coffee, juice, food. Food was good, just hard to get. Walking distance is a bit long but doable with young kids (4 & 6). Don't bother with the trolley--we bought tickets one day and ended up waiting, waiting, waiting...ended up just walking. Overall, though, we'd stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear helgA2010 We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed our pool as well as your stay. We were steamily busy during your stay which made the restaurant really busy during breakfast hours, we do recommend that the earlier the better to avoid big crowds.  As far the trolley/shutter provided by the city of Anaheim to the park, it is estimated times, therefor it is better to walk (10 minutes from our hotel to the Maingate) and if needed, just take the shutter on the way back to the hotel. We appreciate your business and your comments. Visit us again soon!

Summary: We stayed here in one of the mini-suites for 6 nights and loved it! We were there to hit Disneyland, California Adventure, Universal Studios, and Knott's Berry Farm. It is within walking distance to the first 2. Not to mention a bunch of restaurants and a mall in the other direction. So the location was perfect for us. The is an Indian restaurant within the hotel which was delicious. We ate there several times. There is a pool. Nothing special there but it was nice to have. The wifi was awful. I don't know what the issue was there, but my 3G worked better. So overall this place rocks. We would definitely stay here again if we were to go to Disneyland in the future.
Manager Response: We love hearing about our guests having a fantastic time at our hotel. As you mention, we are in a perfect location. Walking distance to the parks and great restaurants nearby as well. We hope that you make this your hotel from now when visiting Anaheim. Thank you for your comments.

Summary: This is a great Ramada the front desk people are so friendly and helpful and if any issues arise they are taken care of right away.
Manager Response: We appreciate your comments. Thank you for staying with us, and don’t forget to recommend us to your friends and family.

Summary: I stayed at this hotel for three nights.  We (two adults and a 7-year-old child) went to Disneyland/California Adventure with another family (two adults and a 10-year-old child).  We asked for two rooms to be as near as possible, and we got rooms that were located side-by-side.  In addition to it, there was a connection door to the next door, so we were able to socialize as we wanted without going to the front door.  The hotel was located within 10-minutes walk from Disneyland entrance, so we were able to walk there.  From the hotel window, we were able to see the backside of Radiator Springs.  Also, we were able to see fireworks at night.  It was a convenient location.  There was a shopping center with some good restaurants in the same block.  Since the hotel gave us kids free
Manager Response: Dear T W We are so pleased that you enjoyed your stay. We truly appreciate your detail review. We hope you and your family visit us back soon.

Summary: Found this hotel because on tripadvisor it rates very near the top area hotel, and was the best price of the top few.  So free parking, wifi and breakfast.  You just don't get those 3 all in one hotel this close to Disneyland.  The walk was about 10 minutes from hotel door to park ticket takers, as people state: one long block and two half blocks.  Easy, and safe.    Hotel was clean, staff was courteous and friendly.  It was our anniversary, and they wished us a happy one both checking in and out.  Furthermore, at our request they moved us into a room on the 4th floor that overlooked Disneyland and thus we got to see the fireworks at night.  Even better, the room they moved us two was slightly cheaper than what we booked - since it was 2 queens without couch instead of with -
Manager Response: Thank you so much for taking time to review our hotel, it is reviews such as yours that keep us motivated to continue to give our best customer service possible. We appreciate your feedback and will improve on areas mention. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: They made a copy of my drivers license without asking upon...
Summary: They made a copy of my drivers license without asking upon check in, two days later my credit card had fraud charges. Seems like a coincidence??? Beds were like sleeping on the floor.
Manager Response: Mr. Keith S. We regret to hear about your negative experience during your stay at our facility.   Be advised that all Credit Card and Identification information we collect remains confidential and it is used for security purposes only.  The copy of the guest identification helps us to properly identify guests when they request extra room keys or need to replace lost and deactivated keys.   If you have any indication that The Ramada Plaza Hotel might be liable for this particular unfortunate incident, please contact us directly at 714-991-6868 and we can follow the appropriate steps.   Thank you for taking the time to express your concern.

Summary: I like the location of the hotel, it's close enough to the convention center, and to Disneyland, also Cheesecake Factory is a 3 min walk away. The room was warm when I got into it but easily fixable. A problem that I had, and I enjoy a good cup of tea is the coffee maker, it's a single service and you put the cup underneath and water spits out a little bit at a time. Also while taking a shower, use of the fan is a risk!! For me I used the fan during the shower, got out then went to the bed, and then herd dripping of water. I go into the bathroom and find a puddle of water on the floor, on top of the vanity and on some of my toiletiers, not only that water is still dripping from overhead box with the light inside. You can tell that I'm not the only one who may have had this
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to give us your comments regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Inn.  Your comments help us to navigate how to improve our hotel. Thank you again and we look forward to seeing you in the future!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn

Summary: Very polite receptionist, simple book in process easy walk to Disney. Lovely room but dated bathroom
Manager Response: Thank you Mr. Dennis H. for staying at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We will be doing some interior renovations in the near future. Thank you for feedback.

Summary: Free hot breakfast, free parking, free Internet, ref & microwave in room, easy access to Disneyland, so hotel is good choice amongst many more expensive ones . Had problem using shower lever, called front desk and within 10 min housekeeping came to demo shower use. Strange to find hair strands on ceiling in bathroom, holes in towels and bathroom smelled musty, like damp rags used to wipe down counter/floor. Room walls seemed thin, could hear voices and kids playing next door. But liked how window could open to let natural air/breeze into room. Overall a good place to stay again.
Manager Response: Dear Cheryl B It means a great deal to us to receive positive comments. That’s why we will continue to work on the areas that need improvement and continue to make are guest comfortable and happy with their stay.  Thank you for being our guest! And we hope to see you soon.

Summary: This was our third stay at this property, and we won't be coming back. The night staff was very rude.
Manager Response: Dear Tony K.  Guests are encouraged to reach out to agents at the front desk if any aspect of their accommodations can be improved upon. I’m sorry to hear that the staff was rude, although I wish that you would be more detail as far as the experience you had. You have stayed with us before, clearly because you enjoyed your stay and the service provided, that being said, I wish for you to visit us again. Thank you for your review.

Summary: Everything was clean and in order, the fridge and microwave were awesome, parking was included at no charge, and the property was a five-minute walk (if that) from the Convention Center.  Staff was friendly and helpful, and maid staff didn't pester us for not taking maid service while we were there.  Only minor complaints would be the breakfast and the wi-fi.  There was hot food and what was there was good, but they were out of bacon and only had whole milk when we got there.  We couldn't get the wi-fi to work at any point (tried on three devices).  Not a huge deal for us though.  A great visit overall, would definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: This is great to hear, thank you Christina Z. for staying with us. It truly helps detail reviews like yours to let our trip advisor readers get an idea of our amenities and our customer service as we strive to be the best. We look forward to many return visits.

Summary: I reserved a Deluxe 2 Queen with sofa bed.  The room did not have the sofa bed. The room was dirty at check in and I asked the front desk agent to send up housekeeping to clean and vacuum. There was food on the floor.  The window had a film on it which had become opaque and peeling.  The toilet continually ran unless you giggled the handle. The shower control was falling apart and the shower head would not change from stream to pulse.  The front door card entry system took three or four insertions to work. Sheets very rough. Internet did not work when I attempted to log on.
Manager Response: We appreciate the feedback as we are always trying to improve. That being said, we are sorry to hear we didn't meet your expectations this trip and very issue mention is being looked at to avoid any further issues.Thank you for tanking the time to review our hotel.

Summary: Walking distance to Disney, with good amenities, price included a breakfast which was worth a visit a both hot and cold food Buffett. The staff were friendly, free parking. Rooms were clean and a good size with tea and coffee facilities.
Manager Response: Dear Kaye M This is what we like to hear, satisfied guest that has enjoyed his/her stay in our property. We know that vacationing can be expensive; that is why all of our services are free of charge. Free breakfast buffet, parking and WI-FI, and unlike most properties we do not have a resort fee. We appreciate your comments and we hope to see you again.

Summary: the room was spacious and comfortable for 6 people. Room was clean and well laid out.  Sofa sleeper mattress was too thin and uncomfortable. Bath towels were too small and not soft. Sheets could have been softer and pillows more plush.
Manager Response: Dear Leora R. We are glad to hear you enjoyed your stay with us and at the same time regret to hear that such important items in the room did not meet your expectations.  Thank you very much for reviewing our facility and for your concerns as they will help us improve the quality of our rooms and overall guest satisfaction.

Summary: The location was great, right next to Disneyland. The room was clean and roomy. The breakfast was great.
Manager Response: Dear Kim L, We are very happy to hear that you enjoyed your stay with us and appreciate the time you take to give us your feedback. We hope to see you again on your next trip to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: The staff at this hotel is very friendly, efficient and efficiently resolves any issue you may have. We arrived late at night and were put in a room by the ice machine.  It was very noisy and I requested another room.  However, the hotel was sold out for the night but by 10:30 am the next morning I had a new "quieter" room. The hair blower on another day quit working and I had a conference to attend. Within 10 minutes, one of the front desk staff had a new hair blower personally delivered to my room.  The breakfast at the Ramada was very good.  There were eggs, bacon, sausage, pancakes, home fries, fresh fruit, yogurt, and oatmeal every morning. The only complaint would be that it was the same food every day.  The rooms are very comfortable and we were able to see the Disney
Manager Response: Dear Michelle L We appreciate your nice comment regarding our staff. I’m sorry for the loud ice machine; it’s good to hear our staff took care of that as well as the hair blower issue. We pride ourselves in providing great customer service and we tried to treat our guest like family. Please contact us for a future stay and we would really appreciate it if you recommend us to your friends and family. Thank you for taking the time to place your comments on trip advisor.

Summary Heading: The hotel overall was ok and was very close to the theme...
Summary: The hotel overall was ok and was very close to the theme parks. However I was not very happy when another guest was given a key to our room by mistake and that person entered our room while we were showering. No apology was given by hotel staff.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim. We value your opinion and use your comments as a way to improve in order to provide our guests with the best possible hotel experience. At the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim, we take guest safety very seriously. In the alleged scenario you described, it appears that there could have been a computer error while issueing a key. If that were the case, we can understand how uncomfortable that would have been and in such an incident, we should have apologized. Therefore, we would like to take the time to apologize now for any umcomfortable situation that may have occurred.  Thank you again for your comments.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim

Summary Heading: Hotel location was good. Bathroom fan/vent did not work...
Summary: Hotel location was good. Bathroom fan/vent did not work. air quality in room was poor. difficult to maintain a comfortable temp.
Manager Response: Dear David L We appreciate you taking the time to complete a Trip Advisor review regarding your recent stay. We apologize for the lack of air quality in the room. The bathrooms do not have fans but have vents. We appreciate your feedback and make sure that we meet or exceed your expectations on your next visit. Thank you.

Summary: My 2 friends and I stayed here for 2 nights - it was a great location for us as we were in Anaheim simply to visit Disneyland. I requested a high level room (as I had seen this suggested in previous TripAdvisor reviews) and this was a great suggestion - we were able to see the Disneyland fireworks from our room! :) The room itslef is quite basic, but very clean & tidy - so there were no complaints from us!!  The included breakfast was great and the in-house Indian Restaurant was quite yummy as well. I can recommend staying here if you're keen for a handy location to Disneyland (about 10 minuntes walking)
Manager Response: Dear MissKris1709 We are delighted to hear you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for leaving your comments on trip advisor, as you can see, it does help future travelers know details about our breakfast, restaurant and rooms with fireworks view. We appreciate your business and hope to see you again the next time your travels bring you to our area.

Summary: I stayed for a week at the Ramada Plaza in Anaheim, I had a great stay at the hotel. The staff was very kind and the front desk staff was very knowledgeable about transportation around the area. Housekeeping made sure I was well taken care of and changed towels every day. The mini fridge and microwave in the room were definite benefits since there are eating places within walking distance from the hotel so I could bring meals back and keep them for later without worries. Wi-fi is free in the rooms but can be a little unreliable at times, but no worries since you can just call down to the front desk and have it reset without problems.   Only complaint I might have is that the family in the room next to mine was a bit noisy and I could hear them quite often through the walls.
Manager Response: Dear Clare H.  Thanks for the 5 star rating we truly appreciate it. We are always glad to read that our guests have enjoyed their stay with us. Our daily breakfast buffet is an added value especially when you are traveling with a family. Also, as you mention, we are located in a very convenient location. Once again, thank you for your detail review and we hope to see you back soon.

Summary Heading: We stayed in a double queen room. The room was a good size...
Summary: We stayed in a double queen room. The room was a good size and offered a couch and desk area.  The in-room fridge and microwave was a plus. The complimentary cooked breakfast (incl. eggs, bacon, sausage, pancakes; buffet-style) was convenient and early enough to make it to Disneyland before opening. The exercise room was small and had three machines (stair master, treadmill and bike). The only thing to note was that the water pressure in the shower was not very strong.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your positive comments regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim. We are happy to know that we exceeded your expectations and look forward to seeing you on your next trip to Anaheim. We will definitely research your comment regarding the water pressure and appreciate you bringing it to our attention.  Sincerely,  Management Ramda Plaza Inn Anaheim

Summary: Enjoyed my stay, and liked the size of the room, and cleanliness. My only criticism was the tile in the bathroom was cracked, and the bathtub plumbing needs to be replaced or repaired.
Manager Response: Dear Mr. James A We thank you for staying with us and taking the time to review our hotel. We will be doing some renovations in the near future for a better and more comfortable stay. Please visit us again, it will be our pleasure having you back.

Summary Heading: it was good that it was close to stores and food. Breakfast...
Summary: it was good that it was close to stores and food. Breakfast could have been better. Bacon and sausages didnt taste right. more drink could help.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us on Trip Advisor. We are glad you were able to enjoy the great location of the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim. We do find that our guests appreciate being close walking distance to Disneyland Park as well as such great restaurants as Bubba Gump Shrimp Company and the Cheesecake Factory. We regret that you did not find the complimentary hot breakfast to your liking. Although not required to provide a complimentary breakfast, we made the decision to extend this benefit to our guests at no extra charge and feel that the hot scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, hashbrowns, pancakes, selection of breads, fruits, hot and cold cereals, juices, coffee, and milk are satisfactory for most of our travelers. Again thank you for your kind comments and we look forward to seeing you in the near future.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim "Best of Ramada Performance Award 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2007, 2006, 2005, 2003"

Summary: I've stayed here twice and have booked for my third stay.  This hotel is handy to most of Anaheim's attractions as well as being close for car rental, Anaheim Garden Walk and some great restaurants.  The free breakfast is great and the hotel is clean, the staff friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your generous review on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim. We are happy to know that we exceeded your expectations and that you had a great stay. We look forward to seeing  you on your next visit to the Anaheim Resort area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim "Best of Ramada Performance Award 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2007, 2006, 2005, 2003"

Summary: We stayed five nights and are not happy with this hotel. First night we got to the first room the toilet did not flush. So the cleaning lady came in with the plunger and said she fixed it. Well it wasn't fixed because we used it right after it was "fixed" and it was still not flushing properly. So we called the front desk and they moved us into another room. When entering the second room, we tried the toilet and the toilet flushed but very slowly because pressure was really low in the toilet and the sink was also very slow to drain. The next morning we got up and went down for American breakfast and we found a bug on a bagel that I had served myself. I told the waitress and all she did was kill it on the table (GROSS). The third day of our horrible stay we went down again for
Manager Response: First and for most, I want to apologize on behave of the restaurant for the bug that was on your bagel. We brought this to the management of the restaurant and we are making sure this does not happen again. As far as the toilet issues, for water savings reasons, our toilets are low pressure, therefor we advise not to flush too much toilet paper at once to prevent toilet from getting clogged. We thank you for your feedback and we will continue to work on these issues for a better stay.

Summary: My husband, 3 kids and I stayed here for 4 nights and we highly enjoyed our stay.  Rooms are large, clean and comfortable. 10 min walk to Disneyland. Full breakfast buffet not just pastries. Housekeeping staff was great too.Excellent, no complaints.  We will always stay here from now on.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Sophia C. It is great to know that you had such a positive experience during your stay at our hotel. Our housekeeping does a tremendous job keeping our rooms clean and are happy to hear their work met your expectations. We are looking forward to serve you again on your next visit to the Disneyland Resort!

Summary: I stayed 6 nights at the Ramada Plaza Hotel to attend a conference in Anaheim. I got a room with 2 queen beds that could have accomodated up to 4 people because there were no other rooms with single bed available. The room was spacious and clean. The hotel is located 10 minutes walking to the Anaheim Conference Center and 10 minutes walking to a mall (the Anaheim Garden Walk) with restaurants, pubs, shops, and even a bowling place. It is therefore an ideal location if you go to Anaheim to attend a conference and don't have a car to move around. Compared to other hotels in the same area and with similar price range, the Ramada Plaza Hotel offers complimentary breakfast and WIFI. The buffet breakfast includes a wide range of options: bacon, eggs, pancakes, cereals, fruit, coffee,
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to review our facility, Albzzz, We regret to read about your negative experience at the end of your breakfast time.   Thanks to your feedback, we have taken the appropriate steps to ensure that this sort of behavior does not occur in the future and have also addressed the issues regarding the Wireless Service.   Our staff appreciates reading reviews like yours, which help us rectify our shortcomings and improve our overall service.

Summary Heading: Read me! Really a good value...
Summary: I love trip advisor - every vacation I pick a hotel based on the tripadvisor reviews...so here goes!   This ramada stuck out to me because of the free breakfast and the ART (shuttle service to the parks) was right outside. To my surprise you honestly don't need the shuttle it's a short 10min walk at best! But if you are super tired its nice to know the shuttle is an option and it only costs a couple bucks.  Overall the staff is helpful, the rooms are really decent for the price...the hotel could use a little facelift and it wouldn't hurt but it's fine! I appreciated that the rooms were exactly as pictured. A big sized mini fridge and microwave were nice to have.  The pool is decent. Kept at a nice temp...again nothing fancy.  Another helpful tip - it's SO close to all the garden
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your praise Stracy08, We are glad to read you had a great experience during your recent visit to our hotel.  Our staff is always thrilled to know our service met your expectations.   Looking forward to serving you again during your next trip to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary Heading: Overall a very good place to stay.  Very close to...
Summary: Overall a very good place to stay.  Very close to Disneyland and it was nicer than I expected.  We got a very good price on the room and I would stay here again.
Manager Response: Thank you so much for your review, William C, We are thrilled to know our facility and location were of your satisfaction. Hope to serve you again next time you visit the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: The internet was absolutely horrible. It was painful just to load a webpage. I had to go out looking for coffee shops with Wifi to try to get some work done. The breakfast was the barest minimum, and the place had lots of little things that were broken. At about 5am, the biggest, loudest fan kicked in above my room. But the staff was nice and the location was convenient.
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback Mr. Dennis, We apologize for your negative experience with our Wireless Service during your stay.   Unfortunately, electronic equipment in constant use such as routers do malfunction unexpectedly.  We hope this shortcoming does not discourage you from staying at our facility in the future.   It is great to read that our staff and location did meet your expectations.

Summary: I would have given a 5 star rating but, the internet is really slow. I couldn't even play games on my computer as well as my phone because it was super slow. Then there were only 2 electronics allowed to connect to internet per room.. That didnt work too well for us with 6 people staying in the room. had to have front desk reset the internet for us several times.   Rooms were clean, atmosphere was nice.  15 Min walk to Disneyland. We ended up taking the shuttle because our feet were sore and hurt after one day.    Shuttle had issues picking up when they were supposed to. made us walk to Disney when we didnt want to with blisters on our feet...  They drive by if their bus is full.. Not right. however you can take the shuttle at the corner, which comes  every 10 min. found that
Manager Response: Thank you very much for your review, Melody, First and foremost, we would like to apologize for the technical issues you experienced with the wireless access.   It is unfortunate that our electronic equipment malfunctioned during your stay with us.  There have been some upgrades to our system although we are only able to maintain the connectivity of devices limited in order to keep WiFi complimentary.   However, we are thrilled to read that our hotel and location were of your satisfaction and hope you give us the opportunity to serve you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Great hotel and location. Staff does not provide best in...
Summary: Great hotel and location. Staff does not provide best in class service and made me and my children feel very unwanted
Manager Response: Thank you for your review, Sandra L. We regret to hear that our service did not exceed your expectations.  Customer Satisfaction is our main objective and our staff prides itself in providing great service to each and every one of our guests.  I hope you grant us the opportunity to serve you again and rectify our shortcomings if you decide to visit  the Disneyland Resort in the future.

Summary: our room was perfect....we stayed for 8 days and everything was as comfortable as if we were home.  Breakfast was awesome and the staff were awesome as well.  Will definately stay here again!
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our facility. We are very happy to hear our Hotel met your expectations and look forward to serving you again when you visit the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: We were vacationing in Southern California and decided to stay in Anaheim overnight to spend two days at Disneyland.  The first Ramada I phoned to book a room was full so I was referred to this second Ramada not far away.  It was quite a bit more expensive but still manageable.  The room was small but decent.  The problem was in the bathroom.  Shockingly, for the price of the room, much of the bathroom tile on the floor was missing grout and many of the tiles were broken and shattered looking.  Also, the tub had not been cleaned very well as there was still dirt and many long black hairs around the edge of the tub.  We were so exhausted by the time we got to the room that we just went to bed.  There was a breakfast buffet included in the price of the room.  It had a wide
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay at the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim. We aim to exceed guest expectations and it appears we fell short during your stay,  Cleanliness and Maintenance are items we strive to perfect. Unfortunately, it appears that you were checked into a room that was not up to standards and needed some repairs. We can definitely understand that this would have been frustrating and have looked into fixing this problem room as well as working on better communication with maintenance and the front desk. Thank you again for bringing it to our attention and we hope that you will consider a second stay with us on your next visit to the Anaheim Resort area.  Sincerely,   Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim "Best of Ramada Performance Award 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2007, 2006, 2005, 2003"

Summary: Good value and proximity to visit Disneyland with free parking and breakfast.  Faciflity is average and breakfast a bit overcrowded.  It was a pleasant stay though.
Manager Response: Dear Sudjali H Thank you for your kind words about our hotel. As for the breakfast, we do advise our guest to go in the restaurant as early as possible to avoid long lines. We hope you visit us again soon. Thank you for staying with us.

Summary: The friendly and excellent staff and location is the main reason we stay here.  This is the fourth time we have stayed at this location.
Manager Response: Dear Todd N We are delighted to have had the opportunity to have you as our guest. Thank you very much for continuing to stay with us. We hope to see back soon.

Summary: Nice stay, great staff, big rooms but felt a bit worn.  Parking excellent with lifts directly up to your floor (well thought out there!).  Our air conditioning in room was not working and we had to move to a street side room which was more noisy. Breakfast very average.
Manager Response: Dear: Shoes_will_travel_14 It was our pleasure having you as our guest. We appreciate the compliments on the staff. I am sorry to hear that there was an issue with the air condition. Please accept my sincere apologies that the room that you moved to was noisy. We will take make sure this does not happen again. We wish you visit us soon so we can provide you with great service and a great room.

Summary: Would definitely return!  Very convenient to walk to the Disney Parks.  Pretty decent breakfast with hotel stay, although the organization of the food line could be improved . . . . .doesn't flow well.  Stayed with family, two adults and an eleven year old.  Double room was sufficiently sized.  Beds was comfortable and room appeared to be clean.  No problems during our stay.
Manager Response: Dear Zakiya82 Thank you very much for staying with us at Ramada Plaza Hotel. We appreciate your precious time in providing us such valuable feedback from your stay. Hope to see you again soon.

Summary: I came to have a trip with my family.  the front desk people was professional and always smile to the guests and I.  As soon as I came to the room for check in, I found the two beds were so comfortably and fairly new.  The room was clean and fresh every time we came back from the disneyland.  I recommend for any one who like to go hot tub or swimming pool before go back to disney land to play again.
Manager Response: Dear richiesng Thank you for sharing your comments with our trip advisor followers. Our staff is always attentive to our guests and their needs for a pleasant stay. We are glad you had a great sleep on our comfortable bed; please do not hesitate to contact us for a future stay. Our staff will be more than happy to assist you.

Summary: An "Excellent" Hotel. Clean rooms, with very friendly Staff. Great location to the front gates of Disneyland.  We recommend this stay......
Manager Response: Thank you for the kind review of our hotel. I am glad that you had an enjoyable trip. We look forward to serving you again in the future. Thank you for your recommendation

Summary Heading: Great location for a short walk to Disney.
Summary: Easy to get to the park. Beds were pretty good as was size of the room. Small pool and tiny gym. Food down the block. Overall a very convenient hotel. Decent for families. Hotel amenities aren't extravagant or anything like that. But, it was priced well and did the job.
Manager Response: Dear Nini127c1 Thank you for your very kind review. I am extremely happy that you enjoyed your stay with us. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Good price, come again, location, free parking, breakfast...
Summary: Good price, come again, location, free parking, breakfast, good staffs. Can be more promotion in lobby.
Manager Response: Thank you Mr. Albino D. for choosing us Ramada Plaza for your travels. We hope you visit us again soon.

Summary: Hotel staff were not knowledgeable of the area and did little to help advise with restaurants and entertainment.  Our shower went from scalding hot to freezing cold our entire 5 day stay.  We were told that there were no rooms to move us to and that all they could do was offer an area to shower.  I asked if they could simply ask maintenance to fix the issue, and they said they did not believe it was something they could report, nor anything they could do about it.  So, either shower at your own risk, or don't shower for 5 days -- what a choice to make when you are paying $160 per night...
Manager Response: Dear Robert W.  We are disappointed to hear that your stay did not exceed your expectations, as we hope for all our guests. It is unfortunate that we did not advise you of restaurants and entertainment seeing as not only is our staff well informed of our surroundings but we do have a dinning map at our front desk. When we encounter a problem we do our best to try to resolve it, that being said, it is disappointing to hear that our staff was unable to fix the shower issue; we will make sure this does not happen again. Thank you for the review, we appreciate your feedback.

Summary: I am a annual pass holder to Disneyland and this was my third straight stay at the Ramada I was there on June 24 - 27 and my last trip was the last week of April and as always, as I have come to expect and the reason I come back to the Ramada is the customer service, the staff always greets me with a smile and now that my face has become familiar to them it's like a home a away from home... Anytime I have a need or question the staff there are very warm and helpful and go out of there way to ensure I have a pleasant stay there, Yes there are a lot of hotels to choose from and cheaper but you get what you pay for... I paid $127.00 a night and yes there are hotels nearby for $80.00 but when you factor in other expenses the Ramada is a bargain with free secured parking and full hot
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Rudy R.  We are thrill to have you back staying with us. We truly enjoy making our guest feel as comfortable as if they were at home. Our staff, from housekeeping to front desk takes pride in our job and it makes us happy to know that it makes a difference when guest return to Ramada Plaza for a wonderful stay. We appreciate your kind review and thank you for recommending us to our trip advisor travelers. We hope to see you back soon.

Summary: We stayed at this excellent hotel for 6 nights.  The rooms were very large and included a microwave and mini-fridge with prep area.  The morning breakfast buffet saved us a lot of money and included eggs, sausage, bacon, pancakes, oatmeal, and yogurt.  Other perks were free below ground parking, and free wifi.  The hotel is within walking distance to Disney with plenty of restaurants and shopping nearby.  Highly recommended.
Manager Response: Dear Christopher C Thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza for your travels. The free breakfast, parking and Wi-Fi are some of the amenities that we provide that most hotels in the area charge for. We wish you and your family stay with us soon. Thank you for your comments.

Summary: We stayed in the Ramada Plaza Anaheim for our trip to Disney and LA area.    Pro:  Its location to the park was a major plus for our family.  Parking is free for hotel guests, which is a great perk -- in fact, we were able to utilize the free parking at the hotel and walk to the park.  It was, at most, a ten minute walk (we have a 5 and a 7 year-old) to Disneyland.  We arrived earlier than check-in, and while they didn't have a room ready for us, the hotel did allow us to park in their garage so we didn't have to pay for Disney parking - thanks to them for that!  Pro:  The free continental breakfast is good (scrambled eggs, hash browns, oatmeal, pancakes, breads, fruits, bacon, etc.)  The manager was extremely friendly and stood and visited with us one morning for a while.  Get
Manager Response: Dear Sarah O Thank you for sharing your comments with our trip advisor travelers. We regret you having to stay in a room that was not up to our standards. I hope that you communicated the issue to the front desk staff so we could have assisted you into moving you to a different room. We want our guest to feel comfortable in the rooms.  We wish that you give us another visit for a better experience in the near future. For future reference, room numbers that are even face inside our property/pool, and odd numbers face the streets Katella or Harbor. We also just improved our WI-FI connection. Once again, thank you for taking the time to place your comments.

Summary Heading: Great place . Close to Disney and a awesome Indian restaurant. Breakfasts were included and absolutely worth it. No comp
Summary: Great place, close to Disney, awesome Indian restaurant at night and fantastic breakfast buffet included in room charge. Service from front desk staff was amazing. Internet access at hotel. Close to a 7/11 , 5 minute walk to Disney, all staff very very helpful
Manager Response: Dear Frances M We are thrilled to hear your stay with us was great. Our front desk is always happy to provide the best customer service. Thank you for your review and we hope to see you again soon.

Summary: We had a great time at the Ramada.  The rooms are clean, the pool is shaded in the afternoon, the breakfast buffet is good, and the hotel is within easy walking distance of Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Chris N  Thank you for taking the time to share your experience at the Ramada Plaza Hotel. We are glad that you were able to enjoy our pool and our delicious breakfast.

Summary Heading: Overall, My family had a great time. Only complain was...
Summary: Overall, My family had a great time. Only complain was shower fixture keeps dripping and mini ref was not cold enough. Staff was friendly and very helpful. Breakfast buffet was very good, compliments to the chef and the crew
Manager Response: Dear Cresen G We are glad you decided to stay with us. We appreciate the compliments on our breakfast and we will make sure the restaurant staff is aware of another satisfied guest.  As far as the shower fixture, I do hope that one of our agents was able to resolve this problem. We will continue to work hard and make improvements where is necessary. Thank you for your review.

Summary: Staff were very friendly and helpful, rooms were clean, spacious and up to date with a safe, fridge, microwave, lcd TV, Wifi and coffee maker.Computers in the lobby for printing boarding passes etc.. are a big plus.The included breakfast was also very good and a great start for a day of Disney.Location is within walking distance to Disneyland and close to ABC market, 7-Eleven, Subway and more.We will definitely stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Monza80 Your lovely comments and review are most appreciated. We are happy to read that you had a pleasant stay. As you mentioned, we are close to just about everything. Disney is 10 to 15 minute walk; dine in restaurants to our right and fast food to our left. Please give us a call back when visiting Anaheim in the future so one of our agents can assist you.

Summary Heading: Great place to stay.  Rooms were nice and roomy...
Summary: Great place to stay.  Rooms were nice and roomy.  Continental breakfast was good.  Only complaint, pool and hot tub were not clean
Manager Response: Dear Chris M We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for your positive input, and we hope that you continue to stay with us on your next visit to Anaheim

Summary Heading: My family and I found the property to be excellent for the...
Summary: My family and I found the property to be excellent for the price and location to Disneyland.  The facilities and service were outstanding!
Manager Response: Dear Scott H Thank you for your very kind review. I am happy that you and your family had such an enjoyable stay. We look forward to seeing you again in the future.

Summary Heading: Clean, excellent breakfast, walk to Disneyland
Summary: My 19 year old daughter and I stayed here for 5 nights while visiting Disneyland.  2 very comfortable queen beds, spotless bathroom.  Good sized bar fridge about 2 x 3 feet (no ice), microwave and a small but adequate countertop for sandwich preparation.  Had no problem with Wifi.  The airconditioning was extremely loud- to the point of waking us up if we were sleeping lightly.  The pool is quite small- 4 to 5 feet deep, rectangular and has no sun after about 4:00.  It is elevated a few feet up from the parking lot, so there basically was no landscaping around the pool.  Lots of tables and chairs around the pool so we came back and had lunch there a couple of times.  Our friends stayed at the Super8 2 doors down and their pool was 8 feet deep so you could dive, kidney shaped,
