Manager Response: Dear 3girlsfromlangley  We are thrilled to hear you had an amazing stay and we will be sure to share your positive feedback with our staff. We truly appreciate the description of the surrounding shops and restaurants you described; it will really help our trip advisor readers have a good idea of what is near our property. Hope to see you again soon!

Summary Heading: clean, comfortable and nice. close proximity to Disneyland...
Summary: clean, comfortable and nice. close proximity to Disneyland. Awesome breakfast. Would highly recommend for the price.
Manager Response: We like to thank you for placing your comments on trip advisor on your recent stay. We hope we have the opportunity to welcome you back again in the near future. And we will really appreciate if you do recommend us to your friends and family.

Summary Heading: This hotel was perfect for my family of five. Very nice and...
Summary: This hotel was perfect for my family of five. Very nice and clean hotel, with no funky smell. We were pleasantly surprised upon arrival, since I just booked this hotel based on reviews and with my fingers crossed. Plenty of space in the room and the free breakfast was convenient.  The room fridge was perfect for keeping our food cold to pack for lunches in Disneyland. The flat screen cable tv was nice and free Internet  so my husband could keep up with some work projects. Swimming in the pool was nice in the afternoon, and soaking in the hot tub was great too!  Only 1/2 block away from a 7-11 and a small market.  Right around the corner from  Subway, pizza, and Chinese food. About a 15 minute walk to the gates of Disneyland. Just enough to stretch your legs for a day in the
Manager Response: Dear Sonja G We want to thank you for your kind review. It’s good to know that you were satisfied with our property and our staff. And yes, just like you mentioned, we are in a great location. Thank you for staying with us and hope to see you and your family soon.

Summary: The start to our trip was at the Ramada. Although not the newest it was clean and comfortable. Staff were great and we felt very comfortable there. Nothing seemed to be an issue and the location was central to some good resturants and the Disney complexes. We were able to walk everywhere we wanted.
Manager Response: Dear Shane R.   The staff and management of Ramada plaza are always proud to see that our guest has had a great stay with us. We want to thank you for your kind review and for choosing to stay with us. We hope you have the opportunity to make a return visit. Have a great day.

Summary Heading: No hot water, terrible smell from bathroom
Summary: Room was large.  Breakfast was good.  However, I stayed here on business and there was NO hot water neither morning nor evening.  Bathing was a terribly cold affair.  I called down several times, assured the hot water heaters would be fixed.  The staff at the desk had an attitude about our calls regarding the hot water issue.  The problem wasn't fixed until the morning of our departure.  And there was a sewage smell coming in from the bathroom as well, which the hotel never even addressed.   To make up for the lack of hot water, we were granted free use of a meeting room for an hour the last day of our stay.  I will never stay at this hotel again.
Manager Response: Dear Karen D.   Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel regarding your stay in January. I do recall a weekend where one of our boilers stopped working and it took a day or two to get it fixed. We are disappointed we lacked to provided an all round positive stay and for that we apologize. Thanks again for your feedback.

Summary: We stayed for 7 nights and would do it again! Our first impression of the hotel was a good one. The staff at the desk was friendly and very knowledgeable about the area. We got joining rooms there was 5 of us, 3 adults and 2 pre teens, the rooms were large (2 queens) and clean. The beds were comfortable. Our chambermaid was great! Any extra requests we had were taken care of in a timely manor. The underground parking was nice by being out of the sun &/or rain. We wanted the internet to keep in touch with family. It is about the only draw back we found, it was a little slow and only 2 devices could be hooked up at one time per room. But it did do what we needed it to do. We used the computers in the lobby to print off our boarding passes for our flight home. We also wanted our
Manager Response: Dear Tammy1000  Thank you for staying with us and providing such a great and descriptive review.  We are constantly striving to make every guest experience wonderful. We hope to join us another time for your visit to Anaheim and Disneyland.

Summary Heading: This is a great hotel.  The location is good for all kinds...
Summary: This is a great hotel.  The location is good for all kinds of parks and stores.  Overall I would recomend it to anyone!
Manager Response: Dear Daniel P.  Thank you for your kind review. Please contact us in the future for your next visit to Anaheim.

Summary: I recently stayed at this hotel on a business trip at the convention center, and the main points are: Pros Close to disney, clean room, friendly staff. Free Parking Cons: Poor WIFI, (slow and only 2 devices allowed to connect) Hotel seems to be very warm, outside the rooms.  bit old fashioned breakfast spread is very limited and sometimes very busy, needing to queue to get in.   Overall i probably wouldnt stay here again, and would choose the sheraton or hilton at a similar price.
Manager Response: Dear TerryD73 Thank you for staying with us. We take our guests experience very serious and we only hope that you are happy with our property and the staff.  That being said, I will share your comments with our hotel management team to resolve and improve the issues that you pointed out.  Once again thank you for your feedback.

Summary Heading: Iwas very happy with staff and overall  service
Summary: The manager went beyond and over his job to please me and my grandson. My internet service wasn't working and he moved us to a different room and larger room, we were very happy.
Manager Response: Dear Nancy O We truly appreciate your compliments on the staff. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast buffet. I hope we were able to provide you with the additional items that were needed in your room. We wish for you to stay with us again. We will be doing renovations in the near future. Thank you for your review

Summary: Service was good, staff were friendly, especially front desk and restaurant staff.  My second son loved the breakfast buffet.  Maid didn't give us enough towels and toilet paper and there was paint peeling from the wall, cracks in bathroom and ceiling.  But good location, close to restaurants and 15 minute walk from hotel to Disneyland parks.  If they could do some renovations and update the hotel, we'd stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Nancy O We truly appreciate your compliments on the staff. We are happy to hear that you enjoyed the breakfast buffet. I hope we were able to provide you with the additional items that were needed in your room. We wish for you to stay with us again. We will be doing renovations in the near future. Thank you for your review.

Summary: They have newer beds and TV's in the rooms. The buffet breakfast had most of the same items each day but the items were warm and brought out through out the morning. This is a nice feature if you want a quick breakfast in the morning. It is VERY close to Disney so you can just walk over. There is also parking for you car right there. There is internet available in your room however the speed isn't that fast.
Manager Response: Thank you for staying at Ramada Plaza. We appreciate your comments about our beds and new TV’s. We do apologize for the slow internet speed; we will do our best to resolve this issue. We will love for you to visit us again.

Summary Heading: Really enjoyed our stay here, I only wish it was more than...
Summary: Really enjoyed our stay here, I only wish it was more than 1 night. The staff was great and the breakfast provided in the morning was a welcome treat, thank you staff.
Manager Response: Dear Mark P. You are very welcome. Thank you for your kind review. Visit us again soon.

Summary Heading: Great room at an affordable price!
Summary: We enjoyed our stay! Everyone was very nice,  & the breakfast was delicious! Will definitely stay there again!
Manager Response: Dear Mr. Frank W.  Thank you for taking the time to leave us a review. It’s good to know that you were pleased with the staff and the breakfast. Don’t hesitate to call us for your future visit.

Summary: We stayed 3 nights at this hotel. We were greeted at the reception desk by staff who were friendly and very helpful with our questions about Disneyland. Breakfast was included with the room and it was good. Most "included" breakfasts are bagels and yogurt. This was scrambled eggs (prepared just right for my liking, not too gooey and not overdone), hash brown potatoes, orange slices, toast, cereal and yogurt. Staff in the dining room were very attentive and made sure all was good.  Sroom was clean and presentable. We had 4 adults and one child which was fine with two beds and a sofa bed. If I have any negative thing about the room it was the bathroom towels. They were very rough which I know is somewhat common but its my pet peeve. A couple of the towels were showing their age
Manager Response: Dear Jimmy-Jenny It was great having you as our guest. Happy to hear you enjoyed our breakfast buffet. Sorry about the bathroom towels, we will communicate the message to housekeeping management. Thank you for the feedback.

Summary Heading: Ramada Is A Great Place to Stay
Summary: Whilst the room was a bit dated, it was clean and had everything we needed. Free wireless Wi-fi was a bit slow, but it did work.  Car parking was easily accessible under the building with elevator access to all floors.  Staff were very friendly and helpful.  Buffet breakfast was okay.  Location is excellent.  Walking distance to Disneyland, restaurants and shops.  All in all this is great value for money.  We would stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Shane P.  We appreciate posting your review of your recent stay. Thank you for your comments and hopefully on your next stay, we will have renovations in our hotel for a better experience. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Good family hotel with Filling Breakfast
Summary: We stayed 5 nights last April.  Room was big with 2 comfy queen beds.  Bathroom was nice. But the best thing about it was the buffet breakfast.  For a budget traveler with a ton of kids, its a godsend.  Its rather basic but very filling--pancakes, scrambled eggs, sausages, bacon, shredded hash browns, yogurt, cereals, oatmeal, toast, bagels, and fruits (bananas, watermelons).    Its just a 15 minute leisurely walk to Disney but at the end of a long day at the park, everyone was complaining of the distance, envious of the hotels located across from the Disney maingate.    We weren't able to check out the Indian restaurant inside the hotel, but there are many good ones within walking distance--like Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gump, PF Changs, CPK, etc.  There is also a Denny's and
Manager Response: Thank you for your feedback. We are extremely happy to know that our recent improvements to our breakfast selections are satisfactory. We would love to have you as our guest again if you decide to visit Disneyland resort in the future.  Once again, thank you for your detailed review.

Summary: We stayed 3 nights, the beds were comfortable and the rooms were clean and tidy.  Room service was unobtrusive.  The staff were very obliging and helpful.  We had breakfast included with our room price and the spread was great.  Everyone's needs were accommodated.  We ate well in the morning and it held us in good stead for our long trek around the Disney Parks during the day. We ate in the Indian restaurant on-site one night too after a hard day at Disney and the food and service were great. The hotel is about a quick 10minute walk from the main gate of Disney and there are shuttles handy apparently.   There are computers available in the lobby if required and the WiFi suited our requirements.
Manager Response: Dear Kerry C Thank you for taking the time to share your recent experience with us here on Trip Advisor. We are thrill to read that you enjoyed our breakfast and the Indian food as well. Again, thank you for your kind words. We look forward to seeing you again in what we hope will be the near future.

Summary Heading: Close to Disneyland, clean & well priced.
Summary: My friend and I stayed here in July last year for 3 nights and were very pleased with our stay.  The rooms are nice cleaned everyday. Also an option to eat your sheets changes everyday too.   Free buffet breakfast is included. Basic breakky stuff cereal, bacon, eggs, toast etc plus juices and water.   It's a short walk around 10 minutes to the gates of Disneyland. Close to restaurants as well. The Cheesecake Factory was my fave :p  Really cheap to stay here. Pool is small but nice to relax next too.   Can't wait for out next visit to Disneyland we will defs be staying here again!!
Manager Response: Dear Sammy148  Thank you for sharing your comments with our trip advisor travelers. We are very happy to know that you were pleased with your stay. Give us a call when planning your next visit; it will be our pleasure to assist you.

Summary: Stayed for 3 nights. Room was bigger than I expected, comfy bed, good size bathroom although the shower was a bit of challenge to get going, but was fine once it did. Easy parking under hotel and good lift access. I had breakfast on one morning, it was ok nothing fancy, normal basic buffet.
Manager Response: It was our pleasure welcoming you as our guest. Glad to hear that you were satisfied with the room accommodations. Please don’t hesitate to give us a call for a future visit. Thank you for your comments.

Summary: I struggled with the heavy marketing campaign with 4 emails in my inbox on checking in.  Very poor taste if you ask me.  The wireless internet was atrocious.  I have rarely had worse.  The towels were of the crisp and course variety - not my favourite. That said, you did meet my minimum requirements of plenty of hot water and comfy bed.  The air conditioning worked well.  The staff were very friendly and helpful
Manager Response: Dear Mr. James C.  I am very sorry for the poor internet connection. I will share your comments with upper management so we can resolve this problem. We hope that in the near future you stay with us again so we have the opportunity to give you a better stay.

Summary: Ramada's accomodations was much better than we ever expected.  The rooms were clean, and well.furnished. The beds were very comfortable.  The staff was friendly and very responsive to our needs.  I have recommended all my family and friends to stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.
Manager Response: Dear Deanna H, thank you for your kind review. We are thrill to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for recommending us to your friends and family. Please contact us for future accommodations.

Summary Heading: Getting a little dated but still good
Summary: This is our second time here and the stay was still great but the hotel could definitely use a makeover.  The staff was great as usual and the breakfast was just as I remembered.  Nothing fancy but we got eggs, sausage, bacon, shredded hashbrowns, and cereal/yogurt for the kids.  Just what we needed to start our day before we get gouged in Disneyland.   The last time we stayed, we got a room on the 4th floor close to the service elevator.  This time around I requested a room in the same area and the wonderful staff was able to accommodate this.  The rooms were clean and the beds were nice and firm.   We made sure to park close to the entrance of the service elevator so we can get in and out quickly.  It also allowed gave us quick access to the pool which the kids loved.    Wifi
Manager Response: Thank you for staying with us and we appreciate your feedback. Our housekeeping staff works hard to maintain the rooms clean. We are happy to know that you continued to choose us for your Disneyland vacations. We will continue to improve are property to make our guest stay more comfortable.

Summary Heading: Great Stay but room is a little dated
Summary: Considering we were at the theme parks most of our time in Anaheim this hotel was great for the price.  It was however a little dated although I couldnt really complain 5 nights for $750 is very cheap and this included a decent bfast. I would def use them again. Additionally, the staff were always very helpful and accomodating.
Manager Response: We are pleased to know that you enjoyed your stay with us. Thank you for choosing Ramada Plaza. We are delighted to know you would stay with us again. We appreciate your comments and we hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Great place for a family of 5
Summary: Overall, a nice clean place to stay.  Staff was friendly and helpful. Complimentary breakfast buffet is nice - scrambled eggs, sausage, bacon, bagels, toast, cereal, etc. Liked  having an in-room safe to keep our passports stowed away. Bathroom door is huge and a bit awkward when it opens into the front door area. Fridge wasn't very cold, and the extremely nice cleaning lady offered assistance, and when we got back it was working better. Nice short walk to Disney park.  Subway restaurant nearby.  Rented a car from Hertz down the street (also walking distance) and had good service there as  well. I always find it difficult to find a place for a family of 5, and our room can easily accommodate that.  I would definitely recommend this place.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much to give us positive comments on almost all services we offer here. We expect to see you soon if you miss the beautiful sunshine Southern California and Disneyland.

Summary: We picked the Ramada Anaheim Resort due to its location to Disneyland and because breakfast was included in the price of the room.  With six people eating breakfast, this could have been very expensive.  The breakfast food and variety was great.  The resort is close enough to Disneyland that it takes less time (maybe 10 minutes) to walk there as opposed to driving there, paying for parking ($15 per day) and waiting for a tram to take you to the gate.  Our only negative experience was with the Resort's WiFi.  Only 2 devices are permitted to connect per room.  With six people all with smart phones or tablets, this becomes a real issue (especially with teenagers).
Manager Response: Dear David,  We appreciate your positive comments. We are currently planning to speep-up our innternet services, so we may able to allow more devices to access the WIFI very soon. Hope you will find it satisfied next time you stay with us.  Again, thank you for liking our hotel.

Summary: In a nutshell:  Fire doors blocked open ilegally Phone in room didn't work Internet service was so slow that I had to use my phone to do emails etc.  The free breakfast was aweful.  Thin walls made it very noisy when people walked by.   Bottom line is thst for what they charge for a room they dont deliver value. Stay someplace less expensive and go to Dennys for a hot breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  First of all, I would like to apologize for those points you pointed out, and I would like to express my genius thanks to your carefulness which could greatly help our improvements.  I am really sorry we met a incident to our phone system the dates you stayed with us, but we had already fixed out the problem, and the phone system had been improved since then. Also, we are currently trying our best to improve our breakfast quality and internet speed. You could see we start to get many positive comments for our breakfast these days.   I sincerely hope you could extend us one more opportunity for your nest trip, and I believe you will find amazing changes next time you stay with us.   Again, thank you very much for your assistance and dedicate for our improvements. Look forward to seeing you again.

Summary: This hotel is within walking distance to Disneyland. This is a three star hotel, so do not expect brand new, but the accommodation is very good and everything is exception clean, the staff are friendly and very helpful. We were in a room next to a couple with children, who decide to fight loudly before 6am in the morning with children who made excessive noise. I think it would be better if the husband would have stop yelling "shut it, just shut" and just talk to her about what the problem was. When we advised the staff of the noise problem, they moved us to another room, asking us what view we wanted, even thought the people in the next room had children, it was fine. The hotel is on two main road, but double glazing you not heard the traffic.  Can not speak more highly of the
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for your understandable and rational comments. We greatly appreciate your high praises of our cleanness, breakfast, and friendly staff. We are always here to maintain a high-standard services to satisfy our guests. Hope you will find everything even better next time you stay with us. Look forward to seeing you in the coming future.

Summary Heading: Second time at this hotel and liked it even more the second time around
Summary: Location to Disneyland is great!  Rooms are clean and spacious.  Friendly staff & wonderful breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Keeley,  Thank you for your loyalty to our hotel. We greatly appreciate your high praises of our cleanness, breakfast, and friendly staff. We are always here to maintain high-standard services to satisfy our guests. Hope you will find everything even better the third time you stay with us. Look forward to seeing you in the coming future.

Summary Heading: Nice and clean and good breakfast
Summary: We had a good stay close to Disneyland for a great value. The shower leaked and there was no fan in the bathroom. This was a suite, but had no extra sink and that made it a little difficult. Great staff serving breakfast.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  Thank you for staying with us again and sorry for the incovenience caused by the lock. But as I noticed, still appreciate you praise our hotel as nice, clean and good. We are always here to make improvements for services and room accommodations. I believe you will find a major improvement if you stay with us the third time. Look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: This is our second time staying here for a "Disneyland stay-cation". Our experience this year wasn't as great as last year, although it's not the fault of the establishment. After returning back from a whole day at Disneyland, we were not able to get back into our room due to problems with the electronic door lock. The staff made several attempts to open our door and we ended up waiting for about an hour before we could get back in our room. During this time, the staff allowed us to stay in an empty room while they tried to get our door open. They ended up giving us a discount off our room due to the inconvenience which was very thoughtful.  Will definitely consider them again.
Manager Response: Dear Andre,  I apologize for the inconveniences caused by the lock. But thanks for your rational comments to our cleanness and friendly staff. We may possess a renovation later this year, so the facilities and equipment might by much better then. Look forward to you patronage still. Thank you very  much for understanding.

Summary: This hotel is very close to Disneyland and the Anaheim Convention Center. We were there for a cheer competition at the Convention Center and it made it very walkable without having to pay extra money for the hotels right by it. They also have a free breakfast buffet which was awesome. Eggs, pancakes, hash browns, cereal, oatmeal, fruit sure to please anyone. only down falls were the pool was kind of small and not much of an exercise room but all in all a good hotel. We would stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Cljensen,  Thank you ffor your comments on our great staff in breakfast area, and thnk you for using great to describe our hotel. We will try our best to make improvement continuously. Hope we will see you again if you travel to Disneyland area later.  PR Manager

Summary Heading: This hotel needs better ventilation in the whole thing.  No...
Summary: This hotel needs better ventilation in the whole thing.  No fan in the bathroom. Rooms where very warm had to have the air on the whole time, which that got cold, turn air off and would heat right back up.
Manager Response: Dear Debbie,  We apologize to the incontinences caused by the AC and Fan system in your room. We have had our maintenance staff to check all AC and fan system in all rooms since we also noticed that summer time is coming. We will do our best to ensure our guests to have a fun summer stay with us and enjoy their Disney trips. Hope you could also come and see again.

Summary: The hotel was within walking distance of Disneyland. The property is nice but small. The pool is tiny. The breakfast was served in an Indian restaurant. I love Indian food but the pancakes and oatmeal had a curry type flavor. The room was clean and the staff was very helpful. The hotel was close to a shopping center with plenty of dining options.
Manager Response: Dear Value Guest,  We greatly appreciate your love of our hotel, our amenities and services, and our surroundings. Also, very much thanks for passing out your positive comments to our other prospective guests. We look forward your next stay with us.

Summary: The rooms are well cleaned, spacious and well maintained. The hotel staff are nice and friendly. Also, there is a complimentary breakfast!
Manager Response: Dear Value Guest,  Thank you for your comments on our staff and services, and for using awesome to describe our hotel. We greatly appreciate your love of our hotel and will try our best to make improvement continuously. Also, very much thanks for passing out your positive comments to our other prospective guests. We look forward your next stay with us.

Summary: I read the reviews on trip advisor and decided to give it a try.  We have stayed in many different hotels in the Disneyland area, including the resort hotels.  We were pleasantly surprised by the hotel.   Pros: Friendly staff comfortable beds warm hottub! walking distance to Disneyland  Cons:  No lids on to-go coffee cups! (hard when walking to Disneyland!) No variety at breakfast and orange juice was really more like water with a little orange flavoring. Not enough towels for everyone in room. Didnt refill the shampoo and conditioner each day.  With 3 girls, it was a problem!  Overall we were very happy with our stay.  We liked the proximity to Disney and the Gardenwalk.  Other families staying were really friendly!  Be sure to check out happy hour deals at the nearby
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for your detailed list of our pros and cons. It helps us a lot to address where we did well, and where we need to improve. We will have our housekeepers to check room suppliers more frequently. And our breakfast has improved a lot in the past couple weeks. Many of our guests put good comments to the breakfast. We hope you will find this also next time you stay with us. Look forward to seeing you soon.

Summary: Stayed Mar 30th with my girlfriend.  Booked online for $149 after tax (one king bed).  The run-down: Relatively quiet room (#401 I think?).  We had a couple rowdy teens across the hall but it was a minimal annoyance. New or recent room furnishings (bed, chairs, TV). Free parking for Sat and Sun, even though we only stayed one night. Breakfast is nothing fancy, but it's better than continental, and was included with the room rate.  If you're going to complain about that, go pay for breakfast inside Disneyland. Location is great - a few blocks away from Disneyland's front gates.  The big downside to this hotel is that some things have not been renovated.  Our bathroom was out of the 80s, but it was fully functional.  The shower head wasn't going to win any awards, but the towels
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,,  We appreciate you pertinent comments on our staff, services, breakfast, room amenities and so on. Hope you will have our hotel in mind when you visit Disneyland/Orange County area next time.

Summary: We were all very happy with the size of the room to accommodate our family of 5. We were also thrilled with the cleanliness of the room/hotel and the happy staff....location to Disney is fabulous as well!....just a 4 minute walk around the corner.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your positive reponse on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us over Spring Break. At the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim, we strive to exceed guest expectations and we are happy that we succeeded during your stay.  We look forward to seeing you on your next trip to the Anaheim Resort area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim "Best of Ramada Performance Award 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2007, 2006, 2005, 2003"

Summary: If you stay in this place, I would definitively consider other alternatives for breakfast. It is basically consist in over salty scrambled eggs, overcooked sausages and some fake orange juice. All considered together, will make more difficult the start of you day.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,,  We apologize for the breakfast the restaurant used to offer. We had worked with the restaurant and mad significant improve on our breakfast the past couple weeks. And we will continually make improvement per guests’ preferences. Thank you for choosing our hotel.

Summary: Customer service was excellent.  The staff were very friendly and helpful.  The breakfast was great.  Check-in and check-out went quick and smoothly.  The hotel was conveniently located to the Disneyland park so that we were able to walk.  The kids loved the pool, hot tub and sauna.  Overall, our stay was very pleasant.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for loving our hotel and the location. We expect your next stay and believe you will enjoy more.

Summary: Was extremely dissapointed with our stay.  The rooms were nice, but the pillows on the bed were terrible.  We called the front desk twice to ask for replacements, but none were ever delivered.  Very poor customer service.  In addition, the buffet breakfast was absolutely terrible.  There was a community gallon of milk out for everyone to share...wrong place to cut costs in my mind.  In addtion, the selection was very small, potatoes were full of water, juice had no flavor.....indifferent staff in the restaurant.  Overall, I would never recommend this hotel or stay there again.
Manager Response: Dear Guest,  I appolagize for the inconvenient. We have already checked with our new front desf staff and trained them again for delieverying in a timely manner. And the galloned milk are changed to small boxes of fresh milk these days. And we also start to offer more selections to our breakfast. Please try stay with us again later if you come here again, and I beliebe you will find many differences. Again, thank you for the sincere comments.

Summary Heading: We went to Disneyland with our daughter and her family and...
Summary: We went to Disneyland with our daughter and her family and stayed at Ramada. The boys loved the pool. We would return again sometime in the future. Good Experience.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you for loving our hotel. We hope to see you soon.

Summary Heading: Average Hotel.  It met our needs and the only complaint...
Summary: Average Hotel.  It met our needs and the only complaint really was the extremely noisy people above us, but that has nothing to do with the Hotel
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for sharing your comments with us regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim. We are glad that we exceeded your expectations. We apologize for the noise you encountered during your stay. We can understand how this might have been annoying. Although not a common occurrence, we do make contact with any guests that are being loud or causing a  disturbance to others when brought to our attention.   We look forward to hosting your stay the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim "Best of Ramada Performance Award 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2007, 2006, 2005, 2003"

Summary Heading: A Good Experience I Would Reccomend Staying Here
Summary: A great stay within walking distance of Disney Land,excellent maid service,room was and smelled clean, beds and pillows were super comfy,tv programming was around 80 channels,pool,hot tub were clean as was pool area and complimentary towels in pool shower area,security was tight and felt safe there,evening management left pool open after hours and let us enjoy it unlike most places that come out and just run you off,breakfast was the only downfall, they need to change it up a bit on a daily basis however the food was decent, overall it was a great stay and I would do it again. Our stay was a 5 day vacation.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim. We are glad that our staff exceeded your expectations. We look forward to hosting your next stay while you are in the Anaheim Plaza area.  Sincerely, Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim "Best of Ramada Performance Award 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2007, 2006, 2005, 2003"

Summary Heading: Hotel is located in a great location, walking distance to...
Summary: Hotel is located in a great location, walking distance to theme parks.  Staff was helpful and hot breakfast was a plus with this hotel.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your positive response on Trip Advisor.  We value your comments and are glad to hear that your stay exceeded your expectations. We look forward to hosting your stay the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim "Best of Ramada Performance Award 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2007, 2006, 2005, 2003"

Summary: We stayed here for our trip to Disneyland. We are a family of 7 so I liked the fact that there were two beds and a sofa sleeper in the room we got. They also gave us 6 coupons for a buffet breakfast. Even with that being said I wish I would have put out the extra money for something a little nicer.. The apperance of the room overall  was worn down. It also had a weird smell. I think that the carpets could be replaced also. there was also mold on the ceiling in the bathroom. As far as the breakfast goes the juices were watered down, they served the same thing every day. There wasn't much of a variety. The first night we were there we went to the pool and as we were gathering our stuff to leave one of they employees yelled  "hey! the pool closes at 10! I thought that was EXTERMLY
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your recent stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are sorry that your stay did not meet your expectations. However, we appreciate your comments so that we may know the areas where we might improve,    Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim "Best of Ramada Performance Award 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2007, 2006, 2005, 2003"

Summary Heading: Great family accomodation that will not break the bank
Summary: This is great value. Very large rooms, clean and comfortable beds including the sofa bed. Free parking and breakfast included in accomodation price, very good and as much as you want. Staff at breakfast delightful. Desk staff helpful and smiling. Short stroll to Disneyland about 15 minutes easy flat walking. Many small take away shops literally next door. Great laundry in hotel. We enjoyed Bubba Gumps, just down the road. I have no hesitation in recommending this hotel for those with children looking for value. I will definately return here with my next lot of grandchildren and their visit to Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Valueed Guest:  Thank you for choosing the Ramada Plaza Anaheim to host your recent stay. We appreciate your comments on Trip Advisor and are glad that we met your hotel expectations. We look forward to seeing you in the future!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim "Best of Ramada Performance Award 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2007, 2006, 2005, 2003"

Summary Heading: Great special room rate, but at what price can you afford?
Summary: We received a great room rate, no charge for parking & a complimentary buffet breakfast. great start to a Disney vacation, right? Pros: Front desk staff were cordial & helpful. In room fridge, microwave & coffee. Cons: Room somewhat clean, but were alarmed that we found among miscellaneous debris scattered about on the carpet - and Advil tablet & small bobby pins (Good thing no baby/toddler was in our group or we may have had to deal w/ the effects of ingesting something(s) like that.) It led me to believe that the room had either not been vacuumed or the equipment housekeeping is using is not performing well. The pillows are lumpy and pillowcases badly pilled. The adjacent rooms are not well sound insulated. But, I understand that families w/ excited kids stay there when going
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to give us feedback on Trip Advisor regarding your stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are always striving to exceed guest expectations and your feedback allows us to know where we can improve. Although not required to provide a complimentary breakfast, we have decided to extend a hot breakfast to our guests that includes scrambled eggs, bacon, sausage, hashbrown, pancakes, assorted breads, hot and cold cereals, fruits, yogurt, juices, coffee , and milk as an added benefit to our guest at no additional charge, We are sorry if you felt the breakfast did not meet your expectations and will take your comments into consideration.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim "Best of Ramada Performance Award 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2007, 2006, 2005, 2003"

Summary: We stayed at this hotel with our two children. The location is convenience with a short walk to some great restaurants. I'd recommend the Cheese Cake Café just down the road. The hotel was clean and the staff were friendly. The walk to Disney was about 10-15 minutes which we expected but after a long day on your feet I'd prefer to be closer. The breakfast buffet was good and provides great value. I'd recommend this hotel and would consider staying again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your comments on trip Advisor regarding your recent stay with the Ramada Plaza Anaheim, We are glad that you enjoyed your stay with us and look forward to staying with us next time you are in the Anaheim Plaza area. Although just a short walk to and from Disneyland Resort, we can understand that it could still be tiring to walk after a long day at the park. An alternate option for next time is possiby taking the ART bus which picks up in front of the hotel for a minimal fee.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim "Best of Ramada Performance Award 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2007, 2006, 2005, 2003"

Summary Heading: Good hotel, clean room, great staff.  A little too far from...
Summary: Good hotel, clean room, great staff.  A little too far from Disneyland to walk, but we did it anyway!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are happy to see that you enjoyed your stay. We are sorry that you found the walk to Disneyland Resort to be long. Most people find the ten minute walk to be reasonable but we understand that people's preferences may vary. So, the next time you stay with us, may we suggest that you might take the ART bus to Disneyland Resort. It picks up in front of the hotel for a minimal fee.  We look forward to hosting your stay on your next visit.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed here, and payed more so we could have breakfast before going into Disneyland. The rooms were clean. The mattresses were just ok. Not the worst we have had, but not the best either.  I would say Costco sells better mattresses.  The walk is a little farther to the parks than we would like, but we knew that when we chose this hotel. Air conditioner was noisy.  The buffet style breakfast was very disappointing. I have had better food in the Army. The milk is in gallon jugs instead of individual cartons. In my mind, that is a lot of filthy hands touching it, and spreading the germs around. Bacon was left in its own grease, and just coated with it. Scrambled eggs, and hash browns were bland and tasteless. They do provide apple, orange,, and cranberry juice which tasted like
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to review our hotel on Trip Advisor.  We value your comments and utilize them as a way to improve.  We are sorry that you did not find our Complimentary American Breakfast up to your liking.  We do offer this as an added benefit at no extra charge to our guests, However, we will share these comments with the restaurant and work on ways we can improve.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We stayed here again with my son, daughter in law and two grand daughters. We all love the hotel. Breakfast buffet was good, room was very clean and organized, staff was friendly, tried to accommodate us in quick responses, and talked with me when I was waiting for my son during checking out. I would like to recomend this hotel and their service highly!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to respond on Trip Advisor. We are glad that your stay exceeded your expectations and we look forward to hosting your next visit in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: The staff tries hard, and the rooms are clean, but it is obvious that they are working on a tight budget.  3 of the 4 rooms we booked had major "issues".  1-toilet overflowed, flooding the bathroom and entry carpets.  No maintenece on site at the time, but staff promptly made arrangements for a room at the adjacent Holiday Inn Express, since the Ramada was sold out.  2-blood stained sheets and towels-not like an ax murder, but sheets and towels that remain stained (even after bleaching) need to be removed from "circulation".  They were technically clean-but still gross and disgusting.  3-the sprinklers went off in the bathroom-and NO, I was not smoking!!  The room was at the end of the hall, so perhaps it had something to do with pressure?  Once again, no maintenence on site at
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for sharing your comments regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We apologize that you experienced some problems during your recent visit.  We care deeply about the level of housekeeping and maintenance at our property and regret that we fell short in these areas during your stay. It is unsure what hour these problems took place. However, we do have a full time maintenance person during the day. We have forwarded these comments to both departments to rectify these issues.   Thank you again for your feedback!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: ♥ Was in town for a corporate meeting and stood at Ramada Anaheim Resort . No regrets at all :). I ♥ love the overall service. All of the staff were very lovely. I was upgraded to a suite upon check in. Room was very clean and comfortable. The location and property are very clean. Thank you so much for making me feel safe and comfortable♥.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your positive review on Trip Advisor. We are glad that your stay exceeded your expectations. We look forward to hosting your next stay while visiting the Anaheim Resort.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: No drinking glasses in room, only plastics.  When asked...
Summary: No drinking glasses in room, only plastics.  When asked why, was told that this was against the law for safety reasons.  What a bunch of bull!  No ice on 2nd and 3rd floor.  Very little on 4th floor.  When mentioned at check out, along with no glasses, was told that she would double check on my comment in a way as if it may not be true.  She should have said she would get it fixed ASAP.  Restaurant was so poor that no one goes there for dinner.  May as well have had a clown outside with a red flag waving people in.  Breakfast was terrible.  Every hot dish was cold. A real pig trough.  Restaurant reeking of curry.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are sorry that you did not care for  the plastic cups in the room and that you would have preferred glass. We are sorry that it was not explained properly to you why the hotel must use plastic cups versus glass. The Health Department requires glasses to be sterilized in a dishwasher when cleaned. The hotel does not have access to a dishwasher. Therefore, we must go with the plastic sealed cups. As for the ice machines, we were experiencing some maintenance problems with the ice machines at the time of your stay and we have worked on rectifying this problem.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Great all round - will be back
Summary: Location location 10 minute walk to disneyland. Great value excellent buffet breakfast included. Rooms a bit dated but comfortable and clean. Staff were very helpful and more then happy to assist. Highly recommend and will stay here again.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for your review regarding your stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We are glad that we exceeded your expectations during your stay and look forward to hosting your next visit to the Anaheim Resort area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I've stayed here twice and I have to say that I've been a very satisfied customer both times. The staff is excellent and the hotel is very clean and has a huge lobby. It's really pretty in there. The rooms are your standard hotel rooms, nicely decorated, nothing out of the ordinary but very well cared for. What it lacks in frills it delivers in care and service. The two times i have stayed (2010 & 2011) the hotel was consistent with its services. If you're planning to stay near Disneyland this is a great choice and tends to be affordable for he location. Plus, you can walk to the theme parks. It's just about a mile.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thanks for your patronage, and your praise for our cleanness, services, and location. We will always here to provide our guests the feeling of home away from home.

Summary: My older children and I stayed at the Ramada during a recent vacation to Disneyland. We had 2 rooms and ended up changing one room.  My son and his wife were put in a handicap accessible room.  For a number of reason, the room did not work well for them.  The staff changed their room with no hassles and the second room was much better.  The hotel is a nice 10-15 minutes walk to the park.  The daily hot breakfast was a nice bonus and saved us on our food costs. Someone (?manager)  checked in  with us every morning to see how breakfast was.  Our vacation was all about Disneyland and it was nice to to have a clean comfortable room to crash at night. The beds were comfortable and I didn't get a sore back which happens on some beds. I would stay here again.  There are hotels closer
Manager Response: Thank you very much for taking the time to review our facility. We are very happy to hear your stay was pleasant and that we were able to address the issue you encountered with the first room to your satisfaction. We look forward to having you again in the future.

Summary: Stayed in Early January 2013 it was exactly what we expected, the hotel is quite outdated and is in need of a revamp. The location is in close proximity to Disneyland and is also close to many restaurants as well. The WiFi from our hotel room was horrible and you could only sign up 2 devices at a time. The daily hot breakfast was good, but had a very small variety. Overall an average stay.
Manager Response: Thank you for your review. We appreciate the time you take to provide us with feedback.  It is unfortunate to hear the breakfast and Wi-fi were not up to par. We are currently planning an improved breakfast service and also will be upgrading the wireless hardware to better suit the compatibility with new electronic devices. We hope you consider our facility if you decide to visit the Disneyland Resort again.

Summary: Comfy beds Friendly staff Need fans in bathrooms Breakfast staff rude if still eating at 10am-vacuumed under feet, took food from under chin
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our facility. I regret to hear about your less than pleasant experience in the breakfast room. We are making changes to the breakfast service and would love to opportunity to serve you again if you choose to visit the Disneyland Resort.

Summary Heading: Convenient location with free hot breakfast… but in need of major remodeling.
Summary: This hotel has a very convenient location since it is 2 blocks from the park. The free hot breakfast was great and a good way to start the day before heading to the park. The staff was super friendly... BUT this hotel is in need of major remodeling. Our room was very run down. Luckily, we only slept and got ready in the room.
Manager Response: Thank you for reviewing our facility. We value all of our guests comments and concerns regarding this location. We are glad to hear that our service was of your satisfaction and hope to have you as a guest again during your next trip to the Disneyland Resort.

Summary: I had a super 3 days there.  Very friendly staff and cleaning crew, clean, ok breakfast but good Indian food restaurant, great location for Disney and Anaheim Convention Center.  I would stay here again.  John
Manager Response: Our staff is thrilled to hear that your stay with us was great! We hope to serve you again in your next visit to Anaheim. Thank you very much for taking the time to review our location.

Summary Heading: Nice Hotel within walking distance of Disneyland
Summary: My family of four (two kids) recently stayed at this hotel.  It was nice.  The lobby was clean and spacious.  It had free wi-fi which helped with my kids using their devices.   The hotel offers a free breakfast.  I thought it was fine.  My kids didn't think much of it, so they just had cereal everyday.  The breakfast included pancakes, bacon, eggs and some fresh fruit.   We stayed in a room with two queens.  The beds were fine, but we could hear traffic all night.   The staff was very friendly and helpful.   We walked to Disney and it was fine each morning.  It took about 15 minutes each way.  It might be a little far for kids under 6 after a full day at the park, but older kids had no problems.  The room included a flatscreen tv with plenty of channels.   The biggest negative
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest,  Thank you very much for loving our hotel. We already checked the shower head and the show system. Most of the water pressure should be fine now. Besides, we also add many variations to our breakfast, so the kids may enjoy the breakfast more. Again, thank you very much for considering our hotel, hope to see you again soon.

Summary: My family and I had all of our needs met at this hotel. Friendly staff, walking distance from Disneyland, great nearby restaurants, and a good breakfast. When we got to our room our fridge was not working. I called the front desk and within minutes we had a working fridge in our room. The facility was clean the lobby was a nice gathering area. We will defiantly stay at the Ramada Plaza again.
Manager Response: We are extremely happy to hear that our hotel met your expectations and that we were able to provide you with great service. We look forward to serving you again in the future. Thank you so much for taking the time to review our facility!

Summary: Room was pretty clean but was on 4th floor with very noisy machinery on top of my room.  Business center is scarce and the only restaurant served only Indian cuisine.  Staff was very friendly and helpful and hotel in close proximity to Anaheim Convention Center and Disneyland.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to respond with a positive review regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim. We strive to exceed guest expectations and we are glad we succeeded during your stay with us.  We look forward to seeing you the next time you are in the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim "Best of Ramada Performance Award 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2007, 2006, 2005, 2003"

Summary: My husband and I spent 6 nights at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim earlier this month.  I was attending a meeting at the Convention Center, but the hotel selected for the event was too expensive, PLUS they would have charged a per-day parking fee.  We saved money by staying at the Ramada Plaza and got to have a free breakfast included each morning.  On top of that, I still paid about $50 less per night than the event hotel.  We thought the room was comfortable and updated.  The only noise we heard was Disney's fireworks show on Sunday night.  Too bad our room didn't face west so we could have seen the show.  The hotel staff was friendly and helpful.  We would stay here again the next time we need to be in Anaheim.  It's a perfect location for people who want to go to Disney or the
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest: Thank you for taking the time to respond on Trip Advisor. We value your comments and are glad that you enjoyed your stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We look forward to seeing you in the future!  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Inn Anaheim "Best of Ramada Performance Award 2013, 2012, 2011, 2010, 2007, 2006, 2005, 2003"

Summary: I stayed 2 nights at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We had a family room which had 2 double beds and a sofa sleeper.  We had  a quiet room and couldn't hear out neighbors upstairs or on either side of us.  They do offer a free breakfast buffet; it is nothing to brag home about but it is free. It consisted of eggs, pancakes,bacon, sausage, hashbrowns, cereals, oatmeal, coffee juices and fruit. The hotel is near by restaraunts like P.F. Changs and Cheesecake factory and there is a liquor store and subway around the corner.  The ART shuttle stops right in front and drops you off at Disneyland.  A little expensive but we did have a pleasant stay and the staff was great.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to respond on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We are happy that your stay exceeded your expectations and we look forward to hosting you again on your next visit to the Anaheim Resort area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Easy Walk to Disney, Basic Room, Free Parking & Buffet Breakfast!
Summary: We arrived at 9pm on Christmas Night for our Big Christmas Surprise Trip with our 9 & 12 year old kids. We stayed for 3 nights in a double queen room. Check in was quick and the staff was all nice. Great location to Disney (easy walk to either park in 10 minutes), tons of free underground parking, elevators were quick and the room was clean and better then we expected. Beds were comfortable, towels were clean & T.V had a good selection of stations. Each night at 9:30pm we could see the fireworks set off by the castle in Disneyland (just request a higher floor room facing Katella Ave when you book). We could see the lghts from Carsland & the back of California Adventures Park from our windows. The strong spice smell in the lobby from the Indian Restaurant was concerning but once
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim.  We are happy to hear that we exceeded your expectations and helped your family to form some happy memories around Christmas time. We look forward to hosting your next stay in the Anaheim Resort area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: My daughter and i stayed in the Ramada Plaza Anaheim for 3 nights, just to visit disneyland. we started in room 228 but the ice machine 2 doors down vibratored the walls so much we had to change rooms. We moved up stairs to the the top floor. No help moving our bags.... Now all we can hear is the lovley hmmm of the air con on the roof.  Buffet breakfast is disgusting. if you like over cooked everything dripping in oil then you will love it. cook a piece of toast and run. Then if you feel like relaxing in your room, dont go and buy a bottle of wine with a cork in it cause they don't have a cork screw in the bloody place...aaarrrhhh.   Positives: beds are comfy , Location, Flat screen TV Neg : Pillows are not, Service...NO service, Breakfast YUCK!!
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments with us regarding your stay at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We strive to exceed guest expectations and we are sorry that we fell short in your case. Although not required to provide a complimentary breakfast, we have added this as an added benefit to our guest at no additional cost. Further, we are in communication with our restaurant operator to work on ways we can improve on an already great American Buffet Breakfast.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Overall, this was a good hotel for its location and cost. The breakfast buffet was much better than expected. The staff was always very friendly and welcoming.   The room was not anything special but served its purpose. Disney was a nice 15 minute walk.   Would stay there again given location.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to respond on Trip Advisor. We appreciate your comments and use them as a way to make improvements.  We look forward to hosting your next visit while staying in the Anaheim Plaza area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Clean choice within walking distance of Disneyland
Summary: Clean hotel that is within walking distance to disneyland (<1 miles or about 10-15min at a brisk pace).  Buffet breakfast is provided - nothing amazing, but it is free.  If you take the Disneyland Resort Express bus it will pick you up at the corner bus station at Harbour Blvd and Katella.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to respond on Trip Advisor. We appreciate your comments and use them as a way to make improvements.  We look forward to hosting your next visit while staying in the Anaheim Plaza area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Facility fantastic, most staff helpful, room very comfortable and well cared for. Had issues with people in the room next door-loud, asked front desk for help, they were hesitant. Bfast buffet so so.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate your comments and use them as a way to improve so that we may provide a service that exceeds guest expectations. We are pleased to know that you had an enjoyable stay and we look forward to hosting your future visit when you visit the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: I found the Ramada plaza to be in a great location, walking distance to the Anaheim Garden Walk (restaurants/bars), Convention Centre and Disneyland.  The room and bed were comfortable, the free breakfast was adequate and plentiful although it could be a bit chaotic on weekends and peak times.  Also there was an issue with not enough hot water on the weekend too! The staff were friendly and helpful and the free wifi was an added bonus.  I was even able to print out something I had forgotten from their desktop in the lounge area/reception.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate your comments and use them as a way to improve so that we may provide a service that exceeds guest expectations. We are pleased to know that you had an enjoyable stay and we look forward to hosting your future visit when you visit the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We had a two queen beds room which was pleasant and spacious. So close to Disneyland and free parking in the downstairs garage. Free wifi and helpful staff. Buffet breakfast included, not the best quality but adequate and plenty of food for hungry people. There was allways fresh coffee in the lobby and also some comfortable lounged to sit on! In our 3 1/2 week trip this was one of my favourite hotels.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate your comments and use them as a way to improve so that we may provide a service that exceeds guest expectations. We are pleased to know that you had an enjoyable stay and we look forward to hosting your future visit when you visit the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: Wonderful Disneyland experience, shame about bad breakfast
Summary: I got a good deal for two rooms. Hotel gave us adjoining rooms with connecting door. Wonderful room, very comfortable beds, flat screen TV, nice bathroom.  Plenty of free parking in the hotel garage. Free wi-fi. Staff is very friendly and helpful. Hotel is about a 12 minute walk from the entrance to the Disneyland resort.   Only big letdown was the breakfast. It was free, included in our excellent two room rate. However, it was very basic and very low quality American breakfast, tasteless pancakes, badly cooked eggs, dry (not fresh) bagels.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate your comments and use them as a way to improve so that we may provide a service that exceeds guest expectations. Although not required to provide a complimentary breakfast, we chose to do so as an added benefit to our guest. We are presently working with the restaurant to find ways to improve our breakfast in order to best service our guests.  We are pleased to know that overall you had an enjoyable stay and we look forward to hosting your future visit when you visit the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary Heading: No Heat, No Hot Water, Dirty Blanket and no Customer Service
Summary: It was HORRIBLE!   First night no heat, followed by lukewarm showers the next morning.   Then a move to another room the following night because they could or did not fix the heat, and they did not take the courtesy to leave us a message or a note that they could not repair.  We were not asked if we needed assistance to moving to the other room either!   Then, the next morning we  wake up to NO HOT water for a shower, which we were told a boiler was down and the problem would be solved that day, only to return to the room again late in the evening to find out that we still did not have any hot water for a shower the following morning...still no follow-up from their staff with a message or note.   Also, the blanket in the first room was dirty. Lastly, the food at the buffet was
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate your comments and use them as a way to improve so that we may provide a service that exceeds guest expectations. We are sorry that we failed to do so during your recent stay with us. We obviously were having some hot water issues during your stay which we can totally understand how this would be an inconvenience. Although not a reoccurring problem, we could have handled this situation better.  Please accept our sincere apologies and we hope that you would consider giving us another try in the future. Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Arrived early and was able to check in which always begins a hotel stay the right way.  The room was nice and clean but we did experience a minor issue with the hot water not being plentiful during shower.  The vending machine on our floor was out of bottle water all 4 nights of our stay which was only a minor problem due to the floor below vending machine was well stocked.  The complimentary breakfast was in the restaurant in the lobby.  Food was mediocre and the selection never changed but the price was right so it was fine.  The convention center, Disneyland, and Garden walk were all relatively close which is very convenient.  We would use this hotel again.
Manager Response: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate your comments and use them as a way to improve so that we may provide a service that exceeds guest expectations. We can understand the inconvenience of the vending machine not being fully stocked during a busy time at the hotel. We will review this area for future stays and guests. We are pleased to know that overall you had an enjoyable stay and we look forward to hosting your future visit when you visit the Anaheim Resort Area.  Sincerely,  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: Great Hotel. Near of Disney complex, so you can go by walking with no problem. Free (and fast) internet and parking. Large room. The room was really cleaned every day. The staff was very polite. I had a kidney stone and they called 911 right away and after that, when I returned from the hospital, always asking if I was better and ok. Nice staff! Breakfast was ok. I highly recommend this hotel for family, couples or singles.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate your comments and use them as a way to improve so that we may provide a service that exceeds guest expectations. We are pleased to hear that your stay was an enjoyable one and we look forward to hosting your next stay in the Anaheim Resort area.  Sincerely. Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: My wife and I had a day planned for fun. We live local, however we wanted a little get away. After going to Bubba Gumps for dinner and a show at the Hard Rock. We had a wonderful visit at The Ramada. I had never stayed there before yet my wife remembers great times with her family visiting the establishment when she was a child. The accommodations were all top notch. Thank you for a great stay. When we decide to travel again, we will find a Ramada.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate your comments and use them as a way to improve so that we may provide a service that exceeds guest expectations. We are pleased to hear that your stay was an enjoyable one and we look forward to hosting your next stay in the Anaheim Resort area.  Sincerely. Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: We had a great stay here.  hot breakfast buffet every morning was quite good.  a little more selection on cereal for the kids would have been nice, and also if they served coffee to the table and had the tables preset with napkins/cutlery would have made it a bit less chaotic as it got very busy in the buffet lineup, but overall we were very happy with it.  the staff were friendly and helpful.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate your comments and use them as a way to improve so that we may provide a service that exceeds guest expectations. We have reviewed your comments regarding our Complimentary American Buffet Breakfast and we will share them with the restaurant operator.  We are pleased to hear that overall your stay was an enjoyable one and we look forward to hosting your next one in the Anaheim Resort area.  Sincerely. Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: It's about a 15 min walk to Dland but other than that, everything at the hotel was great.  Friendly and helpful staff, clean rooms - especially beds.  Free breakfast includes eggs, bacon, sausage, pancake, cereal, oatmeal,....very decent.  The hotel is also very close to 'garden walk' - they have some great restaurants there so you may not need a vehicle during your visit.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest: Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate your comments and use them as a way to improve so that we may provide a service that exceeds guest expectations. Summary: Clean, quiet rooms and efficient service. It would have been difficult for us to make a better choice.   I did not have one complaint about any aspect of our five-night stay, except one petty point: the over the top hot American breakfast would've been improved by offering a fruit salad and croissants on the buffet line.

Summary: We just got back from staying at the Ramada Plaza for 5 days over Christmas break.  For the money it was a very good value.  The lobby was clean, staff was friendly, room was clean, and it is close enough to walk to Disneyland.  We thought it might be far for our kids, but it is only a 10-15 minute walk.  Convenient location (walking distance) to good restaurants such as Cheesecake Factory and PF Changs.   The hotel includes breakfast (eggs, toast, bagels, sausage, bacon & cereal), so something for everyone.  I would stay again.  Over the Christmas break all the hotels near Disney were sky high and/or sold out, this hotel rates stayed reasonable and by doing so they have gained a new customer.  :)  Oh, and free parking!!

Summary: Chose this hotel as it was advertised as one block from Disneyland. The bereakfast buffet selection was poor and quite tastless. We opted to go elsewhere for breakfast. We reported the toilet as broken one evening. Thety said someone would be up to fix it, however no noe showed up at all, and we were left with no toilet facilities up until we left at 10.30am the next day. We had to go from the 4th floor down in the elevator to the ground floor to use the public restroom in the hotel throughout the night. Im wondering if they got it fixed in time for the next person to occupy the room

Summary: We found this to be excellent value for a couple spending a few days at Disneyland and hitting the other standard tourist visits in Southern California. The price was very reasonable and included a solid breakfast.  The rooms were clean and we didn't have any issues with noise.  If you don't have small children, the walk is extremely manageable - about 10 minutes.    Overall there is no question we would stay here again if we visit the area.

Summary: Dont leave out small valuables. Cleaner decided to help them selves to an ipod that fell off the bedside table during the night.  Was gone after rhe cleaners had been.  Not judging the hotel as a whole but its a warning.  Still havent received theft report or police report either which they promised.
Manager Response: Dear Valued Guest:  Thank you for taking the time to share your comments on Trip Advisor regarding your stay with us at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. We appreciate your comments and use them as a way to improve so that we may provide a service that exceeds guest expectations. Although we are sorry that your phone is missing,   we would like to stress that the Ramada Plaza Anaheim adheres to a strict policy when it comes to Lost and Found items. All items found must be turned into the Front Desk the same day where they are logged and held for 90 days. Failure to do so, can result in severe consequences to our employees.  Further, we do have extreme confidence in the honesty and integrity of our employees and have not found missing items to be of any issue at the Ramada Plaza Anaheim. In regards to a police report, it is up to the guest discretion to file a police report. We are not able to do so on behalf of the guest.  Management Ramada Plaza Anaheim

Summary: After looking at reviews in Trip Advisor, we decided on Ramada Plaza Anaheim for our stay in Anaheim. Main factors for us are price, location, and room quality. Overall we rate our stay 3.5 stars. Here are the details: 1. Price We get good price from a third party online travel agents. It was lower than comparable hotels around the area. Rating 4/5.  2. Location We want to stay near (walking distance) to Disneyland. Reviews said between 5-20 minutes. We times our walk to the main entrance of Disneyland, and it was nearer to 15 minutes (which is still okay), and we walked quite fast also. So the 5 minutes must refer to running. Hotel is also very near to several fast food / restaurants, supermarkets and even the Anaheim GardenWalk. Rating 4/5.  3. Room quality The first room we

Summary: We had a wonderful experience when we stayed at the Ramada Plaza on our recent trip to Disneyland. The park was only about a 10-15 minute walk from the hotel.  We have two children, ages 5 and 7, and they easily walked it.  Granted, it was a bit of a challenge after a full day in the park to walk home (we were all exhausted), but it was fine.  All we were looking for with a free breakfast was some sort of sustenance to get us going until lunch.  Well, this part of our stay far exceded our expectations! Summary: We booked in September for a stay in early December and got a good rate for our family of 4. In addition to that, the email confirming our reservation contained an online coupon for National Car Rental, which allowed us to save 30% off our car rental. Not a bad deal at all! As many have said before, the hotel's proximity to Disney is excellent. As can be seen from my attached photo, the Tower of Terror in Disney's California Adventure was so close to our room. If you can't bear the 10-15 minute walk, ART bus no.2 stops directly in front of the hotel to send or pick you up form Disney for USD3 one way or USD5 for a day pass. Breakfast is pretty basic and even if you don't eat meat, other options are enough to keep you full. Note that the staff strictly enforce the 10.00 am

Summary: Stayed here with the wife and two kids.  Room was average sized but did the job of accommodating us comfortably.  The wall to the adjoining room was not as thick as I would of liked.  I could here the neighbors very clearly but admittedly they were a loud bunch clearly obsessed with some kind of sport on the tv. The hotel is almost on the corner of the street that Disneyland is on. In the morning following breakfast its an easy 10 -15 min walk to the gates.  The walk back doesn't feel nearly as quick when you've spend the whole day walking around the Disney parks.  Art bus number 2 can drop you off in a jiffy. Breakfast downstairs in the on site Indian Restaurant was basic. Scrambled eggs were dry and bacon was always greasy and overcooked.  Pancakes were okay.  Nothing

Summary: We stayed at the Ramada Plaza this past weekend on our visit to Disneyland.  We really enjoyed our stay.   The staff was very helpful providing  great phone directions to their hotel when our gps froze stranding us in the middle of a not so nice area of LA, and provided printed directions to area attractions after arrival.  The manager greeted you personally making sure all your needs were met and was available during breakfast for any further help.  Loved the full breakfast buffett in the morning and being a 10 minute walk to Disneyland was a definite plus.  There is also a $5 a day shuttle that stops right in front of the hotel.   The service, free parking, and helpfulness of the staff and manager made it a very enjoyable stay!

Summary: Last August my family and I spent 12 nights in this hotel. We chose this hotel due to the proximity to Disney and we weren't wrong. Staff was friendly and welcoming, whenever we needed anything during our stay they were more than happy to help. Also, in the reception area there was a stand with magazines and coupons which was handy whenever we needed suggestions. The first room we got was nice and had a pool view but during our first night we noticed that there was a voice coming from the AC and we complained the next day. Summary: Spent 2 mights here and chose based on location. Was a 10 - 15 minute walk to Disney gates so very convenient, rooms were good size and comfortable bed though our bathroom was a little tired, small crack in sink but not a big issues. safe underground car park with plenty of space to park and staff were all pleasant. Had a laundry which proved useful, hadnt banked on weather being so good!  Only negative was didnt think much of the breakfast or the staff that ran that side of the business. Ran out of fruit, cutlery etc and wasn't overly busy at the time.  Plenty of other places to eat though and overall a nice hotel if looking for somewhere to stay near to Disney

Summary: Our family just got back from a family vacation at Walt Disney Land.  We had the pleasure of staying at the Ramada Plaza  for 4 nights.  We were so thrilled by the location. 10 min.  walking distance to DL , very clean, and very quiet.  Staff was sooo  accommadating and helpful with any questions we had. Wonderful complimentary full breakfast buffet .  Free parking at hotel is such a money saver. Plenty of dinning and shopping just a couple of yards from hotel.  Garden Walk has plenty of restaurants (Cheesecake Factory, Bubba Gump ,PF Changs and others)  Highly recommend this hotel to anyone.  You will not be disappointed.  Great for families.  This is one of the nicest hotels we found on the strip for the price and location .  You wont be disappointed.   Sincerely , Connecticut

The staff was exceptionally helpful and friendly, going above and beyond to see to our satisfaction. The complimentary breakfasts were very good and filling (and saved us more than a few dollars eating at the parks).   Any family hoping to have a great trip to Disneyland/California Adventure should consider the Ramada Plaza as it is a fantastic hotel at a very, very affordable price.
